<p>60b.1</p>pas rI yA ga ma'o/ /pa rI pr-i t+ya te/ pa rI br-i d+h+ya te/ dr-i shir/ da ri dr-i sh+ya te/ dza rI dzrim+b+h+ya te/ sa rI sr-i bya te/ nI ri naM d+ya te/ shA rI shr-i d+h+ya te/ dzA rI gr-I d+h+ya te/ pa rI pr-i sh+ts+ya te/ pa rI pr-its+tsha te/ D+hau kr-i/ Dau D+hau kya te/ trau kr-i/ to trau kya te/ sU tsa/ sU tra/ sUtra/ mU tra/ tsu ra sogs nyid
<p>60b.2</p>kyi phyir ina'o/ /r-ita sogs rnams las kyang ngo zhes pas ya rkyen no/ /kA ri ti'i Am iT bi ka ra Na ma yin pa la'o zhes pas kA ri ta'i dbyi'o/ /so sU ts+ya te/ so sU t+r+ya te/ mo mU t+r+ya te/ a sha /a shA sh+ya te/ aT/ a TA T+ya te/ dngos po dang las dag la
<p>60b.3</p>yaNa'o/ /a'i yang dbyi'o zhes pas a yig dbyi'o/ /ya'i an med pa la'o zhes pas ya yig dbyi'o/ /bA pa Sh+ya te/ bi b+hi d+ya te/ de bzhin du thams cad du blta bar bya'o/ /sap+ta mI/ lo lU ye ta/ bany+tsa mI/ le lU ya tA ma/ h+yasta nI/ a lo lU ya ta/ 
<p>60b.4</p>a d+ya ta nI/ A lo lU yi Sh+Ta/ pa rok+ShA/ rkyen gyi mtha' nyid las A ga ma'o/ /lo lU yAM ce kre/ shwasta nI/ lo lU yi tA/ A shiH lo lU yi Sh+TiSh+Ta/ b+ha bi Sh+yan+ti/ lo lU yi Sh+ya te/ kr-i yA ti pat+tiH a lo lU yi Sh+ya ta/ de ltar tse kr-i yi ta'i yul bstan pa'o/ /tse kr-I yi
<p>60b.5</p>ta 'jig pa brjod par bya'o/ /de'i a tsa la 'jig go zhes sbyor ba tha dad pa las tsi kr-I yi ta dbyi'o/ /tsarka rI taM yang ngo zhes kha cig go zhes pas pa rasmai'i tshig go/ /Ata sogs nyid las an 'jig go/ /tsarka rI ta las yang na'o zhes pas byings thams cad
<p>60b.6</p>pa gsal byed dang po yon tan can la yang na iT A ga ma'o/ /lo la bI ti/ lo lo ti/ lo lU taH gnyis ka a b+h+yA sta'o zhes pas a b+h+ya sta'i ming ngo / /a b+h+yasta las a n+ti'i na dbyi'o zhes pas na dbyi'o/ /lo lu ba ti/ lo la bI Shi/ lo lo Shi/ lo lU thaH 
<p>60b.7</p>lo lU tha/ lo la bI mi/ lo lo mi/ lo lU paH lo lU maH ba da/ bA ba dI tI/ bA bat+ti/ bA bat+taH bA ba da ti/ kru sha /a b+h+ya sta'i 'ang u pa d+hA nA mina'o/ /byings thams cad pa/ yon tan la dbyangs la'o zhes pas yon tan bkag go/ /tse kru shI ti/ tsau kruSh+TaH 
<p>61a</p>
<p>61a.1</p>tso kru sha ti/ mu da dga' ba la'o/ /mo mu dI ti/ mo mot+toH mo mut+taH mo mu da ti/ sap+ta mI/ mo mu d+yA ti/ pany+tsa mI/ mo mu di tu/ mo mot+tu/ mo mut+tA ta/ mo mud+dA ma/ mo mud tu/ hu d+huT dag las hi'i d+hi'o zhes pas d+hi'i dngos po'o/ /mo
<p>61a.2</p>mud+ti/ mo mut+tA ta/ mo mut+tAm/ mo mut+ta/ mo mu di ni/ mo mu dA pa/ mo mu dA mi/ h+ya sta nI/ a mo mu dI ta/ a mo mo ta/ a mo mut+tAm/ a mo mu duH a d+ya ta nI/ iT ni las kyang IT la'o zhes pas si tsa'i dbyi'o/ /a mo mo dI ta/ a mo mo dI ta/ a mo mo
<p>61a.3</p>daSh+TI ma/ a mo mo di ShuH a mo mo dIH khA dr-i/ a tsa khA dISh+TAm/ a tsA ShA dI ShuH A tsA ShA dIH gr-i d+hu/ mngon par 'dod pa la'o/ /r-i ldan pa'i rI'o zhes pas rI A ga ma'o/ /dza rI gr-i d+hI ti/ ri dang ra dag kyang tse kr-i yi ta zhig pa la'o zhes pas ri dang ra dag tu
<p>61a.4</p>yang 'gyur ro/ /dzA ri gr-i d+hI ti/ dza r+g+r-i d+hI ti/ dza ri gar+d+hi/ dza ri gar+d+d+hi/ dzar+g+gir+d+d+hi/ h+yasta nI/ a dza rI gr-i d+hI da/ a dza rI gr-i d+hI ta/ a dza r-I gr-i d+hi ta/ a dzar+g+raM d+hI ta/ a dza rI g+har+t+ta/ a dza rI g+har+t+ta/ a dzar+g+gar+t+ta/ a dza r-I gr-id+d+hA ma/ a dza ri gr-i d+d+hAm/ a dza r+g+r-id+d+hA ma/ a dza
<p>61a.5</p>rI gr-i d+huH a dza ri gr-i d+huH a dzar+g+ra d+huH sa'o/ /yon tan no/ /phyis pa la'ang di si dag la'o zhes pas dang po bzhi pa nyid de ga yig gi g+ha yig go/ /tshig mtha'i si la zhes sogs kyis brjod par byed pa'i phyir ra nyid do/ /ra'i ra la dbyi zhing dbyangs snga ma'ang ring po'o/ /a dzar+g+hAH 
<p>61a.6</p>sa par+d+d+ha/ a ba spAH kur+d+ha/ a tso kUH rA d+ha dang sA d+ha yang dag par grub pa la'o/ /a rA rAH nar+d+ha/ a nA nAH de lta bu la sogs pa rnams blta bar bya ba rnams so/ /de ltar tse kr-I ya ti/ 'jig pa'i yul bstan pa'o// //in brjod par bya'o/ /yA thob
<p>61a.7</p>pa la'o/ /la lar de la gzhan rab tu sbyor ba la yA ti gang yin pa de/ de'i rgyur 'gyur zhes pas byings las kyang rgyu la'o zhes pas in rkyen no/ /na yig ni a'i u pa d+hA'i zhes sogs kyi khyad par gyi don to/ /ar+t+ti hrI bl-I ri zhes sogs kyis pa yig A ga ma'o/ /
<p>61b</p>
<p>61b.1</p>yA ba ya ti/ in mtha' nyid las gnyis ka'i tshig go/ /yA pa ya te/ Du dAnya/ dA pa ya te/ Du d+hAnya/ d+hA pa ya taM/ d+hA pa ya ti/ d+ha ba ya te/ san+ni d+hA pa ya ti/ sho/ phra mor byed pa la'o/ /tshi/ gcod pa la'o/ /Sho/ /mtha'i las la'o/ /hwenya/ 'gran pa la'o/ /
<p>61b.2</p>b+henya/ kun nas sgrib pa la'o/ /penya/ snal ma'i rgyud la'o/ /d+heT dang pA/ btung pa la'o/ /'di rnams kyi mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge'i mtha' nyid las A nyid do/ /ni shA pa ya ti/ a bats+tsha ba ya ti/ sA ya ya ti/ hwA pa ya ti/ byA la ya ti/ gA ya ya ti/ 
<p>61b.3</p>shAts+tsha/ swa hwA byA be pA rnams kyi in la'o zhes pas A yi ru bsgyur ro/ /pA bsrung ba la'o/ /pA ta'i la mtha'o zhes bsal yig A ga ma'o/ /pA la la ti/ sming / cung zad rgod pa la'o/ /smi dzi kr-I id rnams kyi in la zhes pas A nyid do/ /pa yig A ga
<p>61b.4</p>ma'o/ /rgyu byed pa la b+hi smi dag la in la'o zhes pas At+ma de'i tshig go/ /bisma ba ya ti/ rgyu byed pa po'i 'jig pa la sming mngon par brjod pa'i phyir 'dir rgyu las 'jig pa la mi 'gyur ro/ /kuny+tsi ka yi ni bi smA ba ya ti/ dzi/ rgyal ba la'o/ /Du kr-Inya/ rdzas 'tshod pa
<p>61b.5</p>la'o/ /ing / klog pa la'o/ /A nyid do/ /pa yig A ga ma'o/ /dzA pa ya ti/ krA pa ya ti/ a d+h+yA ba ya ti/ b+hA ti'i in mtha' rgyu 'jig pa la yang 'jug ste ru tsa sogs gnas pa'i phyir At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /muN+Do b+hA pa ya te/ rgyu byed pa b+hI smi dag la i na'o zhes
<p>61b.6</p>bas At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /b+hi Shi tsin+ti zhes gsungs pa'i phyir b+hI las Sha mtha' nyid do/ /muN+Do b+hI Sha ya ti/ gzhan la pa ra sme'i tshig go/ /'phel ba dang A ya ru bsgyur ba dag go/ /kuny+tsaM ka yin b+ha ya pa ti/ spu ra/ 'phro ba la'o/ /bi sngon du'o/ /rnam par 'phro'o
<p>61b.7</p>zhes pas dngos po la g+hanya'o/ /yon tan no/ spu ri spu li dag gi ota'i g+hanya la'o zhes pas A nyid do/ /de byed do zhes pas ina'o/ /rgyu brjod par 'dod pa la slar yang ina'o/ /kA ri ta'i A ma AM ta pi ka ra Na ma yin pa la'o zhes pas kA ri ta dbyi'o/ /bi s+pha
<p>62a</p>
<p>62a.1</p>ra ya ti/ rnam par 'phro bzhin pa la rab tu sbyor ro zhes pas rgyu la ina'o/ /bi s+pho ra ya ti/ tsa pa rgyud la ste/ sogs pa la yang ngo / /tsA pa ya ti/ tsinya/ tsA ba ya ti/ Tu ba pa/ rab tu skyed pa la yang ngo / /bu ro bA to gaH pra pA ba ya ti/ 
<p>62a.2</p>rab tu skyed pa la'o/ /pra pA ba ya ti/ mngal 'dzin du 'jug go zhes pa'i don to/ /rA d+ha dang sA d+ha/ yang dag par grub pa la'o/ /'jig rten pha rol ma yin pa la/ grA mi sA/ d+hA ya ti/ an+naM sA d+ha ya ti/ 'jig rten pha ro tu/ ta paH sA d+hA ya ti/ d+har+m+ma sA
<p>62a.3</p>d+ha ya ti/ Shi d+hu 'gro ba la'o/ /aM n+na sa d+ha ya ti/ grA maM se d+ha ya ti/ sgrub par byed pa yis kyang tA pastA pa saM se d+ha ya ti/ rA dang lA/ len pa la'o/ /slu ba dang mngon par 'jig pa dag la yang lA ti las so zhes pas At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /kasta mul+lA ba ya te/ 
<p>62a.4</p>sh+ye no partI kA mul+la pa ya ti/ slu ba dang mngon par zil gyis gnon pa dag la yang li sa'i kA ri ta la rab tu sbyor ba med pa mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro/ /mInya dang drunya/ 'tsho ba la'o/ /Du minya/ rab tu 'phen pa la'o/ /ding / zad pa la'o/ /mAM mA ti mi no ti
<p>62a.5</p>dI rnams kyi yon tan 'phel ba gnas pa la'o zhes pas A nyid do/ /pa yig A ga ma'o/ /mA pa ya ti/ bra mA ya ti/ e ba dA ba ya ti/ r-i/ 'gro ba la'o/ /hri/ ngo tsha la'o/ /bli/ sgrib pa la'o/ /r-i 'tshe ba la yang ngo / /k+nu yI/ sgra la'o/ /k+Sh+mA yI/ 
<p>62a.6</p>rnam par 'dar ba la'o/ /ar+t+ti hrI bl-i rI k+nu yI k+Sh+ma yI Ata mtha' rnams kyi pa mtha' ste ya dbyi zhing nA mi rnams kyi yon tan 'ang ngo zhes pas ba yig A ga ma'o/ /ya dbyi ba dang nA min rnams kyi yon tan yang ji lta bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ar+pa ya ti/ sa marba
<p>62a.7</p>ya ti/ hre pa ya ti/ ts+le/ p+le pa ya ti/ re pa ya ti/ k+no pa ya ti/ k+Sh+ma pa ya ti/ shr-inya/ shrA pa ya ti/ NInya/ nA pa ya ti/ d+h+yanya/ mgul pa la'o/ /brinya/ tshim pa la'o/ /d+hUnya/ pr-I NA ti dag gi na'o zhes pas na yig A ga ma'o/ /pi d+hU na ya ti/ pr-I Na ya ti/ d+hUnya/ 
<p>62b</p>
<p>62b.1</p>prI N-I ti dag gi zhes nges par bstan pa las 'dir na yig A ga mar mi 'gyur ro/ /d+hU/ rnam par bskyod pa la'o/ /prIng / dga' ba la'o/ /bi d+hU ba ya ti/ brA ba ya ti/ bi lI naM ka ro ti/ in mtha' las slar yang rgyu brjod par 'dod pa la ina'o/ /kA ri ta dpyi'o/ /
<p>62b.2</p>g+h+r-i taM bi lI na ya ti/ la la/ 'dod pa la'o/ /g+h+r-I tI bi lA ya ti/ sna ha/ zhu bar byed pa la li pa'i kA ri ta la 'jug pa yang na yod par mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro/ /pA dza 'gro ba la ste 'gul ba la yang ngo / /phyogs kyis u pa bA dza ya ti/ yang na byis las
<p>62b.3</p>mgul pa la kA ra ta la mi 'jug go/ /du/ dA ba ya ti/ dru/ drA ba ya ti/ sru/ srA pa ya ti/ lUnya/ lA ba ya ti/ b+hU/ b+hA ba ya ti/ Sh+Tunya/ stA ba ya ti/ r-i yig mtha' rnams/ kr-inya/ /kA ra ya ti/ hrinya/ ha ra ya ti/ br-inya/ bA ra ya ti/ br-I/ pA ra ya ti/ dbyangs
<p>62b.4</p>la yang na'o zhes pas la nyid do/ /ni gA le ya ti/ gsal byed mtha' rnams/ bA tsa ya ti/ pA Tha ya ti/ ha na/ ina'o/ /a'i u pa d+hA'i ring po'o/ /han+ti'i ta'o zhes pas ta yig go/ /han+ti'i ha'i in i tsa dag la g+hi'o zhes pas ha yig go g+ha yig go/ /
<p>62b.5</p>g+hA ta ya ti/ nyi Sh+wa pa/ swA pa ya te/ a di dang p+sA/ za ba la'o/ /a di ShA di dag la dgag pa brjod par bya'o zhes pas in mtha' byed pa po las kyi ming bkag go/ /A da ya ti/ /bA da ya ti/ b+hi daM ra/ b+he da ya ti/ tshe dir/ tshe da ya ti/ u r+hA/ kun nas 'khrug
<p>62b.6</p>pa la'o/ /yo d+hA ya ti/ br-i tu/ 'jug pa la'o/ /brta ya ti/ kr-i bU/ kr-i pa'i ra'i la'o zhes pas la nyid do/ /kalba ya ti/ /kr-I DI/ kr-I Da ya ti/ kU dza/ kU je ya ti/ D+hau kr-i/ D+hau ka ya ti/ si tsa/ si tsa ya ti/ d+h+wan+su/ d+h+waM sa ya ti/ du Sha/ rnam 'gyur nyid la'o/ /du
<p>62b.7</p>Sha'i kA ri ta la'o zhes pas o yig gi U yig go/ /dU Sha ya ti/ sems 'dod chags dang bral ba las yang na ste/ pradz+nyAM du Sha ya te/ pradz+nyAM do Sha ya ti/ s+phA ya/ s+phA yi'i ba ru bsgyur ba'o zhes pas ba yig go/ /s+phA ba ya ti/ sha dI/ dman par byed pa
<p>63a</p>
<p>63a.1</p>la'o/ /sha di'i 'gro ba min pa la ta'o zhes pas ta yig tu bsgyur ro/ /pha lA ni sha ta ya ti/ gzhan la/ gAH shA da ya ti/ 'gro bar byed do zhes pa'i don to/ /skye ba'i don la yang ru pi'o zhes pas/ br-I hrI ni ro pa pa ya ti/ kA R+Ya ma d+h+ya ro pa ya
<p>63a.2</p>ti/ ar+thaM sa mA ro pa ya ti/ ru hi las ni/ A ro ha ya ti/ hasti hasti pa kaM/ ma rjes su 'brel pa brjod par bya'o/ /g+ha Ta/ byed pa la'o/ /g+ha Ta la sogs pa rnams rjes su 'brel pa rnams so/ /a'i u pa d+hA'i ring po'o/ /ma rjes su 'brel pa rnams kyi thung
<p>63a.3</p>ngu'o/ /g+ha Ta ya ti/ bya tha/ sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa g.yo ba dag la'o/ /bya tha ya ti/ pra tha/ rab tu bshad pa la'o/ /pra tha ya ti/ mre da nyed pa la'o/ /mra da ya ti/ s+kha da/ za ba la'o/ /s+kha da ya ti/ k+Sha dzi/ 'gro ba la ste sbyin pa la yang ngo / /
<p>63a.4</p>dak+Sha 'tshe ba la yang ngo / /g+ha Ta la sogs pa klog pa'i stobs las u pa d+hA'i 'ang ring po nyid ma yin no/ /k+Shany+dza ya ti/ da k+Sha ya ti/ kra pa/ kra ba ya ti/ kan+da ya ti/ kran+da ya ti/ kra da ya ti/ kla da ya ti/ nye twa rA/ twa ra ya ti/ gzhan la/ twA ra ya ti/ dz+wa ra/ 
<p>63a.5</p>dz+wa ra ya ti/ ga Da/ ga Daya ti/ he Da/ bskor ba la'o/ /mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge rnams kyi thung ngur bsgyur te e ta uta dag go zhes pas e yig gi e yig go/ /hi Da ya ti/ pa Ta yi ti/ b+ha Ta ya ti/ na Ta/ 'gro ba la'o/ /na Ta ya ti/ gzhan la/ nA Ta
<p>63a.6</p>ya ti/ Sh+Ta ka /thogs pa la'o/ /sta ka ya ti/ tsa ka / tshim pa la'o/ /tsa ka ya ti/ ka khe/ dgod pa la'o/ /ka ga ya ti/ ra gai/ dges pa la'o/ /ra ga ya te/ la ge / chags pa la'o/ /hra ge / h+la ge / Sha ge / s+tha ge / kun nas sgrib pa la'o/ /la
<p>63a.7</p>ga ya ti/ hra ga ya ti/ h+la ga ya ti/ sa ga ya ti/ s+tha ga ya ti/ ka ge / brjod par mi bya ba la'o/ /ka Sha ya ti/ a ka dang a ga /gya gyu ru 'gro ba la'o/ /a ka ya ti/ a ga ya ti/ ka Na dang ra Na/ 'gro ba la'o/ /ka Na ya ti/ ra Na ya ti/ tsa Na dang shaN
<p>63b</p>
<p>63b.1</p>dang shra Na sbyin pa la'o/ /tsa Na ya ti/ sha na ya ti/ shra Na ya ti/ sbyin pa las gzhan la/ bi tsA Na ya ti/ shA Na ya ti/ shrA Na ya ti/ sU tha dang kU tha dang kra tha dang kwa tha/ 'che ba'i don rnams so/ /su tha ya ti/ ku tha ya ti/ kra tha ya ti/ kla tha ya ti/ tsa na yang ngo / /
<p>63b.2</p>tsa na ya ti/ ba nu/ yang brjod par mi bya ba la'o/ /ba na ya ti/ dz+wi la/ 'bar ba la'o/ /dz+we la ya ti/ hwa la dang h+ma la/ g.yo par byed pa la'o/ /hwa la ya te/ h+ma la ya te/ smra klog par byed pa la'o/ /smar ya ti/ gzhan la/ bi smAr ya ti/ drI/ 'jigs pa la'o/ /dar
<p>63b.3</p>ya te/ 'jigs pa las gzhan la/ dAr ya ti kASh+thaM/ nr-I/ tshul la'o/ /na ra yA ti/ shrA/ 'tshed pa la'o/ /shra ba ya ti/ 'tshed pa las gzhan la/ shrA pa ya ti/ 'chi ba dang dga' ba dang rno bar byed pa rnams la dz+nyA'o/ /'chi bar byed pa la/ saM dz+nyA pa ya ti pa shUn/ 
<p>63b.4</p>'chi bar byed do zhes pa'i don no/ /dga' bar byed pa la/ dz+nyA pa ya ti rA dz+wA naM/ mnyes par byed pa'i don no/ /rno bar byed pa la/ dz+nyA pa ya ti sha rA na byA d+haH rnon por byed do zhes pa'i don no/ /'gul bar byed pa la tsa li'o/ /tsa la ya ti/ gzhan la tsA la ya ti/ 
<p>63b.5</p>stobs byed pa la tsha di'o/ /tsha da ya ti/ gzhan la che da ya ti g+ho ShA na/ lce sgril bar byed pa la/ la Di'o/ /la Da ya ti/ gzhan la/ lA Da ya ti/ dga' ba dang na ru 'jug pa dag la ma di'o/ /ma da ya ti/ gzhan la/ mA da ya ti/ je nI dang dzrI Sha dang k+ne su dang rany+dza
<p>63b.6</p>rnams dang a la'i mtha' rnams kyang ngo zhes pas ma rjes su 'brel pa nyid do/ /ma rjes su 'brel pa rnams kyi thung ngu'o/ /dza na ya ti/ dza ra ya ti/ k+na pa yata ti/ 'di nyid las ma rjes su 'brel pa'i stobs las rany+dzi'i mr-i ga ra ma Na la a nu Shang+ga dbyi'o/ /ra dza ya ti mr-i gA na/ gzhan
<p>63b.7</p>la/ rany+dza ya ti pa stAM/ a ma'i mtha' rnams/ sha ma ya ti/ b+h+ra ma ya ti/ ra ma ya ti/ ga ma ya ti/ ga mi na/ bzod pa la'o zhes pas At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /A ga ma ya swa tA/ bat+kiny+tsit+kA laM/ bzod par mdzod cig ces pa'i don to/ /dz+wa la dang hwa la dang h+ma la dang na ma
<p>64a</p>
<p>64a.1</p>rnams nyer bsgyur med pa la yang na'o zhes pas yang na ma rjes su 'brel pa nyid do/ /dz+wa la ya ti/ dz+wA la ya ti/ hwa la ya ti/ hwA la ya ti/ h+ma la ya ti/ h+mA la ya ti/ na ma ya ti/ nA ma ya ti/ nyer bsgyur
<p>64a.2</p>dang bcas pa'i rtag tu ma rjes su 'brel pa rnams so/ /pra dz+wa la ya ti/ pra hwa la ya ti/ pra h+ma la ya ti/ prA Na ma ya ti/ pa ri Na ma ya ti/ glA la snA dang ba mu dang ba me rnams kyi yang ngo zhes pas nyer bsgyur med pa rnams kyi ma rjes su
<p>64a.3</p>'brel pa nyid yang na'o/ /gla pa ya ti/ glA pa ya ti/ sna pa ya ti/ snA pa ya ti/ ba na ya ti/ bA na ya ti/ ba ma ya ti/ bA ma ya ti/ nyer bsgyur dang bcas pa rnams kyi ji lta ba thob po/ /pra glI pa ya ti/ pra snA ba ya ti/ u pa ba na ya ti/ 
<p>64a.4</p>ut+pa ma ya tI/ ka mi dang a mi dang tsa mi rnams kyi ma yin no/ /a ma'i mtha' nyid las thob pa la dgag pa bya'o/ /kA ma ya ti/ A ma ya ti/ A tsA ma ya ti/ sha ma'i mi mthong ba la'o/ /sha ma ya ti ro gaM/ mthong ba la ni/ ni
<p>64a.5</p>shA ma ya ti ru baM/ ya ma'i yongs su 'jug pa ma yin pa la'o/ /ya ma ya ti/ gzhan la/ yA ma ya ti/ brAh+ma NA na/ yongs su 'jug tu 'jug go zhes pa'i don no/ /s+kha di'i a pa dang ba ri dag las kyang ngo / /a ba s+kha da ya ti/ pa ti s+kha da
<p>64a.6</p>ya ti/ nyer 'dir gong 'og 'gal ba cig snang ste/ rgya dper 'di kho na bzhin snang bas dpyad par bya'o zhes phyi mo na mchan bur byas snang / bsgyur gzhan las/ pra s+khA da ya ti/ u pa s+kha da ya ti/ 'ba' zhig pa'i ni/ s+kha da ya ti/ pha Na/ 'gro ba la'o/ /pha Na ya ti/ gzhan
<p>64a.7</p>la/ phA Na ya ti phAN+DaM/ bdun cu rtsa lnga'o zhes pas ma rjes su 'brel pa rnams so/ /iN/ 'gro ba la'o/ /rtog pa ma yin pa la Ni la ga mi'o zhes pas ga mi ru bsgyur ro/ /ga ma ya ti/ in bzhin du i ka'i yang ngo zhes pas ga mi ru bsgyur ro/ /
<p>64b</p>
<p>64b.1</p>i d+hI ga ma pha ti/ zhes kha cig tu'o/ /'dir ni rtogs pa nyid du grub pa ma yin no/ /rab tu dmigs pa la gr-i d+hi dang pany+tsi dag la'o zhes pas At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /shwA naM gar+d+ha ya te/ a hiM pany+tsa ya te/ a b+h+yAs log par sbyor ba la kr-inya'o zhes
<p>64b.2</p>pas At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /ba daM mi th+yA kA ra ya te/ bu d+ha/ yu d+ha/ na sha /dzi na ing / bru/ sru/ dru/ rnams las in la'o zhes pas pa rasmai'i tshig go/ /kho d+ha ya ti/ yo d+ha ya ti/ nA sha ya ti/ dza na ya ti/ a d+h+yA ba ya ti/ prA pa ya ti/ srA ba ya
<p>64b.3</p>ti/ drA pa ya ti/ Ni min pa las can ma yin pa las sems bzhin du byed pa po can las so zhes pas pa ra smai'i tshig go/ /A sa/ nye bar sdod pa la'o/ /a sa ya ti/ pA sa ya ti/ pA/ da ma/ Ang ya ma/ A ya sa/ ba ri mu ha/ ru tsi/ nr-i ti/ 
<p>64b.4</p>pa da/ ba sa rnams kyi ma yin no zhes pas pa rasmai'i tshig bkag go/ /ru tsa/ sogs nyid las At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /pA pa ya te/ d+heT tshig kha skong ba'o/ /d+hA pa ya te/ da ma ya ti/ A yA ma ya ti/ A yA sa ya te/ pa ri mo ha ya te/ ro tsa ya te/ narta
<p>64b.5</p>ya ti/ pA da ya te/ bA sa ya te/ dngos po dang las dag la ya Na'o/ /kA ri ti'i Am iT bi kA ra Na ma yin pa la'o zhes pas kA ri ta dbyi'o/ /kAr+ya te/ hAr+ya te/ las byed pa po las bzhin no zhes pa las bzhin du 'gyur ba med de ki ra sogs
<p>64b.6</p>nyid kyi phyir ro/ /kA ra ya te ka TaH swa ya me pa/ sap+ta ma'i/ gA ra ye ta/ pany+tsa mI/ kAr ya tu/ h+yasta nI/ a ka ra ya ta/ a d+ya ta nI/ shi dru sru ka mi kA ri ta'i mtha' rnams las byed pa po la tsa Na'o zhes pas tsa Na'o/ /Na yig ni/ Na yig
<p>64b.7</p>rjes su 'brel ba dang tse kr-I yi ta dag la ma yin no zhes pa'i khyad par gyi don to/ /tsa yig ni tsa Na pa rok+Sha tse kr-I yi ta san mtha' rnams la'o zhes pa'i khyad par gyi don to/ /tshig 'di nyid las in la gang byas pa de thams cad la gnas pa bzhin no zhes pas
<p>65a</p>
<p>65a.1</p>gnyis brjod do/ /in la mtshungs pa phyis pa min pa'i u pa d+hA'i tsaN la thung ngu nyid do zhes pas thung ngu nyid do/ /mtshungs pa ma phyis na yang ba la in dang tsaN pha rol la san bzhin no zhes pas san bzhin du 'gyur ba'i
<p>65a.2</p>phyir e nyid do/ /yang ba'i ring po'o zhes pas ring po nyid do/ /kA ri ta dbyi'o/ /a tsI ka ra da/ de bzhin du/ a dzI ha ra ta a pa'i pa Tha ta/ a pa'i pa tsa ta/ a dzi dza ya ta/ a pI pa ba ta/ a lI la la ta/ a yi ya pa ta/ shru/ 
<p>65a.3</p>sru/ dru/ pru/ blu/ ts+yung rnams kyi yang na bar brjod par bya'o zhes pas yang na i nyid do/ /a shi shra ba ta/ a shu shra ba ta/ a shu shra ba ta/ a si sra ba ta/ a su sra ba ta/ a di dra ba ta/ a du dra ba ta/ a pi pra ba ta/ a su pra ba ta/ 
<p>65a.4</p>a pi sra ba ta/ a pu sla ba ta/ a tsi tsu ba ta/ a tsu ts+ya ba ta/ Tu o shwi/ shwa ya ti'i yang na'o zhes pa 'jug bzhin pa la/ kA ri ta la'ang san dang tsaN dag la'o zhes pas/ yang na saM pra sA ra Na'o/ /a shi shwa ya ta/ a shU sha ba ta/ a shU sha ba ta/ hwenya/ hwa ya
<p>65a.5</p>ta'i rtag tu'o zhes pas saM pra sA ra Na'o/ /a dzU ha ba ta/ hwa ra sogs rnams kyi yang a'o zhes san bzhin du 'gyur ba'i dmigs bsal/ a ta ru bsgyur ro/ /a ta twa ra ta/ a sa sma ra ta/ a da da ra ta/ a pa pra tha ta/ a ma mra da ta/ 
<p>65a.6</p>a ta sta ra ta/ a ba spa sha ta/ beSh+Ta bkra shis pa la'o/ /tseSh+Ta/ g.yo ba la'o/ /biSh+Ti dang tseSh+Ti dag la yang na'o zhes pas yang a ta ru bsgyur ro/ /a bi beSh+Ta ta/ a ba beSh+Ta ta/ a tsi tseSh+Ta ta/ a tsa tseSh+Ta ta/ ga Na/ grangs la'o/ /ga Na'i INAng
<p>65a.7</p>ngo zhes pas yang na a b+h+yA sa'i nyid do/ /a dzI ga Na ta/ a dza ga Na ta/ mtshungs pa phyis pa la san bzhin du 'gyur ba med do/ /a tsa ka tha ta/ ba ra 'dod pa la'o/ /a ba ba ra ta/ ing / in la san dang tsaN dag la'o zhes rnam par bshad pas ga ru
<p>65b</p>
<p>65b.1</p>bsgyur ro zhes kha cig go/ /'dir ni in la san dang laN dag la yang / gA ya ti'i glog par byed pa la 'jug go/ /a d+h+yA dzi ga pa ta/ id/ a d+h+yA bi ba ta/ a Ti zhes pa gnas pa la in la mtshungs pa zhes sogs kyis thung ngu nyid do/ /dbyangs
<p>65b.2</p>dang po las gnyis pa'i 'o zhes pas gnyis brjod do/ /phyi nas a yig gi A yig go/ /A Ti Ta ta/ mA dang mAsma sbyor ba la ma yin no zhes pa'i dgag pa las a Ta la sogs pa rnams mi 'gyur ro/ /mA b+ha bAn Ti Ta ta/ na ba da ra rnams brtsegs
<p>65b.3</p>pa'i dang po rnams la ma yin pa la ma yin no zhes pas na yig dang ya yig dang ba yig dang nga yig dang re pha rnams gnyis brjod par mi bya'o/ /un+di/ slas pa la'o/ /dbyangs dang po rnams kyi dang po'i 'phel ba'o zhes pas dang po'i 'phel ba la'o/ /
<p>65b.4</p>aun+di data/ un+dza/ gnam pa la'o/ /aub+dzi dza ta/ a D+ha/ mngon par sbyor ba la'o/ /a D+hi Data ar+ts+tsha/ mchod pa la'o/ /Ar+ts+tshi tsa ra ta/ br-i d+hu/ mr-i dzU/ kr-i pU/ kr-I ta/ in dang tsaN la ri yig gi r-ita'o zhes kha cig go/ /'dir ni yon tan
<p>65b.5</p>gyi ming sngon ma can gyi phyir ro/ kAr+t+ti i Sha dag gi k+ti'o zhes shes par byed pa'i rtag tu ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir na yon tan no/ /yang na kIr+t+ti ru bsgyur ro/ /a b+hi br-i d+ha ta/ a bar+b+d+ha ta/ a mI mr-i dza ta/ a ma ma brdza ta/ a tsI kl-i pa ta/ e tsa
<p>65b.6</p>ka lpa ta/ a tsI kr-i ta ta/ a tsi kIr+t+ta ta/ shA su r-ita rjes su 'brel pa rnams/ Tu ba sraM/ Tu yAts+ri/ in la mtshungs pa phyis pa min pa'i u pa d+hA'i tsaN la thung ngu'o/ /thob pa la shA su dang r-ita rjes su 'brel pa rnams kyi ma yin no zhes pas bkag
<p>65b.7</p>go/ /a sha shA sa ta/ a pi pe pa ta/ a ya yA tsa ta/ b+h+ra dza sogs rnams kyi yang na brjod par bya'o zhes pas yang na thung ngu'o/ /a ba b+hA dza ta/ a bi b+h+ra dza ta/ a bI b+hA sa ta/ a pI b+ha sa ta/ a ba b+ha Sha ta/ a di dI pa ta/ a dI di pa ta/ a
<p>66a</p>
<p>66a.1</p>dzi dzI pa ta/ a dzI dzi ba ta/ a mi mI la ta/ a mI mi la ta/ a pI pi Data/ ba pI pa Da ta/ a tsa kA Na ta/ a tsI kA Na ta/ a ra rA Na ta/ a rI ra Na ta/ a pa pA Na ta/ aM pI pa Na ta/ shra Na/ a sha shrI Na ta/ a sha pri shra Na ta/ 
<p>66a.2</p>he tha/ A dzI he Tha Ta/ a dzI he Tha ta/ lu sl-i/ a lU lu pa ta/ a lu lo pa ta/ 'dir ni b+h+rA dza naM/ b+h+ra dza stam/ a tsi'i ka ra ta/ zhes pa g+hanya'i mtha' la sogs pa yis grub po/ /bi ba ti'i dbye ste/ a b+h+ya sa'i A ta 'ang ngo zhes pas A yig u pa
<p>66a.3</p>d+hA dbyi'o/ /a b+h+yA sa'i I ta'ang 'gyur ro/ /a pI pya ta/ a pI bya tam/ a pI byan/ tiSh+Tha ti'i i ta'o zhes tiSh+Tha ti'i u ba d+hA i ta ru 'gyur ro/ /a tiSh+Thi pa ta/ a tiSh+Thi pa tam/ a tiSh+Thi ba na/ dzi g+h+ra ti'i yang na'o zhes pas dzi g+h+ra ti'i u pa d+hA i ta ru
<p>66a.4</p>'gyur te yang na'o/ /a dzi g+h+ra pa ta/ ma dzI g+h+ra pa ta/ dngos po dang las dag la'ang ngo zhes pas i tsa'o/ /kA ri ta dbyi'o/ /a kA ri/ gnyis tshig la sogs pa la si tsa nyid 'gyur ro/ /a kA ra yi ShA tAm/ A kA ra yi Sha ta/ g+haT/ i tsa la
<p>66a.5</p>yang na'o zhes pas u pa d+hA A yig gi a yig go/ /a g+ha Ti/ a g+hA Ti/ las byed pa po la las bzhin du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir byed pa po a tsaN nyid 'gyur ro/ /a tsA kA ra ta ka TaH swa ya me ba/ pa rok+Sha/ tsa kA sa dang kA sa dang rkyen gyi
<p>66a.6</p>mtha' rnams las pa rok+ShA la A ma'o zhes pas A ma rkyen no/ /yon tan no/ /a ya ru bsgyur ro/ /kA ra yAny+tsa ka ra/ as+b+hu dag kyang pa rasmai la'o zhes pas as dang b+hU dag tu 'gyur ro/ kA ra yA mI sa/ kA ra yA mA sa/ kA ra yA m+ba b+hU ba/ 
<p>66a.7</p>shwa sta nI/ kA ra yi ta/ A shiH kAR+Ya ta/ kA ra yi ShISh+Ta/ b+ha bi Sh+yan+ti/ kA ra yi Sh+ya ti/ kri yA ti pa t+tiH a kA ra yi Sh+ya ta/ de ltar in mtha'i yul bstan pa'o// //in mtha' dang san mtha' brjod par bya'o/ /kA ra yi tu mits+tshi ta/ sanA+o/ /
<p>66b</p>
<p>66b.1</p>gnyis brjod do/ /san la a yig gi'o zhes pas sri nyid do/ /tsi kA ra yi Sha ti/ dzi hA ra yi Sha ti/ dzi g+h+ra pa yi Sha ti/ dza dang mthar gnas dang / pa sde pha rol gyi u yig gi a yig la'o zhes pas a b+h+yA sa'i i nyid do/ /li lA ba yi Sha
<p>66b.2</p>ti/ pi pA ba yi Sha ti/ bI b+hA ba yi Sha ti/ shwa ya ti'i yang na'o zhes pa rjes su 'jug bzhin pa la/ kA ri ta la'ang san dang tsan dag la'o zhes pas saM pra sA ra Na'o/ /shi shwa ya yi Sha ti/ shu shA ba yi Sha ti/ twenya/ hwa ya ti'i rtag tu'o zhes
<p>66b.3</p>pas saM pra sA ra Na'o/ /dzu hA ba yi Sha ti/ ing / in la san dang tsan dag la'o zhes rnam par bshad pas gA ru bsgyur ro zhes kha cig go/ /'dir ni/ in la san dang tsan dag la yang gA ya ti'i glog par byed pa la 'jug go/ /a
<p>66b.4</p>d+hi dzi gA pa yi Sha ti/ ing / a d+h+yA pib yi Sha ti/ tse kr-I yi ta'i mtha' las kyang sana'o/ /lo lU yi Sha te/ po pU yi Sha te/ a b+h+yA sa med pa'i zhes pa'i tshig las/ gnyis brjod pa byas pa'i slar yang gnyis brjod par mi 'gyur ro/ /
<p>66b.5</p>de ltar san mtha'i yul bstan no// //ming gi byings brjod par bya'o/ /pU dra mits+tsha ti zhes pa ming las bdag nyid 'dod pa la yin no zhes pas yin rkyen no/ /i yig dang na yig kyang / in la a yig gi'o zhes pa'i khyad par
<p>66b.6</p>gyi don to/ /der gnas rnam dbye rnams dbyi bar bya'o zhes pa rnam dbye dbyi'o/ /gang dang gang gi rtags kyi rnam dbye phyis pa yod pa la/ de dang de'i snga mar yod pa'i rang bzhin kho nar 'gyur ro/ /de las/ in la a yig la
<p>66b.7</p>gi'o zhes pas a yig gi a'i nyid do/ /pu trI ya zhes pa gnas pa la/ de rnams byings rnams so zhes pas byings kyi ming yod pa/ byings las rkyen pha rol tu 'gyur ro/ /lhag ma las/ byed pa po la pa rasmai'i tshig go/ /byed pa po la
<p>67a</p>
<p>67a.1</p>a na'o/ /pu trI ya ti/ ku TI ya ti/ kam+pa lI ya ti/ prA bA rI ya ti/ kha T+wA mits+tsha ti/ kha T+wI ya ti/ na dbyi ba'ang ngo zhes pas na yig dbyi'o/ /rA dzI ya ti/ ta k+ShA ya ti/ rta dang 'o ma dang glang dang lan
<p>67a.2</p>tshwa rnams kyi bdag dga' ba la su ka A ga ma 'dod par bya'o/ /rta dang glang dag gi 'khrig pa 'dod pa la/ a shwa s+ya ti ba Da bA/ br-i Sha bya ti gauH gzhan la/ a shwI ya ti/ br-i ShI ya ti/ 'o ma dang lan tshwa dag thob par 'dod pa
<p>67a.3</p>la/ k+ShI ra pya ti bA laH la pa Na pya ti gauH gzhan la/ k+ShI ri ya ti/ la ba NI ya ta/ tshig so so ba can thams cad rnams las/ za bar sred pa rnams la/ as brjod par bya'o/ /da d+h+yA pya ti/ ma d+h+wa pya ti/ 'ga' zhig
<p>67a.4</p>sogs par 'dod pas/ su brjod par bya'o/ /da d+hi pya ti/ ma d+hu pya ti/ zas 'dod par byed pa bza' ba dang / chu 'dod par byed pa 'thung ba dang / nor 'dod par byed pa sred pa zhes pa'i ngag nyid la/ a sha nA yang dang / 
<p>67a.5</p>u da n+ya dang / d+h+ra nA yA rnams ni/ bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'dod pa rnams la/ tshig phrad du grags so zhes pas ji lta bar rigs pa la/ A nyid do/ /ka'i yang na nyid do/ /a dbyi ba yang tshig phrad du bya'o/ /
<p>67a.6</p>a sha nA ya ti/ u dan+Ya ti/ d+ha nA ya ti/ gzhan la/ zas 'dod par byed pa sbyin pa ni/ A sha nI ya ti/ khrus chu 'dod pa ni/ u da kI ya ti/ nor 'dod par byed pa sbyin pa la/ d+ha nI ya ti/ 'dir ni/ a sha nA ya'i
<p>67a.7</p>byings/ bkres pa la'o/ /u da n+ya/ skom pa la'o/ /d+ha nA ya/ 'dod pa la'o/ /zas 'dod par byed pa bza' ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i ngag nyid la yan mngon par brjod par bya'o/ /kA mya yang ngo zhes pas/ kA mya rkyen du
<p>67b</p>
<p>67b.1</p>'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i don la'o/ /pu tra mits+tsha ti/ pu tra kA mye ti/ i da mits+tsha ti/ i daM kA mya ti/ swa r-its+tsha ti/ swaH kA mya ti/ nye bar 'jal ba las kun spyod la'o zhes pas yin rkyen no/ /bu lta bur kun tu spyod par byed pa
<p>67b.2</p>ni/ pu tri yA ti/ mA Na ba ki/ byed pa po la A yis te/ sa dbyi ba yang ngo zhes pas A yis rkyen te/ sa dbyi ba yang ngo / /khra lta bur spyod par byed pa ni/ A yi'i mtha' las kyang ngo zhes pas At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /sh+ya nA ya
<p>67b.3</p>te/ sA ra sa i bA tsa pa ti/ sA ra sA ya te/ si yig dbyi'o/ /mo dza ya te/ a p+sar ya te/ pa/ yas las ni rnam par bshad pas sa yig dbyi'o/ /pa yA te/ pa ya pya te/ de la yang na'i sgra'i 'dod pa'i don gyi phyir A li'i ya
<p>67b.4</p>dbyi'o zhes kha cig go/ /bong bu lta bur kun tu spyod par byed pa ni/ garta b+ha ti/ a shwa ti/ de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ o dzas dang a spa ras las rtag tu'o/ /pa yas las ni rnam par bshad pa'o/ /A yi dbyi ba yang rnam
<p>67b.5</p>par shes par bya/ a shwa dang gardi b+ha ti la yin pa yang ngo zhes so/ /gal+b+ha dang klI ba dang ho Da rnam par bshad pa'i zhes kha cig go/ /ru tsa sogs nyid las At+ma ne'i tshig go/ /gal+b+ha te/ gal+b+ha ya te/ kli ba te/ klI ba yA te/ ho nA
<p>67b.6</p>te/ ho DA ya te/ de bzhin du/ tswi'i don la b+h+r-i sha sogs las ta dang sa dag gi dbyi ba yang ngo zhes pas A'i rkyen no/ /ta da sa dag gi dbyi ba yang ngo / /lhag pa ma yin pa lhag par 'gyur ba/ b+h+r-i shA ya te/ uSh+ma nA ya te/ 
<p>67b.7</p>durma nA ya te/ pe ha ta/ pe hA ya te/ sha shwa te/ sha shwa ya te/ yang na'i tshig las tswi yang 'gyur ro/ /b+h+ri shI b+ha ba ti/ lo hi ta la sogs pa rnams las tswi'i don la DA tsa'o zhes pas A'i rkyen no zhes kha cig go/ /
<p>68a</p>
<p>68a.1</p>'dir ni pa Tat+sa Tat+ka ro ti zhes pa'i tshig la/ mi gsal ba'i rjes brjod byed pa'i DA tsa'o zhes pas/ DA tsa'i yul la gnyis brjod do/ /ta dbyi ba yang 'dod do zhes pas ta dbyi'o/ /phyi nas mi gsal ba'i rjes brjod
<p>68a.2</p>byed pa las dbyangs gcig ma yin pa las a ni ti la/ DA tsa'o zhes pas DA tsa'i rkyen no/ /tsa yig ni ma gsal ba'i rjes brjod byed pa'i DA tsa'o zhes dang / Da yig ni Da rjes su 'brel pa la mtha'i dbyangs la sogs pa dbyi'o zhes pa'i khyad
<p>68a.3</p>par gyi don no/ /'di nyid kyis mtha'i dbyangs la sogs pa dbyi'o/ /snal bu snam bu lta bur kun du spyod par byed do zhes pas byed pa po la A yis te sa dbyi ba yang ngo zhes pas A'i rkyen no/ /yadza la sogs pa phal pa'i tshogs nyid kyi phyir
<p>68a.4</p>gnyi ga'i tshig go/ /pa Da pa DA ya te/ tsha ma Ta/ tsha mats+tsha mA ya ti/ tsha mats+tsha mA ya te/ r-i Na ta/ r-i Na raM NA ya ti/ r-i Na r-i NA ya te/ dmar po lta bur kun tu spyod par byed pa ni/ lo hi tA ya ti/ lo hi tA ya te/ kaSh+Ta ya
<p>68a.5</p>kra ma Ne kra ma ti/ kaSh+DA ya te/ de bzhin du/ pA pA ya te/ ka k+ShA ya te/ sat+t+ra ya te/ ga ha nA ya te/ sdig pa'i 'jug pa rnams las gzhan la mi 'gyur ro/ /kaSh+Ta ya ta pa sa krA ma ti/ ro man+thaM bar+t+ta ya ti gauH rlangs pa
<p>68a.6</p>gyen du 'byung bar byed pa ni/ pASh+pA ya te/ de bzhin du/ USh+mA ya te/ phe nA ya/ bde ba la sogs pa rnams la rig par bya ste/ su ShA ya te/ de bzhin du/ duSh+khA ya te/ sgra la sogs pa rnams byed pa ni/ shap+dA ya te/ 
<p>68a.7</p>de bzhin du/ bairA yA te/ ka la hA ya te/ a b+h+rA ya te/ kan+ThA ya te/ me g+hA ya te/ su di nA ya te/ durdi nA ya te/ nI hA rA ya te/ na mas dang ta pas dang pa ri pas rnams las ni yina'o/ /phyag 'tshal bar byed pa ni/ na ma
<p>68b</p>
<p>68b.1</p>s+ya ti/ de bzhin du/ ta pa s+yati/ ba ri ba s+ya ti/ na dbyi ba 'ang ngo zhes pa'i nges pa las 'dir rnam bcad du mi 'gyur ro/ /tsi tAng / ngo mtshar ba la'o/ /nga yig ni At+ma ne'i tshig gi don no/ /ngo mtshar ba la ri mor byed pa ni/ 
<p>68b.2</p>tsi trI ya te/ kaN+hu la sogs pa rnams las yaNa'o/ /kaN+hunya/ g.yan pa byed pa ni/ nya yig ni gnyi ga'i tshig gi don no/ /Na yig ni yon tan med pa'i don no/ /kaN+hU ya ti/ gaN+hU ya te/ ma hIng / pa hI ya te/ zhes
<p>68b.3</p>pa la sogs pa rjes su 'brang bar bya ba rnams so/ /ha liM/ ka liM 'dzin par byed do zhes pa la/ byings don la in te kA ri ta'o zhes pas in rkyen no/ /na yig ni/ in la rtags kyi zhes pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi don to/ /ha
<p>68b.4</p>la ya te/ ka la ya te/ de bzhin du/ kr-i ta ya ti/ bar+N+Na ya ti/ twa tsa ya te/ tU stA ni bi han+ti/ bi tu sta ya ti/ ke sha na bir lI ka ra ti/ sgra rnams la grol bar byed do zhes pa'i don to/ /gos kyis kun tu 'gebs par
<p>68b.5</p>byed pa ni/ saM bas+t+rA ya ti/ go cha gyon par byed pa ni/ saM bar+m+ma ya ti/ phye mas kun tu 'joms pa ni/ a ba tsUr+N+Na ya te/ de byed pa dang de'i tshe smras pa la'o zhes pas ina'o/ /mgo bo byed pa ni/ muN+Da ya ti/ de bzhin du/ 
<p>68b.6</p>mi shra ya ti/ sh+la k+Sh+Na ya ti/ la ba Na ya ti/ sU tra ya ti/ brtul zhugs las zas la dang / de ldog pa la'ang in rkyen du 'gyur ro/ /ba yo bra ta ya ti/ longs spyod zhes pa'i don no/ /br-i Sha lAn+na pra ta ya ti/ mi za'o
<p>68b.7</p>zhes pa'i don no/ /des 'da' bar byed do zhes pas ina'o/ /glang po che'i rim pa las 'da' bar byed pa ni/ a ti'i sgra sngon ma ni tshig phrad do/ /a ti ha sta ya ti/ byed pa po dang byed pa'i don la/ pi waM gis nye bar glu len
<p>69a</p>
<p>69a.1</p>par byed pa ni/ u pa bI Na ya ti/ shing bal rnams kyis nges par 'gugs par byed pa ni/ a ba tU la ya ti/ tshigs su bcad pas nye bar bstod par byed pa ni/ u pa sh+lo ka ya ti/ sde yis mngon
<p>69a.2</p>par 'gro bar byed pa ni/ s+thA dang se ni zhes sogs kyis Sha nyid do/ /a b+hi She Na ya ti/ 'ga' zhig gi tshe mthong ba la/ rU paM pa Sh+ya hi/ rU pa ya ti/ mang po 'di rnams nges par mthong ngo / /i nid/ yan lag mi gnas pa la yang ngo / /yan
<p>69a.3</p>lag mi gnas pa'i don la i nid rkyen du 'gyur ro/ /ha stau ni ra s+ya ti/ ha sta ya te/ de bzhin du pA da ya te/ mi gnas pa la yang ngo zhes yang gi sgra mang po'i don nyid kyi phyir/ rnga ma las 'degs pa la/ puts+tsha mu t+kI ba ti/ u t+yuts+tshu ya te/ de bzhin
<p>69a.4</p>du/ rnga ma yongs su g.yob par byed pa ni/ pa ri puts+tsha ya te gaH snod kun tu sogs par byed pa ni/ /saM b+hAN+Da ya te/ chos gos la yang dag par nyug par byed pa'am yongs su 'jog par byed pa ni/ saM tsI pa ra ya te b+hI k+ShuH shwe ta
<p>69a.5</p>a shwa dang a shwa ta ra dang ga la Di ta dang / a hwa ra ka rnams kyi a shwa dang ta ra dang ita dang ka dbyi ba yang ngo / /yang yig gis byings don la in ning yang dag par bsdus par 'dod do/ /rta dkar po brjod pa la/ de yis 'da' bar byed
<p>69a.6</p>pa'o/ /yang na'o/ /a shwa'i dbyi'o/ /shwe ta ya ti/ rta mchog brjod pa la/ ta ra'i dbyi'o/ /a shwa ya te/ gA lo Di ta brjod pa la/ i ti'i dbyi'o/ /gA lo Da ya te/ A hwa ra ka brjod pa la/ ka dbyi'o/ /A hwa ra ya te/ 
<p>69a.7</p>mang po nyid las ina'i rkyen la yang ngo / /shwe ta ya ti/ a shwa ya ti zhes pa la sogs pa'o// //man+tu ban+tu bin rnams kyi 'jig pa la yang ngo / /'dir slar yang a nid bshad par mi bya'o/ /I sha /mchog gi dbang phyug
<p>69b</p>
<p>69b.1</p>la'o/ /I sha na la ITa'o/ /saM pa da la sogs pa nyid las kre sra'o/ /'di'i yod pa la ITa'o zhes pas lhag ma rnams man+tu 'dod do zhes pa'i tshig las man+tu rkyen no/ /de in+ma n+taM brjod pa la zhes pas byings don la in byas pa
<p>69b.2</p>la man+du 'jig go/ /rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po med na rgyu mtshan can gyi yang dngos po med do zhes pas rang bzhin gyi rang gi ngo bos nges par gnas so/ /I sha ya ti/ ldan par brjod pa la/ ga ba ya ti/ srug+ban+haM brjod pa la/ d+huTa'i
<p>69b.3</p>mtha' las man+tu 'jig go/ /sru tsa ya ti/ mA yA dang sne d+hA dang sra dza las bin 'gyur ro zhes pas/ sra g+bi NaM brjod pa la/ sra dza ya ti/ pra sha s+ya shra'o/ /pra sha s+ya la/ brjod pa la zhes pas in byas pa la shrA ru bsgyur ro/ /dbyangs
<p>69b.4</p>gcig pa rnams kyi ata'i mtha' rnams kyi 'ang ngo zhes pas A pa A ga ma'o/ /shrA pa ya ti/ br-id+d+hi'i yang dz+ya'o/ /yang yig las pra sha s+ya'i yang ngo / /'phel bar smras pa las/ pra sha s+ya'i yang na'o/ /ina'o/ /dza ya ru
<p>69b.5</p>bsgyur ro/ /snga ma bzhin A ba A ga ma'o/ /dz+yA pa ya ti/ an+tI ka dang / ba D+ha dag gi ne dang sA d+ha dag go/ /an+ti kaM brjod pa la/ ina'o/ /ne da ru bsgyur ro/ /ne da ya ti/ bA D+haM brjod pa la/ ina'o/ /sA d+ha ru bsgyur ro/ /sA d+ha ya ti/ 
<p>69b.6</p>yu ba dang alpa dag gi kan yang na'o/ /lang tsho ldan pa brjod pa la/ ina'o/ /kan du bsgyur ro/ /ka na ya ti/ phyogs gcig la/ s+thU la dang / dU ra dang / yu ba dang k+Shi pra zhes sogs kyis mthar gnas la sogs pa dbyi ba dang
<p>69b.7</p>yon tan yang ngo / /ya ba ya ti/ chung ngu brjod pa la/ ka na ya ti/ phyogs gcig la/ a lpa ya ti/ s+thU la dang / du ra dang / yu ba dang / k+Shi pra dang k+Shu drA rnams kyi mthar gnas la sogs pa dbyi ba dang yon tan yang ngo / /sbom por smra ba
<p>70a</p>
<p>70a.1</p>la In no/ /mthar gnas la sogs pa dbyi ba dang / nA min gyi yon tan yang ngo / /s+tha ba ya ti/ thag ring bar smra ba la/ da ba ya ti/ lang tsho dang ldan par smra ba la/ ya ba ya ti/ myur bar smra ba la/ k+Shi pa
<p>70a.2</p>ya ti/ phra bar smra ba la/ k+Sho pa ya ti/ ba hu'i ya la sogs pa dang b+hU yang ngo / /mang po smra ba la zhes pas ya yig Da dang ina'o/ /ba hu'i yang b+hU ru bsgyur ro/ /b+hU ya ya ti/ pr-i ya dang s+thi ra dang spi ra dang / u ru dang gu ru dang / ba hu la
<p>70a.3</p>dang tr-i pra dang / drI r+g+ha dang hra sba dang / pr-i d+ha dang br-in+dA ra ka rnams kyi pra dang / s+tha dang s+pha dad ba ra dang ga ra dang baM ha dang / tra ba dang drA g+ha dang hra sa dang baR+Sha dang b+r+a-in+da rnams so/ /dga' bar smra ba la ina'o/ /pra ru bsgyur ro/ /A pa/ A ga ma yang ngo / /
<p>70a.4</p>prA pa ya ti/ de bzhin du s+thi raM smra ba la/ s+thA pa ya ti/ s+phi ri smra ba la/ s+pha tha ya ti/ u ru smra ba la/ pa ra ya ti/ lci bar smra ba la/ ga ra ya ti/ mang por smra ba la/ ba ha ya ti/ tr-i braM smra ba la/ tra pa ya ti/ ring por smra ba la/ drA g+ha ya ti/ thung ngur smra ba la/ 
<p>70a.5</p>hras ya ti/ br-id+d+hAM smra bal/ par+kha yan ti/ tshogs pa smra ba la/ dr-in+da ya ti/ bden pa dang don dang rig pa rnams kyi mthar A pa ni kA ri ta nyid do/ /bden par smra ba la/ ina'o/ /'di yis A ba'o/ /sa t+yA pa ya ti/ de bzhin du ar+pa ba ya ti/ pe dA pa ya ti/ dbyangs gcig
<p>70a.6</p>pa rnams kyi ata'i mtha' rnams kyi la'o/ /shA ba ya ti/ kA ri ta nyid do zhes pa'i tshig las 'dir mi 'gyur ro/ /shreSh+thaH shre mA/ shre yAn zhes pa'o zhes pa mkhan po dga' ba'i grags pas mdzad pa'i tshig gsal rdzogs so// //'di ni dpyal lo tsA ba dpal chos kyi bzang po'i phyag
<p>70a.7</p>dpe'i rgya dpe las/ shAkya'i dge slong d+harmA shrI b+ha dras mkhan chen lo tsA ba chen po bu ston zhabs kyi bka' drin las bod kyi skad du bsgyur ba'i gnas ni/ paN+Di ta dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA nA'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos gnas chen po ri phug go// //
<p>70b</p>
<p>70b.1</p>@##/ /mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos sna tshogs gsal ba zhes pa ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi d+hA na shA s+t+ra bi shwa lo tsa na mi t+ya sa rA b+hi d+hA na mu k+t+ya ba lI nA ma/ bod skad du/ mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos sna tshogs gsal rab
<p>70b.2</p>zhes pa ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das dang de'i chos rgyal bar gyur cig dbyangs can rab tu dang bar mdzod/ /skye 'gro rnams la bde ba 'byung zhing dregs dang mi dge ba las drang bar mdzod/ /bdag
<p>70b.3</p>gis gang zhig legs par sbyar ba'i bum pa mchog las byung ba'i chu 'dir yang / /ci zhes lhags par byed pa don la mkhas pa rnams kyis kun tu 'jug par mdzod/ 1 /sde tshan don du mtha' dag snying stobs la dad dpal/ /dpal ldan snyan ngag mkhan po thub pa'i sde zhes byung / /
<p>70b.4</p>bdag gi rig pa'i gnas ni tshig ldan ngag snyan bcas/ /grags ldan bstan bcos mtha' dag las ni rjes su bsdus/ 2/de phyir ngag gi rang bzhin ma lus pha rol gzigs gyur pa/ /sa gzhi la gnas 'dren pa rnams kyi yid brtan snod du gyur/ /dpal ldan dpal 'dzin
<p>70b.5</p>gyis ni snyan ngag mkhan mchog mtha' dag gis/ /sbyar ba'i de nyid bdud rtsi'i btung ba 'chi med dbyangs can ldan/ 3 /de ni phul byung snyan ngag mkhan gyi lam skyes brling ba can/ /blo yi mig ldan bla mas bstan pa'i mig dang ldan pa yis/ /sna tshogs snyan ngag mkhan dbang gis
<p>70b.6</p>bkod mngon brjod mdzad rnams las/ /drangs te mig dang 'dra ba 'di ni sgron me'i mdzod lta bu/ /rtog ge dang bcas snyan ngag mkhan gyi lung skyes brling ba rnams/ /kun tu snang byas rig gnas rnams kyi grong du nges gnas shing / /spobs pa ldan pa rnams kyi blo yi lam
<p>70b.7</p>dang 'dres byas pas/ /da ni 'di yis skye ngan rnams kyi tshig kyang bcom par 'gyur/ 5 /'bad pas dal bar gyur dang ma gyur ma lus rig pa dang / /rig pa 'dzin pa stobs ldan rnams kyi blo la nges sbyar ba/ /dri med rin chen kaustu b+ha 'dir slar yang rlom dor nas/ /dpal
<p>71a</p>
<p>71a.1</p>mo'i dpal yon bzhin du rgya chen kho lag mchis 'di la'o/ 6 /klu yi dbang po yang dag gnas pa'i mdzod gyur rgya mtsho'i dbus/ /sna tshogs snyan ngag mkhan dbang kha yi nya phyis las byung ba/ /mkhas pa 'chi med kyis sprul dar gyi srad bu la
<p>71a.2</p>brgyus nas/ /mu tig phreng ba bkod 'di snying la yang dag gzhag par mdzod/ 7 /'dod chags bral ba'i dri bzangs kyi/ /snyan grags me tog ra ba ni/ /bsten las 'di yi zhabs gnas pa/ /gang yang klu shing lta bur lhags/ 8 /gang zhig sgra la mkhas pa rnams dang
<p>71a.3</p>mngon brjod 'dzin pa rnams dang 'jig rten pa/ /de dag gis kyang deng nyid mthong na yid la dga' ba lhag par skyed par byed/ /des na bdag gis 'bad pa 'di de lhag par gzhan gyi ched du bstan par 'gyur/ /bdag gis rgol ba rnams ni dga' ba'i ched du dregs pa
<p>71a.4</p>'joms byed byas par gyur/ 9 /dang por mang du mkhyen rnams kyis/ /sgra la 'bras bu gang bzhed pa/ /de 'dir 'chi med lugs rnams kyis/ /bdag gis sgra rnams nges par dgod/ 10 /mtho ris mi zad gnas bzang dang / /gzhi gsum pa dang / gnam
<p>71a.5</p>dang / mkha'/ /ro las dang ni/ bde ldan/ mkha'/ /'bras bu 'byung dang / dal 'dzin dang / /lha yi gnas dang / kun tu skye/ /skyo med/ skabs gsum/ mtho ris dang / /mkha' mthor sil ming sum cu/ dang / dbang po'i gnas/ /bde 'gro/ /dga'
<p>71a.6</p>byed/ na b+ha/ lhas rtsen/ rol pa'i sa/ /steng rod sI/ gi 'jig rten lha yi grong / /lha yi 'jig rten/ sai ri ka /ta bi Sha dang / tA biSha/ /ri rab steng dang / mkha' gnas so/ 30 /de nas lha dang / yid bzang dang / /bde 'gro can dang / /'dod gzugs
<p>71a.7</p>can/ /legs bris/ tshigs mda'/ mis byin skyes/ /tshigs bzang dang ni tshe ring dang / /tshogs bzang bcud ldan rmi lam med/ /bi na swan+ta/ gzhal med can/ /skabs gsum pa dang / lha la ming lnga bcu rtsa gnyis/ /r-i yig skyes/ /bsgrub bya/ 'chi med/ 
<p>71b</p>
<p>71b.1</p>bdud rtsi zas/ /mis byin bu dang / a di'i bu/ /sum rtsen dbang dang mkha' khyim can/ /bdud rtsi skyes dang mkha' la gnas/ /sbyin sreg za dang mchod sbyin za/ /mkha' 'gro mkhar gnas gnam la gnas/ /rnam sad dang ni bdud rtsi za/ /na lim+mA dang rgas
<p>71b.2</p>med a mr-i tan+b+ha ba/ dang / /dge skyes mi 'chi sbyin skyes dgra/ /mkha' spyod sbyin dgra gzhi gsum gnas/ /me zhal lha las skyes dang lha/ /swAhA b+hu dza/ /mtho ris gnas nab+haHsa daHdang mig mi 'dzums/ /pU dzi lA dang ma hi la/ /pu pA nA dang ba bu nA/ /pai twA lta ma tu ra/ 
<p>71b.3</p>dang rje btsun zhabs/ /dang po'i lha dang / a ma raH dA na bA ri/ rgyal byed dang / /det+yA ri/ tshangs pa 'phrog byed rdo rje can/ /nyin mo'i/ deb ta/ 'byung gnas bar ma gsum/ /gnyid swa lha las skyes zhes zer/ /mchod/ 'dzin/ nyi ma sna tshogs/ ma tUta/ nor lha
<p>71b.4</p>dang / /dga' ldan dang ni rgyal po che/ /grub pa rlung lha 'od gsal dang / /drag po 'di rnams tshogs kyi lha'o/ /chu skyes rig 'dzin mi 'am ci/ /dri za gsang ba pa sha za/ /gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang / /grub pa 'di rnams lha las byung / /r-i zhes bya ba dang mi
<p>71b.5</p>sbyin ma/ /lha yi ma'o sngon skyes pa/ /zla ba'i sbugs gnas mtshon cha bkod/ /bdud rtsi zas dang mtshun gyi ni/ /gzhon nu la sogs de rnams kyang / /sbyin skyes dang ni mchod sbyin dgra/ /sngon gyi lha dang sbyin ma'i bu/ /sbyin skyes dbang po'i dgra sbyin byung / /
<p>71b.6</p>pa sangs slob ma sa 'og gnas/ /bcud mi ldan dang lha la dmod/ /kai ke ya dang ku tsa dang / /di te skyes dang pra g+ha Sha/ /lha mi pho zer ba 'dra/ /iSh+Ti yu zhes lha ma yin la ming bco lnga/ de rnams so/ 15 /sbyin ma sbyin skyes ma dang ni/ /sbyin skyes skyong ma di ti'o/ /
<p>71b.7</p>sangs rgyas la mtshan bdun cu rtsa gnyis/ 4 /kun mkhyen bde gshegs ston pa dang / /gnyis med gsung ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /thub pa sangs rgyas thub pa che/ /dpal stug thugs rje mdzad pa dang / /bdud 'dul rgyal ba 'jig rten
<p>72a</p>
<p>72a.1</p>'dul/ /skyob pa thub dbang bcom ldan 'das/ /mngon shes drug ldan rnam par 'dren/ /byams pa'i stobs mnga' stobs bcu mnga'/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug rgyal ba dang / /mchod 'os bcu pa spyan bcu gnyis/ /thams
<p>72a.2</p>cad gzigs pa stobs chen ldan/ /chags bral skyabs gsum sku gsum pa/ /'og min bzhugs dang chags 'joms dang / /chos kyi rgyal po mun pa 'joms/ /mkha' mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa/ /rtogs ldan yon tan 'byung gnas dang / /rnam shes
<p>72a.3</p>tsam pa mkhyen lnga pa/ /ma hA ba la/ chos sku chos dbyings chos tri mu tri/ 'khor ba/ /shin tu nges pa bde chen pa/ /stobs chen sems chen stobs chen pa/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po 'ba' zhig pa/ /rdo rje can dang yang dag sbas/ /dgra bcom pa dang bzod
<p>72a.4</p>mang ba/ /'jig rten mgon po dus gsum mkhyen/ /pha rol phyin bcu 'chang ba dang / /nam mkha' mtshungs dang tog dkar po/ /byang chub sems ma hA ba la/ dpa' legs gsung ba/ /gnyis med pa dang rtsod pa bral/ /sku gsum yon tan 'byung gnas
<p>72a.5</p>dang / /dri ma mi mnga' byams chen ldan/ /byang chub pa dang sa bcur son/ /thams cad rtogs dang dgra las rgyal/ 72 /shAkya seng ge gau tam/ /zas gtsang sras dang shAkya thub/ /rdo rje gdan pa sa 'tsho'i bdag /don kun grub pa don grub dang / /
<p>72a.6</p>bla ma lha mo sgyu 'phrul sras/ /lhas byin rnams dang sgyu 'phrul sras/ /nyi ma'i rigs 'khrungs nyi ma'i gnyen/ /don thams ston pa thub pa la mtshan bcu drug/ cad pa dge sbyong che/ 16 /'di yi longs spyod rdzogs bstan sras/ /grags 'dzin skyes dang sgra gcan
<p>72a.7</p>'dzin/ 1 /gtsug ni lhas byin sgyu 'phrul ma/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul lum+bi nI/ 3 /rang sangs rgyas la mtshan drug /bse ru lta bu rang sangs rgyas/ /legs 'dul dang ni gcig pur spyod/ /rang byung dang ni bse ru rgyal/ 6 /nyan thos slob ma'i ming can no/ /byams pa la mtshan bzhi/ 2 byams
<p>72b</p>
<p>72b.1</p>pa rgyal tshab dpal ldan dang / /de bzhin sangs rgyas mi pham pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug chu skyes can/ /phyag na pad+ma mkha' spyod pa/ /ral pa 'dzin dang brtse ba can/ /'jig rten mgon dang spyan ras gzigs/ /rdo rje nyi ma brtson 'grus che/ /'jig rten dbang
<p>72b.2</p>dang pad+mas mtshan/ /bdud rtsi'i char ldan yid bzhin nor/ /gzugs spyan ras gzigs la mtshan nyer gsum/ mang ha la ha la dang / /bde ldan dbang phyug bu mo dgyes/ /'od dpag med pa'i thod can dang / /za ma tog bkod mnar med gzigs/ /gru 'dzin ri
<p>72b.3</p>la dgyes pa dang / /yon tan rin chen 'byung gnas so/ 13 /sgrol ma sgrol ma zhi ba dang / /sgrol ma dpal chen oM mdzad ma/ /rgyal ma 'jig rten dbang sras mo/ /yangs pa can ma sgrol ma che/ /bzang mo mtha' yas yid 'ong ma/ /mkha' la ring du bzhugs ma
<p>72b.4</p>dang / /legs sbyin ma dang dung can ma/ /dpal mo dang ni /sgrol ma la mtshan bco brgyad/ /dbyangs can ma'o/ 18 /spyan gsum ma dang spyan ma'o/ 2 /nor rgyun ma dang nor sbyin ma/ 3 /'od zer can ma zhal gsum ma/ /rdo rje phag mo dkar mo dang / /rdo rje nag mo rdo rje
<p>72b.5</p>nag /rnam gtsigs phag gi shing rta ma/ /'jam dbyangs 'jam dpal 'jam mgon dang / /'jam pa'i rdo rje 'jam pa po/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / /gzhon nu dang ni 'od zer can ma la mtshan brgyad/ gtsug kau rA+e/ phud 'dzin/ /badzra kA li mA badzra kA li/ 
<p>72b.6</p>'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ldan pa do trir thA dang / 'jam dbyangs la mtshan nyer bzhi/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba gaN+Dis brgyan/ /byis pa'i brtul zhugs ral gri can/ /ye shes me long blo yi bdag /zung phud lnga pa ngag dbang phyug /smra ba'i rgyal po shes rab sku/ /ut+pal sngo ldan rgyal
<p>72b.7</p>chen dang / /seng ge sngon po bzhon pa can/ /brtan pa'i 'khor lo seng ge rtsan/ 24 /dzam+b+ha la la mtshan drug go/ nor bu bzang po rmugs 'dzin dang / /sngon gyi gnod sbyin chu'i thub pa/ /chu yi dbang po chu la gnas/ 6 /kye rdo rje la mtshan dgu/ dpal ldan khrag 'thung kye rdo rje/ /rdo rje
<p>73a</p>
<p>73a.1</p>gri gug he ru ka /he ru rol pa'i rdo rje dang / /de bzhin dpyid dang ri khrod pa/ /ru la ru la zhes pa yang / 9 /bde mchog 'khor lo sdom pa dang / /dpyid dang dpa' bo ri khrod pa/ /zla ba'i thod can he ru ka/ /lha dang rdo rje thod pa can/ /
<p>73a.2</p>rdo rje mkha' mgro nges gnod mdzes/ 11 /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /gsum po 'di ni dkon mchog gsum/ /mi yi srid pa bde mchog la mtshan bcu gcig/ pa rnams la/ /de dag nor gyi rin chen gsum/ /dpal stug /dge sbyong / dge slong dang / /
<p>73a.3</p>phyag 'os/ bsam 'os/ chos gos can/ 6 /shra ma Na ri/ tsa lu ka 2 /gnyis po 'di dag rab tu byung / /dge bsnyen chen po go mi'o/ 2 /bdun sbyar ba dang / don byed pa/ /rma bya'i mjug ma can pa'o/ 3 /bsnyen dge slong la med drug/ gnas dang ni gso
<p>73a.4</p>sbyong ngo / /'khar gsil khad+khi rA dang ni/ /khi khI ra ka khe khI ra ka 'ga' zhig dge slong dang dge tshul zhes/ 'khar ba sgra ldan zer/ /btsun pa/ dge sbyong rnams kyi khri la ni/ /rkang gsum pa dang chos kyi khri/ 2 /byed po rnam byed pad+ma'i gdan/ /kun byed sna tshogs sgrub
<p>73a.5</p>byed dang / /bde skyes nyes can skye dgu'i bdag /dbyig gi snying po yang mes po/ /mes po rig byed 'dzin skyes dang / /rang byung tshangs pa bdag skyes dang / /mchog gnas lha rgan gdong bzhi pa/ /pad skyes/ tshangs pa la ming lnga bcu rtsa gnyis/ ma skyes 'byin byed dang / /
<p>73a.6</p>'jig rten dbang dang pad+mas mtshan/ /rig byed snying po rig byed dbang / /sna tshogs shes dang rnying pa dang / /sngon du gnas dang sna tshogs bzo/ /'gro ba'i byed po sna tshogs tshangs pa'i ming / gtong / /sna tshogs byed dang lte ba skyes/ /sngon skyes dga' ba brgya pa dang / /
<p>73a.7</p>chu skyes brgya 'dzin mig brgyad pa/ /byed po pad can ngang pa bzhon/ /sna tshogs sgrub dang skyon can dang / /bde 'byung gnas byed srog byed dang / /rna ba brgyad pa snying stobs can/ /bde shes dang pa'i shing rta tshangs/ 52 /dbyangs can ma la mtshan dgu/ tshangs pa'i bu mo ngag lha
<p>73b</p>
<p>73b.1</p>mo/ /tshangs ma dkar mo shA ra dA/ /dkar mo chen mo dbyangs can ma/ /so ma l+lu ra'i rgyas byed ma/ 9 /de nas rang skyes skra can gsod/ /sbrang rtsi'i bu dang mi 'dzag dang / /khyab 'jug lag bzhin ba so skyes/ /'phrog byed nye dbang glang rdzi dang / /rdeb byed 'gro
<p>73b.2</p>'joms gom gsum gnon/ /g.yung drung can dang dpal gyi bdag /dpal gnas dkar ldan dpal be'us/ khyab 'jug gi ming brgya don lnga/ mtshan/ /dpal gyi lag pa dpal phag pa/ /dpal 'dzin sa gzhi 'dzin pa dang / /sngon gyi skyes bu rwa gzhu can/ /
<p>73b.3</p>a shwat+tha thos rtul mo'i bu/ /tha gu'i lto can dbang po'i dbang / /mkha' shI ni bA ya/ gau riH lding rgyal mtshan skra can gsod/ /sbyin skyes dgra bo pad dkar mig /na rA ya Na sred med/ shI bA rA haH shrI d+ha raH bu/ /me tog phreng ldan stobs ldan 'joms/ /'khar
<p>73b.4</p>ba'i sgra dang briShA ka piH /sna tshogs sde dang be con can/ /'dug gnas lha dang nor lha'i bu/ /swa ya mu na sna tshogs 'gengs/ /shes gsal 'dul dang skyes bu dang / /skye mchog dga' ba brgya pa dang / /rtag tu dga' dang dga' byed dang / /lha mo dga' byed gang
<p>73b.5</p>dga' byed/ /gnas sbyin mchog sbyin lha min dgra/ /pad+ma'i lte ba sbrang rtsi'i sgra/ /rtag tu sbyor ldan dbyug rtse skyes/ /thig le drug pa dbang gzhan skyes/ /gser gyi thig le 'og dbang skyes/ /gos ser can dang 'khor lo'i lag /ma pham pa dang 'dam bu'i
<p>73b.6</p>dbang / /dbyig gi lte ba mchod 'os bcu/ /dpal gnas gzhan gyis mi thub dang / /sbyor ba brgya pa dmyal ba 'joms/ /chur nyal sgra gcan lus 'joms dang / /dpal be'u can dang dpal gyi gter/ /zla ba'i snying po dpal gyi snying / /yA da ba dang mthon po'i
<p>73b.7</p>lha/ /'gro mgon dus kyi mu khyud dang / /'phrog byed/ brtan pa/ gzhung phyed dang / /ngang pa can dus/ char pa'i snying / 2 /rgyal dka'/ skye ba'i dus/ sngo chen/ /'dam bu'i lte ba rab gsal dang / /mun 'joms/ mdas 'dul/ 'bigs byed dang / /rnam
<p>74a</p>
<p>74a.1</p>'byed stobs ldan bslu ba dang / /e ka pA dA d+hi las dang / /sbyor gsum/ phyogs gsum/ gom gsum pa/ /ran+ti'i lha dang / me tog bzhad/ /chu gnas khyu mchog lto ba dang / /spyan dmar/ /mu kun+ta/ legs bzang / /phyag dar khrod kyi
<p>74a.2</p>dra ba can/ /sna tshogs gzugs can 'gro ba'i tog /mdung thung sar ldan/ 'og gi khang / /mi gsal pAN+Da pa 'jigs dang / /kaustu b+ha ldan/ pAN+Di'i bu/ /rgyal byed/ sngon rabs/ sa li ka /sa mi ti rgyal/ mArdza dang / /mA rany+dza ra/ /sa 'dzin 'joms/ /
<p>74a.3</p>smod skyes/ mtha' yas/ gser mdung can/ mkha' la gnas dang / zhi bar grags/ /skye bo 'jigs pa/ skra grol brtan pa/ /'dzin byed dang / /sems skyes/ chu sbyin/ /bkod sbyin dang / kob sin+d+hU'i 'bras/ /char 'bras/ /dgra bo/ mi yi
<p>74a.4</p>seng ge dang / /gtsang byed/ 'jo ba/ a riSh+Ta/ /skra can/ rdul 'dzin 'joms byed dang / rwa gzhu can dang / dung gi lag /'phel byed dang ni mi zad pa/ /rta dang kaustU b+ha 'chad 'gyur/ /rtse byed dang ni dga' ba 'dzin/ /rwa gcig 'khyil pa brgya pa dang / /
<p>74a.5</p>rdul phran lus dang / ser skya dang / /dga' ba'i dbang po dpung bzhi pa/ /rtag pa sbyor ba brgya ldan dang / /ba b+h+rU/ ya ma na'i dgra/ /char skyes/ mda' dang / gtong byed dang / /gzugs mang can/ dang kun la lta/ /kun shes pa dang / thams cad mig /
<p>74a.6</p>lnga skyes 'dzin dang / rgyal byed dang / /thos pa'i snying po skyes bu mchog /mi yi seng ge/ mchod sbyin skyes/ smin can dad gshin rje/ /rgya mtsho'i zla ba/ ri bong thig /mi'u thung / 'jug pa bcu pa dang / /dang po'i/ phag dang / dang po'i lha'o/ 175 /'di yi pha ni nor lha
<p>74a.7</p>ste/ 1 /dun+du ra dang / a na ka/ /dun+du b+hi dang / b+hu kA'o/ /rnga bo che dang bug can no/ /shing ldan dang ni/ shing rta 'dren/ 2 /blon po/ rgod dang / rlung nad can/ /shi ni'i tsha bo bden pa can/ /brag skyes/ yu yud+hA na'o/ 3 /khyab 'jug /khyab 'jug gi pha'i ming sogs/ 'khor
<p>74b</p>
<p>74b.1</p>lo legs mthong ste/ /be con ko mo ki'o/ /gzhu ni rwa gzhu gi dga' byed/ /dung ni lnga skyes/ rgyal ba'i dbyangs/ /'di yi nor bu mtha' byed lag /de ni kostu b+ha ru bshad/ /stobs bzang dang ni rab 'phyad gsod/ /stobs lha gshol mtshon gos sngon can/ /thod
<p>74b.2</p>ldan gshog can tA las mtshan/ /sa bdag byed/ gtun shing can dang stobs can dang / /nam gru dga' byed/ dga' ba can/ /'dod skyong / sbrang rtsi dag pa dang / /legs 'gugs dang ni thod khyab 'jug gi phu bo'i ming sum cu so lnga/ pa'i lag /legs dga' mthong ldan/ tA la 'dzin/ /
<p>74b.3</p>ha yi/ rna rgyan gcig pa sngon rabs pa/ /gshol ldan gser can 'joms 'jigs byed/ /mchog sbas dang ni snar ma skye/ /mi 'dzeg ston skyes kun dga' dang / /bzang stobs/ gshol 'dzin/ gshol la dga'/ /kA li nid+hI 'joms/ 
<p>74b.4</p>lhag ma dang / /kA lin+d+hI 'gugs mtha' yas so/ 35 /'di yi chung ma nam gru ma/ /sbrang rtsi dmar ser can ma'o/ 1 /'joms byed pa dang thong gshol la/ 2 /legs dga' byed pa gtun shing brjod/ /yid las skyes dang / myos byed dang / /chu
<p>74b.5</p>srin rgyal mtshan yid las byung / /me tog gzhu can/ dga' ma'i bdag /me tog mda' can/ gzhan min skyes/ /mi bzad mda' dang / zhi mthar byed/ /bde 'joms/ 'dod chags bsgyur byed dang / /gshol bdud 'dod lha'i ming brgyad cu gya dgu/ gyis rtse bar 'dod
<p>74b.6</p>pa dang / /rol rtsed dga' ba/ rtsed mo ku sum tsA ba/ can/ /'dres byed gsod byed 'dor byed dang / /dga' byed/ dran pa/ tshangs bcom dang / /dregs byed/ lus med/ rab stobs dang / /me tog gzhu can/ me tog tog /'dod chags zam pa
<p>74b.7</p>dga' ma'i bdag /bdag skyes/ mi zad/ nag po skyes/ /mda' lnga pa dang / sbrang rtsi dga'/ /pad+ma can dang / lang tsho 'byed/ /thams cad 'dul dang / rgas byed dang / /'dod duHd+ha na/ chags phye ma/ dka' thub dgra/ /yid sred yid las
<p>75a</p>
<p>75a.1</p>skyes pa dang / /lus 'khogs gzhi dang na tshod skyes/ /'chi bdag gtsug phud snying la nyal/ /dbang phyug bde skyed yon skyes dang / /'dod spyod dga' ma'i bdag skyes dang / /i ming can dang kun sbyor can/ /sbrang rtsi'i kha lo nyi ma'i mda'/ /
<p>75a.2</p>mi bzad mtshon cha mtshon cha'i gzugs/ /sbrang rtsi'i sgron ma rnam byed dang / /'dod pa dang ni 'dod pa'i lha/ /gzugs mang po dang rab dga' byed/ /mtshon cha lnga pa bdud lnga pa/ /'gro rtsen 'gro ba'i shing rta dang / /bdag gi skye gnas/ kun mad+hu sA ra thiH rabI ShUH rtog
<p>75a.3</p>skyes/ sgeg pa'i skye gnas/ rgyal dka' dang / /nya'i tshigs rgas byed/ 'jigs byed dang / /nyin byed dgra dang / 'dres byed dang / /dus rtsen/ dga' byed/ sgrib bya dang / /sred byed pa Tu Ta gzhon dang / /sgra byed dga' ma dga' byed dang / /yid la nyal
<p>75a.4</p>dang / sdom pa'i dgra/ /chu srin mtshan pa lus skyes dang / /'khor ba'i bla ma/ kun rtog byung / /yid la skye ba rnams yin no/ 29 /'di yi bu ni tshangs spong dang / /sna tshogs tog dang / ma 'gags pa/ /u ShA'i bdag dang / nya yi tog /bu yi dga' ma/ 
<p>75a.5</p>dga' byed 'dod/ 2 /'dod pa'i mda' ni lnga yin te/ /kun tu rmongs byed brgyal bar byed/ /smyo byed/ rgod byed/ sred byed do/ 5 /dga' ma/ rtse byed ma/ rtsen ma/ /sgeg pas 'gro ma/ re nA dang / /'dod chags 'khri shing / 'dod ma dang / /i bcas/ 
<p>75a.6</p>dran pa'i ba lU ba/ 9 /'di yi sring mo gnas tshogs ma/ /dar dur sa zhes pa yang / 2 /'phrog byed dga' ma dga' byed ma/ /dpal mo/ pad gnas/ pad+ma ma/ /mi g.yo/ g.yang mo/ dbang mo dang / /chu gter skyes ma/ chu rgyan ma/ /sA dang ShA zhes bya ba'o/ 12 /
<p>75a.7</p>'dod ma/ /to/ br-iShA/ ka pA yI/ /rdo rje 'o ma'i chu gter ma/ /g.yo byed ma dang skyod byed/ khyab 'jug chung ma'i ming bcu gnyis/ ma/ /sred ma/ sin+d+hU skyes ma dang / /rgya mtsho'i bu mo rnams yin no/ 9 /bden pa'i b+hA ma/ b+hA mA dang / /bden bcas ma zhes bya ba'o/ /rnam 'dul khyab
<p>75b</p>
<p>75b.1</p>'jug gi bzhon pa'i ming po gsum/ skyes dang dug 'joms ldan/ /mkha' lding / 'dul skyes/ skar mig bu/ /mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug /klu mthar byed/ /khyab 'jug shing rta bdud rtsi za/ /'dab chags seng ge/ /'dab bzang dang / /gser 'dab shAm+bA lI la
<p>75b.2</p>gnas/ /u lU ti'i bdag ltos 'gro zas/ skya rengs nu pho/ zhing bzang skyes/ /rnam gsal rnam 'dren/ mig yangs dang / /bcud len za dang / dug 'phrog dang / /'dod pa'i tshogs gnas/ pak+Shi saM g+ha/ rdo rje'i mchu/ /ri la gnas dang / klu yi dgra/ /'dab
<p>75b.3</p>ldan/ dpal chen/ gser gyi lus/ /phreng ldan/ 'dab bzang ma yi bu/ /lha rgyal 'dul dang / 'od srungs skyes/ 33 /'di yi chung ma u lU ti/ 1 /bu ni bzhin bzang zhes par dran/ /rgyu skar ji bzhin zhes bya ba/ /rgyal byed ming ldan de'i mtshan mo/ /
<p>75b.4</p>yud tsam rnam rgyal zhes bya ba/ /gang la skyes pa 'gro ba 'joms/ /aSh+Ta karma pa ti b+h+raSh+To 3 rdan+to dzi na sh+tsasaH/ /zhi ba skyo med gzhu can dang / /'phrog byed dbyig ldan bde byed dang / /ri dbang / ri rmod 'di 'brel med pa brtags/ ral pa bcings/ /bde 'byung u mA'i bdag po
<p>75b.5</p>dang / /mdung can tshim byed/ dbang phyug che/ /gtsug na zla ba thod pa 'dzin/ /mig gsum/ gnas byed/ du byed dbang phyug gi ming brgya nyer drug/ dang / /phyug bdag dang ni zla ba 'dzin/ /dbang bo/ dbang phyug /dbang ldan dang / /'byung po'i dbang dang / tsan+dan
<p>75b.6</p>'od/ /ri nyal thod ldan/ dgra sta'i dum/ /b+ha ga lI brgyad las yongs 'joms 'os 'os rgyal ba yang de/ dang rab 'joms bdag /'chi las rgyal dang stag gos can/ /srid pa 'jigs dang / mig gsum pa/ /kun mkhyen me yi khu ba dang / /ral pa'i khur can
<p>75b.7</p>sngon dmar can/ /dpal mgrin drag shul grong bskal bzang phreng / khyer dgra/ /mgul nag nam mkha'i sgra can dang / /la kun+da la/ gang+gA 'dzin dang / bran 'joms dang / /rgyal byed grong gsum mthar byed dang / /g.yon gyi lha dang / lha chen po/ /sna tshogs
<p>76a</p>
<p>76a.1</p>mig dang ga las g.yo/ /ri yi gzhu skyes/ long ba'i dgra/ /khyu mchog rgyal mtshan/ mchod sbyin 'joms/ /nam mkha'i skra can/ tA las mtshan/ /zla ba 'dzin dang gar mkhan che/ /srid bsrung 'dzin dang skra sbas dang / /'jigs byed
<p>76a.2</p>'byung po can b+hang+g+ya/ /mgrin nag /mi zad/ thun mtshams su/ /gar byed pa dang / gar la dga'/ /ka ka TI ko/ /b+ha ru dzoTI/ dmar ser byam ke sha/ /mig dang / dzo TI ka/ /char 'bebs/ i Di hA r+Na dang / /lus srul ga se sha mig sman/ /ka TA TaM ga
<p>76a.3</p>ral pa can/ /ral pa'i tshogs can ral pa 'dzin/ /dal 'bab/ nor bu/ u lin+da/ /gzugs mang po dang gar bas bskor/ /phur bu/ rnam 'jigs mtho ba'i dbang / mig gcig /tshangs 'joms/ 'gro la 'tshe/ /mtshams smra snying byed/ rkang
<p>76a.4</p>gcig dang / /steng gi khu ba mi zad mig /gzhan gyis mi thub gdong lnga pa//gsang ba'i bla ma/ rab byed dang / /gtsug phud rgyal mtshan/ sbrul 'ching dang / /sbrul gyi gdub can ri khrod pa/ /sbrul gdug rna rgyan/ dpral mig pa/ /zhi 'dzin/ mchod sdong / byin 'phrog dang / 
<p>76a.5</p>rtsub po/ steng 'phur dbang po dang / /mig rus phreng ldan/ tshogs kyi dbang / /hiN+Da kAn+ta glang rdzi dang / mig yangs/ zhi bar gnas/ sprin zhon/ /mun sel/ bzang po gcod byed dang / /khyu mchog ser skya khyu mchog tshigs/ /rtag tu 'byung dang / 'byung
<p>76a.6</p>po 'dzin/ /dam pa'i don ni gsal byed dang / /klu yi lus sbyin ri la gnas/ /las byed pa dang / 'gro ba 'dzin/ skya bo/ bzang po'i dbang phyug dang / /long ba 'joms mkhas phyogs gos can/ /'tsho byed khyu mchog mig sman dang / /'chi ba bslu
<p>76a.7</p>dang / dga' ba 'phel/ /rig byed 'don dang / nag po che/ /khyab bdag /g.yon dang / brtan pa dang / /rgyal dka'/ bde skyes/ lha'i nor bu/ /khyu mchog mchog ldan ba lang bdag /mig gsal kun 'gro blo ldan dang / /dpal mo'i bu dang / g.yung
<p>76b</p>
<p>76b.1</p>drung ba/ /dus kyi rga dang / dran 'joms dang / /rtsegs byed/ chos kyi gzhon pa can/ /rab tu rgod dang gad rgyangs can/ /grong 'joms grong gi yan lag sbyin/ /'byung po'i mgon po 'byor pa ldan/ /nam gru skyes dang / yang mes po/ /grong gsum bsreg dang
<p>76b.2</p>ha ming can/ /shaM ku/ khyu mchog mtshan pa dang / /khri rkang can dang u ra bi/ /khyu mchog zhon dang / mig gsum pa/ mgrin pa khra bo rnams yin no/ 126 /ral pa bcings pa ka brta/ /khyu mchog rgyal dka' can dang mkhas/ /a dza ka zhes bya ba'o/ 7 /
<p>76b.3</p>gzhu ni skyo med/ phur bu/ 'gro ldan no/ 2 /bde ba'i khu NA/ kha T+wAM ga /phyag dar khrod dang / rngon pa'i gos/ /sil snyan/ cha lang / DA ma ru/ /'khor ni 'joms byed 'byung po'i tshogs/ /ma mo rnams ni tshangs ma rgyal dka' dang / /lus
<p>76b.4</p>ngan ma dang / khyab 'jug ma/ /dbang mo dang ni/ drag mo dang / /phag mo dang ni gzhon nu ma'o/ /phra dang / yang ba/ rab thob dang / /rab 'dod/ mchod 'os/ dbang phyug nyid/ /dbang du gyur dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur/ /dbang phyug 'byor pa rnam brgyad
<p>76b.5</p>gyur/ /de nas b+h+r-ing+gi ri ti dang / /b+h+r-ing+gi dang ni/ pags pa can/ /kI kA sha yi lus can dang / b+h+r-ing+gi rI Ta/ sham dang / /'dam bu'i lus dang / zhi bar grags/ 8 /dga' ba'i dbang phyug dga' ba can/ /sgo srung / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / /shAlang+gA yan
<p>76b.6</p>sgo yi dpon/ /gar mkhan phreng ba can rnams so/ /de nas grol bum/ rol rtsed mkhan/ /tshogs bdag dga' ba rnams/ hadzI/ saM ca/ yin no/ 3 /nag po chen po lus chen po/ /br-iShA NA ka 'jigs byed che/ 4 /dka' bzlog ka ti'i bu mo dang / /dkar mo/ ri skyes/ 
<p>76b.7</p>ri'i bu mo/ rtag ma dang ni lo ma med/ /dga' ba'i bu mo/ rig byed 'don/ /gtum mo/ ma ma zhi ba ma/ /gsod ma seng ge'i shing rta ma/ /kun la bkra shis/ ser nag ma/ /dus kyi dga' ma/ rgas byed ma/ /dbang phyug gi chung ma'i ming dgu bcu go gsum/ dbyig ma/ 
<p>77a</p>
<p>77a.1</p>gtsug phud gnas 'o ma/ /srid ma/ drag mo/ 'tsho byed ma/ /bzang dus can ma/ du byed ma/ /ser mo/ rgyal byed/ grul bum ma/ /mang ldan/ sa ga skyed ma dang / /dak+Sha'i bu mo/ srad med ma/ /rgyal ma/ shes gsal shes
<p>77a.2</p>gsal ma/ /drug ldan hiN+DI gser ldan ma/ /dbang phyug /dbang mo/ nga b+h+ra ma/ /gsal ba'i bu mo/ tshim byed ma/ /ma la yar gnas/ mchod ldan ma/ /grangs skyes/ rtse mo/ tshogs gtso mo/ /pr-iShA'i sdig ldan/ rnam rgyal ma/ kaiT+b+hA kai Tab+hI/ /zhi ba'i
<p>77a.3</p>sring mo/ yA da bI/ /rdzongs ma nag mo/ sde gzhon ma/ /zhi ba'i pho nya phreng ldan ma/ /lha mo/ sgra can/ tshul 'chos 'phreng / gau ta mI dang / mtshan mo che/ /phreng ba ma tshogs/ gcig pu ma/ /cha shas med ma/ yon tan ma/ /stobs lha'i sring mo/ 
<p>77a.4</p>nus ma dang / /lha yi bu mo ma mo'i ma/ /mtha' yas ma dang durdu rA/ /rma bya'i rgyal mtshan/ mai ne sI/ /khyab 'jug sring mo/ kar+b+ba rI/ /bung ba can ma/ ngan spong ma/ /'phyang ma/ dge ma/ gtum mo dang / /mai nA/ ka yi sring mo dang / /ma dang
<p>77a.5</p>gangs ri'i bu mo dang / /lha mo chen mo legs ldan ma/ /mun can ma dang be bA sau/ /dga' ma/ rig pa chen mo dang / /dug sel ras gos can/ ma dang / gos gcig ma/ 93 /tsartsI ka dang tsA muN+DI/ /rna ba chen/ skra 'dres ma/ mo 'jigs med ma/ /'dor
<p>77a.6</p>ma byi la'i rna ba ma/ /'phrog byed rnam sgeg ma rnams so/ /gau rI'i seng ge tA ma'i yi/ 1 drag mo/ rgyal ma/ rnam rgyal ma/ 2 log 'dren bgegs rgyal bgegs byed dang / tshogs rgan byed ma/ gtum ma'i mgo/ bdag byi ba gser ldan dang / /lto ba 'phyang dang / 
<p>77a.7</p>ha la gnas/ /glang po'i gdong dang / so gcig pa/ /ma gnyis pa dang / /khams gsum pa/ /lus gnyis pa dang / rdo rje'i tshogs bdag la ming bcu bdun/ mchu/ /pr-iSh+Ni'i rwa can glang po dang / /tshogs mchog rje dang dgra sta 'dzin/ 19 /byi ba 'dod pa'i
<p>77b</p>
<p>77b.1</p>lus can no/ 2 /smin drug bu dang / sde chen dang / /dmag dpon/ me skyes/ skem byed dang / /ri sras dga' byed sa ga skyes/ /gtsug phud can zhon khrung khrung 'joms/ /gang+gA skyes dang / 'dam bu skyes/ /gdong drug /ma drug /mdung thung 'dzin/ /rje bo
<p>77b.2</p>sbad byed/ sgrol smin drug bu la ming sum cu so gcig /byed 'dul/ /gzhon nu dang ni mang po skyes/ /rnam par rgyal byed/ bde byed bu/ /lha yi dmag dpon/ grub pa'i sde/ /sde dpon/ byis pa'i spyod pa can/ /tshangs par spyod ldan/ rnam par gnas/ /bcu
<p>77b.3</p>gnyis mig ldan gang+gA'i bu/ /bya gag rgyal mtshan/ gzi brjid che'o/ 31 /de lta bu la sogs pa lha'i rab tu byed pa'o// //dbang po lha bdag /grong khyer 'jig /lha yi rgyal po char sprin can/ /rgyal byed stobs 'jigs/ rgyal ba dang / /skyo med
<p>77b.4</p>mgon po pa t+ya n+ya/ /dbyig ldan/ lha dbang / dbang chen dang / /gnas kyi bdag po/ brgya byin dang / /bcud ldan bdag/ brgya byin gyi ming brgya dang bcu gnyis/ dang / legs brjod bdag/ /prA bI na brdi/ ra hi b+hi ta/ /mchod sbyin can dang / lha ldan
<p>77b.5</p>dang / /mchod sbyin brgya pa/ prA bI'i bdag /khyab stobs/ rgyal po/ 'phrog byed dang / /'phrog byed can dang / 'phrog byed zhon/ /'phrog byed/ rta can yang dag bu/ /char 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje can/ /rmugs byed 'joms dang / stobs ldan
<p>77b.6</p>dgra/ /pu lo ma'i dgra mchod 'dzin dang / /gtsang byed mgon po mtho ris rgyal/ /gzhan snyems gsod dang / sprin la zhon/ /dka' thub skyes dang / bzod dka' dang / /smin pa 'joms dang / kau shi ka /kun 'joms mig stong / shis brjod ldan/ /legs
<p>77b.7</p>stobs g+ha nA/ g+ha na dang / /ri 'joms dang ni rgan la nyan/ /grol med 'joms dang / rta ser skya/ /ki Ni lA ta mchod sbyin mchog /mchod mchog /ri skyes/ 'phel 'joms dang / /'phel ba gzhu mchog /gang po 'bod/ /gtsang ma'i mchod sbyin
<p>78a</p>
<p>78a.1</p>la lA ma/ mdo 'dzin/ mchod sbyin brgya pa dang / /so mang bu dang / so mang skyes/ /lha yi rnga can legs bris gtso/ /bde ldan/ 'joms byed/ grags mu khyud/ brgya 'dzin 'chi med grong gtso bo/ /pha rol mu khyud/ bcud ldan che/ /
<p>78a.2</p>gang po skems byed/ phyag 'tshal ldan/ /mi dbang dang ni/ glang po can/ /ba di ri dang / rdo rje'i lag /42 /'di yi dga' ma pu lo skyes/ /dbang mo/ chu 'dzin/ pu lo'i sras/ /mchog brgya ma dang dbang chen ma/ /legs brjod ma dang / brgya byin ma/ /rgyal
<p>78a.3</p>ba thob ma rnams yin no/ 7 /khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed dang / /grong khyer 'chi med ldan pa ste/ /sngon gyi skad dang / lha lha mo/ /bA ma rA dang / legs mthong ngo / 9 /chu klung mtsho dang / rtse ba'i mtsho/ 2 /tshal ni 'dres tshal rtsub 'gyur dang / /mkha'
<p>78a.4</p>rgyan dga' tshal dga' bas brgyan/ 5 /rgyal ba dang ni 'gro ba'i rgyud/ /rgyal byed dang ni smin par 'joms/ 4 /dbang po'i bu ni rgyal byed do/ 1 /nor ni dbang skyes/ nor char 'bebs/ 2 /lha yi 'dun sa chos bzang po/ 2 /lha yi dmag dang / legs brjod bu/ 2 /sprin
<p>78a.5</p>gyi glang po/ sa srungs bu/ /sprin glang / legs dul sa 'tsho skyes/ /so bzhi pUrba b+hA ShA su ta pu ri/ pa dang / rtag tu sbyin/ /sgra chen/ stobs ldan glang po dang / /glang po'i rgyal po/ brtul bzang dang / /nyi ma lto bcas/ gnyis 'thung dkar/ 13 /
<p>78a.6</p>glang po ches srungs la ming bcu gsum/ mA ta li dang / rta 'gugs so/ 2 /mthor thos dang ni rta dkar dang / /pr-i Sha Na dang bi la'o/ 4 /rdo rje sgra sgrogs/ lag nyal dang / /za byed/ rdo rje'i thog /sgra ldan/ /bde byed sgrogs zhum/ rtse brgya pa/ 'bigs pa/ 'bigs byed/ 
<p>78a.7</p>'bigs ldan dang / skabs kha lo pa/ gsum/ mtshon cha rtsibs brgya byin gyi rta'i ming / brgya pa/ /dbyig lus/ za ldan thog ris brgya byin gyi rdo rje'i ming nyer drug/ 'joms/ /dbang skyes/ sprin skyes/ yu ba can/ /ri 'gems/ brgya 'dzin/ dbang po'i mtshan/ /gcod byed
<p>78b</p>
<p>78b.1</p>ces pa rnams su 'gyur/ 26 /'di yi 'bar ba dang po 'jigs/ 1/gzhal med khang dang mkha'i theg pa/ /mi sbyin bu dang ma mtshan dang / /tum+bu ru dang / rgyas pa dang / /mchu las skyes dang lha'i drang srong / /mi sbyin bu dang rtse byed dang / /lha yi tshangs pa/ ca co
<p>78b.2</p>byed/ /ka re Na skyes/ shu na dang / /ka pi ba dz+nya/ rnam byed bu/ /bde 'byung rtsod dang / tshogs skyong lha'i drang srong / dang / /'byung gnas thub pa slob ma rtsod/ 12 /kun 'gyed gzhon nu/ rnam brgya byin gyi 'khor thub pa/ byed skyes/ 2 /lha yi sman pa/ 
<p>78b.3</p>tha skar bu/ /glang mo/ tha skar khyi/ sna skyes byin ma skyes/ /ga dA ga dA/ tha skar skye/ /mchog mthar byed dang / rgod ma skyes/ /sbyor ldan lha yi gso dpyad pa/ /gzhon pa mchog ldan sna skyes dang / /sman pa'i gos can rnams su 'gyur/ 13 /bi shwa karma/ 
<p>78b.4</p>sna tshogs byed/ /las bzang can dang / lha'i bzo bo'o/ 4 /dri za lha yi glu mkhan dang / /dbyangs sgrogs pa dang / dri za skyes/ 4 /dgra ngan spangs dang / dbyangs ldan dang / /sna tshogs shing rta/ dga' byed dang / /sa skyes/ mi sbyin skyes dang po/ /lha'i bzo bo/ 
<p>78b.5</p>sna tshogs dbyig dang / sgo ldan dang / mtho ris gnas pa rnams su 'gyur/ 10 /rig 'dzin 'dod pa'i gzugs can dang / /mkha' dri za'i bye brag/ la spyod dang lang tsho rtag /phreng ba la dga'/ dga' bas myos/ /mkha' spyod brtan pa'i na tshod can/ /dbang
<p>78b.6</p>chen ma dang me na kA/ /'dab ma'i ri mo/ chu shing ma/ thig le mchog ma/ zla ba ma/ /ri bong ldan ma/ legs brjod ma/ /gtsang ma/ dga' ma/ myos swa hA/ rtsen ma/ dbyangs 'jam ma dang / gnas grol ma/ /skra sdum ma dang skra bzang ma/ /pad dkar
<p>78b.7</p>lha'i 'dod ma/ ma dang / rang 'od ma/ /yun du legs la/ shing rta bzang / /dpung bzang / 'phyang ma/ rab 'joms ma/ dbus bzang ma dang / smig rgyu ma/ /dran pa'i snye ma rnams su 'gyur/ 15 /kha na ma tho med sogs 'di/ /mtho ris smad 'tshong legs myos skyes/ /
<p>79a</p>
<p>79a.1</p>chu skyes/ reg dga'/ dga' bas dregs/ mtho ris chu klung / nam mkha'i klung / /dal 'bab nam mkha'i gang+gA dang / /mtho ris gang+gA bcud ldan rigs/ /zla ba'i rgyun dang / bdud rtsi 'bab/ /sI tA dang ni/ lam gsum 'gro/ /
<p>79a.2</p>10 mar sar rgya mtsho btung mchog dang / /bdud rtsi bde/ /'thung lha yi ni/ /btung ba dang ni skabs gsum zas/ 6 /lha yi ri bo ri rab dang / /lhun po dang ni gser gyi ri/ /rin chen brtsegs dang / lha yi gnas/ /lnga po 'di rnams dkar mo/ lha yi shing / 
<p>79a.3</p>bdud rtsi'i ming / dpag bsam/ rkang 'thung man+dA ra/ /legs khyab/ yongs 'du/ sa brtol dang / /ha ri tsan+dan zhes pa'o/ 5 /lha yi skyed mos tshal rnams ni/ /rnam rgyal 'dres tshal dga' ba'i tshal/ /shing rta sna tshogs tshal rnams su/ /byu ru/ rin chen
<p>79a.4</p>rkang 'thung ngo / 22 /'khyog 'gro/ chung med/ rgyun med dang / /gtsang byed/ rten za/ rab mchod ldan/ /rlung gi grogs po gtsug phud can/ /shing 'phel ba lha dzi/ bi shA na re'i bu/ 'bar byed/ dag byed/ byin za dang / /sreg za nor rgyal/ 
<p>79a.5</p>shar lho'i phyogs bdag/ ag+ni/ me la ming brgya dang bdun/ a na la/ 'od nor can/ 'od can/ rta dmar/ rig byed skyes/ /'od bkra/ 'od kyi nor can dang / /chu yi skye gnas sreg byed dang / /drang srong me'i bu/ mtshun za/ mtshun gyi sA ti he ta/ thob byed dang / /chu mkhris/ chab mkhris/ 
<p>79a.6</p>chu rnams mkhris/ gsal byed/ sbyin sreg /dga' ba/ bi b+hA bA su/ dang / /rnyed za/ parba ri ka dang / /'dor byed/ nor bu rtsom po ba'i zlos skyon/ sel ba dang / /gser gyi khu ba 'od bdun pa/ /lam nag lus mi skyong dzi kha bat+ta ra/ a sAM pat+te/ 
<p>79a.7</p>ba dang / /rtswa a sam+bAt+ti/ gyA wa/ zan/ skems byed/ sbyin byed dang / /sbyin sreg za dang / snga dro song / /zhi byed/ mya ngan/ 'bar ba'i skra/ /'phrog byed/ sgrol byed/ bi tri ho tra/ byin za dang / /sel byed/ khri can/ gnyid sad dang / /grub pa/ sgrub
<p>79b</p>
<p>79b.1</p>par la zhon/ /slu byed/ 'gro byed/ mang po 'dzin/ za byed/ 'bar ba'i lce ldan dang / /sna tshogs za dang / 'od kyi tog /kun za/ lce bdun/ za ba po/ za phod/ nag 'phro/ mun pa sel/ /sngags bdun/ mar ldan/ gsar ldan dang / /
<p>79b.2</p>'bar byed/ rgyal byed/ 'tshol byed dang / /gtsug phud can dang / mun pa 'joms/ /pu gar 'gro dang / lha la rdeg /kha ba'i sgra dang / 'od byed dang / 'od kyi shing rta/ du ba'i tog /bzhon pa dkar po/ gnas byed dang / /skyed byed dang ni/ grang
<p>79b.3</p>bsel/ /'od byed dang ni/ rnam gsal byed/ tsi tra TI raM ku Sha ku/ /char pa g.yo dang / sbyin sreg lag /ser po/ sbyor byed/ pra rA ku/ /gcod byed/ snang byed/ snun pa 'dzin/ /gser 'bar/ nor skyes/ rdo las skyes/ /'gro 'dzin/ 
<p>79b.4</p>mun gnas/ za byed dang / /dkar las gzhan 'gro/ gyen me lce/ /zhi bar gnas pa rnams su 'gyur/ 107 /chags sdig can mang me ma dang / /legs sbyin ma dang / me'i dga' ma/ 9 /me yi rta ni/ gser rtsen ma/ 1 /'od me gzi brjid ldan pa
<p>79b.5</p>b+hA/ 1 /de nas dbyig ma/ gser ma dang / /dmar nag ma dang / 'od bzang ma/ /gzugs mang ma dang / shin tu dmar/ /lce bdun ma dang / sbyin sreg lag / 7 /rgod ma kha dang / brla skyes dang / /rgod ma skyes dang / rgod ma'i me/ /bA shi skyes dang / bud
<p>79b.6</p>shing can/ /byed pa'i rgyal mtshan/ chu'i bud shing / /sa 'og 'dir yang ma ning rtags/ 2 /me yi phung po shing mchog sreg / 2 / nags me/ shing skye shing sreg dang / /sreg byed/ mi bzang / dz+hi ki lA/ 6 /lci ba'i me dang / lci ba skyes/ /kaR+ShU pA tA laM/ dang
<p>79b.7</p>ni ts+tsha ga Na/ ag tshar can/ 4 /sbur me dang ni me ma mur/ /ku kU la dang mu rmu ra/ 4 /rtswa yi me dang mnyam sgrol lo/ /rims kyi me dang lhag par sems/ 2 /bya gag sreg byed skar mda' dang / /sum ka na dang / bya gag mer/ 4 /rlangs pa gyen 'phyur/ a ba thu/ /
<p>80a</p>
<p>80a.1</p>'bar ba'i me ni/ des sbyin sreg /1/me lce/ rnyed za 'bar ba dang / /phur bu/ hi ti/ shi kha'o/ 5 /me stag /mkha' skyes/ me'i zegs ma/ 3 /mgal me dang ni/ sol ba 'bar/ 2 /kun tu gdung byed tshad rims so/ 2 /lus
<p>80a.2</p>'dzin/ g.yo byed/ khu byug can/ /dra ba med pa zhes pa yang / /thal ba/ b+hu ti/ sbas ma/ b+ha ni ta/ /sar+b+pa Ta/ gtsug phud do/ /dang / ar+b+pa Ta/ /rak+Sha/ na ri/ 'gyur ba'o/ 6 /du ba mang po/ /du ba'i tshogs/ /du ba 'gro byed me mang lus kyi me/ 
<p>80a.3</p>skyes/ /me yi rgyal mtshan skra yi phreng / /rlung 'gro nam mkha'i ta mA la/ /g.yo byed sprin gyi bzhon pa'o/ 9 /chos kyi rgyal po pha gshin bdag /'tshe ba'i dbang phyug gshin rje'i rgyal/ /zhi byed gshin rje mtshungs 'jug dang / /lho phyogs bdag po mthar byed
<p>80a.4</p>dang / /grangs can/ byas mtha'/ kI nA sha/ /ma he'i rgyal mtshan/ chad pa 'dzin/ /kun 'dod/ rnying lho phyogs bdag bo la ming nyer drug/ gnas/ gshin gyi rgyal/ /dus 'dzin/ 'phrog byed/ yi dgas bdag /dbyug 'dzin lto bcas ka lin+dI/ /
<p>80a.5</p>nyi ma'i bu dang mtshun gyi lha/ /chad pa can dang dga' byed do/ 26 /'di yi chung ma dud pas 'gegs/ 1 /grong ni yang dag 'gog ces bya/ 1 /mdun pa'i ming ni nyi ma can/ /kA NI tsI ni rnam spyod pa/ /pany+tsa ka twa gri san+nA li/ 1 /sna tshogs sbas pa/ yi ge pa/ 1 / 
<p>80a.6</p>g.yog ni/ gtum po/ gtum chen dag /2 /srin po'i dbang po sgra sgrogs dang / /lang+ka'i bdag dang gdong mang po/ /gdong bcu pa dang / mgrin bcu pa/ /dal 'dzin lto dga'/ dga' byed/ dka' 'grel ni mchog dam pa sgrubs/ sgra/ /dal 'dzin nga rgyal 'od
<p>80a.7</p>yangs bu/ /'od yangs skyes dang gnas bden bral phyogs bdag srin po la ming bcu gsum/ bzhi pa/ /nor sbyin gcung po rnams yin no/ 13 /dbang po 'dul dang / sprin gyi sgra/ 2 /lang+ka'i bdag po'i grong lang+ka/ 1 /rtsed mo'i mtsho ni dra ba can/ /rtse ba'i sa ni 'chi
<p>80b</p>
<p>80b.1</p>med phrad/ 1 /skyed tshal mya ngan med pa'i stobs/ 1 /ral gri zla ba dgod pa'o/ 1 /'di yi sbun zla chung ba dag /bum pa'i rna ba 'jigs byed do/ 1 /dmag dpon lag mchog 'byang ba po/ 2 /blon po 'gro byed dang ne tso/ 2 /slob ma/ zhib ma/ mkha' rjes skyes/ 2 /sring mo'i
<p>80b.2</p>bdag po gser zhes bya/ 1 /'od zer/ gser gyi dga' byed do/ 1 /steng ka gser gyi pad+ma can/ /'od zer skyed par byed pa'o/ 2 /srin si shitra shan/ po ro zan sha rje na za/ /sha za dang ni/ gsod bdag skyes/ /mtshan mo rgyu dang mtshan mo spyod/ /sna tshogs
<p>80b.3</p>mdog dang sha yi zas/ /khrag 'thung sha za sha za dang / /sha 'gugs dang ni/ thun mtshams stobs/ /mtshan mo za dang srin po spyi'i ming zhe gnyis/ /srod la za/ /srod la rgyu ba kun tu rgyu/ /'tshe byed/ phur 'debs/ khrag rgyun 'thung / /mi la 'tshe dang / 'gro
<p>80b.4</p>ba 'dzin/ /bsod ba lA shrI/ ba lA shaH nams skye bo/ bden bral dang / /rjes su 'jug dang / srung ba pa/ /mkha' 'gro skyes dang mi la lta/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang / bi thu ra/ /sha 'dzin/ tshogs rengs/ gsod bdag bu/ /rab 'bab/ sha dga'/ 
<p>80b.5</p>mtshan mo'i stobs/ /mgo gsum pa dang mchu dmar ba/ /mgrin dmar/ 'jigs med/ za byed do/ /'di yi 'dun sa lus nag mo/ 1 /sha za kA pi sa skyes dang / /bum can skyes dang / chang bu can/ /mchog sems mchog sbyin zhags pa can/ /chu skyes
<p>80b.6</p>bdag dang / chu yi bdag/ /'brug sgra can dzal lo tita/ /dang lha min lha/ /bsil ba 'dzin dang / gzhan las rgyal/ /chu ldan dang ni/ bal+lu b+ha/ /nub phyogs bdag dang / nags tshal can/ 13 /rlung bdag chu lha la ming bcu gsum/ nub phyogs bdag po/ dbugs
<p>80b.7</p>'byin 'gro byed rlung / /yang dag rgyug dang / 'gro ba'i ngang / /nam mkha'i srog dang nam mkha'i dbugs/ /'gro ba'i srog dang / 'gro ba'i stobs/ /dri bzhon/ dri min/ rlung dmar rlung / /thob byed/ 'gro byed/ rtag 'gro dang / /srog dang / dag byed/ 
<p>81a</p>
<p>81a.1</p>rab 'joms byed/ /ma mos 'phel dang / mkha' la rgyu/ /myur byed/ rtag de/ gnas med dang / /myur 'gro longs spyod mdzes pa dang / /g.yo byed rdul gyi kha lo pa/ /rgyal mtshan rab g.yo/ rdul rgyal mtshan/ /mtsho ldan dang ni/ 
<p>81a.2</p>mtsho byed dang / /stobs lha g.yo dang / mgul pa dang / /mtshon mi zla ba/ stobs chen dang / gtong byed/ 'dod byed/ 'gro byed dang / /reg ldan/ mi pham 'phrog byed dang / /na g+ha Da dang / bu ga 'dzin/ /marka rtse mo/ kun tu rgyu/ /rgyun gyi stobs
<p>81a.3</p>dang / rgyug byed do/ 52 /pr-i Sha rda ri 'di yi d+ha/ 1/srog dang / thur sel/ mnyam gnas dang / khyab byed dang ni/ gyen rgyu'i rlung / /'di rnams snying ga /bshang lam ste/ /lus kun dang ni mgrin par gnas/ 5 /rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ pA tA li/ /bA t+yA/ A si gi nI'o/ 4 /
<p>81a.4</p>bA tu la dang / rlung phran no/ 1/pA t+yA dang ni/ rlung gi tshogs/ 2 /d+ha bi traM ni/ 'degs pa'i rlung / 1 /ka ruH gyen rgyu 'degs pa'i rlung / 1 /phu lU hra sa// sprul gyi rlung / 1 /lha yi rlung ni/ ku the ra/ /dz+ha ny+dza ni la/ char 'bebs skyes/ 1 /hi ma dz+hA ni/ kha ba'i rlung / 1 /ma
<p>81a.5</p>d+hU/ ma ru ta dri yi klung / /ma la ya rlung / bA san+ta/ 4 /gzhi las skyes pa/ rgyu ba'i rlung / /de la skem byed kun 'gro'i rlung / 2 /rgyug dang / shugs dang / 'gros skyod byed/ /bang dang / rang 'gro/ mgyogs rta 'dra/ 2 /mgyogs par la gor/ myur cig
<p>81a.6</p>car/ yang dang / myur ba/ myur du g.yo/ dpyid/ /myur dang / myur ba ma thogs pa/ /maM k+Shu/ ardza sA/ skad cig /mi 'gor ba dang / dar tsam mo/ 16 /rtag tu/ rgyun du/ skabs med dang / /rgyun mi 'chad dang / rtag pa dang / bar med pa dang / 
<p>81a.7</p>shI g+hI/ gI sra/ a shu/ ltos med dang / res 'ga' tu taM/ ru ru/ min dang bar ma chad/ 9 /de nas rab 'bad shin tu'i don/ /nges pa mtha' gcig /nges 'bad dang / yongs thob/ tshad med/ shin tu lugs/ /nges 'dod/ 'dod dang / rab 'dod
<p>81b</p>
<p>81b.1</p>dang / /rtag tu bor dang nges par dang / /nan tar/ brtan par/ shin tu gzhungs/ /shin tu drag por/ te bor dang / /phul byung dang ni 'bad pa'o/ /dpal ster/ lus ngan/ mi la zhon/ /rgyal po'i rgyal po gnod sbyin dang / /rna rgyan gcig pa nor gyi bdag /
<p>81b.2</p>gnod sbyin rgyal po 'dod pa'i nor/ /nor sbyin mi yi chos ldan dang / /'od yangs/ tsha bo/ rnam thos sras/ /bsod nams skye bo'i dbang phyug dang / /byang phyogs bdag po/ kun raH/ lus ngan dang ni mig gsum grogs/ /nor rtsen dang ni sha za can/ /zhi ba/ mig skya/ 
<p>81b.3</p>i la'i rgyud/ /gter can/ mi 'am ci'i dbang phyug /lto dkar bug ldan/ rtag bde byed/ /gsang ba pa'i dbang / byang phyogs bdag /nor bdag nor ldan pad+mas mtshan/ /ku da nu/ rin chen snying po snying stobs che/ /rtsa gsum pa dang mi ci'i rgyal/ 35 /'di yi pho
<p>81b.4</p>brang lcang lo can/ /shing rta sna tshogs/ 'di'i skyed tshal/ /gzhal med khang ni/ me tog can/ /'di yi rtsed gnas/ /kai lA pa/ /bu ar+tha ba ri/ ni nA la ku be ra/ /rna ba'i snyan dag /mi ci'i rgyal/ 2 /lto ba ngan dang nyer bzhag dang / /des gnas/ 
<p>81b.5</p>stan 'dzin/ gter du gyur/ /dung dang pad+ma pad+ma che/ /'byin byed/ chu srin/ rus sbal can/ /rnga can/ sngon po/ dga' ba can/ /'di rnams gter gyi dbye ba dgu/ /mtha' med rgyas byed/ khyab 'jug gnas/ /kun 'gro/ sgra sgrogs/ lha yi lam/ /
<p>81b.6</p>rlung lam/ sprin lam/ mkha'/ nam mkha'/ /bar snang / mi g.yo/ kun gsal dang / /rnam 'gro/ lus med/ mi 'gyur dang / /kun khyab/ gnam dang / nam mkha'i ming / 'gro med dang / /lhas rtsen/ rol gnas/ rgyu skar lam/ /skye med
<p>81b.7</p>gnas dang / gsal gnas dang / /de ri hA NaH zhes pa rnams/ 25 /phyogs dang nyi ston/ gsal gnas dang / /kun khyab/ 'phrog byed/ ston byed do/ 6 /nyi ma shar las snga dro dang / /gung dang / phyi dro'o/ /a bA tsi/ /lho'o/ /nub phyogs pra tI tsI/ /de
<p>82a</p>
