<p>82a.1</p>yang zla ba gnas pa'o/ /byang gi u dI tsi ru 'dod/ /'ga' zhig zla ba de gnas so/ /dmyal ba 'og dang / a bA tsI/ 1/tshangs pa steng gi phyogs su dran/ 1/u ba riSh+Ta/ u barmu/ a bA gad+ha ad+h+ya steng / 2 /prA tsI na/ a pa tsI
<p>82a.2</p>naM/ /pra tI tsI naM rim pa bzhin/ /u dI tsI naM/ a pA tsI naM/ /shar phyogs de dngos la gsum rnams/ /prA ka dang / a pA ka /pra t+yaka /sogs/ /yul phyogs dus las mi zad pa'o/ /de dngos brjod steng bya'i rtags rnams 'og ni/ /shar ston lho
<p>82a.3</p>la phyogs dngos gsum rnams so/ /pra ts+yA/ a pA ts+ya/ pra tI ts+ya/ de dngos u dI ts+ya bzhin gsum/ /shar/ de yis lho/ nub/ skad cig sogs bshad la/ /phyogs dngos bstan pa bzhin du 'gyur/ /shar sogs kyi phyogs mgon po ni/ /dbang po me
<p>82a.4</p>lha gshin rje dang / /bden bral shar/ chu lha lho/ nub/ rlung lha dang / /nor sbyin bde byed go rims bzhin/ /sa srungs glang po bu dang pad dkar can/ /g.yon phyogs pa dang sa la dga'/ /gsal shar ram sngar/ lho byed nub/ me tog so can dang / 
<p>82a.5</p>sa kun sa dang legs grags dang / /brgyad po phyogs kyi glang po'o/ 8 /glang mo rim bzhin sprin grol ma/ /dmar ser ser phyogs srungs/ skya/ dpe med ma/ /zangs sna ma dang / so legs ma/ /yan lag mdzes dang gsal ldan ma'o/ 8 /nyi ma dang ni ngan
<p>82a.6</p>spong bu/ /sa skyes/ mtho ris snang byed dang / /nye skyes sgra gcan/ phur bu dang / /lhag pa 'di rnams phyogs bdag gza'/ /phyogs bral phyogs par phyogs mtshams so/ 3 /bar dang / a n+ta rA laM la'o/ /'khor yug dang ni dkyil 'khor ro/ 2 /tshangs
<p>82a.7</p>'joms/ char sprin/ dga' byed dang / /chu khur/ rgyun 'dzin/ chu 'bebs dang / /chu 'dzin/ chu 'gyed/ mkha'i rgyal mtshan/ /du ba'i skye gnas/ nam mkha'i gling / /mkha' yi glang po mkha' la rgyu/ /'khrud byed/ sgrogs byed/ sprin gyi ming / 
<p>82b</p>
<p>82b.1</p>chu sbyin dang / /glog ldan/ nam mkha'i ta mA la/ /rgyun sbyin/ chu gnas/ chu'i bzhon pa/ /rgyas byed nam mkha'i du ba dang / /myos byed lha gnas rlung gi shing / /rlung gi shing rta chu 'dzin dang / /gsher 'dzin/ chu bskyod/ grA bA dang / /lags 'dul/ char
<p>82b.2</p>ldan/ sa la 'bab/ /nags tshal skyed dang / chu g.yo'o/ /g+ha na g+ha na char ldan sprin/ /sgra ldan sprin ni pad+ma NI/ 1 /sprin phreng dang ni/ sprin nag dang / /chu skyar gnas dang / kA li kA/ 4 /mi yi lus sgrib kA li kA/ /nges sgrogs/ chu 'thor/ sgrogs byed
<p>82b.3</p>dang / /sgra sgrogs/ 'ur sgrogs/ sgra ldan dang / /grags sprin bye brag pa'i ming / stug dang stug med/ byed dang ni thog sgra can/ /bcud 'bebs ma dang / sgrogs ldan ma'o/ 10 /'khrud byed chu 'dzin rtags gsum pa'o/ /sprin sgra bcas kyi ming / legs 'dul/ 'khyud
<p>82b.4</p>byed/ skyod byed dang / /glog dang / g.yo byed/ nyams myong dang / /gnam gsal gnam lcags/ gsal ldan dang / /sa 'joms sa srungs/ se gol 'od/ /skad cig pa dang / skad cig 'od/ /'jug pa brgya pa sgra brgya pa/ /sprin gyi lcug ma/ sgrogs
<p>82b.5</p>byed ma/ /bde 'thung rnam bkra sna tshogs dang / /gzhi sngon skyes dang / lus phra dang / mi brtan/ chu sbyin/ chu phran ma'o/ 36 /thog gi sgra dang / rdo rje'i sgra/ 1 /sprin gyi me dang / chu 'dzin skyes/ 2 /sprin gyi thog ni/ uk+kaH'o/ /nges 'joms nam mkha'i tho ba'o/ 1 /
<p>82b.6</p>dbang po'i gzhu dang / rlung gi 'bras/ /bu lo ma skyes bdag mo'i gzhu/ 3 /de nyid 'khyog pa ro hi ta/ /de nyid drang por shar laM/ 2 /dbang po'i shing ba la/ rgan po'i thig /rlung gi rgyal mtshan sos ga bzhad/ /ras bal rgyud dang / rlung gi bal/ 6 /char pa zhod dang / char
<p>82b.7</p>'bab dang / /sa'i mar/ bdud rtsi g.yo ba'o/ 5 /de'i gegs/ then pa/ then chen dag /1/thig le/ pr-i Shad/ pho yin te/ /pi 'ja' tshon drang 'khyog gi ming / sruT/ bri ShaT/ bud med do/ 4 /rgyun gyi myu gu char rdul dang / /nges 'dor/ chu yi zegs ma'o/ 2 /ser
<p>83a</p>
<p>83a.1</p>ba'i rgyun ni drag char ro/ 1 /ser ba/ rdo char/ sprin gyi rdo/ /sprin gyi ka pha sprin me tog /sa la rgyun dang / sprin gong bu/ sprin gyi Dim+maM/ chu Dim+maM/ /chu 'khrigs chu yi sa bon dang / /rlung gi 'bras bu/ sprin rus pa/ /ka rA kaHdang ka raHdang / 
<p>83a.2</p>rgyun gyi myu gu/ char sa bon/ /bzhi mdo'i phyag dar zhes pa rnams/ 18 /ser ba'i ming / ka ra ka/ rlung gi gun+ma/ chu yi 'khyil/ /zegs ma'i lto ba/ chu'i myu gu/ 4 /yul ngan sprin gyi rab rib dang / /nyin mo sprin rnams 'khrigs pa'o/ 8 /spyi brags dang ser ba/ mun pa thag pa dang ser ba/ 
<p>83a.3</p>mi snang / thibs po 'thibs/ /sgrib/ g.yogs/ mi mngon/ mi gsal dang / /kun khebs/ khebs dang / mi mngon pa'o/ /zhes pa phyogs kyi bdag po'i rab tu byed pa'o/ /11 /bdud rtsi'i 'od dang / 'od dkar can/ /bsil zer can dang / sim byed dang / /
<p>83a.4</p>tshes bdag /chags byed/ rgya mtsho dga'/ /mig gsum pa yi gtsug gi nor/ /mtshan mo'i nor bu mig gsum 'dzin/ /ga bur/ dbang po/ /mtshan mo'i bdag /chab gter/ mkha' mthong / mtshan mor byed/ /ba la/ k+Sha gu phyogs skyes dang / snar
<p>83a.5</p>ma'i bdag dang / ri dgas mtshan/ /phyag 'os/ mthong dbang / bdud rtsi'i mtshan/ /ri bong can dang / yongs su 'grib/ /'phrog byed/ mchod sbyin bdag po dang / /rnam byed/ sman dbang / skar ma 'tshe/ /ku mud gnyen dang pad+mas mtshan/ /ri dgas
<p>83a.6</p>grib ma 'dzin pa dang / /ri bong mtshan ma 'grib byed dang / /rdul gyi thig le dkar po dang / /shar gyi thig le/ gnyis skyes rgyal/ /ri bong 'dzin dang / rgyal po dang / /gsal ba'i bu mo'i bdag po dang / /rgyu skar/ mu khyud/ rgyu skar gtso/ /gza' yi mu khyud 'tsho byed dang / /
<p>83a.7</p>dkar ldan/ bsil ldan/ kha ba'i 'od/ /rgya mtsho'i mar sar/ mun 'joms dang / /mun pa sel dang / tshigs ldan dang / khyom tsam/ nam mkha'i rna ba/ da yA/ brtse ba can/ /srid byed/ e Na pi br-i dang / /bdud rtsi spro dang / grib ma'i lus/ /rta dkar/ chu skyes
<p>83b</p>
<p>83b.1</p>nad can dang / phyogs skye ba dang / rgyal po'i rgyal/ /rnam par snang byed/ steng 'phur dang / /sri sra/ rgyal byed/ dka' thub can/ /gsum dga' gsher ldan/ bi ku shra/ /sna tshogs za dang srung byed dang / /kai ra bi NI dga' ba dang / /blo bzang srid ldan na tshod can/ /
<p>83b.2</p>'gro byed dang ni/ mu khyud can/ /ri bong grib ma/ thos ldan dbang / /rgas ldan gcig skyes/ rgya mtsho skyes/ 84 /shing rta 'tshe ma'i dra ba can/ /dung rab gnas zhes bya ba'o/ 1 /ngan spang skyes ni dbyangs bcu pa/ 1 /lugs kyi dbyangs ni phur bu'o/ 2 /cha ni bcu drug cha
<p>83b.3</p>shas so/ /gzugs can dang ni dkyil 'khor ro/ 2 /dum bu/ rang nad can dang 'grib byed sogs mar ngo'i cha la rtag par gsal lo/ /cha dang / zhogs ma dang / /dbye ba dang ni phyed ma'o/ 5 /pa bsangs phur bu gnyis 'od che bas zla ba'i blon po lta bur dgongs nas bkod pa 'dra/ phyed dang / mnyam dang / cha
<p>83b.4</p>shas can/ 3 /ku mud can dang / kai ra bI/ snang ldan/ bsil ldan/ zla ba yi/ /ra ba zla 'od zla ba'i phreng / 7 /khang bzang rab tu dang pa'o/ 1 /mdzes dang / stug dang / dang ba dang / /grib ma legs dang / /mngon par gsal/ /snang ba dang ni/ dpal rnams
<p>83b.5</p>so/ 8 /legs zla ba'i 'od kor gyi/ mnyam ma dang / mchog mdzes ma/ 2 /mdzes ma dang ni/ tog gi ming / dga' ma'o/ /mtshan byed/ mtshan nyid/ mtshon pa dang / /rtags can ang+ga mtshan ma can/ /mngon par shes byed rtags mtshan no/ 8/ba mo dang ni khug
<p>83b.6</p>rna dang / /char skya/ khu 'phang / gangs skyes dang / /sa can nam mkha'i rlangs pa dang / /mkha' yi chu dang / rdul gyi chu/ /dbang po'i me yi du ba dang / /rab rnyogs/ mtshan mo'i na tshod skyas/ 12 /kha ba ldan pa/ kha ba'i tshogs/ 1 /ku dzA Ti dang / ku hi kA /
<p>83b.7</p>du ba can dang / du ba 'dzin/ /du ba'i btsun mo/ dga' ldan ma/ /kha ba 'dus dang / kha ba'i 'dab/ /kha 'bab/ yul ngan/ shin tu grang / /nyi ma'i gos can yul ngan grang / /nags kyi gos dang / pha rol 'tshe/ /nam mkha' rdul can/ ku hi daM/ 16 / 
<p>84a</p>
<p>84a.1</p>bsil ba'i 'gyur ba lhags pa dang / /lhags ngar/ lhags ngar/ 'khyags pa dang / /bsil dang / grang dang / kha bas grang / brtan pa/ rkang rten/ nyal/ bza'i rten/ /snang ldan/ shing rta/ lugs bzang skyes/ /
<p>84a.2</p>brtan pa'i ma ni grang ba'i ming / lugs bzang ma'o/ /srin po'i ma ni nges 'tshe ma/ /gsal ba'i ma ni yid can ma/ /khyung gi ma ni 'du la byed ma/ /skar ma brtan pa'i ming / klu yi ma ni ka dru'o/ /ri byi dang ni/ ri bos 'phangs/ /bum skyes/ /kum+b+ha sam+b+ha
<p>84a.3</p>pa/ /mdza' skyob mI bu/ me ltar gsal/ /me nyams dang ni me rlung can/ /rgya mtsho khyar chung byed pa dang / /drang srong / /dbang chen ma'i bu/ rlung thob 'joms/ /bin+t+ya kr-ita/ rnam gza'i bu skar ma'i byi'i ming bcu bzhi/ par 'char/ /chu sa la shaMs ma b+ha ba/ lha'i
<p>84a.4</p>bu dang thub pa che/ /rgya mtsho ser po lho phyogs bdag /gdung byed dang ni/ thub pa'o/ 17 /de yi dga' ma mdzod ldan ma/ /zil gnon phyag rgya lho phyogs ma'o/ 3 /mi ltung / 'gro byed/ 'od can dang / /skar ma dang ni/ sgrol ba dang / 'phur byed dang ni/ snang
<p>84a.5</p>byed do/ 7 /gsal ba'i bu mo tha skar dang / /rta ldan ma dang / rta sbyor ma/ 4 /gshin rje ma dang / bra nye'o/ 2 /smin drug dang ni mang po skyes/ 2 /bod b+ha ba/ snar ma/ skye dgu'i skar ma spyi'i ming / bdag lta skyes/ 2 /ri dgas mgo can/ ri dgas mgo /ri dgas mgo ma/ 
<p>84a.6</p>ri dgas la/ /tha skar/ zla skyes/ mgo skyes lo'i thog ma'o/ 8 /lag dang / drag mo/ bra nye/ nag mo'o/ 3 /sbyin ma'i lha mo/ nabs so dag /2 /rgyal dang / grub pa/ tshim byed dang / /sbyor ldan/ bla ma'i lha ldan no/ 5 /skag dang / gdeng can lha mo dag /2 /mchu dang / snyan
<p>84a.7</p>ngag mkhan skyes dang / pha mes lha las skyes pa rnams/ 3 /'tsho ba skyes/ gre/ skye gnas lha/ 3 /phyi ma nyi ma'i lha ldan/ dbo/ 3 /me bzhi/ rig byed 'don pa'i lha/ 2 /nag pa dang ni/ brgyad ldan ma/ 2 /sa ri dang ni/ rlung lha mo/ 2 /rgyun ldan ma dang / sa ga
<p>84b</p>
<p>84b.1</p>dang / /me dang dbang po'i lha ldan te/ 3 /mdza' bo'i lha dang / lha mtshams dag /2 /lha dbang ldan ma dang ni snron/ 2 /Sha nai ra ti/ rtsa ba snubs/ 3 /chu stod dang ni/ chu lha ldan/ 2 /chu smad/ sna tshogs lha ldan ma/ 2 /gro bzhin/ 'phrog byed/ lha ldan ma/ 2 /mon gre dang ni
<p>84b.2</p>thob ldan ma/ 2 /mon gru/ chu lha mo dang ldan/ 12 /stod smad/ khrums dang / gnas rgyas ma/ /ra yi lha dang / sbrul 'ching ba'i/ /lha rnams dang ni/ rim pa bzhin/ /nam gru dang ni rgyas byed ma/ /gso ba'i lha mo 'di dag 'dra/ 3 /ri dgas mgo yi mgo phyogs su/ /
<p>84b.3</p>gnas pa'i skar ma 'gro ldan no/ 1 /mig dmar/ lus dmar/ sa skyes dang / /sa las byung dang / sa yi bu/ /chu skyes/ sa las skyes bkra shis/ /nam mkha' steng 'gro rtsibs ldan dang / /'od zer dgu ba 'khyog po'o/ 12 /de nas gza' lhag zla ba'i bu/ /rgyal
<p>84b.4</p>po'i bu dang snar ma skyes/ /sngo bsangs lus dang / gsal ldan dang / /mkhas pa rab dga'/ thos ldan skyes/ /lus gcig gser ldan tshim byed skyes/ 12 /dbo sngon song las byung ba dang / /'tsho byed/ smra mkhas/ lha'i bla ma/ /bla ma lha bdag /lha'i slob
<p>84b.5</p>dpon/ tshig bdag /blo ldan lha rnams bdag /nyi ma'i rigs skyes/ tshig gi bdag /shes ldan sna tshogs/ gtsug phud skyes/ /tshig ldan/ mig ldan/ dpyod ldan dang / /rtsub ldan shin tu gsal ba'i gcung / /mtho ris thob dang / 'bar ba ldan/ /
<p>84b.6</p>bcu gnyis 'od 'phro me bzhi skyes/ 13 /dkar po/ pa sangs/ ngan spong bu/ /snyan ngag dang ni/ snyan ngag mkhan/ /lha min bla ma/ lha min bdag /ngan sdong 'dzin dang / kun dzi ta/ /dkar po 'od ldan/ tshig brgya'i dbang / /bcu drug 'od ldan mchu las skyes/ /
<p>84b.7</p>14 sben pa rgyal ma'i bu/ kro Da/ /dal ba 'khyog po/ dal 'gro dang / /su ta/ shu ba/ rjes skyes dang / /nag po/ tshangs skyes/ mi bzad mig /'od zer bdun pa/ gos sngon can/ /gshin rje'i ba dan/ nyi ma'i bu/ 15 /sgra gcan/ gza' yi rna
<p>85a</p>
<p>85a.1</p>ba 'dzin/ /mtho ris snang byed/ bra nye skyes/ seng ge mo'i bu/ mun pa can/ /mgo zlum/ lam nag /zla ba 'joms/ /nye bar 'phar 'gro/ sprin las ni/ /rnam rgyal dang ni/ sha za'o/ /du ba mjug rings sbrul can
<p>85a.2</p>dang / /gtsug phud can dang / skra gnyis pa/ /skag las skyes dang / steng 'gro'o/ 6/drang srong bdun te 'od zer can/ /rgyun shes/ 'od yangs/ yan lag skyes/ /bu la ha yi mchod sbyin dang / /gnas 'jog /sna tshogs/ gtsug phud
<p>85a.3</p>can/ /khyim rnams 'char ba dus sbyor dang / /khyim gyi sgo ste de dag ni/ /nyin dang mtshan du longs spyod pa/ /lug dang glang sogs shes par bya/ /grib ma'i lam dang lha yi lam/ /gza' yi mu khyud na ma mkha'i gnas/ /'od gzugs/ nyi ma/ 'od 'byin dang / /
<p>85a.4</p>nyin mo'i nor bu/ nyin mo'i 'dren/ /gsal ba'i nor bu/ nam mkha'i nor/ /so sor nyin byed/ nyin mor byed/ snang byed/ 'od ldan/ dgu tshigs 'dra'o/ /ba ru NA/ /'od 'gro/ rgyas byed/ mkha' 'gro dang / /rnam bsgyur/ snang byed/ pa ti ba/ /cha
<p>85a.5</p>ldan/ nges bsreg /'od zer ldan/ /'od kyi rgyun dang / phyogs snang byed/ /sgrol byed/ sU ra/ sU ra ba/ /gdung byed/ tshad byed/ rnam snang byed/ /mun sel/ haM sa/ ma ga dang / /'od stong byed dang / 'dzin pa dang / /lus skyob nyin byed
<p>85a.6</p>'dam skyes mtshan/ /nyin mo'i bdag po/ a sri/ pad+ma'i bdag /ga ba sti/ phyogs bdag /mchog 'dod/ char 'bebs dang / /mchod ldan bdun gyi bdun pa dang / /gza' yi bdag po/ snang ba'i bdag /nyin mo'i bdag po/ 'bar byed dang / /'dzin
<p>85a.7</p>byed/ snang ba'i mu khyud dang / /'od byed pa dang / rnam gsal byed/ /sna ldan/ mig gzugs/ rta bdun pa/ /rta ljang can dang / tsha zer can/ /'od 'gyed sUR+Ya/ bsten bya marta N+Da/ bdud las rgyal/ /ma zlum marta N+Da/ 'phrog byed rtsen pa dang / /
<p>85b</p>
<p>85b.1</p>phyogs dgod byed dang / gtum pa'i 'od/ /'od ldan/ 'od kyi skra can dang / /mi sbyin skyes dang / 'gro byed dang / /snang ba'i mdzod dang / nor gyi mdzod/ /rgyu ba'i brtul zhugs/ mdza' bshes dang / /sna tshogs shing rta/ sna tshogs 'od/ /mchod 'os/ 'od
<p>85b.2</p>kyi nor can dang / /'gro ba'i sgron ma/ bcu gnyis bdag /pad+ma'i lag pa rtag tu 'char/ /rig byed 'byung dang las sna tshogs/ /khyab byed/ nad med/ 'thung byed dang / /'od kyi phreng can/ 'od ldan dang / /'od snang 'od stong 'dzin pa dang / /'od gtsang long ba'i
<p>85b.3</p>kha arka lo pa/ /lam ston/ srid byed/ shing rta mtho/ /dbyig gi khu ba/ zlum po 'dzin/ /dus kyi byed po/ bI ta ba/ /bI tha/ snga dro 'dul ba dang / /srub byed/ rgyas byed/ chu'i chom rkun/ 'jig rten mig dang / nam mkha'i mig /'jig rten dbang po/ rtag
<p>85b.4</p>tu 'gro/ /srung byed/ dus la dga' ba dang / /s+yun/ gzugs ma lha kun spyod/ /nam mkha'i thig le/ mkha' lam pa/ /nam mkha'i go la'i nor bu dang / /'od phur/ taR+Shu nam mkha'i tog /'od gtsang ldan dang / gsal ba ldan/ /phyogs kyi mu
<p>85b.5</p>khyud phan tshun byed/ ser skya/ rab gsal skems byed dang / /las kyi dbang po mun pa'i dag/ /lo yi shing rta skyong byed dang / /mun 'joms tshangs pa'i rta rnams so/ /130 //nyi ma'i btsun mo rgyal mo'i ming / /legs 'dor ma dang / rdul bzang ma/ /'od
<p>85b.6</p>skyes/ gshin rje/ kA lan+di/ /nam gru/ ma nu/ sbyin byed ma/ /skrag byed ma zhes bya ba'o/ 1 /nyi ma'i shing rta'i grib ma ni/ /sa skyes ma dang / gdung byed ma/ /spyod ma/ dal ba/ mdog bcas ma/ /ma ma/ dga' ma 'di rnams so/ /nyi ma'i yongs
<p>85b.7</p>bskor gnas byed dang / /dmar ser dang ni/ dbyug pa'o/ 3 /nyi ma 'khyims pa yongs dkris dang / /nye ba'i nyi ma'i khor yug go /nyi ma'i rta ni rgyal po rtsen/ /mchog tu 'jigs dang lte ba sngo/ /yid mgyogs rlung sems/ sems dbang dang / /yid kyi theg pa
<p>86a</p>
<p>86a.1</p>zhes bya'o/ 7 /de bzhin rtsen pa'i 'od la sogs/ /nyi ma'i rta rnams bcu gcig ste/ /nam mkha'i gru dang / gser gyi dbyangs/ /nyi ma'i shing rta ral gri'i breng / 4 /re kha'i grib ma lcags mda' dang / /shing rta'i ba dan can zhes so/ 2 /nyi
<p>86a.2</p>ma'i kha lo skya rengs dang / /brla med/ 'od srungs/ khyung sngon skyes/ /rdo ba 'dzin dang / sgra sgrogs so/ 7 /skya rengs pho bo ral pa can/ 1 /'dod chags snang ba/ 'od zer dang / 'od kyi to ga dang phyogs su 'gro/ /mngon 'dod/ 'phro dang / 'bab pa dang / 'od
<p>86a.3</p>dang / 'od zer/ gsal dang snang / /rang 'od/ 'bar dang / dang ba gsal/ /'od byed/ gsal byed/ glog sgron me/ /smig rgyu/ u sa/ twi go /g+h+r-i Ni d+h+ri Sh+Ni/ me lce dang / /me dngas dang / gsal chen/ po tsi Shi/ /me skya rengs dang ni/ 
<p>86a.4</p>'od/ rnam gsal/ brtsa sI/ /mdzes dang / rab 'dzin/ s+yU nA dang / /nye bar 'dzin pa zhes rnams so/ 38 /snang byed/ snang gsal 'dam kha/ 'od zer sbyi'i ming / zhes dang / rab gsal dang / /snang ba/ ku gdung / shin tu gsal/ 6 /'od drag /nges
<p>86a.5</p>sreg byed pa dang / /tshad pas/ kun tu gdung ba'o/ /drod dang / rab tsha/ tsha drag rno/ 4 /shin tu dro dang / tsha ba la/ /mi bzad pa dang / /gtum pa'o/ 2 /cung zad dro dang / bag tsam dro/ /'jam dro can ni/ cung dro'o/ 4 /tshad gdung rlabs ni/ dz+ha lA'o/ /
<p>86a.6</p>ri dgas sred dang smig rgyu'o/ /char pa 'dor ba'i nyi 'od ni/ /brgya phrag /bzhi pa'i 'od du 'gyur/ /ba mo brgya pa'i kha ba 'beb/ /re zhig tshad pa 'dor bar byed/ /'od zer rnams kyi char 'bab pa/ /'di dag thams cad bdud rtsi'o/ /kha ba 'bab pa sim byed pa/ /
<p>86a.7</p>dkar pos tshad pa 'dor bar byed/ /dus dang bgrang bya nyer 'gro dang / /bstan bya/ slad byung / 'dor byed chos/ /gnas dang / sI ra/ baSh+Ta dang / /yongs 'dor zhes pa rnams su 'gyur/ 11 /tshes gcig /phyogs rtsa/ de sogs tshes/ /mun bsal/ nyin
<p>86b</p>
<p>86b.1</p>mo/ bya spangs bas la/ /nyi bcas/ skabs yod/ gnas pa dang / /rnam bsal/ cha can/ snang ba can/ /nyin mo rtse ba rnams su 'gyur/ 10/tho rangs dang ni/ nyi ma'i sgo/ /snga dang / nam langs/ nang bar zhogs/ /rab tu snga dang / /'od chags dang / /'od
<p>86b.2</p>bcas dang ni/ tho rangs sgo/ /rnam par sad dang / mtshan mo bral/ /sngar dang / tho rangs zhes pa rnams/ 14 /dus min pa dang / nyi ma nub/ /gtor ma bcas dang / nyin mo'i mtha'/ /mtshan mo rgyu ba can rnams so/ /srod dang thun mtshams sa sros dang / /pha
<p>86b.3</p>mes rab tu rgyu rnams so/ 4 /nyi ma 'das dang / phyi phyed dang / 25 /snga dro'i thun dang mtshan mo 'das/ 2 /nyin mo'i dbus dang / nyi ma gung / 2/thun gsum nye ba'i bab laM/ bi na bi/ /mtshan mo rdul ldan sngo bsangs ma/ /thun gsum ma dang mel tshe ma/ /mun can/ nges
<p>86b.4</p>nyal/ nyal byed ma/ rgyal mo/ mthon mo/ dal sbyin ma/ /mtshan mor byed ma/ gdan 'dzin ma/ /bsam gtan ma dang / bya spangs ma/ /rnam sgom/ gnas ma/ mtshan mo'i ming / gnas skyes ma/ /thun ma/ dga' ma/ mun pa can/ /nges zhi/ zla 'od
<p>86b.5</p>mig brgya ma/ /skyon ma/ gnas 'dzin/ bu mo ma/ /ri dgas mig ma/ gnas byed ma/ /drag mo/ zhi gnas ma nag mo/ /mi bzad/ sreg ma srung byed ma/ /skyed ma mang ldan/ sbyor ldan ma/ 'khor po 'byed ma/ chu ldan ma'o/ 27 /nges gzhi gnas
<p>86b.6</p>ma/ /mtshan mo che/ /nges par kun nas nam phyed dang / /kun 'gro thams cad pa/ zhes pa'ang / /zla ba mtho dang / mtshan mo'i smad/ 2 /thun dang / me la tshe zhes pa'o/ 2 /mtshan mo'i tshogs ni mtshan mo'i phyogs/ /srod dang mtshan mo'i sgo dag go 2 /zla 'od ldan
<p>86b.7</p>pa snang ldan ma/ /mun pa can gyi mun ldan ma/ /'das dang ma 'ongs nyi ldan pa'i/ /mtshan mo'i de ni phyogs ldan no/ /tshigs mtshams bcad pa tshes gcig dang / /bco lnga'i bar gang yin pa'o/ /mtshan mos mtshan dang mang 'dzin dang / nag phyogs 3
<p>87a</p>
<p>87a.1</p>dkar po nyi mas mtshan/ 2 /phyogs kyi mtha' dang bco lnga dag /tshigs can/ dga' ba/ 'phel ba ste/ /de dag mchod sbyin dus su bshad/ /'byung po nag po'i bcu bzhi'o/ /zla ba/ gang ba/ 'jal byed rdzogs/ /nya gang ba dang chos
<p>87a.2</p>gnas dang / /zla ba'i ma'o de nas ni/ /rA kA gang ba/ ri bong can/ /zla ba gang ba zhes pa'o/ /cha yis dman pa rjes 'gro can/ /nyin dang de'i mtshan mo'o/ /gnam stong / gnam stong gnas pa dang / /mi mthong nyi zla 'grogs pa dang / /gnam dang / gnam
<p>87a.3</p>stong can dang ni/ /stong dang / zla ba stong pa'o/ /zla mthong / zla ba gzhon nu'o/ /zla ba nyams pa cha rnams so/ /nyer 'tshe dang ni gzas bzung dang / /sgra gcan reg dang gzas gnam stong gi ming / 'dzin no/ 4 /gza' 'di dag gis zla ba 'dzin/ /zos pa
<p>87a.4</p>dang ni/ me tog ldan/ /nye bar rgyug byed spangs pa dang / /me yis bsreg dang rang bzhin bsgyur/ /nyin mor byed dang / mtshan byed dag /gcig tu sbyor ba me tog lan/ /gza' yi rab tu byed pa'o// //mig 'dzums bco brgyad kaSh+Tha ste/ /de sum cu la
<p>87a.5</p>cha zhes bya/ /de sum cu ni skad cig ste/ /de nyid bcu gnyis yud tsam yin/ /de sum cu yis nyin zhag go /de dag bco lnga phyogs yin te/ /snga ma phyi ma'i phyogs dag ni/ /dkar dang nag po de gnyis zla/ /mgo sogs zla ba gnyis gnyis dus/ /de dag gsum
<p>87a.6</p>gyis bgrod pa'o/ /lho byang gnyis su bgrod pa'i lo/ /nyin mtshan mnyam pa'i dus gnyis ldan/ /de yang nyi ma'i 'pho rim las/ /lug dang srang la shes par bya/ /rgyal dang ldan pa'i zla ba nya/ /rgyal gyi zla ba gang yin te/ /ming ni rgyal yin mchu dang ni/ /dbo
<p>87a.7</p>sogs rnams ni rim pas so/ /mgo zla ba'i ming / ri dgas mgo dang bzod ldan ma/ /mgo dang lo yi thog ma dang / /bzod pa'o rgyal rgyal zla ba/ dang tshim byed dang / 2 /dka' thub zla ba mchu zla'o/ 2 /dbo dang dka' thub 'bras ldan dang / /snying po med pa sel ba'o/ 4 /nag pa
<p>87b</p>
<p>87b.1</p>sbrang zla myos byed dang / /nag pa can dang dbo rjes skyes/ /dri zhim ldan dang yid srubs po/ 6 /sa ga sgrub byed sbrang rtsi skyed/ 2 /snon zla 'dod 'phel rtsa ba can/ 2 /chu stod zla ba gtsang ba'o/ 1 /gro bzhin nam mkha' thos ldan ma/ 2 /khrums dang nam mkha' rab gnas bzhi/ /bzang
<p>87b.2</p>po'i gnas rnams mtshungs pa'o/ 4 /tha skar rta sbyor der 'dod pa'o/ 2 /smin drug zla ba smin drug can/ /mang po 'dzin dang sag skyes/ 5 /mgo skyes rnams so/ /de nas ni/ /dgun stod dang ni kha pa'i dus/ 2 /dgun smad dang ni grang ba'i dus/ /dpyid dang me tog ldan dus dang / /
<p>87b.3</p>dri zhim drod phebs tsha ba'i dus/ /sos ka nges sreg tshad pa can/ /drod 'ongs drod can/ /tsha gdung can/ 6 /dbyar dang chu 'bab/ char 'bab dang / /rab tu char 'bab sprin 'byung dang / /k+Sha rI char ldan sprin skye'o/ 10 /ston ka mda' sbyin dus snga ba/ 3 /mgo sogs gnyis
<p>87b.4</p>gnyis rim pa las/ /dus tshigs 'di rnams drug yin no/ /mchod ldan ma dang dbo srang la/ /lho ru bgrod dbyar la ming bcu/ pa bi sha tshigs/ /brgya ko dz+'a ga ra dang / /mda' sbyin gsal bar nyal ba dang / /ku mud dang ldan phyi ma'o/ /nag pa ldan dang sbrang dga' ston/ /dran
<p>87b.5</p>pa'i dga' ston 'dod ma dang / /dpyid ldan chen mo dpyid bzang ldan/ /kurd n+Ti zhes bya ba rnams/ 6 /phyogs kyi mtshan mo/ /sI yA li/ /ston 'bring gi ming / /dwI sa shring+ga lA zhes so/ 3 /brgya byin dga' ston rgyal mtshan 'don/ 2 /zla ba dang ni dpyid 'bring gi/ nyin zhag tshogs/ /
<p>87b.6</p>dbugs skyes lo yi cha shas can/ /lo yi mdzod dang lo'i yan lag /6 /bgrang bya 'gro 'ong / 'dor byed lo/ /dus kyi gnas dang zla ba'i phreng / /dus gling ga ga 'dzin ma/ kyi tshigs phyogs kyi nyin mo'i ming / dang urba Ta/ /bat+sa dus kyi cha shas can/ /brla/ sam+ba ra/ shA ra/ 
<p>87b.7</p>mi bzad pa zhes bya ba rnams/ 10 /rdzogs ldan byas dus bde ba'i dus/ 3 /bi sal+li kA gsum ldan 'grib/ 3 /nyis ldan dang ni mchod sbyin can/ 2 /sdug dus las dus rtsod pa'i dus/ 3 /zla ba gcig gi yi dgas lo/ kyis/ /nyin zhag lo yis lha yi zhag / lo/ lha yi lo/ dus ni nyis lo/ 
<p>88a</p>
<p>88a.1</p>stong gis/ /tshangs zhag mi yi bskal ba gnyis/ /tshangs nyin shed bu'i nyin bcu bzhi/ /shed bu'i nyi ma bu la ni/ /lha rnams dus ni bdun cu gcig /de tshe dus des 'di yis ni/ /phyi ma'i dus su 'gyur ba'o/ /bskal pa'i mtha' dang / 'jig bskal dang / /yongs
<p>88a.2</p>'gyur dang ni dpyad zin dang / /'jig dang dus mtha' cher 'jig pa/ /zad dang sdud dang gnyid log dang / /'gro ba zhig pa zhes bya rnams/ 11 /'jig pa'i ltas dang / nye ba'i rtags/ /nyer bsgyur nyer 'tshe mi bskyed dang / /lugs ma yin dang rtsa nas 'don/ 7 /rab tu nyams pa
<p>88a.3</p>zhig pa'o/ 2 /zhes pa dus kyi rab tu byed pa'o// //'dres pa nag ngo / sdig pa dang / /nyes pa/ ltung ba/ rnyog pa dang / /nyes spyod/ nyes byas/ /a g+ha dang / /aM ha/ dor bya/ pra pre dang / /'dam dang / sA Sh+mA zug rngu dang / /ru staM/ mun pa/ mi dge ba'o/ 18 /
<p>88a.4</p>chos dang / bsod nams/ legs pa dang / /legs sdig pa'i ming / byas dang ni/ khyu mchog go /rangs dang / rab myos/ dga' rab dga'/ /yang dag dga' dang / kun tu dga'/ /kun tu dga' 'gyur/ sdig pa/ shin tu dga'/ /smad bya/ /skyid dang bde dang / shA ti
<p>88a.5</p>kaM/ 12 /dge dang / bkra shis/ dge legs bzang / /ma twaM/ shu b+haM/ bskal pa dang / /skal dga' ba'i ming / ldan/ legs ldan ku sha laM/ /bde ba/ mtho ris mtho ris gnas/ /zhi ba/ b+h+wan+taM/ shaM/ bde legs/ 17 /sdig dang / sharma/ bsod nams
<p>88a.6</p>bde/ bde legs sogs/ /de dang ldan pa shes par bya/ /shin dge ba/ tu bzang dang / rab mchog dang / /ltad mo che dang / phul byung dang / dge ba/ /mchog tu gyur dang bsngags 'os so/ /brtse ba/ dge ba/ byed 'jug pa'o/ 1 /'dod dang / mi 'dod 'bras
<p>88a.7</p>bu ni/ /rnam par smin pa zhes brjod 'di ming gzhan yang / do/ /gnam skos/ lhas bstan/ skal ba dang / /dbang thang bsag rgyab/ sngon byas so/ 6 /rgyu dang byed pa sa bon dang / 3 /gzhi dang thog ma'i byed pa'o/ /gtso bo/ bdag gi ming / skyes bu/ zhing shes dang / /
<p>88b</p>
<p>88b.1</p>nang dang dbang phyug 'tsho ba bdag /gso ba gang zag rang bzhin dang / /rang dang yid 'dren/ A ba sha /kun spyod dang ni/ sems pa dang / /lus gnas dang ni/ mchod sbyin sbyor/ 17 /yon tan snying stobs/ /rdul mun pa/ /khyad par dus can gnas
<p>88b.2</p>skabs so/ /bskyed bya/ skyed byed/ 'byung ba dang / /skye ba/ dzan+ma ma dzan+ma ma ru Sho/ /dza na naM zhes bya ba'o/ 7 /skye ldan/ srog chags/ sems pa can/ /'tsho ba can dang / skye bo dang / /skye ba can dang / lus can no/ 7 /sems dang / sems pa snying
<p>88b.3</p>po/ snying / /nang gi byed pa li shu dang / /yid byed yid skye ba/ skye ba/ skye ba/ dang / skyed pa/ rang ming ngo / 9 /shes rab/ blo dang / nyal slong dang / /blo gros/ dpyod pa/ yid tshol dang / /blo yi byed pa/ bud+d+hi/ mkhas/ /rig dang / rab mthong / kun
<p>88b.4</p>tu rig /sems byed nyer dmigs/ kun tu sems/ /go dang dz+nya sti/ sems pa'o/ 18 /yang dag /rig byed/ tshor ba dang / /gsal gyur/ so sor snang / /nyams myong / /rnam par rig byed nye bar dmigs/ /rab tu gsal dang / yang dag tshor/ 9 /thar
<p>88b.5</p>pa'i lus la khyab pa'i blo/ /ye shes gzhan ni rnam shes te/ /bzo dang bstan bcos 'dzin pa'i blo'o/ /blo dang / gzungs ldan/ yid gzhungs dang / /kun rtog yid la byed pa'i las/ 5 /sems kyi rtsol ba yid la byed/ /rnam dpyod rnam par dpyod byed dang / /bgrang
<p>88b.6</p>dang / /dpyod dang / rnam rtog dang / /kun tu rtog dang gtan la 'bebs/ 9 /rjes su 'jal dang / rjes su dpag /dpyod pa dang ni/ rigs pa yang / 4 /rtog dang / rtog byed lhag par rtog /3 /phyin ci ma log par shes pa'i/ /gtan la phebs dang / nges pa
<p>88b.7</p>mtshungs/ 2 /ne ma nur/ yid gnyis dogs pa dang / /the tshom/ som nyi/ rnam par rtog /rnam par 'khor dang / gcig ma yin/ /bi tsi kat+si/ bi tarka/ 10 /phyogs snga ma dang / snga rgol lo/ 2 /grub mtha'/ gzhung lugs/ rtsod ldan dang / /byas mtha'
<p>89a</p>
<p>89a.1</p>nus pa/ rA d+hA n+ta/ /phyogs phyi ma dang / yang dag bzung / /yang dag bzhag pa rnams su 'gyur/ 9 /dam bca' so sor mnyan bya dang / /khas len/ phyogs bzung / yang dag 'dzin/ /nges pa mnyan bya/ bdag gir byas/ /khas
<p>89a.2</p>len/ so so'i shes pa dang / yang dag thos dang / mi bzad pa'i/ /mang+ga ra dang / u ra rI/ /U ri/ U ra rI yang 'dod/ 15 /log par lta dang med pa pa/ 2 /gnod sems dang ni 'tshe ba'i sems/ 2 /'tshe ba a ba bA ra'o/ 2 /nye bar bzlos dang 'byed pa mtshungs/ /
<p>89a.3</p>2 thar pa grol ba zhi ba dang / /bsil bar gyur dang mya ngan 'das/ /mthar gyur legs pa nges 'byung dang / /ma 'dres pa dang tshangs pa dang / /nges par legs dang bdud rtsi dang / /rab tu tshim dang byang grol dang / /dga' ba chen dang yang srid med/ 16 /don dam pha rol sun
<p>89a.4</p>dpung gnyen/ 3 /log pa'i blo gros 'khor dang 'khrul/ 3 /ma rig mi shes rig min dang / /nga rgyal blo gros rmongs ba'o/ 5 /so sor snang min shaSh+yi'o/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya 'di dag yul rnams te/ /'dod pa'i yon tan dbang po'i don/ /dbang po'i
<p>89a.5</p>gzung bya'i spyod yul lo/ /'dir ni yon tan mar gyur pa/ /dbang po yul dang yid byed do/ /las kyi dbang po lag pa dang / /rkang pa bshang lam nyer gnas dag /blo yi dbang po yid dang mig /rna ba sna lce spags pa'o/ /bska ba dang ni mchog tu bska/ 2 /mang rab
<p>89a.6</p>lany+tsha tsha ba dang / /kha ba dang ni skyur ba ste/ /'di rnams don ni drug rnams so/ /rnam nyed sbyang spos snying 'bab dri/ 3 /bzhon pa can dang kun smos dang / /shin tu ring nas 'gugs pa dang / /brjod bya'i rtags nyid yon tan las/ ra dug gi ming / 2 /'gugs
<p>89a.7</p>byed ring du khyab pa mtshungs/ 2 dri bzang dang ni sna tshim byed/ 2 /'dod pa'i dri dang dri zhim mo/ 2 /kha la bgos pa'i ga pur dri/ /legs 'thul dang ni kha la chags/ 2 /dring ba dang rul dri'o/ 2 /mi gtsang ba dang bsur dri'o/ 2 /kha dog gi ming / dkar po dge byed
<p>89b</p>
<p>89b.1</p>gtsang dang gsal/ /mdog dkar dang ba dkar snum dang / /skyang ba chos 'ching gau ra dang / /stobs byed dag byed ardzu na/ /skya ser ser skya dkar skya'o/ 17 /cung zad skya dang 'ol kha'o/ /nag po d+h+yA ma/ shi ti dang / /s+yA ma mang 'dzin dkar ming dang / /nag lhang
<p>89b.2</p>sngon po d+h+ya ma la/ /kA la sngo bsangs dga' byed de/ 12 /ser po ser shang yung ba'i mdog /a ru ra mdog ser can no/ 5 /ljang gu ljang ser pA lA sha'i/ /mdog ste 'di dag ljang gur mtshungs/ /nag/ 3 dmar po ut+pal dmar ba'i mdog /khrag mdog/ ro hi lo he ta/ 5 /
<p>89b.3</p>mi gsal dmar ba skya rengs mdog /dkar dmar 'dres pa pA ta la/ /ser nag dang ni nag ser ro/ 2 /dmar nag dud kha mchin kha'o/ 1 /ser nag ser skya skyer kha dang / 3 /ka drug sing+gi sing+gi la/ 3 /sna tshogs 'dres ma zal po dang / /khra bo sA ri shA ri ga /a ta dang
<p>89b.4</p>ni sha ba la/ 8 /piny+dza ra ni dmar ser ro/ 1 /pa la k+Sha ni dkar sngon te/ /chu shing me tog lta bu'o/ /ardzun ni dkar po dang / /nag po'i cha tsam ldan pa ste/ /ku mu da ltar dang ba'o/ /si tA rdzu na rnam rgyas pa'i/ /ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing gsal/ /pAN+Da rA ni
<p>89b.5</p>dkar ljang ste/ /mtshan mo'i ri bong can mtshungs pa'o/ /pAN+Da ri ni dmar ser te/ /rdul ldan tho rangs zla ba bzhin/ /pAN+Da ser po'i cha ldan dkar/ /ke ta k+Shi yi rdul dang mtshungs/ /d+hU sa ra ni dkar po la/ /ser po'i bag dang ldan pa ste/ /ut+pal ltar dngas
<p>89b.6</p>pa'o/ /ma tsa ka ni sngo nag ste/ /zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs pa'o/ /gau ra kha dog dmar ser te/ /gi haM gsar pa ltar gsal ba'o/ /hi ra ta ni nag dkar ldan/ /tA la'i 'bras bu ltar gsal ba'o/ /ro hi ta dang lo hi ta/ /dza ba'i me tog dang mtshungs
<p>89b.7</p>pa'o/ /rak+ta thun mtshams ltar gsal ba'o/ /sho Na ban+tu'i me tog bzhin/ /ha ri tra ni dkar ngan ser/ /nye ba'i thun mtshams sprin ltar gsal/ /sh+yA ba rang bzhin ser nag ste/ /thun mtshams sprin dang 'dra bar mdzes/ /d+hU ma la ni nag dmar te/ /du ba
<p>90a</p>
<p>90a.1</p>dang ni sbur me bzhin/ /dkar ser dmar ljang ka DA ra/ /rtswa yi me dang 'dra ba'o/ /ljang gu'i cha yis dman gyur pa/ /de dang ldan pa pad rdul 'dra/ ka dru gser mdog ltar gsal lo/ /ki rmI ra ni dkar dmar ro/ /kal+mA Sha ni dkar
<p>90a.2</p>nag go /karbu ra ni dkar sngon no/ /sing+ga na ni dkar nag ste/ /chu yi rnam pa mtshungs shing gsal/ /ka bar ni dud nag ste/ /dud ldan mar me'i 'od mtshungs pa'o/ /bA la dmar sngon dkar ser te/ /lci ba'i thal ba lta bu'o/ /yon tan dkar po la sogs pho/ /
<p>90a.3</p>yon tan rtags rnams de bzhin no/ /ri hi NI/ ro hi tA/ rak+ta/ /lo hi Ni dang / lo hi ta/ ro hi ti kA/ lo hi ti kA/ rA gA ko NA zhes pa yang / sho NI shi NA si shing+gA/ /sing+gA lA dang ha ra NI/ /ha ri tA+e zhes pa yang ngo / 2 /sh+ye nI sh+ya tA si tA yang / 3 /nI lA gos dang ldan pa'i
<p>90a.4</p>ming / /nI lI/ srog chags sman dag go /sh+ye nI/ ku mu da'i 'dab mtshungs/ /ne tso'i mdangs 'dra ha ri NI/ /tshangs ldan b+hA ra tI skad tshig /ngag dang brjod pa dbyangs can dang / /tshig dang / gsung dang / pA tsa dang / /b+ha Ni ti dang / pa tsa naM/ pa tsa
<p>90a.5</p>tha snyad smra ba dang / smras dang / pA kya/ 'chad dang / bshad/ 19 /saM skr-i ta ni lha yi skad/ /pi shA tsi ni 'byung po'i skad/ /a pa/ b+h+raM sha /zur chag sgra/ /rjod byed bstan bcos sgra la ni/ /ting dang / supra kyi mtha' can tshig /bya ba'am ni/ byed ldan
<p>90a.6</p>pa'o/ /pa ri sA Ta/ gsang tshig ste/ /rI ti tshig gi lam yin no/ /rab tu bcings dang / sbyar ba dang / /yang dag spel dang / rgyus pa dang / /sdud sbyor 'di rnams sbyar ba ste/ /sgra yi ma la ni gu m+b+ya ne'o/ /thos dang rig byed man ngag dang / /sdeb sbyor dang
<p>90a.7</p>ni/ kha ton lung / /rgyud dang / yal ga nges 'gro'o/ 9 /snyan tshig /U k+ShaM/ dbyangs 'jebs dang / /der ni u pa ni Shata rnams/ /rig byed dag ni gsang ba'i 'o/ /chos dang nges par 'gro ba yang / /chos dang thos dang sgrub pa gsum/ /nges brjod dang
<p>90b</p>
<p>90b.1</p>ni snyan tshig dang / /mchod sbyin 'di gsum rig byed gsum/ /bslab dang brda sprod sdeb sbyor dang / /de bzhin skar rtsis thos pa dang / /rtog pa dang ni yan lag go /dran pa dang ni chos dang bcas/ 2 /oM zhes bya ba rab bsngags dang / /tshangs pa yi ni 'gyur med
<p>90b.2</p>sngags/ 3 /u dA t+ba dang / swa ri ta/ /a nu dAt+ta dbyangs gsum mo/ /de lta bu byung sngon gyi tshul/ 2 /sngon rabs mtshan nyid lnga yin te/ /rjes tshol ba dang lugs kyi rgyud/ /rtog ge /sa bdag bstan bcos dang / /kun nang nye bar dmigs don no/ /bstan bcos rgyud
<p>90b.3</p>dang / thos pa mtshungs/ /'bel ba'i gtam dang / phan tshun bgro/ /rab sbyor tshig dang gtam yin no/ 2 /gab tshig dang ni/ brda yis ston/ /dri ba'i pho nya shes dka'o/ 4 /tshig bsdus pa dang bsdus pa'i don/ 2 /bsdus dang / legs par bsdus pa'o/ 2 /
<p>90b.4</p>khyim pa'i gtam dang / skye bo'i brjod/ /log pa'i glu dang / smra ba'o/ 4 /rab tu brjod dang / ci zhes smra/ /rjod par byed dang / skye bos thos/ 4 /sgeg ldan skad dang / nyams ldan no/ 2 /gtam brjod pa dang / de bzhin glu/ /lo rgyus dang ni kha skang do/ 3 /ming dang 'bod
<p>90b.5</p>phyogs/ mtshan nyid dang / /mtshon pa/ rigs dang kun gsal dang / /kun gsal nA ma d+he ya dang / bya ba de sha tshig bla dgas/ /brda dang / 'phral sbyar/ byas pa dang / /kun tu 'bod dang / mngon brjod do/ 25 /gsal dang / grags dang / rab tu grub/ 3 /
<p>90b.6</p>nye bar 'jal dang / dper brjod do/ 2 /nye bar dgod dang / smra ba'i sgo/ 2 /'di dang / rjes sbyor/ shes 'dod dang / /gtam dang / sgrogs dang / rjes sbyor byed/ 5 /slar smra ba dang / lan ldon mtshungs/ 2 /log par mngon sbyor ngan brjod dang / /log smra/ sun
<p>90b.7</p>'byin mngon sum spyod/ /spyo dang / khro tshig /rnam khros tshig /8 /rnam par smra dang / tha snyad dang / /mna' dang / khro bor/ shA pa'o/ 3 /legs smra dang ni/ rjes chags skye/ 2 /yang dag mkhyen ldan snyan grags dang / /tshigs bcad dang ni grags pa'o/ 4 /
<p>91a</p>
<p>91a.1</p>bstod pa nu ti/ stu ti dang / /na ba/ sta ba/ sta traM dang / /bsngags pa dang ni/ rnam par brjod/ 8/smra dang rab tu bsngags pa dang / /mtho bar grags dang / dbyangs su byed/ 4 /skyor tshig dang ni gnyis gsum brjod/ 2 /mya ngan 'jigs dang
<p>91a.2</p>rtse sogs las/ /cong skad dang ni/ yi ge bral/ 2 /skal ba mchog dang / yon tan lhag /2 /'gran par byed dang / yang dag dga'/ 2 /smod pa/ nye bar spyod pa dang / 2 /nag gar+g+hA gar+g+hA NaM/ /mi bsngags/ dor bya nges smod dang / /yongs smod dang ni skur 'debs
<p>91a.3</p>dang / /pi taM ba dang / ngan bya pa/ /smod dang / smod par byed pa dang / /rtsod pa ni/ g+h+r-i NA'o/ 11 /de la g.yo ba gang yin pa/ /'khrig pa'i phyir du phan tshun smod/ /mngon par smra dang / tshig rtsub po/ 2 /spyo tshig /gnod tshig /bsdig tshig go/ /3 /smod pa dang bcas
<p>91a.4</p>nyer dmigs pa/ /sa ri b+hA Sha Na zhes so/ /u pA lam+b+ha rjes su sbyor/ /mgron gnyer 'bod dang / 'gugs dang bod/ 3 /yang dag 'bod pa mang pos bos/ /tshogs pa'i sgra ni/ /sAM rA bi Ni/ /sgra chen ko lA haM la'o/ /rjes su smra dang / yang yang smra/ /smyo
<p>91a.5</p>tshig dang ni/ don med tshig /'gal ba brjod dang / 'gog tshig go /mya ngan tshig dang smre sngags 'don/ /khams bde dang ni/ 'dri rmed do/ /shin tu smra dang legs par brjod/ /gsang tshig dang ni/ gsang ba'i gtam/ /a sa h+na ba/ a pad+t+ma ma/ /a pa dz+nyA na/ 
<p>91a.6</p>a pa hA ya/ phal cher bsdus nas kun bshad pa/ /rkang pa las skyes rgyun chags yin/ /mtho bar brjod dang nges bcings so/ 2 /tu mu la ni 'khrugs pa'i sgra/ 1 /tshig gi skyes dang / tshig spring dang / /bstan pa dang ni yang dag smra/ 4 /tshig gi dbye ba phyi ma gsum/ /
<p>91a.7</p>ngan smra dang ni/ ngan brjod mtshungs/ 2 /sdig pa'i tshig dang / mi dge ldan/ 24 /dge ba dge ba'i bdag nyid can/ /snyan dang / shin tu zhi ba dang / /legs par smra dang snying la 'bab/ 4 /tshig rtsub dang ni/ gya tshom dang / 2 /grong pa dang ni/ tshul min pa/ 2 /myur bar brjod dang
<p>91b</p>
<p>91b.1</p>brtabs te brjod/ 2 /gra staM/ ngag tshig yi ge phyis/ 1 /mi mngon pa dang / mi gsal ba/ 2 /kla klor gyur pa skad nyams pa/ /kun tu 'khrugs dang / nyon mongs gyur/ /phan tshun 'joms par byed pa'i tshig / 2 /don med pa dang 'brel med pa/ 2 /yi ge bral dang brjod bya
<p>91b.2</p>med/ 2 /chu 'thor gtam dang / mchil gtam mo/ /zegs 'thor gtam dang gnyis brjod dang / /don stong tshig dang brdzun gtam dang / /de nas bden dang dga' ba dang / /phyin ci ma log mi bslu ba'o/ 4 /bden sogs bden par smra ba dang / /bden pa de bzhin mi bslu ba/ /
<p>91b.3</p>yang dag 'di rnams gsum de ni/ /sgra dang nges sgrogs grags pa dang / /lhang tsher/ ni swA na/ ni s+t+ra na/ /ding 'ur/ nges smra/ nges sgrogs dang / /sgrogs pa ca co ku co dang / /dbyangs dang / grag dang / skad 'don dang / /hAs/ rA ba ba ra smos/ /ku ha ri taM/ brjod
<p>91b.4</p>pa dang / /mngon par brjod dang rjod byed sgra/ /mgrin skyes/ mngon brjod/ nyams ldan yang / 26 /gaM gA'i sgra ni man+ma na/ /ca co ko lA ha la'o/ /shwar+b+ha Ti dang / tsarba rI/ 2 /sgra ldan dang ni brag ca'o/ 2 /bA si taM ni/ dud 'gro'i sgra/ /gzhu yi sgra ni bis+phA ra/ /rnga chen sgra ni
<p>91b.5</p>Tu Tu ra/ /gos dang la ma'i ma rma ra/ /rgyan gyi sgra ni pany+dzi taM/ /pi wang sgra ni/ ni kwA Na/ /mi gsal kwo Na/ kwo Na sgrogs/ /khog pa'i ka la ka la'o/ /phug dang ni dbyangs sbed do/ /glu dang glu dbyangs 'di dag mtshungs/ /pi wang sgrogs pa la sogs la/ /pra
<p>91b.6</p>kwAN dang pra kwa Na/ /ka Na kwA Na/ saM kwa NA/ /saM ku Na dang / sU ku Na/ /a nu kwa Na la sogs so/ 8 /'khor nyan khyu mchog dri 'dzin dang / /drug skyes bar ma blo gsal dang / /lnga pa zhes pa 'di rnams bdun/ /rgyud dang mgrin las skyes pa'i dbyangs/ /'khor nyan gling bu'i
<p>91b.7</p>sgra lta bu/ /blo gsal rta yi skad lta bu/ /dri 'dzin ra yi skad ltar 'tsher/ /drug skyes zla ba can sgra bzhin/ /khyu mchog ba lang sgra lta bu/ /bar ma khrung khrung sgrogs pa bzhin/ /lnga pa me tog dus ldan 1/ /rma bya sgrogs pa lta bu'o/ /'di rnams thams cad myos pa yis/ /sgrogs
<p>92a</p>
<p>92a.1</p>byed de yang lnga pa'o/ /kA ka li ni phra ba'i sgra/ /mi gsal snyan pa ka la'o/ /zab mo'i sgra ni sngags yin no/ /shin tu mtho ba tA ra'o/ /cha lang pheg rdob sa man+d+hi/ /pi wang dang ni bar+Na ki /rnam par spyod dang dbyangs ldan no/ 4 /bi wang rgyud ni lA su ki /
<p>92a.2</p>rgyud rnams lha yi grangs rnams kyis/ /pi wang nyid ni yongs su bsgrags/ /pi wang srad bu ma ru kaM /pi wang bu ga nA li kA /pi wang khog pa pra bA la/ /pra pA+e ka /rtse yi shing 'khyog /ko lam+ba ni lus yin no/ /thag pa'i gnas dang 'ching ba'o/ /'dab ma'i rgyud rnams
<p>92a.3</p>de yi dbus/ /pi wang la sogs rol mo yi/ /skad thabs g+hu g+hu ri kA'o/ /pi wang la sogs rgyud kyi sgra/ /rnga la sogs pa sbubs kyi sgra/ /gling bu la sogs bu ga'i sgra/ /sil snyan sgra ni cha lang sogs/ /rol mo rnam pa bzhi po 'di/ /bA ti/ tra mA ta zhes bya/ /sil
<p>92a.4</p>snyan dang ni sil khrol lo/ /mA hA ti dang / a mA na/ pa Ta ha la sogs pa'o/ /ma hA na dang / marda ka /rnga zlum/ rdza rnga a na ka /a ru ra 'dra'i rnga ang+k+ya/ /nas kyi dbus 'dra ur+d+ha ka /a ling+g+ya ni ba lang gi /mjug ma'i dbyibs 'dra 'di dag gi /barma mu ra dza yin
<p>92a.5</p>no/ /'khar rnga/ dz+hang+gi pa dag mtshungs/ /D+hak+ka/ cha lang marda la/ 2 /kA ha la dang sgra chen dang / /kA ha'i sgra dang / sbubs can dang / /gtum po'i ku co zhes pa rnams/ 5 /siny+dza la dang / kA ha la/ 2 /de nas D+hak+ka/ guny+dza dang / /D+hak+ka rnam rgyal marda la/ /rgyang grags
<p>92a.6</p>sgra can/ rgyang grags kyi/ /cha lang / snyan pa'i pa Ta ha/ /go byed pa Ta ha dang ni/ /lam+b+hA pa Ta ha ming can/ /A na ka dang / ba Ta ha/ /guny+dza pa Ta hi kA ya/ 4 /a na ka dang / mr-i di ka 2 /'jigs byed rnga dang rnga bo che/ 2 /rol mo'i rab dbye 'di rnams te/ /ma ha
<p>92a.7</p>na dang / Da ma ru/ /muD+hu/ Din+Di ma/ rdza rnga/ /glu rnga/ 'khar rnga/ ka ra Du/ na pa/ rang+gi teng+ga ri/ /g.yul du sil snyan sgra dang ni/ /rnga chung gnyis ka Di N+Di ma/ /g.yul 'thab nyin mo'i sil snyan no/ /mi bdag rnams kyis bza' ba'i mthar/ /
<p>92b</p>
<p>92b.1</p>bza' ba'i sil snyan gang yin de/ /'jig byed zas kyi sil snyan te/ /rlabs kyi 'gros can yin zhes bya/ /byis pa'i sil snyan gang yin de/ /rab dga'i marda la zhes so/ /'tsho ba byung ba'i go byed pa'i/ /sil snyan gaN+Da'i sil snyan brjod/ /thig pa'i sil snyan dag
<p>92b.2</p>dang ni/ /shing rta glang po gnyis ka yi/ /DiN+Di kA dang / ung+ga ra/ /grong khyer dbyangs dang / 'khor ba'i rlabs/ /mi bzad pa yi sgra rnams so/ /chu tshod bum pa/ dbyu gu'i rnga/ /mel tshe 'dzin pa/ mel tshe'i sgra/ /thun gyi dbyangs dang / thun gyi skad/ /dus
<p>92b.3</p>kyi sil snyan du yang bshad/ 7 /zangs ma'i dbyu gu/ chu tshod dbyug /bu ga'i tshad dang / dus 'dzin pa'o/ 4 /de nas sbubs can bum pa dang / /thun gyi tho ba/ dbyu gu'o/ 4 /de sgra thun gyi dbyangs dang ni/ /thun gyi traM gar zhes kyang / 2 /shid byed yi dgas rnga dang ni/ /shi ba'i
<p>92b.4</p>ung+ga ra yang ngo / 3 /glang po myos pa'i tang+ga rI/ /myos pa'i traM ga ra zhes brjod/ /na kA ta traM ga ri kA ni/ /dbul po'i pa Ta ha ru 'dod/ /khyu mchog dga' ston sil snyan gang / /ba lang rnga yi ming can no/ /bum ston 'khar ba'i sil snyan ni/ /'khar ba'i cha lang zhes par
<p>92b.5</p>'gyur/ /ku Tu guny+dza/ shing rta'i sgra/ /lus ldan pa Ta ha yang de'o/ /kha yi sil snyan/ kha'i cha lang / 2 /ga lwa sil snyan sgra chen po/ /ka ra rdi dang / pheg rdob po/ 2 /kU rdza naM ni/ mig gsal sgra/ /tsa Tu/ pa Tu/ spya ba'o/ /gtam pa dang ni/ gar 1 pa/ /2
<p>92b.6</p>re mos smra dang / rab myos pa/ /rig byed/ sil snyan/ gA ta ri/ /glu len pa dang / glu mkhan ni/ 2 /gar pa dang ni/ rol rtsed pa/ 2 /dal dang / myur dang / bar pa la/ /tas+t+wam o g+ho/ g+ha naM rim/ /cha lang / /myur rdeg /dus ma ni/ /la yaM zhes sogs
<p>92b.7</p>bya dus tshad/ /lag pa/ rkang pa/ dag dang ni/ /mig gis so sor blta ba dang / /'dren par blta sogs bya ba'i tshad/ 3 /lo bya ba gang gzhan de/ /phan tshun/ la yaHla yaHdang / /sA mya zhes pa de 'dod do/ /tAN+Da baM/ na Ta ni/ /nA Ta byaM/ lA s+yaM/ /rang+ga/ 
<p>93a</p>
<p>93a.1</p>na rta ni/ n+wi traM zhes pa rnams su 'gyur/ /bud med rnams kyi zlum po'i gar/ /hal+lI sa ka zhes par 'gyur/ /rnga gsum gar dang glu dang ni/ /rol mo gar bya 'di ni gsum/ /de nas b+ha kum bA dang ni/ /b+h+ru kum pa dang / g+hu kum bA/ /b+h+ri ku sa
<p>93a.2</p>ni 'dra ba ste/ /'di dag skyes pas bud med kyi/ /cha byad bzung ba la brjod do/ /zlos gar la bshad rgyal mtshan ni/ /gzhon nu/ jo bo'i khyi'u'o/ 2 /rgyal po rje btsun dang ni lha/ /bu mo rje'u'i khyi'u'o/ /lha mo gang la dbang bskur ba/ /gzhan rnams la ni rje
<p>93a.3</p>btsun ma/ /skyed byed pa ni/ A bu ka /b+hA ba mkhas pa'o mA ri Sha/ /'phags pa am+bA skyed ma'o/ /sring mo che ba an+ti kA/ /sring mo'i bdag po A brti/ /rA dza swA la yul 'khor ro/ /tshogs can ma ni Ardzu kA /byis pa bA su zhes bya'o/ /haN+Da/ ha ny+dze/ ha
<p>93a.4</p>las 'bod/ /dman pa/ g.yog mo/ grogs mo'o/ /'phags pa'i bu zhes bod bya ba/ /bu mo rnams kyi lang tsho'i bdag /gzhan du yang ni 'phags pa mchog /rgyal po che dang mi bdag go /a pra h+ma N+ya pa sang bya min/ /niSh+Tha zin pa yin te mtshungs/ /
<p>93a.5</p>lus nyams lnga pa zin pa'o/ /ang+ga hA ra/ yan lag bskyod/ /gsal byed dang ni/ tshul dag mtshungs/ /gsal byed la sogs gar la ni/ /snga ma'i yan lag gnas dbye ba/ /gar gyi gnas dang zlos gar gnas/ 2 /sgeg dang / dpa' dang / 
<p>93a.6</p>snying rje dang / /rmad byung rgod dang 'jigs su rung / /mi sdug drag shul mnyes pa/ shin pa/ /zhi ba zhes bya nyams bcu'o/ /sgeg pa/ nyams ldan/ gtsang dang 'bar/ gsal ba can zhes pa yang ngo / 4 /sgeg pa'i dbye ba longs spyod rdzogs/ /pa prA lam+b+ha/ 
<p>93a.7</p>ting nge 'dzin/ /spra pa/ 'phel ba dpa' ba yin/ /snying rje/ thugs rje/ brtse ba dang / /kr-i pA/ da yA rjes su brtse/ /rjes su chags dang / shu ka'o/ /ngo mtshar/ 'phags dang / rmad byung / mtshar/ 4 /hA sa ya ha sa/ hA sa'o/ 3 /tsa markA
<p>93b</p>
<p>93b.1</p>ra/ 'dul byed dang / /'dul du 'jug pa zhes pa yang / 3 /mi bzad/ 'jigs byed/ dngangs byed/ /'jigs/ /drag po 'jigs rung / 'jigs par byed/ /so sor 'jigs dang / b+hA mu rA/ /b+hI la/ b+hai ra ba/ b+ha yA ba ha/ 12 /drag po drag
<p>93b.2</p>shul/ zhes pa dang / /mi sdug pa dang / bi bar+s+ha/ /dngangs skrag /nyam nga / bag tsha dang / /pham par byas dang 'jigs pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam 'gyur dga' ba dang / /zhum dang khro sogs kyis bskyed pa/ /nyams su myong dang rnam 'gyur rtogs/ /de yang nyams
<p>93b.3</p>myong longs spyod rdzogs/ /thob pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur/ /der ni mig bzhi las byung ba/ /smin ma 'degs dang 'dzum rnams 'khor/ /bkra bar nyams myong dag la sogs/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid 'dod/ /mngon 'dod de bzhin bsam pa dang / /
<p>93b.4</p>rjes su dran pa'i tshogs su 'dod/ /de bzhin skyo dang rnam par smra/ /smyo ba dang ni nad nyid dang / /dza b+ha 'dul byed kyang zhes pa/ /thob pa'i bdag nyid bcu yin no/ /dgod pa dga' bar byed pa ste/ /de bzhin gnyi ga spro ba'o/ /sbed dang ngo mtshar zhes bya ba/ /dngos
<p>93b.5</p>po bzhag par rab tu bsgrags/ /dbang du byed pa rnam shes kyis/ /dngos po'i lam la skyes pa'i las/ /yid kyi mdud pa ngar sems te/ /nga rgyal sems ni mtho ba'o/ /snyems dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / /ngar 'dzin/ rgyags dang / dregs/ mngon zhen/ 
<p>93b.6</p>bsgyings pa dang ni yang dag shugs/ /kun rtsom/ kun 'bebs/ yang dag bskor/ /rang dbang 'jug dang / kun nas ldang / 2 /mngon par ldang dang / zhe sar byed/ /gus byed/ gus par nyan pa dang / /yongs su sbyong dang / mchog tu byed/ /sten
<p>93b.7</p>byed/ rab bsten dang ba dang / /nye bar byed dang / nye bar gnas/ /kun tu bsten dang / mnyen byed dang / /nye bar spyod dang / u pa sA naM/ 13 /ma gus/ yongs smod/ zil gnon dang / /ring byed/ mi rtsi nI kA ra/ /brnyas dang / /kun brnyas/ zhum byed
<p>94a</p>
<p>94a.1</p>dang / gus med/ brnyas byed smos pa dang / /pa ba naM dang a ba li/ /a b+hi b+ha bA zhes rnams so/ 12 /zhum byed/ ngo tsha 'dzem/ mig dma'/ /hI/ na ti bi sha khrel yod/ 2 /bzod pa/ k+Sha ma/ ti tik+Sha/ /sa hiSh+Shu tA zhes rnams so/ /
<p>94a.2</p>gsod dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'o/ 2 /mi bzod pa dang / phrag dog go/ /yon tan la ni skyon sgro 'dogs/ /a sU ya zhes bya ba'o/ /rab skyon 'gebs dang / 'chab ba'o/ 2 /do Sha dang ni A dI na/ 2 /le lo/ rmugs pa/ snyom las so/ 3 /yid lag cags
<p>94a.3</p>dang / rjes su gcags/ /phyi nas gdung dang / rjes su gdung / /bgod pa'o/ /brnab sems gzhan nor chags/ 2 /nye bar longs spyod/ /ni rbi sha/ a byA d+hA na/ nye ba'i rims/ 2 /'khon dang / 'gras dang / rnam par sdang / 3 /khon du 'dzin dang / der
<p>94a.4</p>'dzin pa/ 2 /yid gdungs/ mya ngan gdung ba dang / /niHsa ma'o/ 4 /brtson 'grus dang / sau TI R+Ya dang ma dang / /su TI ra tA zhes pa'o/ /mi brjod/ khong khro/ khro ba khro/ /ru rta krut+ta/ b+hA ma ko sa/ 3 /yongs su gdung ba a ba tha/ 2 /'du byed dang ni/ bA sa nA/ 2 /
<p>94a.5</p>ngal ba dang ni/ thang chad pa/ 2 /ya mtshan dang ni/ ngo mtshar dang / /dge mtshan dang ni ltad mo che/ /skyo ba sangs pa zhes bya'o/ 5 /'dod rgyal/ rang 'dod/ rgyu mtshan med/ 3 /yid ches pa dang / dad pa'o/ 2 /rab tu dad dang / dad pa mtshungs/ 2 /bud med
<p>94a.6</p>rnams kyi 'jo sgeg dang / /rnam 'gyur/ rnam g.yo/ rol pa dang / /de bzhin bskul dang zur gyis ston/ /'di rnams sgeg pa'i bya ba'o/ /bud med rnams kyi sgeg pa la/ /yid kyi rnam 'gyur las skyes pa'o/ /bya ba so so so so'o/ /rtsed mo'i dngos
<p>94a.7</p>skyes thams cad la/ /brtson par byas dang snying la bris/ 2 /bzhad gad/ tshig 'don ca co dang / /bde phyin/ ku re/ bkyal ka dang / /bde ba'i dga' ston/ narma dang / /rtsod dang / rtsed mo rol pa dang / /saM sa dang / re Na kaH 13 /byis pa rnams kyis rtsed
<p>94b</p>
<p>94b.1</p>mo la/ /be lA/ kan+pa ka /kr-I Da/ /tUrda ni dang / laDa naM/ 5/lag pa'i 'khrul 'khor/ chu rtsed dang / /lag 'khrul can dang / byA rtak+ShI/ /ro ldan pa 'jo'i rtsed mo'o/ 2 /shing rta'i sgra dang ko ha laM/ 2 /zol dang / zur ston/ mtshon pa'o/ 3 /rang bzhin/ 
<p>94b.2</p>bsam/ bdun/ a sha ya/ 4 /skad smra/ rnam 'gyur sbed pa'o/ /'tshub pa/ stab stob/ 'tshub pa'o/ 3 /spyod dang / spyod pa/ rnam pa dang / /ang+gi/ ang+gi ta yin no/ /ga chad dgod dang / kun nas dga'/ /yid dgod/ 'dzum dang / 
<p>94b.3</p>bar mar dgod/ /tshang skyes/ rdul dang / nges gdungs dang / /nyis gdung / rab 'bangs/ lus kyi rlan/ 6 /ba spu byed dang / ba spu langs/ /pags pa'i myu gu/ pags me tog /bu la kaM dang / tsher ma can/ /ba su'i rnam 'gyur/ ba su dga'/ ur+h+haR+Sha
<p>94b.4</p>NaM zhes pa rnams/ /g.yo dang / ldeg dang / 'gul dang / bskyod/ 4 /dud mo/ cho nge / mchi ma 'dzag /3 /g.yal ba dang ni/ glal ba'o/ 2 /yid brtan pa dang yid rton pa/ 7 /'ching ba/ 'gog pa/ biSh+ka m+b+ha/ 2 /gtam 'gal ba dang / bslu ba'o/ 2 /
<p>94b.5</p>rang+gi Na dang / 'dres pa mtshungs/ 2 /shes rab gsal ba/ gnyid sad pa/ /dzA ga ra zhes pa rnams so/ 4 /gnyid dang / nyal dang / gzims pa dang / /rmi lam legs phab ces kyang bya/ /snyom las dang ni sgyid snyom mo/ 2 /gnyid yur ba dang / mig 'dzums
<p>94b.6</p>so/ 2 /smin bsdus/ bzhin bsdus/ khro gnyer ro/ /khro bas blta dang / sdang mig go/ /phab nas blta dang / kun tu blta/ /ik+Sha NaM dang / daR+sha ni/ /nirba r+Na na ni b+hA la naM/ 6 /rang tshul dang ni ngo bo nyid/ /yang dag grub dang / rang bzhin dang / /nges chags bdag
<p>94b.7</p>chos/ /ngang tshul dang / /skye ba zhes kyang bya ba'o/ 9 /sdug bsngal 'jig rten/ srid pa dang / /'khor ba rul gnas btson ra'o/ 5 /nyin mtshan lo dang / skad cig dang / /dgod dang / dga' ston rnams la ni/ /zhes pa dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sde yis bkod pa'i
<p>95a</p>
<p>95a.1</p>mngon brjod mu tig gi phreng ba ming gzhan sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba las mtho ris kyi sde rdzogs so// //sa 'og rkang 'og /stobs ldan/ gnas/ bcung 'og /'og gnas/ /klu'i 'jig rten/ 6bu ga khung bu/ /pad+ma'i
<p>95a.2</p>mig /nir+b+ya tha naM/ /gsal mthongs dang / /bi ro ka dang / da raM dang / /khong stong / ts+tshi traM ku ha rAM/ /ran+h+raM ba pA/ shu Shi'o/ 13 /sa dong / gartA paT dang / 2 /bu ga dang bcas shu Shi raM/ /mun nag /snang med/ mun pa can/ /mun pa nyin mo'i sgo nga dang / /nam mkha'
<p>95a.3</p>'byor pa nyin mthar byed/ /phyogs gos/ an+d+haM/ mkha'i lpags pa/ /mtshan mo klu gnas sgra gcan gnas/ /sngon po'i phung po mtshan mo'i lpags/ /ta ma sa dang / spyod skyo/ g.yo/ /mkha' dang / gan chags/ sa sgrib po/ 21 /kun khyab/ mun pa/ sa tha maH/ /
<p>95a.4</p>mun thug /an+ta/ ta ma saM/ /mun zad/ a ga ta ma saM/ /ri gnas ku dru'i bu rnams te/ /de ni 'jog po/ nor rgyas bu/ /lhag ma stobs rgyu dung dang ni/ a shwa ta ra/ kam+pa la/ /sngo chen/ pad chen/ nor las rgyal/ /bzhin ngan/ bong bu'i spu can
<p>95a.5</p>dang / /yul 'khor skyong dang stobs po che/ /e ra ba ta logs su gzhan/ /lhag ma/ mtha' yas de'i dbang phyug/ /nor rgyas bu dang sprul gyi rgyal/ 2 /tshangs sprul hA la ha la dang / /rta mchil sprul rgyal bzhin gnyis pa/ /sprul gyi sgra ldan zhes pa'o/ 3 /gnyid mi sad
<p>95a.6</p>dang nyal ba dang / /U lU ta dang / myur 'gro dang / /sprul nag dug chen/ chu sprul lo/ /tit+se/ glang sna/ ba lang sna/ /mA lu d+hA nA/ mA tu la/ /khri can dang ni/ rkang bzhi dang / /rgyal rigs dug med sbrul dag mtshungs/ /khra 'dzin/ skra ldan/ khra bo can/ 3 /
<p>95a.7</p>shun pa brjes dang / go cha grol/ /sbrul spyi'i ming / dang / sa la 'phye/ /lag 'gro/ sbrul dang / lag pas 'gro/ /mche ba'i dug can/ dug 'dzin dang / /'khyog 'gro/ rnam 'dzin/ mig gis thos/ /gdengs can/ 'khyil ldan/ rgyab rings dang / /
<p>95b</p>
<p>95b.1</p>lto 'phye/ khu nyal/ bya rog lto/ /zas ngan dang ni 'khor lo can/ /ba lang rna ba b+hu dzaM ga/ /rkang sbas/ rlung gi zas can dang / /rkang bral/ sa nag /b+ho gI /sam ko lA/ dug mtshon can/ lce sgril pa dang / lce gnyis pa/ /sbrul gdug byed dang / gdengs
<p>95b.2</p>ka 'dzin/ /kha dug can dang / sbal pa za/ /da pI ka ra/ sAn+na ga /mche ba can dang / bum sna can/ dong nyal/ pra ba lA kI dang / /zlum po can zhes pa rnams so/ 41 /sa la 'khyil dang / 'khums pa'o/ 2 /so sor sgo nga rul ba 'khyil/ 2 /sbrul las byung ba
<p>95b.3</p>dug rus sogs/ /'gas byed/ darbI/ pa Na/ b+ho ga /nirba pa Ni/ pags pa brjes/ /ro dang / 'ur sgrogs/ gaM ra/ rno/ /dzang+gu la/ ga ta laM/ be ShaM/ 7/nag po brtsegs dang / kA ko la/ /'jam ster/ snying po/ brgyad pa dang / /sha gam skyes dang / 
<p>95b.4</p>tshangs pa'i bu/ /rab gsal ha lA ha la dang / /be'u'i lte bu/ rwa can dang / /me stag can de 'di rnams ni/ /dug gi dbye bar shes par bya/ 11 /dug gi rig sngags dug sel ma/ /dug dang / hA lA ha lam dang / /hA la ha lam dang yang ni/ /ha la ha la zhes pa'o/ 4 /dug gi
<p>95b.5</p>sman pa dug sel ldan/ /sbrul 'dzin/ /sbrul kha sdig pa dang / /dug gi be con/ gtam rab chags/ 5 /'di yi za ma tog la ni/ 4 /sbrul gyi 'dun pa'i snod dang ni/ /bya gag 'dab ltar rgyas pa'o/ 2 /dmyal ba/ dga' med/ 'dod bral dang / /ngan 'gro de yi dbye ba ni/ /
<p>95b.6</p>tsha ba rab tu tsha ba dang / /yang sos thig nag bsdus 'joms dang / /mnar med ngu 'bod ngu 'bod che/ 2 /rab tu gzir bar byed pa'o/ 9 /ri dgas sems can dmyal gnas pa'i/ /srog chags rnams la 'byung ba'o/ 1 /chu bo rab med zhes bya ste/ /phun tshogs med dang bden pa
<p>95b.7</p>bral/ 2 /dbang po/ rna ba nag mo'o/ 2 /biSh+Ti bzang po zhes bya ba/ /byed pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams so/ /gnod pa mi bzad tshor brnag dka'/ 3 /zug gzer/ gsod pa/ sdug bsngal dang / /bya tha/ A bA/ d+ha tshor gzir/ /bde med rtsod dang dga' med rlabs/ /
<p>96a</p>
<p>96a.1</p>bu btsas skyes dang / tshegs chen dang / /dka' ba dang ni 'jigs pa lan/ 15 /dbye ba 'di dag gsum du 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho chu gter chu klung bdag /pA ri ri Ni arna pa/ /ka tsi ga la/ swa rasta/ /bArti/ chu rnams bdag po dang / /a sA m+wa
<p>96a.2</p>ti/ dug can gnas/ /gang+gA 'dzin dang / chu sbyin dang / /chu ldan dang ni zla bas 'phel/ /pha rol 'khor dang / chu chen dang / /rin chen rgya mtsho'i ming / 'byung gnas sA tho d+hi/ /chu srin 'byung gnas brgal dka' dang / /an+ti dang ni/ dpa' klong
<p>96a.3</p>'khrugs/ /chu yi phung po ti mi'i mdzod/ /'jal 'gro dang ni rlabs phreng can/ /rus sbal che ldan/ sin+d+hu'i bdag /zla ba skyed byed/ chu srin bdag /sa la 'gro dang / bsam bya dang / /ri yi thod can/ sa mchod ma/ /ro ldan ma dang / dbang chen
<p>96a.4</p>mtshan/ /bye ma can ma/ 'khyog 'gro skyes/ /ti mi'i grong dang / pha rol 'gro/ /'khrug 'byed ma dang / chu klung can/ /gling ldan chu srin/ rgyal mtshan can/ /chu yi bdag dang / zla ba'i grogs/ /sgron me ldan dang / bde ba'i mchog /de yi rab dbye
<p>96a.5</p>'o ma dang / /lany+tsha mar gyi rgya mtsho dang / /mngar ba'i chu yi rgya mtsho dang / /zho dang bu ram chang gi mtsho/ 58 /bsrubs pa'i mtsho dang 'o ma'i mtsho/ /kA la sha'i mtsho/ 'o ma'i chu/ /bdud rtsi nI ra btung bya dang / /'ju byed/ gnas byed/ sprin gyi bcud/ /sprin gyi myu
<p>96a.6</p>gu rgyas byed dang / /'tsho byed/ 'dod byed/ skyong byed dang / /ngan sel/ 'khru phan/ nor ldan dang / /dug byed/ lus 'ching / mar dang gsher/ /da kaM /ba nA/ chu'i ming la zhe bzhi/ pA ri dang / /btung bya/ 'dzag pa/ sgo kun 'gro/ /a paH 
<p>96a.7</p>sprin gyi me tog dang / /kI lA dang / bispa laM/ /gzhal 'gro/ ar+Na/ bde mchog byed/ /snying po/ bde 'ching / 'o ma byed/ /stobs byed/ kr-i bI Ta/ /i rA dang ni bde byed dang / /mi zad byed dang / srog bslu ba'o/ 44 /As+yaM/ am+ma yaM so/ 2 /'bab chu/ gling ldan
<p>96b</p>
<p>96b.1</p>rgyu ldan ma/ /nya lcibs ldan ma/ skyong ldan ma/ /dba' rlabs ldan ma/ sil sgra can/ /sgrogs ldan/ gzhol 'bab/ lha ldan ma/ /'bab ldan ma dang / bcud 'dzin ma/ /chu yi zegs ldan/ lpags ldan ma/ /'jigs byed shing rta ma dang
<p>96b.2</p>ni/ /zla ba'i lag ma gser ldan ma/ /sprin ldan lta ba'i brtul zhugs ma/ /skya nar ldan ma/ tshad ldan ma/ /sa srung ma dang chu dron ma/ /dbang chen/ grong gi phreng ldan ma/ 25 /chu klung dbye ba/ lha'i chu'o/ /dza hU'i bu mo rgyun gsum ma/ /skal ldan shing
<p>96b.3</p>rta lam gsum 'gro/ /khyab 'jug /rkang pa 'jigs byed skyes/ /chos kyi khu ma/ chu sbyin ma/ /drag po'i thod gser ldan ma'o/ 11 /gshin rje'i sring mo/ ya mu nA/ /nyi ma'i bu mo/ /gdung byed ma/ /gshin rje ma dang kA lin+dI/ /ri bo ka lin+di bu mo/ /ka lin+da ka n+ya
<p>96b.4</p>zhes so/ 8 /narma dA dang / re bA dang / /me la ka yi bu so dang / 5 /sngon gyi gaM gA zla ba skyes/ 5 / mu R+dan lA/ mu rA la/ 2 /lag chu dang ni/ rtag tu 'bab/ 2 /mang po sbyin dang / dkar po 'bab/ /srid sgrub ma zhes bya ba'o/ /shi ta dru dang sha ta pa/ 2 /gaM gA phyed dang kA be+e rI/ 2 /
<p>96b.5</p>gnas 'jog ma dang / go ta mI/ 2 /ba yi mchog sbyin go lA'o/ 2 /dbyangs can dang ni/ shA ra tA/ 2/zla cha/ zla cha las byung ma/ 2 /zhags grol ma dang / bi bA Ta/ 2 /khrag 'bab dbyig gi dpung pa yin/ /drang chu/ lung chu/ byis pa'i chu/ /'dam bu can dang / ku sha
<p>96b.6</p>can/ /shing dum can dang / 'bu can no/ /gzhan yang dbye ba chu 'dras 'dres/ /lha khang nas 'bab/ shing chu gnyis/ /rba dang / dba' rlabs/ rlabs dang ni/ /steng 'byung / dal med/ chu'i 'khri shing / 6 /rlabs chen/ chu 'khrug /rlung gi gsos/ /steng du 'phar
<p>96b.7</p>ba zhes pa rnams/ /dba' rlabs skyes dang / chu 'khor dang / /Sho ga ti zhes bya ba'o/ 3 /de rab 'joms pa la ha ri/ 2 /'khor lo kha la'i sgro/ /chu g.yo ba ni ma nA shwi/ /'khyil pa chu 'khyog rnam pa ste/ /chu 'khor dang ni/ 'khor chu'o/ /tA lu ra dang rlung gis bskyed/ /
<p>97a</p>
<p>97a.1</p>ka laM ku ra/ zegs ma'i lte/ /'khyog po pang+ga zhes bshad de/ /rgyun 'khyog dang ni/ gya gyu 'gros/ /yur ba dang ni/ rnang ma'o/ 2 /rgyun 'bab dang ni/ 'bab chu'o/ /chu rgyun/ pa NI/ 'gro chu dang / /rab 'bab dang ni/ chu tshogs
<p>97a.2</p>so/ 5 /sgrol byed ku Ta/ DuN+Du b+ha/ 2 /sa rI ba ha/ chu rngab pa/ 2 /khron pa rig par chu gnas pa/ /de ni shing dang dro sogs rgyun/ /lha yis byas dang / ra ka'o/ 2 /pra tA lI ni chu yi gnas/ /byAM sA ri NI/ zhes pa yang / /hiN+DI ra dang mtsho'i ka ba/ /dbu ba chu yi gad mo'o/ 4 /
<p>97a.3</p>chu bur dang ni/ dbu ba'i sprin/ 2 /chu klung rnams la chags pa yi/ /pe ni dang ni chu yi ma/ 2 /rab dang 'jug ngogs/ lugs dang / 'khrug /'grog byed/ 'gram dang / rus sbal dus/ /dbus ni 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dang / /sa yo la sa zhes pa'o/ /chu 'phel ba ni gang
<p>97a.4</p>ba'o/ /lugs ni chu gter 'khrug pa'o/ /pha rol tshu rol phan tshun ngogs/ /de yi bar ni rgyun lam mo/ /gling dang / dzal kaM ka dang / /spre'u'i brtul zhugs bar gyi gling / 4 /mchu las thon pa de ni sgang / /bye ma'i ngogs dang / bye ma'i thang / /bzhi mdo'i phyag dar
<p>97a.5</p>zhes pa yang / 3 /bA lu kA/ bA li kA/ 2 /'dab ma dang ni/ chu 'gebs dang / /rdzas dang / aM ka /karba Ta/ /'dam dang 'jim rdzab bA da dang / /dzam+b+ha la dang 'bying 'byed dang / /dzar+b+ha dang chu rnyog go/ 7 /gru dang / sgrol byed/ nau rnams so/ /sgrol ba rta ri/ nau
<p>97a.6</p>kA noH /shin tu rgyal byed/ sgrol ba po/ /ta raN+Di kA / chu'i shing rta/ /bA da li ni zhes bya'o/ 9 /rkyal dang / chu rtsal gzings dang ni/ /b+he la ka dang sgrol ba'o/ 5 /sgrol ba he Da/ mdung can dang / 3 /btung snod/ byed pa/ gru skya dang / /gru yi par+Na Ta dag go/ gru'i ming / /
<p>97a.7</p>pa/ /bA da ra ba/ so li n+daM/ /de nyid bar gyi stan yin no/ 3 /gogs paT+Ta ti raM traM gA/ /gru skya dang ni/ g.yo byed dang / /chu skyong snod la chags pa dang / /sgrol ba'i shing rta rnams yin no/ 5 /gru skya dang ni/ skyong byed do/ 2 /snod skyong ba dang lA d+ha Ta/ 2 /gru sbyar shing
<p>97b</p>
<p>97b.1</p>gi tog tsi'o/ /chu 'thor snod dang / 'thor byed do/ 2 /shing gzhong dang ni chu yi snod/ 2 /rting 'jug shing dang bsgyur ba'i shing / 2 /gru btsas dang ni/ mnyan pa'i gla/ 2 /rna ba 'dzin dang / gdos pa 'dzin/ 2 /gling gzhan rgyu dang / gru'i tshong pa/ /gru 'dren pa zhes
<p>97b.2</p>bya rnams so/ /gshin rje'i gnas dang / gting zab dang / /tshong gnas gshin rje'i 'og mthil reg /4 /rgyal chen nyal 'ching dra ba 'dzin/ /chu yi 'bangs dang nya ba dang / /nya rgya ldan pa rnams yin no/ 6 /tshogs kyi srad bu/ gtsang byed de/ /dra ba dang ni
<p>97b.3</p>nya yi dol/ 2 /'chil ma dang ni/ nya 'bigs so/ /rgya mtsho can dang / rgya mtsho ba/ /gting zab dngas dang / gsal ba dang / dri bral/ rab gsal dri ma med/ 5 /rnyog pa 'dam can ma dngas pa'o/ /gting med gyur dang / mi zab pa/ /zab dang / gzhol
<p>97b.4</p>dang / gting rings so/ /nya rgya d+ha mA/ ku pa NI dang / ko Ti'o/ 4 /sa la wa dang / pany+dza ra/ /khe TaHsla ba zhes pa dang / khe Ta/ pany+dza raM zhes so/ /phur bu ya/ 4 /sA ha tsI rI/ 2 /mgrin gsum kan+Ta ka ka Ta/ 2 /nya dang / 'gro ldan/ go cha can/ /rgyab
<p>97b.5</p>rings/ dz+nya Sha/ sgong skyes dang / /mU ka /rnam 'phyo/ shun pa can/ /rnam 'phyo'i bdag dang / mchog bde dang / /kA Ta kI dang mig mi 'dzum/ /shalkI/ chur nyal/ balka bA na/ /za byed zhes pa rnams yin no/ /mche ba stong ldan khri can dang / /
<p>97b.6</p>kun 'joms bkra pa bI ShI na dag/ 2 /nya yi rgyal por mtshungs pa'o/ /b+ha laM ka dang ro hi ta/ 7 /il+li sha dang bye ma'i rgyal/ /gaM gA skyes dang gseg ma'i bdag /gdengs ka can dang / chu'i ga pur/ chu yi gdung byed dag tu brjod/ 7 /bi sha Da dang
<p>97b.7</p>pags chen no/ 2 /iny+dza ka skyes iny+dza ka /chu yi sdig pa rnams yin no/ 3 /dkar po mtshan dang / kU lA Ta/ /bye ma'i bu ram zhes pa'o/ 3 /gdengs ka can dang gdengs ka bkra/ 2 /tsam+sA skul byed/ gos ngan can/ /kA kA tsi kA/ ka tsi kA/ /ba ka
<p>98a</p>
<p>98a.1</p>tsiny+tsi kA dang ni/ /bA kA tsi zhes bya ba'o/ 2 /go cha can dang / sog ge'i rgyab/ 2 /rgyal po'i sgeg pa mang+ga ra/ /de yi dga' ma rwa can ma/ /grong ni mang+ga ra ldan ma/ /shA la/ sha ku la gaN+Da/ /sha ku la yi byis pa dang / /ga Da ka
<p>98a.2</p>zhes bya ba'o/ 7 /dug sel ring po bang+gA Na/ 1 /char gsum yang pa'i ban+na ra/ /chu yi dben pa zhes pa rnams/ 3 /rgyal mo 'dra ba rgyal po'i mgrin/ /rgyags chen zhes pa rnams yin no/ 3 /rtaM dang ni shing tsher can/ 2 /'od can/ 'od ma'i 'dab ma can/ 2 /
<p>98a.3</p>stobs ldan dang ni zlum po'i nya/ /dro ba'i nya dang / logs rgyas dang / /dkar po'i gzings zhes bya ba'o/ 3 /zla nya ba dang g.yo byed dag /2/bong bu bde byed/ shing steng skyong / /bong bu'i mig dang / gyen 'byung nya/ /gtong byed chen po zhes pa rnams/ 5 /tshangs
<p>98a.4</p>ma 'dam gyi ga DI dag /2 /dbyug pa'i nga rgyal phyed mar byed/ 2 /gaN+Das 'gro dang / so gal rlung / /glo ba'i sgra can/ rlung bug can/ /gos ngan dang ni/ sha za'o/ 6 /mkha' la nyal dang / mkha' nyal spyod/ 2 /kaM ka skyob dang / chus gzir bas skyes/ dbang 'dzin/ 
<p>98a.5</p>nya 'bu dang / /mig lnga pa dang / skra skyed do/ 5 /sgo nga'i nya bran tshogs pa la/ /gru skyed dang ni/ chu'i sgong can/ /'khor lo spyod dang / gru 'dzin dang / /ma nu'i sbrul dang / skums pa can/ 2 /ulU pI dang / byis can mtshungs/ 8 /'od brtsegs dang ni/ ga hwar dang / /dmar por za
<p>98a.6</p>dang sha ku ma/ /dga' ba 'khyil dang ti mi dang / /ti ming+gi la/ rA gu'i bu/ /a g+ha rnams ni dbye bar 'gyur/ /yA dI sa ni chu'i skye bo/ /ming bzang de yi dbye ba ni/ /shaM ku sraM dang chu srin sogs/ /chu yi gzugs brnyan chu srin dang / /ral gri'i so can ma
<p>98a.7</p>ro li/ /mtha' dag tshim dang nya 'debs dang / /de dbye chu srin ka ra'o/ /chu srin dkar dang phyogs 'dzin dang / /'dzin khri lus kyi rgyud can dang / /chu yi sprin rings na kra'i rgyal/ /chu sgong can dang / chu'i bu za/ /ran kra chu yi zas can dang / /bA tuN+Da dang / 
<p>98b</p>
<p>98b.1</p>kum+b+hA ra/ /chu yi phag pa chu mgrin can/ /a pA da dang / nya zas dang / /'bab 'dzin chu yi 'bu zan dang / /chu yi lcer yar lta bar bya/ 11 /go d+hi kA dang / ni hA kA/ /dza la/ gra ha/ zhes pa'o/ 3 /hri dang chu yi bye ma dang / /chur 'dzul/ chu la rgyal ba dang / /nya
<p>98b.2</p>'dzin chu yi sre me'o/ 6 /byis pa gsod dang / byis pa can/ /ral gri'i mjug ldan pa la'ang+ga/ /chu yi rus sbal/ chu'i spre'u/ /skad cig dbugs dang / dbyid/ bdag po can/ /ba shA g+ha zhes pa rnams so/ 9 /rus sbal yan lag lnga pa dang / /ka ma tha dang
<p>98b.3</p>kats+tsha ba/ /yan lag lnga sbas ko Da'i rkang / 5 /sa srin dang ni/ g+hA rgyu rI/ 2 /karka Ta dang / ku lI ra/ /kha gyen phyogs dang / 'phrog byed mig /ti pa sha na/ lus spas dang / /ba Di dang ni gya gyur 'gro/ 8 /glang po la sogs/ thang la gnas/ /de rnams
<p>98b.4</p>sngon ni chu las skyes/ /kiny+tsa lu ka /sa srin ta la/ /sa yi 'khril shing zhes pa'o/ 3 /shI li dang ni sa srin mo/ 2 /sbal pa mo dang dbyar skyes ma/ 2 /rus sbal mo dang / du li mo/ 2 /maN+Du ka dang / dardu ra/ /lus bral 'phrog byed/ b+he ka dang / /rma yi gnas
<p>98b.5</p>dang / char skyes dang / /be ka dga' byed/ shA lU ra/ 'phar bar byed dang 'phar ba dang / /lce med dang ni bshang ba sbas/ 13 /chu srin/ chung ngu / ma k+Shi kA/ /chu'i bu chu yi ma k+Shi kA/ 4 /'gron bu/ pa Ta/ hi ra N+ya/ /hi ra Na dang / rin thang kun/ /za ma
<p>98b.6</p>tog can/ rus pa'i zong / /cho lo'i sa bon/ zhes pa rnams/ /dung gi khyu dang dung can ma/ 2/dung phran dung gi srin mo'o/ 2 /dung dang kam+bu ra/ chu skye/ /chu yi ka raM ka dang ni/ /khab kyi kha zhes bya ba'o/ 5 /mu tig skyes dang 'gas byed dang / /be shI'i mdzod dang
<p>98b.7</p>nya phyis dang / /sa TA lu ka zhes pa'o/ 5 /ur zhes bya dang mdzod ring mo/ 5 /phu Ta Ti ka /'dam nya phyis/ 4 /chu yi nya phyis 'bu skogs dang / /spur ba'i bu dang / sham+bu ka /dza la Dim+ba/ shi bu ka /kam+bu ra dang / baN+Tha ra/ /'dam gyi sbal pa zhes pa'o/ /
<p>99a</p>
<p>99a.1</p>srin bu pad pa dza lu ka /chu khyim/ dza lA yu kA dang / /chu yi snang ba khrag 'thung dang / /chur 'gro/ chu 'thung de bzhin du/ /pe Ni/ bo d+hi nI dang ni/ /pa Ta lu ka zhes pa'o/ 10 /chu nyal dang ni/ chu yi gzhi/ /de la gting med chu sgra
<p>99a.2</p>sgrogs/ /lteng ka 'khyil dang / chu skyang skyong / /nye ba'i khron pa chu nyal lo/ 2/khron chu/ brus chu/ kU pa dang / /btung chu/ dus mchog /kha 'chings can/ /gtsug phud can dang chu yi ma/ 8 /rnam 'thor dang ni/ tsU Da ka /tsuN+DI/ 'dzag chu/ tsaN+Da'i
<p>99a.3</p>'dab/ /pa Ta zhes pa rnams yin no/ /a ra g+haT+Ta/ khron pa che/ /rkang pa 'jug pa'i paTa'o/ 3 /tri kA/ khron pa'i mu khyud te/ /bI nA hA ni kha 'chings so/ /gyen 'dren bum pa'i 'khrul 'khor dang / /chu gyen 'bab byed pra hi'o/ 3 /mun nag khron pa chu nyams
<p>99a.4</p>pa'o/ /mun pa can dang 'bu srin gnas/ 3 /rdzing bu dang ni brus chu dang / /mthil can dang ni khron chu can/ /'og gi gnas can zhes pa'o/ 5 /'og dang / tal+laM/ bal+laM dang / /tal+laM kaM zhes pa rnams so/ 2 /kuN+Da/ lha yi rdzing bu'o/ /A khA taM ni/ lhas
<p>99a.5</p>bskos pa'o/ /rdzing bu/ rdzing rings/ logs ngos can/ /mchod sdong can dang / nya sbal can/ 5 /'obs dang / yongs su brkos pa'o/ 2 /gzhi can gong du chu 'dzin pa'o/ /btsugs shing chus bskor bkrun shing dang / /phyag dang / rdul skyes/ chu skyes
<p>99a.6</p>dang / /ke dA ro dang / shrI tra ha/ /bya yis bskrun dang / bzhin can dang / /gnas can/ shi rtsa chu 'dzin pa'o/ 11 /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas/ mtshe'u dang / chu yi snying po/ bzhad ldan mtsho/ 5 /mtsho chung / rdzing mtsho/ lteng ka'o/ 3 /'dam skyes pad+ma chu skyes
<p>99a.7</p>dang / /mtsho las skyes dang / mtsho la skyes/ /'dab stong / 'dab brgya/ ka ma la/ /'dam la skye dang / tA ma'i bcud/ /rtsibs 'bigs dang ni/ ut+pal che/ /dpal gyi 'dab ma/ am+bu dza/ /baM ke dza dang / dza la dza/ any+dza ni dang / bAM ra dzi/ /
<p>99b</p>
<p>99b.1</p>sa ra pAM dzaM/ mtsho las skyes/ /sa ro du ha/ sa ro dzaM/ /mi yi 'tsho ba/ dug rab 'joms/ /rgyas byed/ am+bo ru na dang / /ge sar can dang / sdong bu can/ /kany+tsi/ dpal gos/ nA li kaM/ 31 /pad+ma dkar po/ chu skyes dkar/ 2 /ut+pa la dang / 
<p>99b.2</p>ku ba la/ ku baM/ ku ba la ya'o/ 4 /kaM sat+so la/ nags ut+pa la/ 2 /chu skyes/ sngon po/ dbang mchog dang / /'chi med/ dbang mo zhes pa'o/ 3 /ut+pal dkar po zla ba'i dri/ /kai ra baM/ ku mu da/ ku mu ta/ /zla ba dga' dang / zla mdzes dang / /
<p>99b.3</p>kan+toT+Ta dang / mtshan mo bzhad/ 3 /kr-iN+No kan+di/ dpal gyi lag /ut+pal dmar po bung ba dga'/ /dpal mo'i khyim dang / ku muta dang / /ko ka na dang / mtsho skyes dmar/ 8 /ka ta lA raM dang / dri bzang can/ 2 /thun mtshams ltar dmar ha lU kaM /dug
<p>99b.4</p>gi lte ba pad rtsa can/ 4 /sdong bu can ma ni la nI/ /rgyas ldan ma dang pad+ma can/ /puT ki nI zhes pa'o/ 7 /ku mu da yi nags tshal ni/ /ku mu di nI'o gzhan mtha' yas/ /kun+di na la nI la sogs/ /sdong bu nA lA nA laM'o/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba tan+tu laM/ /pi si dang
<p>99b.5</p>ni bi ShaN+DaM/ /pad sogs tshal ni/ ka dam+ba/ /ka ra hA Ta/ shi kA/ kan+da/ 3 /ze 'bru dang ni ge sar ro/ 2 /lte ba dang ni/ sa bon mdzod/ /gdugs kyi sa bon sak+Shau raM/ 4 /sam+ba rti kA/ 'dab ma gsar/ 2 /shA lu ni kaM/ 'dab 'khrungs ldan/ /ka she
<p>99b.6</p>ru dang / shA lu'i rgyal/ /'phags pa dge ba zhes kyang ngo / 3 /de nas shring+ga Ta ka la/ /chu yi tsher ma/ chu'i sgu ra 'khyog /2 /pra sni bum pa can dang ni/ /chu yi rtsa ba/ chu'i bzhi mdo/ /mkha' yi rtsa ba chu yi 'dab/ /'dab ma chu yi shun pa dang / /'di ni kar+t+ri
<p>99b.7</p>Ni du'ang blta/ /dza la sU kaM /sbubs can no/ /she bA laM dang / chu bal dang / chu yi rngam/ chu'i len bu/ /kA tsA rAM dang / chu'i sngon mo/ /chu yi lus dang / chu yi rtags/ /chu yi skabs dang / chu'i dra ba/ /chu yi 'dab ma zhes rnams so/ 11 /rgya mtsho la sogs
<p>100a</p>
<p>100a.1</p>pa'i rab tu dbye ba'o/ /sa 'og gi sde rdzogs so/ /snyan ngag mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sdes rnam par bkod pa'i mngon brjod sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las skabs dang po rdzogs so// //
<p>100a.2</p>sa gzhi grong dang sa 'dzin nags/ /seng ge mi dang gnyis skyes sogs/ /rgyal rigs dang ni mi zad par/ /'di ni sde tshan drug tu byas/ /brtan pa/ 'dzin ma/ nor 'dzin ma/ /dbyig 'dzin/ b+ha rA/ mi g.yo ma/ /k+Sho Ni rgya mtsho'i ske rags can/ /
<p>100a.3</p>i la/ k+Sha mrA dang ni/ k+Sh+mA/ /srung byed/ zhag ldan/ mchod 'os ma/ /mchod sbyin byed ma/ 'gro ldan ma/ /sa gzhi 'dzin ma 'dzin byed ma/ sa sbyi'i ming drug cu rtsa gnyis/ sna tshogs 'gengs dang / nor ldan ma/ /k+Shi te/ kun bzod/ bzod ldan ma/ /mtha' yas
<p>100a.4</p>bcud ldan/ 'dzin byed ma/ /yangs ldan rgya mtsho'i gos can ma/ /chu skyob sa dang / sa gzhi sku/ /rgyal byed/ 'byung po 'dzin ma dang / /d+hI dI/ chu ldan/ gling 'dzin ma/ /gling ldan ma dang 'od srungs byin/ /b+hU me/ urnI/ yangs can ma/ /dri ldan ri
<p>100a.5</p>yi rna can ma/ /rin chen snying mo/ klu yi gzhi/ /ri yi phur bu ma dang ni/ /mdzes chen ma dang / lus ldan ma/ /sna tshogs 'dzin ma/ bzod ma/ gauH thang chen ma dang / ba s+thi lI/ /mi'i gnas/ bar yangs ldan ma/ ma'i 'jig rten dang / /sa steng
<p>100a.6</p>ro dang ro dang sI/ /chu gter mu khyud dri skyed ma/ /sa bon skyed dang / rang skyed ma'o/ 72 /sa bzang dang ni yid 'ong ma/ /rab dang sa/ mr-it+sA/ mr-it+sa naM dang / /mr-it+ta/ kA zhes bya mkha' thang / ba'o/ /sa gshin/ 'bru kun skye ba dang / /ga Ni/ A ra
<p>100a.7</p>puSh+pa'o/ /tshwa sgo/ 'gyur byed/ sa can no/ /tshwa sgo can dang / ba tshwa ldan/ sa bye brag ba'i ming / /da sha dang ni/ I ri Ni/ 4 /sa bye brag pa'i/ ka tsa ga lA/ na ling+gA/ 2 /tha dad yid 'ong / skye ba/ rjes su zos/ 2 /sa nag yul ni sa nag can/ /de bzhin sa skya la sogs
<p>100b</p>
<p>100b.1</p>pa/ /brjod bya'i rtags can gzhan shes bya/ /s+tha la dang ni s+tha lI'o/ /s+thi Ni la ni/ thang gi mtshams/ /rig pa'i thang mtshams/ bye ma can/ /ma ru dang ni/ mya ngam thang / 2 /ma brkos pa dang / ma rmos pa/ 2 /skye 'gro/ 'gro ldan 'jig rten dang / /sa rten
<p>100b.2</p>dang ni/ gnas rten no/ 5 /'jig rten 'di ni b+ha ra rta'i/ /yul te/ hai ma ba ta'o/ /tha ra ta dang / mi yi sa/ /yi lA/ pr-i taM/ tog gi phreng / /'phrog byed/ khyu mchog skyes bu'am ci/ /bzang po dang ni dbyig ring bzhin/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan rnams te/ /
<p>100b.3</p>sa steng gi ni yul rnams dgu / 9 /ku sha/ ngam skabs/ khrung khrung dzam+bU shing / /pad+ma/ shaka /shal+ma ming dang / gling rnams su 'gyur/ /kla klo'i yul/ /b+hA ta nga yi mtha' 'khob po/ /pra mA ga dang / sgra ngan zhing / /gangs ri dang ni/ 'bigs byed
<p>100b.4</p>par/ /'phags 'khrungs/ bsod nams sa gzhi dang / /yul dbus dang ni dbus yin no/ /de nas 'dir ni Ad+hA ri/ /'bi dir ya ni 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /'bigs byed gangs ri dag dbus su/ /shar dang nub kyi chu gter ro/ /sha rA ba ti'i mtshams gang
<p>100b.5</p>der/ /'phags pa'i yul la sogs pa rnams/ /yul ni shar dang / lho dang nub/ /byang dang / nub byang rnams yin no/ /lha yi chu bo'i bar gang yin/ /dbyangs can tr-i sa tha tI dag /de nyid sprul pa'i yul yin no/ /tshangs 'khrungs de dag pa Ta'o/ /
<p>100b.6</p>gaM gA ya mu nA dag gi/ /bar bar bzhi ni ri bong thang / /pra hA sa dang / zla ba'i 'gro/ /bat+sa'i tshong rdal/ kau shAm+bI/ /gauDI mda' ris suN+Da yin/ /puN+Das mtshan pa ba ran+t+ra/ /ka n+ya/ kun+dza/ g+hA d+hI'i grong / /bu mo sgur 'khyog /ku sha'i thang / /char chen zhes
<p>100b.7</p>pa rnams su 'gyur/ 5 /dzi sta ri dang nye ba'i thang / /'khor mo 'jig dang zhi ba'i grong / /gsal ldan 'gram dang rgyal po can/ 4 /rang byung skyes dang yul 'khor che/ /yul gyi gnas mchog sad ma/ zhes bya ba'o/ 3 /me tog dang grong khyer dang / /skya snar bu zhes
<p>101a</p>
<p>101a.1</p>bya ba'o/ /gnas bcas dang ni ko sha lA/ /'thab med/ dga' mchog /mdzod 'dzin no/ 5 /gau ta ma/ stobs kyi rigs/ /zangs byugs/ ta mA li kA dang / /dul ba byugs dang / 'phrog byed khyim/ /'khor lo gcig pa/ gnod
<p>101a.2</p>mdzes grong / /glang po can dang / lag ldan can/ /glang pos mtshan dang / lag ldan grong / /glang po'i yan lag ces pa'o/ 5 /zangs g.yog pa'i/ nags tshal bre bo/ rgyal byed grong / 2 /nags tshal dang ni/ khaN+Da baM/ /ma ga d+ha dang / ka Ta dag /2 /bar+t+ta ni dang shar gyi
<p>101a.3</p>yul/ /bi ra dzA dang / 'od ldan no/ 2 /yangs pa can dang / 'phags rgyal dang / /srung byed me tog ze'u can/ 4 /de yi skyed mos tshal gang yin/ /de ni me tog za ma tog /lha mo mkhar dang mda' yi grong / /ko Ta'i yul dang / dka' bzlog nags/ /
<p>101a.4</p>dmar sdug bsngal bral/ po'i grong yang de nyid do/ 5 /grong khyer/ tsam+bA/ phreng ba can/ 3 /sgo ldan/ nor can/ grong khyer dang / /sgo can tshal dang / phreng ba can/ 4 /ga yA/ ga'i rgyal po can/ tI ra/ b+hu k+ti/ lits+tsha bI/ 8 /lus 'phags
<p>101a.5</p>grong khyer/ lus 'phags dang / /ka mi thi la zhes bya ba'o/ 3 /rnam par zhi byed/ sgra ngan zhing / 2 /mnyam yod/ chos kyi tshong rdal lo/ /grong gsum dang ni grong khyer ro/ 2 /'bu len dang ni/ 'bu yi grong / 2 /ma thu rA dang / sbrang can dang / /sbrang
<p>101a.6</p>rtsi nye bar 'joms zhes so/ 3 /ku ku d+g+hi na/ de yi grong / /legs mthong can dang / ku sha'i thang / 2 /skye dgu'i bdag skyes/ pra yA ga /2 /kI ra dang ni/ D+D+ha ka'o/ 2/mtshon cha bzo grong bA hI kA /tri ga ri kA/ kasmI ra/ 2 /kA ma rU pa'i yul la ni/ /
<p>101a.7</p>prAny+dza to ShA/ prAny+dza ShI kA 2 /bang+gA/ seng ge gtsan pa can/ haM ri ka la ya/ 2 /ma tA gi D+ha/ ut+ka la/ 2/sha ka ma tra/ tu ru k+Sha/ /ma kha dang ni nye ba'i nags/ 3 da shes ra dang / kA mA ru skyes/ 2 /phreng ba dang gsum can dang / srung byed do/ 2 /tI ra b+hu k+ti/ 
<p>101b</p>
<p>101b.1</p>lus 'phags dang / /lits+tsha bI yul shes par bya/ 3 /D+wa hA la dang / rta la brtse/ /mchod rten can zhes bya ba'o/ /kA ru Sha dang / khyim chen po/ 2 /ya da bstu/ daR+sha rta/ shA lwo ta dang / ku ku ra/ /ku ru pa dang b+ha d+hi'i yul/ /skye bo dang ni/ pAN+d+yA+o/ 2 /mi ldan/ 
<p>101b.2</p>dang ni/ hA h+nI k+sha/ /a ba d+h+wa ra/ kam+bo dza/ /dzA lan+d+ha ra/ twi garta/ 2 ang+ga/ tsam+pa nye mtshan nyid/ 2 /mnga' ris dang ni/ yul ljongs so/ /rgyal khams yul dang / nye bar phyi yul/ gnas/ 2 /gats+tsha/ mi dang skye bo mang / 2 /'dam bu can dang 'dam
<p>101b.3</p>bu mang / 2 /ku mud can dang / ku mud mang / 2 /sba yi tshal dang / ya mang can/ 2 /'dam rdzab can dang / 'dam can no/ 2/ne'u gsing can dang / rtswa ljang can/ 2 /gyo dum gseg ma can gyi yul/ /gseg mar bcas dang / gseg ma ldan/ /de bzhin
<p>101b.4</p>bye ma ldan pa'o/ /yul gang char chus 'bru skyong ba/ /lha yi ma can zhes pa'o/ /chu klung chu yis 'bru skyod ma/ /de ni chu klung ma can no/ /rgyal po bzang dang / rgyal ldan yul/ /rgyal po med dang / rgyal ngan can/ ba lang / mang ba/ ba lang gnas/ /
<p>101b.5</p>ba lang sngon bsdad/ ba lang lhas/ 2 /gral dang / kun spyod/ tshul dang ni/ /bsod snyoms len dang rgyun dang 'dzin/ 6 grog tshang dang ni/ grog mkhar dang / /brgya byin skye ba/ bstI brtsegs/ /bA ma lU ra/ 'bu yi brag /6 /sa yi khor yug 'khor
<p>101b.6</p>pa'o/ 2 /lam dang / rjes ldan rgyu sa dang / /'jug bya gcig rjes bgom bya dang / /bgrod bya 'gro sa rkang ldan dang / 2 /brta/ ba naM/ rdul can dang / /pan+tha/ bA Ta/ sa tha/ ba ha/ /a d+h+ra/ mA Tha/ khu lu ma'o/ 18 /dam pa'i lam dang / mchod bya'i lam/ /
<p>101b.7</p>lam po lam gyi ming bco brgyad/ che dang / lam bzang dang / /dpal gyi lam dang / rgyal po'i lam/ 6 /lam bral/ lam ngan/ 'jigs bcas lam/ /ka da d+h+ra dang / ka pa tha/ 5 /shriM ga Ta ka /dbyibs dang ni/ /lam 'dres dang ni/ bzhi mdo'o/ 4 /bar
<p>102a</p>
<p>102a.1</p>stong ring po/ /lam stong dang / /dgon pa dang ni/ bgrod dka'i lam/ /lam med pa dang a pa thaM/ na lta/ khru ni bzhi brgya'o/ /lcags khrog lam dang / A la m+b+hA sa/ /rim pas bgrod dka'/ kun rgyu ba/ /ba lang shing rta
<p>102a.2</p>rgyang grags zung / /dpag tshad lam dang d+ha nu kaM/ /rgyal po'i lam dang kun 'gro ba/ /de ni grong gi nye 'khor la/ zhes pa'i sde rdzogs so// //grong dang skyong byed grong khyer dang / /tshong rdal tshong srang gnas dang ljongs/ /smad gnas/ mtshams gnas/ 
<p>102a.3</p>karba TaM/ 10 /A raM ga dang / a tri ba/ /raM ba/ pra ti/ rtsAr+b+ba kaM 4 / grong gi rtsa ba'i grong las ni/ /gyis pa grong khyer nye ba'i grong / /de la rgyun 'bab/ grong chung dang / /urba sa su raM zhes so/ 3 /'phrog byed zla grong bzang po'i grong / /dri za'i grong khyer zhes
<p>102a.4</p>pa'o/ 3 /'dul gnas/ chos kyi phur bu'o/ 2 /mu dAH trI dang / dmangs 'gul gnas/ /sa brkos/ spyod pa'i phur bu'o/ 2 /sin+b+hu raM dang / dmar po 'chos/ /pa To li kA/ sbas phur bu/ /'ga' zhig phyag dar/ rdul la yang / /grong ni bzang po bdun
<p>102a.5</p>brgya yi/ /dbus kyi gnas ni kar+b+ba TaM/ /gal te de grong bzhi brgya'i dbus/ /de tshe dro Na mu khaM'o/ /kun nas 'dam pa'i tshong 'dus dang / /khyim dang / dbang po'i tshong 'dus dang / /grong gi 'gram zhes bya ba'o/ 4 /tshong lam/ zong 'tshong ra ba dang / /srang
<p>102a.6</p>lam/ tshong 'dus/ kun 'jug dang / /heN+ta zong dang / a dzi ra/ /thob pa'i sgo dang / skyed dang ni/ /tshong lam/ dbyangs chen/ brje dang 'tshong / /ka tsam ga lam/ ni rmu Ta/ /mig mangs yang dag tshogs pa'o/ 3 /byis khyim/ khyim gyi sa dang
<p>102a.7</p>gzhi/ 3 /'jug dang / 'jug bya/ skye bo'i gnas/ /rab bsngags gnas dang sa gzhi ma/ /rab tu dga' dang / dga' byed do/ /gri ha/ gr-i haM/ be+e sha dang / /besh+m+ra dang ni gnas pa yin/ /go haM kun dga'i gnas dang ni/ /gnas khang / phibs
<p>102b</p>
<p>102b.1</p>'og 'dun gnas dang / /mtshan mo'i nang gnas sgrib g.yogs dang / /khyim dang bya ba'i gnas kyang ngo / /nges gnas/ gnas dang / kun tu gnas/ /skyabs 'og dang ni/ khang khyim dang / /khang chung / spyil po/ 'dun sa dang / /laM lA/ 
<p>102b.2</p>ka k+Sh+ya 'jug gnas so/ 27 /ra ba bzhi pa/ kun 'jug go 2 /kun gnas khyim dang / bshes gnyen can/ 2 /khang bzangs ra bas yongs bskor dang / /zla ba'i ra ba/ spyi bo'i khyim/ /khang brtsegs dang ni/ ba Da b+hi/ 6 /da d+hi TA dang / nges byas khyim/ /
<p>102b.3</p>thub rnams lo ma'i spyil po dang / /mchod spyil po zhes bya ba'o/ /bzo bo dang ni kun 'jug gnas/ 2 /rta yi ra ba/ rta yi khang / 2 /'dab chags ra ba/ bya ldan no/ 2 /chu khang btung ba'i ra ba'o/ /rgya mtsho'i khyim dang rlung yong can/ /chu yi 'khrul 'khor gnas
<p>102b.4</p>yin no/ /ba si ta pa yi las dang / /a ba sa nI/ spra yi khyim/ /til mar ra ba 'khrul 'khor khyim/ /dud khang a la n+d+hu kA'o/ /btson ra dang ni 'ching ba'i khyim/ /gsod pa'i myu gu bya ba'i sbyor/ /dka' tshegs gnas dang byed pa can/ 6 /tshang ma'i khyim dang
<p>102b.5</p>gany+dza'o/ /grwa pa'i khang pa la sogs la/ /gan+tI dang ni/ ma Tha'o/ /so so'i gnas ni de'i ra ba/ /thub pa rnams kyi gnas dang rten/ /grags pa'i phung po lha yi gnas/ /mchod rten dang ni/ mchod sbyin gnas/ 2 /snying po'i khang pa/ kun spyod do/ /'dun
<p>102b.6</p>khang dang ni skye bo'i gnas/ /sa gzhi dkor mdzes 'dun khang mchog /snying po'i khang pa/ gnas khang dang / /longs skyod gnas su de brjod do/ /mtshan dang mtshan gyi bar dang ni/ /mdzod rab dang ni 'dun khang ngo / 2 /bang mdzod dang ni mdzod yin no/ /a
<p>102b.7</p>riSh+Tas ni bu btsas khyim/ /rtswa spyil dang ni/ lus tshad can/ /rna ba'i rgyud dang many+tsa kaH/ /rtswa yi khang bzangs ma ka Ta/ /mun khang / 1 many+tsa/ ku traM sha /bsil khang la sogs nor ldan gnas/ /khang bzangs lha dang sa bdag khyim/ /gtsang gnas
<p>103a</p>
<p>103a.1</p>dang ni rgyal po'i khang / /'du khang rgyal po'i pho brang dang / /bde legs can dang kun nas bzang / /mdog mdzes dang ni 'phel ba can/ /dga' ba 'khyil pa la sogs dang / /gzhan yang sgo sgrigs sogs kyis phye/ /khyad par bkod pa
<p>103a.2</p>'od rnams spel/ /dbang phyug ldan pa'i pho brang gi /khyad par gzhan yang sbyin sogs 'gyur/ /btsun mo'i khang pa sa spyod ma'i/ /nang dang pho brang srungs ma can/ /dag pa'i mtha' can kun nas 'gogs/ 4 /yang tog dang ni/ khang bzang ste/ /ya phubs
