<p>103a.3</p>dang ni dgra khang ngo / /dbang po'i sgra dang / aM ga ka /man+da ni nI ba lang ra/ /glang po mchog gi ra ba la/ /ku traM ga dang / ur+g+ha Ta/ /si Tha rA zhes bya ba'o/ /sat+mI/ ka n+yA Ta niHku TI/ /grong rnams bar gyi lam po che/ /rAts+tsha zhes sad tshong khang dang / /zong gi gnas kyang de nyid do/ /lcogs chung tsa ya ba
<p>103a.4</p>pri'o/ 2 /lcags ri skyibs dang / bgrod dka' dang / /mda' yi ra ba 'di'i rtsa chings/ /ra ba/ 'obs rings/ mtha' mu khyud/ /gtam gyi lam zhes bya ba'o/ 6 /khor yug /bskor ba grong sogs mtha'/ /'od ma spa sogs las byas dkris/ /skyobs
<p>103a.5</p>dang / mtha' bskor/ brtsigs pa brtsegs/ /e Du kaM zhes bya ba'o/ /de nang rus pa so btsugs pa/ /rtsig pa b+hit+ti/ ku T+yaM'o/ /lus can khyim dang kun 'dzin no/ /sgo drung / /sgo 'dun/ sgo rtsa ni/ /phyi rol sgo yi khyams yin no/ /srang lam dang ni
<p>103a.6</p>khyim gyi 'gram/ 5 /g.yogs dang / khebs dang / bkab tsA la/ 4 /ku TI la dang / nI gra dang / /bkab dang / rab mtha' phreng ba can/ /tA ko gral bcu/ /rab rings dang / /sprin ldan/ a pa hA li kA/ 7 /sgo glegs/ ka ba/ ka bA Ta/ /a ra ra dang
<p>103a.7</p>niSh+ku Ta/ /rwa ra kaT+Ta ka zhes so/ /sgo yi dbyug gu yongs 'joms dang / /sa ro dang / swarga/ /shA zhes so/ 4 /sgo dang / srung byed/ sgo mo'o/ 3 /stegs bu dang ni kha khyer dang / /tsa tuHki kA/ lus ldan gnas/ 4 /rta babs dang ni/ phyi yi sgo/ /grong
<p>103b</p>
<p>103b.1</p>khyer sgo dang sgo mo che/ /mda' yab yongs brtsegs/ glang po'i sen/ logs can/ /phyogs sgo/ nyin mo'i sgo/ /u k+ki kI zhes bya ba'o/ 4 /rab tu bkab dang / mi snang byed/ 2 /yan lag bzhi ldan brtan pa dang / /shing 'og rdo yi ya them
<p>103b.2</p>dang / /re bzhi de yi steng du gnas/ /gong ma'i yan lag de yi 'gram/ /sgo yi steng gi shing gang yin/ /gdung sgur shing khyim thog shing rgyu/ /phug ron skyong dang bya skyibs can/ /krA ma shI rA spre'u'i mgo /zhwa yi rtse mo can zhes so/ 3 /sa bcings
<p>103b.3</p>pa dang zhal zhal lo/ /yol bas bkab dang gos kyis bcil/ /ma ta ti dang / 1 ba ta kaM /sa gzhi kha dog can zhes so/ /rlung gseng skar khung / khra ma can/ /nye ba'i mgrin ldan grong mtha' dang / /nye ba'i shaM l+ya zhes bya ba'o/ /grong dang grong bar 'dug
<p>103b.4</p>gnas so/ /rtswa phreng / rtswa yi su li kA/ /'dzeg skas dang ni them skas dang / 2 /skas ka dang ni steng du 'dzeg /2 /phyag dar/ spyod pa byi dor dang / /gtsang bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ 4 /byi dor byas dang / sbyangs pa dang / /phyag dang / phyi rol/ bya ba pa'o/ 4 /sgo
<p>103b.5</p>dang nges par 'byung ba'o/ /nges par 'jug dang / des 'gugs so/ 2 /mtshams dang / so mtshams/ khrims dang / /tshod/ /chu tshod dang ni/ a ba d+hi/ 6 /'brog khyim dang ni/ rtswa yi khyim/ 2 /'tsho byed gnas dang / rngon pa'i khyim/ grong gi sde rdzogs
<p>103b.6</p>so/ //mi g.yo/ ri bo/ rdo brtsegs dang / tshigs can gyen 'phyur 'dzin byed dang / /sa 'dzin/ ma hI d+ha ra dang / /'gro med/ mi 'gro/ ka Ta kI /yangs ldan/ rtse can/ sha Sha ra/ /rgyun ldan/ khams 'dzin/ mi 'phrog pa/ /
<p>103b.7</p>ri ljongs dang ldan/ ri bo'i ming so gcig sa gzhi 'dzin/ /rlan 'dzin/ sprin gyi so can dang / /sa skyob/ chu skyob/ sa'i phur bu/ mgrin pa can dang / brtan pa dang / cha shas che brtsegs/ kuT+Ti rA/ /sprin 'dzin/ 'byung gnas kaT+TI ra/ 21 /
<p>104a</p>
<p>104a.1</p>ki lA pa dang / nor sbyin gnas/ /nor sbyin ri bo/ tshogs kyi ri/ /dngul gyi lcog can/ dngul rab gnas/ 6 /de nas ri bdag /gangs ri dang / /kha ba rab gnas/ me nA'i bdag /dka' bzlog /bla ma zhes bya'o/ 5 /dbyig
<p>104a.2</p>gi lte ba/ me nA ka/ rol gnas/ /lte ba bzang dang gangs ri'i bu/ 3 /mtha' ri/ sa 'dzin phyi ma dang / /nub pa'i ri dang / lha'i ri bo/ 4 /shar ra nyin mo'i rtse mo dang / /mdun ri shar gyi g.yo med gnas/ /mkha' 'gro'i gdan zhes bya ba'o/ /'bigs byed dang ni/ 
<p>104a.3</p>me ka la/ chu bo/ narma dA 'bab pa'o/ 3 /dal 'bab ri dang / dbang po'i phur/ 2 /ri bo khrung khrung kau ny+tsa dang / /phreng ba can zhes bya ba'o/ 3 /bde ldan/ mid pa/ rab 'bab ri/ 2 /ri bo rtse gsum/ ngos gsum pa/ /'jig rten snang dang / 'khor yug
<p>104a.4</p>ri/ 2 /ma la ya dang tsan+dan ri/ /ri bo A ShA d+ha zhes so/ 2 /de nas ni Sha d+ha dang ni/ /darda ra dang yongs 'du can/ /spos ngad ldan dang gzhan yang ni/ /sna tshogs brtsegs pa la sogs ri/ /gangs ri dang ni kha ba brtsegs/ /rna can/ rwa can/ lha'i ri bo/ /
<p>104a.5</p>sna tshogs can dang ni Sha d+ha/ /bdun po 'di dag drang srong ri/ /rdo ba sbed byed/ gor ma dang / /tsog po/ ju bo/ stun dang rdo/ /gzhan 'joms/ pA ra/ Ti Ta dang / /sra ba/ sa 'joms shing 'joms so/ 12 /khab len/ rab 'byed/ 'o byed
<p>104a.6</p>dang / /'khor bar byed la sogs pa'o/ /rwa dang / rtse mo/ bya skyibs dang / /so dang brtsegs pa zhes bya'o/ /rdo ba'i bu dang / ri'i rus spal/ /g+har+g+ha nA la khyim gyi rdo/ 4 /btsag dang / rdo dmar/ dmar po'i khams/ /ri skyes nags kyi rgya skyegs dang / /
<p>104a.7</p>me tog sa rul ri yi gsang / /8 mkhregs pa/ kha TI/ warna dang / /re khA dang ni rdo dkar dang / /rdo ba'i khams dang sa dkar dang / /shi lA d+hA tu pra wa'o/ 8 /khams ni ldong ros mu zi dang / /ba bla dang ni cong zi btsag /5 /gzhan yang thun mong khyad par ba/ /
<p>104b</p>
<p>104b.1</p>ri las skyes pa rnams yin no/ /ri bo dang ni ri yi smad/ /ri yi 'gram dang / a dzi raM/ 4 /ri ljongs/ bang rim steng snying po/ 4 /mtha' 'khob ri dang / ri'i rkang pa/ 2 / g.yang sa/ ltung gnas/ ri gzar ngos/ /ri ngos khron pa/ ri steng chu/ /yang
<p>104b.2</p>dag 'bab dang / ltung byed pa'o/ /chu ldan/ rab 'dzag /chu 'bab dang / /chu rgyun lhung lhung sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /lhas bskos khung dang / bu ga dang / tshang tshing phug dang / ko Ta raM/ 4 /ri sul dang ni/ ngam grog go/ /sa brkos pa dang 'byung khungs sa/ /
<p>104b.3</p>ri btsan ni 'og sa gzhi dang / /ri steng dang ni sa gzhi mtho/ /lto ba brtol dang brag brtol ba/ /shwa dang ri yi bud ces bya/ /nags tshal dang ni sman ljongs dang / /'gram shing sogs kyis lto ba bkag /zhes pa ri li sde rdzogs so// //'brog dang
<p>104b.4</p>dgon pa stong pa dang / /tshal dang tshang tshing nags tshal dang / /dz+hI Da/ dA pa da pa dang / /shing ldan/ phugs can/ ni sta li/ /ta laM bAr+k+Sha/ 'brog dgon pa/ /mi med/ gzhi can/ dud 'gro can/ /skrag gnas zhes pa rnams yin no/ 17 /
<p>104b.5</p>dgon pa chen po nags stug po/ /nges 'gro khyim gyi kun dga' ra/ /bcos ma'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal/ /nags kyi kun dga' ra ba'o/ 2 /dpal gyi kun ra/ bsod nams 'bras/ 2 /'dod pa'i dgon sa/ btung mchog tshal/ 4 /smad 'tshong ma dang
<p>104b.6</p>slob dpon gyi/ /khyim gyi kun dga' ra ba ni/ /pa Ta'i shing ldan/ tsu ta'i shing / /skyes bu rtse sa skyed mos tshal/ /thun mong rgyal po'i nags kyi tshal/ /rab dga'i tshal dang rab myos can/ /btsun mo rnams kyi skyed mos tshal/ /nags ldan
<p>104b.7</p>dang ni nags tshogs can/ /de nyid rol pa'i skyed mos tshal/ /dus kyi nags dang rgya mtsho'i tshal/ /'gram gnas de yi 'gram dang ni/ /chu klung 'gram gnas dgon pa ni/ /phra mo'i kun ra rab dang can/ /lha khang gnas kyi skyed mos tshal/ /rol mo
<p>105a</p>
<p>105a.1</p>can dang mang tshor can/ /gral dang phreng ba bkod pa dang / /A li bsgrigs dang / dang ra ba dang / /mtshar dang / yA li/ 'khrigs chags so/ 9/phreng bkod/ gral rim/ mngon 'thug byas/ /sa skyes shing dang / nags
<p>105a.2</p>kyi bdag /steng skyes pa dang / rtse mo can/ /yal ga can dang / 'khor lo can/ /sdong po/ kun 'gro 'gro med dang / /na ga ku dza a gats+tsha/ /mi g.yo ka pa/ brtan pa dang / /skyed byed/ sa ldan/ rkang 'thung shing gi ming nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ 
<p>105a.3</p>dang / /rlan skyes/ /'dam ldan/ mgo ling can/ /phung po can dang / 'dab ma yangs/ /rnam rgyas 'dab can/ 'gro med/ skye med/ mi 'gro/ yal ga 'dzin/ /yal gas lhag dang / lus rnams rgyas/ /kA ra wI zhas bya ba'o/ 28 /me tog
<p>105a.4</p>'bras med nags tshal bdag /de nyid ni muD+D+ha zhes bya/ /me tog 'bras ldan tshal dag skyes/ /rkang 'thung mchod rten du brtan no/ /shing gi grib ma bstan pa'i grag /yal ga rtsa thung k+Shu pa'o/ /'dod 'jo las shing sa nag dang / u dum+bA ra dang / p+la k+Sha la sogs/ 
<p>105a.5</p>lha yi bdud rtsi las byung shing / /kA ri ba dang b+hany+dza ru/ 2 /'bras kha rdzur re 'bra go dang / a mra dang / a la ka la sogs pa/ pu 'dzin pa mo gsham min/ /'bras ldan 'bras can 'bras bu can/ /rab shar nyer byed yang dag rgyas/ /sbubs grol ba dang rgyas pa dang / /
<p>105a.6</p>rgya grol/ /nges byed/ go cha grol/ /rgyas/ 'dzum/ bya dang / gsal ba dang / /mi 'dzum pa dang shin tu rgyas/ /rnam dbye rnam gsal/ shin tu phye/ /rnam phye/ gnyid bral shin tu mdzes/ /skyes dang / byung dang / rnam rgyas pa'o/ 13 /mo gsham/ 
<p>105a.7</p>'bras med/ sgra can no/ 3 /mo gsham min pa la sogs gsum/ /brtan pa nges pa/ shaM ku'o/ 3 /myu gu/ mngon 'khrungs/ gsar du skyes/ 3 /sman dag gis ni rigs tsam la/ skyed med/ a dza ta dang / kun la sman/ /sman ni 'bras bu smin mtha'
<p>105b</p>
<p>105b.1</p>dang / /'khri shing / gu ga /lcang ma dang / /lcug ma dang ni tshang tshing ngo / /u pa sany+tsa/ sdong po dang / /mgo ling gnas dang gel pa can/ /rtsa ba yal ga'i bar gyi shing / /sdong rkang dang ni phung po'o/ 2 /yal ga rgyan dang 'khri shing ngo / /phung po'i yal ga
<p>105b.2</p>mtho ba'o/ 2 /rtsa ba dang ni ral pa'o/ 2 /yal ga'i ral pa/ kun nas skyes/ rtse bar bsdud pa/ /rtsa nas rtse mor 'khri shing son/ /shing la sogs pa btsugs pa dang / /bstod pa bsgrang dang / blang ba'o/ /mgo dang / rtse mo/ co to'o/ /rtsa ba/ smad
<p>105b.3</p>dang / rkang ba'i ming / /gong bu dang ni/ snye ma'o/ /de nyid many+dzi pal+lAM dang / /gun+d+hA+e/ 'di rnams mtshungs/ /sbal mig thon dang dzA laM kA /ko mA ri ku/ dzA la kA/ 4 /gzhon nu gsar bu tshigs kaMs pa/ 3 /kha bye ba dang / gyes pa dang / /gu ts+tsha/ k+She pa/ gu luts+tsha/ /
<p>105b.4</p>A lim+bA zhes bya ba'o/ 6 /bu tshab ba dang / mu ku la/ /me snye ma/ gong bu/ tog rab skyes skyes pa dang / /su ma na sa/ yid 'ong dang / /ku su ma zhes bya ba'o/ 6 /me tog rdul dang / yid 'ong rdul/ /me tog rtsi dang / me tog ro/ /lo ma rnyings pa/ sa ba kaM/ /
<p>105b.5</p>'dab ma lo ma/ sgrib byed dang / /da li parno ts+tsha da'o/ /sdong po'i san ma bar+d+hany+tsa/ /mgrin pa can dang / yid dga'/ urki la/ /ka da ra dang / me tog/ shu ni dang / /'dab ma'i rtse dang / dkar po'i rtse/ /sdong po can zhes bya ba'o/ /mgo ling / yal tshogs ki sha laM/ /
<p>105b.6</p>rtsar skyes sdong po lhag pa dang / 'dab ma/ shing lo/ lo 'dab/ shing gi bcud dang yangs pa dang / /shing gi brtul zhugs shes pa'o/ /lcug ma dang ni 'khri shing dang / /sdong po'i 'khri shing yA ba ka /'dab ma'i lang tsho shing gi brtul/ /'dag khu/ rdul dang
<p>105b.7</p>tsarba Da/ byu ru shing dang / lcug ma gsar/ /ma smin 'bras bu shi la Du/ /skam po rA na zhes pa'o/ /shing shun/ tso tsam/ shal kaM dang / /skogs pa'am shun pa/ shing lpags dang ni bal ka lam/ 5 /snying po dang ni rkang mar mtshungs/ 2 /rgyal chen dang
<p>106a</p>
<p>106a.1</p>ni mgo ling ngo / /khong stong dang ni nang can no/ /phra mo'i shing dang ki liny+tsi/ me shing / shing bu/ bud shing dang / /yam shing / hom shing / 'tshod byed shing / /sbyin sreg shing zhes bya ba'o/ /shing 'khri shing sogs skyes pa
<p>106a.2</p>yi/ /lo tog dang ni 'bras bu'o/ /mdud pa/ tshigs pa/ pa ru Shi/ 3 /thang chu 'ching ba/ bin+ta'o/ 2 /sman shing 'bras bu 'byung ba kun/ /a ru ra la sogs pa'o/ /a shwa tha skyes bi nu skyes/ /n+ya gro d+ha skyes ang+ga de'i/ /'bras dang / pri ha tI skyes 'bras
<p>106a.3</p>dzam+bA/ /dzam+b+hu las skyes pa/ /dzam+ba skyes dang / dzam+bU skyes/ /bi dA ri ldan rtsa ba ma/ /rang gi rtags can 'bru dang 'bras/ /me tog mal+li kA dang ni/ /dzA ti na ba mA li kA/ /ke ta kI dang gzhan yang ni/ /me tog skya snar la sogs so/ /byang chub shing
<p>106a.4</p>dang 'dab bskyod dang / /pip+pa la dang glang po'i bras/ /pA da ri ga a shwad+thA/ /ka pA te na 'dab ma snum/ /ke sha bA la p+lak+Sha dang / /rab 'gyur/ /byang chub dang ni mchod rten shing / 12 /pi 'bras gnod sbyin kha sbyor ro/ 1 /p+lak+Sha ni ba rkA TI/ 3 /byang chub shing gi ming / 
<p>106a.5</p>a ma tsUr/ bcud 'dzin byang chub shing dang / khyad par gnas sam tra gnas/ ka si r+tha'i ming / spre'u gnas/ /mA kan+da dang / rkang drug tshos/ /sbrang rtsi'i pho nya dpyid kyi shing / /bud med dga' dang / ge sar 'thab/ /pi ka'i gnyen dang / rtsa lag 'dzin/ /
<p>106a.6</p>'di ni sa a mra'i ming / hA ka ra dang / /shin tu bcud bzang zhes pa'o/ /a mra'i 'bras dang / 'bras bu mngar/ 2 /ki ka shi dang / ka ba kI/ 2 /sa na se dang / tsher can 'bras/ /tsam+bA kA lu/ gtsug phud ldan/ /mu ra dza 'bras zhes pa'o/ 5 /de yi sbubs la sa na
<p>106a.7</p>a ma khyed par ba'i ming / lhan cig byed/ sa'i/ /tA li kA zhes bya ba'o/ /ba ku la dang / shI d+hu dang / /dri ldan ge sar can zhes pa'o/ 4 /mya ngan med kyi ming / mya ngan med dang / pany+dzu la/ /chu la gar rtse/ rkang mdzes dang / /dga' ba sbyin zhes bya ba'o/ 5 /skya nar skya nar gyi mig 
<p>106b</p>
<p>106b.1</p>can shing don yod dang / /chu ldan gnas pa pA Ta la/ /me tog rtsa nag lus ngan mig /kA tsi/ s+thu lI/ 'bras bu skyes/ /'dod pa'i pho nya mdzod tha ma/ /zangs kyi me tog can ma'o/ 12 /tsam pa skyes dang ge sar can/ /nA ga ge sar rkang drug dga'/ /nA ga
<p>106b.2</p>puSh+pa zhes kyang bya/ /'di ni gser gyi me tog can/ /puSh+pa ro na/ gser 'dra dang / /thang gi kro/ klu yi ming can zhes pa'o/ 9 /ha ri dra ba 'di'i phye ma/ /de bzhin ka di ku sum+b+ha/ 2 /tsam pa ka nA ga gser gyi ming / dang / bsod nams bsung / /me tog rgyal dang
<p>106b.3</p>tsam pa skyes/ /mchog thob gser gyi me tog can/ 6 /'di yi 'bras bu ka li kA/ /dri yi 'bras bu zhes par 'gyur/ /spung pa'i ming / se 'bru shing dang / me le brgan/ tsam pa ka'i ming tog go/ /dI m+ba dang / ka ra kaM/ /'bras bu bya ba/ sad+d+ha m+la/ 
<p>106b.4</p>ne tso'i lcug ma tshigs chen skyes/ /rab skyes dang ni gong bu can/ 10 /'o ma can dang rgyal po'i zas/ /'bras bu'i bdag po zhes bya ba'o/ se 'bru'i ming / /klu shing skyes bu mtho ba dang / /ge sar can dang / se 'bru/ lha'i lcug ma/ /seng ge skrod dang / klu'i
<p>106b.5</p>me tog /kiny+dzi ra dang / ge sar dmar/ /bum can lha yi 'dab ma can/ 11 /ke ta ka dang / sogs le sgrib/ /tshad ldan 'dab ma me tog rtse/ /rtsa ba mang dang / dzam+bu 'dzin/ /sa srung skyes dang / klu yi tshon/ /shun pa dri zhim 'bab chu gnas/ /ki rmI
<p>106b.6</p>ra dang / chu bo skyes/ /sa yi dzam+bu ka rnams so/ /chu la rol dang / gzhol ba dang / /mdog mdzes ma du lang+ka la/ /skyur rtsi chen po so rtsed dang / /skyur mo/ dzam+b+hIr/ dzam+b+ha la/ /legs 'dzin/ rab gnas me tog dang / /snying rje dang ni so dga'
<p>106b.7</p>byed/ /rnam par mdzes zhes bya ba'o/ 10 /rgyal po'i 'o ma/ spre'u yi sprang / /las kyi tshon dang / las kyi cha/ 2 /rab skyur rtsi chen po ming / mchod dang ni ma la kaM/ /skyur mo btung ba nas kyi btung ba dang / /ma la ki zhes bya ba'o/ /da raM/ rak+taM ba da rA/ /
<p>107a</p>
<p>107a.1</p>mal kaM zhes pa la yang de'o/ 4 /chus gang ba dang / sa bon gang / /de nyid skyur ba'i ge sar can/ 3 /mA ru lum gI/ rul 'bras ma/ /lha ldan ma dang dri bzang can/ 4 /la ku tsa dang ni ku la/ /shing skyur dang ni shing bran dang / /phra ba'i sa na sa zhes so/ 5 /me
<p>107a.2</p>ldan ma dang / tin+ti drI/ /tsiny+tsa/ tin+ti ri yi shing / /tsukrA/ sprin gyi rwa can dang / /shing skyur yal ga skyur ba dang / /sa skyes skyur dang / shA kAm+la/ /tin+ti lI dang / dmar pos gang / /tin+ti DI ka /star bu shing / 3 /de nas bya rgod sen mo dang / /ko ni/ rgya
<p>107a.3</p>shug karka n+pa/ /bi ci la 'dog 'bras zhim dang / /'bras ldum can zhes bya ba'o/ /ko la/ shin tu dpa' skyes dang / /rgya shug g+hoN+Da/ sa stobs dang / /sa la nges gnas zhes pa'o/ 4 /'bras bu nag min/ bi gu 'bras/ /sde bzang dang ni lag 'joms
<p>107a.4</p>so/ 4 /bil ba dpal gyi 'bras bu dang / /shAN+Di l+ya dang / mA lU ra/ /ha rI rta kI/ ka pi ta tsha/ /shelU Sha dang rab mchod mig /mA gan+dA dang / ma la kAM/ 10 /'di mi sdong bu/ laM ga lI/ /nA li ke ra/ tsug ldan dang / /bu ga byed dang / chu ldan mgo/ /
<p>107a.5</p>'bras ba mi pa'i ming / ldan mgo rgyan/ bu taM drang srong gi dbye bas/ ka / bA na'i chu dang / 'bras rtag dang / /me tog rtags dang 'bras bu'i phung / /sbyang ba'i piSh+ka/ me tog sgrom/ /gnya' shing gi ming / ha DA'i 'bras can/ sa 'tsho'i 'dab/ /tA la'i rgyal dang bcud
<p>107a.6</p>skye'o/ 18 /gu bA ka dang / mkha' 'gro dang / /g+hoN+TA sdug /kra mgo lag 'joms/ /snying po tsher ma can/ /snying po can dang / dz+nyo ta'o/ 7 /so rtsi dang ni dpal mo'i bdag /gaM gA'i rtsibs ldan zhes pa'o/ 3 /gyen shugs 'bras can smin pa 'dzin/ /
<p>107a.7</p>'jam pa'i 'bras bu ldan pa'o/ /dga' byed sU ga 'dod pa can/ /thub pa'i su ga lha shing dang / 4 /rtsas rgyas/ pa yastA la dang / /ta la mi bdag su/ taM ga /'bra go mdud pa mthug pa dang / /sbrang gi 'o ma mkhrigs 'byung dang / /bung ba rtsub dang bcud skye dang / /myang
<p>107b</p>
<p>107b.1</p>bya dang ni shing thog mngar/ 8 /'bra go'i shing gi pung po la/ /sa skyong dang ni dzam+bU skyes/ /pr-i yang+ku dang 'bras ldan ma/ /sngo bsangs can dang / kA ri b+ha/ /bud med ming can sna tshogs sde/ /dri yi 'bras can/ kun+d+ra dang / /so la phyag 'tshal 'bras bu can/ /'khri
<p>107b.2</p>shing mchog ldan dkar mo dang / /dga' byed 'byung po'i me tog can/ 11/pha rol can dang / mdzes ldan dang / /mu tig 'bras dang / 'bras bu can/ /klu yi mdog ma/ so rtsi dang / /so rtsi'i lcug ma zhes pa'o/ 3 /rgun 'bru shing dang ro mngar dang / /ro zhim/ 
<p>107b.3</p>'jam ldan pa'i nu ma/ 5 /do shal byed dang / /rab dgod ma/ /khyu ldan/ dbus 'gyur/ 'chang ma dang / /tshogs can ma dang ma gnas so/ /ge sar/ gser gyi me tog ma/ /phreng ldan ma dang / yid bzang skyes/ /rgun 'brum gyi ming / /mtshan ma'i me tog mA kan+di/ /
<p>107b.4</p>mA lA tI dang ka li kA/ /yid bzang skyes dang / nI bi du/ /puN+Da ka dang 'phrog byed ldan/ /a ti muk+ta/ dpyid bzang dang / /dpyid kyi pho nya/ bya san+tI/ /sbrang rtsi skyes ma 'khri shing ngo / 8 /kun tu gyes dang nags las byung / /'dab bdun phreng ba'i gsar
<p>107b.5</p>pa dang / /sos ka can zhes bya ba'o/ /rtsa stong dang ni rgya 'jigs dang / /mal+li ka a ti muk+ta'i ming / shin tu grol ma/ dang sa yi rkang / /de nas mu ku ta ra'i/ me tog/ /bi tsa kI la/ mu ku raM/ 2 /byer ba mkhregs dang / grong gsum phreng / 2 /A sA+o tA dang / nags 'phreng
<p>107b.6</p>can/ 2 /mtshan mo'i me tog narguN+Di/ /she pha li kA/ /legs 'bab dang / /dmar po'i tshogs can bya ru can/ /sngon po can dang / ro zhim dkar/ 8/'di dkar 'byung po'i skra can no/ /ban+dU ka dang / rtsa lag 'dzin/ /rtsa lag dang ni rtsa lag 'tsho/ /dmar po
<p>107b.7</p>can zhes bya ba'o/ /rlung dga' ma dang / snying rje'i phreng / /sbrang rtsi phreng dang / ka ru Na/ 4/de nas nus ldan chen po dang / /ki ki rA ta Am+lan/ 3 /de dmar ku ru rub ka ste/ /ser na ban+du dzi ba ka'i ming / ku ruN+Da ka'o/ /Am+lan sngon po mu men te/ /bi sha ri kA /
<p>108a</p>
<p>108a.1</p>kuN+Da sngo/ /kun+da dang ni bo ra Ta/ /mchu zla mdzes dang / 'dab ma'i mdzod/ /da lA Ta ka zhes bya'o/ /ka ra bI ra so sor dgod/ /brgyad skyes/ /gtum po/ rta gsod pa/ 5 /paN+Di ta ka /ta ga ra/ 2 /paN+Di ta ga ra dang ni/ /paN+Di ta ga ra zhes
<p>108a.2</p>dang / /ka pa 'phel ba can zhes so/ 3 /ma ru ba kaM /pA rA TaM/ /au ra b+ha yi 'dabs la gnas/ /me tog dpa' bo'i lag pa/ ka ra bI ra'i ming / sa bon zhes pa dang / /tshor ldan me tog /dri med 'dab/ 7 /ha TA'i tsher can 'dul byed can/ /'dul byed rnga yab me
<p>108a.3</p>tog go/ /chu shing / pags ldan/ rtsom byed dang / /glang po'i lcug ma grol ba dang / /pA Da bu ShA/ rgyud rnams 'dzin/ /'od med 'bras can/ 'jam 'bras ldan/ /nad kyi 'bras ldan/ 'chi 'bras can/ /rtsa yi snying po mdzod lus can/ /shAl+ma
<p>108a.4</p>lI dang rlung la 'dun/ /shing 'dzin zhes pa yang 'dod do/ 16 /ma li dang ni me tog dkris/ /grol ba can zhes bya ba'o/ /de ba dA ru/ yongs bzang dang / /lha dbang rkang 'thung / shing sar dang / /ki li ma'i shing bzang po'i shing / /dA ru/ ser shing / tshi can
<p>108a.5</p>shing / /mda' 'dzin dang ni/ bdug spos shing / /sa skyes mdangs can/ shing rings dang / /'od zer 'dab can deb dA ru'i ming / sdong gi tog /sbrang gnas can dang / me tog mngar/ /legs pa'i shing dang / nags rab skyes/ /lam pa'i longs
<p>108a.6</p>spyod sbrang rtsi can/ /me tog bu ra chu skyes so/ /rkang mang pa Ta/ n+ya gro d+ha/ 3/a mra mthar byed/ pI ta na/ /sbre'u'i tsu ta/ sbre'u dga'/ /ka pi ta na zhes pa'o/ 5 /de nas yongs 'du sa brtol ni/ /rnga yab can dang / sa 'joms dang / /'dab ma bzung ldan chu
<p>108a.7</p>skyes dang / /tsam+ba ka dang / phun tshogs 'phel/ /gser gyi gdong can gser shing dang / /karbu 'joms pa nyid dang ni/ /smin pa'i dgrar yang lta bar bya/ 10 /she lu khang kan 'joms pa dang / /yongs 'du'i ming / bsil ba gyen 'joms/ 'khor mang can/ tshogs can/ ka 
<p>108b</p>
<p>108b.1</p>dam+pa'i shing / gshol ldan dga'/ /nI sa rgyun can/ tshogs can dang / /yung mdog gsal dang / me tog gi/ /rdul dang ldan pa'i tshogs can shing / /ge sar can dang / 'bras ming ldan/ /rab mchog ldan dang / rdul stobs can/ /yongs su
<p>108b.2</p>ni ma pa'am kadwI'i ming ni/ rgyud ldan nim pa'i shing / /dpa' ba'i 'dren byed/ man+dAr dang yongs 'du dang / /sa lA dang ni tsam pa ka/ 14 /pA lA sha dang / ki shu ka / pad+ma dang ni/ rgya skyegs shing / /rlung 'joms 'dab can/ 'jigs sgra can/ /gser shing me tog dmar po can/ /
<p>108b.3</p>tshangs pa'i shing dang 'dab gsum pa'o/ 11 /mig smin bzang dang / shi gru dang / /dri snom/ rgya skyegs shing gi ming / ljang ser/ ne tso'i tsam+ba ka / mig 'dra/ grol ba can/ /rab 'joms bud med/ sems 'phrog dang / /ri mo rnam par 'joms pa dang / /chom rkun
<p>108b.4</p>dang ni rtsa ba can/ 10 /de dmar mngar ba'i shing gru'i ming / shi gru dang / /su ru gA'o 'di'i sa bon/ /na le shaM dkar shi gru skyed/ 1/lung thang / a r-i Ta phe na'i/ 3 /lo ma bdun pa shun pa yangs/ /ston ka can dang / mi mnyam 'dag /lha yi bzang shing
<p>108b.5</p>dri ldan dang / /skra can/ ma rgyu shing gru'i ming / /gdon 'joms/ grangs can 'dab/ 7 /sA la'i shing dang / rtsa ba ni/ bra tsi shing / /aR+Ya/ lung thang shing gi ming / lung thang / dbu ma can/ lo ma bdun pa'i ming / rta yi rna ba can/ /'khri shing thogs med shing dang ni/ /lo tog bde
<p>108b.6</p>mchog zhes kyang bya/ 6 /sA la'i thang chu/ spos dkar dang / /me yi lcug ma zhes bya'o/ 3/chu klung pra shing dpa' bo'i shing / /dbang shing ka ku/ b+ha srid sgrub/ 5 /sA la ser po/ rtsa lag can/ /me tog dga' byed/ 'tsho byed dang / /kun za dga'
<p>108b.7</p>byed/ sA la dang / /mdor byed kaShA/ ya gu'o/ 8 /gro ga shing stag pa'i shing / gdugs khebs pags pa can/ /re ga'i 'dab dang / shun pa mnyen/ yi ge'i gzhi can zhes bya'o/ 6 /ka pi ta shing dang dad+hing shing / /so rtse la gnod skyur mo'o/ /de la
<p>109a</p>
<p>109a.1</p>zho 'bras me tog 'bru/ /so rtse nyams byed zhes pa'o/ /u dum+bA ra dzan+tu'i 'bras/ /mchod sbyin yan lag gser 'o ma/ /shun pa me tog 'bras bu bsil/ /de 'bras 'bru dang tsher ma can/ /rgyal po'i zas dang / pi yA la/ /rgyud kyi
<p>109a.2</p>shing dang gzhu yi shing / /Sha Ta dga' ba 'dzin zhes bya/ 6 /shi rI Sha dang me tog 'jam/ /chu 'thung / dug 'joms/ b+hiN+Da la/ /ne tso 'tshe dang / phyir bzlog ma'o/ 7 /shin+sha pA dang / 'dab bzung can/ /ser skya thal ba'i snying po can/ /bi ts+tsha la/ a
<p>109a.3</p>gu ru/ 6 /shal+la kI dang glang po'i zas/ /tshim byed/ cung bzang / sa skyes bcud/ /thang chu can dang / legs 'bab dang / /dri bzang ma taM/ ga skyes dga'/ a gu ru'i shing gi ming / 10 /'o ma'i ming can/ ing+gu rI/ /cha ba shing dang / dpal gyi
<p>109a.4</p>'di lcib/ gnas/ /su TaM dzi ba zhes pa'o/ 2 /ka ta ka dang / chu dngas byed/ 2 /'jigs med/ nad med/ na tshod gnas/ /tshi can/ bdud rtsi/ a ru ra/ /gser ldan/ bcud len 'bras bu can/ /zhi ba/ sems byed/ dge legs can/ /dpal
<p>109a.5</p>yon can dang / brgya byin spos/ /nad 'dor/ bde byed don yod dang / /dag byed/ lha rdzas/ lus gnas byed/ /de bzhin nad rab 'joms pa'o/ 10 /skyu ru ra dang / dpal ldan dang / /zhi byed rgyal 'bras/ 'chi med dang / /na tshod bcud gnas ma ma dang / /
<p>109a.6</p>bcud lnga ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /rab tu ra dang / ru li dang / /'byung po'i gnas dang / rtsod pa'i shing / /mig dang / tshim byed/ kaR+ShI 'bras/ /mig gi rtsa ba/ dpag bsam shing / 7 /nim+ba/ kun bzang / shing kun 'dres/ /dri can 'jug byed/ 'jam po
<p>109a.7</p>'joms/ /karka'i lcug ma/ arka dang / /sa skyes zhes pa rnams su 'gyur/ 7 /shal+ma li dang / grol ba dang / /rnying pa/ skye ngan/ pits+tsha li/ /dmar mo/ tshe brtan/ me tog dmar/ /tsa tu nI dang / badz+dze la/ 10 /gam+b+hA re dang / 'dab bzang dang / /
<p>109b</p>
<p>109b.1</p>dpal gyi lo ma sbrang rtsi'i 'dab/ /kAsma rI dang kun bzang dang / /spro byed/ kAsma ri skyes so/ 8 /kA shat+ma li/ shAl+ma li/ /snar byed phung po zhes pa'o/ 3 /bai kaM ka /dgang gzar shing / /pi kaM ka ta/ mchod sbyin shing / /rgya shug phra mo tshigs mang dang / /stag gi
<p>109b.2</p>rkang pa tsher ma zhim/ /sa 'tsho rgya shug tsher ma can/ /bre taM ka ra zhes bya'o/ 11 /a ko tha dang / zangs tsher can/ /mtshan can/ o l+lo li ka'o/ 4 /'di yi me tog mo ra Ta/ /mngar 'bras/ si le shra sI'o/ 2 /kar+sa dA ra/ a kA+o Da/ /'di dag ri la skye ba'o/ /shin
<p>109b.3</p>tu ka dang / spurdzi ka /nag po'i phung po/ rkang mar nag /4 /bya rog /zla ba/ rigs ngan dang / /bya rog 'thung gcod can dang ni/ /bya rog tin+b+hu ka yi shing / 4 /dong ka dang ni rgyal po'i shing / /me tog phreng can gser ldan dang / /'khor lo 'dra dang nad 'joms
<p>109b.4</p>dang / /legs smin/ sor bzhi pa dang gser/ /se pha li ka /gser me tog /'bras bu ring po can zhes so/ 12 /ri yi phreng ba bcad skye dang / /bi'u can/ shing skya/ /brgya byin shing / /su mtshan dbang dang nas bzang dang / /nas kyi 'bras bu can
<p>109b.5</p>zhes so/ /klu shing chu shing dkar ba dang / /tik+ka'i lo ma gzhon nu can/ /ash+ma rI 'joms zhes bya'o/ /a ti muk+ta/ ka yi shing / /ti ni pa dang 'jig byed dang / /mu khyud shing dang / shing rta'i shing / /sna tshogs byed dang / snod shing ngo / 7 /ka rI ra dang
<p>109b.6</p>kra ka ra/ /mdud pa can zhes bya ba'o/ 3 /'jam po len dang / sA tsu ka /tra sa ri Sh+yad+ha/ /bi dul/ /chu skyes chu yi be ta sa/ 4 /pe ta sa dang / bsil nag can/ /bany+dzu la dang / chu 'dong pa dang / /shing rta'i shing dang sprin me tog /mkhas pa can dang yan lag
<p>109b.7</p>mchog /7 /ni tsu la dang snye ma dmar/ /'gro chu can dang / 'bab chu can/ /chu skyes shing zhes bya ba'o/ 5 /gu gul grong dang / kau shi ka /bum can lUkha la ka dang / /mdung can sa lam dra ba'o/ 6 /mdzod ldan/ dri can/ sbre'u shing / /ro hi ro hi ta ka dang / /
<p>110a</p>
<p>110a.1</p>mchin dgra se 'bru'i me tog go/ 4/gA la ba dang shA ba ra/ /lo d+h+ra/ ti rI Ta/ ti nyu/ /byi dor byed pa zhes bya'o/ 6 /tsi ra bi lA mtshan mo'i phreng / /lag skyes/ ka rany+dza ka'o/ 4 /so sor byang skyes/ pra kIrma/ lA Ta byed skyes/ pa tI
<p>110a.2</p>ka /rtsod byed pa dang mar gyi gang / /de dbye marka Ti dang ni/ /ang+gA rang dang / bal+la rI/ /tshigs drug pa zhes bya ba'o/ /seng ldeng dang ni glu len ma/ /so rgyug byed dang shing sU pa/ /byis pa'i lus dang / rul byed dang / /'dab ma gzhon nu can zhes so/ 7 /
<p>110a.3</p>seng ldeng ngan pa tshil dgra dang / /ka da ra dang seng ldeng dkar/ /zla ba'i shun pa zhes pa'o/ /e raN+Da dang snying po can/ /dri za'i lag dang stag gi mjug /u u ru br-i/ ka gnas gsum ma/ pa dang 'bras bu can/ /tsany+tsu dang ni sor lnga pa/ /snying po 'phel ldan rlung gi
<p>110a.4</p>ma/ /rlung gi dgra dang ri mo can/ /glang po'i rnam pa stag gi 'dab/ /gnas can ma dang / gzhon nu 'o/ 12 /'di yi rang kyang smin pa ni/ /se Sha dang ni/ nA ru kaM /cung zad zhes dang sha mI ra/ /sha mI shaM ku'i 'bras zhi ba/ /pas data tu mig nas so/ 5 /saM ga ra
<p>110a.5</p>'bras sa mI ka/ /rgyal dang rgyal byed rtogs pa'i dgra/ /chu bo skyes dang / 18 rnam rgyal byed/ /gshor shing 'grol 'dzin gar byed dang / /me tog mgul rings ka T+wAM ba/ /bcad cing gar byed spal ba'i 'dab/ /bal 'dab d+yang+ku sa skyes dang / /DuN+Du ka dang / ne tso sna/ /
<p>110a.6</p>skar ma dang ni/ shwa na ka/ 13 /de nas shing gi ut+pa la/ /dong ka ba ni/ yongs snun dang / 1/a bad+ha dang / shun pa mngar/ /bya rog u dum+ba/ ri kA/ phil+phu ma ra bU rdza dang / /g+ha na 'i 'bras dang / dpyid kyi shing / /mtshan mo'i me tog dga' byed gnas/ /rab
<p>110a.7</p>tu ba ka bsdus pa dang / /lag pa'i tshong 'du ma/ swA sha na/ /mgrin pa'i zug rngu myos byed dang / /chos can/ pits+tsha la dang shun/ /'khyog po'i sde zhes bya ba'o/ /shun pa/ nub shing / ne tso sna/ /thub pa'i sdong po zhes bya'o/ /sin+du bA ra/ /sin+du ka/ 
<p>110b</p>
<p>110b.1</p>sa ra sa/ /sin+du pA ri ka /nirgu N+Di ni kA ka/ 6 /sgur 'khyog rdo rje'i tsher ma can/ /bal po'i shing dang / rma byed dang / mi'i gdong / b+hal+lA ta kAng karma la pan dang mya ngan byed/ /srin po 'joms dang me'i rkang 'thung / 10 /shing chen dang ni dz+ha Tal/ /dri can skya
<p>110b.2</p>nar/ khros pa'i shing / 5 /sha za'i shing dang / 'bras bu ser/ /yal gas khyab dang / grib mas 'gebs/ 4 /dpal gyi lo ma ku mud can/ /bum can/ kai Darlu dang / ni/ /tsha ba len zhes bya ba'o/ 5 /zhu mkhan paT+Ti kA khya dang / /pa Ti la dang / dmar po len/ /
<p>110b.3</p>rgya skyegs dang sa byed ces bya'o/ 5 /'deng byed/ gso byed/ rim pa can/ /tshangs sha tshangs pa'i mchod sbyin shing / /nyer sbyor shing dang / tshangs pa'i shing / /ra tu dang ni tu la ya/ 6 /kan+da ra la bong bu'i sgong / /chu 'thung ngos bzang / p+la k+Sha'o/ /chu klung
<p>110b.4</p>skyes dang / sa'i dzam+bu/ /nag po'i phung po ta mA la/ /piny+dza kA dang mchu can na/ 4 /nag mo skyes dang / pi ts+tshi'i 'dab/ /ha r+t+ra dang ni/ 'dab ma 'jam/ 5 /dpal gyi lo ma mi bsrub dang / /rked ldan/ dal byed/ rgyal ma'o/ 5 /dpal ldan dang ni thig
<p>110b.5</p>le can/ /k+Shu ra ka zhes bya ba mtshungs/ 3 /zung du skye dang / hin+d+ra ma/ /de yi 'bras bu gi ri Ti/ /skyed mos tshal dang nags kyi rab tu byed pa'o// //mchu can dang ni rgya mtsho'i mtha'/ /ras bal can dang rgya shug go/ 6 /nags
<p>110b.6</p>de b+ha ra d+h+wa dzA'o/ /ras bal srad bu'i me tog can/ 2 /e 'bar ma ni mu b+hik+Sha/ /b+hA ta kI dang skye byed ma/ /zungs kyi me tog me tog can/ /myos byed gnas ma zhes par 'gyur/ 6 /smyo byed ke ta ba/ d+hurta/ /d+hu ku ra dang / gser ming can/ /skya nar chen po d+hu
<p>110b.7</p>tu ra/ /me tog snying can/ kA ha la/ /mA tu la dang / myos byed do/ 11 /a sma pha la la ni mA ru la su tra ka dang / ho Da puSh+paM dang / dza bA dmar po dang / dmar po'i gong bu dang / stan mchog go/ 5 /dza ba'i shing la ni ma ho Ta dang / rdo rje'i me tog dang /til
<p>111a</p>
<p>111a.1</p>me tog go/ /sau ma ri ya ga ni/ dz+hiN+Di yin te/ de dmar na bu ba ka dang / /se ban ku ruN+Ta ka ste/ dz+hiN+DI de dang lhan cig spyod pa gnyis so/ /dzIN+DI sngon po ni gnyis te/ nags kyi 'bangs dang / tshogs can ut+pala'o/ /'di na rtig la'o/ /de nas klu'i lce dang / ba
<p>111a.2</p>ri sihA'o/ 2 /arka'i 'dab ma la/ rma 'o ma can dang / nor can dang / 'gags pa can dang / sna tshogs dang / pits+tsu ra dang / nyi mas mtshan pa dang / man+dA ra dang / sna tshogs kyi gzugs can dang / rnam par 'thor byed/ 'di la ne tso'i 'bras bu zhes pa'o/ 11 /'di dkar na a larka dang / rab tu gdung ba can no/ 2 /kathiSh+Tha ra ni/ 
<p>111a.3</p>brnas te/ ku thi ra ka dang / ku thil+la ka dag go/ /'di dkar na ardza ka dang / dri'i su can dang / bu thi ra ka'o/ /sa mI ra Na dang / ma ru ba ka dang / bras+tha puSh+ba dang / ha nidz+dza ka dang / dzam+bI ra'o/ 2 /de nas hrI be ra ni lha'i sgra dang / chu'i ming can to/ /dA la dang / dri'i chu
<p>111a.4</p>dang / bar+b+hiSh+Ti dag go /gany+dzi ni dbang po dang / A sa ni ma'o/ /ka ni zhi ba'i lcug ma yin te/ /bu ka dang / phyugs bdag dang / nor dang / e kaSh+ThI la zhes pa'o/ /pI Thi ni tsi tra ka dang / me'i ming can te/ 'joms byed dang / snun byed dang / chu nad 'joms
<p>111a.5</p>byed do/ 5 /shing za ba dang / sri srid 'gro ba dang / 'tsho byed dang / bya rog skyes dang / shing skye yang de'o/ 5 /de nas 'od ldan ma dang / til ser can dang / phug ron can dang / ing+gu rI dang / ro kha ba dang / 'dor byed dang / dka' thub sbyar dang / shing shun
<p>111a.6</p>dang / phug ron rkang dang / ka Ta b+hI dang / 'khri shing dang / pi n+ya na dang / sarka TI'o/ 3 /gu DU tsi dang / rgas med dang / ba dzA dang / rgyud can dang / hi twA ka dang / mri tA dang / pu bras dang / bcad skye dang / yangs pa dang / sbrang rtsi'i 'dab ma dang / 'tsho
<p>111a.7</p>byed dang / zla ba'i lcug ma rnams so/ 12 /sha tha 'joms na phu na rta bA'o/ 2 /sab+ta lA dang / kr-iSh+Na lA dang / sle tres/ gser can dang / kA kA ny+tsi kA dang / guny+dza dang / /brag mchog dang / dzA tsa ru lA dang / sa bon dmar po can dang / du rme ShA dang / du byed
<p>111b</p>
<p>111b.1</p>ma dang / 'dab ma dmar po dang / gtsug gi nor bu yang de'o/ 3/kim+bA ka la ni/ ma hA kA la dang / u tu kA la'o/ 2 /de nas sap+ta lA dang / dri'i rdzas dang / dri med ma dang / lA ta lA dang / dbu ba mang po dang / tsarma ka Tha zhes pa yang ngo / /nag po dang / 
<p>111b.2</p>u ba ku l+ya dang / lus 'phags skyes dang / pispa lI dang / g.yo ba dang / zegs ma dang / u Sha Na dang / mA g+ha d+dI dang / ko lA dang / sna ring sa dang / rtog med ma zhes pa rnams so/ 11 /mdud ba can dang / pispa lI dang / rtsa ba tshigs zug pa dang / 
<p>111b.3</p>bi kA shI ra rnams so/ /spre'u 'i lcug ma dang / ko la'i lcug ma dang / dge legs ma dang / glang mo'i pi spa li dang / ba si ro nA rnams so/ /de nas tsa ki ka dang / dbyi mo dang / gzi brjid ma zhes pa yang ngo / /mdog med skyes dang / zla ba'i lcug ma dang / 
<p>111b.4</p>lcug ma bzang po dang / zla ba'i rgyal mo dang / lug nag ma dang / 'bras nag ma dang / bA gA dzi dang / rul pa'i 'bras bu yang ngo / 8 /shu dag dang / dri mchog dang / mdung ma drug pa dang / tshigs brgya pa dang / sa yi spu dang / dag phan dang / dri rtsub
<p>111b.5</p>zhes par 'gyur ro/ 7 /de nyid dkar po la gser ldan ma zhes so/ /yung ba la ni ni shA dang / mdog mdzes ma dang / mdog mchog dang / ka TaM dang / ka me ri dang / rul ldan ma dang / gser ldan ma dang / gser 'joms ma dang / ser mo dang / khu ser ma dang / gnad sA lA dang / 
<p>111b.6</p>shI sI dang / ta pA la kA dang / la bA dang / pra g+ha rA NI rnams so/ 16 /de nas 'o ma dang / rnam par 'jo ba dang / mtshungs so/ /e la'i shun pa dang / dri bzang dang / pra tsi kA dang / pags pa las byung ba dang / sa mo dang / zla ba gzhon nu ma dang / niSh+ku Ti
<p>111b.7</p>ba hu lA dang / tsa bA dang / sbom mo rnams so/ 9 /sug smel dang / ru tA dang / ka rang gI dang / phur ma gsum pa dang / gcod byed dang / phug ron mdog dang / ma la ya skyes dang / u pa ku ny+tsi kA dang / shing ldan dang / 'dab ma dang / shing ser
<p>112a</p>
<p>112a.1</p>dang / ka TaM ka Ti dang / ka TaM ka Ti rI dang / sI ta dru dang / dus su skyes pa dang / ljang ser mdog dang / paR+Ya n+ya dang / paR+Ya byA dang / pI ta kAShaThaM dang / bI ta na ra kaM rnams so/ 21 /le brgan dang / bi ka kha dang / dzing+gI dang / yang dag
<p>112a.2</p>lus ma dang / lus nag ma dang / sbal pa'i 'dab ma dang / b+hAN+Da rI dang / b+haN+Di ya dang / chu'i lcug ma dang / dri bzang rtsa ba dang / rlung 'joms ma dang / bkra ba'i 'dab ma can ma rnams so/ 12 /gaN+Thi par+Ni dang / mdud pa'i lo ma dang / ka ba skyes
<p>112a.3</p>dang / /mdud pa can dang / dri bzang dang / shing dkar dang / ne tso dang / rma bya dang / me tog sbom po/ kuk+ku ri rnams so/ 10 /sbrang can dang / shing mngar dang / klI ta kaM dang / ma d+hu yaSh+Ti kA dang / yaSh+Ti ma d+hu kA rnams so/ /de nas nang can dang / 
<p>112a.4</p>ru rta dang / mr-it+pa lo laM dang / lus ngan skyes dang / 'od 'bar dang / bya ba dang / yongs su bsgo ba dang / smin pa can dang / dbyug pas mtshan pa rnams so/ /'di'i rtsa ba pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / dpa' bo rgyas byed dang / k+Sh+mI ra dang / /pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / 
<p>112a.5</p>Nai rnams so/ 5 /mon gyi tik+ta dang / sa'i nim pa dang / mon skyes ma dang / 'gro byed tik+ta ka dang / yun rings tik+ta ka dang / gser can rnams mtshungs so/ 7 /sa'i tshor gzem ma dang / sa'i 'gyur byed can dang / tsher ma gsum sbyar ba dang / k+Shu ra dang / 
<p>112a.6</p>sa lam ka Sha dang / bur shing dri dang / so dang / cher ma mngar ba dang / thang gi rwa can dang / ke rwa ye rwa can dang / kha dog gsum pa rnams so/ 11 /bur shing dri dang / kAN+Di k+Shu dang / khu byug mig dang / k+Shu ra dang / k+Shu ra'o/ 6 /u Sh+ya pra sto dang / mi 'jigs 'dab
<p>112a.7</p>can ma dang / rtsa ba brgya ma dang / brgya mchog ma dang / sred med dang / bu mangs ma dang / 'jigs med ma dang / dbang mo dang / ba rI ba rA dang / A he ru rnams so/ 10/u Sh+ya pro k+Sha ni/ spre'u mo dang / paM ka sim+ba kA dang / bdag sbas ma dang / skyes ma dang / 
<p>112b</p>
<p>112b.1</p>h+yaN+Da dang / kan+tu rA dang / rab char 'bebs ma dang / nags kyi mi 'dra dang / spre'u sngo can rnams so/ /rwa can ni u Sha b+ha dang / aSh+Ta baR+Sha pa ti ta/ de'i u Sha b+hA Sh+ya ni pr-i Sha'o/ 3 /ba lang bsrung ba'i 'bras dang / klu'i stobs dang / mjug ma dang / 'dab ma can
<p>112b.2</p>dang / gang+ge ru pA tsa dang / shin tu stobs ma dang / u Sha dang / thung du ga be t+yu kA rnams so/ 7 /ba la'i dbye ba la lu ti pA lA dang / ba lA dang / ba tit+mA dang / spyod pa'i me tog ma dang / bA t+ya la gen ri'o/ /go d+hA pa dI ni legs 'bab ma dang / 'dab gsum ma dang / ngang pa'i rkang ma yang
<p>112b.3</p>ngo / 4 /a spo tA ri'i rna ba yin te/ khyab 'jug gnod pa dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / ba lang zas dang / gi ri ka Sh+la dang / thang gi me tog pa dang / ba shi yang de'o/ /de nas ba ka na smin pa'i ma dang / seng ge ma dang / bA sa kA dang / bri ShA dang / gnas can
<p>112b.4</p>ma dang / a Ta ru Sha dang / seng ge can ma dang / rta so can rnams so/ 8 /ku nas 'o ma dang / A bI dang / gaN+Da dang / rdo rje du bU ka dang / sgu hI dang / gu hA ma rnams so/ /bi DaM ga dang / don yod dang / 'bras dang / 'bras khra bo dang / kr-i ma/ rma stuM dang / stu la dang / khe l+laM dang / 
<p>112b.5</p>rak+ta br-in+lA dang / kai ri lA rnams so/ 98 /dga' ba ni/ drag po'i dri dang / tshangs pa'i ngag dang / ya mA naM kA dang / hr-I R+Ya dang / gsal byed ma dang / dga' ba'i dngos po ma rnams so/ 7 /gzhon nu ma dang / ta ra tsi dang / s+t+ra ha'o/ /skra'i rgyal po dang / klu'i
<p>112b.6</p>bdud dang / ba rA tu/ b+h+r-ing+ga so dar rnams so/ 4 /bung ba dang / bung ba'i rdul dang / bung ba'i rgyal po dang / mArka kI dang / dzA ga rA'o/ 5 /bA ya nI dang / kA ka mA tsI dang / bya rog zas dang / bcud len no/ 4 /sa ha bra be b+hI dang / tsa kro m+la dang / btab dang / sa
<p>112b.7</p>ta be d+hI'o/ 4 /rtseng+ga rI dang / tsu kri kA dang / dgu sha thA dang / braSh+Ta dang / mU mo ni kA dang / k+Shu rAm+mA dang / 'dab ma phra ma dang / 'dzin byed ma dang / a m+be ro l+yi kA rnams so/ 9 /shing a bA mA rga la shai khA ri ka d+hA dang / mA rga ba dang / rma bya can dang / pra h+ya kya
<p>113a</p>
<p>113a.1</p>r+Ni dang / kI sha bar+Ni dang / ki Ni hI dang / kha ra many+dza rA rnams so/ /ang+g+ha D+ha dang / tsher can 'bras bu dang / slI ta g+ha dang / sha ta suSh+bi ka rnams so/ 4 /ruN+Di kirI dang / rak+ta pha lA dang / gzugs can ma dang / ma d+hu ba Ni
<p>113a.2</p>dang / bi baM ka dang / chu srin ma yang ngo / 6 /de nas bi tul+la ka dang / dz+nyA TA ma lA dang / dz+hA Ta tA li dang / zhi ma dang / tA ma lA kI b+ha tsI dang / sde tshan bu mo dang / phra mo'i 'bras bu dang / ad+h+yaN+DA ba b+hU myA ma la hi yang ngo / 9 /badzra pa s+ya s+thi dang / saM hA ra dang / ha sti
<p>113a.3</p>shun+Di dang / ba lA li kA dang / da dru da la dang / bA tu Tha dang / a rim kuN+Di ka rnams so/ 7 /lhar bcas ma dang / lhan cig ma dang / sna tshogs lha mo dang / ut+pal yu ba ma rnams so/ 4 /phag nag ma dang / nyi ma bsgyur dang / /hu lu hu lu yang de'o/ 5 /
<p>113a.4</p>pauN+Da ri kaM dang / pauN+Da t+ya'o/ 2 /sho thi D+ma ni bU na rA Sha'o/ /chu klung shing dang / 'khyog po dang / an+to la ka dang / kats+tsha dang / lus ngan can dang / tun+na'o/ 6 /dung can ma ni chom rkun me tog ma dang / sgra can ma'o/ /so ka can dang / kri b+hi ra Ta dang / la
<p>113a.5</p>mdzes dang / nags kyi tik+ta rnams so/ 4 /bak+ShA Na dang / bad kan gyi snying 'dab mar byed pa dang / glo nad 'joms byed do/ /tshangs ma ni nya mig ma dang / na tshod gnas dang / zla ba'i 'khri shing zhes bshad pa la sogs pa 'dab ma dang / lcug ma'o/ /pa Tu'i
<p>113a.6</p>'dab ma dang / gser ldan ma dang / gser byed ma dang / gangs can ma rnams so/ 4 /d+hA mArga ba dang / sgra can dang / A hA ko ShA ta kI dang / ko Sha ta kI dang / mdzod 'bras rnams so/ 5 /dra ba chen po dang / sa ra can no/ /zug rngu yang ma dang / sh+li khA dang / mtha' yas ma dang / 
<p>113a.7</p>'bras ldan ma dang / brgya byin me tog ma yang ngo / 5 /be NI kha rA dang / ga rI dang / lha mtshungs dang / char sprin zhes pa yang ngo / 4 /lug gi rwa dang / me dru'i rwa dang / rwa can ma dang / rwa'i rwa can ma'o/ 4 /br-i d+hA dA ra ka la ni dzang+ga dang / A be gI dang / ts+tsha ga lAn+ti kA dang / 
<p>113b</p>
<p>113b.1</p>riSh+ya gan+d+hI yang ngo / 6 /spang spos dang / mi sI dang / 'byung bo'i ral pa dang / ral pa can dang / dri'i rdzas dang / dka' thub can ma dang / ral pa 'dzin ma dang / rgyun sbyin ma dang / ral pa'i spu can ma rnams so/ 9 /dri'i 'dab ma dang / stobs bzang ma dang / 'gro byed ma dang / rab 'gro ma
<p>113b.2</p>dang / /ka Tam+b+ha ra dang / rgyal po'i stobs dang / dri 'dzin ma dang / 'byor pa'i dri ldan ma rnams so/ /ra mUrbA dang / lha mo dang / ro ma dar ma dang / mo ra TA dang / rno byed ma dang / sru b+hA ma d+hu li kA dang / d+ha nu dang / she NI tha/ kar+Ni dang si'i lu/ par+Na yang ngo / /rgya spos dang / lha mo dang / 
<p>113b.3</p>lha dang / phreng ba dang / ser sna dang / yang sha'i 'khri shing dang / bya ba'i tshad dang / rgya mtsho'i mtha' dang / pa d+ha lang kA dang / sAM kA zhes pa yang ngo / 10 /de nas rwa can dang / bong nga nag po dang / bong nga dkar po dang / shin tu dug dang / 'od dmar dang / sman chen dang / 
<p>113b.4</p>nye ba'i dug dang / dug spun du gnon pa dang / bal+la rI rnams so/ /rma bya dang / bye ldan snang dang rta bong mig dang / mgo dang / rma bya'i gtsug phud kyang ngo / 5 /de nas mu h+ya lI dang / tA lI rtsa ba can no/ 2 /rnam par 'joms pa dang / 'o ma dkar po
<p>113b.5</p>dang / bur shing dri dang / rnga mo dang / grags ldan ma'o/ 5 /gzhan 'gyur la rnam 'joms dang / dkar chen dri ldan ma dang / 'o ma can ma dang / rtsa ba mngar ba dang / byi la can no/ 6/brjod ldan dang / rang gnas dang / rig pa'i rna ba dang / 'jog
<p>113b.6</p>med ma dang / dpal mo dang / bcud ma dang / gnas gcig 'dzin dang / sA ya ba lI dang / rab bsngags dang / nags kyi tik+ta rnams so/ 10 /tsha ba dang / tsha ba 'dzin ma dang / mya ngan med dmar po dang / nya'i 'byor pa dang / lus ngag mig dang / 
<p>113b.7</p>'khor lo'i lus dang / bya'i zas rnams so/ /sngon mo dang / nag mo dang / rdul ma dang / mchog dang / nya mo dang / spang gi 'dab ma dang / dpal 'bras dang / tut+thA dang / tU nI dang / 'degs ma dang / sngon mo ldan ma rnams so/ 11 /dgra stas gcod ma dang / dgra sta can
<p>114a</p>
<p>114a.1</p>ma'o/ 2 /'bras can ma dang / legs mthong ma'o/ /'dri byed lo ma dang / lo ma so so ba dang / tsi Ta pa NI dang / rkang ldan ma dang / lcug ma can ma dang / rnga mo'i 'byor pa dang ngo / /seng ge'i mjug ma dang / cha shas grub ma dang / nags thug ma rnams so/ 3 /phyogs
<p>114a.2</p>des ma dang / reg ldan ma dang / stag ldan ma dang / gri hA NI dang / kaN+Da kA ri dang / rab tu skul byed ma dang / rig ldan ma dang / phra mo dang / reg dka' ma dang / yul 'khor ma rnams so/ 10 /'od ma phra mo dang / ku kuny+dza dang / lag 'joms rnams so/ 3 /blo 'joms ma dang / nyung ngu 'joms dang / 
<p>114a.3</p>bang+ka bA Di rnams so/ /thams cad rjes su 'byor dang / ma 'joms ma dang / phung ma gsum ma dang / gsum skor ma dang / dur byid dang / tshangs gsum ma dang / 'dor byed ma rnams so/ 7 /sngo bsangs ma dang skyong byed ma ni sde bzang ma ste/ kA lA ma su dang / 'das bral ma dang / zla ba phyed pa
<p>114a.4</p>dang / lug nag ma rnams so/ 7 /nA ku li dang / bcud bzang dang / gan+d+hA dang / gan+hA nA ku lI dang / na ku lA dang / 'dod ma dang / lag 'gro mig ma dang / gdugs can ma dang / legs 'bab ma zhes pa yang de'o/ 7 /rnam 'joms ma dang / dri myur ldan ma dang / 'dab ma mtho ba dang / brtan ma dang / 
<p>114a.5</p>nges ma rnams so/ 5 /ri dgas dri dang / 'khyog po dang / lha min ma dang / ta la'i 'dab ma dang dri ldan ma rnams so/ 5 /rab thob ma dang / glang po dkar po dang / da dru 'joms 'khor lo mthong dang / pad+mA TA dang / u ra Na zhes bya ba la yang ngo / 7 /'khor 'o ma mtshan pa ni sman chen te/ dug 'joms
<p>114a.6</p>dang / mag+tI'o/ /g+har+Na bA Ni sha NaM dang / me tog can no/ /rungs dang 'byor pa ni a d+h+ya zhes bya ba'i sman gyis grub pa ste/ dpal mo dang / bkra shis ma dang / rtogs byed ma dang / dga' ma dang / prA Nad dang / thub pa spros dang / 'phel ba ste 'di dag ni mtshon pa 'di rnams ni/ barba raM dang / ba rba tI ki dang / 
<p>114a.7</p>barba rI k+Shi dang / barba ri puSh+ThatA zhes pa la 'ang ngo / /barba rA ka ba DI dang / mthon po ma dang / ba ra brnga DI dang / yal ga'i me tog ma dang / 'phro ldan ma rnams so/ /e la'i lo ma ni/ legs 'bab ma dang / raspA dang / pho bcud ldan ma gang de'o/ 4 /dI dza/ gnyis skyes ni/ re na kA dang / kan+ti
<p>114b</p>
<p>114b.1</p>dang / ha ri Ni dang / thal ba'i dri dang / ser skya mo rnams so/ 6 /mung+ga'i lo ma ni/ bya rog mung+ga dang / lhan cig pa zhes kyang ngo / 3 /rtag 'jug ma ni/ 'dar byed skyes ma dang / zla ba'i lo ma dang / bzod chen ma rnams so/ 4 /shing tsha dang / 'dab ma dang / pUt+na
<p>114b.2</p>TaM dang / mtho ba dang / shun pa dang / tso tsa dang / lus mchog can rnams so/ 7/ga pur dang / trA bi tra ka dang / 'od srungs dang / rig byed gtso mo rnams so/ 4 /sna tshogs sde'i dga' ma dang / gr-i Sh+Ti dang / phag mo dang / rgya shug dang / phag gdong zhes pa
<p>114b.3</p>yang de'o/ 5 /skyob byed ma ni/ ri ngos skyes dang / phra mo skyes dang / rA tsi kaM dang / skyob ma dang / nags tshal bzang mo rnams so/ /kr-i twa shIR+Sha dang / mngar ba can dang / shing+ga hra so swAd+ga dzi ba aSh+Ta brga ya ti ta s+ya dzi ba kA s+ya kAH 'dab skum ma dang / ngo tsha ldan
<p>114b.4</p>ma dang / nor can dang / ba su twaT+Ta ka'o/ 2 /bkra ba dang / nyer bkra dang / n+ya gro d+hA dang / pra ban+tI dang / sham+ba rI dang / pr-i ShA dang / pra t+ya k+She NI dang / su ta shre NI dang / raN+DA dang / byi ba'i lom rnams so/ /hany+dza kA dang / bram ze dang / bad+mA b+hA rgI dang / bram ze'i
<p>114b.5</p>mchod sdong dang / sol ba'i mdo ma dang / skob skyes dang / bak+Sha shA dang / bi shA ka dang / barba ta bar+d+ha ha rnams so/ 9 /reg dka'/ d+ha nA yA sha dang / du byed ma dang / yIl ya nI sa dang / kats+tsha rA/ mtha' yas ma dang / rgya mtsho yi/ tha ma rnyed dka' ka Na
<p>114b.6</p>sa'o/ 10 /sa 'tsho'i bu mo mtha' yas rtsa/ /me tog phra mo k+Shi Ni ri/ /ba lang srung ma sngo bsangs ma/ /sngo bsangs 'khri shing / sA ri k+Sha/ /mtha' yas ut+pa la sA ri k+Sha/ 9 /mi yi gtsug phud la'ang ga li/ /gshol ldan ma dang smra byed ma/ /rab gdung ma dang go
<p>114b.7</p>byed ma/ /rang dbang ma dang mi gdong ma/ 2 /de nas bya rog byin pa la/ /bya rog lus dang bya rog sna/ 2 /dri yi rdzas kyi i la dA/ /ka me la ya dri bzang dang / /gser bye ma dang / bye ma can/ 5 /de nas sa laM kI la ni/ /mu kun Tu dang gu du dang / /ku tu ru zhes bya ba'o/ 
<p>115a</p>
<p>115a.1</p>sbrang rtsi dang ni 'tsho byed ma/ /'tsho byed/ 'tsho ma/ 'tsho ldan ma/ 5 /na tshod gnas dang / sde brgyad dang / /kA ko lI dang / A lI dang / /'bras bu zhi ma dang / lang tsho gnas/ /de nas ma kU la ka dang / /bum nges glang po/ son can
<p>115a.2</p>gyi/ /so so'i phreng ba dag dang ni/ /u dum+bA ra'i 'dab kyang ngo / /nad med ma dang shin tu spyod/ /pad+ma spyod dang pad+ma mchog /lam skyes spyod ma rnams yin no/ 5 /kAm+bi mU dang / karka sha /zla ba lus dmar gsal ma yang / 5 /gzhan gyis mi thub d+ha ta ka /shI te
<p>115a.3</p>ma dang / sha ni 'dab/ 4 /dArbi ka dang / ba lang lce/ /da rbi 'dab ma can dang ni/ /gser gyi 'o ma can yang de'o/ /me tog brgya ba kA ra bI/ /a ka k+bu Sh+pi/ gdugs dkar dang / /shin tu gdungs dang mi si dang / /ma d+hu rA zhes pa rnams so/ 78 /ra ba skyes dang si ba
<p>115a.4</p>dang / /mngar ldan mi sI g.yo ba dang / /ne ste ya zhes pa rnams so/ 6 /kun tu reg dang / dza tu byed/ /skyed ma bye ba zhes bya dang / /mchod sbyin ma dang / dzi rU kr-i ta/ /'khor los sgyur ma rnams yin no/ 7 /sha TI sha thi kar+ts+tshu ra/ /mdud pa drug pa tri'i sha ShI/ /sa lA
<p>115a.5</p>sa dang spos kyi rtsa/ 7 /sbubs ldan byu ru'i 'khri shing dang / /phug ron rkang dang gar mkhan ma/ /don bzang rdzas kyi sdong bu'o/ 5 /skye ba'i skra dang / d+ha ma n+ya/ tan+ta haT+Ta bi lA dang / /sbos rdzas sI nI zhes bya'o/ 4 /nya phyis dung dang / rmig pa dang / /ko la'i 'dab dang sen
<p>115a.6</p>mo yi/ 5 /na kha'i/ alba Ta ki dang / /bya rogs dang / sbyong byed ma/ /sa can yul 'khor skyes pa'o/ 5 /'khyog po gang byed grong bcu pa/ /stobs skyes pa ra sa la kaM/ /rkyal 'gro/ sngon 'gro/ rkyal mchen pa/ /ke ba Ti zhes bshad 'di rnams/ /gla sgang ming du
<p>115a.7</p>blta bar bya/ 8 /gcan gzan mtshon cha/ stag sen dang / /lag skyes 'khor lo byed pa skyes/ 4 /dus rjes 'brang dang gzhi 'dzin bsil/ /rdo yi me tog /rgan po dang / /brag las byung dang brag las skyes/ 6 /tshogs bde dang ni srin mo dang / /gtum mo nor 'phrog
<p>115b</p>
<p>115b.1</p>bde bam dang / /bu ngan tshogs dang 'bangs mo dang / 8 /gaN+Di'i me tog/ Do ka Ta/ 2 /gaN+Di ra dang / mnyam gnas 'dzin/ /nye ba spyod dang / sha maN+Tha/ /'di la chu yi rma bya can/ 5 /dpal gyi lag ldan b+h+ru rU N+DI/ /'bras bu/ be b+h+ra/ ki Ta laM/ /ku ri bin+da sprin
<p>115b.2</p>ming can/ /masta dang ni/ musta kaM /guN+Da/ rdul can/ se ru'o/ /gtsug phud 'dzin dang 'bras gang dang / /skyong byed 'khor lo 'dzin guN+Da/ /kra ma ka dang mkha' yi grong / /i tri ka dang / shi lIn+b+hAM/ /i du lI raM dang / kan+da laM/ /lus bral bcud
<p>115b.3</p>lngar/ sa dang ni/ /sgeg pa dang ni ba ka'o/ 7 /yal ga nag po dus skyes dang / /shA tha dzi hwar sA ta kaM/ 4 /gzhi can dga' byed yal ga dpa'/ /tsan+di rA laM/ sprin dri med/ /Tak+ka'i yul can/ sAM shu'i 'dab/ /dngos po can zhes bya ba rnams/ 8 /rtsa ldan
<p>115b.4</p>pa dang / lte ba'i 'dab/ /zhing skyes dang ni dben par spyod/ 4 /sA ta ki ni myos byed rkang / /'khri shing mchu dang / steng phur dang / /mjug ma can zhes bya ba'o/ /shA li dang ni/ san+du ra/ /lcags gsod pa dang / yul 'khor che/ /ba rA TI bris/ mA ri Sha/ /
<p>115b.5</p>pa To la dang / sa bdag 'bras/ /tik+ta/ karka shi yi 'dab/ /ya Tu dang ni ka la kaM/ 6 /'di yi 'khri shing / kA li kA/ /rtsa ba dga' byed/ dI brin+ta/ /sen mo dang ni runy+dza la/ 2 /ka Ta mab+ha rA 'dab ring dang / /chu bo zhags ldan ka la mabI/ 4 /hi la mo rtsI tshangs ma'i chu/ /
<p>115b.6</p>nya lus ma dang 'di rnams mtshungs/ 3 /bi tun+d+ra rka/ 'dab ma'i zhing / /legs gnas dang ni tsu tsu'o/ /'dab bu can dang shog shing dang / /pi spa lI dang / bya yi zas/ 4 /seng ldeng ba dang ni yid byed ma/ /mnyam lus 'dud dang / dbu ba can/ /sdong nag /shu ka
<p>115b.7</p>bar+b+rA dang / /ma 'dod pa dang / mthun pa can/ 7 /tA ri TI dang pA ra kI/ /b+ha rA dang ni tso ti kA/ /rtsa ba pA TI ra dang ni/ /glang po'i so dang / rgyal po 'jig /rtsa ba che dang / rtsa ba lci/ 4 /lag pa/ 'ug ldan/ pe tsa'o/ 3 /sgog pa kun dong su kan+da/ /me mo/ spre'u du pru
<p>116a</p>
<p>116a.1</p>mo/ /de nyid ljang gu sman chen no/ /sgog skya/ ke'u/ a riSh+Ti/ /rA pr-i hra ta siSh+Ta/ /rA son/ tsha ba'i rtsa ba/ rtsa ba cha/ /kla klo'i spros te 'di rnams dgu/ /de nas ma d+hA lu ka la/ /lha yi lo ma tsher ma med/ /'bras bu'i me tog /pa raN+Da lu/ /gaM
<p>116a.2</p>gA ra gnas 'dzin yu ta'o/ /bde legs mau ta/ dpal gyi mgo /su ra ki ts+tsha bar ma can/ /kab+dI'i rgyal dang / gdugs kyi bu/ /thang gi pad+ma nga rgyal can/ 6 /kab+dI/ kan+dA/ ya la ga'i khyon/ /bi taN+Da dang / nga rgyal chung / 4 /'ded byed/ skem byed/ 'brum pa
<p>116a.3</p>'joms/ /ka ra bel+la/ kA thi lU/ /steng dkar ba dang / pa rA ru/ rang ro/ ba ku la'i sa bon/ /de ni rA dza ba ro li'o/ 7 /'di rnams sa dza kuSh+maN+Da/ /lo rgyus ma dang / mtshan ldan ma/ /rab tu tshugs dka'/ b+haN+Da kI /'khyog po 'phel ldan chen po dang / /bil
<p>116a.4</p>ba'i yal ga /bA rta kA/ /bA DaM gaM Na/ sa lA dang / /ro bI/ brtA rnams yin no/ 12 /kuSh+maN+Da dang / nag mo dang / /rgyal po'i sbal mo zhes so/ 3 /byo ma can dang / sbal mo dang / bA ru/ gshin ldan lo ma shA/ 3 /de nas dgas dang sbal pa dang / /'gas byed/ 
<p>116a.5</p>bI ru/ nya phyis rnams/ /shAr+Ni briN+ta/ bde gnas dang / /mA lut+ti na/ te mi ShA/ 4 /de nas ba lang mig dang ni/ /go du m+bA dang / glang po tsi b+ha Ti zhes dang / kaM ka chen mo zhes pa rnams/ 5 /yangs pa chu lha'i dbang mo dang / /dbang mchog/ ba las gzhan pa dang / /
<p>116a.6</p>nags kyi me tog ces pa'o/ 5 /bur shing / tsha ba'i tu mIr 'gyur/ /tum+b+ya lA/ shU du sh+tsi kA/ /lA bu kaM/ grong ku ShamAN+Da/ paN+Da ti n+ti li kA rnams so/ 6 /'od ldan ma dang / skya nar dang / dra ba can dang rnga zlum byed/ /'bigs byed dra ba mang po dang / /dra ba ring dang
<p>116a.7</p>ring mo dang / /rak+ta pa To li ka dang / /de la ko sha ta kI dang / /rnam par rgyas dang sdong bu rings/ 12 /rtsa ba'i 'dab ma rab skyes dang / /'bras mchog mda' 'phags/ pags pa bye/ /rany+tsa kaM dang / ba kA dang / /da sha d+hA shA ki zhes brjod/ /'od ma pags pa'i snying
<p>116b</p>
<p>116b.1</p>po dang / /karmA dang / shun pa'i snying / /ki lA Ti na tshigs brgya pa/ /tshigs bzang rtsa'i tog /rtsa'i rgyal mtshan/ /'od ma nas kyi 'bras bu dang / /sa bon gyis 'chi 'gyur med dang / /brjid ldan rnga zlum ba tI na/ 26 /ka rI ra dang 'od ma dang / /karka ra 'o gang yang
<p>116b.2</p>ni/ /rlung gi sgra sgrogs bi shA dang / /ki tsa kA ste de dag 'chi/ /'od ma 'di yi skye ba ni/ /rgyud dang 'bras bu nas 'bras ldan/ /muny+dza sar bra dang ni/ /dza Na ka dang guN+Da ste/ /de ltar 'di rnams mtshungs pa yin/ /ku sha ku Tha darba dang / /dag byed dang ni mchod
<p>116b.3</p>sbyin rgyan/ /bar+d+hi dang ni khrus kyi rtsa/ 14 /dA rbA dang ni tshigs brgya pa/ /brtson 'grus stong ldan rdul med dang / /ngan spong skyes dang ljang ser can/ /skye zhing gnas dang sa yi 'dab/ /mtha' yas dang ni dkyil 'khor can/ /glang sbu brtson 'grus brgya pa dang / /sdong
<p>116b.4</p>bu 'dzin dang / bya yi mig / 14 /mdzod byed pa dang / bcud 'dzin dang / /bur shing ral gri lo ma can/ /gu Da da ru mngar ba'i rtsa/ /shiSh+Na'i tshigs dang 'o ma 'dzin/ /'o ma mngar dang / ro mngar dang / /me tog 'chi dang bcud chen po/ 14 /'di yi rtsa ba mo ra Ta/ /
<p>116b.5</p>tshigs la ta ra Ta zhes bya/ /dbye ba dgon pa'i bur shing sogs/ /ku na lI dang a na lA/ /mkha' ni po Ta ka la dang / /kun+dza la ka d+ha ma na/ 4 /yal 'dab la ni skabs chen po/ /gsal ba po Ta gal dang / /nags dgod pa dang / dz+yal+lu lA/ pya rog bur
<p>116b.6</p>shing spyad byag zhon/ /i k+Shu gan+dA zhes bya'o/ /sa la rtsa lag skye ba'o/ /iDa ka Ta rtsa ba'i sde/ /mdzod kyi yan lag rtsub pa'i dbang / /dpa' byed dang ni ches dpa' ba/ /dpa' bo'i me tog d+ho ba'i dgra/ 4 /'di yi rtsa ba shir ma dang / /pad rtsa'o de nas chu la
<p>116b.7</p>nyal/ /'jigs med bsten byed na la dang / /nags tshal bsregs dang 'dod dang lam/ /lA madz+dza ka zhes pa dang / /yang ba'i gnas dang 'khrug ces bya/ 11 /ka rA ma su ri zhes bya'i/ /rtsa ni shin tu dri bzang can/ /bau ra shin tu dri bzang can/ /lha skyes ka rau ti
<p>117a</p>
<p>117a.1</p>ka'o/ 5 /gdugs dang shin tu gdugs dang skyong / /gdugs kyi rnam pa rtswa'i bye brag /se g+hau zhes bya ba'o/ /phreng ba'i rtswa dang sa yi rtswa/ 2 /sha Sh+yaM dang ni rtswa gzhon nu/ 2 /rgyal ba nyer rgyas phyugs 'dzin no/ 3 /thun mong ma yin rtswa skye ba/ /kun tu skye dang rtswa dmar
<p>117a.2</p>ro/ /rtswa rnams yang dag bsdus pa ni/ /rtswa yi stan dang rtswa'i phung po/ /ku sha la sogs pa yi rtswa/ /'dab ma ljang gu can la sogs/ /'bra ko dang ni ke ta ki /tA li be+e tal sogs lnga/ /hin+ta la dang bcas pa ni/ /thams cad rtswa dang shing gi ming / /sman gyi
<p>117a.3</p>rab tu byed pa'o/ /zhes pa mu tig phreng ba las nags dang sman gyi sde'o// //seng ge 'phrog byed ri dgas dbang / /ral can gdong lnga/ nga ro can/ /mche ba ldan dang / mig grol dang / /yongs su dbang dang / nags kyi rgyal/ /gtsug phud lnga pa 'jigs byed dang / 
<p>117a.4</p>rnam par gnon dang / tshogs kyi rgyal/ /glang po 'tshe dang / glang po 'joms/ /ri gnas/ 'phrog byed/ mig dkar ser/ /nam mkha' gnon dang / cha sha 'jigs/ /ri dgas za byed/ mdzod ldan dang / /ma ru t+pal zhes bya rnams/ 26 /'di yi sgra skad/ bu
<p>117a.5</p>kwa ra/ /k+She Ti ta zhes bya bar 'gyur/ /gang yang sha ra b+ha dang ni/ /steng rkang can dang sha rdul/ /rkang pa brgyad pa glang po'i dgra/ 5 /de nas phyugs 'tshe sha zan dang / /gcan gzan 'tsho byed zhes bya yang / 4 /stag dang dri snom 'tshe byed dang / /gung dang gcan
<p>117a.6</p>gzan ri dgas za/ /nags kyi khyi dang yu bA ku/ /zla ba can dang / lus bkra'o/ /ri dgas dgra zhes bya ba'o/ 11 /dred dang ri dgas za byed do/ /phag dang gtsang byed ko la dang / /sa 'joms sa 'byed mche ba can/ /rko byed/ 'thor byed/ g.yang byed dang / g.yang byed/ 
<p>117a.7</p>sa rlog /mche ba'i mtshon/ /'byed byed dang ni/ su rengs dang / /mgo bo g+ha rmA khab spu can/ /nags kyi hi ra/ ngur sgra can/ /sa rko ba dang / rna chen dang / /mchu rings dang ni 'khor lo'i gdong / /dga' rings/ mang skyes/ rab skye mang / 25 /dom la lats+tsha
<p>117b</p>
<p>117b.1</p>b+ha lU dang / /b+hA l+mu kAl lu b+hal+lA ga /b+ha lu kA dang / ats+tsha dang / /phug du nyal/ spu rings dang / /a ba ba du/ ngan pa'o/ 9 /de nas bsel/ khaD+ga dang / /rwa can dang ni/ pr-I Ni dang / /spro ba'i tshogs dang / gtsigs pa can/ /de la ka ni mchog yin no/ /
<p>117b.2</p>ma he la ni lu lA ya/ /gshin rje'i bzhon pa rol pa can/ /rdul can dang ni rta yi dgra/ /dA ba si kA sa ra dang / /sai bi b+ha dang / puk+Sha dang / mig dmar dang ni hi la gnas/ /'jigs pa bcu pa rdul ldan ma'o/ /ga ba la dang / ma he skyes/ /shi kaM ka tA/ ma he'i bu/ /
<p>117b.3</p>stag sogs nags na rgyu ba yi/ /dud 'gro rnams ni gcan gzan brjod/ /spre'u dang ni/ mi dang 'dra/ /kI sha dang ni/ gi tha dang / shing gi ri dgas 'phrog byed dang / /spre'u rgyug byed mchod byed dang / /yal ga'i ri dgas nags na gnas/ /gnyer ma gdong dang 'gro
<p>117b.4</p>byed dang / /'phar byed 'khri shing ri dgas dang / /sa yi mjug ma kaM khi dang / /kwA s+ya 'dzin dang / dmar po dang / /shin tu dam pa zhes bya'o/ 20 /mi dang 'dra dang bya ba byed/ /ba lang mjug ces 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /spre'u las byung spre'u rnams kyi/ /rtsed mo la
<p>117b.5</p>sogs rnams su 'gyur/ /ce spyang dang ni sa la rgyu/ /ri dgas khram pa ba lang 'tsho/ /ngan g.yo ma dang / zhi ba ma/ 'gro byed/ sgra sgrogs/ slu byed dang / /sa myos/ khyi 'dra/ 'jigs dang 'dra/ /gnas dang / ce sbyang / pri ka ngan/ /phra ma can dang sa
<p>117b.6</p>mdzes dang / /mtshan mo'i ri dgas tsheg sgra can/ /hU yi sgra can mtshan mo pa/ /ca co can dang / zhi ba 'dzin/ /'dzin byed pa lang rengs pa dang / /smin pa dang ni 'khor byed pa'o/ /gyen gdong dang ni lce 'bar dang / /ki khi khi dang 'gro byed dang / /rnga mo lo sA zhi ba gnas/ 8 /
<p>117b.7</p>khri nyal/ rul ba'i rwa can no/ /khri gnas 'gro byed/ khrus mkhan dang / /nags kyi khyi dang / nags na gnas/ 5 /ba men/ ba lang rjes su byed/ 9 /lug can/ byis ya/ thob byed dang / /'jam dang / rwa can/ stobs sgrib pa dang / /ba lang dang ni rims
<p>118a</p>
<p>118a.1</p>nad med/ /ri bong dang ni/ spu 'joms dang / /nags kyi byi ba/ sgeg pa'o/ /zhum bu byi la khrus mkhan dang / /byi ba gsod dang / byi ba za/ /mtshan mo spyod dang / byi zas can/ /kun tu la dang / grong gi spre'u/ /'dor byed
<p>118a.2</p>dang ni/ lus skum dang / /gong bu'i mig dang / dkyil 'khor can/ rnam sgrol mig dang 'bar ba'i mig /shi shu zer/ me nA dor/ kan+da lA/ /gzugs mo byi dur/ sbra byed dang / /shrA bi Ta dang / sha l+ya'o/ 2 /de yi sa ni l+ya 'dod/ /sha lA kA dang / sha la yI/ 
<p>118a.3</p>sha la laM/ sha laM'o/ /dpal be'us mtshan dang / ta Ni shA/ /'phar ba nags kyi ri dgas gsod/ 4 /rna ba/ bA ta/ pra mrI'o/ 2 /gla rtsi'i ri dgas gla ba'o/ 2 /ri dgas pags pa'i skye gnas te/ /sa lus dang ni/ sa 'dre ba/ /ri dgas/ rlung bsreg /mig
<p>118a.4</p>mdzes dang / r-isti/ a ri/ sh+yan dang / /rnam 'tshe/ 'jigs ldan/ sgra la 'jigs/ /mya ngam snying dang ko lo gu/ 13 /e ne ya dang / shai l+ya dang / /tsa rmA g+haM dang / e ma s+ya/ ka ta li dang / gser mdog can/ /tsi na g.yag rgod/ dga' byed dang / /ba pa
<p>118a.5</p>sa mU ru ri dgas/ /'di rnams pags pa'i skye gnas so/ /gzhung nag ru ru myaM ku dang / /aM ku sdom pa skyed byed dang / /ba lang rna ba/ ri dgas dang / /e NaR+sha dang ro hi ta/ /tsa ma ra dang / ri dgas dang / /rta dang / mdzes dang / dga' byed sogs/ /
<p>118a.6</p>gzhan yang ri dgas dbang sogs dang / /ba men la sogs rnams dang ni/ /phyugs kyi rigs rnams shes par bya/ /dpyid dang ni gau d+hA ra/ /te'u lo pa dang dag skyes so/ 3 /byi ba/ u Du ma/ kun+du/ /pr-i Sha/ 'bigs byed/ rkun po dang / rko byed dang ni/ bu ga
<p>118a.7</p>ba byed/ /br-i Shas mtshan dang / br-i Sha'i mig /ba b+hu/ sen rings/ kun chags so/ 13 /'di yi dga' ma/ rkun byed ma/ /zhan ma dang ni rtags can ma/ /rig mtshan ma dang bye gzhan ma/ 6 /tsik+ka/ khyim gyi sre mong dang / /br-iSha/ dri yi byi ba dang / /ts+tshu ts+tshun+da rI ts+tshuny+tshu yang / /
<p>118b</p>
<p>118b.1</p>rtsangs pa dang ni/ mig sman rtsa/ 7 /kr-i ka lA sa sog le can/ /nyin sa ba dang ral gri can/ /tse dA ra dang / rtswa'i da byid/ /rtsangs phran dang ni khyim gyi rtsangs/ /mthu bo dang ni khyim ldan dang / /mdung can ltas shes tsa TaM gi /gshol ldan dang ni/ bkra ba dang / /rgyal
<p>118b.2</p>ba bzhon pa chen po'o/ 4 /byed pa/ ka rA/ Ti kA dang / /rna chu/ ka sha ta pa Ti/ /'bu dang / grogs sbur/ nI laM gu/ /rkang brgyad pa dang / 'bu phran no/ /lte ba bal can spre'u 'dra dang / /thur ma can dang / dra ba can/ /sdom dang / thags mkhan zhes
<p>118b.3</p>bya'o/ /'dis bcings/ rgya dang 'dra ba'o/ /rta shig pa dang sdig pa'o/ /'bu phran dang ni sbur bu dang / /'bu nar dang ni mjug ma can/ /ba mi/ za byed/ ka ba Ti/ /nye lus nye bar phyogs pa dang / /skra 'dra/ nye ba'i lce can no/ /grog ma dang ni/ srin
<p>118b.4</p>phran dang / /gshin rje'i bu dang / g+hu rgyu ra/ /dar gyi srin 'bu/ /skud pa'i bu/ rtsa 'bu/ shing zan yi ge pa/ /steng gi sha dang ma ku sha /mdud can skye ba phra mo'o/ /phyugs la sogs pa'i rab tu byed pa'o// //mkha' 'gro yan lag drug pa
<p>118b.5</p>dang / /mkha' la 'gro dang / mkha' la 'phur/ /pa ta 'ga' dang / 'dab gshog can/ /'dab skyob dang ni/ 'dab mas skyob/ /bya dang / sgro ldan/ sha kun+da/ /sha kun+ta ya bi ka re/ /bad+ki ra dang / nam mkha'i rta/ /mkhar nyal/ tshong las byung ba dang / /
<p>118b.6</p>'dab ldan gshog ldan/ nam mkhar 'gro/ /dge mtshan can dang / lus mgyogs dang / /'gro byed 'dab ma'i shing rta yab/ /mkha' la spyod byed me yi mgrin/ /spu can dang ni gnam la spyod/ /na tshod gnas dang / mkhar 'gro dang / /tsany+tsu dang ni dr-il+lI tsA/ /
<p>118b.7</p>dzA ne ka dang gnyis skyes dang / /lce gnyis pa dang / kI kI shA/ /steng 'gro dang ni shing la gnas/ 38 /'dab ma'i theg pa na tshod gnas/ /br-i pa lA k+Sha ta ru sha /dpyid kyi pho nya ngag snyan dang / /yud+hAr+b+ha la bi ka dang / /ku hU'i mgrin ldan phrog byed gtam/ /mgrin
<p>119a</p>
<p>119a.1</p>snyan kha nas ku hu 'don/ /nags su dga' dang / gzhan gyi gsol/ /khu byug dang ni gzhan gyis rgyas/ /'dod pa'i pho nya ma d+hu kaN+Tha/ /'dod pa'i tA la/ ku hU snyan/ /mig mdzes dang ni bya rog gsos/ /dbyangs
<p>119a.2</p>mkhas/ su tra rnga na dang / /dbyangs snyan 'bras bus nam mkha' 'gro/ /nags la rag lus gzhan la sems/ /khu byug skad dang lnga pa dang / /sbrang rtsi'i sgrar yang de brjod do/ 27 /rma bya/ sa 'gro/ mdangs ldan dang / bkra ba bkra ba'i 'og pag can/ /
<p>119a.3</p>gtsug phud can dang rtse mo can/ /ko ki'i sgra can rab g.yo dang / /ki sha ra dga' mgrin sngon can/ /si tA sang+gA zhes bya dang / /'brug sgra'i rjes su sgeg pa dang / /rna rgyan can dang sen mo'i gar/ /gtsug phud can rgya mtsho skyes dang / /'dab brgya pa dang / 
<p>119a.4</p>sprin gyis sgeg /me nA da dang mgul pa sngo/ /mjug sgro can dang / legs bris sgro/ /sil sil sgrogs dang lag 'gro za/ /shed la brtse dang brtan par grags/ /gar mkhan ri mo dmar ser can/ /byi dor byas pa'i mgrin ldan pa'o/ 30 /rma bya'i thig le u
<p>119a.5</p>ruN+Da/ /mjug ma mdongs ldan de bzhin du/ /gtsug phud dang ni rab g.yo'o/ 4 /zla kham dang ni mdongs lon no/ 2 /thod dang gtsug phud nyid kyang ngo / 2 /ko kI'i tshig ldan gtsug phud can/ /bya rog la ni gtor za dang / /sgra ldan dang ni/ mau ku li/ /kha ta bo na ga 'chi med/ /gtor mas rgyas
<p>119a.6</p>dang / brgya byin skyes/ /lhan cig skyes dang bdag nyid sgrogs/ /dga' bas/ rgyud dang thos sgrogs dang / /'khrig pa sbed dang / luN+DA ka /dri pa sa dang / kA na dang / gzhan gso byed dang / drod gsher spyod/ /bden pa'i ngag dang / rab dga' dang / /lte ba skyes dang g+ha kA sgrogs/ /
<p>119a.7</p>dbang skye sU trI/ dwika tra/ /Nau pa ra 'chi/ dpa' bo can/ /kA Nu nga dang / kA ku shes/ /rilbA ta li gtam can dang / /lan cig dga' dang tsher ma'i tshang / /rdo rje mchu can mdog gcig pa/ /sgrogs ldan zhes pa rnams su 'gyur/ 36 /bya rog chen po kA ko la/ /rag+ha
<p>119b</p>
<p>119b.1</p>bya rog mau ku li/ /bya rog mnan dang / bya rog nag /'chi ba slu ba zhes bya'o/ 7/de nas 'ug pa nyin mo 'jigs/ 7 /bya rog dgra dang / be tsa ka /mtshan mo spyod dang dri bAn+da/ /brgya byin bshad dang / rna 'khyog dang / /'phrog byed mig dang / /bya rog 'jigs/ /sen mo shI
<p>119b.2</p>sI g+ha g+ha bo/ /mtshan mo za ba rnams yin no/ 12 /dmar ser la ni se rtsi ka /'ug pa/ tsa Ti kA yin no/ 3 /kr-ik+tA/ gtum mo/ ri skegs dang / /myos byed thur ma/ rjod byed ma/ mig bkra ma dang rkang bkram/ /mtshon byed brtod pa'i snyem pa'o/ 9 /rnam par 'gro byed ku Na yI/ /
<p>119b.3</p>sa 'thor dang ni go rA Ta/ 4 /bya gag /sa gnas/ bA li ka /kr-i mi dang ni ku ku sgrogs/ 5 /ne tso/ 'dab ma za ba dang / /'thor byed yid gzhungs/ tsa sh+tsi mi/ /blo gsal shin tu gnas pa dang / /'khyog po'i mthu can zhes bya'o/ /sau d+b+hA kI dang / mi gnas dang / /
<p>119b.4</p>ngag skyes/ dbang po/ 3 sgra dang / /spyod byed sbrang rtsi sbrang rtsi 'dod/ /sbrang rtsi brtul zhugs/ sbrang rtsi byed/ /sbrang rtsi myang dang sbrang rtsi skyong / /sbrang bu me tog zas can dang / /bung ba nyam chung sbrang ma dang / /me tog 'jug
<p>119b.5</p>dang / me tog rtse/ /ra yi gnyis pa bcud brtul zhugs/ /ge sar 'dzin dang bcud 'dzin dang / /rdul 'chang / skems dang / bcud sbyin dang / /rdul nyal me tog 'thor ba dang / /sbrang rtsi'i dri myang gser spyod/ /des ni cha shas mthun sgra dang / /ri skyes dang na
<p>119b.6</p>spos dang ldan/ /ro myong mchog dag skad cig 'dres/ /snying por son pa zhes bya rnams/ 33 /sI ba ba ta/ sgra snyan dang / /skad cig 'dod ldan 'gyur dga' dang / /rab tu dang dang / ku k+ku Ta/ /dz+nyIl+lI sgrogs dang / khyim phug ron/ /bA rA ba ta/ ka pa ta/ /ka pa ka ni
<p>119b.7</p>phug ron no/ 2 /Dom+bI'i ba rA ba ta ni/ /kha cig khyim gyi phug ron no/ /khany+dza rI Ta/ ka NA TI na/ /khany+dza le kha/ kha ny+dza na/ /bzang ming gra dang / ni Shi sta/ /rta lo gyu ni/ bu can dang / /bya rog skugs dang / mgrin nag dang / /ni d+hi ra ta/ sha ra ta/ /ka rka ra'i mig /
<p>120a</p>
<p>120a.1</p>ston ka spyod/ /tshang sbas/ raT tsa ra dang / /tsa Ta ka'i/ rgyal char mtshon byed dang / /char lha dga' ba'i sil snyan dang / /khany+dza ri Ta lan cig dga'/ /lan cig tu m+bi zhes bya rnams/ /23 /hA yi bu mo/ yungs kar ma/ /bzang mo
<p>120a.2</p>khany+dza li kA dang / /ma can/ sA rang+ga/ ban+di/ /thub pa'i bu dang / si ta dang / /khug rta dang ni/ chu nyung dang / /sprin 'degs/ sprin rlong / spri shaM ku/ /char la dga' dang / dga' sgra sgrogs/ 10 /khug rta gzhon nu tsA sI ha/ /zangs kyi gtsug phud kr-i ka sgrog /
<p>120a.3</p>bya gag rkang pa'i mtshon cha can/ /snga bar sgra sgrogs mtshan mo rig /mig zlum ka lA bi ka dang / /sA la 'gro mkhas tsa Ta ka /zung gi dbyangs sgrog mtshan mo skad/ /bde legs can dang yongs su mig /dga' byed/ gso byed 'phel byed dang / /pags pa'i
<p>120a.4</p>gtsug phud mya ngan med/ /nor bu'i mgrin can 'od kyi ste/ 21 / mchil pa ka la ping+ka yin/ /rgyab bkra/ khyu mchog bgrod pa dang / /mgrin sngon bkra ba'i rgyal po dang / /khyim du tshong byed/ khyim du nyal/ /rigs can dang ni/ nyer chags rnams/ 10 /de yi chung ma mchil pa
<p>120a.5</p>mo/ /bu ni tsA Ta kai ra'o/ /bu mo tsA Ta kai ba hi/ /ri dgas dbang dang / mchil ba sogs/ /gsod mkhas/ 'dzin byed 'joms byed pa'o/ /tsi r+Na dkyil 'khor can spyod byed/ /mkha' spyod dang ni ring du smra/ /'pho ba mgrin tshang mkha' la 'khor/ /rlung gcod pa dang ring
<p>120a.6</p>'dor ro/ /de nas bya rgod/ dA k+ShA t+ya/ /ring du mthong ba zhes bya'o/ 3 /khra dang ri bong za ba dang / /ba TI bA dzi mkha' la 'gro/ /g.yo ba zhes bya rnams yin no/ /tit+ti ri da/ gshog bkra dang / /sha chu ka biny+dza la'o/ 4 /byang chub b+ha ra/ dwA dza'o/ 2 /khrung khrung / kruny+tsa 'khor la
<p>120a.7</p>gnas/ /biSh+Ta ling+gA mdog can no/ /lA ba ka dang / 'gro nyung ngo / /kuk+ku b+ha ni ku lA la/ /ku kU Ta dang / bu ga'i dbyangs/ /sdu mchan/ dud pa du ba/ sreg pa dang / skyes/ /a Ta'i rgyal po/ gshog ldan dang / /hing+ga ka zhes bya ba rnams/ 6 /karka re Tu/ ke ra Ta/ /
<p>120b</p>
<p>120b.1</p>ka Ta Tu dang / ka rka rA/ 4 /shing rta mo dang / shing 'joms dang / /mgrin ring dang ni 'dab brgya pa/ /kr-i ka Na dang / kra ka ra'o/ 6 /tsA sha/ kI ki di bi dang / /gser gyi gtsug phud ma yi rtags/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro'i rgyal po'o/ 4 /shang shang te'u dug 'chi dang / /'tsho ba
<p>120b.2</p>'tsho byed/ tAn+dA la/ 4 /'od la dga' dang / mchu g.yo dang / /tsa ko ra dang / dug mtshon byed/ 4 /rA ti/ rA Ti 'dam bu'i dgra/ /mgrin ldan/ gzhon nu/ dA rgyu ta/ /mgrin dkar dang ni/ a t+yu ha/ /kA ko mang+gu/ /k+'a thA d+hu rA/ /gi gA tsil+mi/ de baT+Ti/ /sna tshogs
<p>120b.3</p>can chu'i bya gag /4 /mat+pa ra ka /dz+hA m+bA NAM/ /ma Ni tsa ka /chu'i mang+gu/ 4/TiT+Ti D+ha dang / ka Tu'i sgra/ /steng 'gro dang ni/ nyal byed do/ 4 /rgyang grags thos dang / sgra sgrogs dang / /ku ta rA dang / nya 'joms so/ /dur pa 'khor lo/ 'khor lo can/ /shing rta'i lus kyi ming can
<p>120b.4</p>dang / /gnyis gnyis sbyor dang mkha' la gnas/ /'od ldan mtshan mo 'bral byed do/ 8 /lcags rgyab dang ni/ kar+d+ha dang / /rkang ring ko la'i mjug ma can/ 4 /ga le gan+Da/ brka Da/ /chu skyar ka la haM ba yin/ /chu can rkyal byed mang+ga dang / /ki kA dang ni nya 'bigs
<p>120b.5</p>byed/ 4 /sprin gyi bya dang gtsug phud can/ /mchod stong can chu'i kuk+ku b+hA/ /go b+haN+Da ra/ 'dam 'thor ro/ /rgyal po'i cod pan/ hA'i bu mo/ 8 /bya dkar/ ba ka / kaM ka dang / /ra ko ta dang / ni she ta/ /kaM ka tu tra/ gtor ma za/ /zla ba'i gtsug phud mkha' 'gro
<p>120b.6</p>dang / /khyim gyi gtor za/ rkang ring dang / /bi na dang ni thob byed do/ 12 /ka ke ru ka pa lA ka /dug gi mgrin pa can rnams so/ 3 /bzhad dang rdzing bu'i mtshan ma dang / /sgra 'byin ka rtsing+gu ra'o/ 4 /ngang pa mkha' lding dkar po dang / /'chi med 'dzin dang / ma dros gnas/ /dra
<p>120b.7</p>ba'i rkang ldan mtsho yi bya/ /'khor lo'i yan lag grong 'joms so/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po mchu dag dang / /rkang pa dmar po/ lus dkar po/ /dri ma can gyi phreng 'dzin dang / /yul 'khor skyong dang dang skya'o/ /pak+Shi rA d+h-Is ngang pa/ /ka la hi sa zhes kha cig /ngang
<p>121a</p>
<p>121a.1</p>pa'i chung ma ba ra Ta/ /bzhad mo dang ni dpal mo'o/ /bi kha'i khu byug de yi yang / /khu byug gi ni bal+lu b+ha/ /rtsod pa byed dang tsu pr-i ti/ /khyim bzang muN+Da ka ser po'o/ /bcad nyams dang ni gang ba dang / /gzhan spro dang ni/ til snum can/ 
<p>121a.2</p>ga ro d+g+hA d+hI/ 'bras bu'o/ /dbyangs ldan nam mkhar sgeg pa dang / /bkra ba'i skad 'byin zhes pa'o/ /de nas zho can zho tshogs dang / /zho yi gnas zhes bya ba'o/ /pha baM/ pags byi'u/ /b+had+kA rI/ /pags pa'i 'dab can/ dza tu nAM/ /khyim 'gro dang ni bya rog dgra'o/ /
<p>121a.3</p>bA gu li dang / ba gu dang / /ta ru hu ni kA ra Ta byAM/ /d+ha na ts+tsha kA zla ba 'jug /btson lus bya rog mgo zlum spyod/ /'dab chags bye brag hA rI ta/ /kA raN+Da pa brta kA/ /tu ni kA dang / spo Ti kA/ /mtshungs so gzhan yang phye ma leb/ /cha ga pa dang me khyer dang / /
<p>121a.4</p>mun 'joms nam mkha'i mu khyud 'od/ /mkha' snang dang ni nam mkha'i 'od/ /mun sel/ /lam 'od/ 'od sa bon/ /sa DA rbu dang zhes bya rnams/ /lci sbur sngon po ma k+ShikA/ /sbrang ma dang ni sbrang rtsi skyes/ /grog ma put+ti ka yin no/ /sbrang rtsi ches nyung sar sdu/ /
<p>121a.5</p>sbrang gi sbrang bu sbrang bu'i dbye/ /bi kaM dam sha b+ha m+b+ha DA/ /nags kyi sbrang bu b+hi ra DI/ 4 /za byed sbrang bu de rigs gzhan/ /ba rA TI dang / gan+d+ho li/ /ga ro l+li dang tshangs ma dang / /bar TA dang / dug rwa can/ /b+h+r-ing+ga Do la/ pa Da la/ /rtswa bra byed pa rnams yin no/ /b+h+r-ing+ga
<p>121a.6</p>DI dang dz+hI ru kA /tsI rI dzi l+li kA dag mtshungs/ /sbrang gshog can dang dbyangs sgrog dang / /dbyangs byed/ sgra byed/ bzi bzir yang / /lham bu chu gshegs sdong po'i 'bu/ /de dbye srar ba ka dang / /lan cig 'bu dang gzhan byed dang / /dus can b+hak+Sha rA Ti k+Sha/ /
<p>121a.7</p>nag mig dang ni srin bu dang / /u s+si ka dang / nyi me tog /bya spu gshog pa sgro dang ni/ /'gebs byed lo ma lus skyes so/ /dpung pa/ gshog rtsa/ pak+Sha ti/ /gshog sgro'i phreng ba a ri ny+tsha lI/ 'phur dang 'gro la'o/ /rab tu 'phur dang shin tu 'phur/ /yang
<p>121b</p>
<p>121b.1</p>dag 'phur/ rab 'di rnams ni/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bya ba'o/ /sbubs dang / mdzod dang / shubs sgo nga / 4/mchu dang gcod byed/ nyer 'dzin can/ 3/rigs dang / lus/ yan lag /gsar skyes/ byis pa/ bu phrug dang / phrug gu/ /
<p>121b.2</p>bum bu/ /bye'u/ 7 /pho mo 'dus dang / 22 dang / zung dang / dor dang / kha 'tsham dang / /gnyis ldan gnyis pa mtshe ma dang / /phrugs dang / bubs zhes bya ba'o/ 8/tshogs dang / don mthun/ spyi 'dus pa/ /tshogs pa/ phung po/ tshogs 'du ba/ /
<p>121b.3</p>bsags pa dang ni spungs pa'o/ /yang dag tshogs dang bsags dang tshogs/ /'dus pa sde dang / dra ba skyes/ /br-in+da/ dkyil 'khor/ ku dum+ba/ /ni ka ra dang / sto ma dang / /bi sa ra dang / prA sta dang / saM m+mA dang / saM na ya/ /khaN+Da/ sa mu da ya
<p>121b.4</p>dang / /k+Sha twau dang ni ba Ta yaM/ /saM ha ti dang / ni ba ha/ /ni tsa ya dang / tsakra dang / /tsakra bA laM/ ka lA pa/ /bi Da ka dang / pra ka ra/ /sa ri ka ra/ yU thaM yang / /zhags pa skra las gzhan tshogs pa/ /grong gi sgra sogs sngon ma can/ /tshogs pa'i
<p>121b.5</p>dbye ba sde tshan mtshungs/ /rigs mthun dang ni/ chos mthun pa/ /de yi rigs dang mtshungs pa dang / /'dus dang don mthun rigs skye'o/ /dud 'gro'i khyu dang phyugs kyi tshogs/ /gzhan rnams la ni 'dus par 'gyur/ /'ga' zhig don mthun tshogs pa'i tshogs/ /
<p>121b.6</p>phung po/ mchod rten/ spungs dang / tshogs/ /brtsegs pa'o phug ron tshogs dang ni/ /ne tso'i tshogs dang rma bya'i tshogs/ /sreg pa'i tshogs sogs de yi tshogs/ /khyim gnas bya dang ri dgas dang / /de dag lhag ma 'ga' zhig gzung / /bya la sogs pa'i rab
<p>121b.7</p>tu byed pa'o/ /seng ge la sogs pa'i sde rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi dang yid skyes ma nu'i bu/ /shes ldan/ yid ldan/ shed bu'o/ 6 /skyes pa/ lnga skyes skyes bu dang / /skyong byed dang ni pho rnams so/ 5 /mo dang / mi mo
<p>122a</p>
<p>122a.1</p>mtshams ldan ma/ /btsun mo/ yo ShA/ yo Shi ta/ /'ching byed/ zur blta/ g.yon ma dang / /dga' ba'i sa gzhi mchod ldan ma/ /stobs med/ pA yA/ drag mo dang / /stobs ldan/ dga' ma/ g.yon byed ma/ /gnas byed ma
<p>122a.2</p>dang / skyed ma dang / /bu mo/ snying po can ma dang / /legs dga' ma dang / gnod skyong ngo / 12 /dbye ma dga' ma/ dga' byed ma/ /'dod ma/ g.yon ma/ phul byung ma/ /'dren pa mo dang / spyan ma dang / /lus ldan ma dang la la na/ /'jigs ma/ sgom ma/ smad
<p>122a.3</p>rgyas ma/ /rab myos/ mdzes ma/ sdug gu ma/ /bcu gnyis ma ste 'di rnams so/ /khro byed ma dang / 'jigs byed ma/ /gtum mo dang ni/ kro d+ha nA/ zhes pa 'di rnams mtshungs pa'o/ 4 /mchog dang / rab skyes/ gsal ma dang / /mchog gi lcug ma myos
<p>122a.4</p>gsal ma/ 5 /rnam mkhas ma dang / tshigs ldan ma/ 2 /gzhon nu ma dang ta lu ni/ /chags pa'i na tshod ldan ma dang / /na chung / nor ldan/ phyogs byed ma/ /'thab mo can ma rnams yin no/ 7 /dar ma/ grong 'dzin/ myos ma dang / /gsal ma/ dbang bskur/ 
<p>122a.5</p>byas btsun mo/ /longs spyod can ma mi bdag ma/ /lus ldan ma dang bdag ldan ma/ /lag pa 'dzin dang / gnyis pa mo/ /chos bcas ma dang / chung ma dang / khyim na spyod ma ka la traM/ /'ching byed/ shin tu dam byed ma/ /'dzin pa mo dang skyed byed ma/ /khur ldan
<p>122a.6</p>ma dang / lhan cig spyod/ 22 /gnyen byas/ khyim gsar/ bag gsar dang / /dang po'i rdul dang khyo 'dam ma/ /rang gis 'dam dang kha dum dang / /sa rA ban+ni/ su ta dang / /pau tA yu ka spyod byed ma'o/ /rigs kyi ma dang / rigs skyong ma/ /bdag po gcig
<p>122a.7</p>ldan/ bden ldan ma/ /legs spyod bdag po'i brtul zhugs ma/ /legs ma rnams so de nas ni/ /ma 'ongs rdul ldan dkar gcer mo/ 3 /gzhon nu ma dang / bu mo'i tshogs/ /nag dga' ma dang mchog sbyin ma/ /na ba pa ti kA rnams so/ /pho nya
<p>122b</p>
<p>122b.1</p>bcas ma mthong bzlog dang / /rdul bcas ma dang / char ldan ma/ /rdul mthong ma dang / bu mo dang / /snying po can dang / bar ma can/ /gsar bkod/ gsar pa mchog can dang / /rdul gsar gser 'debs dang me tog gsar/ /me tog mthong bar
<p>122b.2</p>bar ma'o/ 20 /cung zad lang tsho ldan pa la/ /gnas pa pha khyim nges gnas ma/ /khyim pa mo dang / grong 'dzin dang / /bu bza' can ma skyed ma dang / /dga' ma/ bag gsar/ mna' ma dang / /snyan pa'i pi wang sgra sgrogs dang / /nges sgrogs/ de
<p>122b.3</p>bdag sa gang+ga/ /dA bi s+yA da dang pa ra ti/ 7 /g.yo ma/ 'phyon ma/ rang dbang ma/ /'ching ma/ bden ma/ phyag dar ma/ /mtshon byed/ rigs tshogs dum bu yi/ /ngang tshul myos pa'i phreng ldan ma/ /dubyash+tsa ng+gI dang / mtshon ma dang / /'ching ba sbyin
<p>122b.4</p>dang cha shas byed/ 11 /'dod ma/ b+ho dza na/ d+ha na diShi ts+tshA ba sa/ ba tI kA/ 'dod ldan ma/ pri Sha s+yA n+dI/ tu kA mi thu ne ts+tshA ra t+yam+ba kI/ kAn+t+wa n+wi nI tu yA yA te saM ge taM sA b+hi sA ri kA/ 1 /bA d+hI na b+har+t+ri kA s+yata/ t+yak+t+wa nyaM/ yad+pa shaHsri ya yA su kalpi ti telpa snyi sun+da rI/ pa sa ba sh+mA
<p>122b.5</p>ni ma tra pa ka padz+dza bi yas mA ga mo tri bi prA lan+d+hA sa ma ya byAM/ du tI kA pre Sh+ya yat+ma taH ba rA+e gaM krI ta saM/ ke to reH na maM la ti pri ya/ 4 /yA ba d+hirma pri ya ko pA ta tsA Tu ka rany+tsa nirga tA tI s+ya ta 3 nu sha yeH pany+tsa t+ka la han+ta ri tA hi pA/ 5 /u ta kiN+Tha tA tu pA ya s+yA bA pa/ be sh+ma ni shA ga taH 
<p>122b.6</p>pri yo nA ga ma ne hen+tu bin+tuM/ yan+ti pa mA ku laM/ 6 /ku ta sh+tsi ta kAr Na ta ya s+yaH pri yaud shAn+taM raM ga ta kr-i twa ba d+hI Ti naM pArtA pro ShI ta pre ya pI beta/ 7/ku tash+tsa n+na ga ti kAn+te kun tu gdung ma dum bu ma/ /mdzes ma dga' ma rtsom byed ma/ /rnam par sbyangs byas mig ma'o/ /de ni dga'
<p>122b.7</p>ma'i gzhi dang ni/ /dga' ba'i phur bu zhes pa yang / /bi pr-i k+tA dang skal ngan ma/ /bu bdun btsas bu/ bska rA/ /bud med gcer mo gos me ma/ /mthong ldan ma dang byis pa thob/ /lang tsho zhags ma theg bral ma/ /dpa' mo min dang rgyu mthun ma/ /so sor bdag
<p>123a</p>
<p>123a.1</p>ma rjes bcas ma/ /byed pa'i gzhi dang rnam ston ma/ /yid ldan dra ma can ma'o/ /rang dbang ma dang gzhan khyim gnas/ /legs dbang ma dang bzo byed ma/ /bud med ces pa'i mtshan nyid ma/ /pe Ta sha dang sh+ma sha dang / /'tsho
<p>123a.2</p>byed ldan ma thos ma dang / /mi yi phreng ldan ma rnams so/ /ma ruN+Da dang dpral ba'o/ /ngur smrig gos dang ldan pa yi/ /rgan mo kA t+yA nI ya nI/ /rgan mo skra dkar dge ma'o/ /rgas dang 'khogs dang rgan mo'o/ /blon po rgan min btsun mo'o/ /phrin skyel
<p>123a.3</p>pho brang spyod ma'o/ /shes rab ma dang mkhas ma dang / /shes ldan ma dang blo ldan ma/ /dmangs mo dmangs rigs chung ma yi/ /dmangs dang de yi rigs kyang ngo / /dmangs rigs chen mo A b+hI rI/ /rigs dang skyes pa sbyor dag mtshungs/ /slob dpon
<p>123a.4</p>chung ma slob dpon ma/ /skyes sbyor sham shra sogs ldan pa/ /'phags ma rgyal rigs ma dang ni/ /rgyal rigs chung ma mkhan po ma/ /mkhan po'i chung mar 'gyur ba'o/ /rje mo rje rigs chung 'phags ma/ /rgyal rigs bu mo rgyal rigs ma/ /mkhan po'i chung
<p>123a.5</p>ma mkhan mo ste/ /klog dang kha ton byed par 'gyur/ /slob dpon ma nyid 'ba' zhig go/ /dpa' bo'i bdag ldan dpa' chung ma/ /dpa' bo'i ma dang dpa' skyong ma/ /skye dgu'i bdag mo skye dgu ma/ /rab tu skye dang rab skye ma/ /zla mo grogs mo na mnyam ma/ /pho nya
<p>123a.6</p>mo dang kun spyod mtshungs/ /mo ma mig mthong lta shes dang / /de nas rdul dang ldan pa dang / /bud med chos ldan dus ldan ma/ /dri ma ldan dang me tog ldan/ /skyed nad dang ni khrag ldan ma/ /rdul dang / me tog zla mtshan no/ 3 /phrug gu chags dang mig blo mangs/ /
<p>123a.7</p>rlog med ma dang zla mtshan sangs/ /mngal chags ma dang sbrum ma dang / /bu che ma dang lus mi bde/ /tshogs can ma yi tshogs rnams dang / /sbrum ma gzhon nu ma rnams tshogs/ /lan bu can ma re dma' dang / /tshong kha bud med tshogs can ma/ /zug rngu byed ma
<p>123b</p>
<p>123b.1</p>r-its+tsha lA/ /gzugs kyi tshor ma mdzes ma dang / /'dod pas btsan ma ngan rol ma/ /rtags can re mos smra ma dang / /phra mo myos pa'i sbubs can ma'o/ 13 /gal te de byed skye bo yi/ /tshogs can re dma'i gtso mor 'gyur/ /lus bsgyur ma dang lcug ldan ma/ /bkab
<p>123b.2</p>pa'i tshogs can ma zhes kyang / /mdza' mkhan ma dang sbyor byed ma/ /kha lo ma dang dga' byed ma/ /lta ba mo dang sbrang rtsi ldan/ /skul byed tshogs can bran mo yang / /rab bsrungs dang / rab byed/ /sa skyong zhal ba/ sped byed pa/ /yid gnas khang spyod 'brangs
