<p>123b.3</p>mo byed/ /tshogs byed 'tsho skyes po TA'o/ 5 /phrin skyel dang ni grong du spyod/ /nye grong 'bangs gtso/ tsha bcas ma/ /nges sbyor so rtsi byed ma dang / /pha rgya ka dang / k+ti kA'o/ /zung can ma dang / zung bud med/ /rab 'phrog theg pa sbyor byed ma/ /kir ti dang / bla ma
<p>123b.4</p>dang / /gzhon nu rlung yab 'dzin ma'o/ /bu mo shing dang snying po'i shing / /ku ruN+Di dang / sdong po bstan/ /chu skyes sngo dang / 'dod ma dang / /'di nyid thal ma byed ma'o/ /shUrmI lcags kyi ka ba dang / /gzugs can 'phrog byed gser rang bzhin/ /lnga lan ma
<p>123b.5</p>ma dang / bu mo dang / /po dang gos la sogs sprul ma/ /gnyis grags/ slar byung de d+hiShu/ /de yi bdag bo d+hi d-i Shu/ /gnyis skyes bcas dang bu bza' ma/ /de la de mchog de d+hi Shu/ /gang las slar byung de dag go /'bangs mo 'bangs las 'bangs med pa/ /
<p>123b.6</p>gang gi sba bya bi d+ha'i bu/ /bai d+ha ba skyes ma med skyes/ /phyi mo med dang / be ma tra/ /bskal bzang bu dang bskal bzang skyes/ /gzhan gyi bud med skyes nal phrug /gar mkhan bu dang gar ma'i bu/ /pha yi sring mo las skyes dang / /ne ne las skyes rnams yin no/ /
<p>123b.7</p>ma yi nu mo las skyes dang / /sgra gnyis bu mo 'dod pa'o/ /rigs 'chol dang ni byi phrug go /slong mos 'tsho zhing skyes pa la/ /da ni ka lo Ti na ya/ /rigs sgyur dang ni bdag skyes so/ /bu mo'i bu dang ka pa'i na/ /pi shu dza zhes bya ba'o/ /ma gnyis bu dang ma
<p>124a</p>
<p>124a.1</p>yang bu/ /ma mchog bu rnams mtshungs pa'o/ /d+ya mr-i ta dang dzA ra dza/ /kuN+Do mr-i ta/ go tsa dang / /go na ka dang bdag skyes dang / /lus skyes bu dang gnyis pa'o/ /kun 'dzin byed rang skyes dang / /bu smad bu dang / lto byung / rgyu/ /
<p>124a.2</p>skye byed dang ni dag byed do/ /mo la bu mo smra ba ste/ /bdun 'dir bdag skyes ma la sogs/ /bu mo blo ldan btsun mo dang / /mnyam byed lus kyi kun spyod ma/ /rang skyes/ zhing skyes brang las skyes/ /brang byung gnas skyes dbang gnyis pas/ /skye dgu/ bu rgyud/ 
<p>124a.3</p>rgyud skyes/ bu/ /u ta na sha ya/ Dim+p+ha/ /'o ma'i mgrin bcas nu ma 'thung / /'khyud 'thung / khye'u/ bu byis pa/ /phrug gu/ gzhon nu/ gso bya dang / /smin rgyu/ 'o 'thung / shA ba ka/ 14 /nyal 'tsho/ bu mo/ 'o 'thung ma/ /lus la 'thung ma rnams yin no/ 4 /yab dang / skyed byed/ pha dang
<p>124a.4</p>ni/ /a pha skyed go /gsob po/ /skyed par byed pa po rnams so/ 7 /skyed ma/ ma dang / a ma dang / /'dzin ma/ rab skyed/ mchod sbyin 'don/ /skyed byed/ /skyed ma/ zhing ma dang / /mngal 'dzin ma dang bcas ma'o/ 11 /ma gzhan ma ma 'dzin ma dang / /
<p>124a.5</p>nye ba'i ma ma zhes pa'o/ /sring mo/ swA sA/ b+ha gi nI/ /pra dza pa ti/ spun zla'i chung / /bdag po'i sring mo snying mo'o/ /chung ma'i spun zla skud po dang / /yA ta ra ni tshig ma'o/ /bdag mo'i pha ma gyos sgyug go/ /de dag la ni gyos po'o/ /bu mo'i bdag dang mag /
<p>124a.6</p>pa dang / /bA ra kI ra sh+ya la ka /sh+yA li kA dang ke ni ku/ /kA de bri dang de ba ra/ /chags rtsibs pra rgyu/ dan+t+ra dza/ /tra ya zhes pa rnams yin no/ /pha yi spun zla/ khu bo dang / /ma yi spun zla zhang po dang / /bdag can dang ni ma'i skra nye/ /de yi chung ma ne ne mo/ /
<p>124a.7</p>sring mo'i bu dang / sring mo skyes/ /tsha bo dang ni/ spun las skyes/ /bu yi bu dang / bu mo'i bu/ /bu dang bu mo'i bu ru 'dod/ /de dag tsha bo yang tsha'o/ /ma yi pha dang / pha yi ma/ /de dag phyi mo yang phyi sogs/ /skyed byed dang ni skyed byed ma/ /gyos sgyug
<p>124b</p>
<p>124b.1</p>dag ni/ shwa shrur/ /bu dang bu mo/ bu to'o/ /bu yi bu la sogs pa yang / /spun zla sring mo ming sring dag /khyo shug bza' mi bza' bo dag /pha yi pha ni mes po dang / /de yi pha ni yang mes po/ /ma yi ma ni phyi mo sogs/ /phan tshun gso dang / rigs brgyud dang / /
<p>124b.2</p>skye gnas mtshungs dang ming sring dang / /lhag pa'i skyes dang tshangs pa mtshungs/ /rang las legs skyes bdag nyid shes/ /nye du rtsa lag 'brel pa dang / /rus bcas/ 'gro ba/ bgo skal spyod/ /dri bcas myur ba/ snag dang bcas/ /gnyen dang / de dngos tshogs pa
<p>124b.3</p>dang / /gnyen 'brel/ 'dzin byed/ dga' ba'i bdag /gtso bo/ sbyin byed/ 'tsho dbang phyug /snying dbang / dga' ba/ lci ba dang / /rtsed 'jo'i rten dang / dga' ston bde/ /srog mgon snying la phan pa dang / /nga rgyal dang ni/ mngon 'dod shid/ /
<p>124b.4</p>mchog dang / mchog byed bza' ston pa/ /a b+hI ta dang / A b+hI ka dzi ra/ nye bdag /sdig pa'i bdag /nges 'dzin gtso bo sngon skyes dang / /dpal dang / thu bo/ sngon las skyes/ /de nas rjes skyes ka nI yang / /mthe'u chung dang / ya pI ya/ /phyis
<p>124b.5</p>skyes dang ni rjes su skyes/ /mngal gzugs dang ni na tshod gnas/ /gzhon nu/ thor bu/ lang tsho can/ /lo yi theg pa bcu pa dang / /lang tsho nyams dang rgas 'khogs rgan/ /lang tsho yol dang / gnas brtan rgan/ /brgya pa tshe song rgas chen po/ /thu bo/ rgan
<p>124b.6</p>rim/ rgan po'i tshogs/ /smin dang na tshod yol ba dang / /skra la sogs pa dkar ba'o/ /byis pa bu tsha/ phrug gu dang / /dar ma/ lang tsho/ ldan pa mtshungs/ /gnas brtan sangs rgyas/ ches rgan 'phel/ /gsum pa'i rang bzhin za ma dang / /ma ning dang
<p>124b.7</p>ni pho ma ning / /nyams pa dang ni/ nyug rum mo/ /mtshan gnyis pa dang / bo TA dang / /gsum pa'i rang bzhin de gzhon nu/ /rgyan gyur byis pa'i zla ba dang / /mngal ldan dang ni/ sh+ya re Na/ /mngal gyi brgyad pa lha'i zla ba/ /'gro byed dang ni 'o ma smin/ /gnas dang
<p>125a</p>
<p>125a.1</p>skyes pa'i tshal dang ni/ /skyes pa'i gnas zhes bya ba yang / /mtshams mtha' 'dren byed snying po'i gnas/ /snying po can dang ldan pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i zla ba gzhan skyed do/ /mngal dang rum ste 'di dag mtshungs/ /mngal dang / bu rogs
<p>125a.2</p>phru ma dang / u l+le dang ni ka la laM/ /'chi med/ lte ba dang ni/ rgyun/ tsa lu byis pa smra ba'o/ /skyes bu ngan dang / skyes bu smad/ /de la bram ze'i khye'u yang / skra bcas/ skra ldan/ skra can dang / /sa yod/ skra ldan sa la'o/ 5 / /
<p>125a.3</p>zhi ba/ piSh+Ta/ khal twI/ khan+t+ri Ta dang / kha l+li'o/ /dbang po/ lut+ta ldan pa la/ /an+t+ra lup+ta ka zhes 'di/ /u la la ni/ lo ma sa/ /pr-iSh+Na ra le lus can la/ /sha med/ nyam chung rid pa dang / /stobs med ces pa'o bzod ldan dang / /stobs ldan/ 
<p>125a.4</p>stobs bcas/ sha rgyas dang / /phul byung stobs can zhes pa'o/ /gsus po che dang / lto 'phyang dang / /lto ldir/ sked sbom/ gsus rdzing can/ /sna nyeg pa dang / sna leb dang / /nyeg po dang ni/ sna gong med/ /sna snyung dang ni sna rings so/ /
<p>125a.5</p>sna bcad pa dang / sna bregs pa/ /rmig pa'i sna can/ rmig sna'o/ /sna mtho dang ni/ sna sgur ro/ /yan lag ma tshang / yan lag nyams/ /sgur po dang ni/ lag pa 'jas/ /gyol po dang ni/ 'khyog 'gros can/ /bya 'gros byed dang / sbu po dang / /
<p>125a.6</p>skra med dang ni/ mgo zlum mo/ /sgur 'khyog /nad can/ dgye dgu can/ /yas 'jog can dang steng pus mo/ /sgyid 'khris dang ni pus mo 'byar/ /gom rlabs can dang rab 'gro bus/ /dkar dang skra can lus can no/ /nad gcong med dang nad bu med/ /gso
<p>125a.7</p>dpyad sman gyi bya ba dang / /rtsi dang / sman dang / gso byed dang / /nad sel dang ni/ 'tsho byed do/ /na dang / khams mi bde ba dang / /nyams mi bde dang / tsha ba dang / /na tsha dang ni mnar ba'o/ /cha med/ nad dang / kun tu zug /kun khyab dang ni/ nye bar
<p>125b</p>
<p>125b.1</p>gdung / /dza k+Sha zad byed/ skom nad dang / /dbugs mi bde dang sbrid pa dang / /sbrid nad/ skyigs bu lud pa dang / /glo dang / skrangs 'bur/ rnag 'bur dang / /skrangs pa zhes pa rnams yin no/ /sha bkra/ nag po/ sha mtshan can/ /sme ba dang ni/ nag thig
<p>125b.2</p>go/ /za 'phrug /za byed/ pra ta ti/ /rA kA/ glang shu/ khyi rngo dang / /pags pa'i me tog/ pags rdul dang / /g.yan pa dang ni/ rkang shu dang / /rkang pa/ rkang pa'i grog mkhar dang / rko byed/ rkang pa'i gaN+Di ta/ /za tsheg /bem tsheg /g.ya' ba dang / /rngo shu/ 
<p>125b.3</p>g.ya' 'phrug /phol mig dang / /'brum phran/ rnam phye/ so sor 'phye/ /rma dang / rmas dang ma tu dang / /pags pa tsha ba ki Na'o/ /phra mo'i rma dang / rtsa yi rma/ /rtag tu 'dzag pa'i rma dang ni/ /dbang po 'dzag dang / skra 'joms dang / /kwo pi tha dang / rtag tu'o/ /rgyab gzhungs
<p>125b.4</p>dang ni garga dang / /bshang ba'i phugs bu can rnams so/ /a shra/ ming ngan can dang ni/ /mtshungs pa'i skye gnas/ gzhang rtsa'i ming / /chu 'gags pa dang / chu bsdams dang / /zas rlon dong khar mi 'ong ni/ /tshang 'khru dang ni/ tshang nad dang / /rjes
<p>125b.5</p>su dri ldan lto ba'i nad/ /lus kyi rma la 'brog mkhar can/ /ma ru ri kA sdig pa'i nad/ /rak+ta ba Di 'di la ni/ /rkang 'bras dang ni phol mig go /pad+ma can dang / tsher ma can/ /g.ya' ba/ skya sbab/ dkyil 'khor can/ /rgyu ma nor can/ rlung 'bras dang / /
<p>125b.6</p>'khrogs pa/ pa la lA sha ya/ mkhris pa pa la/ rims/ mA yu/ /mi skyong ba dang / mi 'thor can/ /ka pha/ sid+ha/ gug pa dang / /bad kan stobs dang / snum pa yi/ /skye gnas can dang / mchil ma'o/ /skyugs pa/ zas ldog/ skyug nad dang / /
<p>125b.7</p>skyug byed/ 'dor byed/ rtsa nas 'byin/ /mngon par bsrub dang / lta ba dang / /skyed dang 'dzin dang / phyi mo dang / /yu ba gaN+Da/ pa raN+Da/ /ku raN+Da dang 'phel pa dang / /garbaN+Da dang lte ba dang / /gu Da ka dang / mchu lte mtho/ /shu ba'i nad dang / dkyil 'khor can/ /mdze nad sha
<p>126a</p>
<p>126a.1</p>bkra/ skya bo'o/ /nad dbye/ dri chu bsdams pa dang / rde'u nad dang ni/ bi dra b+hi/ /zug dang / gsus rdzing / dmu chu dang / /chu sri/ mtshan par rdol ba'o/ /nad 'joms/ nad sel/ sman pa dang / /'tsho byed dang ni/ gso dpyad
<p>126a.2</p>mkhan/ /skyon shes/ tshe yi rig byed pa'o/ 7 /nad sos pa dang nad kyis btang / /nad las de ma thag mgo zug /gtam dang / nad med ka l+ya'o/ /rnam 'gyur med par de brjod do/ /nad kyis btab dang mi gsal dang / /rang snang mi sdug /mthu drug dang / /
<p>126a.3</p>bro 'tshal ba dang / gdung bas gzir/ /nad can nad pa/ yun ring na/ /rngo can dang ni glang shu dang / /rlung nad can dang / rlung can dang / /me dpal dang ni smya shu mtshungs/ /'khru skyugs dang ni/ rgyu gzer ro/ /sha bkra dang ni/ me dpal dang / /'brum nad/ yu
<p>126a.4</p>to/ /gzhang 'brum mo/ /mig tshag /tshag po/ mig nad can/ /pi l+lA klin+ne mig tshag po/ /'on pa rna ba mi gsang dang / /lug ltar lkugs dang ngag thos min/ /der ni lug 'dri'i lkugs pa dang / /bems po ltar lkugs ngag mi brtan/ /tshig nyams ngag gis
<p>126a.5</p>dbul ba dang / /tshig mi gsal ba dang / sems bems po/ /mig gcig zhar ba mig bzang dang / /long ba/ mthong bral/ chu ser dang / /bad kan/ /bad nad/ ka phI lo/ /lte chen/ lte 'bur/ lte ba mtho/ /rmongs dang / brgyal dang / dran nyams so/ /
<p>126a.6</p>myos ldan smyo dang / smyon pa'o/ /rtsa dang 'bab ldan zhes pa'o/ /shig 'dzin dang ni/ shig ldan dang / /gong bu 'dzin dang / byin pa sbom/ /gsus can dang ni/ chu lto can/ /bum pa 'dzin dang / bum pa can/ /sman pa'i mtshams zhes bya ba rnams/ /khu ba
<p>126a.7</p>sa bon stobs brtson 'grus/ /thig le gzi brjid dbang por 'gro/ 7 /sha dang pa lam pa la lam/ /bi shi tam dang / ta ra sam/ /A mi Sha ma dang / /u Sha sa mo/ /dza gra lam dang / kra bya dang / /dza tu tham dang / tsA ra TaM/ 11 /sha kam dang ni/ bal+lu ra/ /shin tu bskams
<p>126b</p>
<p>126b.1</p>pa zhes bya'o/ /dug gis btab pa'i mtshon cha yis/ /bsad pa'i phyugs sha gr-i ny+tsa nam/ /khrag dang / dmar po rak+ta dang / /rna skyes sho Ni rnga 'dor byed/ /mi ltung rang skyes/ sha'i 'gyur ba/ /lus skyes sha yi khu ba bcud/ 12 /snying sha /sha mchog /snying po/ snying / /
<p>126b.2</p>tshil dang / zhag dang / snum bag go /mdangs dang / rkang mar/ khu ba bye/ /mgrin pa'i phyi rtsa/ ltag chu ba/ /'bab ldan rtsa dang / nA Di'o/ /thod pa/ bde mchog /bde skyong ngo / /pags pa dang ni khrag 'dzin dag /klad pa dang ni/ klad rgyas so/ /b+ho
<p>126b.3</p>traM/ ka liN+Da ka'o/ /mtshor pa/ yA kr-ita/ kA le yam/ /mchin pa dang ni/ slI haM/ ti la kaM dang / klo ma dang / gar+b+ha Ta dang / taR+Sha b+hU/ /kAN+Da rA dang chu rgyus che/ /rgyus pa/ chu ba/ chu rgyus so/ /rgyu ma dang ni/ gang ba can/ /mchil ma/ kha chu 'dzag pa'o/ /
<p>126b.4</p>dri ma/ 'dab ma/ ki TaM'o/ 3 /rna ba'i dri ma rna spabs so/ /snabs dang sna yi dri ma'o/ /pi spi kA dang / so skyes dri/ /lce yi dri ma/ hu lu kaM/ /gci pa/ rab 'dzag/ uts+tshA rI/ /ma laM sa kr-i ta/ bska rau/ 6 /bshang ba/ 'bab ldan/ khyab ldan dang / /dri ma/ phyi sa/ 
<p>126b.5</p>brtsa ska/ /biSh+ya/ bi Sha/ brtsa'o/ 9 /rus pa'i khams ni nA ruN+Da/ /ku l+yaM dang ni kI ka shaM/ /lus rus/ keng rus/ rus pa'i gzebs/ /yal ga'i rus pa na la kaM /rgyab rus ka she ru ka'o/ /mgo bo'i rus pa ko ro Ti/ /rtsib ma'i rus pa pA R+shu kA/ /lus dang
<p>126b.6</p>khog pa pe raM dang / /baR+Sh+ma/ de ha/ sha rI raM/ /piN+Da/ kA ya/ bi gra ha/ /mUrti/ ta nu/ tanU dang / /phung po/ zhing dang / bany+dza ra/ /saM ha na na/ gang dag dang / /ba su/ shastaM/ pa raM dang / /dbang po'i skye mched ang+gaM dang / /mUrti zhes pa rnams su 'gyur/ 22 /yan
<p>126b.7</p>lag /pra ti ka dang ni/ /a wa ya ba/ ko ma laM/ /ang+ga mang+gaM/ phyogs gcig dang / /a ya g+ha na zhes pa rnams/ 7 /rkang pa/ rgyu byed/ padaM/ pad/ /aM g+hi dang ni kra ma Na/ 6 /rkang rtse dang ni pra ba daM/ 2 /rkang mdud/ g+hU Ti ka / gum+ba/ /rting pa/ phyi dang / goDa ri/ /
<p>127a</p>
<p>127a.1</p>rkang pa'i rtsa ba zhes pa'o/ 7 /byin pa dang ni/ phra pri ta/ /baSh+ThI/ ba daSh+ThI bAn dang / /pus mo'i nye ba'i tshigs can no/ /brla dang / pa k+thi'o de'i mtshams ni/ /paM k+Sha Na dang pA su raM/ bshang lam/ 'og sgo/ thur lam/ rkub/ /ta nU/ hra dang / 
<p>127a.2</p>'og lam dang / /bshang sgo/ dr-i ti/ paNI'o/ 9 /lte 'og /mdoms dang / sked pa dang / /shro Ni ka kurma ti'o'i/ /rked pa dang / 3 /rked pa ska rags yul dang ni/ /ska rags 'bras can/ ka ri haM/ /gser can gnas dang 'ching ba dang / /ka TI/ pro tha/ s+phi Ta'o/ /bud med
<p>127a.3</p>rnams kyi 'phongs kyi ni/ /phyi ma'i cha ni ni tam+ba/ /mdun cha dza g+ha na zhes dang / /rgyab kyi gzhung rten dri kaM'o/ /de'i sgo/ b+ha ga skyes gnas dang / /masta ka'o/ /rkub tsos dang / /ni tam+ba s+tho/ /kun tu reg /lte 'og /kU bi tuN+Di dang / /tun+di rga ru/ skye ba'i gnas/ /
<p>127a.4</p>gnyis dga' khyim dang b+ha ga dang / /myos byed dang ni man+di ra/ /byed pa'i yan lag chu ma dang / /gsang ba 'khor ba'i lam mi bzad/ /'og sgo nyer gnas mo'i rang bzhin/ /mtshams min/ rten dang / brjod bya'i phyogs/ /de bzhin dran pa'i khron pa dang / /skye
<p>127a.5</p>'dzin dga' ba'i bu ga dang / /me tog lam dang srid pa byed/ /bu gnas grong dang rmongs pa dang / /rmongs byed dang ni/ myos byed do/ 22 /rtags dang / me d+ha/ me ha na/ /nyer gnas/ she ba sgrub med dang / /nyal byed/ bde byed/ gtun shing dang / /myos byed/ 
<p>127a.6</p>lcags kyu/ hang+gu laM/ /dran pa'i ka ba/ myos 'khri shing / /mtshan dang / chags 'khri/ rgyal mtshan no/ 35 /sgro ba/ sgong / mdzod dang sbubs/ /'bras bu'i mdzod dang / lte ba dang / /gsus pa/ dza Tha ra dang ni/ /dku dang / tun+da zhes bya'o/ /brang skyes/ 
<p>127a.7</p>nu ma/ 'o ma 'dzin/ /ku tsam/ logs skyes/ lang tsho'i mtshan/ /nu sor/ nu tog /sngon nyid dang / /rgyab dang lus kyi phyi ma'o/ 4 /'byar dang / kun tu 'byar ba dang / /dbus ma dang ni/ bar ma'o/ /brang dang / nam tshoms/ byang khog stod/ /ko Di ko DA lag pa'i
<p>127b</p>
<p>127b.1</p>bar/ /snying ga /'tsho ba'i gnas dang gnad/ /phrag pa/ lag pa/ mgo bo'i cha/ /de yi mtshams ni dza tru NI/ /lag pa'i rtsa ba gnyis mchan gung / /de dag 'og ni rtsib ma'o/ /spyod byed/ 'bab byed/ 'jug byed/ lag/ gru mo/ bar tshigs/ ka pha Ni/ /
<p>127b.2</p>gru mo'i steng ni bar lhu dang / /gru mo'i 'og ni lag ngar dang / /ki lA TI zhes bya ba'o/ /lag pa'i rtsa ba nor bu [(]'chid[,]'ching[)]/ /lag pa'i mjug ni karlu She/ /lag pa tha snyad byed pa dang / /yal ga /lnga pa/ sug pa dang / /glang sna 'dra dang / dpung pa'i 'dab/ 6 /'khrig
<p>127b.3</p>ma lag pa'i mthe chung bar/ /ka ra b+ho dang lag gzhag go/ /sor mo lag pa'i yal ga ste/ /mthe bong sor mo'i thu bo'o/ /rab tu ston byed mdzub mo'o/ /gung mo dang ni/ ste ba can/ /mthe'u chung dang / tha chung ngo / /lhag ma ming gred du bshad do/ /sen
<p>127b.4</p>mo/ slar skye/ sder mo dang / /myos byed/ lcags kyu/ lag pa'i dpa'/ /lag 'khrungs/ lag skyes/ lag pa'i tshigs/ /kha ru/ i la/ lag pa'i mda'/ /spyod byed tsher ma ka ra Ta/ 12 /ston byed mtho dang / ba lang sna/ /mdzub mo la sogs rnam
<p>127b.5</p>pa'o/ /mthe bong / mthe chung / mtho la ni/ /sor mo bcu gnyis zhes bya'o/ /thal mo/ thal lcag /pra ti la/ /lag mthil sor mo brkyang pa'o/ /saM ha ta la gnyis tshogs so/ /pra ta la ni g.yas dang g.yon/ /lag pa cung thad skum khyor ba/ /de dag
<p>127b.6</p>sbyar ba snyim pa'o/ /lag dar rgyangs pa khru zhes bya/ /khu tshur bcangs pa bcag khru'o/ /a ra la ni mthe chung rgyangs/ /de yi khra bo khu tshur bcangs/ /'dom ni dpung pa lag par bcas/ /de dag 'phred la gyes pa'o/ /steng du lag pa brkyangs pa ni/ /mi yi tshad dang skyes bus
<p>127b.7</p>so/ /byA yAg dang bi yA ma/ /lag pa gzhu dang lus kyi 'dom/ /ol mdud ba dang mgrin pa'o/ /skye dang / mgo ste/ mgo 'dzin dang / /mgo rten dung mgrin ri mo gsum/ /kA ka laM dang mgrin nor bu/ /bum pa 'dra zhes bya ba'o/ /ltag pa dang ni ltag chu ba/ /kha dang
<p>128a</p>
<p>128a.1</p>gdong dang / smra byed dang / /mchu dang / zhal dang / ngag 'don sgo/ /snom byed/ dri 'bab/ sna bug /sna/ /g+hoNA dang ni nA si ka /nA si kyi dang / shilbi ni/ /na s+yA/ ni kraM/ gan+d+ha nA si kA/ 11 /ya mchu/ ma mchu/ so sgrib
<p>128a.2</p>dang / so yi gos dang / so 'ching dang / /bcud myang / ngag 'dab/ so 'dzin no/ /de yi 'og tu ko sko dang / /tsa tsU ka ma dang / 'dod byed dang / /so dang / gcod byed/ rkan/ thag 'gram/ /sen mo/ rmig pa/ rnon po dang / /mche ga 'dong byed/ gnyis skyes so/ 11 /
<p>128a.3</p>gargo/ mkhur tshos/ ka po la/ /de yi pha rol za 'gram pa/ /lce dang / bdud rtsi 'dzag pa dang / /ro shes/ ro myang / lce ro ldan/ /bcud kyi ma dang / ro ma dang / /ta la na na/ ko ku'o/ /mchu yi mtha' ma/ ba yi gru/ /kha dang bdud rtsi'i rten/ /sbrang rtsi/ /rkan
<p>128a.4</p>dang / kA ku de dag go /ku r+ts+tsa smin ma'i dbus yin te/ /mig gi steng ni smin ma'o/ /lta byed/ 'dren byed/ mig dang / spyan/ /tsak+Shu dang ni/ dbang po dang / /tr-i ga dang / lta stangs/ lha'i sgron ma/ /lta ba gsal ba/ am+ba kaM/ 12 /mchi ma/ mig chu/ rlangs pa/ 
<p>128a.5</p>g.yos/ /gsher dang / 'dzag dang / dus las byung / /rdzi ma'i mig gi nor bu'i khyim/ /a pAng+ga ni mig gi mtha'/ /mig gi 'bras bu/ mthong ba mig /mig gi mtha' yi lta ba la/ /mig ngan/ zur mig phyed bltas so/ /rna ba/ sgra 'dzin/ sgra yi gnas/ /
<p>128a.6</p>thos byed/ nyan byed/ thos pa dang / /shro traM shrota zhes pa'o/ /dpral ba rgyan can b+hA la dang / /mig 'dzin yan lag mchog dang kaM/ /mgo dang / spyi bo/ klad pa can/ /muN+Da/ shiR+Sha/ mi zad bde/ /skra dang / 'khyil ba/ slar skye dang / /ka tsa/ mgo nyal/ 
<p>128a.7</p>mgo skyes dang / /'dor byed dang ni spyi bo skyes/ /ta sh+yA/ skra can/ skra tshogs can/ /skra tshugs/ skra ba re/ /skra yi snying po can dang ni/ /ral can/ skra dkris me tog bcings/ /yang dag sdom pa'i skra dang ni/ /ku ra la dang / lha sam can/ /skra 'khyogs
<p>128b</p>
<p>128b.1</p>le kharba dang / 'khums/ /thor tshugs skra zhags/ ka Tir/ /brtul zhugs ral pa dz+ha Ta'o/ /skra yi bar gnas dang byaM/ /rgyan dang / skra lo 'khyil pa 'dra/ /de rnams dpral ba'i bung ba dang / /bya rog gshog pa/ gtsug phud can/ /lan bu/ skra ldan/ skra'i
<p>128b.2</p>lhas ma/ ral pa skra yi tshogs legs pa/ /skra zhags phyogs dang lag pa shar/ /skra las pha rol tshogs pa'i don/ /lus skyes spu dang ba spu dang / /de rgas sma ra kha spu'o/ /skyong byed mgo zlum bcas smar/ /ba spu/ gu ts+tsha ra ba bkra ma can/ /mi la sogs pa'i rab tu byed
<p>128b.3</p>pa'o// //gsal byed/ mthong byed/ snang byed dang / /brgyan pa dang ni rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan gyis brgyan byas rgyan byed dang / /yongs byas rab tu bsgrubs dang brgyan/ /mdzes bcos rgyan bcings na ba th+ya ma/ /so so'i bzo dang mdzes par byas/ /rgyan gyi bya ba brgyan
<p>128b.4</p>gyur dang / /lhab lhub rnam rgyan dang ni rgyan/ /yongs su bcos dang dkyil 'khor rgyan/ 6/cod pan dang ni dbu rgyan dang / /rtse phran dang ni ki ri Ta/ 4/gtsug phud nor bu mgo'i rin chen/ /gtsug gi rin chen gtsug nor bu/ /do shal dbus gnas ta ra la/ /'dren pa dang
<p>128b.5</p>ni mtshungs par 'gyur/ /skra zhags dang ni skra yi rgyan/ /phud kyu dang ni dpral ba'i rgyan/ /dung dang tsan+dan gcod byed pa/ /mthong bar byed dang dpral ba can/ /rna ba dregs byed tA Dang+ga/ /rna rgyan dang ni rna ba dkris/ /tA la pa Ta ta la'i 'dab/ /ze 'bru can dang / rna ba'i rgyan/ /
<p>128b.6</p>rna zhags rna ba'i srad bu'o/ /bung ba'i mgrin dang ska rags dang / /ske rgyan/ mgrin ldan/ rma bya can/ /mgrin rgyan dang ni mgul pa'i rgyan/ /mgrin rgyan 'chang dang swan+ta dang / /la lan ti kA rab 'phyang dang / /mu tig phreng dang sai boDa/ /mu tig srad bu mtshams do
<p>128b.7</p>shal/ /phreng gcig dang ni dkris gcig pa/ /de nyid rgyu skar phreng bar 'gyur/ /mu tig nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /guts+tsha sum cu rtsa gnyis dkris/ /nyi shu bzhi dkris guts+tsha phyed/ /gang zhig drug cu rtsa bzhi dkris/ /de ni do shal phyed pa'o/ /nyi shu dang ni drug cu dag /mA Na
<p>129a</p>
<p>129a.1</p>ba ka ba'i nu ma/ /bzhi dkris byas pa lha bdun pa/ /gang zhig brgyad dkris byas gyur pa/ /de ni rnam rgyal bdun pa'o/ /do shal brgyad brgyad dkris pa'o/ 4 /lnga brgya yi 'od zer tshogs/ /dkris byas nya phyis dung dkris dang / /lag 'gro gnyis
<p>129a.2</p>'thung ri rgyud skyes/ /de dag las byung mu tig rigs/ /nya phyis las ni yang dag byung / /gdu bu dang ni lag gdub dang / /ka Ta kaM dang lag skor ro/ /lag rgyan sor gdub sor mo can/ /rlabs ldan yi ge dang bcas pa/ /sor gdub rgya ldan zhes bya'o/ /ang+tsha ts+tshe ni zhes
<p>129a.3</p>pa'ang de'o/ /dpung rgyan dang ni bar lhu'i rgyan/ /gser gyi lag gdub kaM ka Na/ /lag skud sor 'brang ka ra n+tu/ /bud med rked rgyan 'og pag dang / /ro ldan ro ma/ gser can dang / /tshogs can bdun pa/ ka k+Sh+ya'o/ /skyes pa'i rked rgyan dang ni sgrog /rkang gdub tu
<p>129a.4</p>laM ko TI dang / /many+dza ra dang zhabs gdub po/ /ngang pa can dang rkang skor dang / /g.yer ka dang ni dril chung can/ /rigs ma'i nor bu rkang zhags dang / /rkang pa'i sor gdub zhes pa rnams/ /pags pa 'bu yi srin bu dang / /spu rnams gos kyi skye gnas yin/ /ras
<p>129a.5</p>gos ras bal 'bras bu la/ /snam bu ri dgas spu las skyes/ /gos dar srin bu'i sbubs las byung / /zar ras zar ma la sogs las/ /sar pa'i gos dang so ma dang / /gos sar kun dga'i ras dang gos/ /ud+gA ma nI ya zhes pa/ /bkrus pa'i gos
<p>129a.6</p>zung gang yin pa/ /'dab ma ba la dang ras gos bkrus/ /rin thang che dang nor chen po/ /nad bsal du kU la yi ras/ /gyon gos dang ni spyod gos so/ /gos dang g.yogs ma na bza' dang / /gcer skyob/ bgo ba/ ang+ga sha /tsa raM/ so taM/ pags pa dang / /
<p>129a.7</p>pro ta rnam par bsags pa dang / /sta te dang ni ras rnams so/ 1/gos zad/ gos rnying / gos rul lo/ /dar gos/ gos bzang / gos phung po/ /gos chen/ ne tsol/ /smad gos/ /ngar khebs dang ni/ bla gos so/ /bar gos/ smad gos/ pa ri d+haM/ /sham
<p>129b</p>
<p>129b.1</p>thabs dang ni mthang gos so/ /stod gos/ pr-i ha ti kA dang / /bai ka h+ya dang stod g.yogs dang / /san+d+ha na dang bla gos so/ 6 /mdoms dkris dang ni smad dkris so/ /bud med mchog gi smad gos ni/ /tsaN+Da ta ka'i gos yin no/ /gos dang mgo dkris nA rang+gi/ /
<p>129b.2</p>kun tu dkris pa zhes bya'o/ /rkang pa'i rtse mor khyab pa'i gos/ /gang de sra bde ma zhes brjod/ /steng du bgo ba sil+lI dang / /uts+tsha li kA gnyis yin no/ /phra mo'i gos ni du kU la/ /nak+ta kaM dang karba Ta/ /ba mo'i gos dang be'u ris so/ /kha ba rlung po skyob pa'i gos/ /
<p>129b.3</p>'dir ni gos dang aM ku sha /any+tsa la zhes bya ba'ang 'dod/ /srid du ring ba A ro ha/ /zheng che ba dang bi shA la/ /smad gos dang ni dung ba can/ /nI bI dang ni ba rti bzhin/ /bud med rnams kyi phal che ba/ /khru bcu pa dang gnyis yin no/ /dngos po dang ni bi shi kA /bsags
<p>129b.4</p>pa dang ni shA lU ra/ /lwa ba snam bu dmar po'o/ /mchan khung spyod dang logs su spyod/ /gos spyod pa dang gnyis yin no/ /bla re dang ni stod g.yogs dang / /gur dang spra zhes bya ba yang / /yol ba dang ni sgrib g.yogs dang / /mi snang byed dang gos g.yogs so/ /
<p>129b.5</p>de nyid gos g.yogs yol ba'i gos/ /gur dang sbra dang khyim gnas dang / /gon gnas gos khyim gos rang bzhin/ /'phrang 'dzin rtsed mo can dang ni/ /'khrang khyim dang ni yon tan gnas/ 9 /yongs bcos lus kyi bcas legs dang / /'dag chal khrus rtsi dag
<p>129b.6</p>byed do/ /urbA da na tri ma nyid/ /phye ma bgos dang ldan pa'o/ /lus la rjes su byug pa dang / /pa rti dang ni kha dog can/ /rnam par byug dang rnam par gcod/ /bska bas byug dang yang dag thob/ /lus chags bgos dang phung bar byed/ /dbang bskur mngon par
<p>129b.7</p>'khru ba dang / /dbus dang rgyal byed kun tu rgyal/ /'khrud pa dang ni 'khru ba'o/ 7 /tum+ba snang dang byi'u 'dzul/ 7 /sbyong byed/ gnas/ zegs/ rjes su 'gog /2/sor 'dab 'phrin yig 'dab ma dang / /'dab lcug dang ni snye cha'o/ /ta ma la 'dab thig le dang / /ri mo'i
<p>130a</p>
<p>130a.1</p>bye brag bris pa'o/ /gla rtsi dang ni/ dri'i gos can/ /ri dgas lte ba ri dgas myos/ /myos pa'i mtshan ma dri yi thod/ 6 /gur kum/ dpa' bo/ g+h+r-i sri Ni/ /man+da/ ha ri/ tsan+dan dang / /kha che mchog dang / kha che skyes/ /tsan+dan dmar dang yang
<p>130a.2</p>dag 'khums/ /snang byed/ nyi ma/ dmar ming can/ /dzA gu DaM dang / pI ta naM/ /sI ta kA dang / be ri dang / /ser sna zur dang / dri zhim dang / /lus dmar/ a bi/ me'i rtse mo/ /me tog don can/ sarba TaM/ 4 /sprin gyi snying po ras bal dang / /kha ba'i phye ma 'od dkar
<p>130a.3</p>dang / /rdul gyi snying po zla ba'i thal/ /kha ba'i ming can rtogs byed dang / /shing gi snying po ro'i ge sar/ /ma la ya skyes dri'i snying po/ /dpal gyi dum bu tsan+dan dang / /bzang dpal mA Na yo ru dang / /bya me kaM ga /skyed pa dang / /gos can/ mdog can/ tsan+dan dkar/ /
<p>130a.4</p>dri zhim btags dang / snying po ser/ /kha ba yA myaM zhes pa dang / /dri zhim dkar po zhes pa yang / 17 /til 'dab can dang / sa mchog dang / /'phrog byed tsan+dan zhes pa dbang / /rna ba nag mo dus rjes 'brang / /skye can dang ni/ khyab 'jug skye/ 4 /a ga ru dang rgyal mnyes
<p>130a.5</p>byed/ /dmar po sprin skyes dzong+ga kaM /ba Ni ka dang / dri yi shing / /bya rog gdong dang tsan+dan ser/ /dus skyes/ don ldan/ dzod+g+ra Ni/ /nags kyi tsan+dan mi bdag dga'/ /shing nag/ mdog sbyin/ mdzes sbyin byed/ 16 /a gu ru nag a gu ru/ /bkra shis phreng dang / 
<p>130a.6</p>dri dang ni/ /tsan+dan dmar dang 'dab ma'i lus/ /rany+dza na dang sa'i tsan+dan/ /snum ldan dang ni bsam mi khyab/ 10 /si san+tu raM/ rna ba 'dzin/ /ko la ka dang snum 'bras dang / /sbubs skyes dza ti pha la mtshungs/ /zho dang 'o ma mar gyi mtshan/ /dpal gyi gos dang thang chu'o/ /sbyar
<p>130a.7</p>spos dang ni pA yab/ /rak+ta shIR+Sha ka zhes so/ /gnod sbyin spos dang spos dkar dang / /sra rtsi byed dang kun ldan dang / /gzugs mang nor bu spro ba dang / /pri Na ka dang / mi'i lcug ma/ /A ra la dang sdong po can/ /grags ldan gdong bkris g.yo ba'i gdong / 12 /tu ru Sh+ka dang
<p>130b</p>
<p>130b.1</p>si h+la dang / /snum can dang ni g.yo ming can/ 4 /gong bu can dang dag byed dang / /gnod sbyin spos dang sbyar spos so/ /rgya skyegs/ rgya tshos/ dza tu dang / /tshos dang shing gnas yA ba dang / /nir+b+ha t+ba naM/ tshos kyi ma/ /kha dog mchog ldan zhes pa rnams/ 9 /ga pur gla rtsi
<p>130b.2</p>a ga ru/ /kak+ko la rnams mchod sbyin byug /gnas nas gnas gzhan song ba yi/ /bdun pa sha za'i spos yin no/ /dri dang phreng ba la sogs kyi/ /legs byas gang de sta gon no/ /thod du legs bsdams dga' dang bcas/ /de ni mgo bo'i me tog phreng / /rna ba gang
<p>130b.3</p>bar blta byas te/ /de bzhin mchog de rna ba'i rgyan/ /dri zhim ma ru ba ka yi/ /phreng ba bsgrigs pa ta ma ni/ /me tog phreng ba spyi bo'i ste/ /skra yi dbus su snying po can/ /steng du 'phyang dang rtse mo 'phyang / /mdun 'phyang la lA pa ko bo/ /rab 'phyang drang por mgul du
<p>130b.4</p>'phyang / /me tog ga shal se ral kha/ /gang zhig 'phreng bcings brang la'o/ /nges pa'i phreng dang dri med mtshungs/ /li shi lha yi me tog dang / /lha rdzas dang ni dpal ming can/ /so sor 'bad dang 'chad rtsom pa/ /'dul byed ka tsa nA r+tha ka /sngar/ dngos/ mchod dang
<p>130b.5</p>rtsol byas dang / /rtsol med dang ni yongs su rdzogs/ /mal dang nyal sa gnyid sa dang / /nyal byed dang ni nyal ba'o/ /gral dang skyil krung skyil mo krung / /lhan cig khri la 'dug pa'o/ /gdan khri chung ngu 'dug khri dang / /sngas dang / nyer brten/ nye bar bsnyes/ /spang
<p>130b.6</p>leb can zhes bya ba'o/ /a si gaN+Da zhes pa dang / /ko la gan+Du bA Tu kA / gal+la tsA tu ri zhes pa'o/ /dri yi phye ma/ ma la naM/ /bUg/ sA dza la/ dang ni/ /pha ru kaM zhes bya ba'o/ /za ma tog dang / ga'u dang / /chol zangs dang ni mchil ma'i snod/ /bu ga'i khri dang sa na ka /
<p>130b.7</p>praN+tho/ ka Ta ko lA kA /dus min bU ga'i phye mar 'gyur/ /dus min kun tu 'dres pa'o/ /so rtsi sha ke ma sra baM/ /i b+hi kA dang guN+Da ka /ka Ta shring+ga la gar 'gyur/ /ri skyes dang ni kAn+h+wa kA/ /skul byed dang ni gu Da'o/ 4 /mar me rab 'bar snum za dang / /bcu 'gugs
<p>131a</p>
<p>131a.1</p>bud shing bcu pa dang / /mtshan mo'i snang byed khyim nor bu/ /dud pa skyed dang snum la dga'/ /'bar ba'i ral pa can rnams so/ /bung ba/ lta byed/ mig sman no/ 3 /de nas kau mu dI'i shing dang / /sgron shing dang ni gtsug phud shing / /
<p>131a.2</p>mkhas pa'i khri yi bar la ni/ /khri dang / gdan dang / stan rnams so/ /skra shad dang ni so mangs dang / /skra chas/ skra yi byi dor ro/ 4 /btags dang gos la bgos pa dang / /dri mar byas dang rul song ba/ /ni sh+tsu k+ka NaM/ dul dang zhi/ /rlung g.yab dang ni/ bsil
<p>131a.3</p>g.yab po/ /me long kun mthong mU ku ra/ /mu ku ra dang karka raM/ /zhes pa snyan dang dngags mkhan po mkhas pa dpal 'dzin sde yis rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las mi'i sde rdzogs so// //rgyud dang rigs dang rgyud dang
<p>131a.4</p>ni/ /byung ba/ sngon skyes/ /rjes 'gro dang / /rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang dang / /de yi rgyud ces bya ba yang / 9 /rgyud skyes/ rigs skyes/ /rigs las byung / /rnam bltas dang ni rigs las 'khrungs/ /rgyal po'i rigs las byung ba la/ /rgyal po'i sa bon
<p>131a.5</p>can rgyal brgyud/ /rigs chen rigs bzang 'phags rigs dang / /rigs mchog skyes bu dam pa rnams/ /rigs bzhi bram ze la sogs te/ /gnyis skyes gnyis skyes shin tu byung / /tshangs pa'i bu dang bram ze dang / /pA Da pa dang / kha las skyes/ /gU
<p>131a.6</p>skyes/ skye ba gnyis pa dang / /a la ya dang / mgrin sku can/ /rigs kyi thu bo rgyal mtshan can/ /yu dzA na sh+tsa brjod pa dang / /rgod ma skyes dang bzhi mdo ba/ /dbang bcas slar brjod skye ba'o/ /bram ze dang ni tshangs las byung / /bram ze'i chung ma dag la ni/ /
<p>131a.7</p>bram ze mo dang rje btsun ma/ /dag pa'i mtha' las byung ba dang / /bram ze dang ni tshangs pa'i bu/ /'di yi las drug mchod sbyin byed/ /klog dang sbyin la sogs dang ldan/ /bram ze dang ni gnyis skyes rigs/ /rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs dang / /de skye ta rI
<p>131b</p>
<p>131b.1</p>ya dang ni/ /da ta yA ta ma zhes 'gyur/ /tshangs par spyod dang khrims ldan dang / /nags na gnas dang dge slong dang / /rnam pa bzhi ru gnas pa yin/ /rigs ldan tshangs spyod mkhas pa mtshungs/ /mkhas par byed dang kU ba mig /de nas khyim ldan thu bo pa/ /
<p>131b.2</p>gnas can khyim bdag 'dzin pa dang / /khyim yid can dang khyim rig go/ 6/nags gnas/ /khyim med/ bA+ai kha na/ /dge slong dang ni kun tu rgyu/ /las sbyin bA ra sA ri dang / /maska DI dang legs gnyer gnas/ /yongs su 'dod dang dka' thub dang / /dka' thub
<p>131b.3</p>can dang brtul zhugs can/ /kun tu rgyu dang yongs bsrung ba/ /dka' thub nyon mongs bzod dang 'dul/ /thub pa dang ni ngag bsdams pa'o/ /ring du mthong dang ring po mthong / /mdzangs dang rtogs ldan mkhas pa dang / /brtan pa/ sems shes/ /shes rab can/ /
<p>131b.4</p>skyon shes/ kun shes/ snyan ngag mkhan/ /rigs ldan/ blo ldan/ blo bzang dang / /dpa' bo/ grags thob/ rnam par gsal/ /blo mchog go ba can dang / mkhas/ /grangs ldan dang ni rnam par dngas/ /gsal ba'i sgo dang dus yig can/ /yi ge slob
<p>131b.5</p>byed ces bya'o/ 15 /klog tu 'jug pa mkhan por 'gyur/ /dbang sogs byed pa bla ma'o/ /grwa pa nye gnas slob ma'o/ /bya ba byed dang gsar bu'o/ /gnang bcas rigs dang sgo glegs can/ /bslab pa rtogs dang / dang po pa/ /bsam pa can dang snyan ngag byed/ /
<p>131b.6</p>tshig gi mtha' pa bstan bcos rig /bgegs mtha' ba ya pra t+yu ha/ /bya nA ya dang shI la ni/ /yon tan goms dang nges sbyor dang / /rnam bshad rnam par 'gril pa mtshungs/ /gsang sngags 'chad byed slob dpon te/ /yul lugs 'dzin pa brtul zhugs can/ /
<p>131b.7</p>mchod sbyin byed po mchod sbyin byed/ /zla ba'i btung ba dI kA ta/ /mchod sbyin mang ldan mchod sbyin byas/ /yAdzA mchod sbyin mtho ris 'dod/ /phur bu'i mchod sbyin s+tha pa ti/ /zla ba'i chang 'thung so ma paH/ /rig byed kun la mchod sbyin byas/ /mtho ris kun gyi yon
<p>132a</p>
<p>132a.1</p>gnas so/ /a nu tsa na rab brjod kyi/ /rig byed yan lag bcas pa bslabs/ /bla ma'i bka' yi rjes gnang thob/ /sa mA br-it+ta zhes pa'o/ /su tA mngon par khrus thob bo/ /gcig pur tshangs pa'i brtul zhugs spyod/ /cig
<p>132a.2</p>shos tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod/ /sa tIr+th+yA ni bla ma gcig /pra baM an+da bA da ni/ /mi ldan sbyin sreg mkhan du 'gyur/ /bsags ldan me ni id+ha cir/ /brgyud pa'i man ngag ai ti k+ShaM/ /bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa yis/ /man ngag yang dag rab sbyin pa/ /nye bar shes
<p>132a.3</p>dad dang por shes/ /shes nas rtsom pa nye ba'i rim/ /mchod sbyin gyis sreg a d+h+wa Da/ /mchod sbyin dang ni rgyud bdun pa/ /ma kha tra tu saM sta ra/ /gral dang / rgyun dang / thos pa'i las/ /bde ba'i chu dang / bla re'o/ 13 /rgyal po'i mchod sbyin bcos pa dang / /mi yi
<p>132a.4</p>bdag po'i a d+ha ra/ /'don dang sbyin sreg mgron 'ongs mchod/ /mtshun gsol ba dang gtor ma ste/ /'di rnams mchod sbyin chen po lnga/ /tshangs pa'i mchod sbyin klog 'don pa/ /lha yi mchod sbyin sbyin sreg yin/ /mi yi mchod sbyin mgron 'ongs mchod/ /
<p>132a.5</p>pha mes mchod sbyin mtshun tshim byed/ /'byung po'i mchod sbyin gtor mar brjod/ /'khor dang yongs bskor tshogs pa 'du/ /sa mi ti dang si pa dang / /sa mi ti dang saM mi dz+ya/ /kun tu gnas dang sa rda dang / /na na dang ni 'dus pa'o/ 12 /khyim dang dang po'i rgyud dang ni/ /
<p>132a.6</p>dang po/ sbyin sreg /'dus pa dang / /'phral 'dus pa dang / tA ra dang / /sa b+hA sad/ rab tu bsten/ /'dus dang cho ga blta ba'o/ /sdeb sbyor shes dang thos ldan mtshungs/ /shau ti/ shro ti ya tA'o/ /rigs tsam dang ni nyer 'tsho gang / /de ni bram zer 'gyur
<p>132a.7</p>bar bshad/ /a d+h+wa sUd dang / b+h+ra hri dang / /sbyin sreg byed po mchod sbyin dang / /snyan tshig rig byed rim pa las/ /a gnI d+hi sogs las phyi rol/ /dus mchod rig byed spyod byed pa/ /mchod sbyin zla ba'i bgrod pa dang / /dbang po'i brtul zhugs mtshungs pa'o/ /
<p>132b</p>
<p>132b.1</p>de ni sam stA pa'i mchod sbyin/ /bstod pa'i sa gzhi skye bos dben/ /rig byed sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs/ /thang mnyam pa dang bzhi mdo'o/ /sbyin sreg thab la ta ra ni/ /ma hA rI ro me ma khA/ /sbyin sreg du ba nges tshigs so/ /sbyin sreg thal ba beSh+Ta taM/ /phyugs
<p>132b.2</p>btags srog shing tsa ShA la/ /bum pa shin tu bskor ba'i khyim/ /srog shing rtse mo ta rma'o/ /rtsub shing rtsub stan a ra Ni/ /lho yi me dang / khyim gyi me/ /ha ba ni ste me gsum mo/ /me 'di gsum la te ta'o/ /dri Na ta ni legs sbyangs me/ /sa mr-i k+ShaM ni yongs
<p>132b.3</p>su spyod/ /nyer sbyod me ni rab tu sbyor/ /gang zhig khyim bdag dA nI ma/ /lho phyogs me ni pra Ni ya/ /de ni A la s+yar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sdeb sbyor gA ya trI/ /uSh+TI ka la sogs kyang ngo / /des brjod yam shing sreg rdzas dang / /de ni me yi gter du brjod/ /a
<p>132b.4</p>mi k+ShA sA pri to Sh+Ti/ /'o ma zho dang sbyar ba'o/ /sreg rdzas smin pa tsa tu te/ /zas mchog dang ni 'o thug go /ha bya lha zas 'o ma can/ /ka bya mtshun gsol zas yin no/ /de dag 'o ma ldan pa la/ /sU Sha byin sU Sha can/ /rlung yab dang ni bsil yab ni/ /ri dwags
<p>132b.5</p>pags pa las byas pa'o/ /dgang gzar blugs gsar la sogs dbye/ /blugs gzar bra d+ha ba nyer 'dzin/ /sru kar+thA hU sbyin sreg byed/ /gzar bu mar la 'dri byed pa'o/ /u pa kr-i ta dud 'gro ni/ /mchod sbyin ched du gsod par btags/ /phan tshun zhing dang gsang
<p>132b.6</p>gtor byas/ /gsod pa'i tshad kyi phyugs yin no/ /brjod bya'i rtags can pra mI ta/ /bsnyen rdzogs 'thor 'thung byas nas gsod/ /sreg rdzas sbyin sreg sbyin byas pa/ /zas ldan pa Sha Ta byas pa'o/ /de gnyis gcig ste mchod sbyin lha/ /sbyin sreg rdzas bAn+na m+mA/ /
<p>132b.7</p>de nas thub pa smra ba bcad/ /dik+ShI mtha' can mchod sbyin gtso/ /de dag gsod las byed ya dz+nyi yaM/ /mchod sbyin las 'dod pUrta'o/ /khA ta la sogs las rnams so/ /'dod pa'i pU rta la sogs las/ /a mr-i ta dang pi g+ha sa/ /mchod sbyin lhag ma'i bza' ba ste/ /mchod
<p>133a</p>
<p>133a.1</p>sbyin lhag ma'i rdzas dag ni/ /snod can sbyin dang rnam par gtong / /gtor ma 'bul ba sbyin pa dang / /nye bar 'gyed dang rnam par gtong / /rnam byin brims dang rnam par bkram/ /so sor byin dang mngon du bstan/ /'bul ba yon dang me tog go /gshin don
<p>133a.2</p>ster ba sbyin pa ste/ /au dza de hi ka zhes bya/ /pha gshin sbyin bA ne ba sa/ /shing zan de las bstan bcos sbyin/ /'phags pa can dang bsod snyoms sogs/ /pha mes bya ba brgyad pa dang / /nyin mo'i cha dang ku ta pa/ /dus ston zla dus mchod pa'o/ /lha yi sgo dang lha'i ltang
<p>133a.3</p>mo/ /gyad kyi ltad mo ma hUM ri/ /ko shal can yun ring dang / /'don pa po dang chos smra ba/ /mngon par 'ongs dang mgron 'ongs dang / /rab 'joms 'joms dang bi shi kA/ /tshes zad 'dzin byed mthun pa dang / ba ku la dag mtshungs pa'o/ /mnyam pa rkang pa 'dzin pa
<p>133a.4</p>dang / /mngon par smra dang nye bar 'dzin/ /gsong por smra ba rnam pa gnyis/ /nye bar kun 'dzin cho ga bzhin/ /mngon par smra bya mchod par byed/ /dag pa rnam par bcas mchod mtshungs/ /gtor ma'o gus par nyan pa dang / /rnam par gnas dang nye bar gnas/ /yongs
<p>133a.5</p>su spyod dang nye bar spyod/ /spyod pa dang ni spyod lam gnas/ /tshol ba yongs su tshol ba dang / /rjes su tshol dang kun tu tshol/ /gsol ba dang ni zhu ba'o/ /slong dang mngon par slong ba dang / /don du gnyer ba zhes bya'o/ /mchod pa'i ri ni mchod yon te/ /zhabs kyi ched
<p>133a.6</p>du chu zhabs bsil/ /'gron po glo bur gsar 'ongs dang / /legs skyes zhes pa rnams yin no/ /'gro dang 'khyam dang slar yang 'gro/ 'chag pa dang ni 'gro ba'o/ /nye reg dang ni zhal bsil lo/ /ga N+Du Sha dang kha gang byed/ /mthar gyis pa dang go rims dang / /
<p>133a.7</p>yongs su rim pa rjes su rim/ /shin tu gnas dang yongs su 'gro/ /nye bar dgod dang nges pa dang / /brtul zhugs bsnyen gnas bsod nams can/ /shin tu gso dang nye bar gnas/ /bsnyen gnas kun nas sgrol byed dang / /'da' bar byed dang brtul zhugs
<p>133b</p>
<p>133b.1</p>mdzes/ /zla ba bsnyen gnas byed pa dang / /gcig mtha' gsum mthar za ba dang / /zas drug pa dang dus can dang / /mchod sbyin gnas dang mchod sbyin brtan/ /dben pa tha dad bdag nyid dang / /glu len pa dang rig byed 'don/ /tshangs pa'i rig byed 'don pa
<p>133b.2</p>dang / /mtshan mo grub pa brjod par 'gyur/ /tshangs pa dang ni bi ra li/ /klog cing kha chu 'thor ba ni/ /tshangs pa'i thig le zhes par 'gyur/ /skyed dang rig byed klog pa ni/ /tshangs pa'i brtsa sa las byung / /yon tan sparma sa ti ka'o/ /der ni mtho ba'i yan lag
<p>133b.3</p>kyang / /bsam gtan rnal 'byor stan dang ni/ /tshangs stan rtogs pa'i cho ga rim/ /gtso bo dang ni rtogs pa'o/ /rjes kyi rtog pa rjes gcod pa/ /'du byed sngon du 'dzin pa ni/ /nye bar byed dang thos pa'o/ /tshangs spyod dbang po mtha' dag sdom/ /dbang po thul
<p>133b.4</p>dang grong du zhi/ /zhi dang sdom brtson sdom ldan dang / /brtul zhugs che ldan yo b+hing+ga/ /gtsang gnas khrus kyi brtul zhugs can/ /gang zhig brtul zhugs dbang gis ni/ /thang nyal gcer nyal s+tha N+Di la/ /de nas chags bral ta ma pa/ /nyon mongs dang bral
<p>133b.5</p>gnyis las 'das/ /rtags dang spyod pa chos phreng ldan/ /gsal ba'i brtul zhugs bkram pa'o/ /gang zhig rmongs pas spun zla yi/ /thu bor bag ma byed de'i gcung / /pa ri be rtar de shes bya/ /pa ri be ste de'i phu bo/ /bI ba ha ni rnam nyams med/ /brtul zhugs
<p>133b.6</p>skyes dang 'du byed 'dor/ /ro langs brtul zhugs can thams cad/ /mngon par dang byed gdur bar byed/ /dngos med dang ni du ni hA/ /gtong ba myur 'gro tshangs spyod can/ /pA ShA N+Da dang rigs ngan dang / /kun gyi rtags can gsum po mtshungs/ /spyod byed dang ni
<p>133b.7</p>sgrol byed dang / /tshul khrims spyod pa gtsang ba 'ongs/ /gtsang ma/ dag pa/ dri ma med/ /bsod nams dang ni yid gzhungs so/ /sA lA sha yi dbyug 'dzin dang / /chu stod kyi ni brtul zhugs can/ /chu shing dang ni 'od ma 'dzin/ /g.yang gzhi dang ni ri dwags lpags/ /
<p>134a</p>
<p>134a.1</p>bud med brtul zhugs bstan/ br-iShI/ /spyi blugs/ chu snod bum chung ngo / /mchod rten kha dang me tog can/ /ka ra ka zhes bya ba'o/ /bsod snyoms pa dang slong mo pa/ /'tshob pa dang bslang bya ba/ /slong mo can dang sbyin byar 'gyur/ /'di
<p>134a.2</p>yi bsam gtan ldan dang byed/ /kha ton dang ni bzlas brjod dang / /khrus byas khrus chu sa ba ni/ /rig byed dang ni bzlas kun gyis/ /sdig pa 'joms par byed pa'o/ /mthong ba bco lnga gnam stong la/ /phyogs mtha' so so'i sbyin sreg byed/ /rtag tu lus sgrub ltos
<p>134a.3</p>pa yi/ /las gang de ni rtsol ba'o/ /rtag tu las ni yang dag sdud/ /gya tshom gcig gi TuM ka ta/ /nges pa gang zhig rtag tu las/ /glo bur ba la bsnyen bkur bsgrub/ /de nas lhag ma dag byed 'gyur/ /mchod sbyin sa rI bA ba ta/ /u ba bI ta mchod sbyin gyi/ /srad
<p>134a.4</p>bu dang ni gnyis skyes ldan/ /tshangs pa'i skud pa dag byed de/ /lag pa'i g.yas phyogs rab tu dkri/ /prA rtsI nA pI ta g.yon dkris/ /ni bA ta ni mgul bar 'phyangs/ /pany+tsa ba Ti brang dang sked/ /mchod phyir thogs dang yang dag ldan/ /mchan khung phur ma ko pA ni/ /
<p>134a.5</p>kats+tsha ngos su ldan pa'o/ /dpral bar thal ba'i re khA gang / /sol ris gsum dang tiR+Ya ka /be khI ta yi thig le ni/ /b+hA la dang ni ba dang gsum/ /sor mo'i rtse mor tIr+tha lha/ /mthe chung rtsa bar tshangs lha'i chu/ /gung mo mtheb mdzub mtshun gyi chu/ /mthe ba chen
<p>134a.6</p>rtsa bar tshangs chu sbyin/ /tshangs pa slar byung tshangs nyid dang / /tshangs pa yang dag ldan pa dang / /lha sogs skye ba de bzhin no/ /dka' tshegs dka' thub la sogs pa/ /mal med 'gro ba b+hA b+h+ya na/ /shes bya lta ba b+hi das grol/ /b+h+yu di to trau rim ji bzhin/ san+b+ya
<p>134a.7</p>sa ba t+yAn dang / /sa ne phe re rnyed la sogs dang / /'gro byed mkhas byung tshul 'chos dang / /tshul 'chos pa yi bya ba'o/ /sde gsum chos dang 'dong pa nor/ /sde tshan bzhi pa thar pa'o/ /de stobs bzhi ldan tshangs pa yi/ /grong ba'i lam gyi mchog yin no/ /bden
<p>134b</p>
<p>134b.1</p>smra shis brjod bstod pa rnams/ /'dun par drang srong chen po rnams/ /bram ze'i drang srong gnas 'jog sogs/ /thos sogs byas pa thos drang sogs/ /a tri 'dab sogs rgyal drang srong / /skabs kyi drang srong rnams kyang ste/ /ji mi la sogs rig byed pa/ /
<p>134b.2</p>rgyas pa dang ni 'od srungs pa/ /dga' ba dang ni gling skyes bu/ /pr-i ta ko Ti bden ldan bu/ /pha rol 'gro dang gnas byed dang / /bde ldan ma yi bu dang ni/ /bde ldan skyes ldan rgyas pa dang / /pha rol gzhan dgra b+hA ra ta/ /hri ta kA ki rgya shug gu/ /17 /grog mkhar skyes
<p>134b.3</p>dang grog mkhar can/ /chu bdag dang ni ku sha'i rigs/ /bal+mI ka dang grog mkhar bu/ /snyan ngag thu bo grog mkhar sras/ /ku sha'i rgyud dang gnas ngan dang / /sna tshogs bshes gnyen glang bdag skyes/ /gnas 'jog rgyu ni tI mgon dang / /a dz+ya mA na brla
<p>134b.4</p>ldan dang / /sha ta nA ku/ gau ta ma/ /gzegs zan 'od srungs mtshungs pa'o/ /thang la 'bar dang lha yi 'bangs/ /kA shi'i rgyal dang bdud rtsi skyes/ /skyong byed dang ni rnal 'byor can/ /glang mo skyes dang ring mo'i bu/ /khyab 'jug spas dang 'khyog mo can/ /
<p>134b.5</p>shA na kI dang rlabs ldan sor/ /nA sa ya na brgyad klu dang / /phyogs ldan 'chang ba mi ni brjod/ /nye bar 'dam dang 'bras bu 'byor/ /byed ldan mtha' 'dzin slong ba dang / /ra ba kA ya na'i rab/ /kin+dA k+Shi'i bu pA Ni Na/ /pA Ni ni'i bu sbrul 'dzin dang / /skyes bu byed dang
<p>134b.6</p>gdong byed dang / /yon tan byin dang pa ta li/ /dga' byed ldan dang dga' byed dang / /byA Di yid gzhungs ldan pa dang / /bik+Sha bA si skyes pa dang / /nabs so/ mchog sred/ kAt+yA dang / /kA t+yA ya na gtsang skyes dang / /rnam spros b+hAr d+h+wa dza dang / /'dab bzang skyes
<p>134b.7</p>dang ba g+hu byed/ /nag po'i 'bangs dang be d+ha' dang / /drag po dang ni 'khyog po byed/ /b+hA ra bi dang sa rtal+la/ /srid pa'i 'byor dang gtsang mar brjod/ /sa yi snying po khog pa dang / /'jug pa 'khyog dang 'di dag mtshungs/ /mchod sbyin balka la rnal 'byor/ /tshangs pa dga'
<p>135a</p>
<p>135a.1</p>ba'i lugs gnyis so/ /de ni legs bsdus zhes byar 'gyur/ /gang zhig snga bar dran byed pa'o/ /bag ma dang ni nye zung dang / /gnyis smra smra byed lag bsdams so/ /nye bar rtsol dang nye bar 'dren/ /byis pa las byed 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas
<p>135a.2</p>dril bu'i yan lag dang / /na gu la dang bkra shis sgra/ /bkra shis phreng ldan rul+la lu/ /ku lu re tu lo la dang / /yau ta ke dang yu ta kaM /yon tan rkang bkra shis brgyad/ /tu ra ta rti ki dga' byed/ /sgo yi rgyan dang ka bar 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dang ni phreng ba can/ /rta babs
<p>135a.3</p>rtsa dang phreng ba dang / /rtse mo sbyar ba 'di dag mtshungs/ /gu pa ka dang me tog can/ /gu he nges skyed mdangs ldan mchog /spyod byed mthil dang rab tu 'phrog /bu ga rtse byed 'dab ma dang / /karka re To zla ba phyed/ /lha yi sor mo sgo yi rgyan/ /a buT+Ta por/ 
<p>135a.4</p>pi ga sha /grong khyer dang ni Ta ku ra/ /ka Ta ka dang yi ge gsum/ /ni saM chu shing bcud 'dzin dang / /ra tar+d+hi ki bde dang khrus/ /kun sbyor nye bar 'dzin pa dang / /lus dang btung ba sh+li Tha dang / /kro Di bye ba 'khyud pa yang / /yongs rtsom pa ri kun 'joms dang / /
<p>135a.5</p>kro Da kroDa ci 'ga' zhig /kun tu rab sbyor a ba ti/ /log spyod mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / /grong chos 'o byed dga' dang 'dzem/ /bde chen rol dga' mi tshangs spyod/ /ku no nA ti bzang ba dang / /b+ha R+Shi ti dang dga' dang rmongs/ /skye ba 'ching ba dga' ba bsgrubs/ /
<p>135a.6</p>k+Sha pi saM ste sa naM dang / /mi ba ti dang dga' ba'i sgra/ /gang du di sbas ya ti naM/ /de du ma no ra taM du 'dod/ /dben dang skye bo med dang bkan/ /gsang ba/ tshogs med/ dgon gsang chen/ /'di drug gsang ba zhes pa'o/ /u pI shu dang 'khyud pa dang / /ni
<p>135a.7</p>sto ka dang nye bar lci/ /shes pa dang ni ra ba gsal ba/ /gsang ba de las byung ba'o/ /mchog gi tshig la seng ge dang / /stag dang / shar b+ha/ /khyu mchog go /dpa' bo glang po rta cang shes/ /mkhas dang pad+ma dkar sogs smra/ /skyes bu gtso rjes rjod byed
<p>135b</p>
<p>135b.1</p>dang / /zhes pa paN+Di ta snyan ngag mkhan po dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sde yis rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba mu tig phreng ba las bram ze'i sde rdzogs so// //spyi bor dbang bskur rgyal po'i bu/ /lag skyes rgyal rigs rnam par rgyal/ /
<p>135b.2</p>pri dza lin+d+hi mi bdag /k+Sha ta ni gnam gyi rgyal/ /sa dbang / sa skyong / sa yi bdag /sa 'dzin mi bdag sa 'tsho dang / /sa gzhi skyong dang lha yi rgyal/ /k+Sha d+ha ra dang sa spyod dang / /rgyal phran dang ni dum bu can/ /spyi bor dbang bskur mi'i bdag po/ /skye ba gcig dang cha shas
<p>135b.3</p>bdag /rje btsun mi bdag skye dgu yi/ /bdag dang 'jigs pa sel byed pa'o/ /yul bdag mi dbang zas kyi bdag /sa dbang bdag po zhes pa yang / /gang gis rgyal 'dod mchod sbyin byas/ /dkyil 'khor dbang phyug brtan pa'o/ /gang gis bka' dang bstan pa dang / /
<p>135b.4</p>rgyal po rnams ni mtshungs pa'o/ /gang dag rgyal po zhes brjod pa/ /rgyal po ma lus kun gyis ni/ /phyag byas lhag pa'i dbang phyug go /'khor los sgyur ba sa kun dbang / /mi bdag gzhan gyi rgyal phran no/ /rgyal po phal dang rgyal rigs tshogs/ /
<p>135b.5</p>rgyal po ldan pa sa 'dzin tshogs/ /dang po'i rgyal po pri du dang / /bai n+ya ka dang bum pa can/ /gzhan las rgyal dang lang tsho can/ /mAm+na ta la sogs pa dang / /ga TuM gi ka zhes pa dang / /ya mad a g+ni dga' byed dang / /ngan spong skyes dang rdul bzang skyes/ /
<p>135b.6</p>dga' ba can dang ra d+hu'i bu/ /shing rta bcu pa de yi bu/ /skyed pa po dang ra ma Na/ /tshul bzang ma ni r+d+ha sha dang / /tshed ma las dga' byed zla/ /dga' byed bzang dang gu bi dang / /shing rta bcu pa las skyes pa/ /mtshon byed dang ni lag ma Na/ /bshes gnyen bzang dang
<p>135b.7</p>sprin sgra rgyal/ /mdzod ldan pa dang mdzod 'dzin skyes/ /kai ka yi dang / ka kI/ /lus 'phags can dang skyed pa po/ /me thi lI yi sar byung dang / /ra ma'i bu dang ku sha sar/ /ha lU man dang 'od ldan dang / /ti rA ni ni mya ngan med/ /kun tu 'dren dang spyod mchog dang / /
<p>136a</p>
<p>136a.1</p>dga' byed pho nya srid sgrub skyes/ /ti Di kun tu dga' byed dang / /skyob byed skyes dang seng ge dga'/ /sang skyes gzhon nu byis pa dang / /mgrin bzang dang ni nyi ma dga'/ /e la gang dang rtogs byed dang / /dbang chen dang ni yal 'dab
<p>136a.2</p>po/ /de nas sha kun+da yi bu/ /thams cad 'dul dang b+ha ra ta/ /sha kun+da skyes dauSh+man+ta/ /yang yang 'gro dang yong ba can/ /srid sgrub lus skyes gcod byed dang / /brtson 'grus ldan dang 'byung po'i steng / /'dam bu dang ni/ nai Sha d+ha/ /bsod nams grags ldan
<p>136a.3</p>rab dang ldan/ /thos ldan zhi pa 'jigs chen dang / /pra b+hi ya dang dga' ba'o/ /bu mo yo dza na gan+na/ /gI ge yI dang bde ldan ma/ /rnam pa kra brtson 'grus lus bkra skyes/ /nag mo a Sho da rI dang / /gan+na ba ti rgyas pa'i ma/ /shaM gA skyes dang ga gA ma/ /bu
<p>136a.4</p>ni lha yi brtul zhugs dang / /zhi ba gsar dang gang+ga'i bu/ /gang+gA skyes dang 'jigs pa dang / /mdzod gnas kla klo 'chi bdag dang / /grong gi nor zhes bya ba'o/ /yul 'khor srung gi ma las skyes/ /shes rab mig dang ma can bu/ /skya ba'o mI Di so so yi/ /kAn+ta
<p>136a.5</p>kun+di 'di dag mtshungs/ /a mrA li ka las skyes pa/ /bin+d+ha ba dang a mra'i bu/ /'thab dka'i dgra ngan rgyal po ste/ /gAn+na ra skyes 'thab pa med/ /chos rgyal skyes ni mI D+hi ste/ /chos kyi bu ni dka' thub bu/ /ki ka rnams ni rjes su skyes/ /ma skyes dgra ni g.yul
<p>136a.6</p>ngor brtan/ /br-i ko da ri 'jigs sde'o/ /dpa' bo'i rdul dang ka Ta'i rma/ /tshogs skyes klu yi stobs zhes bya/ /rlung gi bu ni Di rma b+hi tA/ /ba ka kinI karmI ra/ /dza rI sbrang rtsi 'joms pa'o/ /a rdzu nal bu raM kra/ /stobs bzang dbang dang 'dam pa che/ /yAn+na cod pan
<p>136a.7</p>gAN+Di/ /snying po med dang brgya byin dga'/ /'jigs rung rnam rgyal rgyal byed dang / /ma bya pA tsA d+ha na gang / /gzhon pa dkar po bIr+t+ta g+ho/ /gsang ba'i rab dbye ka bi skyes/ /dga' ba'i dbyangs 'gyur gAN+DA bi/ /gaN+Di bi dang d+ha nu'o/ /trau ba dI dang ri skyes ma/ /nag
<p>136b</p>
<p>136b.1</p>mo lnga len ma skye'o/ /skyed ma bsod nams grags ldan ma/ /mchog sbyin 'dren ma rig byed skyes/ /rtag tu lang tsho ldan ma'o/ /kra ya stobs bzang ma gnyis ma/ /srid sgrub ma dang lus ldan ma/ /rigs med dang ni lhar bcas kyi/ /ma las skyes pa
<p>136b.2</p>skye dgu skyes/ /sa'i rna ba la ang+ga'i rgyal/ /rA d+har skyes dang 'joms byed bu/ /nyi ma dga' ba rnams yin no/ /bum pa can la mthar byed dang / /dus kyi phyi ma mun dbang phyug /nag mo skyes dang sde bzang dang / /bkra ba'i sa dang gcod byed do/ bre bo che la
<p>136b.3</p>rgyun gyi bdag /b+hA ra d+h+wa dza'i slob dpon dang / /chu yi bdag dang bla ma'o/ /bre bo che'i bu chu yi bu/ /skye bo mgul dang drang srong rgyal/ /yongs su 'phangs pa'i bu yang ngo / /dza ra ku ru 'gro byed mchog /ba the ta s+ya tshes bcas ma/ /dza ta ko ru ma na mA/ /lha mo
<p>136b.4</p>zhes dang e ta dag /gnas pa can mi dang lus bdag dang / /rnam snang bu dang stobs ldan dang / /mngal can bin+da ba li'i bu/ /mtshon cha can dang br-i to pa/ /'dul dbyangs dang bu mchod rten dang / /byis pa skyong dang tsi rI ra/ /shing rta che'i bu mkhar ba dang / /dza ra sa
<p>136b.5</p>t+ya bde mchog skyes/ /rna ba can dang rtsa ba'i lha/ /rtsa ba bzang dang myu gu'i cha'o/ /bka' dbang gros pa blon po dang / /gros kyi snod dang gzhung lugs 'dzin/ /blo dang bzod pa can zhes pa/ /gzhan ni las dang lhan cig spyod/ /slob dpon chen po gtso bo dang / /
<p>136b.6</p>slob dpon chen po mdun na 'don/ /bde legs can dang lta thog pa/ /gnyer pa dang ni spyan gzigs pa/ /mig gi chos can spyan pa dang / /rtog dang rtog par byed pa po/ /tha snyad rnams la blta ba'o/ /sgo srung ba dang sgo skyong ba/ /sgor gnas sgo ldan dbyug pa
<p>136b.7</p>can/ /sgor gnas pa la blta ba'o/ /pra tI hAR+Ya nyer gnas blta/ /de ni be ta byed pa dang / /pe tra 'dzin dang to Da ka /log sgrub skyes dang 'jug byed pa/ /snyems tshogs can dang dpya yi gnas/ /mkhar can dang ni rdzong skyong ba/ /dus bu skyong dang dum bu can/ /srung
<p>137a</p>
<p>137a.1</p>ma'i tshogs pa sku srungs pa/ /be tra'i sde dang bsrung ba'o/ /gnas brtan dang ni grong dpon dang / /gzhis bdag gnyer ba hu ri pa/ /pho brang nang pa nang mi dang / /nang na gnas pa'i skye bo'o/ /gser mdzod pa dang / gser gnyer pa/ /dngul
<p>137a.2</p>mdzod pa dang 'dul gnyer ba/ /grong gnas pa dang gnas byed pa/ /spyan pa de nas sa bi ba/ /slob dpon gnong can 'gram dang ni/ /grol ba'i las dang gros byed pa/ /dung gi spyan pa dung pa dang / /spyan pa dang por byed pa mtshungs/ /dar gu li ka so rtsi byin/ /rab
<p>137a.3</p>'jug byed dang 'jug pa po/ /'jug byed bu dang rgyug byed pa/ /dzam g+hA ka ri dzam b+hi ka / btsun mo'i sku srung kany+tsa ki /gnas byed dang ni nyug rum pa/ /ma ning nyams pa za ma mtshungs/ /yang dag thob byed lus nyad ba/ /zhabs thog pa dang 'tsho ba pa/ /grogs
<p>137a.4</p>byed la dang spyid byed pa/ /yul mthar gnas pa'i rgyal po dgra/ /de yi pha rol bshes yin no/ /u pA shin bar gnas yul/ /rtsa 'dzin dang ni rgyal gnas so/ /dgra bo mi dga' yongs bgrod dang / /dgrar 'dzin pa dang bshes mi byed/ /sdang byed/ zhe 'gras/ 
<p>137a.5</p>'khon byed dang / /mi mdza' ba dang pha rol rgol/ /mngon bgrod dgra byed rnam sdang dang / /mi phan byed dang phyir rgol dang / /yongs gnas 'gran zla mngon gzhom bya/ /dzi g+ha kun tu 'gran sdang byed/ /rnam sdang bzod byed mi dga' byed/ /bzhin mnyam mtshungs pa
<p>137a.6</p>'gran zla dang / /grogs dang gros gnyen/ snag gnyen dang / /sdug dang / rtsed rol/ lhan cig spyod/ /sI shUr+tha nI zhes pa yang / /dbang bcas legs spyod/ legs sdud dang / /'grogs dang 'dun pa'i skye bo dang / /bdun brgyud gnyen dang mdza' grogs
<p>137a.7</p>bshes/ /ljang gu'i mtshon 'dar brjod pa dang / /skad cig tsam gyis mtshon gyur pa/ /sngon po'i chos bzhin brtan pa dang / /dga' dang dor byas rjes su 'jug /mkha' la rtsen dang rol rtsed dang / /der ni nye bar gyur pa'o/ /lta nyul dang ni rtog mi pa/ /rtog dpyod
<p>137b</p>
<p>137b.1</p>byed dang nyul mi dang / /ldum bu pa dang so rtog mi/ /bya gtong dang ni nang yan no/ /lo shes rtsis mkhan lha zhes dang / /lha yig pa dang shes ldan dang / /dus shes yung tsam thang cig shes/ /gnas shes 'grangs byed lha 'dri ba/ /gus par 'dri dang sems brjod
<p>137b.2</p>'gyur/ /pra s+ya sha ka Ti zhes pa'o/ /der ni nges 'gro sbyin pa dang / /lha la 'dri dang nye bar thos/ /rgyud dang grub mtha' shes pa dang / /sbyin bdag khyim bdag mtshungs pa'o/ /bris mkhan dang ni yig mkhan dang / /yi ge pa dang 'dri byed pa/ /kir ka dang
<p>137b.3</p>shAn+ti ka /yi ge can dang snag tsha'i zong / /kA k+Shi ka dang po li ka /de nas me lA bu rma lA/ /dga' byed dang ni yi ge 'chags/ /snag tsha'i nor bu snag tsha'i nor/ /yi ge khron can bArta la/ /snag tsha chu ngang ma lA dang / /mda' la mig sman snag tsha'o/ /myu gu
<p>137b.4</p>yi ge'i 'dab can dang / /kA tsa na dang yi ge 'ching / /yi ge'i pho nya khu tshur byed/ /phrin yig brjod dang rjod byed pa/ /yi ge'i gnas dang dri gtsang khang / /rgyas 'debs rkyen byed 'dri byed dang / /byi bya/ kun tu bri bya dang / /yi ge'i rim pa rim pa gnyis rnams so/ /
<p>137b.5</p>la khI la ka 'phrin yig khyer/ /lhag par 'phrin yig spyod byed 'dod/ /yig mkhan las byed rkyen bcug pa'o/ /skyes kha dang ni pho nya ba/ /du t+yi de dngos las yin no/ /lam la tshong pa 'gron po dang / /lam 'grul 'gron lam gnas spos pa/ /'gro byed
<p>137b.6</p>lam po de nas ni/ /sdud byed lam pa dang ni rgyud/ /mnyam pa sa mu na sA tha/ /dzang+ka 'dug gnas 'di dag mtshungs/ /dzA ga ma la sogs pa'i rab tu byed pa'o/ /bdag po blon po thugs ches dang / /mdzod dang yul 'khor rdzong dang dpung / /rgyal po'i yan
<p>137b.7</p>lag gnyis yin no/ /khab dang pho brang zhes pa dang / /dums dang 'thab dang chas pa dang / /gnas dang nor gtong gzhan brten rnams/ /drug rnams yon tan zhes bya'o/ /nus pa dang ni mthu stobs dang / /dga' bar byas dang sngags bzlas dang / /zad dang
<p>138a</p>
<p>138a.1</p>gnas dang 'phel ba dang / /sde tshan gsum po rig pa'o/ /rnam par gnon dang skyes bu'i mthu/ /gzi brjid dang ni mdangs dang stobs/ /dpung dang mthu brjid can dang ni/ /bang mdzod nor gyis gang ba dang / /dbye dang sdud dang dums dang ni/ /dpya 'tshal thabs ni rnam pa bzhi/ /khral
<p>138a.2</p>dang sdud dang dpyad dang ni/ /phra ma dang ni skyom mtshungs/ /de nas dbye dang nye bar 'gyed/ /u pa d+ha ni chos sogs kyi/ /gang zhig nye bar blta ba'o/ /drug ni lta bar byed pa ste/ /gang zhig gsum sogs spyod yul lo/ /mtshungs pa blo thub yid ches so/ /nyams na dman pa ji
<p>138a.3</p>ltar 'grims/ /ma nyams rigs pa rtog pa dang / /gzugs ston pa dang mtshungs par gnas/ /rigs pa thabs dang thob pa dang / /'os pa 'thad pa lugs bzhin dang / /rigs pas thob dang gnas su brjod/ /mngags pa gang zhig la ma btsas pa/ /gang de
<p>138a.4</p>so sor bstan pa'o/ /des bstan kun tu bstan pa dang / /mngags bstan gdams pa bstan pa dang / /bstan pa dka' dang rjes su gnang / /khrims lugs dang ni 'dzin pa'o/ /kun tu gnas dang yul chos dang / /yang dag rab 'dzin kun tu 'ching / /nges
<p>138a.5</p>gzung / sdoms dang / 'ching ba mtshungs/ /nyes pa/ nongs pa/ skyon can dang / /tuN+Di kA dang rigs bab 'gro/ /gnyis sogs chad pa nyis 'gyur len/ /thob bya dpya dang sdud dka' dang / /khral bar thob pa sho gam mo/ /'di yi 'byor pa kun n+wa dang / /
<p>138a.6</p>nye bar sbyin dang nye bar spyod/ /zang zing lany+tsa u kau dang / /rab tu ston dang kun tu ston/ /mdzod 'dzin 'bul ba nye bar sbyin/ /skyes dang zhu rten zhes bya dang / /rnam gzhag dang ni mdun 'jog dang / /sbyin par brtsams dang dad rdzas dang / /de yi dus la sbyin pa'o/ /phyi
<p>138a.7</p>dus la ni A ma ti/ /'di la mthong ba'i 'bras bu dang / /phyi mar mthong ba'i 'bras bu dang / /mthong med me dang chu la sogs/ /mthong ba rang bzhin dgra bo dang / /sa skyong shin tu 'jigs pa dang / /rang phyogs mthu yis 'jigs pa'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang ka Ta kaM/ /kun
<p>138b</p>
<p>138b.1</p>tu gnas dang phung po skyob/ /nges 'jug dang ni khyogs can dang / /byi dor can dang A ju byed/ /rab tu rtsom dang bka' lung ngo / /rnga yab dang ni g.yo ba byed do/ /rnga yab rnga ma spu can dang / /sa raM tsA ba tsU la kaM /kra ye rlung g.yab lus gcig pa/ /bo ma guts+tsha kaM dang ni/ /
<p>138b.2</p>gaM ga r-i zhes bya ba'o/ /mi bdag stan ni bzang po'i stan/ /de ni gser gyi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /seng ge'i khri'o gdugs tshad skyob/ /pu po Ta skyes tsha ba sgrib/ /uT+kU Ti dang 'khor lo'i lus/ /sa bdag la gnas rgyal po yi/ /rtags mtshan gser gyi dbyug
<p>138b.3</p>pa dang / /nye bar mtshon ces bya ba'o/ /bum pa bzang po gang ba'i bum/ /gser gyi ril ba b+h+r-ing+ga ra/ /so rtsi'i snod ni ka raM ka /s+thA gi kA lu kA zhes so/ /phye ma lA ba phye ma ni/ /'gyur byed mtshon gyis bsgribs pa'o/ /khyogs dang 'degs dang do li kA/ /
<p>138b.4</p>bring+khA/ /bring+khA la ni dang / /bring+kho la zhes bya ba dang / /bring+kha ring+kho la ring+ga/ /breng+kha Na rang+kha NA+o/ /rgyal srid kyi yan lag gi rab tu byed pa'o// //glang rta shing rta rkang thang rnams/ /dmag gi yan lag rnam pa bzhi/ /mi mthun lce dang glang mo skyes/ /glang po rwa can
<p>138b.5</p>nA ga dang / /rdzing can/ /lag ldan/ /ri dgas che/ /pI lu mang 'thung gnyis 'thung dang / /cher myos i b+ha/ kA ri TA/ /kA TI ral can/ 'dus pa dang / /rgya mtsho can dang bum pa can/ /ha sti/ ma taM/ ga skyes dang / /skyob byed mche ba gnyis pa
<p>138b.6</p>dang / /sdong po 'dzin dang sdong po dga'/ /pad+ma can dang 'khri shing can/ /pre tsi la dang / pe tsa kI/ /so ldan mche ba'i stobs can dang / /glang mo'i bdag dang dza la ka /paN+Di pA dang / bA dzI ta/ dI r+g+ha sA ru ta zhes dang / /an+taHswo de te rA dang / nirdU ra dang
<p>138b.7</p>mtshon byed rten/ /nyi ma thob dang 'khor lo'i rkang / /stobs mchog Sha hA ya na dang / /myos pa'i bri ku/ bur shing rtse/ /gnyis 'joms daN+Da pA la d+hi/ /lus chen dI hA/ 'gram byin dang / /sgrogs byed gnyis 'thung bu rnams so/ 53 /lag ldan ma dang glang mo
<p>139a</p>
<p>139a.1</p>dang / /rna ba 'dzin ma b+hA ba sA/ /gnas ma i b+h+ya ka tsA dang / /gzhon ma/ tshogs can/ sgeg ma'o/ /khyu bdag chu yi mgon po dang / /ka la b+ha dang glang po'i bdag /bik+ko pr-I ta sa chen dang / /so dbang u da gra da na/ /zab mo'i rigs
<p>139a.2</p>dang glang po bcas/ /gang 'gyur lcags kyus gdul dka' ba/ /g.yo ba can dang bya la ka /shin tu gdug dang ma taM skyes/ /gcer bu rab bye mir+b+hin+na/ /sgrogs byed myos pa'i so ldan dang / /glang po'i chang dang myos pa'i chang / /glang po smyon pa glang po rgod/ /rgyal
<p>139a.3</p>po'i phyi yi glang po'i rgyal/ /mchog tu rnam par rgyal byed pa/ /gang 'gyur phal chen myos ral can/ /pU ri ShA sogs nges par dregs/ /glang mo spos kyi glang mo de/ /gang zhig khro byed khros pa'o/ /skad cig gis ni dbang du 'gyur/ /gal te mtshon pas b+hA sto/ /
<p>139a.4</p>'od zer can dang mchod sbyin gyi/ /glang po mchog rgyal rtags pa mtshungs/ /bi taM glang po phal pa'o/ /glang tshogs glang po 'dus pa'o/ /dud 'gro byin dang gdab pa dang / /glang po'i yongs 'dren bi d+ha'o/ /bum pa'i 'og ni bA ha N+yaM/ /pra ti ma ni de yi 'og /bum pa
<p>139a.5</p>can dang glang 'bur gnyis/ /de yi bar ni bid+ha'o/ /A rak+ta ni bum pa'i mtshams/ /gaN+Da sham kha 'gram pa'i mtshams/ /mche ba'i sha ni pra beSh+Ta/ /ka rI ra ka so'i rtsa ba/ /sna yi gong ni stu la'o/ /lag sor lag pa'i ze 'brul/ /dpral ba a ba grA ha'o/ /rgyab kyi
<p>139a.6</p>sha ni ta l+ya lA ma/ /phrag pa'i phyogs ni A pa ni/ /yI k+Shi kA ni mig 'bras so/ /mig gi zur phyogs nirlu dz+wa/ /san+da na ni mig rus 'og /A ya skA ra byin pa'i rtsa/ /pro ha rkang pa'i tshigs la'o/ /pak+Sha b+hA ga rtsi ba ma'i cha/ /dan+ta b+hA ga mche ba'i rtse/ /rje ngar phyi
<p>139a.7</p>dang rtse mo'i ni/ /a pa raM dang yo gi ta/ /rje ngar bdun dang rtse mo'i cha/ /gA trar 'gyur ro so rtsa ka /mjug ma'i rtsa ba dang ni mtha'o/ /gang po'i kha cha pad+ma'i kaM /rna ba'i rtsa ba tsU li kA/ /ru ladz+dz+he lA rna ba'i nag /myos pa'i sbyor ba bya stA ra/ /de nas sbyin pa myos
<p>139b</p>
<p>139b.1</p>pa'o/ /glang po'i rgyan la/ shri ma gAT/ /glang po'i mgo dang lag ldan mgo / hak+ko gar+dz+dza 'bod pa'o/ /lcags kyu la ni shr-i Ni 'o/ /rna ba 'bigs pa kar+Na rA/ /'ching ma sa thag /la lI'o/ /'dogs pa'i ka ba a la naM/ /shaM gar koSha Da zhes pa'ang / /lcags
<p>139b.2</p>sgrog bA tsi hinyidza ra/ /lcags thag an+tu ka zhes pa'o/ /de nas pr-iShA ka k+ShA dang / /ba ra tra ni glang po'i thag /prA ga b+w-i ni glang po'i chings/ /nA rI glang po'i chings so/ /a pa ba ta 'ching bas 'dzin/ /glang po mchog ni gu Ta naM/ /rtogs ldan skye bo dam pa dang / /
<p>139b.3</p>dze ga nin+da dza ga rdza ni/ /mkhris pa'i rims dang bA ka la/ /skyon bral brtsegs pa bA ka la/ /la ba khra'o/ /glang po'i g.yog /kha dog stan dang / ku tha'o/ /rta dang chu 'thung myur 'gro dang / /'gro mgyogs/ mgyogs 'gro bdun pa dang / /sin+ku skyes dang 'gro
<p>139b.4</p>byed dang / /sgrub byed gshog ldan ha ya dang / /'phrog byed dpal gyi bu dang ni/ /si naM rnam gdon rlung las skyes/ /rlung gi shing rta yang yang za/ /rnga yab can dang hi ShI dang / /pI ti de ka sha ka dang / /'gro byed phung po rmig pa can/ /ki m+bI sA li ho dra dang / /
<p>139b.5</p>ral can tshangs pa rang skyes dang / /mchod sbyin phyugs dang ku DU ra/ /rgyal 'dzin ri dgas ral pa dang / /dzA nu ba d+hu rtsa gdong dang / /rnga yab mjug ma can rnams so/ 25 /cang shes dang ni rigs ldan dang / /rlung dang kun shes zhes kyang ngo / /rta mchog sin+du bA ra dang / /
<p>139b.6</p>rang rigs dang ni legs brtson ldan/ /lhag par rgyugs dang bang ldan dang / /rnam par dul dang legs 'gro dang / /br-i ShA na la shugs 'gro dang / /lhag spyod a shwa ta ra dang / /kha ra dang ni skyob byed pa/ /turmiM/ sa m+wa/ /rta dkar dang / /dpal gyi shing can gang
<p>139b.7</p>gi ming / /shing gi rjes su mtshon byed pa/ /rta ni bzang po lnga re rnams/ /yan lag lnga rnams legs par rgyas/ /ma l+li kA mig dkar min rnams/ /nag dang dbang po'i gzhu lta bu/ /gshog ldan rta gtsang mchod sbyin la/ /gang zhig mchod sbyin thob pa'i
<p>140a</p>
<p>140a.1</p>mchog /rlung gi rta dang sa yi phyogs/ /rlung tshogs/ 'phrog byed/ tau ra bai/ /mdung can dang ni rnam par dul/ /dbye ba 'dar byed gling skyes dang / /mi ldan yul du skyes pa dang / /bA nA yu skyes/ pA ta sig skyes/ /bA ra Ta zhes pha rol
<p>140a.2</p>la pa/ /rgyab ldan dang ni gnas pa'o/ /shing rta 'dren byed ra tha s+ye/ /bde bar byed dang bde bar spyod/ /rte'u dang ni thu ru nyid/ /mo rta rgod ma bA mI dang / /a shwA/ ha yI/ rab skyed ma/ 6 /rta yi khyu dang rta yi tshogs/ /rgod ma'i khyu dang rgod ma'i tshogs/ /dpal
<p>140a.3</p>gyi shing can snying gar 'khyil/ /mdzes byed mgrin par gnas pa'o/ /ze rngog ru gnas gang 'khyil ba/ /de ni lha yi nor bur brjod/ /kaTh+yan rta yi sked pa'o/ /he ShA hA+e ShA de yi skad/ /'tsher 'gro/ /phyogs bzhir 'gro ba dang / /yongs skor mchod
<p>140a.4</p>'gro ring du 'gro/ /lnga po 'di rnams rta yi 'gros/ /rta yi gdong dang mtshul pa'o/ /ze rngog dang ni ze ba'i phyogs/ /rmig pa sha paM bergI'o/ /rta mjug dang ni rnga ma dang / /rta rda lA gu la zhes dang / /bA la ha sta rta snying ngo / /ban+tA li kA tshogs su 'gyur/ /'dre
<p>140a.5</p>bar byed dang ban+de mtshungs/ /nye bar 'dre dang 'dre log dang / /pha rol 'dre dang sa la 'dre/ /steng du gnas dang skyes bu can/ /rnam par gnon dang rgyug dang bang / /rta yi srab dang ka ba ma T+yaM/ /ka pi kaM dang na na'o/ /ha yats+tshu Ta'i phrag pa/ /mgrin par dril bu g.yer
<p>140a.6</p>kha'o/ /rab bskul 'dzin dpyad/ srab par+Na/ /sa tU 'jug byed dang ni lcag /yongs su 'gro byed/ 'dod byed dang / /rang+ga'o 'di yi rtse mo'i cha/ /pra Sha re dang ban+da ha/ /pags pas dkris dang ka Sha mtshungs/ /rta yis nyin gcig bgrod pa'i lam/ /gang de
<p>140a.7</p>A shwI naM zhes bya/ /mgrin par 'phyang la le nA sha /zhags pa ne nA li kI /theg pa 'khor los 'gro ba dang / /g.yul gyi shing rta yan lag brgyad/ /rgyal byed sna tshogs shing rta dang / /pha rol legs bgrod smra ldan no/ /'di ni me tog shing rta dang / /rtsed sogs
<p>140b</p>
<p>140b.1</p>rgyu can 'khor lo'i theg /theg pa shing rta rnam 'dren dang / /lam bgrod yongs su skyed pa'o/ /rna ba'i shing rta rab 'bab dang / /rta can mtshungs pa gsum yin no/ /gnyis so stan g.yogs stag can dang / /stag gi pags g.yogs shing rta'o/ /la ba dkar pos
<p>140b.2</p>g.yogs pa dang / /'bab ldan la ba dkar pos g.yogs/ /shing rta lwa ba can dang ni/ /gos can lwa ba sogs kyis g.yogs/ /gnyis 'thung la sogs shing rta rnams/ /shing rta'i tshogs dang lam bgrod do/ /rnga mo ldan pa'i shing rta ni/ /lhag par rnga mo yang pa
<p>140b.3</p>ldan/ /gan+t+ri dI bes ra'o/ /a na shing rtar gyur pa ni/ /gan+tI lwa ba'i phyi rol can/ /khyogs dang de bzhin thag pa dang / /lum+ba shing rta'o/ /d+hu ni shing rta'i gdong yin te/ /a ba skar shing rta'i lus/ /shing rta'i yan lag 'khor lo'i rtsibs/ /min dang de
<p>140b.4</p>nas bi t+Dika / 'khor lo'i lte ba mtha'i mu khyud/ /pra d+hi'o de'i mig zer bu ni/ /a ni ra Ni zhes pa'o/ /'thab ra dang ni shing rta sgrib/ /yu gan+d+hAr gnya' shing 'dzin/ /a nu karko 'og gi gnas/ /gnya' shing 'ching zhing yug dang / /bzhon pa lam
<p>140b.5</p>'degs theg pa dang / /phyogs dang 'khrul 'khor mgyogs byed do/ /phan tshun 'bab dang rgyu byed dang / /'degs byed zhes bya ba rnams so/ /bzhon pa ba dang glang po ba/ /glang chen steng na gnas pa'o/ /me mi N+Tha dang blon po che/ /rta yi steng na gnas pa'o/ /'di
<p>140b.6</p>rnams de ltar spyod byed pa/ /zhes pa skyong bar byed pa'o/ /kha lo pa dang mgo 'dren dang / /sna thag sna khrid kha lo sgyur/ /g.yas sdong lho phyogs gnas pa'i ming / /shing rta'i gnyen zhes bya ba'o/ /rta la gnas dang shing rta pa/ /'thab byed dpa' bo rtul phod
<p>140b.7</p>pa/ /bya ra ba dang mel tshe pa/ /dmag dpon dang ni dmag mgo ba/ /bde chen dang ni chen po 'dis/ /sde bsrung ba dang sde can no/ /dmag la mnyam par rig pa gang / /dmag dpung dang ni dmag tshogs so/ /gang zhig stong gi stobs ldan pa/ /de ni stong
<p>141a</p>
<p>141a.1</p>thub zhes bya'o/ /dpa' bo/ spyod byed/ shor ba dang / /kur+b+ya/ slag can/ sas+ha r+d+ha/ /gon khrab dang ni mda' skyob dang / /go bya dang ni tso la ka /lus skyob khrab dang ya lang dang / /brang khebs ka ba ta la nam/ /pags skyob kang+ga Ta ka dang / /
<p>141a.2</p>dza ga ra dang ka ba tsa'o/ /sprul lto 'dra dang brang skyob dang / /kat+tu la dang sgrib skyob dang / /sor mo skyob dang sor skyob byed/ /byin pa skyob dang mang+khu NaM/ /mgo skyob/ mgo khebs/ tshem zha rmog /lcags kyi rang bzhin dra ba can/ /dra ba phal cher lus bsrung ngo / /
<p>141a.3</p>go cha gon dang go chas can/ /go cha ba dang chas zhugs dang / /go cha dang ni parmi ta/ /go bgos/ sadza nar+d+ha dang / /UD+ha dang ni kaM ka Ta/ /'di ni chas pa ma sogs skabs/ /thams cad mngon par 'gro ba dang / /tshogs kun pa dang go kun bgos/ /go cha can sogs
<p>141a.4</p>go 'dzin dang / /khrab can ba d+hun+ti dbus der/ /bdag can mtshon cha'i snying po mtshon/ /rkang thang rkang dmag rkang 'gros pa/ /rkang 'gros can dang rkang shar ba/ /pa dA be+e ka rA/ rkang rgyu pa/ /rkang 'gro rkang can/ dpung bu chung / /rkang thang tshogs dang yan lag byed/ /
<p>141a.5</p>lus kyis 'thab par byed pa'o/ /mtshon chas 'tsho dang mtshon cha ba/ /mtshon cha blo can mtshon cha mtshungs/ /lag yang dang ni myur du 'bigs/ /myur bar 'phyogs dang bslab pa'o/ /lag sbyangs skyes bu sgyu rtsal can/ /dgos pa bcas dang myur bar bgrod/ /'ben
<p>141a.6</p>las mda' ni gzhan mi 'gro/ /gzhu can/ gzhu ldan/ gzhu thogs dang / /dong ldan dang ni mda' snod can/ /gsal shing mtshon dang gsal shing ba/ /mdung can dang ni mdung mtshon can/ /ral gri pa dang gri mtshon can/ /mdung pa dang ni mdung can pa/ /dgra/ 
<p>141a.7</p>sta bdag bcas gang yin pa/ /de na dgra sta'i mtshon cha can/ /pags ldan lag na phub yin no/ /ba dan 'byar dang rnam rgyal can/ /de gcod dka' spyod gzhu thogs dang / /mda' pa dang ni mda' 'dzin pa/ /grogs byed rjes su spyod pa dang / /rjes su rgyug dang
<p>141b</p>
<p>141b.1</p>phyir 'brang ba/ /sngon 'gro mdun 'gro dang por 'gro/ /gdong 'gro ba dang sngon la 'gro/ /sna 'dor ba dang mig sngar 'gro/ /man+tha ra dang dal gyis 'gro/ /bang chen pa dang mngon par mgyogs/ /myur 'gro/ mgyogs pa shugs can dang / /rab mgyogs rgyug par byed
<p>141b.2</p>dang mgyogs/ /'dod 'gro rjes su 'dod pa dang / /kun tu myur dang shin tu myur/ /rgyal dang rgyal nus dze tuM ste/ /dze la rgyal bar sems pa'o/ /a b+h+ya mi ta/ grogs ngan dang / /skya log zhes pa de brjod do/ /gang zhig sgra 'dun 'gro byed pa/ /rgyal ba gsal
<p>141b.3</p>byed rgyal brjod pa'o/ /stobs chen dang ni gyad mi dang / /gang zhig shin tu rtul phod pa/ /brang sprod a ra si la'o/ /shi rta ra rta shing rta'i bdag /rgyal byed rgyal ba rnam rgyal byed/ /dze tA rgyal can rgyal bar byed/ /dpa' bo rab stobs rnam gnon can/ /dpa' spyod/ shor
<p>141b.4</p>ba/ stag shar dang / /g.yul na brjid dang legs pa dang / /rkang thang gzhan la thob byed pa'o/ /rgyal mtshan can dang bzhon pa can/ /dmag dpon ru dar sde dang ni/ /dmag dang dpung ni chas pa'o/ /stobs kyi sde dang 'khor lo dang / /tshogs pa dang ni ba dan can/ /de
<p>141b.5</p>nas nA sI ri dang ni/ /'dren pa dang ni sngon 'gro mtshungs/ /dpung tshogs rnams kyi bkod pa ni/ /de dbye dbyug sogs 'khrug shoms so/ /zang dkar zlum pa'i dbyug par 'gyur/ /longs spyod rjes su spyod par brjod/ /dkyil 'khor kun sbyin zlum po ni/ /so sor
<p>141b.6</p>spyod pa 'dus pa'o/ /slar 'brang bkod pa phyi ma'o/ /dmag gi rgyab ni yongs 'dzin pa/ /glang po shing rta re re dang / /rta pa gsum dang rkang thang lnga/ /pa dA ti kA zhes pa'o/ /so sor yan lag sum 'gyur gyis/ /se nI mu khA+o rim pas gzhan/ /sum 'gyur gu l+mi
<p>141b.7</p>ga nau dang / /ba ha nI dang / pr-i tA nAM/ /tsa mUM/ A nI ki nai dang / /de bcu a k+Sho hi N-Ir 'dod/ /phun tshogs 'byor ldan dpal dang shis/ /phongs pa ma 'byor phun tshogs bral/ /dal gyis sa srung chen por 'gyur/ /dal gnas/ mtshon cha/ balpa ri/ /gzhu dang
<p>142a</p>
<p>142a.1</p>tsA ba/ d+ha nu dang / /mda'i 'phen dang ni karmu ka/ /mda' mo/ mda' dang / mda' rnon dang / /a ba s+t+r-i Na trA ti Na/ /tA d+hanu dang / gu NI tA/ /gzhum chog dang ni/ a sha'o/ /gAN+Di ba dang gaN+Dib/ /chang zung dang ni rna ba dang / /rgyab nag
<p>142a.2</p>mda' yi zas can no/ /gzhu yi mchog ma mu Ta nI/ /ta lam lag 'brag lag stan no/ /go bA dang ni lasta ka /chang zung dang ni gzhu yi rgyud/ /gzhu rgyud srad bu rgyud yon tan/ /ga byaM dang ni tA ra baM/ /mda' 'phen mtshon cha/ la kAM dang / /mda' bsnun dbug
<p>142a.3</p>bya 'phen pa dang / /mtshan ma dang ni so so'i lus/ /drang lta rab 'gro mda'i spyod yul/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas brkyang la sogs pa'i/ /gnas 'di rnams la lnga zhes so/ /mda' dang lam ldan shA ya ka /bA Na/ tsher can i Shu dang / /mi 'khyog dang ni mkha' la
<p>142a.4</p>'gro/ /sgro ldan skra ba skyes 'dra dang / /sha ra nag phran ro pa dang / /tshogs can dang ni/ pre Sha rka/ /rtse mo can dang myur 'gro dang / /gshog ldan 'bab byed b+ha la dang / /k+She la kaM ka mtshon cha'i 'dab/ /ka Ta ka ka rnam par 'don/ /'ben bsnun dpa' 'joms rab
<p>142a.5</p>'joms dang / /bA dze na dang / pi karka/ /de nas phyogs can 'gro byed dang / /gsum khas sta dang gcod byed dang / /'gro ldan 'dab ldan bkod pa can/ /b+hal+li/ b+hal+la la sogs mda'/ /lcags mda' sgra chen lcags sbubs can/ /mtshon cha'i gtso bo
<p>142a.6</p>zhes pa'o/ /rtse mo'i cha la tshol byed dang / /mtshon cha tshad ldan mu Na ya/ /dug can li sta mda' phyogs dang / /li sta ko zhes pa rnams so/ /ni ra ta ni mda' 'phangs pa/ /'gro ldan 'dor byed shA ya ka /mda' dang grol ba rnam par gcod/ /'bar byed dang
<p>142a.7</p>ni shugs drag go /zla ba phyed pa po can dang / /bra sogs sgo dang d+hA rA'o/ /tU Na tU Ni ra dag mtshungs/ /nges chags dang ni mda' 'dzin no/ /nye bar chags dang tshogs can dang / /mda' yi gnas dang bi pA tha/ ral gri dang ni dkyil 'khor can/ /rtse mo can dang
<p>142b</p>
<p>142b.1</p>kr-i bA Na/ /a si gcod byed shA ya ka /lag skyong zla ba 'dzum byed dang / /sgrol byed skyob byed gcod byed dang / /shad lang dang ni brdeg cha dang / /bzang bdag skyes dang pha rol skyes/ /mtshon cha'i gzhi dang 'dzin byed 'dzin/ /dug can dang ni rnam 'joms dang / /dpal
<p>142b.2</p>gyi snying po las rnon dang / /rjes su gtse dang / shis byed dang / /phub dang phal ka zhes so/ /pags ldan drang po'i ral gri dang / /ka TI ta la/ arga naM/ /'khor lo'i cha can g.yul du 'dzin/ /se ru ral gri'i yu ba ste/ /de yi 'ching thag mo kha la/ /prA t+yA kA ra/ ka
<p>142b.3</p>la ha/ /si d+ha na ka ral gri'i shubs/ /tho ba 'joms byed g+ha na'o/ /dbyug pa lcags bcings pa ri g+ha/ /skyed gri ka ra bA li'o/ /b+hin+di bA la mda' thung mtshungs/ /dgra sta sta ri gcod byed dang / /sta mo zhes pa'o dgra sta'i 'og /gcod byed/ gzod dang gri gri gug /chu
<p>142b.4</p>gri gri thung ts+tshu ri kA /mdzod kyi ral gri ral gri'i bu/ /mda' bo che ni to ma ra/ /mdung dang mtshon ring thag mdung dang / /ka rA ba dang sha la rnams/ /mdung thung dang ni kA shrI mtshungs/ /'phang mdung / sor mdung / pir shang ga /mdung dang mtshams can zhes pa'o/ /
<p>142b.5</p>rtse gsum pa dang mtshams gsum pa/ /phur bu/ brtan pa/ shaM ku dang / /zhi ba me tog cha rnams mtshungs/ /sna mdor ko Ta ya zhes so/ /zur dang mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi/ /lag grol 'khrul 'khor grol ba dang / /muk+tA/ pu ka /muk+ta kaM/ /lag grol shak+ti
<p>142b.6</p>la sogs te/ /grol ba chu gri la sogs pa/ /muk+tA muk+ta gsal shing sogs/ /'khrul 'khor grol ba mda' la sogs/ /mda' skyong mda' ni ring ba la/ /phyi rol nges dang baT+Ti sham/ /dbyug pa/ gsal shing be con dang / /'khor lo la sogs mtshon rigs
<p>142b.7</p>dang / /mda' dang mtshon cha goms pa ni/ /u bA pa ni khu ra lI/ /rgyal pos dmag la mnga' gsol byed/ /dgra la dpung ni sngon 'gro dang / /gang zhig dmag 'gro de dbang bskur/ /phyir rgol byed dang phyir sngon 'gro/ /'thab skyod shin tu 'gog pa'o/ /kun
<p>143a</p>
<p>143a.1</p>tu 'thab dang 'khrug pa dang / /dmag 'joms pa dang nges par 'jug /dmag 'gro bskyod dang thegs pa dang / /zhugs dang 'gro ba ga la'o/ /'jug dang de ru gnas pa dang / /yul lta pra ti ra thar 'dod/ /brkyang ba dang ni ru brkyang dang / /pha rol
<p>143a.2</p>dmag nang 'jug pa'i don/ /bai tA li kA go phyed pa/ /bde ba sgrub par byed pa'o/ /'khor lo can dang dril bu can/ /mnyam dka' dang ni sbrang can mtshungs/ /gcer bu bstod pa'i brtul zhugs dang / /phyag 'tshal go ra ga stong 'don/ /tho rangs mdo ni rab 'don
<p>143a.3</p>dang / /dbyangs dang bkra shis brjod byed pa/ /longs spyod stobs ldan phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par rgyal dang rgyal byed rgyal/ /phye ma dang ni k+Sho da'o/ /nye bar 'khrug dang 'gyed pa'o/ /'dzings pa dang ni phyogs med do/ /sngon gyi 'dzin pa mchod pa dang / /
<p>143a.4</p>longs spyod tshogs dang yongs rdzogs nyid/ /ba dan rnam par rgyal byed dang / /rgyal mtshan tog dang nam mkha'i snye ma/ /kad+ha lI dang kar+d+ha lI/ /bsags ldan mtshon byed b+ha dza yi/ /a ba tsU la uts+tshu la/ /'phel byin kha dang kurba ka /dur khrod 'khrug pa'i sa gzhi
<p>143a.5</p>dang / /shin tu 'jigs pa rab tu ster/ /nga sngang snga zhes pa dang / /bdag ni snga'o zhes bya ba/ /mtshar can skyes bu dregs pa can/ /de ni nga rgyal can dang bdag /nga nga zhes smra phan tshun 'gran/ /gang zhig 'gran par byed pa'o/ /shugs can thal 'gro rtul phod
<p>143a.6</p>dang / /stobs ldan dpa' dang nyam nga med/ /'joms byed mthu dang brtson 'grus dang / /nus pa srog dang pha rol gnon/ /rnam gnon dang ni shin tu dpa'/ /gnod pa'i gnas su 'joms byed pa/ /dpa' bo mchog ni gang zhig gi /chang 'thung g.yul
<p>143a.7</p>gyi snga phyi ru/ /'khrug pa 'gyed pa rgyal byed pa/ /saMk+Sha/ mr-i d+hi/ sa lI ka /du byed dang ni kaM da naM/ /rab tu rnam par 'joms pa dang / /g.yul du 'thab dang rtsod pa dang / /saM yu ga dang kan rab 'joms/ /g.yul gyi 'du byed rtsod pa che/ /rnam 'dzin
<p>143b</p>
<p>143b.1</p>g.yul las skyes pa gang / /mi bde g.yul 'gyed a dzi ni/ /sa mi yu d+ha zhes bya'o/ /g.yul du 'thab mos phan tshun dag /mnyam du shi ba a naM ka /dge bral saM spo Ta zhes 'dod/ /sAm+ba ra yi ki dang ni/ /mngon par nyid dang yang dag 'joms/ /
<p>143b.2</p>'khrug long rnams ni spyi yin no/ /du byed mi bzad 'thab mo'o/ /mtshon med g.yul sha tu mu la/ /dpung pas 'thab pa ni yur+ha/ /glang bo'i bum pa'i sgra dang ni/ /ngu sgra 'thab dang dgra kun 'phel/ /glang sgra seng ge'i 'ur sgra dang / /'khrug rnga pa Ta/ ha yi sgra/ /
<p>143b.3</p>mtshungs so ta raT+Ta dang ni/ /mngon gsal rdzas dang a raT+Ta/ /snyems pa'i garga ra rnams so/ /dpa' bo'i brtson pa dpa' bo'i rgyud/ /dregs rtsom ma Ta ka Ti'o/ /g.yo sgyu ngan thabs na Tha'o/ /de nas 'khrul dang nor ba dang / /'chi byed 'chir 'jug shi ba dang / /
<p>143b.4</p>nges zin slar yang bskor ba'o/ /brgyal dang myos dang 'bog pa dang / /mnar ba dang ni mtshir ba'o/ /rmas pa lus nyams ltung ba'o/ /'gras dang rtsen dang slar byed dang / /'khon zhugs pa dang sha 'khon zhugs/ /'jigs dang b+ho lo snying stor dang / /paN+Da
<p>143b.5</p>ga Ta zhes bya'o/ /bros dang byer dang nye bar bros/ /shin tu bros dang rnam par bros/ /phyir song ba dang phyir log dang / /kun tu bros dang khyus pa'o/ /ce spyang can dang mche ba dang / /'du byed dang ni rnam par 'phyo/ /dus mtshan 'jigs byed shing rta mo/ /g.yul
<p>143b.6</p>du bcom dang gzhan rgyal dang / /'pham pa dang ni pha rol rgyal/ /yib pa dang ni bskyab pa'o/ /ma lus gsod dang nges par bsnun/ /gsod pa dang ni brdeg pa dang / /brdung gtag dang ni rab tu 'joms/ /rnam par gnon dang 'jug byed dang / /'tshe byed yongs
<p>143b.7</p>dor gnas med byed/ /gos med stan med gnas med dang / /tsa ka dang ni nor 'joms dang / /nges 'tshe nges gnod nges par sel/ /gnas spo gzhan nas nges 'gugs dang / /sel byed dang ni brnab sems dang / /ni shun+ta na/ nges par gtser/ /rab 'joms
<p>144a</p>
<p>144a.1</p>mnar dang mnar ba dang / /kun thob rnams 'gro shin tu bsrub/ /'joms dang 'tshed dang / gnod pa dang / /gnod byed/ 'gro byed/ 'tshe ba dang / /rkyen dang rnam 'dor rab 'jal 'jug /rnam bsnun srub byed yongs 'jal 'jug /chud za byed dang
<p>144a.2</p>rnam zhi byed/ /'joms dang nges sel rnam 'tshe byed/ /de bskyed ces pa rnams su 'gyur/ 47 /gnyid log mtshan mo sad pa shi /sa dang me dang chu dag go /mnyam pa dang ni 'bras bu bcas/ /lnga pa nyid du dus kyi chos/ /lta ba'i mtha' dang 'jig pa dang / /shin tu 'gro
<p>144a.3</p>dang nges par thim/ /ring du/ chas dang / kun tu gnas/ /lnga nyid mtha' dang zhig pa dang / /'chi dang / shi dang / nub pa dang / /nges par lhung dang sa thob pa'o/ 17 /ro dang / rab thob lnga pa nyid/ /tshe 'das nyer thob rab tu bkod/ /gzhan song / rab thim/ kun
<p>144a.4</p>tu gnas/ /rab sod dang ni gzhan du song / /bcu pa zhes pa rnams su 'gyur/ 11 /ro dang / phung po/ gnas son dang / /ro sha /sa 'phel/ gnas skabs lnga/ 6 /mthar 'gyur dang ni/ bA ru tha/ /ro khri can dang / bA Ti dang / /ro yi shing rta shing gi gyad/ 6 /
<p>144a.5</p>ka ban+d+ha dang / byed ldan ni/ /mgo bo dang bral khog pa'o/ /dur khrod dang ni pha mes nags/ /drag po rol ba zhi ba'i gnas/ /'jig gnas bsreg gnas yi dgas gnas/ /ro thab sgong pug tsa ti dang / /shing gi gnas zhes bya ba'o/ /ri mos bkra dang mchod
