<p>144a.6</p>rten dang / /rtag par ro khar byur bu'o/ /legs byas bkur sti dam pa byed/ /mchog tu byed pa rnams yin no/ /rab zung / nyer bzung / gzung bya dang / /phyag byed pa dang ma ti'o/ /btson rar bcings pa'i khang pa dang / /khri mon dang ni chad pa'i khyim/ /
<p>144a.7</p>shing gnas/ shing khyim/ chad can bcings/ /skyes bu'i srog ni prA Na'o/ /de bzhin 'tsho dang gson pa dang / /tshe ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i dus/ /skyes bu 'tsho byed 'tsho ba'i sman/ /dmag gi yan lag gi rab tu byed pa'o// //zhes pa snyan ngag mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal
<p>144b</p>
<p>144b.1</p>ldan dpal 'dzin sde yis rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las rgyal rigs kyi sde rdzogs so// //brla byung / brla skyes/ /dzau dang / /rje rigs sa 'dzin rje'u'o/ 6 /kun 'tsho ba dang / 'tshe ba dang / /son byed so
<p>144b.2</p>nam 'tsho tshis so/ /'tsho bar byed dang 'jug byed do/ /skye bo 'jig rten skye dgu rnams/ /zhing pa phyugs skyong / tshong byed dang / /'tsho ba'i chos zhes bya ba'o/ /zhabs thog 'jug byed/ lta ba dang / /bden par brjod dang zhing las dang / /bden dang shi po ny+tsa dang
<p>144b.3</p>ni/ /rmo rko dang ni phru rlog go /ma bslangs pa dang / a mr-i ta/ /bslangs pa dang ni mr-i ta'o/ /prA mi t+yi ni skyed kyis 'tsho/ /bu lon dang ni paR+Ya dang / /bskyi ba dang ni g.yar ba dang / /brje ba dang ni bsgyur brlog go /so sor sbyin dang rnam par brje/ /nges pa yongs su
<p>144b.4</p>'jug pa dang / /brje dang yongs 'jug cha gzhan dang / /nor gyi rab tu sbyor ba dang / /le lo can dang skyed kyis 'tsho/ /ma lA k+Shi kA ha zhes dang / /ra Ni d+hA ba bden mi bden/ /bi shan ni/ bu lon gtong / /skyed pa dang ni nor spel ba/ /'dzin pa can dang sbyor ba pa/ /
<p>144b.5</p>ut+ta ma ni rab sbyor ba/ /spel ba spo dang spel bas 'tsho/ /log min byed dang log 'tsho ba/ /legs pa dang ni nyis 'gyur ba/ /zhing pa shes pa so nam pa/ /phru rlog pa dang rmos pa dang / /bram ze zhes pa 'di dag mtshungs/ /rab rje ba dang nus ldan dang / /shor ba pa dang
<p>144b.6</p>'khor lo skyong / /zhing dang 'bru shas pa le yaM/ /'bru dang sA lu 'byung ma'o/ /nas dang nas zhing dug thu ba/ /nas sogs 'byung ba'i sa gzhi'o/ /til zhing dang ni til skye ba/ /au mI ni dang sran ma skye/ /sran ma can dang b+hi gI ta/ /bcad bya gzhan lam rag pa'o/ /thog
<p>144b.7</p>gnyis mon gyi khri tshe dang / /sran sogs skye dang bzod pa'o/ /sa bon btsugs dang bskrun pa dang / /btab dang rmos dang skyed pa'o/ /gsum log dang ni lan gsum pa/ /gsum rlog gsum rmos de la yang / /nyis 'gyur byas dang de bzhin du/ /thams cad sam+bA kr-ita mo/ /
<p>145a</p>
<p>145a.1</p>bre dang bre bo che sogs tshad/ /bre can bre bo che can sogs/ /bA rI tshad can khA rI ka /ma r+ha mar+No dang pa'o/ /zhing dang sa gzhi 'bru skye dang / /'brum sa chu ma mu tshigs can/ /rmo ba zhing sa sa gzhi tshogs/ /bong ba dang ni sa sgong dang / /ko Ti ra dang ko Ti dang / /
<p>145a.2</p>she loSh+Ta sogs dbye ba'o/ /lcag pa dbyig pa to tri dang / /pra dza na dang gzir byed do/ /zor ba dang ni rnga byed do/ /tog tse dang ni rko byed do/ /gshol dang thong pa rmod byed dang / /ri rI shaM dang lang+ga la/ /pha laM phung po can ha laM/ /sa 'joms dang ni ku dA la/ /ma ni rnam par
<p>145a.3</p>'joms pa'o/ /gshol chen dzit+pa ha lI dang / /sA mya'o gnya' shing gnya' phur dang / /gshol mda' gshol gyi dbyig pa'o/ /dor dang rmo glang bar+t+ta ti/ /pags dang skul byed dam pa las/ /srab dang 'dzin spyad ces pa yang / /brtod phur dang ni 'dogs pa'i shing / /
<p>145a.4</p>gang du phyugs rnams 'ching ba'o/ /kha lA d+ha no kha la mtshungs/ /rnga pa dang ni gcod pa'o/ /pa rI tra pa sa bon yin/ /'bras dkar 'bru dang pa Ta la/ /'bru dbye an+na sbi na dang / /tshogs can bod kyi sran ma dang / /ha ri Nu dang khaN+Di kA/ /pr-i laM ku dang khre rgod do/ /bkra
<p>145a.5</p>shis dang ni sran chung dang / /mon sran 'bru ser gre'u'o/ /gro dang yid bzang kla klo'i zas/ /rab sgrim zhes pa 'di dag go/ /bri ka dkar po ya tsa dag/ /tok+Shu kha dog ljang ser ro/ /parba Ta ni sran ma'i rgyal/ /sran dkar nas kyi 'khri shing ngo / /sran ma yongs mnyam
<p>145a.6</p>mung+khA dang / /tsa na ka dang 'phrog byed spu po/ /mung+ga dang ni 'phrog byed do/ /mu ta nag po nags skye dang / /dpyid skyes nags kyi mung+ga dang / /mung+ga brkyang ba dag mtshungs te/ /til skyes dang ni dgos pa'i til/ /til gyi phung po dzA TI la/ /ko Da pa dang ko tra pa/ /gyin
<p>145a.7</p>'joms de nas yungs nag la/ /tshogs can sa ri pa ba dang / /tsha ba'i snum can tan tu b+ha/ /yungs kar don grub zas gtsang dang / /'byung po 'jigs byed ces pa'o/ /ske tshe/ k+Shu d+ha mngon skyed dang / /A shwa rI dang nag mo dang / /k+Sha pa dang ni yungs kar rgyal/ /
<p>145b</p>
<p>145b.1</p>ku lat+tha dang nges snum dang / /zangs kyi gtsug phud kul+la Sha/ /ya ba ka rnams mtshungs pa'o/ /mA tu lA ni b+hang+gA'o/ /zar ma u muk+Shu mI'o/ /tsaN+Di kA ni/ tsang+ga TI/ /gaM geShI zhes bya ba ni/ /sha Ta sharka rA zhes so/ /rtsa dang so ba des sgrib dang / sngo bsangs kA
<p>145b.2</p>sh+ya thun 'gro mtshungs/ /lo thog rtse mo kaM sha ru/ lo tog snye ma ka ne shaM/ so ba 'bru dang skogs can dang / /stam+ba guts+tsha rtswa sogs 'bru/ /za byed tsha ba'i 'joms pa ni/ /lo tog rnams kyi gcod byed do/ /mgul ba dar pa sdong bu dang / /pA la lA dang 'bras bu
<p>145b.3</p>med/ /spun stong dang ni phub ma dang / /skogs pa dang ni spun pa'o/ /rtse mo dang ni gra ma dang / /rno ba sha mi si m+bA'o/ /so ba'i tshogs pa d+hA n+ya yin/ /btsang ba dang ni mang byas dang / /sran ma la sogs gong bu'i 'bru/ /snye ma'i 'bru ni nas la sogs/ /ka lA la sogs
<p>145b.4</p>sA la rnams/ /drug cu pa la sogs pa'o/ /ga pe/ bgrod dka'/ /be d+hu kA/ /rgya che'i rtsa dang dgu luny+tsu/ /zegs ma phra mo tAN+Da la/ /lcags rtse dang ni gtun shing dang / /gtun dang u bU Sha la'o/ /kaN+Da ra dang bA DI ra/ /tshogs se dang ni khrol ma'o/ /blo ma
<p>145b.5</p>dang ni 'khrab byed do/ /khres dang thum bu sgye pa tshe/ /rtswa khres ka lin+da ka dang / /sbyangs dang nges sbyangs 'bru'i bdag /ku shul ka /uSh+TaM kA /lus ldan snod dang ping+ga naM/ /kA tsa'i snod dang snod spyad dang / /lhung bzed dang ni a ma traM/ /bre skyong / ru khA/ s+tha
<p>145b.6</p>lI dang / /me thab dang ni si tha ra/ /bum pa bum chu pa'i ba dang / /ka la sha dang bum pa'i rgyal/ /mgrin bug can dang kum+b+ha dang / /sa li g+ha zhes bya ba yang / /ra shA lA dza te/ 'tshe bya ba/ /kham phor dang ni rdza phor ro/ /chu khang kha chod sa ldan dang / /sa tsan bA ra
<p>145b.7</p>sa naM d+ha/ /sad naM dang chu 'dzin 'phel/ /bum can ma dz+nya ri dang mtshungs/ /rdza ma dang ni/ btso rdza'o/ /chu yi snod dang chu rdza'o/ /nan+ta sha nA ka Ta ha/ /chu snod mtshungs pa kA ra dang / /lo b+han+ti kA su ta'o/ /snum zan ma dang dul ma dang / /'khar ba dang ni btung
<p>146a</p>
<p>146a.1</p>ba'i snod/ /lcags can rtsub pa sol+la dang / /ko tu ko sbubs snum gyi snod/ /de nyid chung ma kut+ta ya/ /shing dang lcags las byas pa yi/ /gzar bu kau pi kA ma le/ /su da Da dang zan ma dang / /g.yos ma dang ni lag bde ba/ /mchod byed pa
<p>146a.2</p>dang gnas byed pa/ /thab kha ba zhes bya ba'o/ /phyag tshang ba dang zas gnyer ba/ /zas byed pa zhes bya ba rnams/ /tshang mang dang ni ro ldan dang / /mchod pa'i gnas dang g.yos khang ngo / /thab dang sgyed bu me thab dang / /tsu li dang ni g.yos pa'o/ /bar+Ni ha pin+tA twing+ga g+h+r-i ta
<p>146a.3</p>bi sha bA/ /ga ti b+hi Ta l+ya r+thi su skri ta pya shwit+kaM/ ya ta saM skr-i ta su ta switA/ yongs thob phun tshogs gya nom dang / /yongs su sbyangs dang legs par sbyar/ /snum brngos snum btsos mdangs dang ldan/ /ltar ltar dang ni mal mul lo/ /legs sbyangs pa dang dag byas mtshungs/ /
<p>146a.4</p>mtshungs pa 'gyur bA sita/ /mdung dang dag pa'i bar gsum mo/ /ma smin pa dang bsru bu zas/ /rma med pa dang ma nyams pa/ /'bras yos bcag pa so ba brngos/ /de bzhin ur+hu Shu zhes dang / /yos dang su Ta d+hA n+ya dang / /tsa ma ka dang byis pa can/ /yos dang nas
<p>146a.5</p>brngos pa dag dag /yos bkra mdzes pa'i rma can dang / /bcang bya dang ni gong ma can/ /po la ba Ta ka dang ni/ /ShiSh+Ta gang ba can zhes so/ /shing sgril gnas dang tsam sa/ /yongs bcod dang ni bcad bya mtshungs/ /thug pa'o gro phye bag phyer brjod/ /zas dang rjes
<p>146a.6</p>su myos pa dang / /bza' ba dang ni rab dang byed/ /'khrugs dang tshos dang tshig pa mtshungs/ /zas dang lto zhes bya ba dang / /ro kun dang po khu ba'o/ /'bras khu tsa ma khu ba dang / /thug pa khu ba zan las byung / /snyigs ma bye ma bza' ba dang / /ro can shA ba d+hA li kA/ /me
<p>146a.7</p>rdza lcags snod me gzhong dang / /rngod gzhi sla nga ther po'o/ /thod pa dang ni ras bal mtshungs/ /gzar bu dang ni lag skyogs so/ /lo ma sngo yi lo ma dang / /dar pa sdong bu chu ba'o/ /sbod dang kha dog sgyur byed do/ /ka Dam+pa dang ka lam+ba/ /be la par yo byad do/ /zi ra
<p>146b</p>
<p>146b.1</p>dza ra a dzA dzi/ /yul dbus skyes sogs shI ka ra/ /zegs ma snang byed ka ra bI/ /zi ra nag po rgya chen ma/ /gro bzang can dang yangs ma dang / /dus nye ba dang kuny+dzi kA /sge'u gsher dang rwa can no/ /de nyid sman chen sga dang ni/ /nA ga raM dang ku la sman/ /chen po'i sman dang
<p>146b.2</p>thams cad pa/ /sna tshogs 'gro dang pe lu dza/ /pho ba ris nag mu Sha NaM/ /ko la kaM dang chos kyi sman/ /sogs pa d+hA n+yaM dpal yon can/ /'u su/ bi tun+na laM dang / /ka stum+ba tI dpal yon tri/ /nor can d+ha ya nI Sha kaM /dbang po shing kun me ldan dang / /sr-i pi bdug pa
<p>146b.3</p>tsi bo che/ /stong 'bigs dang ni dza tu kaM /zug 'joms sang+g+ha la dga' dang / /sa mo nye ldan mchog ma dang / /bya rog sgra dang yangs pa'o/ /kAny+dzi kaM dang grub pa'i chu/ /bdud kyi sdong bu sbun pa'i chu/ /srung byed zla ba shin tu dpa'/ /a b+hi mrA Da kul+lA Sha/ /nya phyis phyi
<p>146b.4</p>mchu dpal yon chu/ /kuny+dza na dang / khams 'jig byed/ /'dzin ma mngar ba tsU kyi dang / /rdul 'joms thab dang sho la kaM /ra chen zhes bya rnams su 'gyur/ 16 /shing skyur bse yab tin+di DI/ /rgya mtsho'i lany+tsha dang ni tshwa/ /dpyid dus chags pa de dang de/ /'gyur
<p>146b.5</p>byed/ rnon po/ chu yi ro/ /ka ra ba sh+ya ba le'o/ /sin+d+hu skyes dang bsal ba dang / /sin+d+hu las byung lany+tsa mchog /mA ni man+tha 'gyur byed rkyen/ /rdo ba'i lany+tsha sin+d+hu dzaM/ sin+d+hu ba lam 'gyur byed rdo/ /la ba Na dang u paM dang / /ba tsa lai k+ShaM tu/ tsa kaM/ /thig le can dang mdangs can no/ /smin
<p>146b.6</p>pa bi traM byas pa tsam/ /ro ma ka dang sbyar char 'dod/ /ka ra dbu ba hwags dang ni/ /sharka ra dang ka ra dkar/ /sdong bu 'dzin dang bu ram dang / /ro mngar bisba Ta dang ni/ /ka ra bzang po ki lA TaM/ /'o ma'i rnam 'gyur ku rtsi kaM /ka ra dkar po/ dkar chen dang / /sbrang
<p>146b.7</p>rtsi sbyar ba rA sa lA/ /tshod ma dang ni thug pa dang / /tsha ba rnams ni mtshungs pa'o/ /'byor ba b+h+r-iSh+TaM/ b+haR+Ya TaM/ /cha shas dang ni yan lag 'di/ /lI tsi ta dang mI nA mI/ /g+ho dard rA maM pr-i saM/ /'di rnams tshod ma'i khyad par ro/ /'o ma a mra bzho ba dang / /tA li yaM dang
<p>147a</p>
<p>147a.1</p>pA ka laM/ /pA tsa lam rnams mtshungs pa'o/ /rtse byas/ bsreg sha shul ma bya'o/ /btsos pa'i sha ni bai tha raM/ /sid+d+ha zho yis bsres pa'o/ /'o ma mar sar dag kho na/ /lA ba ni kaM /sA r+b+bi twaM/ /zhag lon til gyi bza' ba la/ /au da kri Sha/ 
<p>147a.2</p>au ta s+t+wi ta/ /'bras thug dang ni ya ba gu/ /thug pa skyo tsha ta ra la/ /ngom/ 'grongs/ tshim dang / chog pa'o/ /bkres dang / longs spyod/ sha za can/ /za 'dod/ za/ ltogs/ zas la gdungs/ /bza' ba kha zas ldan pa dang / /zas dang / bza' rgyu/ 
<p>147a.3</p>nyin mo ba/ /b+ha k+Sha Na dang ni ka Sha/ nges za/ mngon za/ dza k+Sha NaM/ /b+huk+taM/ nges gnon/ mthar 'gyur dang / /zas bzang ba dang 'jigs med dang / /lus 'degs nges par gso byed do/ /za ba dang ni khams dag mtshungs/ /btung ba dang bcas si pA ti/ /
<p>147a.4</p>bza' ba dang bcas pa pa'i 'o/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis ni/ /bden 'byung ston mo tshogs 'khor ro/ /de gzhan sred pa brtan po yis/ /za 'dod btung ba 'dod pa'o/ zos lhag dang ni lhag rol dang / /sder zhabs zos te bor pa'o/ /'dod pa rab 'dong
<p>147a.5</p>gdung ba dang / /zhen pa dang ni sred pa'o/ /spri ni 'o ma gsar pa'o/ /'o ma/ k+Shi ra/ dug+d+ha dang / /pa yas kun tu 'jo dang 'bab/ /'jo dang / nye bar 'dren pa'o/ /sa bya dz+yaSh+ThaM/ sha shaSh+ThaM/ /brla skyes dang ni nu skyes kyang / /'o ma las byung zho la sogs/ /
<p>147a.6</p>rab tu chags dang dpal mkhregs zho/ /zho kha chu ni zho las byung / /dap+p+yaM/ zho mkhregs las gzhan pa'o/ /sa ra/ zho yi mchog yin te/ /zho yi gsher ba kaT+TaM ka /de ni he ya ma bI naM/ /gang zhig khar tshang ba bzhos mar/ /zhun mar zhun ma bsreg rdzas
<p>147a.7</p>mar/ /mar sar dang ni sar las byung / /hai yaM ga bI naM mtsho skyes/ /bsrubs skyes ga laM mU TaM'o/ /chu skya chab skya dar ba'o/ /ma thi raM ni chung rkang gcig /chu phyed pa ni ni rdza lam/ /dbyug bsnun dar ba zhes sbyangs so/ /ba lang rnams kyi lpags ngan sogs/ /
<p>147b</p>
<p>147b.1</p>pa las byung ste brjod bya zhing / /go ha naM dang tshe ga naM/ /ba lang lci ba ba byung ngo / /ts+tsha ga Ta suta phyi ba dang / /ba lang mdung dang / ba byung kaM /phyugs ldan go mi zhes bya ste/ /glang rdzi ba lang dbang phyug go /'brog pa phyugs skyong ba lang bgrang / /ba 'jo zho mkhan
<p>147b.2</p>lcags thogs so/ /paN+Di ra ni ma he skyong / /brka ra ni/ phyugs gzhon nu/ /ba lang rnams kyi tshogs pa la/ /phyugs tshogs/ kurba/ nor phyugs nor/ /a nar+d+ha na/ sau ra b+he/ ba lang / khyu mchog /mchog dang glang / /nog can bzang po stobs ldan dang / 
<p>147b.3</p>lkog shal can dang skye mchog glang / /yi ge dang bcas phung po dkar/ /'bab byed/ lus ldan/ zho srung byed/ /glang mchog /rwa ldan shA ku ra/ /'gro byed/ dri ldan/ log spyod can/ 91 /glang chen dang ni nog chen dang / /nog chen rgas dang glang rgan no/ /nog skye ba dang / 
<p>147b.4</p>nog skyes dang / /phrug gu dang ni/ drug mthong sogs/ /'jigs dang rwa can snying can dang / /na s+ya dang ni nastaM ta mtshungs/ /tu pa ri ni/ rAs dman pa/ /nog can tshogs pa/ au k+Sha kaM /be'u sa kr-i t+kar dang / /zho 'thung dang ni da nU ka /
<p>147b.5</p>A Ta ka naM/ k+Sha lI byed/ /gnya' 'dul dang ni glang por mtshungs/ /ma ning sha bcad sbyor ba'o/ /ma ning bdag po i T+wa ra/ /ba khyu ba tshogs/ ba lang lus/ /be'u'i tshogs ni bAt+pa rka/ /bzhon ma dang ni drus ma'o/ /rgyab len 'gro dang phyir 'gro dang / /
<p>147b.6</p>gnya' shing la sogs po TA ra/ /gnya' shing glang 'dul shing rta 'dren/ /rgal dang khal pa khur 'dren pa/ /gnyis po gcig gis khur theg pa/ /chig theg gcig pus 'dren pa'o/ /kun gyis khur theg dul ma dang / /khur kun 'dren par nus pa'o/ /rmod byed/ 
<p>147b.7</p>gcod byed/ 'khru byed pa/ /gshol ldan/ rmos ldan khal glang dang / /dpung pa'i phyogs ni ba ha'o/ /sAsna ske yi lkog shal lo/ /ba lang mgo phyogs nai tso kaM/ /phyag 'tshal ba ni re tsa na/ /ba lang laM la re b+ha naM/ /lag mgrin/ lA dzA/ go li gA /
<p>148a</p>
<p>148a.1</p>ba lang ma he la sogs pa/ /gson pa'i nor dang rkang pa'i no/ /ba lang za dang gsol ba'i gnas/ /ba lang za gnas gang zhig la/ /zhi ba'i skye mched ut+p+r-iSh+Ta/ /mtshams dang khyu mchog dkyil 'khor/ /sgrub byed ma dang dri bzang skyes/ /gro
<p>148a.2</p>ru prA dang ma ma dang / /rwa ldan ma dang mchod byed skyes/ /ba mo bA ni lam+p+ri dang / /chu skyes dang ni tu hi Ni/ /uD+ha mA ya ba lang rnams/ /ba lang kha lo ni pi kI/ /kha dog la sogs dbye ba las/ /ser skya khra bo dkar po sogs/ /lo gnyis ma dang lo gcig pa/ /lo
<p>148a.3</p>gcig ma dang lo gcig pa/ /ba sar/ she dus be'u 'khor/ /be'u zin pa/ zhes pa'o/ /a pa to ka be'u shor/ /khyu mchog sbyor dang mtshams ldan ma/ /'phral du mngal chags be'u'i ma/ /be'u'i ma/ /bzhon ma drus ma dang / /mang du 'joms ma/ yongs 'joms ma/ /
<p>148a.4</p>legs brtul ma dang 'jo bde ma/ /nu rgyas ma dang bzhon can ma/ /be'u yun ring ma lo khur ma/ /be'u mangs ma dang mig gtum ma/ /'jo ma/ 'o 'phel/ 'o ma 'ching / /'o 'ching gnas ma 'o gnas ma/ /gro Na k+ShI ra bre chen bzhon/ /bI ra ba lI
<p>148a.5</p>ba lang zhag /lo re zhing ni skye ba dang / /lo btung skye dang slar skye ma/ /skyed dus ldan ma pra sa ne/ /b+han+darna pyata rab skye ma/ /bzhon nyid dang ni A bI na/ /pra su ba stu pi ya su/ /ni pA naM dang de haM nI/ /srub ma'i rdza ma mtshungs pa'o/ /srub ma srub shing
<p>148a.6</p>na man+tha/ /srub ma dang ni zho skye'o/ /ta kra Ta dang zho bsgral dang / /srub ma bdun pa zhes pa'o/ /srub ma'i ka ba ku tha ro/ /zhi ba'i phur pa ni Sh+ka m+d+ha/ /srub thag san+da na dang ni/ /sa shur mdzu dA ma nI/ /de la ba ni gang gyur pa/ /'ching ba rkang pa gcig pa'o/ /sa
<p>148a.7</p>li kA dang lhas ma can/ /zho sogs gcod byed gang yin pa'o/ /rnga mo rim can rang bzhin dang / /lus can la ni tsher ma'i lcag /mchu 'phyad b+ho li bya san+ta/ /ku la nA sa rlung gnyis 'thung / /d+hu mra shi ka lcags sgrog dang / /dga' byed ring po lang+ga na/ /'khor
<p>148b</p>
<p>148b.1</p>lo'i mgrin dang mang po sgril/ /ra sa lA d+h+wa rlung la dga'/ /d+hu ri d+ha ra rol pa bkram/ /rde'u dang ni rnga phrug go /rde'u 'dogs thag shing kha la/ /shing la rkang pa 'dogs pa'o/ /ra dang lto 'phyang ts+tsha ga dang / /bo tsang bya lhan cig rangs pa dang / /lha rnams dga' dang me nA
<p>148b.2</p>dang / /brka ra dang zhi ba dga'/ /'dab ma'i zas can rna ba 'phyang / /yid srub yang ba zhes pa dang / /bsto buk+ka Al+ya bu/ 15 /ra rnams dang ni ra khyu dang / /ra yi tsu lu m+pA dang ni/ /ts+tsha ga lI dang ts+tsha gi dang / /many+dza ga la mun can no/ /lug dang spu ldan g.yang
<p>148b.3</p>dkar dang / /bal ldan/ a bi/ e Da ka /lto 'phyang dang ni u ra b+ha/ /gnas bcas yu mang 'joms byed ma/ /maN+De/ b+ha Na/ u gi lu/ /me Shi dra ba can dang ni/ /bzhon lug a b+hI mA rI dang / /sha te bi dang sau D+ha bi/ /be du kha dang 'dra ba'o/ /rnga
<p>148b.4</p>mo brang 'gro tshogs dang khyu/ /rnga khyu gsus 'phyang rnga mo'i khyu/ /bong bu dang ni 'khor lo can/ /sna chen/ skad chen/ rA su b+ha/ /kha ra grong du 'dren pa dang / /dran pa dran bya phur bu'i rna/ /lam 'gro byed dang / rnga ma can/ /chu ba ring dang byin pa gtsang / /
<p>148b.5</p>sbyong byed phyugs dang rtswa A ru/ /tri Na sai hi b+ha zhes dang / /tsha Ta 'i khyu mchog lam ba dang / /bzod pa'i mu khyud sa la nyal/ /k+Sha ra zhes pa rnams yin no/ 24 /lus 'phags skyes dang ded dpon dang / /tshong dpon tshong pa nges 'gro dang / /zong dang tshong gi ka yi ka /zong
<p>148b.6</p>ba dang ni nyo tshong ngo / /pi gro ti na tshong mkhan te/ /nyo ba gra yi ka dag mtshungs/ /btsong bya ba ni dz+ya yin no/ /any+tso kra ya rin gzhal bya/ /zang dang tshong dngos rtsa nor dang / /rnyed pa lhag pa'i 'bras bu can/ /bcol dang gtams dang bkod pa'o/ /slar blangs pa dang
<p>148b.7</p>gtang pa dang / /zong tshong bkram pa bkra be+e ste/ /kre yaM tshong gi phyi ma'o/ /btsong bya tshong zong tshong zog dang / /bsgyur bar bya ba la sogs so/ /sa ma yA ni bden byed dang / /bden byas kA ka Ni pa Na/ /ta ri'i cha dang bi kra ya/ /bi sa na rnams mtshungs pa'o/ /
<p>149a</p>
<p>149a.1</p>phreng bcu swa ts+tsha zhes bya ste/ /grangs dang bgrang bya bcu la sogs/ /grangs dang bgrang bya bgrang byed kyi/ /nyi shu la sogs rtag tu gcig /grangs don gnyis dang mang po nyid/ /de rnams la yang dgu bcu'o/ /bcu gnyis grangs kyi rkang pa ste/ /
<p>149a.2</p>gcig bcu brgya yi rim pa las/ /stong dang khri 'bum sa ya dang / /bye ba dung phyur nirbu dang / /pad+ma la sogs thams cad ni/ /phyi ma phyi ma bcu 'gyur ro/ /'jal bar byed dang tshad du byed/ /mnyam byed ces pa tshad kyi don/ /'jal byed srang dang sor dang bre/ /
<p>149a.3</p>ma ru lnga rnams mA sha ka /de rnams bcu drug zho yin te/ /zho bzhi la ni srang gang ngo / /gser 'jal zho cha gser mig ste/ /ku ru bi sta de yi srang / /'degs byed dang ni snyoms byed do/ /srang brgya khur yin nyi shu srang / /yA tsi tri ni khur bcu'o/ /shing rta khur
<p>149a.4</p>ta A tsi rta/ /kaR+ShA pa Ni dong tshe yin/ /zangs kyi dong tshe pa Na 'o/ /bzhi cha bzhi pa dag dang ni/ /bcu drug nyi shu kuny+tsa ka /u Da ba dang bre la sogs/ /yongs su 'jal byed so so ko /rkang pa zhes pa bzhi cha yin/ /cha dang cha shas dgod pa'o/ /
<p>149a.5</p>longs spyod/ zang zing / rdzas rang dbang / /nor dang / ba su/ a n+wa dang / /dbyig dang rin chen yo byad rnams/ /'byor pa/ mdud pa/ snying por re/ /r-i k+ShaM/ r-i ts+tsha sgrub byed rnams/ 18 /mdzod dang rin chen gser gzugs dang / /sgrom dang snod
<p>149a.6</p>ces bya ba yang / /de dag las gzhan spa bya dang / /dngul dang de gnyis ma hA ti/ /mkha' lding gshog pa margad dang / /rdo yi snying po nor bu ljang / /pad+ma rA ga dmar po dang / /ku ru bin+da/ sh+me nAsma/ ri bzang can dang rin chen dmar/ /ya ba rbo la/ 
<p>149a.7</p>dpal me tog /nor bu chen po byu ru dang / /'khri shing nor bu tsa kr-i kan/ /lus dmar 'dab dang gser can 'dab/ /byu ru dang ni rtsi dmar ro/ /mu tig nya phyis sa bon dang / /grol ba can dang mu tig 'bras/ /nya phyis skye bar sbubs skyes dang / /ba ra sa yi u
<p>149b</p>
<p>149b.1</p>ba laM/ 7 /mu men rgyal po 'khyil ba dang / /rgyal po'i cod pan rnam gsal skyes/ 4 /shel la arka ga lwarka/ /me shel 'od gsal nyi ma dang / /rdo ba 'od gsal ri skyes dang / /sreg byed rdo ba shA li 'phye/ /sbyangs pa'i rdo ba dri ldan dang / /tsa ma'i snying po
<p>149b.2</p>dngas pa dang / /dag pa'i rdo dkar zla ba'i bri/ /rdo ba dkar po zhes pa rnams/ 12 /nyi bzhon la ni beDUR+YaM/ /sprin chen dang ni gzhon nu skyes/ 7 /rdo rje la ni zho ldan gnas/ /hI ra ka dang nor bu'i dbye/ /chu shel ma ni pa sA ma/ /ma Ni tsa ka dbus na 'dzag /mig
<p>149b.3</p>la phan dang rin chen che/ /bsil ba'i char ba ldan zhes pa'ang / 7 /dbang po sngon po nor bu sngo/ /nor bu'i snying po rjes 'brang ba/ /sarga se 'bru'i sa bon mdog /nor bu las skyes thod du 'dod/ /rdo skyes mu tig la sogs kyang / /nor bu mdzes bzang rol pa
<p>149b.4</p>dang / /rin po che dang 'gyur byed dang / /'ching bu 'di dag mtshungs pa'o/ /puSh+pa ra ga sa yi chi la/ /baM sha rA ga la sogs gzhan/ /gser la swar+Na/ ka na ka /he ma zangs mchog kAny+tsa naM/ /dug+ma dang ni tsam sa skyes/ /gaM gA skyes dang bsreg bya dang / /A li
<p>149b.5</p>dang ni karbu raM/ /sa le spra ma dang skyes gzugs dang / /bum brgya skyes dang ri las skyes/ /b+harmA/ 'od byed 'dzam bu'i gser/ /rkang brgyad pa dang hi ra Ni/ /cha shas sbyangs dang mtsho'i sa bon/ /gzi brjid skyes dang rin chen che/ /skyes dang tsa ku ra skyes dang / /
<p>149b.6</p>'tsho bsgrol dang sa'i zla ba/ /lcags mchog mdog ldan su rA b+hi/ 27 /rwa can rgyan gser/ rwa can gser/ /mi zad gser la ka l+yAM naM/ /dngul la tshon can/ arga DaM/ /khardzu ra dkar mdog ngan dang / /'khyog po'i sa bon tA ra'o/ 7 /zangs ma shuwaM nyi ma yi/ /
<p>149b.7</p>ljon dmar u dum+bA ra dang / /dmar po kla klo'i kha gnyis brgyad/ /bi raSh+Tha dang thub mkhris 'dzin/ /lcags dmar dang ni yong skyob kyang / /ra gan/ ri'i kA ri med/ /mkhris 'dzin A ra ku Ta dang / /ri ti dang ni zhu bya'o/ /rga ba 'khyog dang lus 'jam dang / /su re
<p>150a</p>
<p>150a.1</p>b+ha dang / pits+tsha Ta/ /tra su zhes bya ba rnams so/ /zha nye/ sI pa/ ka sbyor 'dod/ /tra pu dang ni des 'dod can/ /pr-i ts+tsha ta dang sI pa'i bdag/ /ba d+h+raM/ 'jam pa'i gzugs can no/ /gser gyi dgra dang / stobs mang po/ /ma d+hu kAM dang stobs po
<p>150a.2</p>che/ /lcags dang mtshon cha can rnon po/ /gong bu/ nag po/ lcags gong dang / /ri yi snying po rdo yi snying / /sa ra sa pa zhes pa yang / /lcags kyi rnam 'gyur phra mo 'di/ /thams cad kyang ni lcags su 'gyur/ /lcags snyigs so thog lcags dreg dang / /
<p>150a.3</p>lcags kyi dri ma tsha tsha'i zhag /'khar ba kaM s+ya kaM sa s+thi/ /zangs skyes bsil ba'i chu skyes so/ /zha nye skyes dang zangs skyes dang / /sa rAShI kaM tsa ra NaM/ /rgyug byed dngul chu 'dang byed dang / /khu ba'i dbang po zhes grags dang / /'phrog byed sa bon khams chen po/ /
<p>150a.4</p>drag pa'i khams dang su ta ka /mtshal skyes dang ni hing gu la/ /dA ra da dang dmar po dang / /mchog sbyin dang pa'i rkang pa'o/ /sin+d+hU ra dang bye ma dmar/ /phye ma dmar dang rdul dmar dang / /dri 'dzin skyes dang zha nye skyes/ /ba bla la ni karbU raM/ /ba lang so dang gar
<p>150a.5</p>ming can/ /piny+dza ra dang bI ta naM/ /tA la mA lam/ gar gyi rgyan/ /ser po/ pI tAM/ byi la'i mig /ro ma pra ta naM zhes so/ 11 /ldong ros dang ni gar ngan ma/ /yid 'bod ma dang klu lce ma'o/ /bal mo sa yi gor ma dang / /go la dri rno mu zi'i dri/ /dri bzangs dang ni
<p>150a.6</p>mig la phan/ /rigs can ku la r+thi kA'o/ /dus kyi me tog me tog ze/ /pau Sh+ya kaM dang ku shu'i khams/ /kA shi shaM dang many+dza naM/ /dus kyi pad+mo las skyes dang / /phug ron skyes dang dpal bzang skyes/ /chu srol mig sman sau nI rA/ /mig sman ga tis ya mu naM/ /mig sman
<p>150a.7</p>nag po chu klung skyes/ /rgyun gyi mig sman mig gi rgyan/ /spang ma'i mig sman rtse can mgrin/ /sngon po dang ni rma bya can/ /btsos pa las byung spang ma'o/ /spang ma brtul ba da rbi ka /mig sman sngon po bya khyung rdo/ /khu ba'i mig sman khu ba'i snying / /kA shi Sha
<p>150b</p>
<p>150b.1</p>khams kA shI khams/ /le brgan ka ma lus dang mchog /yang dag tshon dang me'i rtse mo/ /grong gi gur gum zhes pa rnams/ /brag zhum don phan rin skyes dang / /rdo skyes shi lA dza tu dang / /rdo ba'i nad ces bya ba'o/ /dbyar rtsi gong bu dri sbyin dang / /ri bong gos
<p>150b.2</p>srog can dang / /ra sa gan+d+ha gan+do ra/ /gnag tsha 'phel zhes bya ba rnams/ 9 /tshal Tang+ka k+Sha rA Sh+TaM/ /gar 'o de nas ri tsa ka /ya bag k+Sha ra 'gyur byed sman/ /ya ba sri ka nas rtse skyes/ /rgya tsha 'gyur byed/ kA po ta/ /bde 'phel sau brtsa la dang / /ru tsa kaM dang ri
<p>150b.3</p>skyes dang / /s+tha b+h+ra kA mA la rnams so/ /sbrang dang mngar ldan mA k+Shi ka /sa ra g+ha byung sA ra g+haM/ /pra tshil dang ni sbrang rtsi'i snyigs/ /shing rtsa smyig rkang sa yi spu/ /nA pat+ta si 'byung po'i skra/ /tsan+dan dmar po tsha ba gsum/ /drod gsum skyon dang smin pa dang / /'bras
<p>150b.4</p>gsum pha laM kr-i kaM dang / /tri pha lA dang dri pha lA/ /ri bong bal dang ri bong spu/ /lug skyes lwa ba lug pa la dang / /lug can lto 'phyang can zhes pa'ang / /zhes pa snyan ngag mkhan paN+Di ta dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sdes rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba
<p>150b.5</p>ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las rje rigs kyi sde rdzogs so// //dmangs rigs rkang skyes 'bangs dang ni/ /rigs kyi tha ma byin pa skyes/ /chos snum de nas gtum po dang / /'dres pa'i ri mo mkhan sogs so/ /dmangs dang rjes skyes ri mo mkhan/ 
<p>150b.6</p>sman pa rje'u rigs gnyis skyes las/ /dmangs dang rgyal rigs drag po'o/ /bya bas 'tshe ba rgyal rje 'dres/ /mA hi Sh+ya ni rje rgyal 'dres/ /k+Shat+t+ra rje'u dmangs rigs 'dres/ /bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs bu/ /de ni lus 'phags rje'u rigs rnams/ /shing rta mkhan ni
<p>150b.7</p>ma hi Sh+ya/ /ri mo mkhan las byung ba'o/ /gtum po'i skye bar gyur pa ni/ /bram ze mo dang chos bsgrub las/ /yi ge pa dang bka' 'grel byed/ /rtsegs pa rigs dang glegs bam rigs/ /byed mkhan dang ni bzo mo mkhan/ /ri mo'i las byed sgyu rtsal rigs/ /rang bzhin
<p>151a</p>
<p>151a.1</p>gyis ni shas nyan can/ /blo gros can dang bzo bo'i rigs/ /rigs ldan dang ni rigs kyi gtso/ /grong brtsegs pa dang chen po'o/ /phreng rgyud mkhan dang me tog gcod/ /me tog gis 'tsho me tog can/ /de la me tog ya bA ShI/ /
<p>151a.2</p>me tog gcod ma nags mdzes ma/ /puSh+pa mA b+h+ri phreng ldan ma/ /me tog rab tu sog byed ma'o/ /rdza mkhan dang ni bum pa mkhan/ /'khor los 'tsho dang sa las byed/ /dbyug gu bsgyur ba zhes pa'o/ /zhal ba mkhan po la pa ka /pra d+has 'tsho dang ts+tsha d+hA dang / /su d+ha susta
<p>151a.3</p>phyugs sogs las/ /tan+ta ba ya thags mkhan no/ /gos bzo ba dang tshem bu mkhan/ /dung mkhan dang ni drung 'bud pa/ /zangs mkhan dang ni zangs mgar ba/ /gser mkhan dang ni gser byed pa/ /gser bzo ba dang gser mgar dang / /gauny+dzi kA dang dmar ba can/ /
<p>151a.4</p>muSh+Ti kas 'tsho zla bas 'jug /nor bu byed dang bai ka Ti/ /ko rang+gas 'tsho bkra ba byed/ /ri mo can dang ri mo byed/ /kha dog spyod pa to li ka /phra mo go chas 'tsho bungs chags/ /mtshon cha mkhan dang ral gri mkhan/ /lcags bzo ba dang lcags mgar ba/ /ba ru T-i byed
<p>151a.5</p>bA ru Ni/ /ka l+ya bA la btung ba 'tsho/ /chang tshong ma dang chang ma'o/ /sbrang chang tshong ma go lI dang / /mtshams can chu yi g.yon pa can/ /grong dpon dang ni mtho ris grags/ /nA bi ta dang mthar gnas pa/ /'dreg mkhan/ skra mkhan zla ba can/ /sen mo gcod
<p>151a.6</p>dang bat+pAM'i bu/ /tho ba can dang kA+au ri ka /snod spyad 'dren dang snod spyad pa/ /zla 'dzin grong dbang gcod pa'o/ 17 /shing mkhan shing bzo shing 'jog pa/ /shing rta byed dang shing 'jog mkhan/ /phya mkhan dang ni shing khyim mkhan/ /khyim gnas dang ni bza' mi'o/ /
<p>151a.7</p>tshos ma dang ni btso blag mkhan/ /tsha ba dang ni yas phur can/ /gzhu bu mal ha rI dang / /srang ba sbyangs dang tshos byed pa/ /lham nag byed dang lham mkhan dang / /ko pags mkhan dang ku ra Ta/ /zho shas 'tsho dang las byed pa/ /gla pa dang ni gla yis 'tsho/ /gla za bang chen 'phrin pa dang / /
<p>151b</p>
<p>151b.1</p>khur pa dang ni khur 'dren pa/ /shaub+hi ka dang mig 'phrul ba/ /na b+ha shra ma dbang po'i rta/ /sgyu ma pa dang sgyu ma mkhan/ /ngan g.yo ba dang slu byed pa/ /sgyu ma byed dang dga' byed pa/ /byed pa sbyor dang kham smra ba/ /lha yis 'tsho dang lha bzo ba/ /'byung ba las skyes tshangs pa mkha'/ /tshangs pa las byung
<p>151b.2</p>lha bram ze/ /rnga pa dang ni rnga brdung ba/ /lag pa'i sgra dang thal mo rdeg /gling bu ba dang gling bu 'bud/ /pi wang pa dang pi wang mkhan/ /'tsho ba'i tha chad bya shor ba/ /de nyid lam du 'dren pa'o/ /ra rdzi dang ni ra skyong ba/ /rngon pa/ snyi pa/ bshan pa/ lings/ /sha 'tshong
<p>151b.3</p>ba dang sha gcod pa/ /gang zhig skam pa'i sha 'tshong ba/ /de ni sha bskams can yin no/ /shan pa ri dgas gsod pas 'tsho/ /rngon pa dang ni lings pa'o/ /A She Di ka ri dgas 'dzin/ /ri dgas rgya dang 'dra ba can/ /'deng byed/ gsod byed/ stong byed dang / /d+ya s+t+ri/ ri dgas
<p>151b.4</p>dra ba'o/ /a tsau da naMA khe Ta/ /ri dgas sdig pa gnyis kyang ngo / /un+ma na dang 'dab can brtsegs/ /bI ta sastu nye bar byed/ /bya dang ri dgas 'ching ba'o/ /dak+ShI NA ka bsnun pa nyid/ /de ni ri dgas g.yas rmas can/ /A khe Ta dang 'ching ba dang / /zhags pa dang ni
<p>151b.5</p>shu raM b+ha/ rgyud can/ shu m+ba/ thag pa dang / /mri Shub TI gu Ni 'o/ /phal pa/ /dman pa/ ngan rigs dang / /dzal ma cig shos so so skyes/ /ngan pa dmangs rigs ris med dang / /khol dang byed pas gnas pa'o/ /bran dang 'bangs dang g.yog po dang / /gla mi
<p>151b.6</p>dang ni tsi tra ka /mngag gzhug bsgo bya sbed pa dang / /sngags pa zhags thogs yongs gcod pa/ /gzhan sos dang ni tsal+lu dang / /gzhan skyes pa dang gzhan gyi skyong / /luSh+NA mtshams 'khyogs man+tha ra/ /nges bzo dang ni bems po'o/ /tha shal lto 'gengs shI ta ka /
<p>151b.7</p>'dar ba lan glan le lo can/ /sgren po khram pa mkhas pa dang / /gsal po drung po spyang po'o/ /gtum po gdol pa mtho ris so/ /sdig can gsong por 'gro byed dang / /nges 'jigs byed dang ma taM ga /ngan thabs can dang nyal med pa/ /mthar gnas dang ni mi 'dod pa/ /dbye ba mon pa ri khrod pa/ /shin
<p>152a</p>
<p>152a.1</p>shun pa ni kla klo skyes/ /chom po rkun ma rkun po dang / /srang ba sha dim ta mdog can/ /jag pa gzhan rku ar pa dang / /rku jag chom rkun 'jab bu ba/ /yangs 'phyag so sor rku byed do/ /bum pa can 'gebs skyes bu 'gebs/ /mtshams
<p>152a.2</p>kyi byed po 'og tu rgyu/ /su rung+ga sbrul me tog can/ /sa yi chu bag zhes pa dang / /'og gi su rung+ga d+haur/ /rnam sgrogs dang ni DiN+Da ka /rab chags chom rkun tsi l+la m+la/ /phyag 'tshal sgra dang mA ba la/ /phyag byed pa dang de bshad dang / /pa rAng+guT dung gi sgra/ /snyan ngag chom
<p>152a.3</p>rkun zla ba'i rdul/ /ka pra/ bcang bya/ rko byed do/ /sa rung+ga mtshams de dbye ba/ /dpal be'u ba lang kha sogs/ /na sh+Ti sti sU tra no Sh+To/ /rkun nor rkun rdzas chom rkun can/ /rku bya zhes bya chom rkun la/ /bcings pa zhes ni kha cig go /khyi dang sA ra me ya dang / /ser skya
<p>152a.4</p>dang ni ri dgas za/ /shu na ka dang smra byed dang / /shrA dang / in+t+ra man dang / /'dod can dkyil 'khor ring po dang / /rab dga' ban+ta/ dar dang / /kau me su ka nA li ha/ /rdo rje'i mjug ma nyal ldan dang / /dga' gsum ra ta pra la dang / /bcud 'thung dga' dang bco ba
<p>152a.5</p>dang / /dga' mtha' shA la pr-i ka dang / /grong gi ri dgas ku ku ra/ /phra ma can dang gso bya dang / /rus pa za dang khrel can dang / /rol pa lce sgril zhi ba'i sgra/ /bshes byed/ dgra byed/ ri dgas dgra/ /skye ba'i cha can 'dod dbang dang / /dga' ba'i phur bu zhes
<p>152a.6</p>rnams so/ /37 /a la ka dang sbyang bcas dang / /a khe Ti ka sna tshogs drag /ri dgas 'tshed dang g.yo dang khyi/ /kha Du ka /shwA seng ge'i rigs/ /ro ldan/ tum+bu ri/ shu ni/ /shu n+ya/ shu n+yi/ shunA ra/ /bshang ba za dang grong gi phag /thod pa chu ser can ma dang / /
<p>152a.7</p>sdigs byed ma dang sred can ma/ /bud med rnams kyi 'jug pa la/ /srad bu gcod byed ni Sh+pi ta/ /rtog pa khri'u pany+dzi ka /shing bal dang ni nA ki kA/ /tU la pi tsu shing bal 'jam/ /'jam po las skyes tU la kaM/ /ras bal dang ni brta raM/ /shing bal 'khal ba piny+dza
<p>152b</p>
<p>152b.1</p>na/ /nges 'thag nA ri bI ra me/ /shing bal shing ldan karka rI/ /zla ba can dang kushA Na/ /kU la sa ka ja l+lo la/ /srad bu thags rgyud han+pA na/ /snal ma srad bu thags kyi rgyu/ /thags bzang dang ni rtag ma'o/ /sa rI dang ni thags mkhan dang / /thags 'thag b+hu ti
<p>152b.2</p>blu ti/ /zhes so/ /ta rI mdog gnyis shing yin no/ /sgam dang / sgrom dang / snod dang mdzod/ /'jog sa dang ni bang ba'o/ /bzo bo las dang sgyu rtsal lo/ /kan+da bA sa khur 'dzin dang / /khur shing de 'phyang thag pa dang / /kA tsa'o sa de nas bi bad+ha/ /bi ba d+ha dang
<p>152b.3</p>khur yongs 'dren/ /lham dang chag dang bcag lham dang / /mthil lham dang ni srog phan dang / /mdzod ldan rkang pa'i shing rta dang / /rkang mchog skye dang rkang khri dang / /rkang rten zla ba gcig pa dang / /zhabs stegs dang ni rkang stegs so/ /'breng thag /
<p>152b.4</p>'bring zhags ko thag go /gser gcod rngo ni ka Sha ste/ /nA rA tsI dang zho cha'o/ /mchan gri dang ni gri gug mtshungs/ /sog le gcod byed 'dab ma 'dzin/ /gsor dang 'bigs byed ces bya'o/ /snyung dang ko ba 'bigs byed do/ /shing za gzong dang shing 'bigs dang / /
<p>152b.5</p>TaM ka rdo ba'i gzong yin no/ /chan gri paT pa ra shu/ /grags ldan dang ni za byed do/ /'od can lugs kong mU la'o/ /sbud pa dang ni ko ba'i sbud/ /khra bo 'dri byed pir dang ni/ /bris smyug dang ni tu li kA/ /kA bA ri dang dza la hA/ /skye 'gro'i cod pan kharba rA/ /b+ha med
<p>152b.6</p>da TI mgo bo'i zhwa/ /chu skyob mgo ras mgo bo 'ching / /pa lA sha yi 'dab ma dang / /'dab ma pi tsA tsi ka'o/ /gtum po rnams kyi pi wang ni/ /tsaN+Da la dang pal+la kI/ /sku gzugs gzugs brnyan pra ti ma/ /lder bzo dang ni slar grib ma/ /slar byas 'dra dang so
<p>152b.7</p>sor mtshungs/ /slar gzugs dang ni sku 'dra dang / /'dra bar bzhengs dang 'dra 'bag dang / /pra phab bzhin dang legs par bzhengs/ /nye bar 'jal dang dpe rnams so/ /brjod bya'i rtags can mnyam dang mtshungs/ /de 'dra de mnyam de dang mtshungs/ /de yi
<p>153a</p>
<p>153a.1</p>gzhi 'dzin rab tu 'dra/ /mtshungs pa dang ni slar gzugs bzhin/ /de nas kun gsal nges par gsal/ /so sor gsal dang rab gsal bzhin/ /nges snang nges snang grib ma dang / /mnyam dang mchog gi gnas su brjod/ /las gla/ 
<p>153a.2</p>sgrub gla/ rngan pa dang / /bya dga'/ gla dang / dge dang ni/ /khur gla gla dang rin dang ni/ /yon dang snyed pa zhes bya'o/ /chang dang myos 'gyur myos byed dang / /bshol ldan mnyes dang bcud rab dang / /spos ngad ldang dang so sor thos/ /myos par byed dang
<p>153a.3</p>yongs su thos/ /ka pi shi dang kun 'dzin ma/ /chu ma bshol ma tshogs ldan pa/ /ka sh+yaM/ ka l+yAM chu bdag skyes/ /dpa' mo dri mchog gnod sbyin bcud/ /A li kA dang shaR+Ya ni/ /shuN+Da/ nying khu/ kaM l+yaM dang / /kan+to yaM dang lha min mo/ /ka tsa mA li kA
<p>153a.4</p>dang ni/ /'gro byed chags ldan myos gnas dang / /a biSh+TaM zhes bya ba yang / 32 /shun pa'i chang ni shing shun chu/ /bur chang bu ram las byung ba/ /ba nu kar+Na mArtI kaM/ /sbrang chang sbrang rtsi las skyes pa/ /sdong bu ldan pa sdong bu'i bcud/ /chang 'degs dang ni tA la tI/ /
<p>153a.5</p>me tog sbrang chang ma d+ha ga /mngar ldan dang ni sbrang gi chang / /me re ya dang me tog chang / /bur chang ma d+ha ka dang ni/ /sbyar chang dang ni mtshungs pa'o/ /sma rA sa bo/[ x ]bde byed/ /ma d+hu bA rA sbrang gi chang / /nye bar za dang kun tu za/ /chang spags dang ni chang zas so/ /chang
<p>153a.6</p>khang chang mal btung ba'i gnas/ /chang ra dang ni chang 'thung gnas/ /chang skyogs dang ni chang snod dang / /kha phor dang ni tshim byed do/ /pA rI dang ni ga lu ka /phab dang chang rtsi zhes bya'o/ /nying khu bdud rtsi'i snying po dang / /san+d+ha na dang chang bsnyal pa'o/ /cho lo rgyan po sho
<p>153a.7</p>dang ni/ /rgyan 'byed kr-iSh+Na ko ha la/ /sho rgyan rtse dang gnya' bo dang / /rtse dang ma lA Na dang ni/ /khab len mgo 'thu cha 'dzin no/ /sho rtsed cho lo ldan pa dang / /rgyan 'gyed du to da raM dang / /pa Na zhags ldan cho lo'i mig /rgyud rtse pa Na cho lo'i skugs/ /'breng byed lcags
<p>153b</p>
<p>153b.1</p>sgrog pany+dza nI/ /yongs 'dren brkyang pa khyi dang d+ho/ /kun nas skyed ba zhes bya'o/ /rkang brgyad re mig 'bras bu can/ /de yang gnas can dgu nyid do/ /tsa ny+dzu ri dang tin+ti DI/ /srog chags skugs sho rgyal zhes bya/ /don can ba Ta ts+tshi d+d+ha n+na/ /dza du pu TA kA yin no/ /twan+ma bI kA tsho
<p>153b.2</p>lo'i dbye/ /lnga gcig ka ni ka rnams mtshungs/ /cho lo ston pa byi ba'i rna/ /kurbi kan+ta sna can no/ /rtags kyi phreng bar ci brjod pa/ /de nas chos gzhan la yang 'jug /gang dang gang du bstan gyur pa'i/ /sgra yi sbyor ba rnam rtogs bya/ /zhes pa dmangs rigs kyi sde rdzogs
<p>153b.3</p>so// //legs byas pa ni bsod nams ldan/ /dpal yon ldan dang chos can dang / /skal ldan dang ni bzang byas so/ 6 /snying du sdug dang snying la 'bab/ /yid 'ong dang ni snying po ldan/ 4 /'dod pa dang ni 'dod dang ldan/ 2 /blo che ba dang bsam yangs dang / /mi zhan pa dang
<p>153b.4</p>mthon po dang / /bdag nyid che ba bsam pa che/ 6 /skyabs gnas rgya chen yon gyi gnas/ 4 /rtsom pa che dang spro ba che/ /brtson chen mtshon thabs bslab pa dang / /brtse ldan dang ni snying rje che/ /snying brtse ldan dang nges pa dang / /phun tshogs can dang mtshan ldan dang / /sh+li la
<p>153b.5</p>dang dpal ldan dang / /dpal dang mdzes pa yang dag ldan/ /las la byang dang kha byang dang / /bslab pa dang ni dge dang mkhas/ /mngon shes rnam shes nges par byang / /legs shas rnam par shes pa can/ /shes ldan dang ni go ba can/ /de nas nus ldan stobs ldan
<p>153b.6</p>mtshungs/ /lha dang rje btsun mdo ldan dang / /'od ldan legs ldan mchod bya dang / /zhabs dang mthar 'gro yon gnas dang / /mchod 'os sbyin 'os yon dbul bya/ /rab sbyin gtong phod sbyin rlabs can/ /mang du 'god dang snyan smra dang / /sbyin dang tshul ldan dpal stug dang / /
<p>153b.7</p>shin tu sbyin byed sbyin pa po/ /sbyin byed grol ba snu ka la/ /sbyin po/ sbyong po zhes bya dang / /yongs su rtogs dang rgyu mtshan can/ /mchog sbyin dang ni rab tu ster/ /yun ring 'tsho dang tshe ldan no/ /bshes gnyen can dang bstan bcos rig/ /shes rab can dang legs sbyangs
<p>154a</p>
<p>154a.1</p>shes/ /yid gzhungs pa dang blo gtsang mtshungs/ /yid dga' mgu dang yid rab bde/ /sems ni rangs par byed pa'o/ /mig ngan dang ni yang ngan dang / /yid nang chud dang yid mi bde/ /blo chud zos dang sems myos pa/ /sot+kaN+Thi dang
<p>154a.2</p>u d+kaN+Thi/ /the tshom dang ni som nyi dang / /yid gnyis dang ni ma nges pa/ /yon tan nor ldan mtshan nyid dang / /phan par byed pa mtshan nyid can/ /shes ldan rgya cher grags pa can/ /rigs ldan rnam shes rnam par thos/ /rab tu brtan dang khrigs gnas dang / /
<p>154a.3</p>kun tu dul dang yang dag 'dul/ /lhur byed gzhol dang rab tu 'bab/ /rab tu gnas dang rab zhan 'dod/ /gzhol dang kun tu chags pa mtshungs/ /nI ra pa dang paN+Di ra/ /nor ldan nor dbang phyug pa dang / rdzas ldan nor ldan yo byad can/ /dbang ldan dbang
<p>154a.4</p>phyug rje bo dang / /gtso bo mgo 'dren bdag po dang / /lhag sbyor/ 'dren pa/ mgo dpon dang / /jo bo mnga' bdag dpon po dang / /lhag par 'phel dang chen por skye/ /grong khyer rtsed byed ts+tsha gi lu'o/ /Shi D+ge bi daSh+tsa Sha T+ya dz+nya bya lI kats+tsha ka /nA ga Di/ b+hu dza ga b+h+ring+ga
<p>154a.5</p>lang+ga sh+tsa ta ra la sh+tsa pa de ba kaH tsang+go bai sh+yA pa tri sh+tsA thab+ha bi li ts+tsha la ro bi TaH/ 3 /khye'u rtse dang gnas 'joms dang / /'dod pa'i rtsed mo rnam sun 'byin/ /b+ho lo pe lu ha la sh+tsai ba be la sa bi b+hA wa li se/ la te ba grok+ti ra ti ro ts+tsha kA lats+tsha ki lA bu b+hau/ /yan lag mchog dang
<p>154a.6</p>gzugs ldan dang / /lus mdzes pa dang sdu gu'o/ /srung ma nyug rum nyams pa dang / /'og med dang ni khyim khol po/ /ngas byed bya ba byed pa dang / /gzhungs byed 'grus par byed pa'o/ /smra mi shes dang lkugs pa'o/ /yid la gcags dang pha bcas
<p>154a.7</p>dang / /pha yi chos ldan pa dang 'dra/ /pha lta bu dang gnas bya'o/ /dga' bas brgyan bya bu mo dang / /gang zhig sbyin byed lan cig 'gro/ /de la pha rol son pa dang / /'dod don brtson dang brtson 'grus can/ /byams dang / mnyes gshin mtshungs pa'o/ /mdza'
<p>154b</p>
<p>154b.1</p>ldan mdza' dang gces par 'dzin/ /dge ldan/ bde ldan bde 'byung dang / /dge gsum pa dang yan lag ldan/ /nga ldan nga rgyal ldan pa dang / /nga rgyal byed ces bya ba'o/ /rang rgyud/ rang dbang / rang bdag can/ /rang dga' gzhan gyis ma bzung
<p>154b.2</p>ba/ /sred bcas de ni ci 'dod can/ /khri la 'phye dang rdul can no/ /gzhan rgyud gzhan dbang pha rol dbang / /rang dbang med dang bdag dbang med/ /rang dbang med par 'dzin pa can/ /rang dbang med dang gzhan dbang can/ /gzhan gyis zin par de brjod
<p>154b.3</p>do/ /gang zhig bud med skyes pa yi/ /mtshan ma rig byed rgya mtsho pa/ /rma gzir ba dang gnad la reg /gnad du phog dang gnad 'byed pa'o/ /'brel pa can dang yon tan ldan/ /ldan dang bya ldan las la brtson/ /las bzod las nus las su rung / /
<p>154b.4</p>las la nus pa ldan pa'o/ /las kyi ngang tshul las la bzang / /las la dpa' dang mgo thon byed/ /gla zan dang ni las byed dang / /las mkhan de yi bya ba'o/ /phyag ma dang ni mang pos byed/ /yun ring thogs dang ring du byed/ /skye bo'i bya ba grong ldan dang / /
<p>154b.5</p>grong bya grong dang ldan pa'o/ /'dres par spyod dang ci 'grub byed/ /ngan dang dman ba byed mkhos chung / /nyam chung stobs chung sgrub pa las/ /'dres ma'i lam du 'phags pa'o/ /gti mug rmongs dang ji bzhin skyes/ /shes pa gzhan dang ma la brten/ /mdog
<p>154b.6</p>med dang ni mtshan nyid med/ /lta ba dman dang 'jigs bcas so/ /'gro med kun tu bsgribs pas 'tsho/ /skyabs tshol mngon zhugs skyabs don gnyer/ /rjes skye ba dang mtshan nyid med/ /ltogs pa dang ni bkres pa dang / /bru ba tsha dang zas 'dod pa/ /
<p>154b.7</p>bkres gyur bkres dang lo ma za/ /ku TI ba ga gzhan za dang / /gzhan gyi bsod snyoms za ba dang / /gzhan skyes gzhan la reg pa'o/ /kun zas kun gyis 'tsho ba'o/ /'dod pa can dang rde can dang / /a mi gyu dang 'dod srung can/ /brkam dang shin
<p>155a</p>
<p>155a.1</p>tu rmongs pa'o/ /snyom las sgyid snyom sgyid skyur dang / /'jas po dang ni tha shal lo/ /bdag 'gengs dang ni rang grod 'gengs/ /bdag gi gsus pa 'gegs pa'o/ /krums dang sha yi zas dang ni/ /lto chen grod che dong ga bde/ 
<p>155a.2</p>btung 'dod pa las tshim pa dang / /skom pa tshim dang bri Ta'o/ /shin tu 'dod lo lu b+ha/ /lu p+hA/ lo ma/ lam dang ni/ /pa Ta lA la sA zhes so/ /ba spu'i myu gu/ /ba spu langs/ /kun tu zhugs dang yi dgas byed/ /breng khe le taM mdzes pa dang / /rab tu 'gro dang
<p>155a.3</p>rol pa mtshungs/ /lo ma med dang shing khrus dang / /gnas sbyar dang ni mi bzad mtshungs/ /myos pa dang ni ra ro ba/ /rang nyid bye dang 'khrab pa'o/ /myos dang chang gis g.yengs pa dang / /g.yo ldan chang 'thung myos pas g.yengs/ /lam ring don ni yang
<p>155a.4</p>dag mthong / /ring du ldang dang ring po mthong / /da ltar byung ba'i blo gros dang / /dus su nye bar zhugs pa'i blo/ /gang zhig 'byung 'gyur bskal pa gzhan/ /mnyam dang mthong pa po dag mtshungs/ /phra mo mthong dang ku sha bsten/ /blo skye ba dang mchog
<p>155a.5</p>bde ba/ /'dod dang lnga skyes snod la sogs/ /a b+hi ra dang b+ha dza no/ /snod dang bcas dang thun zos dang / /dus su skyes dang nye bar gnas/ 1 /'dod ldan la ni ka mi tA/ /ka mu kA ma ra zhes dang / /kA la la dang a nu ka /aM b+hI ka dang / a b+hi ka /kA ma
<p>155a.6</p>mi tA zhes pa'o/ /mi brtan pa dang srab sa pa dang / /rang gnas mi gnas gzhan sdang min/ /gang de gnas su brjod par bya/ /kru br-i tA tir gnyen las skyes/ /log can mtshams kyi 'tsho ba'o/ /'jug byed rjes dang sha sogs dang / /chu la sme bya mngon
<p>155a.7</p>sgrub pa'o/ /sgrub can dang ni dul ba 'dzin/ /tshig brtan pa dang A shwa ba/ /dpang dang rang dgar byed pa dang / /zhi ba dul ba mnyen pa mtshungs/ /spyi brtol spobs can mdze med dang / /log par spobs dang b+h+r-i Shu dang / b+h+r-iSh+Nu tshug med/ gnongs med dang / /
<p>155b</p>
<p>155b.1</p>phyag 'tshal gsong por smra ba'o/ /gsod dang 'joms byed rnam par 'tshe/ /mi la 'tshe dang rtsub las byed/ /lcags rtse can dang rnon po'i las/ /myur bar byed dang 'debs pa dang / /nus pas gzir dang gdung bar byed/ /'ded byed nyams byed
<p>155b.2</p>'joms byed dang / /rab sgrub rnam 'gebs ga N+Da dang / /rigs dang sngags bcas gaN+Da ka /tsi ki ta dang dgongs pa dang / /bag tsha/ 'jigs dang / 'jigs med dang / /'jigs rung dang ni skrag pa'o/ /'jigs phyir rab zhugs rang 'bad ldan/ /b+harmA TaM
<p>155b.3</p>ni bdag po'i chung / /'thab pa'i don du rab sbyin byed/ /a nut+pal thams cad kyi/ /ut+pA la mchog dpa' ba'o/ /sho tha nga rgyal med pa mtshungs/ /nga rgyal bcas pa saMm Ni/ /nye bar gyur dang nye bar gdugs/ /lus ldan/ murti mr-it+taM dang / /ka tho raM dang / mkhregs
<p>155b.4</p>dang / brtan/ /niSh+Tha pa raM dang ka thu TaM/ /kU raM dang ni/ dza tha raM/ /karka sha zhes bya ba rnams/ 11 /mtshams med dang ni rlung med dang / /ni rba raM dang karka raM/ /pI ta ra dang pI na ShI/ /yA no sbom po byed ces kyang / /ser sna dman dang zhan pa dang / /mi taM pa tsi ka pa
<p>155b.5</p>tsA na/ /srang dang khu tshur srin bu dang / /k+Shu pa ka dar+b+ya ngan pa/ /dbul po sgrub med dman pa dang / /ni spA cung zad ngan 'gro nyid/ /gnas ngan nges 'thor bA tha tsA/ /tsa ke tshol ba'i don can dang / /ba nI ba ka slong ba po/ /ba su ki Ta kha gzhan no/ /kun tu chos
<p>155b.6</p>can chos ldan dang / /shing ku ra bi mtha' ldan no/ 6 /sa sbAM t+pa nga rgyal shes/ /sga n+t+ra snum dang mnyen pa'o/ /shin tu gzhon dang so mA nAM/ /ga ma laM dang rtsa ba sbyin/ /'jam dang reg bde ko ma laM/ /se la baM zhes bya ba'o/ 4 /mdzes dang / gsal dang / bzang ba
<p>155b.7</p>dang / /su ba ma dang bA d+ha dang / /sho b+ha naM dang / kAn+taM dang / /yid 'phrog tu tsa yid 'ong dang / /ma dru dang ni many+dza laM/ /lo Di haM dang bzang po can/ /na yud+khaM la/ ga taM dang / /bar+Na dang ni/ bar+d+ha raM/ 18 /g.yon dang pad+ma ldan pa dang / /yid du 'thad dang yid dga' dang / /
<p>156a</p>
<p>156a.1</p>nyams dga' spyod pa/ dga' ba ldan/ /byed ldan zhi ba se sha lam/ /mngon pa a b+hi s+sa ta dang / /snying 'bab thob dang rtse dang dga'/ /skal bzang dang ni ma lu raM/ /mig tu 'thad dang mthong na dga'/ /lta bas chog
<p>156a.2</p>mi shes dang tshim/ /mtha' med grags ldan legs mthong ba/ /gzhan dang thun mong min pa dang / /bra ti swi gaM ma 'dres pa/ /rnon po dang ni rgyal po 'joms/ /ma stan dang lhod pa dang / /tshags lhod 'dod rgyal rab tu lhod/ /lhod pa mgor gnas
<p>156a.3</p>'dren pa min/ /ma d+ha s+tha dang / briSh+Te dang / /bcom dang / rgyab dang sham bde ba/ /gtam dang thos can rab bsten bya/ /rab tu sbyin byed ces pa'o/ /brnab sems yid 'dod ces bya dang / /khyim chags pa dang khyim zhan pa/ /ngang can nang gnas
<p>156a.4</p>dang chags pa/ /ltung 'dod dang ni babs 'dod do/ /ngo tsha tshul can khrel ldan no/ /'jug pa dang ni 'phel 'dod dang / /'phur 'dod dang ni steng 'gro 'dod/ /tshul bzang logs dang rmang med pa/ /gyen dang / steng dul/ steng gnas dang / /rab tu zhi
<p>156a.5</p>dang spobs pa can/ /rgyan 'dod dang ni rgyan cha 'dod/ /'gyur 'dod dang ni yid 'dod dang / /'khor 'dod/ 'jug 'dod mtshungs pa'o/ /kha 'gog nya ba/ chu 'dod pa/ /ni rig la/ a ba d+ha/ /shes ldan rnam spyod thig le dang / /rnam par rgyas
<p>156a.6</p>dang / rnam par gsal/ /bkram pa brdal ba rab tu brkyangs/ /rnam par brkyang ba zhes bya'o/ /ma nags nus/ mi 'dzer bzod pa dang / /bzod dang bsran nus gus pa'o/ /khang pa/ chu klung / khyim/ de pa'o/ /bsdus pa'i dpa' bo de nas khro/ /
<p>156a.7</p>khro ba/ 'tshig pa/ sna thung ba/ /gtum pa shin tu khro ba'o/ 6 /gnyid med dang ni gnyid chag go /gnyid yur ba dang / rab tu 'thibs/ /gnyid 'dod pa dang / gnyid log 'dod/ /gnyid log pa dang nyal ba mtshungs/ 8 /'phyang dang / mdzes dang / 
<p>156b</p>
<p>156b.1</p>phra dang zad/ /de nas nyams dang zin pa'o/ /lhar 'gro/ lha la phyogs pa dang / /sna tshogs 'gro ba kun tu 'gro/ /gang zhig 'phred 'gro da dud 'gro/ /lhan cig 'gro dang dus gcig 'gro/ /phyin ci log dang gzhan du phyogs/ /phyir phyogs pa dang
<p>156b.2</p>pha rol phyogs/ /rgyab kyis phyogs dang / pra tI pa/ /mthun pa/ sa many+dza ba'o/ /nye ba dang ni nye bar zhugs/ /'grol dang kha bub 'og tu phyogs/ /rjes su 'gro dang rjes su son/ /bzod 'dod nye bar bsten pa dang / /rjes su 'gro byed de rjes tshig /
<p>156b.3</p>ma ning dang ni mi zad pa'o/ /sgo bcas nges bcas rab brjod dang / /smra bar byed dang / spobs pa can/ /ngag dbang dang ni ngag dag mtshungs/ /bzlas pa smra ba brjod pa'o/ /gsung ldan smra byed/ smra mkhas dang / /gsal ldan dang ni sgrin po dang / /smra ba'i
<p>156b.4</p>byed po zhes bya'o/ /kha bcings/ kha ngan/ tshig ngan no/ /gtam dang / lo rgyus lab bzang dang / /smra bzang / smra mang / gtam mang po/ /bla na med pa gang smra ba/ /bsnyems pas brjod dang / brjod pa chung / /ngan smra/ ngan spyod mtshungs
<p>156b.5</p>pa'o/ /'bru mi gsal dang / gtam mi gsal/ /skad dang / sgra zhes bya ba dang / /bstod smad/ bsngags smra brjod pa mtshungs/ /nus dang 'gal ba smra byed mtshungs/ /gzengs bstod pa dang mtho bar byas/ /smra ba'i tshul dang kha rog go /gcer
<p>156b.6</p>bu gos med phyogs kyi gos/ /gnod dang / gzir dang / gzhan gyis 'chir/ /gzhal dang mig zhal nges 'joms so/ /'khrul dang phal cher rnam skrag dang / /bag tsha ba dang / 'phyar ba mtshungs/ /byar med pa dang rnam g.yo mtshungs/ /bya sta
<p>156b.7</p>'khyog po kun tu 'khrugs/ /'dod dang / ut+pa ny+dza la dang / /skrag pa sbyin dang dgos pa'o/ /sdig spyod dang ni kun spyod ngan/ /dbang bral 'ching ltas sun 'byin blo/ /don med pa dang don stong 'thob/ /nyam nga ba dang shin tu 'jigs/ /k+Shi ta lcag
<p>157a</p>
<p>157a.1</p>tsub lcag gi rgyu/ /g.yo ba dang ni mi brtan pa'o/ /mi shes blun po mngon par ston/ /sun 'byin pa dang / byi ba shor ro/ /kha rgyal ba dang shags rgyal ba/ /lag yangs pa ni/ ster 'dod mtshungs/ /'jigs pa med dang kun shes
<p>157a.2</p>dang / /'gro dang / ti ka pA ga ra/ tshig rdeg dang ni/ slar smra ba/ /'ching byed phur bu 'gog byed do/ /'ching ba bcing dang go cha can/ /lcag gzhus skyob byed gsang bya gsod/ /skyon 'dzin pha rol nye bar rtog /skyon la gcig tu rtog pa'o/ /dug sel ba dang dug
<p>157a.3</p>gis gsod/ /gtun shing / gtun gyis brdungs pa dang / /zhe sdang dang ni 'khrug pa dang / /gsang bya mgo bcad 'di dag mtshungs/ /ut+tA bi la g.yo ba dang / /shin tu g.yo dang rnam g.yeng ngo / /ut+pA la dang / ta rA la/ /log dang ma dul tshul ngan
<p>157a.4</p>can/ /rna bar zlos dang smra mchu can/ /phra ma dbyes dang gcugs zhes bya/ /skye bo ngan dang / lce gnyis dang / /slu byed dang ni swo da ka /rnam 'tshe 'joms byed 'tsho ba sdig /mnar byed dang ni ma sgrungs pa/ /s+tha ga /ma rungs ki ta ba/ /g.yo dang / nges
<p>157a.5</p>byed ma yin skyes/ /dbyug 'khrug can dang ku ha ka 1// sgo glegs can dang / dra ba can/ /sri ti ka dang / kham pa dang / zur mig sgyu ma ldan pa dang / sgyu ma mkhan dang sgyu ma can/ /sgrub med ngan pa nyer 'jig dang / /yid can kha na ma tho dang / /rigs ngan
<p>157a.6</p>kun tu dman pa dang / /a ba lAM ku yA pa raM/ /kaM re pa dang / sA l+lI dang / /khe Ta gar+g+ha pra tiSh+Na/ /arba/ pA ba ni kAN+DaM/ /tsa laM d+h+ru gaM he tu praM/ 21 /sdig pa sdig 'dod/ sdig can no/ /ston pa/ bstan pa/ ston byed do/ /mtho ris lha rnams
<p>157a.7</p>rdzus skyes te/ /mi dang phyugs sogs mngal na skyes/ /sha sbrang srin sogs drod gsher skyes/ /bya dang sprul sogs sgong skyes rnams/ /shing dang sngo sogs sa gzhi skyes/ /sas bskrun/ sa skye/ sa las 'khrungs/ /kha ba bska ba/ dri zhim dang / /'gro
<p>157b</p>
<p>157b.1</p>ba rab sbyong lam kha'o/ /gtsang ba dri ma med pa dang / /ye dag rang bzhin dri med don/ /tshogs pa sbyar dang byi dor byas/ /bkrus dang dri ma med par byas/ /nges sbyangs/ khrus dang / dag pa dang / /dag byas rab tu bkrus pa dang / /rnyog pa med dang dri ma bral/ /
<p>157b.2</p>rnam sbyangs 'bar dang dri ma med/ /dri mas gos dang / dri ma can/ /nag nog dri mas sun phyung ba/ /nyams pa dang ni/ kaSh+ma laM/ /snying po med dang / phalgu'o/ /stong pa dang ni gsog dang gsob/ /ya ma brla dang / ta li ni/ /gtso bo dang ni dang po'i sgo/ /gdong dang / mchog dang / dpon
<p>157b.3</p>dang ni/ /che shos/ rtse mo/ mchog gyur dang / /gong ma'i gong dang / mchog rab mchog /rab rtse chen po phul byung dang / /ches che ba dang / phul byung dang / /mchog gi mchog dang rtse mor 'gro/ /legs pa legs gnas mchog ldan dang / /mchog gnas dang ni/ rab mchog
<p>157b.4</p>rab/ /phul byung gya nom/ shin tu mchog /bla na med dang shin tu mdzes/ /gong ma ma yin dman pa gnyis/ /'og ma dang ni ma rabs so/ /che dang / rgya che ba traM dang / /yangs dang yangs ldan yangs pa dang / /ma ha ta/ rnam yangs/ dbyes che dang / /mur blu du/ gu
<p>157b.5</p>ru'o/ /phra mo bag tsam chung ngu ma/ /chung bar gnas dang a lI ya/ /chung dang / nyung dang / cung zad pa/ /phra ma/ 'jam pa/ rtsa phran tshogs/ /srab dang / char nye bag tsam dang / /zegs ma dang ni 'thor ma'o/ /sa tu phran tshigs thun tshigs so/ /dpag med/ tshan che/ mang po dang / 
<p>157b.6</p>rab mang dpung che phal che dang / /mang rab dang ni b+hu ti'o/ /gang ba/ brtan pa/ khengs pa dang / /rgyas pa dang ni gtams pa'o/ /nges par sgrub dang nges par 'jug /btsas pa dang ni smin pa'o/ /byas pa dang ni bcos pa mtshungs/ /sbyin pa/ byin dang / byin pa'o/ /bde byed dang ni
<p>157b.7</p>'dod pa med/ /ma TaM ka ra bde byed do/ /rgyud dang / dge ba/ sbyin byed dang / /dge ba sbyin sogs de byed pa'o/ /gong du 'pho dang zhi ba pa/ /sangs rgyas pa dang rnam 'jig mtshungs/ /lnga 'dzin pa dang / phyugs bdag skyes/ /kaun sta dang 'dren 'dod pa/ /zas byed pa dang dbye ba
<p>158a</p>
<p>158a.1</p>dang / /'dzem med gos med phyogs gos can/ /gcer bu/ ba lang / lus gcer tshogs/ /bsod snyoms za dang / dri ma 'dzin/ /'tsho ba pa dang thos byed pa/ /'khogs dang / btsun ba/ srid 'dul byed/ 15 /che phan bgrod pa nges 'gro ba/ /rab grags pa
<p>158a.2</p>dang pha mes 'dod/ /dkar po ldan dang / 'phags pa 'dres/ /mchod bya dang ni 'gron 'ongs mtshungs/ /de 'tsho bsam 'dod re ba dang / /sbyin byed dang ni nges 'dzoms so/ /nyin mo dga' dang 'dod pa dang / /'joms byed ban+d+hu/ dak+ta bta/ /rab tu thal sbyor drang po dang / /ni ran+da
<p>158a.3</p>la gnod las rgyal/ /'dor 'dod/ snang 'dod/ rab gnas dang / /mchog gnas/ sgros gnas/ phyi rol gnas/ /myur dang / phra dang / shin tu 'dod/ /rgya tshe sbom ma/ /rab byed don/ /legs dang / ring dang / rgyas pa dang / /shin tu lci dang / shin tu thung / /'phel dang che dang yangs pa dang / /
<p>158a.4</p>mang dang / brling dang / thung ba dang / /tshogs ldan shin tu phul byung ngo / /thams cad sna tshogs ma lus dang / /zad par lhag med lus pa med/ /ni khi ma dang / mtha' dag dang / /sa ma gra dang / sa masta/ /rdzogs dang mtshang med pa dang / /kun dang dum bu min zhes bya/ 14 /brgya las pha rol
<p>158a.5</p>stong la sogs/ /brgya sogs pha rol grangs gyur pa/ /gang de grangs te brtsis te gzhal/ /bgrang ba dang ni brtsi ba'o/ /bsdus dang / bsgyur dang / bsnun pa dang / /kun tu bsnun pa zhes par 'gyur/ /rnam par bcad pas khyad par byas/ /stug po bar med/ mtshams med dang / /tho
<p>158a.6</p>re ba dang / co le ba/ /nye logs/ nye 'khor drung na mo/ /glo dang mtho 'khor 'dra ba mo/ /nye ba'i mgrin dang / lugs bcas pa/ /phyogs mthun pa dang mtshungs par spyod/ /sa nI i dang nye ba dang / /ma zad pa ni a bya yaM/ /logs dang / mtha' dang nye ba'o/ 18 /phyogs 'dra ba dang / phyogs
<p>158a.7</p>mtshungs 'dod/ /yang dag chags pa 'byar ba dang / /shin tu 'thams pa zhes kyang ngo / /'gyangs dang mchog tu ring ba dang / /a rang bya ba haM taM mtshungs/ /shin tu ring 'gyangs ches ring dang / /ring po dang ni/ rgya che ba/ /zlum po ril po/ zur med/ sgong / /mtho dang mthon po ring
<p>158b</p>
<p>158b.1</p>po dang / /dma' ba thung ngu / mi mtho ba/ /mchu thung ba'o/ /de nas mtho/ /ring dang rtse mo bsgreng ba dang / /tung+ge dang ni uts+tshai pa'o/ /bak+Shu raM dang / gug dang / dud/ /rtse min dma' dang / thung ba'o/ /'khyog po yon po/ kyog pa dang / /mi drang 'khyus dang / sgur po dang / /yo can kyag kyog
<p>158b.2</p>'khyog can dang / /gya gyu/ dgye dgu/ b+ha sgu ra/ /yan lag ma tshang / rtsi taM dang / /ka lA la dang sa sto mtshungs/ /drang po dang ni 'khyog med dang / /pra gu Na dang / sha ra la/ 4 /rtag pa rtag tu nges pa dang / /rtag tu gtan du chags med dang / /gzugs gcig nyid kyi dus khyab
<p>158b.3</p>dang / /ther zug par ni brjod par bya/ 7 /don med don bral mo gsham dang / /'bras med/ cha med/ swA hA'o/ /ka raM bi taM spras pa dang / /khros pa b+hu ru kuN+Di taM/ /gnas dang / ches brtan/ gnas bya dang / /brtan dang cig shos g.yo ba'o/ /spyod dang / g.yo ba/ spyod byed dang / /
<p>158b.4</p>g.yo ba/ ldeg pa/ 'gul ba dang / /bskyod pa 'khyams pa yam yom dang / /ldag ldeg/ shig shig pag pig dang / /'gul dang bskyod pa nyid dang ni/ /yongs su 'gul dang yongs su 'khyol/ /'gro dang / rkyal dang / rab g.yo 'degs/ /rnying pa dang ni rab rgan dang / /sngon
<p>158b.5</p>dus ma dang / yun ring ma/ /sngon skyes dang po rgas pa'o/ /bzang po sar pa/ mngon par sar/ /so ma/ slar byung / rab gzhon dang / /thog ma yag ma gsar byung ngo / /rab 'phel dar ma me d+hi ta/ /rab gsal snang ba gsal ba dang / /rab sgang / rab gsal/ smu Ta'o/ /
<p>158b.6</p>rtse gcig dang ni bgrod gcig dang / /lus gcig pa dang gzhan min 'jug /bgrod gcig 'gro dang gcig 'gro ba/ /mchog gcig dang ni der 'gro'o/ /rting pa dang ni phyi mo'o/ /gcig gcig pa yang re re ba/ /thog ma/ sngon ma/ snga ma dang / /dang po mgo ma la sogs so/ /
<p>158b.7</p>tha ma tha shal/ rjes ma/ mtha'/ /phyi ma dang ni mjug ma'o/ /tha dad don dang / gcig gzhan dang / /ches gzhan pa dang cig shos so/ /be+e tsa gi ka chags bral 'os/ /ma lus dor ba zhes bya gnyis/ /dbang po can dang bar lta ba/ /mngon sum la ni phyi zhes kyang / /
<p>159a</p>
<p>159a.1</p>dbang po las 'das nang dang phyi/ /bar na gnas pa don med can/ /bi swats+tshastu s+thi re shu/ Sh+ke bA na mA s+ya na nI ra saM/ /suts+tshaN+Da ti rnam 'phyang min/ /a laM ga TaM/ rab 'phyang min/ /shing rta dang ni saM pA d+ha/ /'dres pa dang ni
<p>159a.2</p>'chol ba'o/ /sa byaM lus kyi g.yon la 'gyur/ /a pa sa byaM g.yas la'o/ /pra sa byaM ni go bzlog 'gyur/ /a paSh+Shu yang g.yas la'o/ /mi mthun pra ti lo ma dang / /pra ti ku laM/ a paSh+Thu laM/ /phan dang mnyes gshin gces pa'o/ /mthong bya pa
<p>159a.3</p>sho hr-i ta'o/ /lcags sgrog a narla na'o/ /tshig mang gcig gis dbye ba dang / /skra bregs pa dang / bzhar ba'o/ /mnyes pa bsub pa 'phur ba dang / /rnam bab 'gro dang 'gyur ba'o/ /bar du song dang brjed pa dang / /rab tu song dang bar dag mtshungs/ /
<p>159a.4</p>'phul ba 'ded pa bskul ba dang / /bskyed pa/ 'phul ba/ 'phen par 'dod/ /ni gA Da dang shA ta dang / /brdar bas rno byas rnon por byas/ /rgya btab pa dang / ab btab pa/ /bsgo ba dang ni brjod pa dang / /slong ba dang ni/ zhu ba'o/ /rab tu bkab dang
<p>159a.5</p>sam+bI taM/ /khebs dang bkab pa zhes pa yang / /nges pa dang ni ni ya ta/ /gang ba dang ni rdzogs pa'o/ /rdzogs la khad dang / zin la khad/ /bsregs dang / tshig dang / tshig ma'o/ /bzhogs dang / bzhur dang / chung ngur byas/ /nyon mongs dang ni sems sdug go/ /
<p>159a.6</p>phug dang / rtol dang / bug pa byas/ /rnam dpyad/ brtag dpyad/ rnam par phye/ /stug po/ 'thug po/ dru ta'o/ /grub pa/ zin pa/ rdzogs pa'o/ /gses pa/ phye ba/ dbye ba'o/ /'khor ba 'jug pa 'khyil ba'o/ /yang dag 'byor dang nye bar 'byor/ /
<p>159a.7</p>'ching ba/ 'khyigs pa/ bsdoms dang / 'dogs/ /brtod pa dang ni dkris pa'o/ /dog pa/ snal ma/ ran ma snas/ /thags kyi rgyu rnams byed pa'o/ /nye bar gnas dang nye bar btud/ /nye bar dong dang nye bar son/ /nges mchod sogs dang 'phar dang por/ /
<p>159b</p>
<p>159b.1</p>ster dang shin tu mchong pa dang / /grol dang yongs su 'jam pa mtshungs/ /'thob dang / rnyed pa gnyis dag go /'dogs pa 'khyor ba 'gul ba dang / /g.yo ldeg pa dang / 'dar ba'o/ /gsher can rlan can/ rlon pa dang / /'das po skal min thag can blon/ /
<p>159b.2</p>kun mchod dang ni klin+na'o/ /rab tu 'gro dang rab tu 'phel/ /chag pa dang ni zhig pa'o/ /sbas dang / yib dang / nye bar bsags/ /smin dang / myug dang / len pa dang / /te bar byug pa zhes bya'o/ /babs pa dang ni zhu ba'o/ /chu dong dang ni khron pa'i chu/ /bsgo
<p>159b.3</p>ba dang ni/ slob pa'o/ /mchod dang / rjed dang / gsol rim 'gro/ /phA Ta dang ni ma nA yang / /bkur sti 'gro dang / mar 'o ma/ /chu yis smin pa zhes pa'o/ /sna dang / snom dang / bsnam pa dang / /sna mang / snom nyan/ sgo chos pa/ /khrel dang ngo tsha 'dzem bag dang / /
<p>159b.4</p>'thob bya/ 'dud bya/ bsdu ba sogs/ /g.yogs pa dang ni byibs pa'o/ /'gro ba/ 'bab pa 'gyur dang 'jug /zhar byung ba ni zur gyis brjod/ /yongs su gyur dang brjod pa'o/ /rnam sgrub mang byed sna tshogs dang / /gzugs ni so sor sgrub pa mtshungs/ /
<p>159b.5</p>bsdoms nas brjod dang bsdu yig go /sa mun+na r+ha nges par smad/ /myang 'das thub pa'i me la sogs/ /myang 'das rlung mi 'jug pa'o/ /bshang ba/ lci ba bcag byas pa/ /rgyas pa dang ni gang ba'o/ /kha slang ba dang rang gir byas/ /kun thos so sor bzod pa
<p>159b.6</p>dang / /yang dag thos dang rig pa dang / /nye bar thos dang chad byas dang / /mnyam par bzhag dang nye bar son/ /phyag 'tshal 'dud dang / mchod pa dang / /bkur sti rim gro/ ri mor byas/ /nye bar spyod dang / nye bar gnas/ /zhabs thog zhabs 'bring bkur ba'o/ /
<p>159b.7</p>snyan brjod bsngags pa brjod pa dang / /bstod pa/ brjod pa/ sgrogs pa dang / /ngag snyan/ tshig snyan/ bsgrags pa dang / /legs brjod/ grags brjod/ yon tan brjod/ /yang dag gdung dang / sems sdug dang / /sdug bsngal dang ni tshab dang / /gdung dang kun tu gdung
<p>160a</p>
<p>160a.1</p>ba'o/ /mi mdzes bzod dang dul ba dang / /dul 'gyur/ zhi dang / zhi bar 'gyur/ /bcad pa/ gtubs pa/ bregs pa dang / /bkas pa/ bral ba/ gas pa dang / /'thub pa dang ni/ gcod pa'o/ /yid dga'/ sems dga'/ tshim dang
<p>160a.2</p>dngas/ /rab tu dga' dang mnyes pa'o/ /bcom dang zhig dang nyams pa dang / /brlag pa chud zos zhig pa nyams/ /thob pa rnyed pa/ 'phrad pa dang / /dngos rnyed/ 'thob pa rnyed pa'o/ /lam rtog pa dang lam nyul dang / /tshol dang rjes tshol rta rjes 'brang / /rjes su dgongs dang
<p>160a.3</p>kun tu brjod/ /'chab dang sbed pa mtshungs pa'o/ /brnyas pa/ sngan can/ khog chud dang / /tshod yod/ ha sa ha sti taM/ /btang ba bor ba spangs pa dang / /'phangs pa bskyur ba por ba'o/ /dben pa dang ni bral ba dang / /bcom dang bzhag pa med pa'o/ /skyabs dang
<p>160a.4</p>skyob pa bsrung ba dang / /sbed pa sgrib pa sbas pa'o/ /smra ba brjod pa zlos pa gtam/ /grags pa lo rgyus bka' mchid do/ /go dang rtogs dang khong du chud/ /rig dang shes dang kun chub pa/ /zos pa 'chos pa myangs pa dang / bldad pa mid pa gsol dang
<p>160a.5</p>zas/ /myangs byas tshim byas zos pa dang / /gsol ba tshim bya za dang zas/ /gon dang a ri gtam dang bkab/ /bsgribs dang skor dang 'dod dang bzhag /slar bcings bsdams dang chings ma dang / /kun tu bsdams pa zhes pa yang / /bkag pa dkris
<p>160a.6</p>pa bcings pa bskor/ /yongs bskor nges bskor yongs su bcug /rab tu kun phye ba dang phye/ /bzhag dang rnam bkod btags pa dang / /nges bkod phyugs dang nges par son/ /nges pa ko ra btson dang de nas bral/ /rku dang dbyi ba dag mtshungs so/ /sgra
<p>160a.7</p>sgrogs sgra byed nges par nyo/ /skad cig bcom dang phyi mar byas/ /bkram dang rab tu gtor ba dang / /lhur ba dang ni rab 'gro'o/ /'khrugs dang 'tshol dang yang dag 'khrugs/ /nges par bsags dang kun tu bsags/ /kun 'jug gang dang
<p>160b</p>
<p>160b.1</p>rdzogs pa dang / /khyab dang bkab par yang brjod do/ /rtsad nas bton dang drung phyung dang / /gnad nas phyung ba zhes pa yang / /bkag pa dang ni bsal ba dang / khor dang spangs dang yongs su spang / /spang byas yongs su bsnun pa yang / /chag grum dang
<p>160b.2</p>ni zhig pa'o/ /bkag sogs rjes su mi 'dod pa/ /rnam par sel dang kun tu yangs/ /rgod dang nges par snyems pa'o/ /bslus pa dang ni rnam par thob/ /de bzhin des bkug ces pa yang / /gseng ldan legs rgyal dang ba che/ /gzir ba
<p>160b.3</p>dang ni btsir ba'o/ /ji lta ji ltar sbyin gyur dang / /gang gi de la ma gus las/ /'bad dang rab 'bad nges par bkab/ /nges par gtam 'dod brtan pa dang / /su nI tha dang lugs dag mtshungs/ /spyod pa ngan dang bsam pa 'khyog /'gro
<p>160b.4</p>byed gso byed 'gro dang rgyug /phyag dar ba dang sun 'byin pa/ /so sor brtan dang Na daM ka/ phrag dog can dang tshul 'chos mtshungs/ /rtsal nyid gang du 'gro yon tan/ /phra ma dang ni byed pa'o/ /de 'gyur rtse mor son pa pa/ /ba dan dang ni mda'
<p>160b.5</p>zhes pa'ang / /zhes pa dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sdes rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs mig ces bya ba'i mngon brjod las khyad par can gyi sde rdzogs so// //rang bzhin rkyen la sogs don gyi/ /'dren pa'i rtags rnams drang bar bya/ /las
<p>160b.6</p>dang bya ba byed pa yi/ /cho ga sgrub par byed pa yi/ /cho ga'i las ni rtag tu 'phro/ /phan tshun gzhom par byed pa rnams/ /mtha' dag tshig la mchog tu 'gro/ /las dang sgrub byed bya ba la/ /song dang kun tu 'gro bar byed/ /rtag tu dbang bya sbyin pa dang / /
<p>160b.7</p>dbang du byed pa zhes pa yang / /nu ma longs spyod nU ma 'dzin/ /gzhan gyi tshe dang rang gi 'byor/ /yongs su thob dang yongs su skyob/ /chog pa dang ni lag pa 'gebs/ /g.yo ba dang ni 'dar bra byed/ /ngom pa dang ni tshim pa'o/ /'tshem pa dang ni tshem
<p>161a</p>
<p>161a.1</p>bu'o/ /'dra ba gcod pa gtubs pa'o/ /rol ba dang ni kun tu brtse/ /bsten dang kun tu bsten pa'o/ /de nas skyob dang mnyam gnyis rdzas/ /sa many+dza saM gzhan min bcas/ /gcig 'gro ba dang phyogs gcig pa/ /grags ldan
<p>161a.2</p>grogs su gyur pa dang / /sbyin par byed dang lha nyid dang / /yid kyi rgyal srid grub bcas dang / /nye bar 'gro dang rtse ba dang / /mi zad sbyin dang sbyin pa dang / /'phel du 'jug byed dang sbyin pa/ /yid byed pa dang lha sogs de/ /gang ba'i bzhin dang gang ba'i
<p>161a.3</p>snod/ /ba lang / ba dang nye bar byug /dbye ba brjod dang brjod brten dang / /snyan brjod mkhas dang mkhas ldan dang / /byams ldan dang ni mdza' bshes ldan/ /yongs su yan lag kun tu gnas/ /rtogs pa dang ni byang chub po/ /kun nas shes dang
<p>161a.4</p>kun tu 'gro/ /bab chol dang ni 'gro byed de/ /nor dang dpal yon bA Ta baM/ /yangs pa can dang byed pa can/ /gzhan dngos byed dang rgyal ba'o/ /zhi dang dul dang nges pa dang / /bzod dang nus dang thub pa'o/ /nor dang 'khrul dang 'khor ba'o/ /spyod pa
<p>161a.5</p>dang ni spyod tshul lo/ /rigs pa dang ni lugs dang tshul/ /sbyin pa sbyin byed 'debs dang stong / /'byor dang reg pa 'bod pa sbron/ /grags dang rab grags bab dang ltung / /'phel ba dang ni rgyas pa'o/ /'tshed pa phreng ba smin pa'o/ /gnon pa dang ni brtson
<p>161a.6</p>pa'o/ /tshig pa bsregs pa bzung pa blangs/ /'bugs dang 'bigs dang zad dang rdzogs/ /bsrung ba dang ni skyob pa dang / /rgyu dang ni gsal ba yi sgra/ /brten pa dang ni rten byed 'dod/ /rab 'jal tshad ma 'jal byed do/ /yang dag 'phel dang sgrub pa mtshungs/ /
<p>161a.7</p>'phel byed gcod rtogs bse ba'o/ /brgyal ba dang ni mngon par khyab/ /slong ba bsod snyoms don 'dod slong / /khro ba dang ni mngon par khro/ /tshor ba myong ba nyams su myong / /dri ba dang ni rmed pa dang / /khams bde ba dang 'dri ba'o/ /rab tu 'gro dang rab tu skye/ /
<p>161b</p>
<p>161b.1</p>'gyur byed rab tu srung byed 'dor/ /ri dang ri bo rgas dang 'khogs/ /rgyas pa dang ni 'phro ba'o/ /brjod dang dbyangs sogs rgyags dang khengs/ /byed sgrub gyen bskyod steng du bskyod/ /shin tu phul phyin sbyar dang 'khyud/ /yul dag dang ni bsam pa'o/ /
<p>161b.2</p>mtshe ma zung dang phrug ma dang / /bubs dang ro zhes bya ba'o/ /nyams pa dang ni rmas pa'o/ /bsdu ba dang ni btus pa dang / /rjes su 'gying dang rjes su sgrub/ /bsdu ba dang ni mngon par len/ /mngon par bsdu dang mngon par 'dzin/ /gnas dang yongs su
<p>161b.3</p>rgyu ba'o/ /so sor bsdu dang nye bar len/ /sdod dang gnas par byed pa'o/ /yongs su 'gro dang yongs su 'brang / /rjes su byed dang yongs su byed/ /'chags pa bsti gnas ngal bso dang / /dri byug pa dang mtshon byed do/ /ltung ba lhung ba ltung byed ltung / /
<p>161b.4</p>'gro byed dang ni 'gro ba'o/ /nges tshig dang ni rab tu nges/ /nye 'khor nye logs dag dang ni/ /khu tshur bcings dang yang dag gzung / /mngon par bskyed dang rjes su 'dzin/ /mi 'dzin de dang 'gal ba'o/ /mngon par sbyor dang mngon par 'dzin/ /rnam par
<p>161b.5</p>nye dang yongs su nyid/ /nges par 'jug dang nye bar spyod/ /bgegs dang par gcod grub pa'i bgegs/ /'byung po nyer 'dug 'khod cing 'dug /rab tu 'bebs dang 'jug pa dang / /'byung dang 'jug dang 'gyur ba'o/ /'brel ba skyigs pa gcod
<p>161b.6</p>pa'o/ /nad pa reg bya rlung nad can/ /spyod byed zlum po byed pa dang / /phyir byed pa dang 'jig dang bred/ /yengs 'gyur rnam par 'gyur ba dang / /gnyis mtshungs ma med log par byed/ /rnam 'tshe'i las dang mngon spyod dang / /de nas song zin zad
<p>161b.7</p>pa'o/ /lhan cig mi gnas spangs te 'gal/ /mi mthun pa dang 'gal ba'o/ /mdor bsdus pa dang bsdus pa'o/ /nyes pa dang ni mthong ba med/ /rnam par khyed dang khyed pa dang / /tshogs pa bsdoms pa mtshungs pa'o/ /gnas skabs dang ni skabs
<p>162a</p>
<p>162a.1</p>yin no/ /lan cig dang ni skad cig kyang / /sha sbyor mngon par 'khrig pa'o/ /thags yun bkri rdzong snal ma ba kri/ /rnga ba 'dreg pa 'bal ba'o/ /nges par 'phyar ba 'khrab pa'o/ /yang dag bstod dang kun tu spyod/ /blo nus
<p>162a.2</p>dang ni chu srol lo/ /'khrug phyir 'jug dang rab sbyor don/ /rtsom pa dang ni mgo 'ju ba/ /sho ma dang mgo zug a raM bA/ /sbyin pa dang ni gsal bar byed/ /bar chad dang ni bgegs byed do/ /myur rtsol mgyogs su byed pa'o/ /nye bar dmigs dang nyams su
<p>162a.3</p>myong / /sku byug dang ni byug pa'o/ /rjes chags dang ni sbyor ba'o/ /rnam par dmigs dang shin tu 'dor/ /lus kyi rgyas pa pI stA rA/ /sgra yi rgyas pa bista ra/ /kun zhum zag pa nyon mongs so/ /tshogs pa 'dus pa 'phung ba'o/ /lta ba tshol ba rtogs pa dang / /
<p>162a.4</p>nyung dang tshol ba zhes bya'o/ /rnam grangs dang ni ming gzhan dang / /ming gi rim pa rnams mtshungs so/ /phyir rgol dang ni bzlog pa dang / /bkag pa dang ni bsal ba'o/ /ldog pa dang ni phyir lag dang / /nyal sar log dang phyin ci log /'gongs pa dang ni
<p>162a.5</p>mchongs pa dang / /'phro ba go rims 'das pa'o/ /rnam par grags dang rab tu grags/ /legs 'bab dang ni nyed pa'o/ /des klog nges brjod 'don pa dang / /nges par 'dren dang nges tshig go /dbyibs dang de yi gnas tshul dang / /yang dag 'gro ba
<p>162a.6</p>zhes bya'o/ /skyug bro ba dang zhe mer dang / /btsog skyug lta log don dag go /ring po'i dus dang nyin zhag ring / /u da dza ni phyugs 'ded pa/ /shing stegs shing 'jog gang dag tu/ /shing stan shing gi ut+g+ha na/ /gang gi sdong po 'bigs shing za/ /sdong
<p>162a.7</p>po 'joms dang sdong 'joms so/ /de la kun mnyam gang zhig gis/ /de skyes pa ni mtho ba'o/ /glo lu lud pa 'bod pa dang / /glo 'khogs pa dang lud pa 'khogs/ /rims dang tshad pa'o rgyug dang 'khyu/ /bIr ra ti dang A ra ti/ /ngal bso dang ni nye bar
<p>162b</p>
<p>162b.1</p>dga'/ /phur bu dang ni phung po dang / /bso ba steng du 'phen pa'i don/ /nI kA ra ni sgregs pa ste/ /gyen log lung pa sgregs pa'o/ /so sor sgrigs pa las byung ba/ /glo dang zas dag rim pa las/ /rab byung brtul zhugs sbyin pa dang / /dka' thub
<p>162b.2</p>nges pa gnas pa'o/ /yongs su spyod dang gso ba dang / /'dud dang phyag 'tshal pa dag mtshungs/ /mtha' ni sA ti bi rA mi/ /sA ni zhes pa dag kyang ngo / /ga li sta dang sa pa laM/ /nyul dang rgyal mtshan ldan pa dag /skad cig skad cig ldan dus dang / 
<p>162b.3</p>'dod dang za bar byed pa'o/ /dus su chad dang yang dag rdzogs/ /dum bu mu khyud mi zad pa/ /gsol dang yongs su bshad pa dang / /ri ldan rta dang mnyam byed dang / /pra ti pA ni tshigs so so/ /dga' ba'i sgra dang ca cor 'gyur/ /byed pa med dang 'phrog skyed
<p>162b.4</p>sogs/ /byed sogs bya ba bco ba la/ /'gran zla med dang gtam dang ni/ /'du 'dzi dang ni 'dor dang gtong / /rigs mthar de yi tshogs pa dang / /u ba ga na ka la sogs/ /bems po sems med rigs med dang / /de bzhin sems med la sogs
<p>162b.5</p>pa/ /byis pa dang ni bu tsha'o/ /lhan cig 'gro dang dus gcig 'gro/ /bram ze mi tshogs mi rnams kyis/ /bshol tshogs ha la naM du 'gyur/ /g.yul sa g.yul thang g.yul kha'o/ /rtsib logs dang ni rgyab rnams ni/ /pAr+sh+waM/ pr-iSh+ThaM/ /zhes pa nyid/ /
<p>162b.6</p>grong tshogs skye tshogs du ba'i tshogs/ /zhags pa tshogs pa so so'o/ /stong phrag tshogs dang lce me tshogs/ /go tshogs rig byed la sogs kyang / /sde tshan bye ba rdzogs pa las/ /'dod bzhin bshad pa rab tu brjod/ /rgyud bcings pa yi khyad par can/ /
<p>162b.7</p>gtam dang yongs su brjod pa dang / /dum bu'i gtam dang tshogs pa dang / /gtso bo gzhan yang rtogs par bya/ /bcad dang sde tshan le'u dang / /yongs gcod ldan pa'i mtshams mi zad/ /tshig dang rab brjod snang byed pa/ /bud med skabs dang pho'i be'u/ /
<p>163a</p>
<p>163a.1</p>ang+gi'i gzhung ni gsal ba yi/ /gnas 'dir yang ni yang dag bsdus/ /tshigs bcad so so so so'i gnas/ /phan tshun brjod pa'i nang las so/ /sargas bcings pa snyan ngag che/ /gzugs can chen po zlos gar du'o/ /drang srong
<p>163a.2</p>kun d+harmA'i bstan bcos/ /dran pa'i lung dang bstan bcos dang / /grangs dang tog dang gzhal ba dang / /gnyis gzhung gnyis gsum bcu yig can/ /rjes su dpag dang lung can dang / /gtan tshigs khyab dang rtags sgrub byed/ /de nas rgyu dang nyer len dang / /
<p>163a.3</p>rkyen dang lhan cig byed pa'o/ /klog dang de la goms pa dang / /bsdus pa dang ni spyod pa'o/ /rgyu mthun de dang 'dra ba dang / /kun da smin drug can dus ston/ /dgongs pa dang ni kun spyod do/ /'khor lo dang ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /shun+Da naM dang g.yo ba'o/ /k+Sho raM bzang
<p>163a.4</p>por byed pa yang / /'dab bcas dang ni de byed gang / /mchog dang gang zhig gzir ba'o/ /rA mA ya Na dga' byed kyis/ /sgra sgrogs zad par byed pa'o/ /dngos po tshig don chos dang ni/ /sems can phyin dang spyod pa'o/ /'das pa'i rnam pa 'phen pa dang / /nges
<p>163a.5</p>par bsgrub bya yi ge mang / /de nyid dang ni de'i skad cig /tshig dang gtso bo zhes pa yang / /khye'u dang ni ma bsdus dang / /sgrib par byed dang rten med pa/ /byed pa gang dang so sor byed/ /so sor de nyid tshar phyin pa/ /rab tu nges tshig rjes kyi tshul/ /sAn+tA naM dang mnyam
<p>163a.6</p>gsum mo/ /gang yang 'od ldan lam dang ni/ /gtso bo nyid dang 'od zhugs 'gyur/ /de nas chu dang zheng dang gnas/ /mtho dang gzugs can zhes pa'o/ /yongs su spyod dang yongs su 'joms/ /yongs su 'dun dang yongs su 'dzin/ /yongs su 'chos
<p>163a.7</p>dang yongs su byed/ /yongs su smod dang yongs su 'gebs/ /cha shas skye ba dug mtshon cha/ /gsad pa bya dang ri dgas dag /'os dang snang ba 'jig pa dang / /'thug dang snyigs mar gyur pa brjod/ /lA Ti 'dab ma mgo bo rnams/ /gnas dang
<p>163b</p>
<p>163b.1</p>yul 'khor nges par gnas/ /cha shas nye tshig dri dang zas/ /'ching dang tshol bar byed pa dang / /sangs rgyas rdzas dang mchod rten dkor/ /sems can rdzas dang rtsa lag dang / /drug gi grangs kyis phyugs rnams kyi/ /tshig la ba lang drug par 'dod/ /rnam
<p>163b.2</p>gnyis rtsod dang gzugs dang ni/ /byed pa 'gro ba dga' ba dang / /dge ba nyes ltung snying la bris/ /rtog dang sems dang tshul du byas/ /'khor lo 'jug dang yur ga dang / /nges 'joms dang ni mi 'gro ba/ /grong tshogs grong dang phyag dar dang / /phub can nor dang dga'
<p>163b.3</p>ba can/ /tshong pa dang ni tshong bya dang / /nye bar bsten dang nye bar 'dor/ /ruN+Da lus 'ching snod dang gnas/ /sa gnas 'tsho ba btung bya dang / /snying dang pags pa phur ma 'dod/ /a la brgya dang 'dud pa'i gnas/ /'dir ni de bzhin sgrub pa min/ /bslu dang
<p>163b.4</p>mngon par spang po dang / /phreng ba gral dang 'jug pa gral/ /kun tu 'dzin dang chu yi snod/ /mchod rten dang ni rnam 'dren sgo/ /mngon sum dang ni don gsal mthong / /dpa' bo gnon dang rnam par gnon/ /de nas rab tu bstod dang brtsam/ /de la phyogs
<p>163b.5</p>pa zhes pa yang / /rang 'dun skyes dang 'dud byed dang / /rab g.yo skyes dang rjes 'brel bzhin/ /si No chu yi ba raN+Da/ /pa ku ra dang yang dag gnas/ /kun skyob tshong zong 'dud pa dang / /gser bum mtshams dang sna can dang / /gang ba sgrub pa mchog 'dud
<p>163b.6</p>pa/ /'jig par byed dang aSh+Ta ka /glang po rnga dang khrus chen dang / /tshangs pa chen po thos dang zan/ /A ba l+ya ka ut+kaN+Tha/ /blon po bar ma mjal ba gnyis/ /sbal pa dang ni ba lang gshed/ /zas dang byed pa tarku Ta/ /nyin mo ma tsu kaM ma ning / /mA mA
<p>163b.7</p>dz+yi ti rta rnams kyi'o/ /zhes pa snyan ngag mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sde yis rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las 'dres pa'i sde rdzogs so// //
<p>164a</p>
<p>164a.1</p>@#/ /skad dod gcig gis don du mar 'jug pa'i mngon brjod nor bu'i phreng ba bzhugs so// // @#//sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs dang ka sogs rim nga las/ /gtan phab ka la sogs pa'i mtha'/ /yi ge gnyis pa la yang yod/ /nges pa ka sogs rim pa las/ /
<p>164a.2</p>kaHni tshangs pa/ rlung nyi ma/ /me dang / gshin rje bdag nyid dang / /gsa' ba dang ni 'gro ba la'o/ /kai ni/ mgo dang / chu dang bde/ /ku'i sgra/ sa dang ngan pa la/ /a ka /sdug bsngal/ sdig pa la/ /arka/ ri mo/ mtshan mo dang / /mtshan ma dang ni mtshan nyid dang / /gar
<p>164a.3</p>la sogs dang le'u dang / /phang pa dang ni/ gzugs can la/ /an+ta ka ni/ ri mo 'khrug /sngags dang / gnas dang / rgyan dag la'o/ /arka/ nyi ma/ arka'i 'dab/ /brgya byin shel dang zangs dag la/ /e ka /gtso bo/ grogs po dang / /gang zhig cig shos min pa la/ /
<p>164a.4</p>shaM ka /'dab chags bye brag dang / /mthar byed/ sgo glegs gnyis skyes la/ /karka rin chen karke ta/ /me dang / rta dkar/ me long bum/ /kalka sdig pa/ bshang ba dang / /kiSh+Ta skyon dang / ngan g.yo dang / /de bzhin til mar tshigs ma dang / /sdig sems dang
<p>164a.5</p>ni/ ba tu ra'o/ /kA ka /bya rog /gdan dang / sbrul/ /mgo bo/ byad gdong / ngan pa dang / /nga rgyal gling dang / shing gi bar/ /kA kA/ bya rog byin pa dang / /bya rog /gral dang / bya rog shing / /kA ka /mA bya/ dri ma 'joms/ /brag can la yang blta bar bya/ /
<p>164a.6</p>kA kaM/ bya rog tshogs dang / /g.yo ba 'ching bar byed pa la'ang / /kuSh+ku/ mtho dang khru dang ni/ /bang mdzod dang ni/ smad pa la/ /ko ka /'khor lo ce spyang dang / /gtso bo dang ni/ 'bra go'i shing / /sbal pa khyab 'jug rnams la'o/ /ts+tsha ka /khyem la zhen pa dang / /sna tshogs ri
<p>164a.7</p>dwags/ 'dab chags dang / /grong khyer dang ni/ 'khyog po la/ /Ti ka /rdo ba 'joms pa dang / /rdo yi rtsig pa mngon brjod dang / /nga rgyal/ bye brag /spre'u'i gnas/ /byin pa'i bar dang / ral gri'i shubs/ /khro dang rko bar byed pa la/ /tarka/ som nyi rnam rtog dang / /sbrul
<p>164b</p>
<p>164b.1</p>dang las dang shA tri yi/ /rab tu dbye ba dag 'a/'o/ /to shaM/ bu rgyud/ bu dang ni/ /ri mo dang ni rgyab 'jog gsum/ /tri kA/ khron pa'i mu khyud dang / /gnyis pa can dang bya rog mdzod/ /nA ka /mtho ris/ bar snang la/ /nA ku/ grog mkhar ri bong dang / /thub pa'i bye brag
<p>164b.2</p>rnams la'o/ /niSh+ka gser dang / dong tse zho/ /brgyad lhag brgya yi gser dang ni/ /brang gi rgyan srang gser srang la'o/ /n+yad+ku / ri dwags/ drang srong dbye/ /pang+ka/ 'dam dang / sdig pa la/ /pA ka//smin dang byis pa la/ /bA ka /rgas dang yongs su smin/ /mthar thug pa
<p>164b.3</p>dang ngal ba la/ /ba ga mthar byed zhi ba dang / /srin po'i bye brag /lus ngan la/ /bang+ga chu sogs 'khrog pa dang / /baR+YA na dang / skal ba dang / /bcom pa la/ ni brjod bya ldan/ /pang+ka/ shing shun/ shing skogs rdu/ /d+hU ka/ bu ga dus la'o/ /b+he ka /sbal pa/ sprin dag
<p>164b.4</p>pa/ /muSh+ka/ sgo nga'i mdzod dang / tshogs/ /thar pa can dang / yal ga can/ /rU ka /ngag mi ldan dang / dman/ /rang+ka/ rta dang gyang dag la/ /rA kA/ mthong ba'i rdu'/ dang ni/ /bu mo dang ni 'bab chu'i bar/ /zla ba gang zhing rdzogs pa dang / /g.ya' ba'i nad la'ang blta
<p>164b.5</p>bar bya/ re ka /dog pa/ pa ri ka /tha ma dang ni brjod bya can/ /ro kai bu ga /byin nas 'phrog /ri bo ka dang mdzes nga /'o/ /lang+gA/ srin po'i grong / yal ga /ku laSh+Ta dang / shA ki dI/ /A lo ka ni snang bar brjod/ /lo ka nga / dang / skye bo la/ /shaM kA/skrag dang / rnam rtog
<p>164b.6</p>la/ /shaM ku/ gangs kyi khyad par dang / /zhi ba/phur bu/ rkang pa dang / /mtshon cha'i khyad par dag la yang / /shalke dag/shing shun phye/ /shA ka nus pa shing dang glang / /mi yi bdag po'i khyad par la//shA shaM/ ljang gu lo ma dang / /me tog 'bras bu la sogs so/ /
<p>164b.7</p>shu ka 'thor byed rgyas nga /'i bu/ /sgra sgogs dang ni bsngags pa la/ /shu kang / gradzre par+Na dang / /shi rI Sha dang / shing dmar la/ /shulke/ byed pa la sogs dang / /gang zhig ma yi chad pa la'o/ /shri ka /shung+ga brtse ba la/ /sho rka/ ne tso'i tshogs dang ni/ /
<p>165a</p>
