<p>165a.1</p>bud med byed pa'i khyad par la'ang / /sh+lau ka tshigs bcad grags pa la/ /sre ka /rlung dang ut+pal mnga'/ /sto ka /chung ngu char sdod bye'u / /a nu kA ni nyung dang / mkhas/ /dmag dang nyon mongs ra Na rka/ /rigs dang ngang tshul a Na ka/ /lcags sgog
<p>165a.2</p>skye ba/ abyu ka /ad+hi ki ni nyi dang thab/ /arnyi kA ni 'khyags dang sman/ /aN+Di zhukA ni rtsar yang bshad/ /sring mo che bar yongs su grags/ /a dI ka ni 'jigs pa med/ /'chil byed/'dod ldan snyan ngag mkhan/ /rnams la brjod bya ldan pa'o/ /am+bi ka ni chu ldan
<p>165a.3</p>dang / /skye bor skye ba rnams la yang / /yungs kar dang ni kye ta ba/ /grub pa la yang asmr-i rnguka /am+bi kA ni tsu kri ka /sgyur po dang / de bzhin tibye Di kA dang / /sgyur ba'i tshogs la'ang blta bar bya/ /a b+ha 'uka ni nya dang byis/ /rmongs pa byu Na rtsig pa la'ang / /a la ka ni lus ngan grong / /
<p>165a.4</p>lan bu/ phye ma a la ka /a la na ni nyi ma dkar/ /rnal 'byor/ sbyo byed/ khyi la'o/ /a li ldu ka ni brdzun tshig dang / /mi mdza' ba dang nyin mo la'ang / /a sho ka ni 'jam po len/ /nga rgyal dang ni shing sdong la/ /a sho kai ni mchog sbyin la/ /a sho
<p>165a.5</p>kA ni tsha ba dang / /ro hi b+hA dang sho kabyaka /A d+ha ka ni nga rgyal dbye/ /gdams pa dang ni A+orje ka /A tang+ga ni nad dang gdung / /sang+gA dang ni rdza rnga'i sgra/ /A na ka ni rnga chung dang / /rnga dang / rnga zlum/ sprin gyi sgra/ /A lo ka ni blta ba dang / /gsal dang gsong por
<p>165a.6</p>smra ba dang / /Asna shaM ni nyin mo dang / /nges 'gro 'dor ba rtag pa'i las/ /ik+Shu ku ni/ bur shing dang / /bran/ bza'/ nyi ma'i rigs mi bdag /u darka ni/ tshol byed dang / /nag mo'i 'bras dang myos byed chang / /u phru ka ni 'ug pa dang / /ldum dang /
<p>165a.7</p>sgra ngan 'thab pa la/ /uSh+Ta ka ni nges gdung dang / /tsha ba tsam dang myur byed dang / /mkhas pa rnams la'o uSh+Ti kA/ /'jim pa/ glang mo/ myos byed brag /urmi kA ni dba' rlabs dang / /sor gdub dang ni sbrang bu'i sgra/ /gos zhig pa dang / steng du 'khrug /saM shu kai ni
<p>165b</p>
<p>165b.1</p>gos phra dang / /gos tsam dang ni stod g.yogs la/ /kany+tsu ka ni go cha dang / /'da' sgrib nges grol brlab pa dang / /dga' byin lus kyi gos la'o/ /sman gyi khyad par kany+tsu kI/ /ka TA kai ni ri ngos dang / /ri zhol/ rgyal po'i pho brang dang / /gdu bu rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa dang / /
<p>165b.2</p>rgyan dang glang po'i so la'o/ /ka Na ka ni tsha ba dmar/ /tsha ba'i me dang byo 'a la'o/ /ka bye ka ni ngang tshul ngan/ /rung+d+ha R+Sha dang sbrul la'o/ /kA li kA ni bshad pa dang / /shin tu 'gro dang / dngos me bsrub/ /kaN+Da ka ni shing yan lag /lus kyi gnas dang skyon dag la/ /
<p>165b.3</p>ba spu dang ni phran tshegs dag /gsod byed la yang blta bar bya/ /ka na ka ni gser sbyo byed/ /nA ga ge sar tsaspa ka /ki shu ka dang / gser rtsibs dang / /ko li'i ya la'ang 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /ka ra ka ni thod pa dang / /spyi blugs dang ni mkha' 'gro dang / /
<p>165b.4</p>le brgan/ se 'bru/ lag pa la/ /sprin kyi rdo ba ka ra kA/ /ka ra~M` ka ni lo thog dang / /bden pa nA ri ke la'i rus/ /mgo bo rnams so karte kA/ /rna rgyan gling bu sogs bskul lcag /lag ldan lag rtse skal ba dang / /lag pa'i gung mo'i sor mo dang / /
<p>165b.5</p>'dam bu'i sa bon mdzod dang ni/ /ku Ta ni la'ang 'ga' zhig zer/ /ka waM ka ni rtags mtshan dang / /nag bo/ skyon dang skur 'debs la/ /kA thra ka ni bya gag dang / /mgo ser dang ni ko ka la/ /kA mu ka ni 'od ldan bshad/ /a sho ka shing shin tu grol/ /kA
<p>165b.6</p>ra ka /byed por shes bya/ /las kyi dang po byed por 'dod/ /kA ri kA ni tshigs bcad dang / /'grel pa rgyas pa byas pa la/ /ka ri kA ni gar glang mo / /nA si ta sogs bzo bo la/ /ka rmu kaM ni 'od ma gzhu / /las kri nus pa brjod byar ldan/ /kA li kA ni
<p>165b.7</p>gtan mo dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi bye brag dang / /nub par gyur dang rin thang dang / /'khye shing khyad par ba to byel/ /ba spu'i phreng ba du ba can/ /snag tsha la'o kA tI ni/ /sdig pa 'dab can sprin stobs ma/ /stobs dang du ba'i rab dbye dang / /sprin sar
<p>166a</p>
<p>166a.1</p>rnams la brjod byar ldan/ /ki pA ka ni nag chen 'bras/ /rmongs pa dang ni tI tsa ka /sgra ldan 'od ma lha min rlung / /'od ma skam po shing bye brag /tI Ta ka ni 'bu yi rigs/ /gya tshom hUMcan la brjod byar ldan/ /ku la ka ni rigs
<p>166a.2</p>gtso bo/ /grog mkhar bya rog shin tu ka /ku la ke ni tshigs bcad sbyar//sdebs pa dang ni le'u can/ /ku li ka ni klu'i bye brag /rigs gtso shing gi khyad par ro/ /ku shi ka ni thub pa'i dbye/ /thang chu shing dang shing gi mig /til mar lhag ma rnams
<p>166a.3</p>la'o/ /ku sha ka ni gzhan gdung byed/ /spre'u dang ni 'od chen la/ /rtse mo'i khyad par ku tsi kA/ /'o ma'i rnam 'gyur/ /tU li kyu/ kuny+tsi ka ni/ kuT+ma la/ /kyu pa ka ni yon tan shing / /til mar snod dang chu'i btung ba/ /ku kurja ra shi ba la/ /ka bi kA chu'i
<p>166a.4</p>rdo pa'o/ /grog mkhar mchod rten ku la ka /ku la shaM ni 'gram la'o/ /zhing las thong gshol kr-i Sha ka /kiny+tsa ka ni cung zad dang / /pha rol byis pa'i khrag la'o/ /ko ra shaM ni kha 'bus mkhas/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba/ kak+ko la'o/ /ma tang+ga dz+wani ze 'bru dang // /bur shing srin bu'i
<p>166a.5</p>khyad par la/ /kau shu shaM ni ltad mo dang / /dga' ston/mngon 'dod/ rtsed 'jo dga'/ /phan tshun phrad dang bkra shis samAyA ra dang / /gtam bshad rgya chen bag ma len/ /yul gyi longs spyod dus la yang / /kau shi ka ni gu gul dang / /'ug pa Sh+pe'u le sbrul khas sdig /
<p>166a.6</p>dbang po sna tshogs bshes gnyen dang / /drang srong mdzod shes rnams la'o/ /gtum mo dang ni chu klung gi/ /bye brag la ni kau shi tI/ /kra mu ka seng phrom ba/ ni 'bras sman gang la/ /gu bA ka di tshangs pa'i shing / /piT+Ta kA gzhu mkhan dang lo d+h+ra dang / /ras bal la'o khar+b+he ka /ma hi
<p>166a.7</p>'o ma dbu ba can/ /sho ni ka zhes pa la'ang / /kha na ka ni de nyid shes/ /mtshams dang chom rkun/ rnam 'joms la/ /mu Shi ka ni byi ba dang / /chung dang dman dang tha ma la/ /kho la ka ni smin pa dang / /grog mkhar dang ni
<p>166b</p>
<p>166b.1</p>shing gla gor/ /mdzod dang mgo bo'i gos la'o/ /ga na ka ni skar mkhan dang / /grangs mkhan tshong pa'i bud med la'o/ /ga Ni ka ni tshogs can ma/ /rtog can mo dang glang chen mo/ /gaN+Da ka ni bse ru dang / /grangs dang rig pa'i rab dbye dang / /rnam par
<p>166b.2</p>dpyod pa'i khyad par la'o/ /'bab chu'i khyad par gaN+Da tI/ /gAN+Di ka ni dri bzang po/ /le ka ka ni tha snyad byed/ /guN+Da ka ni dri ma btul/ /cha shas brjod dang snum gye snod/ /gu hra ka ni sbed pa dang / /gsang ba pa yi snod sbyin dang / /tshe ka dres par brnags pa
<p>166b.3</p>la/ /gi ri ki ni khams bye brag /khams spyi tsam dang gser la'o//go ra~M` ka ni/ bya yi rigs/ /na gu ka dang sA Tha ka /go la ka ni nor bu can//rlung gi tshul dang phru ba la/ /gradzre ka ni/ ka rI ra/ /lha shes/ gu gul rim pa dang / /gradzre bar+Na/ mdza'
<p>166b.4</p>bo'i bu/ /pi pi li yi rtsa ba la'o/ /gra ha ka ni snang ba dang / /mkha' 'go/ gza' yi cig shos la/ /tsa Ta ka ni/ ka la dzi ka /de yi bu mo chung ma la/ /tsa tung+gA ni/ ma sha ka /smyug ma'i myu gu/ 'phrog byed mchod sdong / khyem bye brag /tsa lu
<p>166b.5</p>ka ni/ rab 'thor dang / /snod kyi /khyad par dag la'o/ /tsa Sha ka ni chang gi snod/ /chang dang chang gi rab dbye la/ /tsA ra ka ni skyong byed dang / /btson rar bcings pa dag la'o/ /tsi tra kai ni thig le la/ /tsi tra ka ni me yi ming / /e raN+Da chu shing dang byis pa
<p>166b.6</p>dang / /gcan gzan gye ni khyad par stag la/ /tsi ra ka ni lhag par byed/ /yi ge la yang brjod bya ldan/ /tsi ri kA ni bung ba la/ /tsum+ba ka ni khab len dang / /khram pa// rig pas nyer 'tsho dang / /'dod ldan la'o tsu lu ka /rab 'thor snod kyi khyad
<p>166b.7</p>par la/ /tsu lu tI na byis pa gsod/ /snod dbye/ cha shas/ khyad par la/ /tsU Da ka ni/ gtsug phud dang / /bcud len/ spre'u mdun/ shing ka spru ta/ /tsU yi kA ni zlos gar lus/ /rna ba'i rtsa ba glang po la'o/ /dza tu ka ni pags pa'i 'dab/ /'khrul
<p>167a</p>
<p>167a.1</p>'khor/ mtshal dang / mig dag la/ /dza na ka ni pha skyed byed/ /rgyal po'i drang srong rgyu'i khyad par/ /dzam+bu ka ni ce spyang dang / /dman pa nub phyogs bdag po la/ /dzA la kai ni byed pa po/ /ngan g.yo'i rab tu dbye ba dang / /dra ba
<p>167a.2</p>can dang 'bras bu la/ /dzA la kA ni dra ba dang / /rigs su 'gro dang rol mtsho la/ /dzA li ka ni nya pa dang / /khram pa'o grong rtsegs dz+ha li kai/ /dzA li kA ni/ gos bye brag /dra ba can dang 'bras bu dang / /ri yi snying po chu gnas dang / /shor ba rnams kyi rdo
<p>167a.3</p>ba dang / /lus 'thug pa dang srin mo la'o/ /dzA ha ka ni/ g+ho bye dang / /byi la khri dang / ka ruN+Di/ /dzre ba ka ni/ shing bye brag /srog ldan dang ni sbrul khas sdeg /ser po'i ra ba zad byed pa/ /rgan po'i 'tsho ba bsnyen bkur ba/ /dzre bi kA ni rgyal 'dra'i lo/ /dz+hai li ke
<p>167a.4</p>ni bung ba dang / /byug pa dang ni dri ma dang / /dz+hai ru kA dang sbyin dang mdzes/ /Tuklu ka ni/ dri gtsang khang / /bla gab med pa'i gtsug lag khang / /TuN+Da ka ni dmar ba dang / /cung zad  mu stegs  khro ba la yang brjod/ /DiN+Di ka ni na gru ka /chom rkun dga' ba lhur byed la'o/ /Dim+bi
<p>167a.5</p>kA ni chu'i gzugs brnyan/ /nga rgyal can dang 'dod ldan no/ /taN+Da ka ni shing phung dang / /brjod pa mang po bsdus pa dang / /khyem gyi shing dang dbu ba dang / /rkang 'theng dang ni sgyu ma can/ /tak+Sha ka ni thu klu'i bye brag /'phel ba can dang shing bye brag /tA ra ka ni lha min dang / /rlung yor 'dzin dang
<p>167a.6</p>mthong bas sgrol/ /skar ma/ ka nI/ ni kA'o/ /tA ra kaM ni sgrol ba po/ /ti la ka ni shing dang nad/ /sme ba rta yi bye brag go/ /tI la kaM/ sau brtsa la/ /ngal ba dang ni kha chu la'o/ /ti la kA ni khra bo la/ /tu na kA ni sde ris dang / /zho can dang ni 'dab  gru'i/ chags la/ /
<p>167a.7</p>tu ruSh+ka ni/ spos si h+la/ /gar log /kla klo'i bye brag dpal gyi gnas/ /tU li kA zhes bya ba ni/ /rnam bkod bkra ba'i ri  kha ru tsha mo can/ /tU la talpa dag  mal stan/ la'o/ /tri shaM ku phye ma leb ni sha la b+ha/ /mi bdag dbye ba glang gis so/ /daR+sha ka ni
<p>167b</p>
<p>167b.1</p>mchod pa dang / /pha mes slabs dang pra pi Na/ /dA ra ka ni 'byed pa dang / /bu rgyud/ bag ma'i las la'o/ /dI pa ka ni/ ngag gi rgyan/ /sgron me 'bar bar byed pa'o/ /dI bya kaM ni gtsug phud dang / /a dza mo da ya bA nI/ /dru Shi kA mig dri ma dang / /tU li kA'o dra ba ka /rdo yi bye brag
<p>167b.2</p>rnam par tshig /dbyangs ldan la'o  pi wang bgreng / d+ha ni ka /legs pa dang ni dpal yon can/ /d+ha ni kA ni rgyug pa la'o/ /d+h+wa ba ka ni/ rdul can dang / /rgyal po 'gro ba'i las rnal 'byor/ sman ra dga' ba/ legs ldan ma/ d+ha nu ka ni ba bzhon ma/ /glang mo phru gu btsas pa la/ /
<p>167b.3</p>d+he nu kaM ni/ bud med kyis/ /byed pa dang ni gzhon ma'i tshogs/ /nasna ka ni gcer bu pa/ /gos med  'gro  mdud pa med pa'o/ /nisna kA ni gcer mo zhon/ /nan+da ka ni 'phrog byed dang / /khab+dza dga' byed rigs skyong ba/ /na ra ka ni dmyal ba dang / /lha ma yin
<p>167b.4</p>gyi khyad par la/ /brta ka ni gar dang rtse/ /spyod dang pho Ta ga la ka/ sgeg mo glang mo narta tI/ /nA ya ka ni 'dren pa gtso/ /mchod 'os dang ni dbus ma la/ /'dam skyes mi shes nA li ka /mda' dang zug rngu nA lI ka /mtsho skyes/ pad sdong / nA li shaM/ /bi pA ka ni
<p>167b.5</p>'chos pa dang / /rdul dang las kyi 'bras bu la/ /gru'i 'gram pa/ /ni rmo ka ni nam mkha' dang / /go cha thar pa sbrul shun brjes/ /bA ra ka /rta/ blon po che/ /glang po dang ni dung la'o/ /nI ka dang ni dI li kA/ /rams dang phra mo'i nad dang ni/ /she pha li ka'i don can no/ /pa tA
<p>167b.6</p>kA ni rnam rgyal dang / /skal bzang mtshan ma'i  rnam smin/ rgyal mtshan la/ /pad+ma kaM ni/ pad+ma'i shing / /glang mo rig can 'dam skyes la/ /pa rI ka ni brtul zhugs dang / /ral gri skyil krung talba khri/ /glang mo paR+Ya ti kA la'o/ /tshon rtsi/ /pak+Sha ka ni ngos logs phyogs/ /phyogs kyi sgo dang logs
<p>167b.7</p>bcas dang / /ka Ta ka yi khyad par dang / /pA Ta ka zhes bya rnams dang / /mig sogs blta dang rtsa ba'i rdzas/ /nye bar bsags dang kU la dang / ma hA kiSh+ku rol mo dang / /bstan gyi/ /grong gi dbye ba la yang blta/ /bArta ka ni g.yang sa dang / /lhung ba skyong chu'i glang po la'o/ /pA lang+ka
<p>168a</p>
<p>168a.1</p>yal ga'i bye brag /sha khru tI ta 'dab chags la'o/ /pA ba ka mi rtag tu spyod/ /b+hal+la ta ga bye dong ka /tsi tra ka dang me bsrub dang / /dag par byed pa rnams la'o/ /pi sgyu ka ni kang+ga la/ /mtshal dang se h+la/ til snyigs ma/ /si nA ka ni 'phrog byed dbyug /mdung dang legs
<p>168a.2</p>par char 'bab la/ /siSh+Taka ni tsa ma sa/ /nas kyi so ba mig gi nas/ /pu tra ka ni/ sha ra b+ha/ /bu  bse shing gi 'bras bu/ shing / khram pa ri'i khyad par/ /pu tri kA ni bu 'dzin ma/ /yA ba ka dang tU ka'o/ /pu la ka ni 'bu'i bye brag /nor bu'i skyon dang rdo'i bye brag /glang po'i zan changs
<p>168a.3</p>ba spu langs/ /ga lwarka dang bab la'o/ /pu khA ka ni sban she stong dang / /bsdus dang zas kyi snyigs ma'o/ /dut+pa ke ni lus ngan po'i/ /gzhal med khang dang rin chen zegs/ /mig nad sha tsha ra gan dang / /mig sman khu ba rnams dang ni/ /rnga zlum/ ra sa ka TI dang / /
<p>168a.4</p>lcags dang 'khar ba rnams la'o/ /thra thu ka ni/ byis/ sna nyag /pU dA ku ni srog chags pra/ /br-i dA ku ni/ sdig spu dang / /stag dang khra bo dag la yang / /be tsa ka ni/ 'ug pa dang / /glang po'i mjug ma'i rtsa dang rtse/ /pe Ta ka ni po ti yi/ /sgam dang tshogs
<p>168a.5</p>pa can la'o/ /pra tI ka ni mi mthun dang / /phyogs re ba dag go zlog dang / /cha shas la'o pra be+e ka /'khrus dang shi pa dag la'o/ /pA Na ka ni sems can rigs/ /po la ka dang 'tsho byed shing / /pri ya ka ni ka dadza/ /a li tsi tra lus ngan dang / /dr-i ya~M` ku dang
<p>168a.6</p>ljang ser dang / /gur rku dang ni dga' byed la'o/ /pha la ka ni bkod pa bkra/ /dar dpyangs lus kyi rab dbye dag /pa rA ka ni brjod bya ldan/ /spyang dang rjes rtse sang+ka ra/ /ba su ka ni/ zhi ba'i gyad/ /arka'i 'dab dang spu can dang / /nyi ma dang ni
<p>168a.7</p>sbal pa can/ /dA tru ha dang khron pa la/ /bA ra ka ni rta'i bye brag /rta yi 'gros dang dgag pa la/ /bAr+ng+ha kaM ni rgan po'i tshogs/ /rgan po nyid dang rgan po'i las/ /bA la ka ni mi shes byis/ /skra dang / rta dang / glang po dang / /sgra can rnams la blta bar
<p>168b</p>
<p>168b.1</p>bya/ /bA la ka ni/ ngo tsha dang / /bA ri haR+Ya sor gdub la/ /bA li kA ni bye ma byis/ /bo la kA ni rgyan la'o/ /bA lu kA ni bye ma la/ /bA lu ka ni e la'i bye/ /br-iSh+tsi ka ni sdig srin dang / /shing dang khyem dang de bzhin sman/ b+hasma ka ni thal nad dang / /byi dang ga dang cha yi gter/ /
<p>168b.2</p>tA lAM ka ni dmar po dang / /sngo yi bye brag rus sbal dang / /'phrog byed mtshan nyid chen po rdzogs/ /skyes bu lag pa'i 'dab ma'o/ /b+hU ti shaM ni/ b+hU nin+ba/ /'bar byed ga pur gcod byed dang / /sa can/ bkod pa sa yi ni/ /khyad par yongs su bzung ba'o/ /ju ma ka ni ce spyang dang / /
<p>168b.3</p>khram pa nyi 'khyims rdo'i bye brag /maN+DU ka ni sbal sprul dang / /'ching ba'i rab dbye dmar po la/ /lo ma la yang maN+DU ka /maN+DU tI ni sbrang rtsi can/ /shing mngar zhes kyang bod pa dang / /phyag dang phyogs kyi khyad par dang / /shing mngar lo ma la yang ngo / /mil+la ka dang mal+li kA/ /ngang
<p>168b.4</p>pa'i rgyal po'i khyad par la/ /mil+la kA ni rtsa stod dang / /nya dang sa yi smod dag la/ /ma pa ka ni srog chags phra/ /rab dbye 'gro ba'i khyad par la/ /mA tro kA ni ma mo dang / /tshangs ma sogs dang lha la yang / /'dzin ma dang ni byed pa la'ang / /mA ma ka ni zhang por
<p>168b.5</p>brjod/ /mA sa kai ni mnyam nyid ldan/ /phreng ba dang ni mgul rgyan dang / /do shal me tog phreng ba dang / /mkha' lding chu klung khyad par la/ /me tsa ka ni sngo bsangs dang / /rma bya'i mdongs dang mun pa la/ /me tsa shaM ni/ brjod bya bzhin/ /kha dog nag po la 'gyur ro/ /mo tsa ka
<p>168b.6</p>ni chu shing 'bras/ /de las skyes dang se gru la/ /nirmo tsa ka chags bral can/ /mo da ga ni bca' ba yi/ /bye brag dga' byed gzhan bzhin no/ /ya ma shaM ni/ yang dag sdom/ /sgra yi rgyan dang mtshe ma skyes/ /dzA ga ka ni 'gro ba'i tshul/ /rgyal po'i glang po mchod pa can/ /yAdz+hai
<p>168b.7</p>ka ni mchod sbyin dang / /ku sha mchod sbyin nyer spyor la/ /su ta shaM ni byes pa dang / /sum+ma/ rkang rtse/ je tshom dang / /gos dbye/ bu mo'i gos g.yo dang / /ldan pa la ni brjod bya ldan/ /mu thi ka ni 'dod pa dang / /khyu dang / nad med me tog 'ga'/ /rak+ta ka ni nad gred dang / /
<p>169a</p>
<p>169a.1</p>gnyen byed/ gos dmar rdzas chags la/ /ra dza ka ni/ rgyug pa dang / /ne tso pho dang btso lag mkhan/ /ra sbo kA ni bcud ldan dang / /gser dang ske rags dag la'o/ /rA dzi kA ni springs yig dang / /nya pa/ ske tshe/ yungs kar la'o/ /rA tri ka ni rje rigs kyi/ /khyem dang
<p>169a.2</p>lo ni 'gro ba'o/ /rA tro kai rgo ma/tshan mo la'o/ /ru tsa rka ni mgul rgyan dang / /byi dong ga dang bkra shis rdzas/ /bshang ba/ phreng ba de'i rked dang / /rus rgyan gi wang lha shing dang / /skyur rtsi bI dzA phUr dang / /gser la sogs pa'i dong tse la'o/ /ruN+Di kA ni 'thab pa dang / /sgo dang bsdus pa
<p>169a.3</p>pho nya mo/ /re Na kA ni glang mo dang / /ya mang ag+na'i dga' ma la/ /lam+bu ka ni/ yul/ rgyan gos/ /lA sa ka ni rol pa dang / /sgeg pa'i byed po ma rdzogs pa/ /phru na ka ni/ phyugs tha dang / /lo tsa ka ni mig 'bras dang / /sha yi gong bu bsdus pa dang / /btsun mo dang ni byis pa'i rgyan/ /
<p>169a.4</p>dud pa sngon po 'dres pa dang / /maurbI/ smin ma/ pags pa lhod/ /chu shing dang ni rna ba gang / /nges pa'i blo gros rnams la'o/ /ngany+tsa ka ni grol ba dang / /khram pa dang ni khyem pa dang / /rta sreb dang ce spyang la/ /ban+d+ha ka ni brje ba la/ /ban+d+ha ki ni g.yo bcas ma/ /ban+tu kai ni rtsa
<p>169a.5</p>lag 'tsho/ /ban+tu ka ni gdong ser la/ /brta ka ni zlum po dang / /bya yi bye brag rta'i rmig pa/ /bar+Na ka dang bar+Na shaM/ /phyag dang spyod dang snyan ngag mkhan//byug pa dang ni ri mo mkhan/ /yi ga dang ni tsan dan la/'o/ /nga rja kA dI sra ba dang / /be'u dang ni smyu gu la'o/ /bal+lI ka
<p>169a.6</p>ni grog mkhar dang / /thub pa nad kyi bye brag la/ /bI R+Sha kaM ni skyob pa la/ /baR+ShA dus la gzhan bzhin 'gyur/ /bA sgo ka ni me ldan dang / /yul gyi khyad par dang ni rta/ /bA d+ng+ha ni me lda na dang //dpa' bo dang ni tshal dag la// /be+e tarka ni the tshom dang / /rtog dang dpyod la 'ga'
<p>169a.7</p>zhig 'dod/ /bi sA ka ni yongs 'gyur dang / /rdul dang ro myang ngan 'gro la'o/ /be+e be ka ni rnam dpyod dang / /chu yi sno da dang dben nga / /thra ShAng+ka ni bde byed dang / /lcags dang b+halbA ta ka dang / /gzhi chen la'o/ /bi dza kai/ /shaM gru'i byu ma dang rgyu dang ni/ /'phral du phyung ba'i myu
<p>169b</p>
<p>169b.1</p>gul/ /bya lI shaM ni mi dzi'i las/ /mtshan gzhi bral dang gzir ba dang / /grong khyer nga /'o shaM kha ka /mgo bo'i nad la'o/ /shaM kha kaM /gdu bu dung la'o/ /shaM pU kA/ /lha ma yin gyi khyad par dang / /dbyangs ldan glang po'i bum mtha' la// /shaM bu ka ni chu'i nya phyis/ /sha khA kA ni
<p>169b.2</p>mda' nyid dang / /zug rngu dang ni gdugs kyi gur/ /tarku shing bal ri skegs myos/ /thob pa min pa dag la yang / /shAl+la kI nI khyi dang bya/ /shA ya ka ni ral gre mda'/ /shA karka ni/shA rka ra'i/ /gong bu 'o ma'i dbu ba la/ /shi shu ka ni byes pa dang / /byis pa gsod dang byis
<p>169b.3</p>pa'i tshig /shi ta ka be+e legs gnas dang / /grang ba'i dus dang ma 'ongs mthong / /shi ka ka ni/ dbyar ka yi/ /'bru dang / dngul chu dag la'o/ /sas+thA ki ni phreng bar byas/ /rgyal cho kar/ tarku d+h+riSh+Ta dag la'o/ /saM brka ni sbyangs stobs dang / /'du 'dzi dang ni reg pa la/ /
<p>169b.4</p>bar ka ni ma tshang dang / /lam dang / gral dang mtsho dang ni/ /sI d+hu'i btung / snod sI d+hu la'o/ /sa s+ye ka ni pa ta sogs/ /snying po ral gri nor bu la'o/ /sU tsa ka ni ngan pa dang / /bya rog khab dang khye dang rtogs/ /sru ta kai ni skye ba la/ /sru ta kai ni/ dngul chu la/ /sre dA ku ni
<p>169b.5</p>nags tshal dang / /nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan rdo rje rlung / /'khrud byed/ chu sbyin/ pe tsa ka /se pa ka ni/ bal+ma kI/ /rab mtha' shing 'khyog rjes su 'tsho/ /s+thA ka ni spyod pa dang / /pha ra sogs dang chu bur la 'o/ /su byA kA ni/ rams la 'gyur/ /grog mkhar/ shing dag
<p>169b.6</p>su m+bi kA/ /swa ste ka ni bkra shis rdzas/ /dga' dang khyem gyi bye brag dang / /phye ma'i rab tu dbye ba dang / /dga' ba'i se' snyan dag la'o/ /hA ra ka ni g.yo can dang / /chom rkun tshigs bcad rnam shes dbye/ /du Tu ka ni/ sil snyan dbye/ /myos pa'i ca co dA t+yu ha'o/ /he ru
<p>169b.7</p>ka ni sangs rgyas dbye/ /de bzhin nag po chen po'i tshogs/ /k+ShA ra ka ni/ dra ba can/ /bya dang nya sogs rgya dad dol/ /k+Shu ra ka ni khu byug mig/ /ba lang rmig pa sbum can shing / /ang+gar ka sol ba dang / gza' mig dmar/ sa skyes kaN+Da ka la'o/ /i gA ri ka/ /bur shing
<p>170a</p>
<p>170a.1</p>mda'/ /kiM shu ka'i kor ka'o/ /A ma la ka// sbal pa dang / /sbrang can/ chu skyes/ ge sar la'o/ /a li ba ka /gral dang ni/ pi ka dga' ba'i khyad par ma/ asma n+ta kaM/ ur+ng+hAn/ /mA lu ka dang 'gems pa la/ /A palpa ka/ /mun pa dang / /rmongs
<p>170a.2</p>dang mdud pa/ 'phyang dang dga'/ /'jug pa'o/ /A kha ni ka ni/ /byi ba/ chom rkun/ phag dag la/ /A k+She pa ka//rlung nad dang / /nad dang rmod pa la 'gyur ro/ /ung+ka li ka/ /rtsed mi dang / /mgrin pa bteg dang rgyun mang chu/ /e Da mU ka g.yo dang ni/ /dag dad thos pa
<p>170a.3</p>spangs pa la/ ka thil+la ka/ /nab so dang / /kA ra bel+la ral gri 'dab/ /ka ni ka ni mthe chung gi /sor mo dang ni/ mig 'bras la/ /ka parta ka/ ral pa bcings/ /dzo Ti rga dang / lte ba la/ /karko ta ke/ dbal 'bras dad/ /glu yi rab tu dbye ba la/ /ka la bing+ka grong gi byi'u/ /
<p>170a.4</p>ku ling+ga ka dag la'o/ /kA ka rU ka/ /'ug pa rta/ /rgyal byed mkhas pa/ mkha' gos can/ /'jigs dang dbul ba rnams la'o/ /kA ya Ti ka gzhan gnad shes/ /gdugs dang / dus dang / yul la'o/ /kur pa ka 'dod pa dang / siN+Di kA dang / nang bye byag /kr-i ka
<p>170a.5</p>bA ku khyim bya dang / /sgeg byed dang ni rma bya'o/ /koShA ta ka sgra dang ni/ /snang ldan/ sprin dmar sgra sgrogs so/ /kau k+kuTi ngan g.yo can/ /ring du bskul dang dal med pa'o/ /'dod chen hI lI na dag la'o/ /khA rA li ka grong gi gtso/ /gnyer dang
<p>170a.6</p>lcags mda' nyer 'jog la/ /gu Na ni kA goms pa dang / /yan lag stong ba klog byang dang / /gang la'o shA kaN+Da ka ni/ /ba lang yan lag dri ma dang / /legs byung skam gnas pur ma la'ang / /ga ku li ka ke ka ra/ /'dam gnas ba lang
<p>170a.7</p>phyogs can la/ /gau med ka nor bu ser/ /kA ko la dang 'dab chags la'ang / /g+ha r+g+ha ri kA/ dril chung dang / /rol mo'i bye brag dag la dran/ /de bzhin 'bras kyi so ba 'dzin/ /chu klung gi ni bye brag dang / /rol mo'i dbyug gu dag la'o/ /tsaN+DA li kA sman bye brag /go rI ka ni
<p>170b</p>
<p>170b.1</p>mi'am ci/ /dzaT ru ka/ /klu shing dang / /chu'i a nU ka ral pa can/ /de bzhin yal ga 'phrog byed dang / /tu lAng+haT rnams la'o/ /dzar+dz+dza ri ka rI mo mang / /hrul bor gyur pa dag la'o/ /dzI ban+ti kA/ 'tsho bar bshad/ /yal ga/ /phyag 'tshal gu DU tsi/ /dzi ba tri ka ri bong can/ /
<p>170b.2</p>tshe ldan lha rdzas sman zhing las/ /tartu rI ka mchog tu gyur/ /tartu rI kaM snod la'o/ /tuk+ta shA ka/ /chu lha dang / seng lding lam dang / mdzes pa la/ /tri par+Na kaM ni/ tsha ba gsum/ /'bras bu gsum dang gzem la/ /ngan+ta shri ka lag 'gro dang / /gnod sbyin la 'gyur de
<p>170b.3</p>nas ni/ /A Ta ka/ /rang skyes dang / /nA ga ge sar til dbu ba/ /kun+da shi rI Sha dris lan/ /rlung dang 'obs dang sgrol ba che/ /btsag dang glang mo'i rna ba dang / /me dad gzegs ma'i tshogs dang ni/ /bre dang bya ba'i phung po la/ /dA se ra ka 'bangs mo'i bu/ /glang
<p>170b.4</p>po'i phru gu nya pa'o//ni yA ma ka gru 'dren dang / /bla ma glo gros rlung g.yor 'dzin/ 'khrul 'khor byed pa rnams la'o/ /nir+g+ran+tha ka brad byad pa/ /cha med/ gos med spyod med dang / /rlung dang rang dbang bshang ba'i zad/ /pany+dzu laM kA/ gos/ bu mo/ glu yi bye
<p>170b.5</p>brag dag la'o/ /paN+DI ta ka spos dang dregs/ /dbu ba rdos dang nu ma'i dngos/ /bisba li ka ma ning dang / /sI ba na dang srin bal can/ /puN+Da rI ka /me/ phyogs/ glang / /stag dang bud shing bye brag la/ /puN+Da ri kaM gdugs dkar dang / /chu skyes dkar dang sman
<p>170b.6</p>la'o/ /puSh+ka la ka ri dgas dri/ /phur bu dang ni zad byed la/ /pUr+Napa ka snod gad pa/ /pa Ta ha yi snod dag la/ /po tI na kaM po ta kI/ /rnam g.yo/ po tAng+ha na la'o/ /pra kIr+Na kaM mdud pa'i dbye/ /bkra shis rnga yab rta la'o/ /pra tsa lI ka mda' 'phen dang / /rma bya gnod sbyin lag
<p>170b.7</p>'gro la/ /pharka rI ka tsa pe Ta/ /pharka ri kaM 'dam po la/ /ba ge ru ka 'khyogs po'i dbye/ /rlung med pa dang lcugs ma la/ /ka parda ka mig 'bras dag /brad po sa bon mdzod lte ba/ /ba raN+Da ka glang po yi/ /tshor reg lang tsho'i tsher ma dang / /de bzhin kun nas zlum po la/ /brta rU ka chu klung dbye/ /
<p>171a</p>
<p>171a.1</p>dza le ba Da bya rog tshang / /sgo nga'i gnas la yang 'dod do/ /barbA rI ka nag po che/ /skra yi bkod pa yal ga la/ /ba lA hA ka chu 'dren dang / /klu dang lha min khyad par rig /pA Ni dza ga tshong pa'i rtags/ /ri dgas mtshan ma 'dod ldan ma/ /Dau rba ngang ni/ rjes chags tshig /brin+dA ra ka lha dang
<p>171a.2</p>gtso/ /yid du 'ong dang tshogs par dran/ /bri ha hi kA stag ldan dang / /gos kyi khyad par dag la'o/ /b+haT+TA ra ka lha dang ni/ /sa skyong dka' thub nor can la/ /b+ha yA na ka stag dang ni/ /seng ge dang ni 'jigs rung la/ /b+hAR+YA Ti ka chung ma dang / /nges rgyal 'phrog byed khyad par la/ /b+h+ra ma ra ka sprin
<p>171a.3</p>sbrang chang / /adz+dzA na dang phye ma dang / /mdung 'dzin zhes pa rnams la'o/ /maN+Do da kaM sems chags dang / /kun tu byug pa dag la'o/ /maN+Da la kaM gzugs dang ni/ /mdze yi bye brag dregs pa la/ /bai de ha ka tshong pa dang / /srad bu rje rigs bu la'o/ /bai nA shi ka skad cig pa/ /gzhan
<p>171a.4</p>dbang dang ni lte ba'i bal/ /sha tA ni ka thub pa'i dbye/ /rgan po sdong po spyang ki khyi/ /ce spyang dang ni sbre'u la/ /shi lA Ta ka snum dang drag /shring+ga Ta ka sgo'i lcog dang / /lam gyi bzhi mdo dag la'o/ /saM g+hA Ti kA snam sbyar dang / /sna dang chu snod kuT+Ta nI/ /san+ta ni ka 'o zho'i mtsho/ /spre'u'i
<p>171a.5</p>dra ba dag la'o/ /saM daM shi ka rkaM pa dang / /lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor rab dbye la/ /a pra tI ka dbang ldan dang / /phyogs kyi glang po lha yi gzugs/ /shri ga li ka ce spyang mo/ /skrag pa dang ni 'bros pa la/ /shai ka ti kaM ma yi snod/ /bkra shis srad bu dag la ni/ /de bkod dang ni the tshom
<p>171a.6</p>la'o/ /ma yU ra ka spangs ma dang / /a pA mArga'i shing la'o/ /ma ru ba ka myos byed dang / /me tog dbye ba dbu ba sngos/ /bA Na ba ka do shal dbye/ /byis pa skyes ngan mkhas pa la/ /mr-iSh+Ta'i ru ka smra byed ma/ /mr-iSh+TA shin dang 'gron po'i dgra/ /ra ta r+d+hi kaM bde ba'i 'khrus/ /bkra shis brgyad
<p>171a.7</p>pa dang nyin mo/ /rA tshon rtsi dang / d+ha rang+ka rgan la nyan/ /shis byed sprin gyi rdo pa'o/ /la tA li ka a mra'i lcug /rdo rje'i khu tshur la yang dran/ /lA lA Ti ka bya la bzod/ /'khyud pa'i khyad par dag dang ni/ /gtso bo'i dpral ba blta ba dang / /mthong ba med pa yang brjod do/ /le k+Sha'i ra ka phrin yig
<p>171b</p>
<p>171b.1</p>khyer/ /ke yash+tsa yi phrin yig la/ /le khI la ka gzhan lag nas/ /rang gi lag gi phrin yig la/ /bi tu n+na kaM dpal yon can/ /dz+ha Ta ma la la yang ngo / /bi dU Sha ka mkhas pa dang / /gzhan smos pa dang cho ga byed/ /bi nA ya ka rgyal ba mgon/ /bya khyung khyab 'jug bgegs bla ma/ /bi mA na ki
<p>171b.2</p>nga rgyal gyis/ /stong pa dang ni mngon par sems/ /lha yi theg dang sa bdun khyim/ /bi she Sha ka thig le dang / /khyad par du ni byed pa la/ /bai ta li ka rtogs byed pa'i/ /ri mo dang ni grags pa dang / /Di tA la dang bu dang ni/ /phye ma gnyis pa phreng gnyis pa/ /rnam par skyod byed rnams la'o/ /
<p>171b.3</p>sai ka ti ka dri gtsang khang / /rgya mtsho dang ni khrus la'o/ /rang gi chung ma gzhan la gnas/ /gang zhig sgrub par ma nus pa/ /de la der bkod tsam gyis ni/ /bkres par byas pa'i bza' ba la'o/ /so ma balka shun pa dang / /seng ldeng dkar po dag la'o/ /sau gan+d+hi
<p>171b.4</p>ka gdung dang / /pad+ma rA ga gcod byed dang / /dri can dri ldan so b+hA rgyA/ dag la'o/ /ba da/ tasta/ s+thI/ a ne yo/ na/ Da mU ka zhes pa/ /bId+ha yi tuHshak+Sha ma/ ki ta ba dang / ngag thos spangs/ /mA tre Na/ k+Shu b+ha/ /Ats+tshu rtagr-i ta/ b+ho dza na/ ri ta ka zhes pa/ /dgong dang sen mo 'joms bye brag /u pa kA ri kA zhes pa/ /rgyal
<p>171b.5</p>po'i chibs kyi ra ba dang / /piSh+Ta'i dgon pa bur shing byed/ /ka Ta ko bar byed pa dang / /'ching bu'i bum pa dag dang ni/ /gtor mas rgyas dang ce spyang la'o/ /kak+Shu pek+Shu ka zhes pa/ /brtan dang dag pa'i mtha' dang ni/ /skyed tshal skyong bar byed pa dang / /'khrud dang tsang+gA 'tsho sgo skyong / /
<p>171b.6</p>kr-i mi kaN+Da kaM zhes/ /ri mo/ /spyo ba/ byi tang ga//sho dza ga ri ko zhes pa/ /bkra shis brjod dang thab byed pa'o/ /ci li m+bi li kA zhes pa/ /mgrin pa can gyi bye brag dang / /mkha' snang dang ni klog rnams la'o/ /dza la kung+dza ka zhes pa/ /lcog dang chu khang pra shI'o/ /dza la tA yi ka zhes pa/ /
<p>171b.7</p>il+lI sha dang kA kA tsi/ /nya dag la ni/ sman/ 'dod pa yin/ /na ba ka rang+ka zhes pa/ /be ta'i 'bras bu dang ni sprin/ /na ba pha li kA zhes pa/ /dung dang chu yi khri shing dang / /gru dang gsar du skyes pa dang / /dang por gsar skyed bud med rdul/ /nA ga pA ri kaM zhes pa/ /rgyal po'i glang mor
<p>172a</p>
<p>172a.1</p>glang po skyes/ /bya khyung dang ni grangs gnas dang / /ske rags ri mo can la'o/ /bya ba hA ri kA zhes pa/ /sbyang bar bya ba dang ni mtshal/ /'jig rten gyi ni tha snyad do/ /brI hi rA dzi ka zhes pa/ /krA ma nI dang rgya yi 'bras/ /sha ta sa rbi kA/ /dU rbA/ shI ta tsam+ba ka yi sgra/ gshin rje
<p>172a.2</p>tshim byed sgron me la/ /su ga san+ta kaM dpyid la'o/ /rgyags pa'i ngag ston la yang 'gyur/ /he ma puSh+pe ka dang ni/ /he ma puSh+pa ka zhes pa/ /me tog tsam pa ka'i phung po'o/ /grA ma mang+ku ri kA lcog /grang gi 'thab mo la yang blta'o/ /ma nga na Na lA kA ni/ /sbrul dang 'dod pa skyes la'o/ /mA tu la
<p>172a.3</p>su tra ka ni/ /zhang po skyes dang khram pa'i 'bras/ /la tA markA Ta ka ni/ /bu mo me tog spre'u'o/ /bar+Na bi lo Da ka ni/ /tshigs bcad grib ma 'phrog bcom rkun/ /sin+dU ra ti la ka ni/ /klu dang sin+dU ra'i thig le/ /sna tA tse ki t+sa ka ni/ /zla ba bzhi pa'i bsnyen gnas la/ /snA ta tsi ki t+sa kaM ni/ /dka'
<p>172a.4</p>thub bud med me tog la'o/ /zhes pa snyan ngag mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sde yis rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes pa/ ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las/ ka dbyangs bcas ka mtha'i sde'o// //kha ni nam mkha' lha yul sde/ /bla dang yang dag
<p>172a.5</p>rig dang grong / /stong pa thig le dbang po zhing / /ku NA ha la'i 'bras bu la'o/ /nag sen mo gaN+Dal/ /na khI/ na khA dri yi rdzas/ /oM kha snyan tshig yid 'ong / /snyan tshig oM yig drug pa la'o/ /phreng+khA paR+Ya Ta la dang / /gar dang 'gros dang rta yi 'gros/ /sing+khA 'gro ba'i khyad par dang / /
<p>172a.6</p>gar dang sr-i ka shi kya la/ /mu khaM kha dang nges 'byung sgo/ /thabs dang rtsom pa dag la'o/ /le kha spring yig lha min la/ /le khA ri mo gral yi ge/ shaM kha dung dang dpral rus la/ /na khI gter gyi bye brag la/ /sA khA lcug ma rig byed che/ /mtha' can lag dang phyogs kyi bar/ /shi khA yal
<p>172a.7</p>ga gtsug phud rtse/ /phud bu 'bar ba mjug ma la/ /sA kha mdza' bo grogs po la/ /su khaM skyid dang mtho ris la/ /su khA grong dang rab sems so/ /go mu kha ni kha chung dang / /rol mo'i snod dang nyer byug dang / /tri shI dri shA khA b+he ka thal+la ko/ /bi shI kha ni mda' bo che/ /mda' dang rko byed shing rta dang / /
<p>172b</p>
<p>172b.1</p>sdong bu la'o/ /bi shi gA+o/ sa ga sgrub byed/ bsrub pa la'o/ /bra mu kha ni dang po/ gtso/ /'od chags 'bar ba/ nad lag pa'o/ /bi shA khA ni skems byed rtog /ag+ni mu kha lha dang ni/ /gnyis skyes dang ni rlung gi ming / /ag+ni mu khI zhes pa dang / /'ga' zhig ag+ni mu kha ste/ /bal+lAM ta ka'i shing la'o/ /ag+ni shi
<p>172b.2</p>khA mjug ma can/ ag+ni shi khaM gur kum brjod/ /in+d+ra le khA zla ba'i cha/ /la tA su kha zla ba'i bcud/ /ag+ni na kha rus sbal dang / /glang po 'gar ni ba lang sogs/ /bar+d+hA ye khA bskrad pa la/ /bar+d+hA shi kha byis pa la/ /ma hA saM kha mi rus dang / /gter dang dung gi rab dbye la/ /byA g+h+ran kha kan+da ste/ /dri
<p>172b.3</p>yi rdzas kyi bye brag go/ /parba dza mu khaM zhes pa/ /nam mkha' dang ni lam la'o/ /sarba te mu khA zhes pa/ /zhing shes cho ga drag po la'o/ /sna tshogs gsal ba las kha mtha'i sde'o// //gaHni dri za tshogs bdag nyid/ /gaM/ glu/ gA ni/ glu mkhan la/ /go ni glang dang mtho ris dang / /mkha'
<p>172b.4</p>'od rdo rje dz+la pa ri/ /ba lang sa phyogs mig dang ngag /mda' dang chu rnams la ni pho/ /a ga 'gro med shing ri bo/ /nyi ma lag 'gro dag la'o/ /ang+ga chang gi rab dbye la/ /a gaM lus dang gtso bo dang / /thabs dang 'gan zla nye ba dang / /yan lag ldan pa rnams la'o/ /ang+ga kun tu bod pa dang / /
<p>172b.5</p>grangs pho'o// mid zlos don rab dga' la/ /ing+ga sur dang shes pa dang / /'gro dang rmad byung dag la'o/ /kha ga bya dang mda' dang ni/ /nyi ma lha dang gza' la'o/ /khang+ga ral gri tsher ma dang / /rwa can rgyal ba'i khyad par la/ /gAng+gA gdong drug 'jigs byed la/ /gaM gA 'byung ba brjod
<p>172b.6</p>byar ldan/ /tsang+ga mdzes dang mkhas pa dang / /chags dang rnam par sgeg pa la/ /Tang+ga mtshon cha'i khyad par dang / /byin pa dang ni rko byed la/ /t+yA ga sbyin dang yongs gtong la/ /tung+ga mtho ba brjod byar ldan/ /tuM gaM klu shing ri bo la/ /tuM gi sgra dang mtshan mo'o/ /durga bgrod dka' du rga ni/ /
<p>172b.7</p>gtum mo dang ni rams la'o/ /na ga ri shing 'gro med dang / /nyi ma lag 'gro dag la'o/ /na ga klu dang klu shing dang / /nA ga ge sar so dang ni/ /glang po dang ni char sprin 'khrug /'khrug las lus kyi rlung bye brag /gtso bo nyid dang mchog gnas dang / /zha nye mtshon dang bud med kyi/ /'chi bar
<p>173a</p>
<p>173a.1</p>byed pa'i khyad par la'o/ /sing+ga dmar ser sing+ga ni/ /mA sI'o sing+ga skra can la/ /sing+gA ra ma tha dang rtsa/ /u mA dang ni gi wang la/ /pU ga ni ku ru m+ba dang / /rkang 'thung kra mu ka la'o/ /phalgu dri ma 'bras bu med/ /b+ha gaM ye shes skye gnas 'dod/ /grags pa bdag nyid tshe dang
<p>173a.2</p>grol/ /dbang phyug brtson 'grus tshigs bral chos/ /dpal dang 'bad pa nyi ma la'o/ /b+hang+ga chu rlabs nang lus gyi/ lha mo/ bye brag /dbye ba rgyal ba go rims bzlog /b+h+riM ga sha na'i lo tog la/ /b+hA ga cha dang rnam par dbye/ /phyogs gcig dang ni bgo skal la'o/ /b+h+r-i gu pa sangs pi nA kin/ /
<p>173a.3</p>g.yang sa ya mang ag+ni la/ /b+h+r-ing ga /bud ga /Shang+ga dang / /du ba 'tshub ma la'o b+h+r-ing+gi ni/ /skra yi rgyal dang bu ram shun/ /b+ho ga bde dang / sprul gyi ni/ /gdengs ka dang ni lus dag la/ /'dus la blta dang bud med kyi/ /bza' ba skyong byed nor la'o/ /mA rga lo yi thog ma dang / /sil
<p>173a.4</p>snyan dang ni rjes tshol la/ /mr-i ga ri dgas phyugs glang chags thogs/ po/ /rgyu skar gyi ni dbye ba la/ /mr-i gI tshol dang ri dgas 'gros/ /'dren pa'i khyad par dag la'o/ /yu ga /san mo/ sI rAng+ga/ /yu gaM rdzogs ldan la sogs dus/ /gru bzhi 'phel dang ming dang sman/ /yo ga go cha gyon pa
<p>173a.5</p>dang / /sbyar ba bsam gtan las dang ni/ /khyon la sogs dang srad bu rdzas/ /kun 'joms mchog dang sngar med rnyed/ /sman dang thabs dang rigs rnams la/ /ro ga sman rul ba dang nang / /laM ga mdzes dang bi lga la'o/ /liM gaM mtshan ma rjes su dpag/ /'khrug dang / 'thor dang / grangs dang ni/ /
<p>173a.6</p>ku pra kr-i ti rnams la'o/ /bang+ga yul gyi khyad par dang / /b+haN+Ta ta kI ras bal la/ /bang+gaM mtshon la'ang blta bar bya/ /byang+ga spal ba lus dman la/ /byang+ge gzhan bzhin ma ning ngo / /shAD+gaM mda' yi stan la'o/ /shAD+ga khyab 'jug mda' stan la/ /shr-ing+gaM rwa dang rtse mo dang / /gtso bo mtho dang zhi ba la/ /
<p>173a.7</p>de bzhin ngan pa/ shr-ing+ga rtse mo'i chu 'bab ma/ /mtshan ma sa yi mag pa la/ /shr-ing+gA rwa dang khyu mchog dang / /nya dang gser gyi khyad par la/ /swarga/ rang bzhin nges grol dang / /nges pa sbyo dang blta ba dang / /rmongs dang le'u rnams la'o/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang p+la k+Sha dag /ser po la ni sing+gA 'o/ /a
<p>173b</p>
<p>173b.1</p>ni ga ni/ /yid srubs dang / /lus med nam mkha' yid la 'dod/ /a naM gaM ni lus dman dang / /lus kyi 'byung ba bzlog pa la/ /a sAng+gaM ni lus khral dang / /mig gi mtha' dang thig le la/ /a yo ga ni brtson gral brtsegs/ /phral dang khregs dang skyed
<p>173b.2</p>mos tshal/ /A b+ho ga ni kun 'gro 'bad/ /gdugs dang rab sems gang ba dang / /kun sbyor dri dang phreng ba sbyin/ /rtsol ba sgrib pa rnams la'o/ /A shu ga ni mda' dang rlung / /ut+parga ni 'dor dang gtong / /thun mong ba dang phyir sbyin pa'o/ /urba ga ni skyo ba
<p>173b.3</p>dang / /shin tu mang po can la'o/ /urba gaM ni shin tu 'gro/ /kra mu kI yi 'bras bu la'o/ /ka ling+ga ni sen mo rul/ /du ba 'tshubs dang tshong bye brag/ /yul gyi dbye ba mkhas pa dang / /bsregs dang ko Da ka'i 'bras bu/ /ka li gA ni btsun mo'o/ /kA liM gA ni grul bum
<p>173b.4</p>pa/ /glang po dang ni sprul dag go/ /ka liM kI ni sbal pa'i rgyag /tsa krAM ga ni 'dab chags te/ /tsa kraM gI ni/ ku Du'i nya/ /dzi h+ma ga ni/ /sprul 'grol mang / /tA Da ka ni chu klung dang / /'dab ma'i phung po'o tA Da gu/ /thu lu tA ta/ skyed bu mo/ /tu ra gI ni rta bon po/ /tu ra gA ni/ 
<p>173b.5</p>rta dang sems/ trI brga ni/ chos 'dod don/ /tshogs dang / che ba gsum dang ni/ /snying stobs/ rdul mun gsum 'dus dang / /'phel dang gnas dang zad pa rnams/ /lhan cig brjod la yongs su grags/ /mu stegs/ ral gri d+hA rAng+ga/ /na rang+ga ni pho'i
<p>173b.6</p>rtags dang / ba raN+Da ga phur bu zlum/ /nA rang+ga ni zha nye'i mtshon/ /bshang ba/ skye bo/ zung du skyes/ bisbi li'i khu ba la'o/ /ni ShaM ga ni/ mda' dong grogs/ /ni saM ga ni/ tshul khrims le'u/ /ni lang+ga ni/ 'bu srin dang / /b+haM b+ha ra NI snying po can/ /pa taM ga ni phye ma leg /
<p>173b.7</p>nyi ma bya dang / 'bras bye brag /sa bang+ga ni ro bcud la/ /ba trAng+ga ni tsan da na dmar/ /gro ga dang ni shug pa la/ /ban+na ga/ /sbrul/ pad+ma shing / /pa rA ga ni me tog rdul/ /khrus chal sogs dang rdul la'o/ /nye bar chags dang / tsan+dan dang / /ri bo'i khyad par dag la'ang
<p>174a</p>
<p>174a.1</p>bshad/ /sun+nA ga ni skyes bu gtso/ /shing gi khyad par ut+pal dkar/ /dzA ti pha la dag dang ni/ /skya bo'i sprul la'ang blta bar bya/ /bra ya ga ni 'jug ngogs dbye/ /arga 'bab dang khyab stobs la/ /pa yo ga ni las rab sbyor/ /des bstan la'o praM yaM
<p>174a.2</p>gu/ /kaM guM rA dzi kA dang ni/ /'bras ldan dang ni bispi lI/ /sla ba ga ni/ spre'u dang / /sbal ba/ me lce/ kha lo pa/ /b+hU dzaM ga ni/ sprul/ Shilga/ /khyi 'tshed glang po mA taM ga /mr-i taM/ ga ni rnga dang dbyangs/ /lus dmar 'tsho byed sman la'o/ /ra k+taM ga ni bkra shis dang / /
<p>174a.3</p>brtan pa/ brtse ldan rnam gnon la/ /rA thA ga ni/ gnyis med dang / /'khor lo dang ni 'khor lo'i 'dab/ /shing rta'i yan lag rnams la'o/ /pa rang+ga ni mgo skyes gnas/ /bu ram shun pa glang po la'o/ /bA ti ga ni bcu smin pa/ /sgyur ba po gang gser 'gyur mkhan/ /
<p>174a.4</p>bi DaM ga ni srin 'joms dang / /nA ga ra'o pi ha ga /mkha' 'gro dang ni rtse mor 'gro/ /bi sarga ni dman pa dang / /gtong dang dri ma 'dor ba dang / /rnam par 'dor dang grol ba dang / /'od dang sel ba'i khyad par la/ /saM b+ho ga ni dga' ba dang / /longs spyod dang ni rgyal
<p>174a.5</p>ba'i bstan/ /sarba gaM ni chu la'o/ /khyab bdag bde byed sarba gaH/ /sA raM ga ni ri dgas dang / /glang po bye'u mkha' 'gro'i dbye/ /bung ba dang ni khra bo la/ /bya khyung / tshangs pa/ he mAng+ga/ /a nu Shang+ga brtsams dang / /snying rje la yang 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /a ba
<p>174a.6</p>brga thar pa dang / /'bras bcas bya ba byas pa la/ /a b+hi ShaM ga 'du 'dzi dang / /mna' dang / /sbyor ba mdzod dang ni/ /g.yo ba pa dang spyang ki dang / /skye bo gzugs kyi rab dbye la'o/ /a pa rA ga mtho ris snang / /gza' dang me tog ldan pa dang / /du lU la yang / gza'
<p>174a.7</p>rna can/ /yongs su smra ba rnams la'o/ /u pa sarga nad kyi dbye/ /nye bar 'gro ba dag la'o/ /ka Da b+haM ga lo thog rnams/ /sen gcod/ br-i ya t+ya ya'o/ /in+d+ra b+haM ga zla ba skyes/ /rang dbang can dang mi bdag sna/ /dIr+g+ha d+h+wa ka glang chen dang / /phrin yig khyer ba dag la brjod/ /mal+lanA ga glang
<p>174b</p>
<p>174b.1</p>chen dkar/ /bat+sa'i bu dang thub pa la'o/ /rA dza shrIM ga gser gyi ni/ /dbyug pa dang ni mang+gu ra/ /sa mA yo gaM/ /kun sbyor dang / /'du ba dang ni dgos pa la/ /saM pra/ yo ga rab dga' dang / /las dang rjes su 'gro ba la/ /ka thA pra sang+ga zhes pa/ /rlung gi tshogs
<p>174b.2</p>dang dug gi nad/ /'chos pa'i sman pa dag la brjod/ /nA DI ta raM gA zhes pa/ /kA ko chu bya rog /la dang / hiN+Da ka/ /ra ta hiN+Da ka la'o/ /ga mtha'i sde'o// //g+ha ni dril bu'i dbang po la/ /g+hA ni dril chung 'joms byed la/ /g+hu ni bud med sgra la'o/ /a
<p>174b.3</p>g+haM sdig pa sdug bsngal phongs/ /aM g+h+r-i rkang pa shing gi rtsa/ /ar+g+ha mchod byed rin thang la/ /ud+g+ha lag pa kha sbyar dang / /lus kyi rlung dang smin pa la/ /o g+ha phan tshun rgyug pa dang / /myur dang gar gyi man ngag dang / /tshogs dang lam dang rab 'bab la/ /ma
<p>174b.4</p>g+hI sman gyi bye brag la/ /ma g+hA rgyu skar bcu pa la/ /me g+ha sprin dang musta la/ /mo g+ha 'bras med dman pa la/ /mo g+hA rkang 'thung skya nar la/ /la g+hu yid 'ong snying po med/ /a gu ru dang sr-ik+kA dang / /a gu ru nag cig car la/ /sh+lA g+hA rab bsngags bsnyen bkur la/ /mngon
<p>174b.5</p>par 'dod pa dag la'o/ /a na g+hA ni sdig pas stong / /dri ma med dang yid dga' la/ /a mo g+ha ni 'bras bur bcas/ /a mo g+hA ni kun bshad dang / /phan pa dang ni byi dang ga/ /ul+lA g+hA ni nad med dang / /mkhas dang gtsang dang dga' ba ldan/ /kA rtsi g+ha ni gser dang ni/ /byi
<p>174b.6</p>ga dkyil 'khor shin tu dngas/ /ni drA g+ha ni tsha ba'i dus/ /gdung tshad dang ni rdul gyi chu/ /sa ri g+ha ni tho ba dang / /rnal 'byor dbye ba yan lag 'dzin/ /'joms dang 'ching bu'i bum pa dang / /bum pa rab ba lang grong / /pra ti g+ha ni khong khro khro/ /ma hA r+g+ha ni rin thang che/ /
<p>174b.7</p>rin thang med dang lA ba ka /sarbo g+ha ni bla ma dang / /shugs don/ go cha kun don bdag /g+ha mtha'i sde'o// //nga ni 'jigs par byed dang yul/ /nga mtha'i sde'o// //tsa ni chom rkun zla ba dag /a tsa mchod dang / gzugs brnyan dag /uts+tsha che dang mtho ba la/ /ka tsa skra dang bla ma dang / /
<p>175a</p>
<p>175a.1</p>khu ba dang rma chings skam/ /ka tsa glang po mo la'o/ /kA tsa nor bu dra ba dang / /mig nad dang ni sa'i khyad par/ /kAsbyi ske rags chun po dang / /guny+dza dang ni tshangs bye brag /kUrtsa smin ma'i dbus dang ni/ /bsgrub bya smar mi bsngags pa'o/ /kruny+tsa bya yi bye brag
<p>175a.2</p>dang / /ri dang gling gi rab dbye la/ /tsany+tsa sprul pa 'dam bu sogs/ /tsany+tsA rtswa yi mi la'o/ /tsany+tsu sor lA tro TI dang / /ba lang rtsa dang ki lIny+tsa/ /tsartsA gnas dang / los ma si/ rtog pa dang / /spyod dang sems pa dag dang ni/ /pags pa dang ni shing shun dang / /khrung khrung / pags pa
<p>175a.3</p>tsam dang bu ram shun/ /nI tsa sA ma ra dang gzhol/ /mi'u thung 'bab phyogs dma' ba dang / /mtha' dag 'jam po shing bal dang / /ru rta lha min bye brag dang / /zhing las 'jigs dang gzhan bye brag/ /prA tse dus dang phyogs dang yul/ /mo tsa mig sman bzang po la/ /mo tsa
<p>175a.4</p>shAl+la li chu shing / /ru tsi mdzes dang 'od dang 'dong / /mngon par chags dang bzang ba la/ /ba tsa ne tso bA tsa ni/ /dri dang sA ri ka la brjod/ /bA tsa dbyangs can tshig dang ni/ /shin tu chung ba'i dba' rlabs dang / /go skabs dang ni bde ba la/ /sa tsI dbang mo brgya byin ma/ /shu
<p>175a.5</p>rtsi'i nyer 'dzin dag pa dang / /sngags pa chu dang rma bya dang / /sgeg pa dang ni so ga'i dus/ /dkar ba dang ni ma nyams pa'o/ /sU tsi lag sogs tshul dang ni/ /snum pa dang ni rtse mo la'o/ /sU tsI mtshams ldan rnams dang ni/ /brjod dang byed pa'i khyad par la/ /a bI tsa ni
<p>175a.6</p>dmyal ba dang / /chu yi rba klong ba ha ra/ /u dU tsi ni chu dang phyogs/ /yul dang dus la brjod bya ldan/ /ka ni tsi ni rgyas pa dang / /'khri shing guny+dza shing rta la'o/ /ka ba tsa ni phub ma 'da'o/ /rda dang khong bu sgong la'o/ /kra ka tsa ni sog le dang / /mdud pa can dang sa skyes
<p>175a.7</p>so/ /na mu ci ni mos byed dang / /bral ba dang / lha ma ni klu chu glang po la'o/ /nA rA tsa ni lcags mda' ma/ /nA rA tsI ni 'dogs bye brag/ /pra tI tsi ni phyogs dus yul/ /pra pany+tsa ni rgya che dang / /kun bsags dang ni spros pa'o/ /ma ri tsi ni 'bar ba dang / /thub pa dang ni kr-i pa Na/ /rta dang
<p>175b</p>
<p>175b.1</p>ral gri dang bkren pa dang gsum la 'jug go/ /mA rA tsi ni mchod sbyin can/ /glang po che dang kak+ko la/ /srin po'i khyad par rnams la'o/ /mA ri tsI ni lha mo'i dbye/ /bi ka tsa ni rab rgyas la/ /bi pany+tsi ni ngo tsha can/ /rol rtsed pi wang phong can gza'/ /saM ko tsa ni 'ching ba dang / /nya yi bye brag
<p>175b.2</p>dag la'o/ /saM ko tsam ni gur kum dang / /yang dag grogs po bzang bo la'o/ /kA kA tsiny+tsi/ srad/ sa bon/ /chu yi 'bu dang / di li ra/ /dza la sU tsi chu'i srin bu/ /rwa can dang ni byis pa gsod/ /kaM ka tro Di dz+haka'o/ /ma limU tsa/ /chom rkun mi/ /ta ra nA rU tsa yi sgra/ /khyi dang dga'
<p>175b.3</p>ba'i yal 'dab dang / /bud med mchog dang yongs brtsams las/ /kun tu byung ba'i bya ba la'o/ /tsa mtha'i sde'o// //tsha ni gcod dang bya rog la/ /tshA ni gcod dang 'dod pa dang / /mtshan ma dang ni dang ba la/ /ats+tshe mi zad pa dang ni/ /dom dang shel dang mngon du phyogs/ /
<p>175b.4</p>ats+tsha shin tu dang ba la/ /kats+tsha brag la sogs mtshams la/ /gru yi yan lag na ka la/ /ma min bdag dang yongs gnas dang / /g.yo ba'i khyad par rnams la'o/ /kats+tsha tsa'i ri kA dang ni/ /phag mo la yang blta bar bya/ /guts+tsha phon po do shal dbye/ /sdong po dang ni
<p>175b.5</p>bsags pa la/ /bits+tsha mjug ma bits+tsha ni/ /shal+ma li yis bkris pa dang / /rdul dang pU gats+tsha Ta'i sbubs/ /mA bA'i mdun khang phreng ba dang / /skye bo bral ba la puts+tsha/ /bits+tsha phyi ma phyogs dag go/ /m+lets+tsha skad mi gsal ba dang / /rigs kyi bye brag sdig la dga'/ /
<p>175b.6</p>ma hA kats+tsha chu klung mgon/ /chu yi bdag po la yang ngo / /tsha mtha'i sde'o// //dza ni myur 'gro dzA zhes pa/ /'byung po skye ba rgyal byed rgyal/ /dzU ni rA ga dbyangs dang bstod/ /sha za dang ni mgyogs pa la'o/ /a dza nag po dran pa dang / /rdo rje sgra gcan ra g+hu'i bu/ /ap+dza
<p>175b.7</p>gzhu yi khyad par dang / /zla ba chu skyes ni tsu la/ /shing / dung la'o a dzi sa mnyam/ g.yul/ /urdza spro dang / byed pa po/ /U rdzA brtson 'grus dang ni stobs/ /kany+dza skra dang tshangs pa la/ /kany+dzi bdud rtsi pad+ma la/ /ku dzi/ dmyal ba/ sol ba la/ /kuny+dza spre'u sdong
<p>176a</p>
<p>176a.1</p>po dang / /glang po dang ni so la yang / /kuny+dza/ sgur 'khyog /shing bye brag /brdzu 'bra go'i shing dang ni/ /g.ya' ba dang ni srin bu'o/ /gany+dza lha khang / gur kha ri/ /mdzod la'o/ /gardzA/ bsrub pa la/ /gardza pra hasta la'o/ /guny+dza/ kA ka ma tsi ri
<p>176a.2</p>dang / pa Ta ha dang sgra yi cha/ /dwi dza/ bram ze/ sgong skyes so/ /dwi dzA ngan spong / bu rdul bzang / /d+h+wa dza/ rtags mtshan khri rkang dang / /ba dan mtshan rtags/ shoN+Di ka /ni dza bdag po/ rtags pa dang / /n+yub+dza na byis pa thos par brjod/ /n+Yub+baM mtshon gyi las mon sman nu/ 
<p>176a.3</p>la 'gyur/ /kub+dza/ 'og tu phyogs pa la/ /piny+dza gnod pa/ piny+dzi g.yo/ /be+er+sA shing bal/ yur ba la/ /pany+dza 'khrugs la brjod bya ldan/ /pra dzA rgyud dang 'jig rten la/ /pra dzA 'gro ba tshogs pa dang / /tshA ba ka dang lam la'o/ /b+hu dza dang ni b+hu dza dag /dpung pa
<p>176a.4</p>dang ni lag pa dang / /ma dang pha dang gnyis ka la'o/ /mardzu btso blag pa dang ni/ /khrus dang dag pa rnams la'o/ /rar+dz+dzu lhas ma yon tan dang / /gral dang phreng ba rtsig pa la'o/ /ru tsa nad dang ung+ga la/ /lany+dza/ da ra dang mtha' ngos la/ /lA dzA 'dzin dang
<p>176a.5</p>'bras so ba/ /lA dza gsher ba'i 'bras la'o/ /lA dzi/ pu shel rtse la brjod/ /bA dza phyogs la yang 'gyur te/ /sgra dang thub pa'i bye/ thags pa/ brag la'ang / /b+'aM dzaM mchod sbyin don dang la/ /mar la'o bI dzi rgyud dang ni/ /nye bar len dang khu ba la/ /byA dza kun
<p>176a.6</p>tu 'dzin don dang / /de nyid g.yo dang mi ston pa'o/ /brdzu tshong pa dang ni klog /sadz+dza go bgos kun tu 'byung / /sany+dza bde 'byung tshong pa dang / /swa dza rdul dang rang skyes dang / /khrag dang de bzhin bu la'o/ /ang+ga dzaM ni sgra dang dga'/ /bu dang bde bas dregs pa dang / /
<p>176a.7</p>yan lag 'dzin dang glang po che/ /ang+ga dza ni khrag la'o/ /aN+Da dza ni bya dang nya/ /rtsangs pa sprul dang gla rtsi dang / /sgong skyes rnams la'o/ /am+bu dze/ /mtsho skyes dang ni ni tsu la/ /chu'i lcang ma/ kom+bi dza ni yul glang po/ /shaM ga'i dbye ba rnams la bstan/ /ka ra dza ni lag skyes
<p>176b</p>
<p>176b.1</p>dang / /stag sen dang ni sen mo la'o/ /kAM po dza ni/ zla ba'i shun/ dung dang klu shing rta rnams la'o/ /kaM bo dzI ni sran ma'i 'dab/ /shing kun lo ma la yang 'dod/ /kA ru dza ni bzo bo dang / /ri mo dang ni rang skyes snum/ /grog mkhar btsag dang dbu ba dang / /glang phrug nA ga ge sar
<p>176b.2</p>la'o/ /ku Ta dza ni shing bye brag /bra bo che dang bum pa skyes/ /gi ri dza ni ri yi bu/ /zhang po/ kho ru dA hr-i dA/ /gi ri dzaM ni lhang tsher dang / /lcags dang brag zhun dri bzang la/ /dza la dzaM ni 'dam skyes dang / /chu skyes pad+ma ru rta dung / /pa rany+dza ni til 'khrul 'khor/ /ral gri dbu ba bor
<p>176b.3</p>ba'i 'dab/ /pA Ni dz+ya ni tshong pa dang / /'tsho byed byed pa'i khyad par la/ /ba la dzA ni tshong tshong zong / /kha dog ldan pa'i bud med la/ /ba la dzaM ni sa dang zhing / /lo tog yul dang ba lang lhas/ /b+hU mi dzA sprul la a na kI/ /dmyal ba ngan skyes b+hU mi dza/ /murga'i lo ma ba na dzA/ /
<p>176b.4</p>kha na dza ni glang po stag /'dam skyes nags byung ba na dzaM/ /ba hu dza ni rgyal rigs bshad/ /thig le khu ba spa yaM dzA/ /sa ha dza ni grogs med la/ /gzhan gyi rtags can sa ha dzA/ /sA ma dza na snyan tshig byung / /brjod bya'i rtags can glang po la'o/ /hi ma dzA dang hi ma dza/ /ri yi
<p>176b.5</p>sras ma legs brjod ma/ /de bzhin mai nA ka la'o/ /a hi b+hU dza rnam 'dul bu/ /'brug sgra'i rjes su sgeg pa la'o/ /kA smi ra da bong nga dkar/ /ru rta gur kum pad+ma la/ /gra ha rA dza zla nyi ma/ /dza g+ha n+ya dza zhes pa ni/ /nu bo dang ni dmangs rigs la/ /dwi dza ra dzA ma chen mo'i mgon/ /
<p>176b.6</p>'dul byed bdag skyes khyad par la/ /d+harma rA dza gshin rje dang / /bde bar khyung / rma bya/ gshegs dang g.yul ngor brtan/ /b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bla ma'i bu/ /stag gi tshogs dang thub pa la/ /b+hA ra dwA dza bre bo dang / /shing bal gyi ni khyad par la'o/ /b+h+r-i ga rA dza sbrang rtsi'i btung / /sbre'u dang ni bya'i bye
<p>176b.7</p>brag /yak+Sha rA dza mig gsum grogs/ /rA dza rA dza nor sbyin dang / /sa kun dbang dang ri dgas mtshan/ /k+Shi rA b+d+hi dzaM ri bong can/ /k+ShI rA b+d+hi dzA dpal mo la/ /k+ShA rA b+d+hi dzaM nya phyis dang / /rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa dag la'o/ /r-iSha b+ha ra d+hA dz+wa'i sgra/ /bde byed mchod pa'i khyad par skye ga 
<p>177a</p>
<p>177a.1</p>la/ /de nas mu ni b+hai Sha dzi/ /drang srong ri byi/ a ru ra/ /'gom pa la ste dza mtha'i sde'o// //dz+ha ni spyod pa rlung dag la/ /zhig pa la yang 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /dz+haM dz+ha sgra yi bye brag la/ /dz+hai ni chu 'khyags char pa la'o/ /dz+ha mtha'i sde'o// //
<p>177a.2</p>nya ni dbye kha'i sgra dang ni/ /glu len pa la 'ga' yis bshad/ /dz+nyA ni mkhas dang blo la'o/ /bi d+ha'i sgra ni rmongs sems po/ /prA dz+nyA blo la pra dzanyA mkhas/ /saM dz+nyA ming dang glu len dang / /sems pa drang srong bud med dang / /long ba'i lag pa mgo dang ni/ /mig rnams kyi ni mtshon
<p>177a.3</p>byed la'o/ /kr-i ta dz+nyA ni byas pa shes/ /snying po gzhal bya brjod bya ldan/ /bud med rnams kyi lta ba la/ /dai ba dz+nyA ni tshogs can la/ /bde gshegs bde 'byung sarba dz+nya/ /bdag dang grong khyer k+She tra dz+nyA/ /nya mtha'i sde'o// //TA ni sa la'o/ Ta ni sgra/ /TaM ni spyi blugs
<p>177a.4</p>la 'gyur ro/ /aT+TaM khyim gyi khyad par dang / /zar ma/ skam po/ zas dag la'o/ /iSh+Ta rmi dang / mchod sbyin dang / /'du byed rnal 'byor mchod sbyin las/ /mchod dang mchog tu dga' dang bsngags/ /iSh+Ti mchod sbyin mchod dang 'dod/ /bsdus dang tshig bcas srad bu
<p>177a.5</p>dag /ka Ta sked pa sha ka dang / /shin tu'i don dang lte ba dang / /glang po'i 'gram pa dam tshig dang / /bya yi rnam pa rmad du byung / /ka TI/ ka TiM/ A ka d+hi/ /kaD+Tha kA ni sun 'byin dang / /pr-i yaM gu dang / ske tshe dang / mya ngan med dang dmar po dang / /tsha ba rnams la lta bar bya/ /ka
<p>177a.6</p>Tu bcud dang ser sna dga'/ /dri bzangs rnon po dag la'o/ /kaSh+TaM thibs po dka' 'tshegs la/ /kuT/ bum pa/ rdo gzhong dang / ko Ta dang ni/ khyi la'o/ /ko TI/ 'o ma 'bangs mo chang / /ri mo dang ni guts+tsha ka/ /kUT/ phung po dang ni shar/ /rtsibs dang tshul 'chos sgyu ma gar/ /
<p>177a.7</p>sbun pa/ rtse gsum/ sI rAM ga /'khrul 'khor lcags gong g.yo med la/ /kr-iSh+Ti/ rtogs dang mi dang 'gugs/ /ko Ti grangs kyi bye brag dang / /mchog dang shin tu phul byung rab/ /rtse mo gzhu yi mchog ma la/ /kruSh+TaM du dang sgra sgrog la/ /kha TaM bad kan thal lcag la/ /mun
<p>177b</p>
<p>177b.1</p>pa dang ni khron pa la/ /khA Ti/ sa ba ra tha dang / /kr-i Na e ka /gra ha la'o/ /ke Ta smod dang nor la dga'/ /ka pha grong gi dbye ba la/ /kr-iSh+Ta sman gyi khyad par dang / /a ka pra sa ban+d+ha la'o/ /g+ha Ta bum pa glang po'i 'gram/ /ting 'dzin gyi ni bye brag dang / /ba lang gnas dang byed
<p>177b.2</p>pa la/ /g+ha TA'ang bum pa glang po'i 'gram/ /g+h+r-iSh+Ti phag dang kun tu sgrogs/ /khyab 'jug gnon dang sgrogs bad kan/ byed la'o/ /gyoN+DA rgya shug /pU ga'o/ /tsa Tu/ tsA Tu/ pi tsiN+Da/ /gdan gyi bye brag /brtul zhugs la/ /dza TA/ gcer bur skra rtsa ba/ /spang
<p>177b.3</p>spos la'o dza TI ni/ /lus dang dgon pa ni rkuny+dza/ /rma yi byi dor/ nags tshal la/ /tru Ti/ 'god dang cha shas dang / /sug smel dang ni kun tu gdung / /dus kyi tshad la'o tro Ti ni/ /kaT+pa la dang / chu dang nya/ /twaSh+Ta 'phel dang / /tshig mda' dang / /bzo bo dang ni rnon po dang / /
<p>177b.4</p>diSh+Ti khu tshur yongs su 'jal/ /diSh+Ta/ dus dang nyer bstan dag /driSh+TaM skal pa/ triSh+Ti ni/ /mig dang lta ba blo rnams la/ /d+ha Ta dag tha 'jal ba la/ /d+ha TI dum bu dang ni gos/ /na tang sel/ TI/ lag pa'i rnam rol la/ /na Ta/ shol/ shai lU Sha/ /pha Ta/ gos
<p>177b.5</p>bzang yo byad skyong / /pa Tu smra mkhas nad med dang / /rno dang mkhas dang gsal ba dang / /pa To la dang / gdug dang sgrogs/ /pa TU/ phye ma rdo ba dang / /spang leb/ bzhi mdo/ rma sogs 'ching / /rgyal po'i lugs dang stan gyi dbye/ /pa tA rna rgyan rgyan
<p>177b.6</p>cha dang / /rgya skyegs dang par byed pa la/ /baT+Ti gos kyi bye brag dang / /ngag gi 'dren dang lug khur ma/ bum can shing / /puSh+Ti 'phil dang gso bar byed/ /paT gdengs ka tshul 'chos dang / /'gram la'o ngal gso byas pa la/ /pAN+TaM de nas pa Ta ni/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang ba rI
<p>177b.7</p>Ta/ /brti co ga kA dang / ma TIr 'dod/ /b+ha Ta/ pA ma ra yi dbye/ /dpa' bo la'o b+ha Ti ni/ /rab tu 'gro ba nyid la'o/ /b+h+r-iSh+Ta zhes pa spyo ba dang / /stong ba'i ba Ti kA la'o/ /muSh+Ti 'bras bu khu tshur bcings/ /m+liSh+Ta mi gsal smra ba la/ /nad brjod pa la m+liSh+TaM'o/ /yaSh+Ti mda' dang mtshon cha'i dbye/ /
<p>178a</p>
<p>178a.1</p>do shal mchog dang do shal che/ /'khri shing rgyal mtshan dbyug pa dang / /b+hA rgI'o riSh+Ti ni/ /'byor pa dang ni ral gri la/ /riSh+TaM bde dang mi dge med/ /la Ta ral gri rab myos skyon/ /lA Ta yul dang gos phyogs la/ /bA Ta lam dang tshul la'o/ /bA DI khyim dang niSh+ku
<p>178a.2</p>Ta/ /bi Ta Shilga lan tshwa dang / /grangs dang byi ba mda' dang sprul/ /biSh+Ti las byed bzang po dang / /pe ta na dang mngag pa la/ /khruSh+Ti nyin mo tho rangs dang / /'bras bu yongs su smyung ba la/ /bluSh+Ti 'byor pa rigs pa dang / /nges pa la sogs 'bras bu la/ /sha TA ral pa seng ge la/ /
<p>178a.3</p>bring+TaM sprul dang sbyar ba dang / /rnam par nges byas bskyed pa la/ /br-iSh+Ti sprul pa le'u la/ /s+phu Ta gsal dang rgyas dang khyab/ /s+phu Ti gsal dang sbal pa mo/ /rkang sgrogs la'o hriSh+Ta ni/ /s+phu long dga' skyes rab bsnun la'o/ /a ba Ta ni bu ga can/ /khron pa lhag ma dong la'o/ /ba Tu
<p>178a.4</p>dong dang khron pa la/ /bum pa ya ma ku Ta dang / /lcags sgrog dang ni 'ching ba la/ /a riSh+Ta ni spu ba can/ /gzhol 'phyang bya rog kaM ka'o/ /a riSh+TaM ni bcas pa'i khyim/ /ta kra dge dang mi dge'i mtshan/ /ut+ga Ta ni shas che dang / /dar ba bdo ba dregs pa'o/ /ka ra Ta ni 'tsho ba
<p>178a.5</p>smad/ /shing zan nyi ma bcu gcig pa/ /bya rog sil snyan khyad par dang / /bram ze ngan dang le brgan rtsi/ /gdul dka' glang po'i 'gram pa dag /karka Ta ni bud med kyi/ /byed pa khyim gyi bye brag dang / /sbal pa dang ni bya la'o/ /karka TI ni skra can ma/ /shAl+ma li yi
<p>178a.6</p>'bras bu la'o/ /karta Ta ni 'dam dang ni/ /'dam rtsibs ka ra hA Tar grags/ /kA rba Ta ni ras bal dang / /rgya skyegs la'o kI ka Ta/ /'jal 'tshed nor med rta la'o/ /kur+k+ku Ta ni ma ga d+ha/ /zangs kyi gtsug phud can dang ni/ /gding ba srad bu 'khru dang ni/ /ku ku
<p>178a.7</p>b+ha dang rdo can la'o/ /kuk+ku TI ni rna rgyan dbus/ /se gol dga' ba dman pa'i dbye/ /zangs kyi gtsug phud can ma dang / /bud med log par spyod pa la/ /shA la b+hany+dzi ku ruN+DI/ /dz+nyi ny+dzi kA yi dbye kuN+Da/ /kr-i sI Ta ni dga' ba dang / /chu dang sgra tshogs 'byung gnas
<p>178b</p>
<p>178b.1</p>dang / /'phrog byed rnams so tsakrA Ta/ /dman dang khram pa dug sel ma/ /tsarba Ta ni khyab pa dang / /rgya che ba dang thal lcag dang / /sarba Ta la'o tsarba TI/ /phye ma'i bye brag la 'gyur ro/ /ci bi Ta ni sna leb dang / /sna nyeg dang ni ri sri ta/ /tsi riN+TI legs gnas ma/ /lang tso gnyis
<p>178b.2</p>pa'i bud med dang / /spyod pa me tog ngan pa la'o/ /dza ku TI ni dza ku TI/ /ri dang khyim la'o dza kU TaM/ /rgya mtsho yi ni lan tsha la/ /tri kU Ta ni dus bzangs la/ /tri pu Ta ni zhen pa dang / /sa tI na ga la yang 'gyur/ /tri pu TA ni me tog gi/ /dbye ba sug smel dur byid la/ /traM go ni dra ba'i dbye/ /
<p>178b.3</p>b+hau tAny+tsa lI ma yang 'dod/ /tro hA Ta ni rngon pa dang / /tshigs bcad rab dbye la 'dod do/ /bA ra Ti/ rta/ tsa ta ka/ /ro langs brtul zhugs can la'o/ /nirta Ta ni brtse med dang / /gzhan snod khrag dang 'bras bu med/ /ni rkuT ni skyed tshal khyim/ /nya pa dang ni sgo glegs la/ /parba Ta ni phye
<p>178b.4</p>ma yi/ /rnam 'gyur dang ni sman bye brag /pa riSh+Ta ni bsnyen bkur dang / /rab tu gsal dang 'tshol ba la/ /brka TI ni sla k+Sha dang / /sA ka li yi shing dag la/ /ras bal zhing las pA tra Ta/ /pits+tsha Ta/ mig /ki TI rdul/ /pits+tsha TaM ni zha nye sogs/ /ba ra TA ni
<p>178b.5</p>dad pa gso/ /pa ra TA ni gan+d+ho lI/ /parba Ti ni rje rigs 'bru/ /bArba Ta ni chu srin la/ /bA ruN+Da ni byis pa la/ /b+hA kU Ta ni nya dang brag /b+hArlu Ta ni rngas 'tsho ba/ /chags dang rang gi bud med phrad/ /b+hA bA Ta ni 'dod ldan dang / /legs dang cha lugs lus dang gar/ /marka
<p>178b.6</p>Ta ni spre'u sdom/ /bud med kyi ni byed pa la/ /marka Ti ni spre'u mo/ /sdom mo ne tso dra ba dang / /lag pa lag skyes khyad par la/ /mArka Ta ni sa bon dang / /ka rka Ta yi rgyal ba tsi na/ /skyu ru ra dang ba lang dang / /d+hu ka'i 'bras la'ang blta bar bya/ /mo tsa Ta ni tsan dan dang / /nag
<p>178b.7</p>pos 'tsho dang chu shing gi/ /rus dang nye bar byed pa la/ /mo ra ti ni rtsa ba dang / /aM ko Ti ni me tog la/ /mo ra Ta ni zhag bdun dang / /'o ma mchog dang mUrbi kA/ /bal+lA Ta ni glu mkhan dang / /'dod can ri mo tog tses 'tsho/ /bi ka Ta ni rnam gtsigs dang / /yangs dang
<p>179a</p>
<p>179a.1</p>mdzes dang mchog la'o/ /be ka Ta ni rnam mdzes dang / /nya dang lang tshog sar pa la/ /be ra Ta ni 'dres dang dman/ /rgya shug gi ni 'bras bu la/ /shai mA Ta ni lha yi gzhi/ /seng ge skra skar mon yul lo/ /saM sr-iSh+Ta ni bAn+ti sogs/ /legs par dag dang
<p>179a.2</p>'grogs pa'o/ /harma Ta ni/ sA+o ma dang / /khang bzang / baM gaM/ rus sbal la'o/ /uts+tshing+ga nya'i dbye dang / /skyes bu khro bar byed la'o/ /ga ra hA Ta chu skyes rtsa/ /sha l+ya/ dru dang me tog dbye/ /kA ma kU Ta tshogs can ma/ /rnam par 'khyams dang tshogs can dga'/ /
<p>179a.3</p>kar+p+pa pu Na ngo tsha med/ /smyo dang long bar byed pa la/ /ka TaM/ na TaM/ nya pa dang / /gla sgang dang ni dmar po la'o/ /kuN+Da kI Ta long ba dang / /ngag dang mngon shes g.yo ba dang / /dzA ra dza yi bram ze ma/ /bu dang 'bangs mo 'dod can la/ /baT+ka rI Ta spang leb dang / /
<p>179a.4</p>ral gri'i so dang brtul zhugs spyod/ /gA D+ha muSh+Ti ser sna dang / /ral gri dang ni chu gri sogs/ /tsakra bA Ta/ kra ya dang / /chu zheng mtha' dang / gtsug phud shing / /tsa tuH ShaSh+Ti grangs mang cha/ /nA ra ki Ta rdo ba'i bu/ /legs byin sha bi/ han+t+r-i la'o/ /
<p>179a.5</p>ba ra buSh+Ta gzhan 'dzin dang / /gzhan gyis gsos dang tshong zong la/ /pra ti/ kr-iSh+TaM gsang ba dang / /zhing rmed las ni gnyis pa la'o/ /pra ti shiSh+TaM zhes pa ni/ /so sor bshad dang bsngags pa la/ /parkA rA Ta zur mig dang / /nyi ma gzhon nu
<p>179a.6</p>'od 'bar dang / /mi'u thung chu 'dzin phang pa dang / /kAn+ta dat+ta sen mo nyams/ /shi ba'i biSh+Ta ngan pa dang / /pags pa ngan dang dbang phyug che/ /prAny+tsa lo ha rnams la'o/ /shru ti ka Ta/ sems mang sprul/ /siM ha ts+tsha Ta zhes pa ni/ /klu shing dang ni ge
<p>179a.7</p>sar la'o/ /da sha no ts+tshiSh+Ta zhes pa/ kha sbyor dang ni dbugs 'byin rten/ /pA tA tsam+pa Ta zhes pa/ /lcags dang 'khar ba rda zlum dang / /'thab dang rked pa rin chen zegs/ /rlung dang / rnga chen/ rgya shug la'o/ /Ta mtha'i sde'o// //
<p>179b</p>
<p>179b.1</p>Tha ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / /stong pa bde byed mtho ba'i sgra/ /ka Tha thub pa nges brjod dbye/ /lhag par de klog de rig lha/ /kaN+Tha mgrin pa rtsib logs dang / /zug rngu 'joms dang sgra dag la/ /kAN+thA phyogs dang rab 'gyur gnas/ /dus kyi 'jal byed mtshams
<p>179b.2</p>dang ni/ /thang shing la'o kASh+ThaM ni/ /bud shing kuN+Tha rmongs las med/ /kuSh+ThaM nad dang nad mtshon byed/ /goSh+Tha nang dang lto ba khyim/ /kU shUl khyem/ /ku shul dang rang gi ba'o/ /goSh+Thi 'dun sa gtam gyi sa/ /goSh+ThaM ba lang lha sa la 'dod/ /dz+yaSh+Tha zla ba'i bye brag dang / /gtso bo dang ni rgan pa
<p>179b.3</p>la/ /dz+yeSh+Tha zhes pa skar ma dang / /gtun shing sor mo'i khyad par la/ /duSh+Thu nyam chung tha ma la'o/ /niSh+ThA nges thob rdzogs pa dang / /nyams dang mtha' dang phul byung dang / /slong ba dang ni nyon mongs la'o/ /yA ShA ma'i gnas/ pA Tha klog /pr-iSh+ThaM lus kyi rgyab phyi ma/ /
<p>179b.4</p>phraSh+Tha sngon 'gro gtso bo la/ /prASh+Tha gtum mo dang ni sman/ /baN+Tham+sa byas kun thob dang / /gdung gi so dang mi'u thung / /sha Tha ngan pa khram pa dang / /bar du gnas pa dag la'o/ /shA Tha le lo rmongs pa la/ /shreSh+Tha mchog dang ku be ra/ /ShaSh+Thi drug rnams rdzogs
<p>179b.5</p>pa dang / /'phrog byed kyi ni btsun mo la/ /ha Tha stobs kyi byed pa dang / /pA ri pa li dag la'o/ /a praSh+Tha ni dus byis pa/ /a baSh+Tha ni rje rigs kyi/ /bu dang gnyis skyes yul phyogs la/ /a m+baSh+ThA ni gaM gA skyes/ /ma'i gnas dang ni tshogs la'o/ /ka niSh+Tha ni chung
<p>179b.6</p>ngu dang / /no go na chung nyam chung dang / /mthe'u chung dang ni sor mo la'o/ /ka ma Tha ni rus sbal la/ /ka ma ThaM ni snod bye brang / /dza ra Tha ni sra pa dang / /skya bo dang ni gseg mar brjod/ /narma Tha ni tsU tsu ka /grong khyer la'o bra koSh+Tha/ /rgyas par byed dang ras bal gzhi/ /mi yi bdag po'i
<p>179b.7</p>khra ma'o/ /pra tiSh+Tha ni zhe sar 'dod/ /mchod sbyin sgrub dang gnas gzhi dang / yi ge tshigs bcad dag la'o/ /ba riSh+Tha ni rab mchog mdzes/ /tin+ti ri la'o ba ri Sh+ThaM/ /na le shaM dang zangs la'o/ /ma kuSh+Tha ni bsrub pa dang / /'bru dang phar 'gro dag la'o/ /la g+hiSh+Tha gos shin tu chung / /
<p>180a</p>
<p>180a.1</p>be kuSh+Tha ni/ /skra can dang / /brgya byin la'o/ shrI kaN+Tha/ /ri sras bdag dang / sgra ngan dang / /dug sel la yang 'gyur ba'o/ /sA d+hiSh+Tha 'phags shin tu brtan/ /ka la kaN+Tha pi ka dang / /phug ron dang pa/ sgra snyan dang / /kaM
<p>180a.2</p>ka ri dgas khyad par la/ /kA la/ pr-iSh+Tha/ rna ba gzhu/ /dan+ta sha tha skyur rtsi dang / /ka pit+Tha dang / mtshon gyi las/ /nA rAng+ga dang ts+tsa kri ka'o/ /nI la kaN+Tha dA t+yu h+'+ao/ /gyol po dang ni rab g.yo dang / /ki ni ka la piM ka dang / /ser po'i snying po'i can dag la'o/ /
<p>180a.3</p>kA la kaN+Tha bzhin du 'jug /pU ti kASh+ThaM thang shing dang / /lha shing dang ni/ sa skyes la'o/ /sU tra kaN+Tha phug ron dang / /gnyis skyes khany+dza ri Ta la/ /hA ri kaN+Tha/ khu byug dang / /mgrin pa do shal bcas la'o/ /Tha mtha'i sde'o// //Da ni ri yi
<p>180a.4</p>mgon po dang / /skrag pa'i sgra la'ang blta bar bya/ /aN+Da bya dang / nya sogs mdzod/ /'dom gyi sgo nga / brtson 'grus la/ /I DA rtogs pa bu mo dag /i lA bzhin du sa ba lang / /kAN+Da sde chen/ mda' dang don/ /sdong bu/ skabs dang chu/ dbyug pa/ /
<p>180a.5</p>mtshams dang / kut+bA/ sdong po dang / /'phrog dang / smad dang bdag ldan ma/ /bu dang dzA rA ta rnams so/ /kuN+Di spyi blugs lo/ /kuN+DaM/ lha yi dra ba'i gzhi/ /pha ma yang ni 'dod pa'o/ /kr-I DA/ rtsed mo smod brnyas dang / /ku rel 'o kro Da ni/ /dal ba
<p>180a.6</p>dang ni phag pa'o/ /kro DaM phag dang bak+Shas la/ /khaN+Da phyed ma bur shing gi/ /rnam 'gyur nor bu sun 'byin la/ /ga Da/ nya dang par la 'gro/ /gu Du/ sgur rgyab/ /bu raM la/ /gaN+Da/ bre dang sbyor ba'i dbye/ /bse ru dang ni khur tshos dang / /mchog dang rab dpa'
<p>180a.7</p>mtshan ma dang / /rta dang rgyan dang chu bor la'o/ /gu Da glang po'i go cha dang / /phru ba bur shing rnam 'gyur la'o/ /gu Da/ sgu tI/ ri lu dang / /ma d+h+wA na la yang 'dod pa'o/ /goN+Da pA ma ra'i dbye ba/ /rgan po'i lte ba la brjod do/ /tsaN+Da drag po lha min dbye/ /gshin
<p>180b</p>
<p>180b.1</p>rje'i 'bangs dang shin tu khro/ /tsaN+Da nor 'phrog ma dang ni/ /dung gi me tog can dag la/ /tsi N+DI ri yi bu mo dang / /'tshe byed btsun mo khro byed ma/ /tsU DA gdu bu'i dbye ba dang / /gtsug phud dang ni ba Da b+hU/ /tsau Da yul dang / gos bye brag /dza Da/ rmongs/ lkugs
<p>180b.2</p>grang bas gzir/ /kuN+Du sman la'o b+hA Da ni/ /khu tshur sogs dang yang dag 'jal/ /rtsa la sogs dar rdeg pa la/ /tA DI thal mo dang ni shing / /daN+Da gtum mo'i cha shas kyis/ /yongs bskor dmag dang dpung bye brag /nga rgyal dbye ba gshin rje 'dul/ /
<p>180b.3</p>mngon pa'i nga rgyal srub dang rta/ /zur gyi dbyug pa mtshams dang ni/ /gza' gdon mi bdag gdugs dang ni/ /la gu Da la 'dod pa'o/ /nA DI/ sbubs rtsa rma rnams kyi/ /gaN+Da/ tur+b+ba dag dang ni/ /skad cig drug gi dus dang ni/ /spyod pa dang ni/ ku ha na'o/ /ni
<p>180b.4</p>DaM gnas dang rigs su 'gro/ /nye ba dang ni snga ba bcas/ /baN+Da blo dkar baN+DA dang / /baN+Da kad+hI'i bdag dang dkar/ /biN+Di lus kyi cha ngag dang / /gnas dang si h+la ka'o/ /piN+Da nas las skyes pa'o/ /gong bur byas pa dag la'o/ /piN+Di rgyun dang stobs po
<p>180b.5</p>la/ /khyem gyi cha dang 'tsho ba dang / /piN+Di A lA bu dang ni/ /'bra go dang ni sbos bye brag /pi DA 'joms dang brtse ba dang / /thang shing dang ni mgo'i me tog /tsaN+DA rigs rnams tshogs pa la/ /tsaN+Da lag sogs bor ba la/ /b+haN+Da snod dang / rtsa ba chod
<p>180b.6</p>pa yi/ /nor dang / rgyan dang rta yi rgyan/ /chu klung snod la'ang 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /kuN+Da grul bum sbal mo la'o/ /maN+Da snying po mjug ma dang / /raN+Da dang ni rgyan dag la/ /maN+DA ma ma'oN+DaM ni/ /phal pa'i dbye ba la yang ngo / /muN+Da/ sgra gcan mgo bo dang / /lha ma
<p>180b.7</p>yin gyi bye brag la/ /raN+DA bya ba'i lo ma dang / /sman dang bi d+ha ba la'o/ /byA Da phyug la 'tshe dang sprul/ /shuN+Da myos dang gya tshom la/ /buN+Da chang dang rje rigs dang / /sdong bu glang po'i lag pa la/ /shuN+DA chu yi glang mo la/ /shauN+Da myos pa mngon par brjod/ /shoN+Di
<p>181a</p>
<p>181a.1</p>zegs ma tsa bi ka /Sha Da btung ba'i khyad par dang / /pad+ma sogs kyi tshal la'o/ /ShaN+Da/ bang rim bdag /po sogs/ /k+She Da sgra dang ka ra la/ /rna bar byur dang rtsub pa dang / /'khyog po'i k+She DA glang mo dang / /dpa' bo rnams kyi seng
<p>181a.2</p>ge'i sgra/ /rgyab kyi zug rngu la yang ngo / /dAk+Sh+we DaM/ arka dmar po'i 'bras/ /dbyangs dang me tog du ra sang / /ka ra Na Ni sgrang rtsi can/ /pA si ka raN+Da ba dang / /'dab chags da lA Ta ka'o/ /kuSh+maN+Da ni tshogs kyi dbye/ srin bu karkA ru dang mang la/ /kuSh+mAN+Di ni
<p>181a.3</p>gtum mo sman/ /ko daN+Da ni smin ma gzhu/ /yul gyi bye brag la yang ngo / /gA ru Di ni bstan bcos dang / /dug dang ma ra ka ta la/ /ta raN+Da ni/ snum can dang / /mchil pa/ srad bu bcings pa dang / /dngos po dang ni grub la'o/ /tin+ti Da ni lha min dbye/ /
<p>181a.4</p>tin+ti Di ni gshin rje'i bran/ /shing dbye mu tsany+tsa yi shing / /dra ba'i Da ni dbye ba'i sgo/ /tshang gi khyad par mkha' dag la/ /nirguN+DA ni tra Ni kA /sngon po'i rtags dang chung ba dang / /'dzin dang / kar+hA Ta ka la'o/ /pi tsiN+Da ni sra ba dang / /phyugs kyi yan lag
<p>181a.5</p>la yang ngo / /pu T+yaN+Da sprul ri dgas dri/ /gan+d+ha kI Ta ka la'o/ /pra kaN+Da ni bkra shis dang / /rtsa ba yal ga'i mtshams shing dang / /yal ga'i tshogs pa la yang ngo / /pra tsaN+Da ni rab gdung dang / /ngan 'bab/ lugs dang dpa' bo'i lag /ba raN+Da ni chod
<p>181a.6</p>pa dang / /yu ba gaN+Da ka dang ni/ /bar gyi kha khyer dag la'o/ /bArtaN+Da ni mche can bya/ /pA ruN+Di ni sgo'i piN+Da/ /bA ruN+Da thabs mig dri ma/ /gaN+Di sta yi rgyal po la/ /khrus kyi snod dang tha ba la/ /b+he ruN+DA ni 'dab chags mo/ /lha mo dbye dang 'jigs ma la/ /
<p>181a.7</p>mArtaN+Da ni gtum mo'i 'od/ /phag la'o ma raN+Da ni sprul/ /lam dang / ba byung dkyil 'khor la/ /bi tsaN+DA ni ri skegs dang / /ral gri gzhon ma gnas la 'jug /bi taN+Da ni rlung dbye dang / /ka ra bI rI rdo yi ming / /kats+tshi sA ka sAdz+nyA+e la'o/ /shi khaN+Da ni/ rma bya
<p>181b</p>
<p>181b.1</p>gtsug /sa piN+Da ni bgo skal dang / /gong bu dang bcas nu ma la/ /sa raN+Da ni sa ra Ta/ /khram pa rgyan gyi khyad par la/ /a po gaN+Da byis pa can/ /lus ma tshad dang shin tu 'jigs/ /tsakra pA Da ri'i dbye ba/ /tsakra pA DAM zlum po'o/ /dza ga raN+Da chu sgyur
<p>181b.2</p>ba/ /chu rdul dang ni sprul dag la/ /de ba tA rA lha yi nyi/ /mtho ris sgang byed dbyangs ldan ma/ /bA tAH khu Da rlung dmar dang / /bat+yA lcags sgrog mjug ma can/ /gnas tsam la yang blta bar bya/ /Da mtha'i sde'o// //b+hA ni rda dang yon tan med/ /mi zad pa
<p>181b.3</p>yi sgra la'o/ /g+hU D+ha dben dang gsang ba sgrib/ /kAD+ha 'che ba 'dod pa la/ /dr-i D+ha sbom po stobs ldan la//dr-i D+haM/ bA D+ha/ bra ba/ D+ha/ /mA D+hi 'dab sogs bcom pa dang / /nor dang / zhan dang gsal ba la/ /mU D+ha le lo/ /rmongs pa la/ /rA D+ha tshangs
<p>181b.4</p>pa bzang dang mdzes/ /ba D+hi des dang dam bca' la/ /dau D+ha rgyas dang skyes pa la/ /khyub+hA rgya che rnam pa bkod tshogs/ /ShaN+D+ha/ sgrib/ char skyes bu bcings/ /so D+ha bzod pa dang nus pa la/ /sho zwa yang ni bzod pa la/ /azlu zwa ni dbang phyug la'o/ /azlu T+wA ni
<p>181b.5</p>btsun mo dang / /kr-i ta pA ban+h+ya la'o/ /A ShA D+ha ni brtul zhugs kyi/ /dbyug pa zla ba/ dri ma slong / /a bU D+ha ni/ phung po sbo ma/ /u bo D+ha ni bkod pa tshogs/ /pra gI D+ha ni brtan dang dga'/ /pra mI D+ha Ni/ dri chu 'thug /pra rU D+ha ni rtsa ba bcings/ /mkhregs
<p>181b.6</p>pa dang ni gur la'o/ /bA rU D+ha ni rgyags dang me/ /gos dang g.yo ba sgo glegs la/ /bi g+hu D+ha ni/ smad dang sbed/ /bi rU D+ha ni sol ba skyed/ /sa mU dA ni sarba dang / /b+hug+na/ nye bar 'gro ba dang / /phung po byas pa'o/ /saM rU D+ha/ /dar ma dang ni myu gu la'o/ /a
<p>181b.7</p>d+h+ya ru D+ha/ zhon pa dang / /lhag pa la ste rtags gsum pa/ /D+ha mtha'i sde rdzogs so// //Na ni gtan la phab dang shes/ /Nu ni phra dang bram ze'i dbye/ /a Ni mchog tu mkhas pa dang / /phur bu mtshams dang zur la'o/ /uSh+Na chad pa gdung ba dang / /
<p>182a</p>
<p>182a.1</p>bsregs pa dang ni mkhas pa'o/ /Ur+Na mdzod spu lug sogs pa la/ ka Na/ pra zegs so ba'i cha/ /kaNA dzi ra bi spa li/ /chu srin dang ni mak+Shi kA /kar+Na/ rna ba pr-i thA'i bu/ /mdog bzang dang ni lta ba la/ kA Na/ mau kr-i/ lA ba dang / /lta
<p>182a.2</p>ba'o ki Na/ rma mtshan rtags/ /pra no rma dang yon tan la'o/ /kIr+NaM khebs dang yongs khyab dang / /'tshe ba mngon par brjod pa'o/ /ku Ni khyi dang gzir ba la/ /kr-iSh+Na khyab 'jug srid sgrub/ spre'u/ /rgyas pa la'o/ kr-iSh+Ni ni/ /na le shaM dang / lcags la'o/ /kr-i Shu/ 
<p>182a.3</p>dzrau pa dI nI dang / /ba mo/ /d+hU rA/ pispa li/ /ko Na mchi mar dbyug pa dang / /rol mo'i dbye ba karka skyes/ /pi waM la sogs sbyor thabs dang / /phyogs gcig dang ni khyim rnams so/ /ga Na tshogs dang 'dzoms byed grangs/ /dmag gi rab tu dbye ba la/ /gu Na gzugs
<p>182a.4</p>sogs/ snying stobs sogs/ /rig pa sogs dang ljang gu sogs/ /'dod dang gtso bo min pa dang / /mtshams sogs/ thag pa/ maurbI dang / /spyang ki'i lto ba rnams la'o/ /geSh+Nu gar dang glu len la/ /g+h+r-i NA/ snying rje smad pa la/ /g+hA NaM/ sna dang / g+hA ta la'o/ /
<p>182a.5</p>tsUr+NaM phye mar gyur pa la/ /tsUr+Na k+Sho da 'gyur byed dbye/ /tsur+NA dri yi sbyor ba la/ /dzer+Na shing dang cha shas zla ba/ gter/ /dziSh+Na/ sa dang / dbang po mi/ /rgyal byed la'o dzI r+NaM ni/ /smin dang rgan dang mchog tu rgas/ /ri Ni/ bU ga gdug pa'i lha/ /thos pa dang ni mkhregs
<p>182a.6</p>pa la/ /tI k+ShA 'gyur byed lhag par rno/ /rno ba'i bdag nyid la sogs la/ /tIk+Sh+NaM lcags dang dug dang ni/ /rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa 'thab pa dang / /nas kyi rtse dang swo ka ka'o/ /tU Ni sngon mo/ tU Na chags/ /triSh+Na sred dang 'dod pa la/ /tA NaM skyob dang bsrub pa dang / /skyong
<p>182a.7</p>dang skyob par byed pa la/ /rIr+NaM/ bcom dang 'jigs pa la/ /deSh+Nu 'joms byed gdul dka' la/ /dru Na sdig pa bung pa la/ /dru NI rus sbal mo dang ni/ /chu yi sbal mo la yang ngo / /dru NaM ral gri la yang ngo / /dro Na bya rog /kr-i pI'i bdag /lung pa bzhi mdo 'brog
<p>182b</p>
<p>182b.1</p>la'o/ /dro NI shing dang 'bab 'bab dang / /ba lang za dang sa dang ni/ /shing / khyim ri dang mtshams dang ni/ /tshong gi dbye ba la yang ngo / /d+har+Na gser dang mchod sbyin dang / /pa Na/ zong dang / glad dang sbad/ /brgyad cu dang ni ba rA Ta/ /kAR+ShA pa Na dang ni nor/ /tshong dang
<p>182b.2</p>shing rta cho lo dang / /tha snyad la yang dran par bya/ /khu tshur bcings pa la yang ngo / /par+Na/ ljang gu/ kiM shu ka /par+NaM 'dab ma/ lo ma la/ /sAR+Sh+Ni zhes pa phyi yi cha/ /dmag rgyab sa 'og /smyo ba la/ /prAr+Na chog dang gang ba la/ /prA NA gnas dang prA Na ni/ /rlung mchog
<p>182b.3</p>rlung dang g.yo ba la/ /prA NaM/ snyan ngag 'tsho ba dang / /po la dang ni/ gang ba la/ /pha ni/ bu raM byed pa la/ /pA Ni/ bkod pa dang ni ngag /pA Ni sprin dang / rin thang la/ /b+hU Na/ bud med mngal dang byis/ /ma Ni rin chen rtags kyi rtse/ /rwa dang mgrin pa nu ma dang / /a liny+dza
<p>182b.4</p>ra/ mu tig sogs/ /mo Na pa Ta kut+sa ka /nags dang / chu srin kum+b+hI ra/ /ma k+Shi ka/ /rkang pa'i rting pa/ sprul za ma tog /ra Na zur/ sgra/ 'thab pa la'o/ /ra Na/ rdul dang / nag po dang / bar+pa Ta la par+pa Ni/ /bstod pa gzugs/ dud 'gro/ grags yon tan dang / /chags
<p>182b.5</p>dang bram ze la sogs dang / /dkar po sogs dang mdzes pa dang / /la ba khra bo brtul zhugs dbyangs/ /shing dang / cha byad/ mdog mig go/ /bA Na sa yi bu dang / rta/ /rta yi lus dang 'ba' zhig pa/ /mdangs dang dz+hiN+Da can la'o/ /biSh+Nu sred med bu nyi ma/ /blin nor
<p>182b.6</p>lha'i dbye ba dang / /pi wang dang ni glog dag la/ /pr-iSh+Na yA da ba dang lug /sA ShaN+Di dang gtum pa la/ /be Ni chu klung ri mo dang / /skra bcings pa yi khyad par dang / /lha la sogs pa la yang ngo / /be Nu 'od ma mi bdag dbye/ /shA Na phyed 'degs zhing las dang / /
<p>182b.7</p>'tshe ba dang ni sog le dang / /grang ba skyob pa'i khyad par la/ /shA NI/ snyigs dang chung ngu dang / /rnam par snyigs pa rnams la'o/ /sho Na dga' ba chu klung dmar/ /ngang pa bya khra rma bya dang / /rta dmar la'o shrA NA ni/ kA cho ma'i/ /thug pa lan brjod bya ldan/ /shrA NaM/ 
<p>183a</p>
<p>183a.1</p>'tshed pa shre Ni ni/ /phreng ba dang ni khrus la'o/ /s+thA Nu bzo yi tshogs dang ni/ /'phrog byed brtan pa nges pa'o/ /s+thu NA lcags kyi gzugs brnyan dang / /ka ba dag la'o k+Sha Na ni/ /dga' ston dus dbye/ skabs dang tshigs/ /a b+hI k+ShA nges pa dang / /
<p>183a.2</p>shin tu'i don la'o a ru Na/ /skya rengs dang ni nyi ma dang / /ru rta/ mi gsal dmar ba dang / /thun mtshams dmar ba chu 'dra dang / /dmar dang ser skya 'dres pa la'o/ /a ru Na ni dur byid dang / /bong nga / sngo bsangs le brgan la/ /a ra Ni ni mi bsrub dang / /
<p>183a.3</p>srub par byed pa'i dbyug pa la/ /in+d+ra Ni ni bde sogs ma/ sman/ /sin+d+hu wAr byed pa la/ /byA ra NaM ni ma mo stong / /I k+Sha naM ni mthong dang blta/ /u Sha NA ni zegs ma la/ /u Sha NaM ni/ sman/ na le sham/ /e ShANi ni rma dang lam/ /rjes su 'brang dang srang gi dbye/ /
<p>183a.4</p>e Sha Ni ni lcags mda' dang / /rjes su 'tshol dang sngar rjes can/ /kaM ka NaM ni lag pa'i rgyan/ /lag pa'i srad bu mgo thod la/ /kar+t+ri ni ni/ rtsa'i bye brag /chu yi lo ma la yang ngo / /ka ra Na Ni rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs dang ni rjes skyes la/ /ka ra Ni ni
<p>183a.5</p>sgrub po mchog /lus dang lus gnas las dang ni/ /bya ba dang ni dbang po zhing / /byis pa'i smra ba dbyangs kyi lus/ /do shal kun tu 'jug pa dang / /bya ba'i khyad par la yang 'dod/ /ka ru Na dang / ka ru NA/ /brtse ba ro nyams shing la'o/ /ka ru Na ni dbang dang
<p>183a.6</p>ni/ /lta ba glang mo dag la'o/ /ka l+ya Na ni dge ba dang / /gser dang bkra shis mi zad la/ /kA ka NI ni bzhi cha dang / /srang dang tshad kyi dbyug pa la/ /kA ka Ni ni guny+dza dang / /pa Ta tsam dang / mdze'i bye brag /kA ra NaM ni bsnun dang bsad/ /gzir dang gnod
<p>183a.7</p>pa'i byed pa la/ /kA ra NA ni 'bad pa la/ /karma NaM ni 'tshe ba'i las/ /gzhan lus rab 'jug shes pa dang / /sngags dang rgyud kyi rab sbyor la/ /kurbA Na ni glang mi byed/ /kr-i pa Na ni smod dang 'bu/ /kr-i pA Na ni/ ral gri la/ /mtshan dang byed po kr-i pA Ni/ kong+ga
<p>183b</p>
<p>183b.1</p>Na ni yul bye brag /kong+ka NaM ni mtshon bye brag /ko kar+Na ni dre'u dang / /sbrul dang ri dgas dbye ba dang / /tshogs kyi khyad par mthe bo dang / /ming med tshad sman mUrbi kA /gra ha Na ni mi bdag thob/ /rang gir byas dang byed pa la/ /bza' dang / nyer tshags/ phyag
<p>183b.2</p>'tshal dang / /rkyen dang gus pa dag la yang / /grA ma NI ni/ nA si ta/ /gtso bo bdag po longs spyod can/ /tshogs can/ grong dpon/ rim rnams la'o/ /tsa ra NaM ni/ a brku/ /'gros dang rin dang rkang pa rigs/ /tsA ra NaM ni 'khor ba dang / /mtha' dang / rgyu ba
<p>183b.3</p>za ba dang / /zi ra/ go snyod mtshal dang ni/ /sau brtsal 'dod do/ /tA ra Ni ni sgrol byed nyi/ /gzhon nu ma dang gru mkhan la/ /ta ru Na ni na chung dang / /gsar pa 'khyog po'i me tog dang / /ce spyang chen po dag la'o/ /dak+Shi Na ni/ thang shing dang / /g.yon min
<p>183b.4</p>gzhan 'dun rjes su 'jug /a pA tsi las byung la 'dod/ /dak+Shi Na ni mchod sbyin/ sbyin/ /rab gnas a pA tsI la'o/ /dur+b+ba r+N+Na ni bye ma can/ /gzung dang mdog ngan la yang brjod/ /daurbA NaM ni mr-iSh+Ti'i 'dab/ /dUrbA'i khu ba la yang ngo / /dru g+ha Na ni thob
<p>183b.5</p>dang / /pa ra/ sU d+ha 'tshe ba la/ /dra bi NaM ni pha rol gnon/ /gser dang 'byor pa la yang ngo / /d+ha ra NaM ni 'dzin pa dang / /nga rgyal dbye ba dag la'o/ /d+ha ra NI ni sa la'o/ /d+ha ru Ni ni chu dang ni/ /mtho ris dang ni mchog la gnas/ /d+harmA Na ni sprul bye brag /rkang
<p>183b.6</p>'thung khyad par dag la yang / /d+haR+Sha NI ni rigs tshogs ma/ /d+haR+Sha NaM ni mdzod dang dag/ /d+hA ra NI ni sangs rgyas gsung / /sngags kyi bye brag zlos gar la/ /d+hi Sha Na ni lha'i slob dpon/ /d+hi Sha NA ni blo dang gnyid/ /ni rmA NaM ni sprul pa dang / /snying po dang ni
<p>183b.7</p>bkod pa dang / /sa many+dza pa zhes pa la/ /niR+Ya Ni ni ni nges 'byung thar/ /mdzod dang a/ pAng+ka dang bcings/ /nirbA Ni ni myang 'das thar/ /nub dang glang po skyes bu dam/ /niH shre Ni ni them skas dang / /'bra go'i rkang 'thung dag la'o/ /ba tror+Ni ni sbyangs pa'i
<p>184a</p>
<p>184a.1</p>dar/ /bat+t+ror+Na ni/ shA na'i shing / /bak+Shi NI ni kun 'gro dang / /da ltar ba dang nyin mtshan ldan/ /phyogs mtha' dang ni nya gang ba/ /yal ga can gyi dbye ba la/ /pu rA kA kaR+ShA pa Na'o/ /pu rA NaM ni mtshan nyid lnga/ /dus rings lon pa'i rdzas la
<p>184a.2</p>brjod/ /pU ra Na ni rdzogs byed dang / /ba skong phye ma'i khyad par la/ /pU ra NI/ shal+ma li/ /gos dang rtsom dang srad bu'i dbye/ /phra g+ha Na ni zangs bum dang / /a lin+da dang lcags tho la/ /bra ma Na ni/ bden smra dang / /rgyu mtshan gtan tshigs bstan bcos dang / /
<p>184a.3</p>lcags dang gcig skyob ra ba 'jal/ /rgyu mtshan 'di snyed ces pa la'o/ /pra ba Na ni rab tu sbyangs/ /'bod dang rim gzhol/ sa/ skad cig /bzhi mdo la'o/ pra be ni/ /'dres dang rul ba dag la'o/ /prok+Sha Ni ni khrus dang 'ching / /ba ra Na ni ra ba la'o/ /ba ru Na
<p>184a.4</p>ni tshul la'o/ /ba ru NaM ni shing dbye dang / /lo ma kha ba chu bdag dang / /nyi ma dang ni chu la'o/ /bA ra Na ni glang por bshad/ /bA ra NaM ni dgag pa la/ /bA ru NI nub phyogs dang / /mai re ya dang durbA tri/ /prAh+ma NI ni rten byed ma/ /gnyis skyes chung ma gnyis
<p>184a.5</p>skyes ma/ /pr-ik+kA rnams so/ /prAh+ma Na/ /de bzhin prAh+ma Ni zhes pa/ /sngags rigs dang ni gnyis skyes tshogs/ /b+ha ra Ni ni dmar po dam/ /b+ha ra NAM ni rigs dang bla/ /mi bzad mche ba/ b+hI Sha Na/ /shal+la Shi'i bcud b+hI Sha NaM/ /b+h+ra ma Ni ni tsher ma dang / /dbang phyug rol
