<p>204a.5</p>lha'i dbang / /lus ldan dbyangs kyi rten la'o/ /g+ha nA g+ha na/ char sprin dang / /brgya byin dang ni glang po myos/ /g+ho Sha yi t+gu zhes bya ba/ /ne tso dang ni bram ze la/ /tsi tra b+hA nu bya dang me/ tsol kin ni zha nye dang / /laM ba dang ni kiSh+ku'i tshigs/ /dza lA Ta na 'jug pa dang / /
<p>204a.6</p>kraM ka /kaM ka khrag gi rgyun/ /dza la Ta ni chu 'khor la/ /dza lA Ta ni chu gnas la/ /na la mI na nya'i bye brag /iny+tsA ka dang byis pa gsod/ /ta pa swi ni dka' thub can/ /dka' thub dang ni rjes su rtse/ /ta bo ba lang gi/ /d+ha na dka' thub la/ /snag can tsha ba skye ba
<p>204a.7</p>la/ /ta bo d+ha na mgo zlum ma/ /nang ma khyim dang dpa' ba la/ /durbA man ni 'dam gyi ni/ /nya phyis dang ni 'brum sran no/ /deb se ni lha yi dmag /gnas dang rtogs pa dag la'o/ /dwi dzan+man/ so/ bya bram ze/ /glang po tho ba/ klu shing klu/ /ni d+hU ba naM/ bskyod dang dga'/ /
<p>204b</p>
<p>204b.1</p>gsod dang mthar byed nags tshal la/ /nirbA sa ni gnas med dang / /'tshe dang 'go ba'i gnas la'o/ /nir+g+hat+sa ni ngan byed dang / /a la k+ta ka zhes pa la/ /niR+YA ta naM sbyin pa dang / bkod dang gtor dang sgra dag la/ /ni ba ma ni/ thos dang mthong / /na shA ma ni/ lta dang
<p>204b.2</p>mthong / /pa ya swa ni ba bzhon dang / /mun can ma dang sprin la'o/ /ba ri dzran ni mchod sbyin can/ /mchod sbyin las dang yongs byed la/ /pu N+ya dza na srin po dang / /ljon shing sA lA sha dang ni/ /srung dang skyes mchod bya rnams la/ /pr-i thag+dzan rmongs dang dman/ /
<p>204b.3</p>pra dza na ni skye gnas dang / /skye pa dang ni rab 'gro la/ /pa Ni d+hA naM rab 'bad dang / /rab tu 'jug dang mnyam gzhag la/ /pra ti mA naM gzugs brnyan dang / /ngag glang po'i mche ba'i bar la'o/ /bra ti ban dam bca' dang / /rnam par shes dang zhugs pa'o/ /pra
<p>204b.4</p>ti yat+na 'du byed dang / /so sor 'dzin dang 'dod pa'o/ /pra t+yar+thin ni brjod bya'i rtags/ /gnyis gnyis so sor smra ba'o/ /pra yo dza naM/ dgos pa rgyu/ /pra ba tsa ni bzang po dang / rang bzhin brjod pa la yang ngo / /pra spo tra naM/ nyi ma dang / /rab tu kha bye bsnun pa la/ /
<p>204b.5</p>pra sA d+ha nI grub pa dang / /ka ka ti kA zhes pa la/ /pra sA d+ha ni/ 'bebs pa la/ /pra ha sa naM 'joms pa dang / /rab tu bzhad dang kun bskyod la/ /pha la kin ni 'bras bu can/ /i l+li shi zhes bya ba la/ /bar+d+ha mA na 'dam bu dang / /nyams pa med pa dang e raN+Da/ /
<p>204b.6</p>dri ba'i bye brag rnams la'o/ /bA Da gin+ni sdang ba dang / /lam dang lo mas 'tsho ba dang / /rta yi khyad par rnams la'o/ /bA rA sha naM 'gro 'joms dang / /dung dang sgo skyong dag la'o/ /b+hA tat+ma na ni tshangs pa dang / /gang zag ma da yid+gu ni/ /chang dang sI d+hu'i btung
<p>204b.7</p>bal/ /mad+ha d+ha naM/ bdud rtsi che/ /gos bzang dang ni si h+la'o/ /ma hA mu ni ri byi dang / /dpal yon dang ni ri byi'i bu/ /ma hA se na sa ga dang / /dmag dpon chen po dag la'o/ /mA tu lA nI b+hA dgA dang / /cha shas bgrod dang zhang po la/ /mA lu d+hA na ka sprul khra bo/ /
<p>205a</p>
<p>205a.1</p>pad+ma chen po dag la'o/ /mA lu d+hA nI 'khri shing dbye/ /yid gzhungs can dang yid gzhungs ldan/ /me d+ha po nI bram ze mo/ /ra sA ya na mkha' lding la/ /ra sA ya ni ru ra dang / /nad 'phrog dug dang / phyi dong ka /rA dzad ni bdag 'dzin shing / /'o ma
<p>205a.2</p>can dang kaM shu ka /la lA la dang la lA man/ /rtags mtshan nyams dga' rgyan dang ni/ /rwa dang gtso bo mjug ma dang / mthu dang rgyal mtshan rta rnams la/ /laM ga lin+na/ puN+Da'i shing / /'be ta sha'i dang gshol mtshon no/ /ba naSh+tsa ni ce spyang dang / /dzam+bu ka dang stag
<p>205a.3</p>dang ni/ dred dang byi la rnams la'o/ /bi ro tsa na nyi ma me/ /zla ba rab bde/ /dga' ba la/ /bi Sha yin ni dbang po dang / /yul can yid las skyes dang sreg /yul las skyes dang mi yi bdag /'bar ba dang ni rang dbang can/ /bi ShA Ni ni rwa can 'jig /bi la pa nI ta rA
<p>205a.4</p>lA/ /la sad+d+ha dang gAM ga nA/ /bi la sin ni gdengs can dang / /dug sbrul dag la blta bar bya/ /bai shrak+se nA mi nyams la/ /bi shra k+se nA/ 'bras ldan shing / /bi badzra na yongs su gtong / /sbyin dang / /mdangs dang gsod pa la/ /bi smA sa ni dri za'i grong / /bu ga can dang dran
<p>205a.5</p>pa la/ /bi ha na ni 'joms pa dang / /bi ny+dza na dang shing bal bskyod/ /bi he Tha ni 'tshe dang 'joms/ /br-i k+ShA da nI shing skyes dang / /rnam par 'joms dang dri dag la/ /br-i k+ShA da naM sprang yab dang / /dgra sta dang ni a shwat+tha/ /bai ro tsa na/ bde gshegs kyi/ /bye brag nyi ma stobs
<p>205a.6</p>ldan bu/ /bya bA yin ni 'dod ldan dang / /rdzas kyi dbye ba brjod par byed/ /shi khaN+Di na ni mda'i bye brag /'jigs med sgra dang rma bya tshogs/ /shi khaN+Di nA/ gu ny+dza dang / /khyu dang yal ga dag la'o/ /shi kha rin ni ri rtse dang / /sdeb sbyor a bA mArga'i shing / /shrId+gA rin
<p>205a.7</p>ni/ dkris bzang dang / /'dod pa can dang glang po che/ /sh+le Sha g+ha nA/ mal+lI dang / /ka ta kI dang tik+ta'i bcud/ /sa dA da na/ glang chen dkar/ /ha la gnas dang spel gyispos kyi glang / /sa nA ta na 'phrog byed dang / /khyab 'jug pha mes 'gron po brtan/ /rtag pa'o/ sa
<p>205b</p>
<p>205b.1</p>ma pan+naM ni/ /gsang ba thob pa rul ba rdzogs/ /sa mA sa naM yang dag thob/ /yongs su gcod dang mnyam gzhag gzung / /sA ma dA naM mthun pa dang / /'dzin dang rtag pa'i las la'o/ /sa mut+thu naM nad langs dang / /kun 'gog /sa mu r+ts+tsha naM ni/ /mngon khyab yang
<p>205b.2</p>dag 'dod dang rmongs/ /sam+bA ha naM/ khur la sogs/ /'dren dang yan lag nyed pa la/ /sam+ba da nAM lta ba dang / /bslu dang dbang du byed pa la/ /sa ro dzi nI pad+ma can/ /mtsho las skyes dang mtsho mchog la/ /sA ma yo ni ting nge 'dzin/ /glang po che dang mchog
<p>205b.3</p>gnas la/ /sa mA d+hi ni nges brjod dang / /sbyin sreg byed pa'i shing grangs la/ /sA ra sa nAM gser la'o/ /ta nu tri naM grang skyob la/ /su ka rman ni rnal 'byor dbye/ /zas bzang lha yi bzo bo la/ /su daR+sha ni/ lha grong dang / /khyab 'jug gi ni 'khor lo la/ /
<p>205b.4</p>su daR+Sha nA bka' dang ni/ /lhun po'i dzam+bA sman gyi dbye/ /mig gi dga' bar byed pa la/ /sU dA min+ni/ sprin dang ri/ /su d+ha n+wan ni/ brtan pa dang / /gzhu can sna tshogs las la'o/ /su barban ni skabs gsum dang / /'od ma 'da' dang du ba tshigs/ /su yA mu
<p>205b.5</p>na khyab 'jug dang / /nad dang bat+sa'i rgyal po dang / /blo bzang skyes pa rnams la'o/ /sau rA ma ni glog dbye dang / /rnam gsal chu skyes khyad par la/ /saM ya ma nI gshin rje'i grong / /brtul zhugs dang ni yang dag sdom/ /sta na yid+gu sprin dang ni/ /'brug sgra
<p>205b.6</p>shi dang dbyug pa la/ /haR+Sha yit+ku pu dang gser/ /a gra dzan+ma na tshangs pa dang / spun zla'i mthu bo bram ze dang / gsod dang / sbyin dang gtong ba la/ /a nu bA san zhes pa/ /snum pa'i las dang bdug pa la/ /an+da bA shin/ gtum po dang / /slob ma nye gnas dag
<p>205b.7</p>la'o/ /a pa brdza ni zhes pa/ /yongs su gtong dang mya ngan 'das/ /bi shrA Na na zhes pa la/ /a ba sardza naM zhes pa/ /sbyin dang yongs su 'dor ba la/ /a b+hi niSh+Ta na yi ge/ /rnam par gtod pa dag la'o/ /u pa sparla naM/ reg pa dang / /khrus dang zhal bsil la yang ngo / /
<p>206a</p>
<p>206a.1</p>u pa sam+ban+naM ni byas/ /legs par 'dus byas pa la'o/ /kA ma tsa ri na tsa Ta ka /'dod ldan dang ni rang 'dod la/ /kA ran+d+ha mi 'khar ba mkhan/ /gser 'gyur mkhan la'ang blta bar bya/ /kiSh+ku barban 'od ma dang / /dar gyi srin bu dang ni me/ /kriSh+Na bar+t+man bsreg
<p>206a.2</p>za dang / /kun spyod ngan dang / sgra gcan la/ /kha ra b+hA dza naM zhes pa/ /'jam dang 'khar ba sol+la dang / /'jug pa la'o de nas ni/ /gan+d+ha mAM d+ha na ra'i dbye/ /bung ba dang ni dri ldan ma/ /gan+d+ha mA da nI/ ni chang / /'khri shing ri dgas dbye ba la/ /tsa kra tsA rin byis pa dang / /
<p>206a.3</p>nor can grong gi dra ba can/ /tsi ra dzI bin/ tshe ring dang / /khyab 'jug dang ni lhan cig skyes/ /tik+ta barban gu DU tsi/ /shing mngar hi la mo tsI'o/ /d+hA ma ke ta na yi sgra/ /me dang du ba mjug rings la/ /pad+ma lAny+tsa na nyi ma/ /'jig rten dbang phyug nor sbyin tshangs/ /pad+ma
<p>206a.4</p>lAny+tsa na sgrol ma/ /dbyangs can ma dang pad+ma ma/ /sI da tsan+dan naM zhes pa/ /nag mo can dang yung ba la/ /pr-iSh+Tha shr-id+gin/ /shaN+D+ha dang / /'jigs bcu pa dang ce spyang lto/ /pra tsa lA kin/ lam 'gro dang / /'brug sgra'i rjes su sgeg pa la/ /pra ti pA da ni sbyin pa/ /
<p>206a.5</p>khro dang go bar byed pa la/ /ba na mA lin sgra 'greng pa/ /ba na mA li ni phag mo/ /pa bar+Ni nI 'bras bu ldan/ /bud med rin chen mtshon byed ma/ /sred pa dang ni yung ba la/ /bar tsan+da dz+wa lha'i shing / /nag mo can la'ang blta bar bya/ /byom tsA rin mkha'
<p>206a.6</p>'gro dang / /lha dang rig pa 'dzin pa la/ /ma dU sU da na phag mo/ /spu 'chad par ni rnam shes bya/ /ma hA ra dza naM zhes pa/ /bum pa dang ni bum brgya pa/ /mri t+yu prany+tsa na dpal 'bras/ /kA ko la dang / gzigs gos can/ /big+h+Na kA rin 'jigs mthong dang / /
<p>206a.7</p>rnam par 'joms par byed pa la/ /bi shwa karman lha bzo dang / /mArtaN+Da dang thub pa'i dbye/ /br-i ShA sarban 'phrog byed dang / /lha min/ sgeg ldan gro ma'o/ /sha ku lA da nI zhes pa/ /sha can chu yi bi spa li/ /g+hiny+tsu lAM dang / tshangs pa can/ /shA laM k+Sha ya na yi
<p>206b</p>
<p>206b.1</p>sgra/ /rdo yi dbye ba dga' byed la/ /she pa ki rta na 'dod ldan/ /b+t+ring+gi ri ti pad+mA'o/ /shwe ta bA ha na srid sgrub/ /bdud rtsi sbyor bar byed pa la/ /shweta bAn/ na bdud rtsi sbyor/ /rgya mtsho'i dbu ba sprin gyi snying / /ShaSh+Tha hA ya na zhes pa/ /'bras kyi dbye ba sin+d+hu ra/ /
<p>206b.2</p>saM pra yo gin cha yis rtse/ /'dod ldan dang ni rab sbyor la/ /ha ri tsan+dan ni ba mchog /lha yi shing dang 'od ldan ma/ /gur gum pad+ma rA ga la'o/ /ha ri bA ha na zhes pa/ /nyin mor byed dang sprin gyi bzhon/ /an+tA pa shA yin khyi 'tshod/ /nA bi te dang thub
<p>206b.3</p>pa'i dbye/ /kA lA nu mA din zhes pa/ /ka la biM ka ro lam+ba/ /ka bany+dzil rnams la'o/ /dzA yA nu dzI bi na zhes pa/ /rgyas dang ngan 'gro 'dul dang che/ /sa ha sra de d+hin zhes pa/ /dga' byed 'joms dang ro sgyur shing / /na mtha'i sde rdzogs so/ /kha ni rlung do kU dag byed/ /
<p>206b.4</p>pA ni btung ba skyong byed la/ /kalpa tshangs pa'i nyin zhag dang / /rigs pa/ 'jigs pa/ bstan bcos sgrub/ /kU pa chu yi dngo dang ni/ /shi ba byi dor byed pa'i khung / /kr-i pA rtse ba zhes bshad do/ /kl-i pa rgyas pa de'i yang ni/ /b+hA ra tA'i skyes bu la/ /
<p>206b.5</p>khaSh+pa stobs kyi byed pa dang / /khro ba la yang grags pa yin/ /go ba lcug ma ba lang gnas/ /grong la sogs pa'i bdag po yang / /go bI sa skyong sa 'dzin dang / /srung ba pa dang snying po can/ /chu pa reg dang k+Shu pa dang / /g.yul 'gyed pa dang rlung dmar la/ /talpaM chung
<p>206b.6</p>ma mal dang ni/ /dgra khang la'o tA pa ni/ /kun tu gdung dang da ba thu/ /tA bI chu yi khyad par la/ /tra pA ngo tsha rig la'o/ /tra pu zha nye mtshon dag la/ /darbu nga rgyal dregs pa dang / /ri dgas myos pa la yang ngo / /nI pa rtul dang tshogs la 'gyur/ /pany+tsa la sngon gzhu dag
<p>206b.7</p>la/ /buSh+pe me tog bud med rdul/ /rgyas dang kha bye ba la'o/ /rU paM rnam pa mdzes rang bzhin/ /tshigs su bcad dang nA na ka /gar mkhan sogs dad ri dgas mdung / /spyod pa phyugs dang sgra la'o/ /re ba snod dang 'khrug pa la/ /ro pa mda' dang 'dogs pa la/ /le
<p>207a</p>
<p>207a.1</p>pa byug dang bdud rtsi la/ /dze ma na'o/ pa bA ni/ /bu ga dang ni tshem bu la/ /pat+pa /mig chu rlangs ba la/ /shaSh+pa rtsa gzhon so sor zas/ /shA pa mna' dang sbyor ba la/ /sU ba byed pa mchod ma'i dbye/ /swA ba nyal dang mi shes nyid/ /reg pa mi
<p>207a.2</p>shes don can no/ /k+Shi pa thogs pa rnam par 'god/ /ku re 'phen dang 'dzin pa la/ /byug dang snyoms pa la yang ngo / /ar+Na pa Ni/ sai ri b+ha/ /chu rnams yang dag 'khrugs pa la/ /A kalpa ni khyim tsam dang / /rtog par byed pa la yang ngo / /A bA ba ni 'dod dang
<p>207a.3</p>smin/ /yongs 'dor a la/ bA la'o/ /a k+She pa ni smod dang gtong / /'gugs dang snyan dngags rgyan la'o/ /a Du pa ni zla ba gos/ /u la ba ni/ rtsa'i dbye ba/ /a la baM ni gel par 'dod/ /kats+tsha ba ni ru sbal dang / /gyad kyi 'ching ba'i khyad par la/ /kats+tsha
<p>207a.4</p>bI ni/ ru sbal mo/ /phra mo'i nad kyi dbye ba dang / /shing shun dbye ba dag la'o/ /ka lA pa ni tshogs rma bya/ /gser dang tu NI ra dang / zas/ /gos dang ka si sU ra dang / /kau hi gnyis ka dag la'o/ /kA sh+ya pI ni sa dang nya/ /k+Sha sh+yi pa ni/ thub pa'i dbye/ /ku Ta pa
<p>207a.5</p>ni nga rgyal dbye/ /niSh+ku Ta dang thub pa la/ /baT+sI ri kA la yang ngo / /ku Na pa ni ro rul dri/ /ku ta pa ni tsha mo dang / /nyi ma'i brgyad cha/ tshad pa ra/ /la ba ku sha rol mo la'o/ /dzi hwA ba ni khyi byi la/ /stag dang khra bo dag la'o/ /bA da pa shing / bri rkang / l+h+wam/ /bA tA ba ni
<p>207a.6</p>gzi brjid/ rdul/ /rak+ta ba ni mtshan mo rgyu/ /rak+ta bA ni pad+ma dang / /rnam rtog 'khrul dang phyogs rnams la/ /bi Ta pa ni khri shing sdong / /Shilga rgya chen lcug ma'o/ /a pa lA ba ngan smras dang / /yid gcugs sel ba dag la'o/ /a b+hi rU pa rtogs bya dang / /
<p>207a.7</p>dga' dang rab thob gzugs la'o/ /a ba le ba skyon dang snyoms/ /byug pa yang dag 'gro ba la/ /u pa tA ba smra nyer gdung / /myur ba'i don can du 'dod do/ /u pa dza ma khyad par dang / /dbye dang rnam par 'joms pa la/ /dza la kU bI rtsing bu dang / /khron
<p>207b</p>
<p>207b.1</p>pa'i snying po dga' la'o/ /nA ga/ puSh+pa/ klu shing dang / /nA ga ge sar tsam+pa ka /pa ri kam+pa 'jigs pa dang / /yongs su 'gul dang rab bskyod la/ /pa rI bA ba chu gnas dang / /yongs su thob pa dang kun tu 'gebs/ /biN+Da puSh+pa mya ngan med/ /dza ba'i me tog 'dam
<p>207b.2</p>skyes la/ /ba hu rU pa dran pa dang / /rdo rje rang byung mda' tshogs/ bskyod/ /me g+hA puSh+pa/ /lhang tsher gong / /chu dang chu la skyes pa la/ /bi bra lA ba 'gal brjod dang / /don dang bral ba'i tshig ga la/ /ba dza puSh+pa myos byed dang / /de bzhin ma ru ba ka la'o/ /
<p>207b.3</p>bri ka d+hU pa shing ser dang / /bcos ma'i bdug pa dag la'o/ /pr-iShA ka'i lha chen po/ /'bar byed nag po dag la'o/ /he ma puSh+pa mya ngan med/ /dza ba'i me tog tsam+pa ka /tsa ma ra puSh+pa ni gsal/ /tsU ta dang ni ke ka'o/ /pa mtha'i sde'o// //phu ni
<p>207b.4</p>sngags dang phe ni sgra/ /grangs med spA ni rgan dang 'phel/ /s+pha ni/ /g+hany+dza'i rlung dang khyab/ /s+phu ni s+phung byed balgu'i dngos/ /gum+pha dpung pa'i rgyan dang / /tshig /lugs dang brjod pa dag la'o/ /re pha ra yig smod pa brjod/ /ba phe ba lang sogs rmig pa/ /ljon
<p>207b.5</p>shing sogs kyi sgra la'o/ /shing phA ral pa chu klung dang / /sha can dang ni ma ma la'o/ /pha mtha'i sde'o// //ba ni chu lha nyer mjal rdzas/ /kam+bi/ kha dzA kA dang ni/ /'od ma'i cha'o kaM bu ni/ /glang bo gdu bu dung / /dung phran/ /mgrin pa dang ni spubs can la'o/ /bA rA
<p>207b.6</p>gzugs thung / grangs bye brag /tsArbI mdzes dang blo dag la/ dzam+bu ri dang chu klung dang / /gling dang shing gi dbye ba la/ /Dim+bi ca co 'jigs pa dang / /glo ba mchin pa/ rnam 'gro dang / /e raN+Da la'o darbI ni/ /kha dzA kA dang 'bras bu la/ /dwI shing ser/ yung ba dang / /
<p>207b.7</p>lha shing / sa ldan/ sngon skyes la/ /pUrbA sngon dang sngar rtse mo/ /tum+bI tik+ta lam+bA dpal/ /bim+pa gzugs can 'bras bu dang / /dkyil 'khor dang ni gzugs brnyan la/ /sham+ba dge dang yangs pa dang / /gtun shing rtse gnas lcags snying ldan/ /rdo rje rnams so stam+ba
<p>208a</p>
<p>208a.1</p>ni/ /rtswa dang gel pa shing rnams so/ /ka dam+baM ni don grub dang / ni ku rum+ba nI pa'o/ /sdong bu yal ga ka lam+bI/ /ka lam+bi ni sdong bu mda'/ /nI sa la'o kA dam+ba/ /dang po'i tshogs dang mda' la'o/ /ga dzA hwA glang po biSh+pa la'i/ /glang po 'gran dang
<p>208a.2</p>glang po'i grong / /gan+d+har+b+ba ni/ ri dgas dbye/ /glung mkhan dang ni mkha' spyod dang / /srid pa bar ma'i sems can la/ /khu byug rta dang bcud len grub/ /lha yi glu mkhan rnams la'o//gu Dum+ba ni snying dang 'bras/ /prin+ta dang ni ba lang zas/ /dwi dzi hrA ni sprul phra
<p>208a.3</p>mo/ /ka Tir ka'o ni taMpa/ /rtse mo phrag pa lus byed do/ /bra la ma ni/ 'phyang ba dang / /lha min tA la'i myu gu dang / /yal ga la'o prA lcam pa/ /khyab 'jug dbye ba gsum rgyas dang / /'o ma 'dzin pa'o b+hU dzam+bu/ /bi kaM ka ta'i 'bras bu dang / /go DUm+ba la'i he ram+ba/ /
<p>208a.4</p>ma he lto 'phyang dpa' dang snyems/ /dza ra dzam+bU dzam+bU 'byed/ /'bra go'i 'bras bu dag la'o/ /la la dzI hA 'tshe ba dang / /rim pas 'gro dang khyim la'o/ /sha ta barbA durbA dang / /ngan spang bu dang btsun mo la/ /go rak+Sha dzam+bu ni gro/ /de bzhin sa bsrungs 'bras
<p>208a.5</p>la'o/ d+hU lI ka dam+ba ni shing / /ti ni sha dang ka dam+ba/ /chu la'i shing la blta bar bya/ /shri gA la dzam+bU zhes pa/ /go Dum+ba'o 'ga' zhig ni/ /rgya shug 'bras bu zhes 'dod do/ /ba mtha'i sde tshan no// //b+ha ni 'dri bu chags pa dang ni/ /dkar dang rgyas
<p>208a.6</p>pa'i don la yang / /b+hA ni 'bar dang gnas tsam la/ /b+haM ni skal ma b+hI ni 'jigs/ /b+hU ni sa dang gnas tsam la/ /'byung bar byed pa rnams la'o/ /b+ho ni bod pa mi zad pa'o/ /kum+b+ha bum pa khyim gyi dbye/ /bi Ta glang po'i mgo'i yan lag /bum rna
<p>208a.7</p>can gyi bu la yang / /kum+bI skya nar chu'i 'dab ma/ /bi Tha ra ka ta 'bras bu'o/ /kum+b+ha gu gul shing dur byid/ /gar+b+ha/ mngal dang byis pa dang / /nag phyogs la ste rtags/ tsher can/ pa nas/ /dzam+b+ha/ so dang / sgyur rtsi dang / /lha min dbye dang za ba la/ /dzrin+b+ha/ kha gdangs
<p>208b</p>
<p>208b.1</p>kha bya glal/ /Da m+b+hi/ bA li sha dang byis/ /dam+b+ha tog can shing shun la/ /dr-ik+b+hU sprul dang bdag po la/ /nA b+he/ /rgyu skar 'khor lo sgyur/ gtso bo 'khor lo'i mtha' dang ni/ /srog chags yan lag myos pa la/ /ni b+ha 'dra ba thol la'o/ /ram+b+ha 'od ma'i dbyugs pa la/ /ram+b+ha
<p>208b.2</p>chu shing chu skyes ma/ /bi b+hu sum rtsen dbang khyab bdag /sham+b+hu dbang phyug tshangs pa dang / /mchod 'os dang ni skra can ma/ /shu b+ha grub pa shu b+haM bde/ /sho b+ha mdzes dang grib ma la/ /sa b+ha/ mdun/ pa/ ba/ ba lang gnas/ /rgyan po 'gyed pa rta rag go/ /stam+b+ha bems po/ ka ba
<p>208b.3</p>la/ /sa b+hU khyab 'jug tshangs pa la/ /a shu b+ha ni 'chi ltas sdig /mi 'dod/ maM bzang / sdig can no/ /At+mA b+hU ni/ 'dod lha tshangs/ /a ram+b+ha ni/ /skyed tshal dang / /dregs dang myur dang gsod pa la/ /r-i Sha b+ha ni/ khyu mchog gtso bo/ /sde tshan brgyad dang sman bye brag /
<p>208b.4</p>dbyangs kyi khyad par phag pa'i 'jug /bu ga rna ba dag la'o/ /r-iSha b+hA mi yi rnam pa/ /bud med rnam mang btsun mo dang / /rtse mo/ byi la mchog gnas gtso/ /ka ku pa ni srid sgrub shing / /'dod chags dbye ba rab bsten dang / /phyogs mdzes bstan bcos la ba dang / /
<p>208b.5</p>tsam+pa ka yi phreng ba la'o/ /ka ra b+hi ni 'khrig ma dang / /mthe'u chung cha dang rim pas 'gro/ /rkang pa brgyad pa sha ra b+ha/ /ri dgas bye brag dag la'o/ /ku sum+b+ha ni/ gser tshos/ /chen/ /ril ba spyi blugs/ /gard b+ha/ /bong bu/ dri yi dbye ba dang / /ki bar+Na dang kai ra ba/ /garda d+d+hA ni nad
<p>208b.6</p>nyung dang / /skye ba'i khyad par dag la'o/ /dun+du b+hi ni rnga bo che/ /sbyin skyes dbang pos thig le la/ /durma b+ha ni rnyed dka' dang / /yid gcugs/ sa/ khyi rngo/ nad can la/ /ni kum+pa ni so ldan ma/ /bum rna can gyi bur yang dran/ /pal+la b+ha ni rig ldan dang / /brtse ba can dang
<p>208b.7</p>dbang po la/ /baR+ShA b+hU ni slar skye dang / /kany+tsi li dang sbal pa la/ /biSh+kam+b+ha ni sbyor ba'i dbye/ /rgya khyon so sor bcings pa dang / /gzugs can yan lag so sor 'bad/ /'ching ba'i dbye dang rnal 'byor can/ /biSh+Tam+b+ha ni so sor 'ching / /rnam 'phel ba dang rnam par/ /
<p>209a</p>
<p>209a.1</p>'phel/ /bi sram+b+ha ni rol pa can/ /'thab mo dbugs 'byin 'dren dang gsod/ /pri Sha b+ha ni/ khyu mchog dang / /dkar po khu ba/ skyes mchog la'ang / /bai d+har+b+ha ni ngag 'khyog po/ /nyid dang mtshams pa'i khyad par la/ /sha ra b+ha ni/ seng ge'i dbye/ /
<p>209a.2</p>rkang pa brgyad pa ka ra b+ha/ /sa nA b+hi ni rang skye mtshungs/ /su ra b+hi ni tsam+pa ka /khra bo dpyid dang dri ldan la/ /gser dang dzA ti phal dang / /yid 'ong dri bzangs dag la'o/ /shar b+hi ni shal+la ki/ /ma mo'i dbye ba dag la'o/ /a nu Sh+Thu b+ha mda' dang ni/ /sdeb sbyor rab dbye
<p>209a.3</p>dag la dran/ /a paSh+Ta m+b+ha gser dang ni/ /rab rtsom dka' ba dag la yang / /shA ta kum+b+haM gser la ste/ /shA ta kum+b+ha rta gsod pa'o/ /b+h+ya mtha'i sde tshan no// //ma ni zhi ba mA zla ba dang / /sgra gcan dang ni ma mo dang / /dga' dang nga rgyal 'ching ba dang / /dgag
<p>209a.4</p>pa la ste mi zad pa'o/ /me dang maM zhes pa'ang / don de'o/ /A ma nad dang de dbye phyogs/ /iSh+ma 'dod dang / dpyid la'o/ /u mA go rI dang ni ser/ /mdzes dang grags dang dga' ba la/ /U ma grong dang byed pa la/ /urmi rlabs dang dba' klong dang / /'jug pa dang ni
<p>209a.5</p>gsal ba la/ /gos khums pa dang rtsigs pa dang / mgrin pa bteg dang btsir ba la/ /kA ma dran pa grib ma la/ /ka maM 'dod bya dga' nges 'dod/ /A ma rjes su 'dod pa la/ /kA mI 'dod dang bud med btsun/ /kA mi 'dod can skyes bur 'gyur/ /sarba nA
<p>209a.6</p>ma'i kaM zhes pa/ /rnam par rtog dang dri ba dang / /'dor dang smod dang rnam pa la/ /ki mi gser dang bu mo dang / /phreng ba A b+hA lA la'o/ /kri srin bu kI Ta dang / /rgya skyegs dang ni srin bu'i dbang / /gnyis ma nub pa rin pa dang / /g.yo ba dang ni 'gul ba la/ /kharma zer
<p>209a.7</p>na'i rab dbye la/ /ga ma a nA lo tsi ta/ /lam dang rgyan 'gyed khyad par la/ /gul+ma sdong po tsa mU ni/ /bsrung dang dmag sde mchin nad dbye/ /gul+mI A ma la kya dang / /yol ba dang ni gos kyi khyim/ /brA ma dbyangs dang 'dug gnas dang / /tshogs dang sgra sogs snga ma can/ /
<p>209b</p>
<p>209b.1</p>g+harma tshad gdung sos ka dang / /drod dang rdul gyi chu la'o/ /dzAl+ma sA ma ra dang 'khrus/ /yang dag lta bar byed pa mo/ /dzi h+ma gya gyu ta ga ra/ /dal ba dang ni 'khor lo'o/ /yung ba dang ni ljang gu la'ang / /tok+ma to k+maM/ thos dri ma/ /da ma 'du byed/ dbyug pa dang / /dul dang
<p>209b.2</p>zhal zhal la yang ngo / /dasma mi dang / chom rkun dang / /skye bo'i nga rgyal la yang dran/ /dru ma/ rkang 'thung yongs 'du dang / /mi'am rgya spos/ /ci yi dbang phyug la/ /d+harma 'tshe med bsod nams dang / /rigs pa mchod sbyin rang bzhin dang / /dpe dang / /sdom dang kun spyod
<p>209b.3</p>dang / /rigs byed mtha' dang gzhu rna ba 'byor/ /zhi ba'i btung ba sman bdag nyid/ /dri yi rtsa dang bsil ba dang / /'dul byed ming dang gzhan bstod la/ /na mi khron pa'i kha skor dang / /ti ni sha shing 'khor lo'i mtha'/ /ne ma dus dang mtshams dang dor/ /ra ba dang ni
<p>209b.4</p>kai ta ka'o/ /pad+ma pad+ma'i tshogs dang ni/ /chu skyes bkod pa grangs bye brag /gter dang pad+ma can klu'i dbye/ /pad+mA b+hA shIr dang ni dpal/ /brAt+mI dbyangs can 'dam skyes gdong / /tshangs pa'i nus ma pany+dzi kA/ /zla ba'i lcug ma yal ga'i dbye/ /b+hA ma khro ba sgra dang 'od/ /
<p>209b.5</p>b+hI ma bde 'byung spyang ka lto/ /a mA be ta sa'i shing dang / /drag po dang ni 'jigs rung la/ /b+hISh+ma 'phrog byed gAM ga skyes/ /srin po dang ni 'jigs byed ma/ /b+hU mi sa dang gnas tsam la/ /b+hau ma/ dmyal ba sa skyes la/ /b+hA ma 'khrul dang kun+d+ra dang / /zad dang chu yi
<p>209b.6</p>nges 'gro la/ /ya ma gshin rje chos kyi rgyal/ /zung dang yang dag sdom dang khwa/ /mtshe ma skyes dang / lus dang sgrub/ /bltos pa med gang dag pa'i las/ /yA ma mtshon cha yang dag 'gog /yA mi gza'/ srin mo bud med rigs/ /yud+h+ma gzhu dang g.yul 'gyed
<p>209b.7</p>pa/ /ra yA/ sbrang rtsi'i lha ma yin/ chung ma la/ /ra ma yid bsrubs mdzes pa dang / /sa skyes mya ngan med pa la/ /rasmi 'od dang rta'i srab dang / /mig gi rma dag la'o/ /rA ma da g+hu'i bu dang ni/ /drang srong ya mang ag+ni dang / /shol 'dzin phyugs kyi dbye ba dang / /shin
<p>210a</p>
<p>210a.1</p>tu yid du 'ong rnams la'o/ /rA mA bud med dang shing kun/ /rA maM gnas can ru rta'o/ /ruk+mi gser dang lcags la ste/ /ma swa tsal tsa NA ka re/ /ru mA mgrin bzang mdzes pa la/ /lak+Sh+mi dpal dang phun tshogs la/ /pad+ma br-i yang ku dang mdzes/ /ba mi nad
<p>210a.2</p>can skyugs ba la/ /nA ma g.yon dang 'phrog byed dang / /'dod dang sprin dang pra tI ba/ /bA maM gcod byed bA mA mdzes/ /sha mi phye dang 'bras bu dang / /shim+b+ha dang ni ngag mtshungs pa/ /shuSh+mi nyin mo'i bdag po la/ /shuSh+maM gzi brjid la 'dod do/ /sh+yA ma ljang gu nag po dang / /rab sbyor ba
<p>210a.3</p>Ta'i shing dang ni/ /sbal pa sprin dang byis pa rgan/ /sh+yA mA kha dog ljang gu dang / /sngo bsangs tsA grA li dang ni/ /rab tu 'gro min bud med dang / /zla ba'i 'khri shing sman dur byid/ /sI ri pa dang guN+DA dang / /mtshan mo rams dang pr-i yang+ku'o/ /sh+yA ma ma lan tshwa'i dbye ba dang / /na le shaM
<p>210a.4</p>la'o/ shrA ma ni/ /thub pa dus dang snga ma min/ /dal ba sel ba'o ma lA ni/ /'gugs dang 'dra dang / tsA gu'i zer ba'i mchan bu snang / /skye bo kun/ /sI ma mtshams dang dus dang ni/ /zhing dang dbye ba gnas la'o/ /sra ma mkha' dang 'o ma la/ /sraSh+maM chung du mngon par brjod/ /sri Sh+ma phra dang nang dag la/ 
<p>210a.5</p>sUk+Sh+ma phra dang phyi mo la/ /so ma 'od dkar bu gar 'gro/ /pha mes dang ni lha dag la/ /s+yA ma lha'i sman/ gri shing dang / /nor gyi dbye ba rlung spre'u/ /hi maM kha ba ba mo dang / /tsan bsil dang 'khyags pa la/ /ho mi dang ba dang ni mar/ /k+Sha ma sa dang bzod pa la/ /k+Sha ma bzod pa ldan pa la/ /k+Sha ma
<p>210a.6</p>zar ma phreng ba can/ /k+She ma 'thob dang bsrung ba dang / /bkra shis dang ni chom rkun la/ /k+Shai mA gtum po 'phrog byed la/ /k+Shau mi zar ma'i gos dang ni/ /du kU la yi ras la'o/ /a da ma ni smad dang dman/ /A ga ma ni bstan bcos lung / /A shra ma ni tshangs spyod sogs/ /thub
<p>210a.7</p>pa'i gnas dang tshogs khang la/ /ut+ta ma dang ut+ta maM/ /mchog dang phul du byung ba'o/ /kA la ma ni sA li 'dzin/ /brko bya 'bras dang rgya skyegs bcud/ /ku su maM ni me tog 'bras/ /dus su skyes dang mig nad la/ /kr-i tri maM ni lan tshwa dang / /sih+la ka dang bcos pa dang / /god+hU
<p>210b</p>
<p>210b.1</p>na ni/ 'bru'i bye brag /na rang+ga dang sman gyi dbye/ /go mi mi ni/ dUrbA dkar/ /'khor dang shu dag la yang ngo / /gau ta ma ni thub pa'i dbye/ /shAkya seng ge'o/ /gau d+ha mI/ /bgrod dka' dang ni gsal ba la/ /ta ni maM ni ral mal dang / /bla re dang ni zhal zhal la/ /kra Di ma ni se 'bru dang / /ka ra ka
<p>210b.2</p>dang e la'o/ /ni ga ma ni tshong dral dang / /pUrbi dka Ta lu N+TI/ /tshong pa'o ni ga ma na des/ /'ching ba dam bca' 'khrul 'khor skyob/ /nirga ma ni des 'gro blo/ /phun sum tshogs dang rigs ngan la/ /ni ga ma ni lha'i mtha' dang / /tshong ba'i grong khyer nA si ta/ /pany+tsa ma ni 'dod chags dbye/ /
<p>210b.3</p>lnga rnams dang ni rdzogs byed la/ /mkhas pa dang ni khong chud la'ang / /pany+tsa me ni skyabs seng bu/ /ba ra ni mi phul byung gtso/ /snang ba'o ba ra ma o mdzad/ /rjes gnang dang ni grangs med can/ /pra kra ma ni skabs go rims/ /nye ba'i rim dang rim pa'o/ /pra tA ba ni rjes su byed/ /so 'ching ma
<p>210b.4</p>dang so ldan ma/ /bra tha ma ni dang po gtso/ /bra harma ni khang brtsegs dang / /bum pa dang ni ri yi stod/ /ma d+h+ya ma ni yul dbus dang / /mchog dang gung dang dbus su skyes/ /ma dz+ya mA ni gnam stong dang / /rdul mthong bud med dag dang ni/ /rna ba can dang yang gsum gyi/ /sdeb sbyor la gsor
<p>210b.5</p>dbus ma la/ /bi kra ma ni rnam gnon mdzes/ /bzo dang nus pa phun tshogs la/ /be dru ma ni rin chen shing / /bi ru dang ni lcug ma sar/ /bi sbra ma ni rnam sgeg dang / /'khrul dang sgeg pa'i bya ba la/ /bi lo ma ni go bzlog dang / /lag 'gro khyi dang zhags pa la/ /bi lo mI na na tshod gnas/ /
<p>210b.6</p>bzlog dang gsod par byed pa la/ /byA ya ma ni bgrod dka' ba'i/ /kun spyod rnam 'gog skyes bu'i rtsal/ /saM kra ma ni 'gro byed dang / /chu las yang dag sgrol ba yi/ /kun spyod 'khrul 'khor dag la'o/ /sat+ta ma ni ches mchod 'os/ /mchog dang legs pa la yang ngo / /saM b+h+ra ma ni gus pa dang / /
<p>210b.7</p>skyong dang legs pa la yang ngo / /suSha maM ni mdzes dang 'dus/ /su Sha mA ni gsal ba dang / /mngon par gsal ba la yang ngo / /su Shi ma ni sbrul bye brag /su ShI ma ni rlung ser bu/ /mdzes dang 'khyags pa dag la'o/ /a nu pa ma mdzes pa dang / /stod pa dang ni srin po yi/ /phyogs kyi glang mo
<p>211a</p>
<p>211a.1</p>la 'dod do/ /a b+h+yA ga ma mthar byed dang / /shan pa 'gal byed khas blangs mtshon/ /u pa kra ma gso sbyong dang / /nyer 'dzin tsam dang rnam par gnon/ /u pa kra ma logs su 'gro/ /rang gir byas pa dag la'o/ /dza la ga ma chu'i gong dang / /chu yi bzhi mdo rus
<p>211a.2</p>sal la/ /daN+Da yA na nyin mo dang / /bum pa skyes dang kA+o nA sa/ /ba ra kra ma nus pa dang / /rnam gnon brtson pa dag la'o/ /sA bang+ga ma spal ba spre'u/ /na hA pad+ma nga rgyal can/ /ma hA pad+ma grangs dang gter/ /klu yi khyad par la yang 'dod/ /mAt+ta bA ma 'khogs pa dang / /yongs
<p>211a.3</p>su zos dang por ba la/ /sarba b+hau ma phyogs glang dbye/ /sa kun pa la yang 'dod do/ /ma mtha'i sde'o// //ya ni rlung dang grags pa dang / /thob byed gtod dang 'gro byed la/ /yA ni sa dang ma mo dang / /me dang rnga yab mUrbI dang / /mur+b+ba h+lA rnams la'o/ /dro ni lha gnas skabs gsum
<p>211a.4</p>lam/ /a nu mtshungs med dbye ba dang / /gzhan du 'gyur dang tha ma la/ /ar+th+ya blo dang rig pa dang / /brag zhun la'o ar+b+h+yaM naM ni/ /rin thang don dang mchod dang 'os/ /ar+g+h+ya sbyor ba tsam la yang / /aR+sh+ya rje bo rje rigs la/ /A byA gnas dang gtso bo la/ /A byaM gdong
<p>211a.5</p>dbus kha las byung / /i h+ya bA ma 'dod dang sbyin/ /mchod dang 'grogs dang gnas la'o/ /i b+h+ya phyug por gyur pa la/ /i b+h+yA glang po sha laM kI/ /ka n+yA bud med chung du dang / /gzhon nu ma dang khyim gyi dbye/ /sman gyi bye brag dag la'o/ /ka l+yaM tho rangs snang ba dang / /
<p>211a.6</p>nyin mo'i ka l+ye nad med mkhas/ /ka khyA skyes mchog dge pa 'chang / /ka byaM chad dang lcag 'os dang / /bar ma dang ni lcags rnams la/ /ka k+Sh+ya chen po dang ni gser/ /sked chings dang ni glang po'i so/ /kaM s+yaM khang bzang la sogs kyi/ /re mig dang ni btung ba'i snod/ 
<p>211a.7</p>gzi brjid skyes dang rdzas kyi dbye/ /rol mo'i bye brag la yang ngo / /kA ya lus dang rang bzhin 'dus/ /'bum dang lha las byung ba'o/ /kaR+YaM rgyu dang dgos pa la/ /kA bya ba sangs gza' la'o/ /ka bya gtsang byed blo dag la/ /kAM byaM gzhung gi khyad par la/ /ku T+yaM rtsig pa
<p>211b</p>
<p>211b.1</p>byug pa la/ /ku l+ya mA t+ya rigs byung dang / /rigs la shin tu phan pa dang / /sha dang nyi ma khrus gzhong dang / /kI ka sha'o ku l+yA ni/ /chung ngu bcos ma chu klung dang / /chu bo 'tsho gsil sgra sgrogs/ /kr-i t+yA/ bya ba lha dag dang / /nor la sogs pa bgo bya dang / /'phel
<p>211b.2</p>ba'i bya ba dag la 'di/ /kr-i t+yA ta bya sogs su brjod/ /kr-i yA las dang bya ba dang / /byed pa rab tu bzung dang thabs/ /rtsom pa dang ni bslab pa mchod/ /gso dpyad dang ni nges byed la/ /ga byaM rgyal bya ba lang gi/ /'o ma sogs dang mchod sbyin rdzas/ /ga bya ba lang
<p>211b.3</p>rigs pa phan/ /gu h+yaM gsang ba nyer gnas dang / /sba bya khyo shug rus sbal la/ /gu h+yA yal ga'i grong dang phug /bya dang ri dgas tshang dag dang / /bshang lam rang dbang min dang phyogs/ /ge ya glu mkhan glu dang dbyangs/ /go h+yi yon tan sbyin dang bu/ /grwa mya skyed ma bud
<p>211b.4</p>med dang / /grA myaM dga' 'brel a sh+lA la/ /tsas gdung ba tshogs dang ni/ /rtsa bar 'ching ba'o/ /tsa bya dben ba tsa byA ni/ chen po dang ni dri yi mchog /tsit+yA ro yi kha dang ma/ /tsi t+yaM gshin po'i mchod rten la/ /tsai t+yaM gnas gzhi tsi t+yA ni/ /gtsang khang phyur bu la yang ngo / 
<p>211b.5</p>tsi t+ya sangs rgyas sku gzugs dang / /shing la yang ni shin tu bsten/ /tsai t+ya dri ba rmad byung la/ /tsA t+ya brjod bya bzhin tso la/ /dpal gnas ma'o/ /tshA bA ni//tsha gdung med dang bkur ste dang / /shin tu bskums dang mdzes pa dang / /gzugs brnyan me shel gral skyong ba/ /dzan
<p>211b.6</p>ma dang mna' ma sar/ /bshes dang khol po dga' dang phan/ /skyed byed ma'o dza n+yaM ni/ /kun sbyor yongs smod tshong dus la/ dzan+yA ma dang grogs mo dga'/ /dzarlu srog chags me mchog gnas/ /dza ya rgyal byed rnam rgyal la/ /dza ya chos kyi dbye ba nad/ /u ma'i grogs mo
<p>211b.7</p>rgyal byed ma/ /phan pa dang ni ma bsrung la/ /dzA t+yaM rigs can gtso bo la/ /tAr+sh+yA bya khyung nyi ma yi/ /kha lo pa dang shing rta rta/ /rta rna la sogs la 'dod do/ /ta k+Sh+yaM mig sman khu ba la/ /tiSh+ya me tog cha shas la/ /'dzin pa la'o tra yI ni/ /de gsum rigs byed gsum pa dang / /
<p>212a</p>
<p>212a.1</p>rdzogs pa la ni yang dag 'dod/ /dras+Yu dgra dang chom rkun la/ /dA ya sol+luN+Tha bshad dang / /yau ta ka sogs nor dang sbyin/ /cha sogs rin dang ba yi dngos/ /di byaM/ lam bcas/ li shi dang / /me tog la'o di bya ni/ /skyu ru ra'o/ /di byaM ni/ /kha dog la sogs 'byor pa
<p>212a.2</p>la/ /dA th+yA gos khyim gos la ste/ /dai t+ya lha min de t+yA ni/ /chang dang gtum po sman pa yang / /dra byaM bi ru la dang 'byor/ /shing gi rnam 'gyur skyed pa dang / /sman dang sa sogs 'jig dang 'dul/ /d+ha n+ya 'bras dang skyu ru ra/ /d+ha n+ya bsod nams ldan pa la/ /d+hA naM 'bru dang so ba la/ /
<p>212a.3</p>d+hiSh+t+yaM/ rgyu skar khang pa la/ /na ya nus pa gnas dang ma/ /lugs dang pho nya'i khyad par la/ /nA T+yaM sil snyan gsum pa sgeg /ni t+yaM stag dang des pa la/ /pa th+yA a ru ral 'dod/ /pa th+yAM phan pa nyid la'o/ /ba d+ya dmangs rigs pa d+yaM ni/ /tshigs bcad pa d+yA mi yi lam/ /pa d+ya kun tu rnams 'gyur dang / /bi ting+gi'o yAM yaM ni/ /smod
<p>212a.4</p>pa dang ni btung ba la/ /pI yu nyi ma 'ug pa dus/ /pu N+yaM legs byas chos dang ni/ /bsod nams ldan dang yid 'ong la/ /pU dz+ye dang phyag 'os la/ /pe yaM btung bya'o thug la/ /de yA/ 'tshed bya dang ba snying / /prA ya phal che mang dang mtshungs/ /mal dang 'chi bdag dag /
<p>212a.5</p>la'o/ /pri ya/ dga' dang myur/ rgan sman/ /ba n+yaM/ /nags tshal las byung la/ /ba n+yA+e tshogs dang nags kyi chu/ /ban+d+h+yaM/ bud med mo gsham la/ /ban+d+h+ya/ rgyal dang 'bras med shing / /pa l+yaM gtso bo stobs byed 'dzin/ /brlu/ mchog ldan mtsho lnga pa/ /bin+d+h+yA gcod byed mdzes
<p>212a.6</p>pa la/ /bin+d+h+ya/ snum dang sun 'byed la/ /bIng+gi/ mthu dang khu ba dang / /gzi brjid dang ni nus pa la/ /ba sh+yA tshogs can ma la'o/ /be sh+yAM rje rigs ke ta na/ /b+ha yang dag po so sor 'jigs/ /rab deng / sgur 'khyogs dga' ba dang / /las dang tshon gyi shing dag la/ /b+ha bya
<p>212a.7</p>legs dang skal ldan byed/ /b+ha bye bden dang dge ba dang / /rung ba dang ni ngo bo can/ /b+hA gyAM dge ba'i bdag nyid dang / /sgrub dang dge dang mi dge'i las/ /b+h+ri t+yA 'bangs dang gla mi la/ /ma t+b+ya nya dang nga'i dbye ba/ /shing gi rgyal po la yang ngo / /ma d+h+yaM 'byar byed kun tu 'byar/ /
<p>212b</p>
<p>212b.1</p>rigs dang go skabs tha ma la/ /ma n+yu lha min mchod sbyin khro/ /ma ya bzo bo lha min dang / /glang po che dang rta la'o/ /ma yu ri dgas mi 'am ci/ /mA ya gos sar can lha mi/ /ma ya ngan g.yo brtse ba dang / /sAM pa rI dang blo dag la/ /mA l+yaM me tog phreng ba la/ /mU l+yaM
<p>212b.2</p>rin dang dngos po la/ /mri t+yu mched dang lha dag la/ /me d+h+yaM me du ra la'o/ /me d+h+yA zas dang shu dag la/ /bAR+Ya/ gtsang pa me d+h+yaM rten/ /ba yu rta dang mchod sbyin rta/ /yA myA smin byed rgyas pa la/ /yA myA ri byi tsan+dan la/ /ya gya pi wang mchog dag la/ /gA r+d+h+ya nus dang sdig pa
<p>212b.3</p>can/ /yo gya sma sa me shel lo/ /yo gya 'byor dang sman dag la/ /ra th+ya 'khyog dang bzhi mdo dang / /laM dang shing rta dag la'o/ /ra th+ya shing rta 'dren pa la/ /ra myaM yid dga' ra myA ni/ /mchog tu rnam par bsams pa'o/ /ra mya tsam+ba ka yi shing / /rU byaM gus dang
<p>212b.4</p>gser dang dngul/ /rab bzhi'i tshul dang thob bya dang / /thob pa dang ni rigs pa la/ /la ya gar sogs mtshungs pa dang / /rnam par sgeg dang ma 'dres pa/ /lak+Sh+yaM grangs dang mda' zad pa/ /khang pa la'o/ /lA byAM ni/ /sil snyan gsum pa bud med gar/ /bik+Sh+ya
<p>212b.5</p>rta yi rol pa dang / /mthong bya rmad du byung ba la/ /brah+m+yA sde tshan rab gnas dang / /baR+Ya Ta na la yang ngo / /shA ya/ mal stan/ /sbrul lag pa/ /mal dang ldan pa nyid dang yang / /sgra yi gum+p+ha la yang ngo / /shal+ya shwA bi Ta/ myos byed shing / /sha mya phur bu mda' dang ni/ /'od
<p>212b.6</p>ma'i ka m+bi kA mda' chen/ /shU n+yA sbubs can/ /shU n+yaM ni/ /skye bo med pa la 'dod do/ /sau rmyaM dpa' ba nyid dang ni/ /spyod dang shor ba la yang ngo / /saM khyaM yang dag 'gro dang grangs/ /gcig nyid sogs dang 'dor ba la'o/ /ta ya 'jig rten las pha rol/ /sa t+ya bden pa bden
<p>212b.7</p>ba zung / /lha rdzas la'o sa t+yA skad/ /sa t+yaM de ldan mtshams dang bsags/ /chu klung dbye ba kun 'dzin dang / /dam bca' bsam pa khrims lugs la/ /sa bya g.yon phyogs nye ba la/ /sha byaM mtshon cha 'bras yon tan/ /rdo ba bdun dang sauD+ha bya/ /nai ru dz+ya dang bzod pa la/ /sa d+h+ya rnal 'byor
<p>213a</p>
<p>213a.1</p>dbye ba la/ /tshogs dang lha'o bsgrub bya la'ang / /sA ya mda' dang phyi dro la/ /sruR+Ya nyin mo'i de'i dga' ma/ /sman gyi dbye ba la suR+YA/ /se byaM bsten 'os 'dam bu byings/ /bsten pa'o so myA mdzes 'khri shing / /s+the ya mdun na 'don la'o/ /smaya rtsod pa'i tshig gtan 'bebs/ /
<p>213a.2</p>sgrol ba snyems dang rmad du byung / /hAR+Ya pa ru ra yi shing / /'phrog bya la'o hri d+ya ni/ /dbang du byed dang rig byed sngags/ /rig pa dang ni sman la'o/ /hr-i d+ya 'tsho ba brgya pa dang / /snying dga' ba dang snying po la/ /k+Sha ya 'god dang bskal ba'i mtha'/ /gnas dang skyes bu'i khyad par la/ /ad+ya ya ni sun
<p>213a.3</p>'byin dang / /bka' dang rim 'das 'jig pa'i dbyug /a d+hi Sh+ya ni tshugs pa med/ /spungs chen chu klung khyad par la/ /a na ya ni phongs pa dang / /skal ba lugs dang mi dge'i gnas/ /a pa taM ni bu mo gu/ /a b+ha ya ni 'jigs pa med/ /ab+ha ni ya'o ba na pa la/ /a b+hi ya ni u shIr/ /
<p>213a.4</p>a b+hi khyA ni/ /snyan dang grags/ /bzang po rnams grags ming rnams la/ /a ba d+yaM ni bsad 'os dang / /don ma yin dang spyo ba la/ /a shwI ya ni rta'i tshogs dang / /rta la phan pa'o a ha l+ya/ /lha dang dpal mo'i dbye ba dang / /gau ta ma yi btsun mo'o/ /ma hA rma ni ri dang brtan/ /A ti thugs ni
<p>213a.5</p>shen pa'i bu/ /shen pa la'o A ter yI/ /me tog can dang rgyun shes bu/ /'bab chu'i khyad par dag la'o/ /A trai ya ni thub pa'i dbye/ /A di t+ya ni nyi ma lha/ /am+na ya ni man ngag thos/ /A sha ya ni bsam pa dang / /gzhi rten gzhan la brten pa'o/ /A shra ya ni bang mdzod dang / /margas pa
<p>213a.6</p>dang ci 'chad ma'o/ /in+d+ri yang ni sems la ste/ /in+d+ri ya ni yul dbang byed/ /u da ya ni shar ri 'char/ /a bA ya ni mnyam 'byed sogs/ /thabs dang nye bar bgrod pa la/ Ur+NA yu ni ba la ldan lug /lwa ba skad cig 'jig pa la/ /ai n+ya yaM ni e n+yI lpags/ /dga' ba 'ching ba'i
<p>213a.7</p>khyad par la/ /au tsi bye ni grol de nyid/ /bden pa dang ni rung ba la/ /kam+ba ya ni niR+Ya ma/ /bcud kyi dbye ba byug pa dang / /'dod chags yan lag dri bzang dmar/ /kA le ya ni lha min dbye/ /kA me yaM ni dus dum bu/ /ku lA ya ni sngon po bzhin/ /'dab chags sngon po dang ni gnas/ /
<p>213b</p>
<p>213b.1</p>kau kr-i t+ya ni rjes su gdung / /mi rig byed pa dag la'o/ /gAM ge yaM ni mu sta ka /gser dang ka ste ru Sha'o/ /gAM ge ya ni sde tshan dang / /'jigs sde dang ni gAM ga'i bu/ /tsak+Shu She ni ka Ti ka /pad dkar shing dang mig sman bcud/ /ku sha l+yaM ni skal bzang dang / /mig la phan pa'o tsa m+bi
<p>213b.2</p>ya/ /sh+ya pa ka dang 'jig byed mda'/ /me tog ge ser gser la'o/ /dza g+ha nyaM ni tha ma smod/ /lhag ma'o dza TA yu bya'i dbye/ /gu gul shing ngo ta pa s+yA/ /tshangs spyod dka' thub skar ma dbo/ /de ba yu ni chos ldan dang / /de ba yA tri ka la'o/ /dwi tI yA ni ches dbye dang / /sa le
<p>213b.3</p>rdzogs par byed pa la'o/ /nA de yi ni rgyal ma dang / /sba yi dzam+bu chu'i lcang ma/ /nI ka ya ni bdag nyid khyim/ /dza bA ni rang+ga gi guSh+Tha/ /chos mthun nges 'bab mtshon cha dang / /'dus pa dang ni 'dres pa la'o/ /nyai pa th+yaM ni tshos byed pa/ /rab tu sgrub par byed pa la/ /ba ya s+ya ni'o
<p>213b.4</p>thug dang / /mdog bzang 'o ma bzhon ma dang / /'o ma phan nga'o baR+Ya dang / /gnas dang 'brug sgra sgra 'byin la/ /ngaR+YA ya ni rnam grangs dang / /sprul pa rab 'byed mda' la'o/ /sA nI ya ni btung bya chu/ /bA ru Sha ni phur bu la/ /bA ru Sh+yaM ni rtsub pa dang / /brgya byin gyi ni tshal la'ang
<p>213b.5</p>yang / /pu lap+d+ya ni mi ci'i dbang / /'od yangs tsha'o mgrin bcu la/ /bra tIrle ni lag skyes rul/ /cho ga nges par bkram pa la/ /pra na ya ni dga' ba dang / /bi shram+b+ha dang slong ba la/ /pra NA ya ni sreg la 'dor/ /yang dag mi 'dod mngon par brjod/ /pra t+ya ya ni mna' gtan
<p>213b.6</p>tshigs/ /shes dang yid rton nges pa dang / /sI n+tA di khyA ta tA dang / /bu ga gnas spyod rag las la'o/ /pra ma ya mchi bskal pa'i mtha'/ /brgyal bar gyur pa rnams la'o/ /pra pa bya ni lam mthun dang / /rang bzhin ldan pa'o/ /pa la ya/ /gdu bum mgul nad/ kaM ka Na/ /
<p>213b.7</p>bA le ya ni bany+dzi kA/ /bong bu ba si hi ta pa/ /bra h+ma n+ya ni sa nu dang / /br-i Sha tshangs pa'i legs pa la/ /brah+ma N+yaM ni bram ze dang / /bram ze rnams kyi tshogs pa la/ /b+hu dzi Sh+ya ni grogs ngan dang / /lag pa'i srad bu'o b+hu dzi Sh+yA/ /rag lus man dang rje rigs bran/ /b+hU ShA ts+yu ni 'od
<p>214a</p>
<p>214a.1</p>chen 'dod/ /bsil pa'i 'od zer rnams la'o/ /b+h+rA tri bya ni/ spun zla'i/ thu/ /maM ga l+yaM ni zho bkra shis/ /yid 'ong la'o mang+ga l+yAM/ /dpal 'bras dang ni a shwa d+tha/ /ma sU rA dang skyob byed la/ /maM ga l+yAM ni gsal ma dang / /me tog brgya pa br-i yang
<p>214a.2</p>gu/ /thur bltas me tog zhi ma dkar/ /dung gi me tog shu dag rnams/ /ma la ya ni yul ri'i dbye/ /kun dga' ra dang ri yi cha/ /dur byid la yang ma la yA/ /mr-i g.yu ni bram zer brjod/ /go ma mu ni nad dag la/ /ra ha s+ya ni sba bya la/ /ra ha s+yA ni chu
<p>214a.3</p>bo'i dbye/ /lo hi d+yaM ni dmar po dang / /'bru dang chu bo'i khyad par la/ /bak+ta bya ni smod dang dman/ /rag las pa'o ma dA h+ya/ /ngag bzang po dang gcod byed dang / /rnam par rgyal dang rgyal ba'i lam/ /bi dza ya ni gau rI dang / /de yi grogs mo chos dbye la/ /bi
<p>214a.4</p>na ya ni drul dang lugs/ /dra ba la'o bi sha l+ya/ /mo yi gtsug phud glang po dang / /gu DU tsi dang dur byid dang / /zug rngu bral ba la yang ngo / /bisma ya ni rmad byung snyems/ /bi Sha ya ni spyod lam yul/ /dbang po'i don la'ang nges par 'jug /'brel pa sogs kyi shes
<p>214a.5</p>pa'ang dran/ /bya bA ya ni rab dga' dang / /mi snang ba la yang dag dran/ /bya bA yaM ni gzi brjid la/ /shiN+Da yaM ni/ /thub pa'i dbye/ /dpal 'bras dag byed khyad par la/ /shA l+ya yaM ni me tog brgya/ /sha'o skyes pa la yang ngo / /shrIR+Sha n+ya ni rnam par rgyas/ /skra dang rtse mo
<p>214a.6</p>can la'o/ /shai le yaM ni rgya mtsho'i tsha/ /ta la'i 'dab dang brag skyes la/ /shwa shurlu sgyug mo dang / /bum pa dang ni sh+yA le ka /pan+na ya ni rgyab gnas dang / /stobs dang lugs dang 'du ba'o/ /sa ma ya ni grub mtha' dang / /mna' dang kun spyod yang dag rig /des bstan
<p>214a.7</p>bya ba'i rnam pa dang / /dus dang brda rnams la yang ngo / /sa raN+D+Yu ni chu sbyin dang / /rlung dang nus pa/ rung ba stobs/ /bau ni a nA ya pa/ /phag gi bya ba la yang ngo / /sau ra b+h+yaM ni dri bzang dang / /mdzes dang yon tan gus pa la'o/ /saM s+t+ya ya ni kun tu 'jug /dbyibs
<p>214b</p>
<p>214b.1</p>dang rgya che mgrin pa la/ /tir N+yaM ni mi zad rdzas/ /mchog dang gser dang khu ba dang / /nga rgyal dbye ba la yang ngo / /hri de yaM ni snying po snying / /k+Shi pa N+yaM ni dri zhim lus/ /k+Shi tra ya ni gzhan lus dang / /gso spyad 'os dang zhing dang rtsa/ /gzhan gyi chung ma dga' ba
<p>214b.2</p>dang / /bsgrub bya dang ni nad dag la/ /a nu sha ya rjes su gdung / /rjes su 'brel dang zhe sdang la/ /an+ta sha yA 'chi ba dang / /sa yi mal dang dur khrod ma/ /g.yas bral g.yas min mi mthun pa/ /a ba bya na snyems ni na/ /u pa kAR+Ya ltami bdag gnas/ /phan
<p>214b.3</p>par byed pa'i dbye ba la/ /kA tra be ya zha nye dang / /sha tshe dang ni mtshon dag la/ /u ba kra ya gso spyad dang / /rtsom pa dang ni gsod pa la/ /zla ba'i na tshod bla re dang / /bdag nyid dang ni sman gyi dbye/ /dzA lA sha ya chu yi gzhi/ /dza la sha yaM 'dam bu sbyin/ /
<p>214b.4</p>taN+Tu li ya byi dong ga'i/ /shing dang chung du mA ri la/ /gdung ba rtsa dang stong pa dang / /ka ta ka'i 'bras phreng ba yangs/ /d+ha naM dza ya rta dang lus/ /glang po rlung me ka ku b+ha/ /ni ra ma ya skyon med rtog /pa ri bA ma chu yi gnas/ /naM ta m+ba dang / /yongs su bkab/ /pAny+tsa
<p>214b.5</p>dze n+ya hri ThI ka sha /dung dang bA Ta ga la'o/ /bau ru She ya skyes bu'i rtsal/ /tshig dbye tshogs ba gsod pa dang / /skyes bus byas pa rnams la'o/ /bi ta bA yaM 'jigs pa dang / /'jigs rung pra ti shra ma ni/ /'dun sa dang ni gnas la'o/ /pha laM da ya 'bras
<p>214b.6</p>bu rnams/ /'byung dang rnyed dang sum rtsen la/ /pi le sha ya byis ba sprul/ /b+hA ga d+he yaM skal ba dang / /lag pa dang ni cha la'o/ /b+h+ri tan+d+r-i ya byed pa dang / /sgra dang spyod yul 'dus pa la/ /ma hod bo yekun 'byung dang / /byang grol du mo rgur mo la/ /ya hA lam gtsug
<p>214b.7</p>lag khang / /mu stegs khang dang mchog bdag la/ /ma hA mU l+yi rin thang che/ /pad+ma rA ga la sogs la/ /mAdzA ri ya dmangs rigs dang / /byi la bya ba spyod pa la/ /ra te N+ya ya rab 'phyang gsod/ /lhag pa dang ni ne'u le/ /sa muts+tsha ya sbring dang 'gog /sa mu dA ya
<p>215a</p>
<p>215a.1</p>tshogs pa dang / /kun tu sbyor dang nye ba'i rim/ /sa mU dA ya tshogs brid sgra/ /sam+ba ra ya g.yul 'gyed dang / /rgud dang phyi ma'i dus dag la/ /sa lang+ga ya sgra dang ming / /rol rtsed phyugs dang bya dag la/ /s+thu'u lots+tsha ya mtha' dag ni/ /shing dum rdo ba za ma tog /glang po rnams kyi bar ma la/ /
<p>215a.2</p>a ku to b+ha yaM zhes pa/ /lha khang a kIn+di shIka /kA lA nu pAR+YaM ni shing / /shi sha ba dang dus skyes dang / /ri las skyes pa rnams la'o/ /dug+b+ha tA lI yang zhes pa/ /A ma'i 'o ma 'o ma'is/ /dbu ba can dang de nas ni/ /'o ma'i tsam sa dang ni/ /ta ta paN+Da kI Ta'o/ /pra ba tsa nI ya zhes pa/ /brjod bya'i
<p>215a.3</p>rab dang rjod byed rab/ /pr-i Sha ka bA yI zhes pa/ /dpal mo go rim 'tsho byed ma/ /brgya las mchog tu gyur ma'o/ /pa t+yung+ga ma nI yaM ni/ /nye bar gnas bya sbyang pa'i gos/ /bi shwa k+sen bri yA ni/ /pad+ma ma dang skyob byed la/ /ya mtha'i sde'o// //ra ni 'dod me me dang rno/ /rwa ni a rtog ser dag la/ /
<p>215a.4</p>ru ni sgra dang 'jigs dang cha/ /ri ni nyin byed sa la'o/ /gro ni bcod bya 'tshod byed la/ /g+h+rA ni sna dang snom byed dang / /dra ni shing dang nyin mo dang / /gser dang 'dod pa'i gzugs can la/ /shrI ni dpal mo dbyangs can dang / /mdzes dang shes rab thang shing dang / /'jug pa sde gsum phun
<p>215a.5</p>tshogs dang / /cha lugs dang ni phan byed dang / /sru ni 'dzag dang chu 'bab sgra/ /hri ni/ bi Da ngo tsha la/ /a graM gtso bo mchog dang ni/ /rtse mor gyur dang lhag pa sogs/ /mdun dang stobs dang nga rgyal dang / /bram ze mdzes dang 'od dag la/ /mchod dang 'degs pa dag la'o/ /ang+ga ma
<p>215a.6</p>sri m+be khAN+Di swa rno/ /ma d+ho ri he ri skyes la'ang ngo / /ran+t+ra myur ba 'khyogs lus dang / /myur bar 'gro ba dag la'o/ /a shraM dmar dang gsol la'o/ /a shra zur dang skra la'o/ /a s+t+raM mtshon cha gzhu gnas phyin/ /A rA pags pa 'bigs pa la/ /A rA sa skyes spen pa la/ /
<p>215a.7</p>a ru shing gi dbye ba dang / /spe'u dang ni mche ba can/ /in+d+ra brgya byin mun pa nyid/ /rnal 'byor dbang po gdengs ka la/ /i ra bcud dang 'khor dang 'dzin/ /mi mnyam pa yis rnams la/ /u gra drag go bod pa dang / /dmangs rigs bu dang 'phrog byed la/ /u gra shu nag sbrid pa
<p>215b</p>
<p>215b.1</p>dang / /rnga mo glang mo che mo la/ /uSh+Ti pa lang skyong ma la/ /u sra 'od la u srA ni/ /ba lang steng skyob dag la'o/ /ai n+d+ri bya rog rgyal byed la/ /e dra dza pA'i shing dang ni/ /chang gi khyad par dag la'o/ /aMg+h+r-i rkang pa praM thu bo/ /ka dru gser dang ser skya la/ /ka ri lag pa 'od char rdo/ /kA ra bsad
<p>215b.2</p>pa ma mo ri/ /nges dang so sor 'bad pa dang / /stobs ldan la'o sA rA ni/ /gnyen dang grong khyer 'ching ba dang / /gser dang byas pa gzir ba dang / /pho nya mo dang rab bsten pa/ /kA ru bzab dang / /byed pa po dang las kun pa/ /kA ri bya ba nA pi ta/ /kI ra ljongs dang ne tso
<p>215b.3</p>la/ ku ru mi bdag khyad par zas/ /dpal mgrin dang ni dug sel la/ /kr-i ts+tshaM dka' tshegs sdig pa dang / /kun tu gdung ba la sogs la/ /kru ra drag po rtse med do/ /kroSh+Ti/ ce spyang 'o ma dang / /rnam par 'joms dang be da'i shing / /kha re bong bu lha seg dang / /
<p>215b.4</p>rnon po'i kha ru so med sbrul/ /dkar po lhan cig ko la'i 'dab/ /ga ra nad kyi khyad par la/ /ga raM dug dang nye dug byed/ /gA traM glang po mchog dang lus/ /byin pa la sogs yan lag dbye/ /gi ri ri dang ri ldan dang / /'dzin khri mig dang 'jig pa dang / /skad dang
<p>215b.5</p>tshig dang dbyangs la yang / /ku ru bsten bya sogs byed dang / /bram ze sogs dang lha sngags pa/ /chen po g.yo ba du rdzar/ /guN+d+ra gzi brjid can la'o/ /gun+dA 'bras gang bla sgang dang / /br-i yang ku dang gar 'khyog la/ /gr-id+h+ra lu ba'i bye brag go/ /go tra sa 'dzin go traM
<p>215b.6</p>rigs/ /k+Sha tra dang ni ming la yang / /sred pa gnod pa zla ba dang / /lam dang nags tshal dag la yang / /go drA ba dang ba lang tshogs/ /go ra mtshan mor byed pa dang / /skya rengs re dkar rnam dag la/ /go ri ri yi bu mo dang / /chu lha mo dang 'jigs pa'i skal/ /
<p>215b.7</p>chu klung / ri mo skyed ma dang / /dmar ser gsal 'dod pr-i yang ku/ /gau raM/ rnam 'jig /dkar po dang / /yungs kar pad+ma can dang mtsho/ /g+ha pra nyin mo 'tshe ba la/ /g+ho ri 'jigs pa mngon par brjod/ /u ma'i ming / /g+ho ra mdud can/ /tsa kra naM/ /dur pa dang ni tshogs pa la/ /
<p>216a</p>
<p>216a.1</p>tsa kre shing rta'i yan lag dmag /grong gi dra ba chu yi 'khor/ /ku la la dang bya ba sgrub/ /snod dang yul 'khor mtshon cha'i dbye/ /rtsi traM sna tshogs rmad byung dang / /kun nas bris dang thig le mkha'/ /tsi tA/ rgyu skar thos byed ma/ /lag 'gro
<p>216a.2</p>dang ni lha mo'i dbye/ /byi ba'i lo ma go Tu mab/ /bzang mo dang ni glang mo'o/ /rtsi raM wa sta gtsug phud dang / /zha nye dang ni ba'i nu ma/ /tsi ri kats+tsha Ti dang ni/ /kA pi ni dang / tsi kra dang / /skyur ba chu yi lcang ma 'o/ /tsu shrI/ tsag dang / tsu gri ni/ /skyu ru ra yi shing la 'dod/ /tsi tra zla
<p>216a.3</p>ba ri'i dbye ba/ /shi ba dang ni mchod rten la/ /tso ra chom rkun dung bzang po/ /r+ts+tsha che gdung sgrib pa la/ /che trA sbrang rtsi can dang ni/ /g.yer ma dang ni dbang po'i brag /dzA ra tshim byed bdag po la/ /rdzA ri nges dang sman bye brag /dzI ra zir ral gri dang / /TA ra
<p>216a.4</p>mtshon dang mgyogs 'gro la/ /tin+t+ri gtso po grub mtha' dang / /thos pa yal ga'i khyad par dang / /bran bza' 'dzin dang bstan bcos dang / /rgyu dang yongs su 'gebs pa dang / /srad bu ldan dang / rkyang pa mchog /grub pa dang ni sgrub byed thabs/ /tan+t+ri
<p>216a.5</p>rig dang yon tan dang / /tshig dang / gu DU rtsI dang ni/ /mig dang rab tu rings pa la/ /ta ri gos sogs sgrom/ gru/ sgam/ /tA naM zangs dang skya rengs dmar/ /tA ra shin tu mtho dang gzhu/ /mu tig la sogs legs dag dang / /sgrol dang dag dang grol ba la/ /tA raM
<p>216a.6</p>dngul dang skar ma dang / /mgrin bzang bla ma bud med dang / /sangs rgyas can 'khrungs lha mo dang / /mig gi dbus kyi 'bras bu la'o/ /tI ra dka' thub 'gram ngogs dang / /shar dang nub kyi de dag go/ /tI praM shin tu bod pa dang / /tshang ba dang ni mig de ldan/ /
<p>216a.7</p>hI bri dur ba'i ta zer dang / /dri yi du rbA dag dang ni/ /'od ma can dang rab skyes la/ /to traM 'joms byed skrag dang dor/ /da ri ri sul cung zad don/ /da pra bong bu rta dag la/ /da ru lha yi shing dang shing / /dwa raM sgo dang khas len la/ /d+hu ra rus sbal phyugs dang gsod/ /
<p>216b</p>
<p>216b.1</p>ras bal d+ha ra 'dzin ma dang / /snying po'i gzhi dang sa la'o/ /d+hA drI sgyur dang sha ma/ /nye ba'i ma dang ke ta tI/ /d+h+wa ra 'dzin ma phun tshogs char/ /dwa na phreng ba/'tshe ba rdzas/ /'gro ba rta 'gros rnga pa can/ /ral gri sogs kyi kha dang ni/ /dmag rtse mig
<p>216b.2</p>deng gong bye brag /yung ba dang ni mtshan mo la/ /d+hi ra mkhas brtan yangs dang 'jam/ /d+hI raM/ gur gum na bkra ni/ /zab mo la'o na tra ni/ /sna yi rtse mo drag po la/ /nA ras dang rgyal ba mi/ /mA rA ma dang ga bur la/ /nA ra rgyud bA na chu nA pra/ /mtshan
<p>216b.3</p>mo'i bdag po'i ni pri ni/ /stobs can dang ni mu khyud dang / /nam gru dang ni nags tshal la/ /ne traM mig dang shing gi rtsa/ /gos dang yon tan shing rta gar/ /ne rta dar dang 'dren byed brjod/ /pat+t+ri lo ma 'dab ma mnga'/ /phyogs dang 'dren pa'o pa ra mchog /bdag
<p>216b.4</p>nyid 'di dang lkog tu gyur/ /pa raM mi zad 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /pA tri snod dang blon po dang / /rung dang 'gram gnyis khyad par dang / /blugs gzar sogs kyi 'dab ma dang / /phan tshun 'gram gyi khyad par la/ /pA rI sdig srin rdzogs pa dang / /bAn+ta dang ni pA ra ba/ /
<p>216b.5</p>glang po'i rkang pa'i thag pa la'o/ /pun+ta lha min bur shing dbye/ /pad+ma dkar po dang ni 'bu/ /khra bo dang ni gnas ma dang / /sa dang chang la'o su raM ni/ /grong khyer skya nar bu dang khyir/ /steng khyim grong dang lus la'o/ /pu ra gu gul bu rA ni/ /sngon dus pu ru mtho ris dang / /mi bdag khyad par bra h+ya'o/ /
<p>216b.6</p>pa rA chom rkun pu ra ni/ /phye ma'i bye brag chu 'bab dang / /rma ni yang dag 'khrud pa la/ /bo traM gos dang gdong gi rtse/ /phag pa'i mchu la'ang dang ba ltar bar bya/ /paur grong na brjod par byed/ /pau raM rtsa'o/ /ba kra ni/ /dal bal 'gro ba'o ba kraM naM/ /'phar ma'i dbye ba rjod par byed/ /ba kra 'khyog dang khro ba la/ /ba d+h+ru grong
<p>216b.7</p>dang mig dag la/ /ba d+hu thub pa phra mo dang / /ne'u le rkang ga/ /rdo rje dang / /dmar ser dang ni yangs pa la/ /bar bu mo'i bdag po dang / /Shi lga lha la sogs dang / /bslu/ /yongs su bskor ba la 'gyur ro/ /ba raM gur gum la 'dod do/ /gtso bo yid kyi khyad par la'ang / /bi rA 'bras bu gsum dang gru/ /ba rI ba rgyal las 'doms ma'o/ /
<p>217a</p>
<p>217a.1</p>bA ra nyi ma sogs nyin dang / /sgo dang / skabs dang 'phrog byed la/ /b+ha ra shir sgur chang snod tshogs/ /bA ri glang po'i chings sogs lus/ /bA ri lha mo dbyangs can ma/ /ba ri ngo tsha shes dang chu/ /bA sra nyin mo/ /ba saM ni/ /myos byed yan lag bzhi mdo'i lam/ /bI
<p>217a.2</p>ra shin tu dpa' dang rdzogs/ /bi raM rtsa dang ba'i raM mi/ /chu shing gam+ha rI dang ni/ /tA ma la dang la bA lu/ /k+ShI rI pI dang / kA ko lI/ /'o ma bdag po bu ldan ma/ /u dum+ba ri ba lang lhas/ /'o ma rnam par 'joms pa la/ /bren+ta sbyin byed/ /brgya byin sogs/ /'joms dang sprin dang
<p>217a.3</p>sgra rnams la/ /b+ha dra 'phrog byed dga' spyod dang / /shing dang ma ru ka dan+d+ha/ /glang po gtso bo legs pa la/ /b+ha dri byed pa'i dbye ba dang / /bla sgang bde ba gser rnams la/ /b+ha drA 'dor byed/ /sman dang phra/ /ma gug pa dang kaT+pha la/ /b+ha ra shin tu phul byung bur/ /b+ha ru spun zla
<p>217a.4</p>gser la'o/ /b+hA ra gsod bral/ ba lA ni/ /gser dang khri phrag gnyis la'o/ /b+hi ru dbang por 'dam pa dang / /'jigs dang nA si ka'i bye brag /b+hU ri brA r+dz+ya/ /gser dang / /tshangs/ dbang po dang ni dpa' ba la/ /man+tA rig byed khyad par dang / /gsang ba smra dang
<p>217a.5</p>lha sogs sgrub/ /ma ru mya ngam ri skyes la/ /mA traM mtha' dang des bzung la/ /mA traM yongs su 'gebs dang 'byor/ /nga rgyal nyung dang rna rgyan dang / /yi ge'i lus so mA ra ni/ /bgegs dang 'chi dang lha br-i Sha/ /mA ri gtum po skye ba zad/ /mi tra grogs po nyi ma la/ /
<p>217a.6</p>mI ra/ 'od zer ri bo chu/ /mu ra/ lha min/ /gsod pa la/ /yA tA ltad mo 'gro dang 'gro/ /lha yi dga' ston dag la'o/ /rA Sh+TaM yul skyed pa dag la/ /ru ru ri dgas lha min dbye/ /re traM/ khu ga bdud rtsi dang / /dngul chu gos kyi gnas la'o/ /ro d+hA/ rngon
<p>217a.7</p>pa'i bu/ lo d+haM/ /rgya skyegs/ /sdig pa/ /sgrub pa bral/ /ro trAM gtum mo/ /rau tra ni/ /drag po dang ni 'jigs su rung / /dbang po'i dbye ba dang ni sgo/ /bkraM badzra rgyud can smad/ /badzra dbyig dang / rgyags dang ni/ /byis pa dag dang skyu ru ra'o/ /ra bra pa dang
<p>217b</p>
<p>217b.1</p>'gram la'o/ /k+She tra yid dang rdul dag la/ /geraM lus dang kha bye rlung / /bya gra go bzlog yang dag la brugs/ /byA g+h+ra gud dang ka rany+dza/ /khrag ldan sgo nga'o/ /bya g+hi ni/ /reg dang gtso bo gzhan gnas so/ /sha bkra brgya byin/ srid sgrub shing / /rta tri bde sogs
<p>217b.2</p>bdag po sprin/ /ga ru/ rdo rje khro bo la/ /tsA ra gzi brjid cher ma la/ /sha ri chu dang gri la'o/ /sastI gri dang mtshon cha lcags/ /shar khra bo dang ni rlung / /shA ri bya dang mdog dmar ser/ /'thab dang glang po bgrod pa dang / /'dogs dang byed pa dag la'o/ /shA traM
<p>217b.3</p>ka dang bstan pa la/ /shi gru som nyi yal ga la/ /badzra lus dang snying po la/ /shi g+h+ra myur dang sgrol ba la/ /shu kra pa sangs ma gtso bo/ /shu kraM ku ba mig nad dang / /dkar po la'o shub+h+raM sprin/ /sgron me dang ni dkar po'o/ /shu ra mdzes dang dpa' bar bshad/ /
<p>217b.4</p>sU ra nyi ma la yang blta/ /sha traM mchod sbyin rtag tu sbyin/ /ke ta ba dang gnas dang nags/ /sa ra do shal stag pa'i rtser/ /sAM traM 'thug po dang ni sa/ /nags tshal rnams la'o bA raM ni/ /rigs pa chu dang nor la'o/ /sA ra rkang mar cha shas rags/ /pi bra tshad gdung dang
<p>217b.5</p>ni chu/ /pi pra chu klung khyad par la/ /sI ra thong gshol nyin mo'i bdag /su ra lha'o su rA ni/ /chang dang btung ba snod dag la/ /sU traM mtshon byed dang ni gzhu/ /snal ma dang ni rnam gnas la/ /s+thi raM g.yo med thar pa dang / /shala'i 'dab ma sa la'o/ /s+phar rnam par gtsigs pa
<p>217b.6</p>dang / /spyi blugs sogs dang chu bur bdag /sa ra a yig la sogs dang / /mtho ba sogs dang bar ma sogs/ /sgra med 'jigs dang rlung la'o/ /swa ri rang 'dod dang ni dal/ /swa ru rdo rje mchod sbyin 'da'/ /khur ba dang ni dum bu la'o/ /ha ri khyab 'jug yongs dbang dang / /zla
<p>217b.7</p>ba rlung dang dbang po me/ /gshin rje sbrul dang sbal pa spre'u/ /rta dang ne tso 'jig rten dbye/ /dmar ser dang ni 'phrog byed do/ /hA ra mu tig phreng mtshon cha/ /hi sraM/ bya rog 'bras bu sha/ hi praM 'joms par byed pa la/ /hI ra pI sI li kA dang / /dpal dang rdo rje bde byed la/ /ho bA ri mo'i
<p>218a</p>
<p>218a.1</p>bye brag dang / /bstan bcos dbye ba khyim dang ni/ /dus sbyor phyed pa rnams la'o/ /k+Sha ra sprin dang k+Sha raM chu/ /k+Sha ra 'chir bu thal ba dang / /bcud dang ngan pa lan tshwa la/ /k+Shi raM 'o ma chu dag la/ /k+Shu tra chung ngu tha ma dang / /khro dang ser sna
<p>218a.2</p>dag la'o/ /k+Shu trA rje rigs ma gar ma/ /lus bral bcud 'joms chen mo'o/ /ho shA kaN+Da kA ri dang / /caM ge rI dang ma k+Shi ka /k+Shu ra nA si ta phan byed/ /bze ma dang ni a mab ra/ /k+She traM lus dang chung ma dang / /zor ba grub pa gnas rnams la/ /k+Shau tra 'o
<p>218a.3</p>ma la yang ngo / /aM gu ra ni shing sha pa/ /yang+ka ke dang yang ba'o/ /ang+ku ra ni myu gu dang / /sbu dang chu dang khrag la'o/ /aM gA ra ni mi shes dang / /bkra shis dang ni ma po ba/ /a dzaM ra ni rlung bud med/ /lus kyi yul dang da rdar/ /an+di ra ni skyes bu
<p>218a.4</p>nus/ /a d+ha ra ni so dang gnas/ /dma' ba dang ni brla med la/ /a d+ha ra ni sa'i bye brag /mi shes pa dang lhur len la/ /an+ta ri ni khyad par dang / /khyad par can dang go skabs dang / /bdag dang bdag gi bral ba dang / /nang dang phyi dang bar dang mtshams/ /
<p>218a.5</p>de yi don ched skabs bu ga /sa pa raM ni dus bab don/ /glang po phyi nas lus la yang / /a nA tse dang ne tra brjod/ /a ba ra ni dga' ba dang / /srid pa ma dang tha mar brjod/ /a ba ri ni glang po che'i/ /byin pa'i mtha' dang phyi ma bsal/ /a ba ra ni lha rus pa/ /
<p>218a.6</p>bsdus pa rdo rje ljon shing la/ /a mA rA ni dbang po'i grong / /du rbA ka ba gu TU ci/ /am+ba ri ni gos ras bal/ /nam mkha' chags pa dri bzangs la/ /sgrib byed sgo glegs a ra raM/ /a su ra ni srin po me/ /lha min nyi ma dag la'o/ /a k+Sha raM Ni
<p>218a.7</p>tshangs pa dang / /mkha' dang yi ge dag la'o/ /A ka ra ni skye dang gnas/ /des 'bab gtso bo 'dod par bshad/ /A kA ra ni zur gyis mtshon/ /dbyibs dang 'bod pa dag la'o/ A dA ra ni rten gzhi dang / /gzhi dang chu 'dzin rnams la'o/ /
<p>218b</p>
<p>218b.1</p>A sA ra ni rab 'byams dang / /'dzin ma dang ni char ba dang / /mdza' bshes dang ni stobs la'o/ /aM gu ri ni rab rib dang / /'khrugs dang rab stobs legs pa la/ /A hA ra ni bza' ba dang / /za ba 'phrog dang sdud pa la/ /i ta da ni sA ma ra/ /gzhan
<p>218b.2</p>dang grub dang nad med myur/ /i twa ra ni rwa 'bigs dang / /dma' ba lam pa 'khrugs pa'i las/ /i shwa ra ni nor phun tshogs/ /zhi ba/ rje bo yid srub la/ /I shwa rI ni rje mo dang / /dkar mo dbang mo skem byed ma/ /at+ta ra ni tshig tha dad/ /
<p>218b.3</p>rgyal po'i sras dag la yang ngo / /ut+ta ra ni byang dang steng / /phyi ma dang ni bla ma'o/ /u da ra ni lto ba dang / /'thab dang ngos 'dzin spyod skad cig /u dA ra ni gcod byed la/ /chen po yon gnas rigs pa la/ /an+da rA ni sa gzhi dang / /lo
<p>218b.4</p>thog thams cad za ba la/ /chu rgyun/ dus mchod dri k+Sha riM/ /au shI ri ni rtse gcig dang / /tA na gcig dang ma 'khrugs pa/ /rnga yab yu ba gcig brjod dang / /mal stan dag la'o/ /kats+tshu ri/ /sA ma na dang g.yo ba 'o/ /ka ts+tshu rA ni/ /ngan pa rnyed/ /
<p>218b.5</p>ngan rig/ /rtse mo/ shi m+bi dang / /sa rI'o kany+dza ra ni sgra/ /nyi ma tshangs pa thub pa lto/ /ka T+wa ri ni 'khor lo 'dod/ /smad pa'o de nas ka T+wa sU/ /ram+baM shI pa mig sbyin dang / /bden bral dang ni lang tsho can/ /ka Ti traM ni skyed gos dang / /gser can pags pa'i
<p>218b.6</p>yan lag la/ /ka DA ra ni dmar ser dang / /'bangs dang dmar ser mdog dag la/ /ka Ni ru ni dong ka dang / /glang mo dang ni 'jug pa la/ /ga ne ru yang de nyid la/ /ka da ra ni seng ldeng gi /bye brag sog le nad dag la/ /shre na/ ri sul kan+da ra/ /kan+da ra dang / /kan+d+hA rA/ /sprin dang
<p>218b.7</p>mgrin pa dag la'o/ /ku ra ra ni bya dbye khyi/ /sog le long ba/ ka rI ra/ /'od ma'i myu gu bum pa dang / /shing gi dbye ba la yang ngo / /ka ba rI ni skra'i bkod pa/ /yal ga'i dbye ba la yang ngo / /ka ba raM Ni lan tshwa dang / /skyur dang gser dang ras yug la/ /kar+par na ni khur ba dang / /
<p>219a</p>
<p>219a.1</p>mtshon cha'i bye brag gzhong pa la/ /karka rI ni ga lan+ti/ /srin bu me long brtan pa la/ /ka rI rI ni sbrang chung dang / /so yi rtsa ba glang po che/ /karbu ra ni srin po dang / /sdig pa chung dang / gser la'o/ /karbu rI ni nag /po'i tshogs/ /karbu
<p>219a.2</p>ra ni khra bo la/ /karbu rA ni ce spyang la/ /ka rbu raM ni stag la'o/ /ka la traM ni yang yang za/ /bgrod dka'i gnas dang chung ma sked/ /kAn+ta ra ni nyer 'tshe sogs/ /mdzod dang byed pa'i khyad par la/ /kA n+tA raM ni bgrod dka'i lam/ /dgon pa chen po la yang ngo / /kA be re
<p>219a.3</p>ni chu klung dbye/ /yung ba lta ba/ /bud med do/ /kA smI ri n-i gur kuM la'o/ /tsi ku ra ni g.yo ba 'od/ /khyim dang yangs pa lag 'gro dang / /ri byi shing gi khyad par la/ /tshi twa raM Ni gcod byed rdzas/ /ngan pa dang ni sdang ba la/ /tshi di ra ni snang ba che/ /pa bash+gu d+ha dang ral
<p>219a.4</p>gri/ /thag pa la'o dza Tha raM/ /lto ba/ /srab bcings pa la/ /rdzaM bi rang bzhin/ /dza m+bi ri'i/ /shing dang bre dang me tog dag /dzardza ra ni rnying pa dang / /hrul po gnas kyi rgyal mtshan la/ /rdza len+tA ni chu lha dang / /rgya mtsho dang ni rmugs 'dzin dang / /dza su ri ni rdo rje thog /dz+ha dz+ha ra ni
<p>219a.5</p>rtsod pa'i dus/ /rol mo'i dbye ba shing khyad par/ /dz+ha la rI ni sil khrol dang / /bcings dang rol mo hu DU ga/ byis pa 'khor lo 'dzin la'o/ /Da ga ra ni/ TaM gan+Da/ /Ti ra dang ni/ ku re dang / /rnam par 'khor ba spyod yul la/ /TaM gA ra ni siM dza nI/ /sgra dang rab grags
<p>219a.6</p>ngo mtshar la/ /bring+gi ra ni dor bya la/ /tiM ga ra ni skyug pa dang / /Ta T+Tha rI ni 'phyang ba dang / /dmag rda/ rol mo brdzun smra la/ /ta mi pha raM Ni rab rib khro/ /ta mi shrA ni/ /mun mtshan mo/ /mun pa bstod pa'o/ /tit+ti ri/ /bye'u dang ni thub pa la/ /ti mi raM ni mun 'tshub
<p>219a.7</p>dang / /mun pa dang ni thibs po dang / /sred pa dang ni sprin nag la'o/ /tam+bu tI ni shu lI dang / /A DU dpal yon dag la'o/ /tu ShA rang bzhin kha ba'i dbye/ /bsil bar byed pa dag la'o/ /b+hU pa ra ni bska ba dang / /rwa dang chu mchog smra ra mi/ /twa kyan+t+rA ni lag pa tsan/ /
<p>219b</p>
<p>219b.1</p>ta kyan+ta ni yan lag mchog /dan+d+ha ra ni rdza mkhan gyi/ /'khor lo 'dren dang glang po myos/ /mda'i 'khrul 'khor dag la'o/ /dan+tu ra ni mi mnyam dang / /mtho dman can gyi so dag la/ /da ha ra ni/ rdzun can dang / /no bo dang ni nag po can/ /da rta ra ni ri yi dbye/ /
<p>219b.2</p>cung zad zhig pa brjod par byed/ /dardu ra ni sA la pa dang / /ma la ya dang sil snyan dang / /b+haM dra ri yi dbye ba la/ /da ru rA ni dbyig dang shel/ /grong gi dra ba/ durdu ra/ /dA se ra ni 'bangs 'os bu/ /du rdu raM Ni gzung dka' dang / /khyu mchog sman dang / /lha min
<p>219b.3</p>sogs/ /sum rtsen khyab 'jug /gnyis ldan dang / /the tshom dang ni zung la'o/ /d+hU pa ra ni khong bu dang / /nyung ngu dang ni rab mtha' la/ /na ren+d+ra ni sa yi mgon/ /dug gi sman pa gcod byed pa/ /narma ra ni nyi ma rta/ /dbu ba/ rus sbal ba mo me/ /narma rI thuni/ glang
<p>219b.4</p>po dang / /ri sul cha med/ mu ra lA/ /nA ga ra ni/ grong khyer 'dzin/ /mkhas dang / /yangs pa dag la'o/ /nA ga raM ni gla sgang dang / /bca' sga/ dga' ba 'ching ba la/ /ni ka ra ni/ tshogs snying po/ /rigs kyi sbyin bya tshogs bye brag /ni ka ra ni 'byor pa dang / /
<p>219b.5</p>dpal yon dang ni rnam 'god la/ /nirdza rA ni rgas med dang / /pi sha ga dang rgas 'dor dang / /ta la'i 'dab dang gu DU rtsi/ /nirba ra ni 'dzem med dang / /'jigs med/ snying po mkhregs pa la/ /ni Sh+Thu ra ni 'dzem med swa/ /ni ba ra ni tshong pa dang / /dngos po
<p>219b.6</p>can no buM ku ra/ /zam pa them skas/ chu bal dang / /chu yi sgur 'khyog dag la'o/ buM dza ra ni lus la ste/ /pany+dza raM ni bya yi snod/ /pa dA ra ni rkang pa'i rdul/ /rkang par gos pa rnams la'o/ /pa bi traM ni/ zangs dang chu/ /chos ldan dang ni gtsang byed dang / /gtsang
<p>219b.7</p>ma la'o/ /ba TI ra/ /zor ba dang ni rtsa/ ba can/ /mchil pa 'od ma rdul snying spyod/ /bA n+Du raM ni kha dog dang / /ma ru ba kaM de ldan la/ /sA ma ra ni dman dang rmongs/ /mkha' la gnas pa la yang ngo / /parba ra ni rgyal po yi/ /mchod sbyin 'jigs dang zan snyigs la/ /
<p>220a</p>
<p>220a.1</p>pidze+e ni thal pa dang / /mI tra ral pa/ ni pa ka /mnga' rnams la'o piny+dzi raM/ /gser dang ser po rta'i khyad par/ /bi Tha ra ni snas la'o/ /pi Tha raM n-i bsrub pa dang / /mu sta'o/ /piN+DI ra zhes pa/ /ma he skyod dang yal ga 'dor/ /pI pa ra ni
<p>220a.2</p>rus sbal rgyab/ /puSh+ka raM Ni mkha' dang / chu/ /glang po/ /lag rtse pad+ma dang / /chags pa mtshon dang sa dang sman/ /gling dang 'gram gyi dbye ba dang / /mtsho mda' ral gri 'bras bu dang / /rol mo snod dang / kha rnams la'o/ /pra ka ra ni/ ku ru m+ba/ /rab bkram
<p>220a.3</p>me tog la sogs la/ /pra ka raM ni/ dzong+ga ka /shes bya'o pra ka rI zhes pa/ /bzhi mdo dang ni nags tshal la/ /pra kA ra ni 'dra ba dbye/ /prA kha ra ni shin tu rtsub/ /rta la sogs dang go cha dang / /dre'u dang ni khyi la'o/ /pra da ra ni nang dbye ba dang / /
<p>220a.4</p>sha ra b+ha dang / glu dag la/ /prAn+ta raM ni ring dang gtong / /lam dang nags tshal bas mtha' la/ /pra ba rang ni rgyud dang rigs/ /pra ba ra ni mchog la'o/ /pra sa ra ni yang dag gsal/ /shugs dang rab tu 'dren pa la/ /pra sta ra ni nor bu thob/ /pany+tsa ra ni lci ba
<p>220a.5</p>dang / /sbubs dang / tA la'i lcug ma la/ /pra sa ra ni ba ko Ta/ /s+Tha shi kA rany+dza dang rigs/ /pa da raM Ni rgya shug dang / /shing bal dang ni 'bras bu la/ /ba da rA ni e la'i 'dab/ /khyab 'jug gnon dang sman la'o/ /ban+d+hu ra ni 'ching ba dang / /dga' dang so sor
<p>220a.6</p>'ching ba la/ /ba d+hu rA ni mkha' 'gro la/ /ngang pa dang ni bud med mchog /ba ra tA na mtshan khung dang / /'jug pa tsam la'o barba ra/ /skra'i bkod par sig dman pa la/ /barba rA ni pany+dzi kA/ /yal ga me tog dag la'o/ /bA ga ra ni mi med dang / /shA
<p>220a.7</p>g+ha spyod pa rlung dkris dang / /smra 'dod dang ni 'jigs med la/ /bA sa ra ni nyin mo chags/ /pA su rA sa dbang ni k+Shu/ /b+hArlo ru ni rtse mo la/ /gang gi /su pa mchog bud med/ /de ni ri dgas ri'i dbye ba/ /b+hA ska ra ni nyi ma me/ /b+h+raM gA ri ni bung ba la/ /b+h+r-i ga ra ni gser
<p>220b</p>
<p>220b.1</p>spyi blugs/ /'dod can bung ba b+ha ra'o/ /rdo ba sbrang bu b+h+ra ma ra/ /ma ka ra ni mi la 'dzin/ /gter dang / khyim gyi rab dbye la/ /bas ku ra ni mu ku ra/ /me long ba ku ra yi shing / /sdong bu me tog ku lA la'i/ /bal+lA ka'o/ /many+dza rI/ /snye ma mu tig sbom po dang / /
<p>220b.2</p>ti la ga yi ljon shing la/ /ma t+sa ra ni dge dang sdang / /lam dang 'thab mo 'o ma t+sa rA/ /ser sna dang ni sbrang bu la/ /ma dA ra ni sin+d+hi pa/ /ngan pa la'o mad+d+hu tra/ /bung ba dang ni 'od ldan la/ /ma d+hu ra ni ma sha ste/ /ma d+hu raM N-i dug bye brag /ma d+hu ra ni bcud phra mo/ /mi dga'
<p>220b.3</p>ba'o ma d+hu rA/ /sbrang gi spal mo me tog brgya/ /grong gi dbye ba dag la'o/ /de bzhin sbrang ldan shing dang ni/ /ni ste yA dang tshem bu la'o/ /man+da ra ni mtshon byed dang / /mdzod dang srub par byed pa la/ /man+d+ra ra~M` ni le brgan rtsi/ /man+tha ra ni myos byed dang / /'khor
<p>220b.4</p>lo dang ni yangs pa la/ /man+da ra ni mtho ris dang / /man+dA ra dang srub byed ri/ /man+da ra ni dal dang 'bras/ /man+da ra~M` ni grong khyer dang / /khang pa'o man+da ra zhes pa/ /chu srin gnas la'o man+dA ra/ /lha shing yongs bzangs/ /arka'i 'dab/ /maM du rA ni rta'i ra ba/ /nye
<p>220b.5</p>ba'i don can dngos po la/ /ma yu ra ni gtsug phud ldan/ /marma ra ni gos sgra med/ /lo ma sgra mang gos kyi dbye/ /marma rI ni shing ser po/ /ma sU ra ni sran chung dang / /mtshungs pa dang ni bud med do/ /ma hi ra ni tha snyad rgan/ /ma han+d+ra ni gnas dang ri/ /ma Tha
<p>220b.6</p>ra ni nyi ma yi/ /'od skor dang ni bya'i bye brag /mAr+sA rA ni byi la dang / /kha d+dza sha'o mu di ra/ /'od ldan dang ni sprin la'o/ /mung+ga ra ni bong ba sogs/ /'joms dang thabs min me tog dbye/ /mur mu ra ni nyi ma ta/ /ba mo med dang zhi gnas la/ /mu hi ra ni rgyags
<p>220b.7</p>dang rmongs/ /ru d+hi ra ni gur rku khrag /ru d+hir ra ni sa dga' byed/ /ba Tha ra ni sra ba dang / /g.yo ba baSh+Ta dag la'o/ /bak+ka ra ni bzhon pa lug/ /ba l+lu ra ni sha skam sha /mche ba can no ba l+lu raM/ /nags kyi zhing dang 'bab pa la/ /bal+la rI ni snye ma dang / /sha skam la'o ba l+la
<p>221a</p>
<p>221a.1</p>ra/ /ne'u gsing dang ni chu mdo gnas/ /tsi lu'i zhing dang sman ljongs la/ /ba shi raM ni rgya mtsho'i tsha/ /b+ha ga NaM d+ha ka dang ni/ /ki Ni hI'o ba rAM raM/ /chu dang g.yas 'khyil dung la'o/ /guny+dza dmar po'i sa bon dang / /'bu skyes la yang blta bar
<p>221a.2</p>bya/ /bas ru ni bdug pa dang / /bya yi gnas dang khyim bum pa'o/ /bi kA ra ni mi sdug nad/ /rnam par 'joms dang 'joms byed sgra/ /bi du ra ni paN+Di ta/ /Shilga ko ra bA na'o/ /bi d+hu ri ni so sor 'gro/ /phral ba dang ni ma tshang ba/ /bi du ra ni bcud len la/ /bI ba ra ni
<p>221a.3</p>khung bu ga /'jug pa ro dang dong la'o/ /pi sa ra ni rab 'byams 'gro/ /bsti ra ni rgya che spros/ /yangs pa'i bi stA ra zhes pa/ /lo 'dab rgya chen khebs pa'o/ /biSh+Ta ra ni ku sha'i khres/ /stan dang sa la skyes pa'o/ /bI hA ra ni 'khor ba dang / /phung po bde gshegs
<p>221a.4</p>rol pa'i gnas/ /sha kA rI ni sdeb sbyor dbye/ /chu bo'i dbye ba ska rags la/ /sha shA raM ni chu dbus sgang / /dun+d+ra rI ni 'gram la'o/ /shaM ka raM ni ri sras ma/ /mgon mo dge ba byed pa'o/ /sharka rA ni gseg ma dang / /ldan pa'i yul dang ras bal can/ /bu ram/ 
<p>221a.5</p>dum bu/ rnam 'gyur dang / /rdo ba mdzes pa'i dbye ba la/ /sarba rI ni thun gsum ma/ /yung ba dang ni bud med la'o/ /sha wa ra ni kla klo'i dbye/ /bde byed dang ni chu la'o/ /sha kA ra ni glang la ste/ /shA kA raM ni sdeb sbyor dbye/ /shAM ka ri ni bgegs kyi bdag /
<p>221a.6</p>skems byed la'o shA rI ra/ /lus skyes dang ni glang la'o/ /'o ma'i lbu ba sharka ra/ /'joms byed mun nag sharba raM/ /shA rA raM ni 'doms sen mo/ /skas dang 'dab chags gzeb la'o/ /shA ba ra ni rgya skyegs shing / /sdig pa dang ni sgrub bral la/ /shA ba rI ni gra
<p>221a.7</p>ma yi/ /shim+ba zhes bya'o shA ba raM/ /de yi ngo bo la yang ngo / /sha kha raM ni ri shing rtsa/ /mchan khung thal mo mtha' rnams la/ /se 'bru smin pa'i sa bon dang / /nor bu can dang mtha' dag la'ang / /shi lin+da ni nya'i dbye dang / /shing gi dbye ba dag la'o/ /shI
<p>221b</p>
<p>221b.1</p>lIn+d+ri ni ka ra ke/ /dngos po'i me tog grong gsum pa'o/ /shI lIn+d+ri ni bya mo'i dbye/ /rkang rings dang ni sA la'o/ /shi shi ra ni dus las te/ /ba mo can dang 'khyags pa la'o/ /shI ka ra ni khra bo dang / /rlung dang 'gro med/ chu can la'o/ /shu Shi raM ni khung bu
<p>221b.2</p>can/ /nIg+na dang ni/ bu ga can/ /shrIM gA ra ni rab dga' dang / /gar gyi nyams dang glang po'i rgyan/ /priM gA raM ni phyi ma dang / /sin+d+hU ra dang li shi yi/ /me tog la ni 'jug par 'dod/ /shwa shu ra ni khyo shug gnas/ /shwa shu rA ni tshangs ldan sman/ /saM
<p>221b.3</p>ka ra ni me de byes/ /kun nas byi dor byi dor bral/ /mi sun 'brin pa'i bu mo la/ /sa kA ra ni zhes 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /saM ga ra ni mdangs dam bca'/ /bya ba'i rnam pa dug dang phongs/ /saM ga raM ni/ bgrod bya 'bras/ /sa b+hA ra ni bsags dang tshogs/ am+ba
<p>221b.4</p>ra ni ri dgas dang / /sa 'dzin lha min nya dang ni/ /rgyal ba'i khyad par dag la'o/ /saM bA raM ni chu dang ni/ /sangs rgyas pa yi brtul zhugs nor/ /saM ba rI sman dbye ba la/ /sa mu draM ni lus mtshan nyid/ /sa mu TI ya mdzes sogs la/ /sA baM trI ni lha yi dbye/ /sA bi
<p>221b.5</p>tri/ sA ban+tI'i bdag /sin+d+hU raM ni shing gi dbye/ /sin+d+hU raM ni bye ma dmar/ /sin+d+hU ri ni d+hA ha kI/ /slag pa dmar po mdzes pa la/ /sun+da ri ni gtso mo'i dbye/ /su nA ra ni khyi'i nu ma/ /sbrul gyi rgyan dang bi ka'o/ /se ri n+t+rI ni gzhan khyim gzhan/ /shi bya kring dang / rang dbang
<p>221b.6</p>ngo / /saM ka raM ni kha dog byed/ /rgan po chen po'o/ /sau bI raM/ /kI dzi kaM dang mig sman rgyu/ /rgya shug dag gi yul la'o/ /saM ska ra ni nyams myong dang / /kun tu rtogs dang so sor 'bad/ /saMsta ra ni gral mchod sbyin/ /tiN+DI ra ni dbu ba dang / /bA na phiM ga na zhes pa'o/ /
<p>221b.7</p>a klu pA ra chu yi/ /mgon dang rus sbal rgyal po la/ ag+ni hA+o tra me la ni/ /me yi sbyin sreg sbyin pa la/ /a nut+ta ra gtso bo dang / /so so'i tshig ni rnams sangs la/ /a gro pa ni byang phyogs dang / /go bzlog pa dang bla na med pa/ a ti sa ra bcings dang 'khrug /rang stobs
<p>222a</p>
<p>222a.1</p>dang ni 'jigs bcas la/ /a b+hi hA ra mngon sbyor dang / /chom rkun dang ni bzod pa la/ /a ru ska ra/ b+hal+lA te/ /rma byed shing dag rjod par byed/ /ar+d+ha tsan+d+ra zla dum dang / /mgrin par lag pa mda'i bye brag /zla phyed zla/ kham dur byed dbye/ /a laM kA ra
<p>222a.2</p>rgyan dang ni/ /dpe dang yon tan dag la'o/ /a ba sa raM sngags kyi dbye/ /rab tu stong dang char dag la/ /a ba tA ra 'jug pa dang / /mu 'gri dang ni 'obs la sogs/ /a b+ha ra gdon chom rkun/ /'khrug pa rgyan po sogs rnams 'khor/ /a ba ska ra bshang lam
<p>222a.3</p>dang / /gsang ba nges 'bod nyer 'gro la/ /a sha ta ra be'u dang / /glang po rta yi khyad par la/ /a si pa tra dar gying bu/ /dmyal ba'i khyad par dag la'o/ /a Dam+ba ra glang po che'i/ /dbang po'i sgra dang sil snyan sgra/ /pra bany+tse ra tsa nA dang / /yang dag brtsams
<p>222a.4</p>pa dag la dran/ /at+ma bi ra srog chen po/ /sh+ya la'i bu dang sun 'byin la/ /in+dI pa ri ut+pal/ /in+dI pa rA/ /ba b+h+yi mo/ /u dum+ba ra skye bo'i 'bras/ /lus 'dzin yangs ba'i grogs po la/ /u dum+ba ri zangs dang ni/ /ru rta'i dbye ba dag la'o/ /u dum+ba ra shin tu
<p>222a.5</p>mtho/ /gcig pa dang ni mi bzad pa'o/ /u pa ga ra me tog sogs/ /'thor dang phan par byed pa la/ /u pa ka ra nye ba dang / /yongs su bgegs dang phan byed la/ /au dum+ba ra shing zan lnga/ /nad kyi dbye ba la yang ngo / /ka TaM b+ha ra rab 'bab dang / /snar ma glang
<p>222a.6</p>po bud med do/ /ka lim+ba ka zlum po dang / /char skyes dang ni mUr ba la/ /ka ra bI ra rta gsod pa/ /lha min dbye ba rta dag la'o/ /bu bcas lha skyes gtso bo dang / /ba lang rnams la'ang de bzhin no/ /rgan chen ma dang mchod pa la/ /ka ra bI rI 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /
<p>222a.7</p>kar+Na kA ra gi mA ka'i/ /shing dang u tA la la'o/ /kar+Nu pU ra ut+pa la/ /snyan gyi gong rgyan phal cher dang / /rgyan mchog rnams la blta bar bya/ /karma ka ra gla mi dang / /glas 'tsho ba dang las pa'o/ /marbA dang ni gzugs can la/ /karma kA rI 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /ka li kA dang
<p>222b</p>
<p>222b.1</p>d+hu ma pa Ta/ sen mo dang ni lag skyes so/ /kA dAm+pa rI gzhan gzung ma/ /bur chang dbyangs dang bya ri skegs/ /kA li dza ra rnal 'byor pa'i/ /'khor lo 'du dang 'jigs byed dbyangs/ /kum+b+ha kA ra rdza mkhan rigs/ /kr-iSh+Na sa ri ri dgas dang / /snum pa dang ni ne sha ba/ /gi
<p>222b.2</p>ga d+ha rA ri yi bu mo/ /mgon po dang ni chu'i mgon po/ /gi ri sA ra lcags skyas dang / /ma la ya yi ri bo la/ /gr-i hA rI ra la bas 'gebs/ /'degs dang ru rta'i yan lag la/ /ga na sA ra ga bur dang / /dngul chu g.yas su 'khyil ba la/ /tsa kra d+ha ra khyab 'jug dang / /lag
<p>222b.3</p>'gro grong gi dra ba la/ /tsa rA tsa ra sa gzhi dang / /zur gyis shes dang 'gro ba la/ /tsarma kA ra l+h+wa ma mkhan dang / /pags pa'i las can sman la'o/ /tsi tra T+ri ra mtshan mo'i bdag /dril bu'i rna ba don nges 'joms/ /'gro byed zur gyi thig le can/ /dza Ta TI ra ral
<p>222b.4</p>pa dang / /ko ka Na dang ri sras bdag /rkang 'thung rnams kyi mdun skyes dang / /snyan tshig rigs byed sa skyes la/ /ta la pa trI raN+Da la/ tA la pa tri rna rgyan la/ /tung+ga b+ha dra chu'i bye brag /tuM ga b+ha dra myos shing gtsigs/ /tuN+Ta ki TI ras bla dang / /gzugs can
<p>222b.5</p>la'o/ /de nas ni/ tu lA d+hA ra mtshungs pa'i khyim/ /tshong pa'o to ya d+ha ra ni/ /sprin dang / /gla sgang gser bzang po'o/ /daN+Da d+ha ra gshin rje dang / /sa dag daN+Ta d+hA ra ni/ /gshin rje mi bdag dbyug pa yi/ /sol khang sogs dang phreng ba dang / /them skas dang ni yol khang
<p>222b.6</p>mchog /da sha pu ra yul dang grong / /ba lang gi ni sgra dag la'o/ /di gam+pa ra zang byed pa/ /gcer bu/ /mun pa mdung can no/ /du ro da raM tha snyad dang / /cho lo rgyan po 'gyed pa la/ /de ha yA tra/ gnam lcags 'chi/ /de ma tu ra glang po'i gdong / /sems can
<p>222b.7</p>rgan po'o de nas ni/ /d+ha ra d+ha ra ri khyab 'jug /pA ra d+ha ra chu'i bzhon pa/ /ral gri'o d+ha raM ku raM ni/ /ka ra kA dang pI ka ra/ /shI ra 'o d+hArtu raSh+Ta na/ /mchu rkang nag po'i dang ba dang / /ko ra ba dang sprul pa la yang / /d+hu raM d+ha ra zhes pa ni/ /d+ha ba'i shing dang d+h+ru rba ha/ /d+hUn+d+hu
<p>223a</p>
<p>223a.1</p>mar brgya byin dang / /tshig bsrung khyim dang du ba dang / /rkang pa ldan pa rnams la'o/ /d+hi ta rASh+Ta ma can dang / /bya yi bye brag rgyal po bzang / /d+h+ri ta rASh+Ti ngang pa dang / /gnas rnams dang ni sman la yang / /na b+haSh+tsa ra sprin dang rlung / /bya dang / /rig
<p>223a.2</p>pa 'dzin pa la/ /ni shA tsa ra sbrul dang ni/ /nor dang he ra rdo rje ma/ /ni shA tsa rI 'ug pa la/ ni Shad+d+ha ra za byed sbrul/ /ni Shad+d+ha ri 'dam mtshan mo/ /nI lAm+ba ra gdug pa la/ /spyan log mdzad dang rab 'phyang gsod/ /ro za'o pa yo d+ha ra ni/ /chu 'dzin dang ni be
<p>223a.3</p>ta'i shing / /ku ba zegs ma/ ru li dang / /kA sha byed pa rnams la'o/ /pa re ba ra che'o sogs/ /ri dgas dbye ba dag la'o/ /pa ri pa rA rgyud dang ni/ /yongs su rgyud dang gnod pa la/ /pa ri ka ra brtul zhugs dang / /skyil krung dang ni 'khor rnams dang / /rtsom dang
<p>223a.4</p>lus ldan 'ching ba dang / /yongs su 'gebs dang dben pa la/ /pa ri bA ra 'khor dang ni/ /ral gri'i shubs dang yongs 'gebs la/ pa ri pa ra lha dang ni/ /brin pa 'chi ba phyogs re ba/ /pak+Sha tsa ra zla ba dang / /khyu smin yangs pa/ /rims glang po/ /pA Ta TI ra chu snod
<p>223a.5</p>dang / /sho gam pa yi bya ba dang / /lcags kyi sil khrol sha yi zas/ /dza hu'i snod dang dag byed la/ /bA rA bA ra chu klung mgon/ /pha rol tshu rol 'gram dag la/ /pA ri b+ha dra ni m+ba'i shing / /man+dA ra yi rkang 'thung la/ /bI tAm+ba ra khyab 'jug gar/ /pI ta pA ra ba lang tshim/ /
<p>223a.6</p>nor bu ma la ya skyes la/ /pUr+Na pA trA yongs gang snod/ /'o ma skyes pa la sogs dang / /smod dang / /rnga dang / spel byed la/ /pra tI hA ra cho 'phrul mchod/ /sgo dang sgor gnas bar med la/ /pra ti sa ra/ sde dang rgyab/ /kaM kar+Na dang rma khru dang / /sngags dbye chen po dang ni
<p>223a.7</p>rgyan/ /lag pa'i srad bu ngas shes bsrung / /pra tI kA ra/ phyir bcos dpe'i/ /pra b+hA ka ra nyi ma ma/ /ba kra na kra ne tso ngan/ /pa la b+ha drA gzhon nu ma/ /skyob byed dang ni stobs la'o/ /barba Ti ra ka thub pa'i/ /phyur bu'i gnas kyi myu gu dang / /tshogs can ma yi bu mo la/ /
<p>223b</p>
<p>223b.1</p>bA ra kI ra mchu rnon dang / /nges par rgyas dang rta la'o/ /bi ra b+ha dra/ /rta yid gzhungs/ /rta dang dpa' bo chen po dang / /dpa' byed bIng ta ra ni/ /dpal gtso dpa' byed guN+Ta la/ /ma Nits+tshi tra tshil bu dang / /khyu mchog zhes bya'i sman la yang / /ma hA pI ra mkha' lding dang / 
<p>223b.2</p>dpa' bo mgrin ldan sgra dang thog /spre'u nyi ma mkha' yi me/ /dza rA Ta ka rnams la'o/ /ma hA mA tra/ glang po skyed/ /yan lag 'byor dang blon po la/ /ra tha kA ra ma he dang / /glang mo skyes dang de'i skad cig /rAg sU traM ras bal skud/ /dar skud dpyid dang cha shas dang / /
<p>223b.3</p>dung dang ga Ni pa tri ka'o/ /lang+ga kha ru mar me tshig /da shAM she Sha dag la'o/ /lam+bo da ra 'ching byed dang / /ha la gnas dang lto ba 'chang / /lag+mI pu tra 'dod rdzogs rta/ /bA ta pu tra khram chen dang / /ha nU man dang 'jigs sde la/ /ban+du tan+d+ra snying po yi/ /'bras bu can dang
