<p>223b.4</p>yan lag bzhi/ /bi b+hA ka ra 'od chen dang / /rnam par snang byed dag la'o/ /bi b+hA ka rI mun sel ma/ /yung ba dang ni rnam gsal byed/ /rgol ba'i gos dang / luN+TI dang / /kaT+Ta li dang bud med 'khyog/ /bi shwam+b+hA ra 'phrog byed dang / /brgya byin bi shwam+b+hA ra sa/ /bi shwa
<p>223b.5</p>ka dru ngan pa sgra/ /kun nas rko dang khyi la'o/ /bI ti ho ta nyi ma che/ /bi tra ho tri nyin mor byed/ /bya ti ka ra phongs pa dang / rnam par thogs pa dag la'o/ /bya ba hA ra tha snyad dang / /shing gi bye brag gnas la yang / /sha ta pa tra gyes pa'i brgyal/ /shing ldan bum pa gtsug
<p>223b.6</p>phud can/ /sha ta pa tri rgyal 'dra ba/ /sha tA pa rI legs spyod dbang / /shi lu mA ra chu'i spre'u/ /bdag sgrol ba dang 'phrog byed la/ /sa mu drA ru zam pa 'ching / /'dzin bri ti miM gi la'o/ /saM pra hA ra 'gro dang 'chag /sa ha tsa rI dz+hi N+TA'o/ /sa ha tsa ra lang tso dang / /so sor
<p>223b.7</p>byed pa dag la'o/ /sA la sA ra/ shing kun shing / /su ku mA ra 'jam pa la/ /sU tra d+hA ra/ shing mkhan bzo/ /a nan+t+rar pho ba gar/ /snod kyi dbye ba brgya byin la/ /s+thi ra daMSh+T+ra lag 'gro dang / /phag gi dbyibs 'dra'i seng ge la/ /ut+pa la ba ni zhes pa/ /ut+pa la'i tshogs
<p>224a</p>
<p>224a.1</p>mnyam pa/ /mtho ris gar ma ser skya 'dzin/ /mu stegs can gyi khyad par la/ /tA mA lA ba tri zhes pa/ /thig le tA pany+tsi 'dab can/ /tA lA shi pa traM zhes pa/ /tA ma la kI tI lA pa/ /pA da cau dwa ra zhes pa/ /pi spa la dang / ka ra ka /
<p>224a.2</p>ra dang / /shaika rta la'o/ /gzhan skyon gcig tu gsal byed dang / /de la brtson dang mi la 'dod/ /pI ta kA pa raM zhes pa/ /mkhris pa 'dzin dang gur kum la/ /pA shu tsA ma ra zhes pa/ /rdul sel ba dang rab bstod la/ /ra sa ke pa ra zhes pa/ /ba ku la dad be d+ha ka /klu
<p>224a.3</p>shing me tog rnams la'o/ /rA dza pa dA raM zhes pa/ /la pa l+li'i 'bras skyu ru dmar/ /ro ma ke sa ra zhes pa/ /ba spu langs pa la 'dod do/ /ba swo kasma rA zhes pa/ /dpal sbyin gyi ni pad+ma can/ /lcang lo can gyi grong khyer la/ /pi pra tI sa ra zhes pa/ /'gyod dang / 
<p>224a.4</p>khro dang phra rgyas la/ /sa ma b+hi hA ra zhes pa/ /yang nas yang du nges don can/ /sarba to b+ha dra zhes pa/ /snyan ngag sgra dang phug bye brag /sarbo to b+ha dra zhes pa/ /dma' dang zas dang bud med gar/ /zhes pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las re
<p>224a.5</p>pha'i mtha' can gyi sde'o// //la ni dbang po lA zhes pa/ /sbyin pa dang ni 'byor pa la/ /li ni thiM pa la yang ngo / /lu dang lU ni gcod pa la/ /Am+la ro yi rab dbye dang / /Am+bI tsAd+ge ri ka sman/ /a li bung ba dang ni tshang / /A li bsod snyoms len pa la/ /Am+bI btung
<p>224a.6</p>ba bsam pa yang / /a lu ga ya ni ka'o/ /b+he la ka kaM nga la'o/ /i lA ba lang sa bdud rtsi/ /dbyangs can zla ba bud med la/ /Do la 'dod dang 'gro ba la/ /ka la snyan dang gsal ba'i sgra/ /ma rnyings cha dang dkar ba la/ /ki lA bcu drug cha phyi mo/ /rU la don dang rgan
<p>224a.7</p>po dang / /bzo bo dang po'i cha dang ni/ /dus kyi khyad par can la'o/ /ka li nang gi mchod sbyin dang / /'khrug pa rtsa ldan dge sbyin la/ /kA la dus dang 'chi ba dang / /nag po che dang gshin rje dang / /za byed dang ni nag po la'o/ /kA lI nag mo ma mo'i dbye/ /dkar
<p>224b</p>
<p>224b.1</p>mo sprin sar/ legs 'gyur dang / /kA Ta dang ni pa bA da'o/ /kA la dur byid nag po dang / /rams dang le brgan dag la'o/ /ki lA ka pha/ nges 'joms dang / /'bar dang yang dag skum pa dang / /ku li/ rang skyes mchod sbyin dang / /dus kyi yan lag
<p>224b.2</p>khyim dang tshang / /kU laM mthun pa sde dang ni/ /rgyab bcas sri pa lteng ka la/ /ko la mtshon byed skyong ba dang / /phangs pa ko Da b+he la byed/ /gyol po'o ka laM ut+pa la/ /ko la drod sman dbyibs mo dag /ka la g.yon can tha shal dman/ /kha laM pa dang gnas
<p>224b.3</p>la yang / /rnyog pa dang ni lo thog la 'ang / /kha lu pags pa gzhol ba dang / /gos dbye khye'u tsA ta ka /khal+lI lag pa rkang pa dag /nyer ba dang ni nad la'o/ /khi laM ma thogs snying po dang / /kun tu bcug dang 'bigs pa la/ /ga la mgrin pa/ spos dkar
<p>224b.4</p>bcu/ /sA la'i pung po sa skyes la/ /go lA po dA ba rI yi/ /grogs dang go la'i 'dab mig sman/ /go laM riM pa'i tshogs dang ni/ /nor bu can dang dkyil 'khor la/ /tsa lA g.yo 'gul pad+ma/ glog /khebs la'o/ /kIl+la ma nyams dang / /rgyal ba dang ni gos la'o/ /
<p>224b.5</p>tsal+lI rigs dang gzhi can la/ /kIl+lA gos dang g.yo ba la/ /tsa lu/ rul tsul+lI ni/ /bsag pa bsam gtan rol mo la/ /tsA+ol+la/ gos dman/ smad pa la/ /tshal+lI me tog dbye ba dang / /ba ku la/ rgyud rnams sgrogs so/ /tshal+la 'degs dang / zol dang g.yo/ /dza laM
<p>224b.6</p>chu mer/ chu/ 'khyil/ 'khyogs/ /dzA laM/ ko ra kA/ dra mig /dam+b+ha/ prind dag la'o/ /dzA li khebs kyi dra ba dang / /nye ba'i dra ba shing dag la/ /dz+hA lA/ tshad gdung rlabs lu mo/ /'jigs pa'o dz+hal+lI tshad pa'i nad/ /dz+hi ru ka dang / 'jug dang / nyal/ /ta la rol mo ta la ni/ /
<p>224b.7</p>ral gri'i chang zung 'joms byed glang / /nags dang byi'u dbyangs chu 'dzi/ /tal+lI bye ma ta lu khung / /to lA shing gi khyad par dang / /mthe bong / gung mo dag la 'dod/ /tA la dbyangs kyi bya dus chang / /ral gri sogs kyi chang zung dang / /khar ba las bkod rol mo yi/ /snod kyi
<p>225a</p>
<p>225a.1</p>khyad par dag dang ni/ /lag pa'i 'bras bu lag mthil dang / /tA saM dang ni bab la'i tshogs/ /tu lA khyim dang srang brgyad dang / /'jal byed tshad kyi dbye ba dang / /'ching ba 'dzin byed mi bzad pa/ /khre'u dang ni snod la'o/ /tU la 'jam po/ rtsa
<p>225a.2</p>dang ni/ /nam mkha' tshangs pa'i shing la'o/ /da laM rdzas dang / grib ma dang / /mtshon cha 'dab ma dum bu min/ /da li 'dab ldan dbye ba'o/ /du li ka ma bI la'o/ /do lA theg pa'i khyad par dang / /rams la'o/ /d+hU li rdul dang ni/ /tshad kyi khyad par dag la'o/ /
<p>225a.3</p>na la/ po Ta ga la dang / /rgyal po can dang / sI sa dang / /pi dU di pa ta la'o/ /na lI ldong ros grib ma la/ /na laM mtsho skyes pad sdong la/ /ne lA nA lA nI lI rnams/ /yal ga ka TaM ba ka /la/ /nA lA btung bar byed sogs don/ /gur la'o nI la mdog nag dang / /spre'u'i
<p>225a.4</p>dbang phyug ri yi bye brag /nag po'o/ /nA lI shing mtshan dbye/ /pa laM mI pa/ bdag nyid la/ /ba lU sbom po ku su ma/ /khang chung 'khor lo'i grong la'o/ /sA la/ gral dang / phyogs re dang / /g.yang sa'o/ /ka luM 'khri shing rtse/ /cha shas shig dang sma ra la'o/ /sa lU
<p>225a.5</p>skyur dang mtshan ma la/ /kI lu 'khrus la'o/ /pI lu ni/ /shing dang / glang po me tog dang / /mda' dang tA la rus dum la/ /bu la don tsam thal mo yangs/ /pha laM lo thog rgyus bskrun dang / /'bras bu rnam skyed rnyed pa dang / /dzA ti pha la bak+kal/ /tshol bar byed pa'i
<p>225a.6</p>phud la yang / /'bras gsum/ 'bras ldan/ /'bras bu can/ /bA laM snying po'i 'jig rten dang / /ras bal sogs dang gos dang ni/ /stobs ldan gshol ldan lha min dang / /lus dang bya rog /gtor ldan la/ /ba laM/ dri ro dmag dang ni/ /mthu dang / rags pa
<p>225a.7</p>gzugs dga' la/ /pa lA ba T+ya la kar brjod/ /ba li lta min khyad par dang / /rdal pa so dang / 'od zer dang / /rnag dang / phan pa rgya mtsho skyes/ /rga ba/ bshang lam pags pa dang / /lta ba bcom pa khyad par dang / /khyim/ dang shing gi khyad par la/ /
<p>225b</p>
<p>225b.1</p>pal+li/ dzo mo pA dang ni/ /ta tA me tog khyad par la/ /bA la byis pa skra dang / rta/ /glang po che dang mgo bo la/ /bA li/ rmongs dang / byis pa khrel/ /pi lam phug dang bu ga dang / /khung dang / tshang dang / khyim la'o/ /pai lA/ dus dang / mtshams dang ni/ /dbang phyug
<p>225b.2</p>rnams kyi ston mo dang / /so yi rnyil dang 'o ma'i dkris/ /chu gter dang ni de yi chu/ /nyon mongs yod par shi ba dang / /chags dang tshig dang / blo rnams so/ /b+hal+la mda' dang dom la'o/ /b+hal+lI b+hal+lA ta dang mda'/ /b+hA laM dpral ba nyin mo'o/ /b+ha laM 'jigs
<p>225b.3</p>dag snying dang ni/ /smyung ba'i bye brag rgyal byed la'o/ /b+he la dri ma bshang 'bu sdig /mal+la kun tu ser sna dang / /snod dang thod pa can la'o/ /mA lu nya'i dbye ba la Ti/ /bu dang / 'khri shing dag la'o/ /ma lam zhing dang chu la'o/ /mA la me tog chun po phrad/ /mU
<p>225b.4</p>laM dang po rtsa ba dang / /rgyu skar/ glang po chul/ sogs dag la/ /mau lI 'dus dang / 'dres pa dang / /chos ldan dang ni gtsug phud dang / /mya ngan med pa'i shing cod pan/ /rol dang rtse dang / sgeg pa la/ /sgeg par gyur pa'i gtso bo dang / /'khor lo ma lus pa
<p>225b.5</p>la yang / /lo lA lce rtse g.yo ba la/ /lo la yang dag sred dang g.yo/ /byA la/ ma rungs/ lag 'gro dang / /gcan gzan gdug pa'i so can la/ /sha la/ shal+la ka'i lo ma/ /bung ba'i tshogs kyi bya ba las/ /shA la nya yi khyad par dang / /shing dang spyi dang 'bras
<p>225b.6</p>dang za/ /shA lA khyim dang khang pa dang / /phyogs gcig skems byed yal ga la/ /shA lu ga ti rdzas/ chom rkun sman/ /shA li dri dang phyi la dang / /'bras bu la sogs rnams la'o/ /shi lA/ chu klung chung ngu dang / /rdo ba/ mi bzad 'khor lo 'dzin/ /shi laM mtho ba/ rdo ba la/ /
<p>225b.7</p>shi li'i srog chags mangs la/ /shI laM b+hi dpyod pa mchog /khu ba/ dkar po rnal 'byor la/ /shuklaM gzugs can dkar po dang / /yon tan ldan pa nyid la'o/ /shu laM shi dang / rgyal mtshan dang / /rnal 'byor dang ni nang la'o/ /shU lA tshong zong yo Sha dang / /lta ba 'jigs dang / 
<p>226a</p>
<p>226a.1</p>phur bu la/ /she la ri bo shai laM ni/ /ri skyes bya khyung ri bong can/ /shA la sa shing spos dkar shing / /s+thA la snod kyi dbye ba la/ /s+thA lI/ skya nar nam mkha' dang / /s+thA la/ /sbom rtsegs shes rab dman/ /hA lA chang dag mi yi bdag /
<p>226a.2</p>ha la ku re brnyas dang / sgeg/ /aM gu la ni glang po che/ /rna rgyan lag pa'i yal ga'o/ /a tsa la ni ri phur bu/ /g.yo med a tsa lA ni sa/ /any+dza li ni ku ta pa/ /lag pa kha sbyar thal mo la/ /a na la ni nor lha me/ /a ni la ni nor dang rlung / /a be la ni go la'i
<p>226a.3</p>phye/ /a ma lA ni pad+ma la/ /a ma laM ni rnam 'jig dang / /sprin la'o a rA la zhes pa/ /thang chu/ glang chen myos dang / 'khyog /a ku laM nA/ /a ka ka'i/ /gos dang / dbyug pa'i rna can la/ /a b+hI lam ni 'jigs rung gnas/ /sU lU lAM rigs kyi ma/ /mgo
<p>226a.4</p>dang spyi bos sgrol ba la/ /i twa la ni nya dang ni/ /lha min rab dbye sgeg dang 'bar/ /udz+dza la ni 'bar gsal la rgyas/ /ut+tA ni spre'u dang / /gtso bo rnam 'gyur steng du 'gro/ /ut+pa' la laM ni ut+pal dang / /ru rta dang ni sha med la/ /ut+phul+la ni bud med kyi/ /byed pa kha bye steng
<p>226a.5</p>'gro la/ /un+nA la ni 'phags pa dang / /gtso bo steng du 'gro ba la/ /u pa lA ni gseg ma dang / /rdo ba/ shag ma/ rin chen la/ /ka ta lI ni ba dan dang / /b+ha pa tA kA ri dgas dbye/ /rtsom byed chu shing / 'dri byed dang / /DaM spyaM dang ni shAl+la lI'o/ /kan+da lo ni nyer chags dang / /
<p>226a.6</p>myu gu sar dang thod pa la'o/ /ka dA lI ni sgra snyan dang / /ljon shing dang ni ri dgas dbye/ /ka pi la ni thub pa'i dbye/ /me dang / khyi dang / ser skya'o/ /ka pi lA ni me'i phyogs kyi/ /glang po/ glang mo/ phyugs bye brag /kA pA la ni mgo bo'i rus/ /shiM sha pa dang rdul can dang / 
<p>226a.7</p>bum pa sogs dang bu raM dang / ru rta nad dbye 'gro ba la'o/ /ka ma la ni chu skyes dang / /chu dang / klo min/ zangs dang sman/ /ka ma la ni ri dgas dbye/ /ka ma lA ni dpal mo la/ /ka ma la ni klu yi rgyal/ /sna can/ rul dang / 'bu la'o/ /kam+ba la ni gregs mchog chu/ /
<p>226b</p>
<p>226b.1</p>ka pa lA dang dan+ta ra/ /mtho dang 'jigs su rung ba la/ /ka rA paM ni/ /dgra sta can/ /gtsigs pa 'bad pa til mar la/ kal+lo la ni ul+lo la/ /rab tu dga' dang lam la'o/ /kA ko la ni/ lung pa yi/ /bya rog rdza'i dbye/ /rdza mkhan la/ /kA kI la ni cha shas 'tsho/ /
<p>226b.2</p>'dod pa'i rtsen dang / pra NA la/ /brtan bral yid 'phrog shing grib don/ /kA mA lA ni 'dod ldan dang / /'dod chags dbye ba mya ngam can/ /kAr+ha li ni gzhon nu ma/ /ko ha lAM ni nges dang skraM/ /kA ha lA ni sil snyan gyi/ /snod kyi khyad par dag la'o/ /kA ha la ni ngan pa la'o/ /kiT+Ta
<p>226b.3</p>la ni zangs bum dang / /lcags kyi tshogs la yang brjod do/ /kI lA laM ni khrag dang chu/ /ku d+hU laM ni phur bu 'dris/ /g.yang sa dang ni phur ma'i me/ /ku tsi lA ni rnam ma phug /gos ngan dri ma ldan gos la/ /ku TI le min gser ldan 'khyog/ /ku Ti lA ni 'bab chu'i dbye/ /kuN+Da
<p>226b.4</p>laM ni rna rgyan dang / /de bzhin gdu bu sra yab dag /gser shing dang ni gu/ /DU tsI/ /rigs la yang ni nges par 'jug/ /kud+dA la ni tog tse dang / /sa 'joms dang ni sa 'byed la/ /kun+ta la'i ni yul ljongs dang / /yul gyi sgra dang lan bu lhas/ /kun+da la ni shog shing dang / /nas
<p>226b.5</p>dang b+hA la la yang ngo / /kum+b+hi la ni tshigs bcad dang / /grib ma 'phrog byed chom rkun dang / /gral dang nya dag la yang ngo / /ku lA la ni rdza mkhan dang / /kuk+ku b+ha dang ko shi ka'o/ /ku ba laM ni ut+pa la/ /mu tig 'bras bu rgya shug 'bras/ /ku sha la ni yongs 'thob dag /
<p>226b.6</p>bsod nams dang ni bslab pa la/ ke ba la ni gcig byas dang / /'ba' zhig pa dang ku ha na/ /ke ba laM ni gtan phan dang / /ye shes dbye ba dag la'o/ /ke pi la ni shing dang skye/ /ko ra ri ka ke ma'o/ /ko ma la ni 'jam dang chu/ /ko ha la ni thub pa chang / /gan+d+ho lI ni ba ra TA/ /
<p>226b.7</p>bzang po'i gnas so ga ra laM/ /dug dang nga rgyal rtswa dang ni/ /pu la ka'o go ki la/ /kha 'dzin snying po ba lang skyong / /nye ba'i sa skyong dag la'o/ /gau ri la ni lcags phye dang / /gai ra la dang yungs kar dkar/ /gran+thi la ni smyug ma dang / /bi kang+ka ta/ sa d+ya n+thi/ /tsany+tsa la ni/ 
<p>227a</p>
<p>227a.1</p>glog dpal mo/ /tsany+tsa la g.yo 'dod ldan la/ /tsa twA la rlung / snying po la/ /rmongs dang sbyin sreg thab la'o/ /tsan+di la ni/ zla ba min/ /tsa pa la ni skad cig dang / /myur ba dang ni g.yo ba la/ /dngul chu nya dang chom rkun dang / /rdo yi bye brag
<p>227a.2</p>la yang ngo / /tsha ba lA ni pad+ma dang / /glog dang / bisba li rnams la/ /tsU DU la ni 'khor lo 'dzin/ /gtsug phud 'dzin dang / gtsug phud ldan/ /tsag la ni da yo ShA/ /rgan po dang ni byis pa la/ /ts+tsha ga la ni ta ma ta/ /ra dang sngon po'i gos la'o/ /dzag la ni da da
<p>227a.3</p>ka/ chang dang / dang byed myos byed shing / /dza ga la ni chu med pa'i/ /yul dang / dgon dung sa la'o/ /dza Ti la ni ral pa ldan/ /ral pa 'dzin dang spang spos sman/ /dzam+b+ha la ni dzam+b+hir/ /lha yi khyad par la yang ngo / /dzam+bu lA ni shing dzam+bU'i/ /yal
<p>227a.4</p>'dab dang ni 'dab mas khebs/ /dzam+b+ha la ni chub la dang / /'dam la'o/ /de nas dzA ga la/ /ka piny+dza la'o dzi gu rI/ /dzang+ga la las skyes pa dang / /rtse mo dang ni sham+b+hi dang / /dug gi sman pa'o dzaM ga laM/ /dra ba can dang 'bras bu'o/ /taN+Du la ni 'bras so ba/ /la
<p>227a.5</p>sogs tshogs dang ping+ga ka /tu mu la ni byed pa dang / /rtsod pa'i shing ngo tai ti la/ /gaN+Da ka dang byed pa'i dbye/ /du kU laM ni phyed pa dang / /zar ma'i ras dang gos phra mo/ /d+ha ba la ni mdzes dang dkar/ /ma hA bri Sha dag la'o/ /d+ha ba lI ni bzang skyes/ /na ku la ni
<p>227a.6</p>skya bseng bu'i/ /bye brag dang ni bse mo'o/ /na ku lI ni bya gag dang / /spang spos dang ni sman la'o/ /nu ku li ni bya gag mi/ /rtsa ba/ rtsa bya ra swa lo/ /nA b+hI laM ni lte ba yi/ /snying po'i gnas dang tsak+Shi na/ /tsa maM la'o ni tsu la/ /gos med dang ni chu shing la/ /nirma lam ni dri med
<p>227a.7</p>dang / /sprin dkar dang ni dri ma bral/ /niSh+ka la ni chas stong dang / /sa bon nyams dang cha med do/ /ni sta laM ni ni zlum po la/ /de bA lI ni phreng ba gsar/ /sa yi ga ram legs byed ma/ /pany+tsA lI ni glu/ /bum/ /pany+tsA lA ni yul skye bo/ /pa Ti laM ni los min nad/ /nag
<p>227b</p>
<p>227b.1</p>nog dang ni yongs khebs la/ /pa Ti la ni don med dang / /karka sha yi gos la'o/ /pa To la ni gos dbye dang / /'od ldan ma dang bgo ba la/ /ba la lam ni til gyi dbye/ /sha dang 'dam dang srin po la/ /pA ga lo ni ru rta sman/ /sA ma laM ni/ chu ngan rig /brtsegs
<p>227b.2</p>pa sngon ma yang de nyid/ /pA ga li ni sa rtsi sar/ /pA lA ni gnod byed rdzas/ /srid byed la'o de nas ni/ /bA Ta lA dang bA Ta lI/ /shing dang me tog dag la'o/ /bA Ta laM ni skya nar la/ /pA Ta la ni 'bru mar dang / /bkra zhing dmar ba la 'gyur ro/ /bA ti lI ni shi ba dang / /
<p>227b.3</p>snod dbye g.yon dang nya dol la/ /sngon dus sa 'og pA ta laM/ /pA dang 'ching byed bA shu la/ /pI shu laM ni khri rkang mdung / /bi ga la ni thub pa'i dbye/ /me dang 'od gtum 'od kor dang / /gter gyi dbye ba spre'u la'o ska/ /sing+ga la ni 'od zer dang / /gnod pa 'jug gi bya
<p>227b.4</p>mi'u thung / /pi tsu la ni dz+ha bu ka /ni tsu la dang tshul bya rog /pi ts+tsha lI ni shAt+ma li/ /rgya mtsho'i dbye ba shing sha pa'o/ /rkang steng / chu med/ pits+tsha la/ /kuny+dza laM ni sha yi bu/ /piny+dza laM ni gnod pa la/ /pit+tA laM ni gzi brjid skyes/ /rdzas dang 'khris pa ldan pa la/ /pit+ta lI
<p>227b.5</p>chu pip+pa lI/ /pap+pi laM ni/ byang chub shing / /bya'i dbye ni ri shu b+ha'o/ /pip+pa laM ni chu la'o/ /pib+pi li ni gnas dang gcod/ /dbye ba dang ni zeg ma la/ /pud ga la ni gang zag bdag /lus dang rnam pa mdzes pa la/ /bi sha la ni mdzes dang mkhas/ /bzang ba dang ni tshul khrims
<p>227b.6</p>la/ /bra kha la ni rta go cha/ /myos pa/ /ngan dang tha chad la/ /tA bA la ni 'jig rten 'og /bstod pa/ sor mo lag pa la/ /bra pA la ni byu ru dang / /bi ldang dbyug gu/ lcug ma gsar//phe ni la ni lung tai shing / /phe ni laM ni rgya shug 'bras/ /myos byed shing 'bras phe ni lA/ /b+han+d+ha
<p>227b.7</p>la ni skyur ba dang / /mgo ldum dang ni ba lwa ra/ /glang po grol ba rnams la'o/ /ba hu laM ni nam mkha' la/ /bA hu lA ni e lA dang / /nI lAM kA dang sa la'o/ /byed pa can dang nag phyogs dang / /me la ya ni b+ha hu ma/ /prA h+ya mdog nag ba hu la/ /bad+hI la ni nyon mongs na/ /
<p>228a</p>
<p>228a.1</p>ma sI bsam gtan brgA la/ /maM ga lA ni durbA dkar/ /me ga la ni sa yi bu/ /mang+ga laM ni legs bkra shis/ /de bzhin nor gsar bsrung ba la/ /many+dza la ni dza la rad+ku / /many+dzu la ni 'jam pa la/ /many+dzi la~M` ni chu bal la/ /maN+Da li ni glang po'i
<p>228a.2</p>gzugs/ /ni ku rusba rgyal khams dang / /rgyal po gza' mig dmar/ bcu gnyis can dang ni/ /ru rta sbrul dang / dbye ba dang / /yongs su khyams dang 'khor yug la/ /maN+Da la ni dkyil 'khor zhes/ /snying po gzhal bya la yang ngo / /ma hi lA ni sa chen mas/ /
<p>228a.3</p>mchod ldan 'jigs byed/ shun+d+ra'o/ /mA tsa la ni thigs pa dang / /chom rkun A ma ya dang ni/ /'dzin pa dang ni yA da sa'o/ /mA tu la ni ngan pa dang / /zhang po 'bru dang myos byed shing / /mu kha lI ni tA la dang / /rin chen byi ba'i rna ba la'o/ /mu shA lI ni khyem la'o/ /
<p>228a.4</p>da byid la'o mu kha le/ /gtun shing lcags kyi rtse mo can/ /me Sha la ni gser gyi ri/ /ri stod dang ni ral gri 'ching / /me/ kha lA ni rked pa'i phyogs/ /ro ldan dang ni ska rags la/ /ra sa lA ni bur shing dang / /gtsug phud thang shing sA la'i bcud/ /ra sha lA ni byi dor dang / /
<p>228a.5</p>lce dang / durbA sogs dang shing / /rA mi la ni dga' byed dang / /'dod pa/ rnga ma ba lang mjug /lAd+ku lI chu'i yi sba lI/ /shog shing me tog khyad par la/ /lA ng+ga laM ni khyem shing gi/ /bye brag shA ra/ rta la'o/ /lo ha la ni lcags sgrog dang / /da rigs mi gsal smra ba la/ /
<p>228a.6</p>many+dzu la ni shing ke la/ /lcang ma dang ni tai ti sa/ /baN+Da la ni dpa' bo dang / /g.yul 'khrug dang ni 'jig rten dang / /a pa ni tra ka zhes pa'o/ /bA tu la ni/ rlung can dang / /rlung tshogs dang ni rlung bcas la'o/ /bA ta laM ni rgyal po dang / /kuSh+ThaN+Da yi sa bon dang / /ko lA s+tha yi
<p>228a.7</p>sa bon la/ /bA mi la ni ngan g.yo dang / /g.yo la'o/ bi DA la byi la/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i khyad par la'o/ /be+e bu la ni yangs pa la/ /gting zab ri bo nub ri la/ /si ma lA ni dri med bsel/ /sa yi dbye ba dag la yang / /bi shu la ni shing dbye dang / /yangs pa dang ni rgya che la/ /
<p>228b</p>
<p>228b.1</p>bi shA la ni dbang mchog skyes/ /'phags rgyal la yang blta bar bya/ /bri Sha la ni dmangs rigs dang / /rta dang / zla ba sras pa la/ /sha ka la ni shing shun dang / /dum bu chags pa'i dngos po la/ /li rigs ser sna/ sha mA laM/ /sa ya lu ni gnyid mi sad/ /sbrul dang khyi la brjod bya
<p>228b.2</p>ldan/ /sha ya lu ni tshul khrims gnyid/ /shArdU la ni srin po'i dbyes/ /seng ge rkang pa brgyad pa dang //stag dang gtso bo mchog la'ang / /gnas/ shA l+ma lI ni shing dbye dang / /gnyis 'thung gi ni khyad par la'ang / /shI ta li ni ri skyes dang / /me tog chung dang ri las
<p>228b.3</p>byung / /bsil ba dang ni lo ma'i sran/ /nI b+ha ra zhes rnams la'o/ /chu bal/ ri skyes/ shI ba la/ /ce spyang 'jigs ma/ shri gA li/ /wa dang lha min shri gA la/ /shaM ka la ni lcags sgog dang / /sked pa'i gos kyi 'ching ba la/ /shai ba lam ni chu bal dang / /pad+ma'i
<p>228b.4</p>shing dang mchod pa la/ /shoSh+ka la ni sha'i zong dang / /bsil ba'i zas la'o/ sh+yA ma la/ /dkar min dang ni a shwat+tha/ /sngo sangs dang ni nag lhang ngo / /shad+d+hA ru ni dang ldan dang / /mi zad pA la gzhol ba la/ /shrI pha la ni dpal 'bras dang / /sngon po/ skyu ru/ mA lU
<p>228b.5</p>ra/ /ShaN+DA li ni mtsho skyes dang / /'dod ldan til mar nga rgyal la/ /saM ku lo ni brjod bya bzhin/ /khyab dang 'di don brjod byed la/ /san+d+h+ri la ni su ruM gA/ /dga' dang myos pa dag la'o/ /ni pA lI ni skya nar dang / /pags las sa b+ha lA guny+dza/ /sa ra la ni shing rul dang / /
<p>228b.6</p>rgya che ba dang 'khyog pa la/ /se d+h+ya lA ni nya phye ma/ /ki lA si naM rnams la'o/ /su ta la/ uT+wA/ se kA/ /'ching ba sa 'og gnas bye brag /su re la ni/ ri'i dbye ba/ /zhi dang rab tu 'dud pa la/ /te ma la ni gser mkhan dang / /rtsangs ba dang ni rdo'i bye brag /ang+ka pA li yongs
<p>228b.7</p>su rtsom/ /mtha' dang 'jigs byed dag la'o/ /a ti pa lA stobs kyi dbye/ /rab stobs dang ni/ shin tu stobs/ /ak+Sha mA laM rnam skyed bya/ /da run+d+ha ni bgrang phreng la/ /u lU/ kha la/ gu gul dang / /u dU kha la dag la'o/ /e kASh+Thi la sdig pa'i gos/ /tsu ka la
<p>229a</p>
<p>229a.1</p>ni rim pas so/ /ka tsa mA la/ mya ngam byed/ /klu'i dbye/ ral pa'i khyad par la/ /kaM dI la ni bong bu dang / /sgo nga can dang / blaM k+Sha'i shing / /ka maN+Da lu spyi blugs dang / /brka TI'i rkang 'thung la'o/ /karma pha laM las kyi bsgyur/ /las
<p>229a.2</p>kyi rnam par smin pa la/ /ka la ka lu ko lA ha la/ /de bzhin sardza na sa la'o/ /ku rU ha laM mtshan mkhan mtshon/ /kha ta mA la/ du ba sprin/ /gaN+Da shi ma ra smin pa/ /s+thu lo pa la/ thod pa la/ /gan pha lI 'bras can dang / /tsam+wa ka'i ko ra ka'o/ /rak+ta pA la
<p>229a.3</p>ri'i dbye ba/ /tsa kra ba laM 'khor yug ba'o/ /dza lAM tsa laM chu bal dang / /chu la nges par 'gro ba la/ /da mA ma laM ma ru ka /'dul bar byed pa la yang ngo / /d+h+wa ni nA lA pi wang dang / /gling bu ko ha la dag go/ /pa ri ma la rnam nyid dri/ /'phrog byed bkra ba dag la'o/ /
<p>229a.4</p>sa mu n+mIl dag 'joms dang / /yan lag chags sogs dri zhim la/ /sI tha ke li khri'u nyid/ /byed pa can dang mig zur la/ /dka' bas bgod ke dang chu 'bab dang / /rkang pas mngon par rgyug pa'ang / /Sho Da ga la gsal ba dang / /sbubs dang nya yi khyad par
<p>229a.5</p>la/ /ba hu pha lA dri ma dang / /bdag byed dang ni 'o ma la/ /br-i han+na la skra chas dang / /ma hA po Ta ka la'ang / /b+ha Ta kA li'i/ ri sras la/ /gan+d+ho lI dang sman dbye la/ /b+hasma tU laM kha ba'i rdul/ /char dang grong gi kunA la/ /ma Ni lA lA btsun mo dang / /rgyu skar bcu pa/ 'phrog
<p>229a.6</p>byed la/ /ma da ka la glang po myos/ /dregs dang mi gsal brjod pa la/ /ma hA kA la lha chen po/ /kim+sa ka dang rab 'joms byed/ /ma hA dI la/ klu'i bye brag /ba mA kA ra nor bu'i dbye/ /ma hA ba la sI sha ka /dar ma'i stobs la brjod par bya/ /ma hA ba lA ba lang rji/ /
<p>229a.7</p>'bras la'o/ /mak+tA pha laM mi ni/ /mu tig ga pur/ ba li'i 'bras /mr-i t+yu pha li'i Arka'i 'dab/ /dus chen po yi shing la'o/ /ba hu pha la/ be+e NI dang / /dug mo nyungs dang spang spos dang / /ra dza swa la bud med la/ /ra dza swa lA rdul ldan ma/ /ba ta ki li/ ka lA lA sa/ /gyol
<p>229b</p>
<p>229b.1</p>po rnams kyi dbyug dum la/ /pa ta pha laM brgya byin gzhu/ /dro ba'i chags pa la yang ngo / ma tsi ki la/ mal+li dbye/ /'dul bar byed pa la yang ngo / /sa dA pa la be+e ta'i shing / /u du mA ra 'bras bu'i phung / /ha ri tA lI na kha'i ri mo/ /ral gri du rdA rnams la'o/ /ha
<p>229b.2</p>khA ha la'i tshangs pa'i sbrul/ /thu bo dang ni dug gi dbye / /ha ste ma la sa bsrungs bu/ /ki ni ya ka zhes pa la'o/ /a su tI ba la yi sgra/ /mchod sbyin dang ni chang 'tshong la/ /du rdaN+Da pA la zhes nga // /nya dang sbrul gyi rab dbye dang / /rgyal po'i rgyal po la yang ngo / /e
<p>229b.3</p>ka kuN+Da la zhes pa/ /kA li n+dI 'joms byed pa la/ /klu TA pa ka la zhes pa/ /glang po'i mkhris pa'i rims dang ni/ /smin dang dag par byed pa la/ /kr-i bI Ta pA la zhes pa/ /chu phrad pa dang rgya mtsho la/ /pany+tsa kasba la zhes pa/ /la ba dkar dang rdo'i khyad par/ /man+d+ra
<p>229b.4</p>tsU rna la zhes pa/ /dbang byed rig sngags la 'dod de/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi don med sngags/ /shes dang ku sha'i chu skad cig /su ra ta tA li zhes pa/ /pho nya ma yi mgo phreng dang / /bag ma'i nyin mo dang 'brel ba'i/ /mgo bo'i mre tog phreng la 'dod/ /zhes pa sna
<p>229b.5</p>tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan du mu tig phreng ba las la yig mtha'i sde rdzogs so// //wa ni bum pa/ chu lha dang / /nyin mo dang ni rang dbang la/ /bA ni rlung dang / mda' dang mdung / /bi ni bya dang nam mkha' la/ /swa ni/ shes dang / bdag legs
<p>229b.6</p>gcod/ /bdag gi ba yi nor la'o/ /a bi lug dang nyi ma ri/ /byi ba dang ni bal la'o/ /a bI me tog ldan ma dang / /rta dang lcags dang skyes bu'i dbye/ /U r+d+h+waM steng dang an+d+h+ya dang / /ka N+waM sdig dang / thub pa la/ /ka Na ngan pa ldan pa la/ /ka bi snyan dang gas
<p>229b.7</p>mkhan po dang / /pa ba sangs dang grog mkhar dang / /khyi dang snyan dngags byed pa la/ /ki N+waM sdig pa rgyal po skyes/ /skye bo dang ni rnam gnon la/ /kharba thung ngu dang ni dri/ /gri ba mgrin pa/ mgul pa la/ /ts+tsha bi bzang dang mdzes pa la/ /dza bA Do d+d+hA'i me tog
<p>230a</p>
<p>230a.1</p>shugs/ /dza ba shugs can la yang ngo / /dzI ba tshig bdag shing gi dbye/ /srog chags tsam la'ang lta bar bya/ /dzI bA 'tsho bar byed pa la/ /mau rbI sa dang spyod pa dang / /piny+dzi ta dang 'dod pa la/ /dzI biM 'tsho ba la yang ngo / /ta twaM rang bzhin
<p>230a.2</p>rtag pa'i dbye/ /mchog bdag la'o nga ba ni/ nags dang nags tshal/ /nags klung la/ /di paM mtho ris bar snang dang / /'od 'gro/ gnam dang / mkha' la'o/ /de ba/ rgyal po lha dang sprin/ /de baM dbang po la 'dod do/ /de bI rje btsun ma dang ni/ /gzi
<p>230a.3</p>brjid can ma br-ik+ka dang / gar mar tshangs pas dbang bskur dang / /mi yi bdag po'i bud med la/ /dra ba/ bcud dang pra dA ba/ /rnam par zhu bar gyur pa la/ /dwa n+dAM log par spyod pa la/ /dwan+d+ra zung dang 'thab dang gsad/ /d+ha ba bdag po shing dbye dang / /khram
<p>230a.4</p>pa dang ni mi la'o/ /b+hU pa cha shas 'jug pa dang / /thub pa rnal 'byor/ ba Ta/ nor/ /b+hu paM nges pa rtog pa dang / /rtag pa dang ni g.yo med la/ /b+h+ru bA/ mUr+pA ra/ ba dang / /'dab ma g.yengs dang phreng ba'i dbye/ /na ba bya rog bstod pa dang / /gsar du bstod
<p>230a.5</p>par bya ba la/ /nI bI/ sked pa'i gos mdud pa/ /rtsa ba dang ni tha ma la/ /paM kwa yongs su 'dud pa dang / /rnam par 'jig dang mngon phyogs la/ /mar+sh+wa mchan khung gzhi dang ni/ /'khor lo/ mtha' nye phyugs tshogs la/ /pr-i th+wI sa gzhi sa dang ni/ /
<p>230a.6</p>shing kun bu mo zi ra nag /prA d+h+waM 'ching dang bsdam pa dang / /gzir dang ring du gdon byos la/ /bla ba/ kA raN+Da ba dang / /sbal pa dang ni/ b+he la ka /chu yi bya rog pA k+Sha'i shing / /ring du 'gro dang / sgra gding ba/ /rigs can dang ni spre'u la'o/ /bla baM/ dmag dang
<p>230a.7</p>mtho ba dang / /dri dang / rtsa dang / ba lang 'tshe/ /b+ha ba/ dpal mgrin 'khor ba dang / /dpal dang / legs 'thob skye ba la/ /b+hA ba rang bzhin byed pa dang / /bsam pa sems can bdag skye dang / /bya ba rol pa dngos po dang / /tshig don gnas kyi khyad par
<p>230b</p>
<p>230b.1</p>la/ /skye bo/ rtogs pa 'byor pa dang / /gar dang / khrus dang mkhas pa la'ang / /re bA dza m+bA li ni'i dbye/ /raMs dang / dran pa yangs pa dang / /thung ngu rab byed rta dang ni/ /gar dang san mo'i dbye ba dang / /'bras bu kha na ma tho dang / /bya'i khyad par
<p>230b.2</p>dag la'o/ /la ba/ /cha shas sgeg pa dang / /gcod dang sbyin dang dga' byed dga'/ /dpal 'bras dang ni pi ba li/ /bi l+l+baM sna tshogs/ lha grong khyer/ /biM shwa/ sna tshogs thams cad dug /phye ma'i btung ba la yang ngo /sha ba ro dang btung ba la/ /shi bi/ 
<p>230b.3</p>gro ga mi bdag dbye/ /shi ba 'phrog byed/ rnal 'byor dbye/ /lha dang phur bu phye ma dang / /gu gul dang ni bang kar shing / /si ba/ thar pa/ sgo dang chu/ /dge ba'o shi bA/ dkar mo dang / /dri ma med dang ka ke ru/ /dz+hA TA ma lA laM dang ni/ /rnga mo dang ni sha k+shu'i 'bras/ /
<p>230b.4</p>sa tI/ skye bo/ sems can dang / /srid pa/ srog chags bdag dang dngos/ /rdzas dang stobs dang sha za sogs/ /yod dang yon tan 'byor pa dang / /rang bzhin dang ni mtha' la'o/ /sa ba/ kun 'dzin mchod sbyin dang / /khrus dang zhi ba yon gnas mtshungs/ 
<p>230b.5</p>shru bA/ shru gA dbye ba dang / /shal+le ki dang murbA la/ /ha ba laM dang / 'bod pa dang / /nges par bstan pa rnams la'o/ /hra sra/ thung ngu dma' ba'i don/ /k+Sha ba/ ske tshe/ k+Shu DA'o/ /a b+hA ba ni yod min dang / /dngos med dang ni shi ba la/ /a kli ba ni yod min
<p>230b.6</p>gnas/ /arta baM ni me tog dang / /rdul dang dus dang 'byung po la/ /A pra ba ni dam bca' dang / /nyon mongs tshig dang gnas pa la/ /A hi ba ni mchod sbyin dang / /yang dag gnon pa la yang ngo / /ut+pa ba ni dga' ston dang / /'dod dang / rab 'byams khro ba
<p>230b.7</p>la/ /ud+d+ha pa ni dga' ston dang //khyab 'jug zhang po mchod sbyin dang / /dag byed byed pa gsal ba dang / /pags pa zi ra nag po la'o/ /ki ta pa ni ngan pa dang / /myos dang slu byed dag la yang / /ke sha ba ni klu shing dang / /spang skyes dang ni skra can la/ /kai ta baM ni/ ts+tsha
<p>231a</p>
<p>231a.1</p>la dang / /snang ba dang ni/ ku mu da/ /dgra bo dang ni ngan pa'o/ /kai ra paM ni/ ku mu da/ /zla ba can dang kai ra bI/ /gaN+D+wi dang ni gA Di dang / /gzhu dang srid sgrub gzhu la'o/ /gA la ba ni rgya skyegs thub/ /tAN+Da baM ni gar dang rtsa/ /mtho ris/ bar
<p>231a.2</p>snang sum rtsen dang / /sum rtsen ma dang rig byed dbye/ /dI di bi ni blo ldan dang / /bsam pa dang ni bdag la yang / /dI dzeM hwa ni sbrul dag dang / /phra ma can la mngon par brjod/ /naM Sh+pApa ni nyi ma rlung / /ka Da m+pang+ga ra dang ni/ /rnam par rtog pa mad pa dang / /sim+bi
<p>231a.3</p>kA ra dza mA ShA/ /nit+na ba ni ngan smras dang / /mi mkhas pa dang yid brtan min/ /pany+tsa twaM ni lnga lan dang / /dngos po dang ni gter la'o/ /bal+la ba ni/ rgya chen gyol/ /skag dang / rgya skyegs tshon dag la/ /bIr+tha bI ni g.yo ba dang / /ki sha la dang yal 'dab
<p>231a.4</p>ma/ /pI r+tha ba ni ma zab dang / /sa dag sa yi rnam 'gyur la/ /pung+ga ba ni khyu mchog dang / /gtso skye sa mchog sman bye brag /pra b+ha ba ni/ skye ba pa/ /chu yi rtsa ba pha rol gnon/ /rgol ba nad rung thams cad kyi/ /kun spyod rtogs par byed pa la/ /pra b+hA ba ni/ 
<p>231a.5</p>nus gzi brjid/ /dang po/ dmigs dang gnas la'o/ /pra b+ha wa ni mngal nas mthar/ /bram ze rnams kyi me tog 'bras/ /phan tshun grogs dang / 'jig rten skyes/ /pra sa ba ni/ lcug ma can/ /rdo rje'i shing dang s+yU ta'o/ /pe ra bi ni srin mo dang / /ce
<p>231a.6</p>spyang la'o bal+la ba/ /'joms pa dang ni ba lang skyong / /'jigs sde la'o/ /ban+d+ha pa/ /gnyen dang mdza' bshes dag la'o/ /brga ba ni pa sangs dang / /glang po dga' byed dgra sta can/ /gzhu bzang la'o/ /b+hArga/ bI/ /ri sras/ dpal mo/ dur+pA dkar/ /b+hai ra
<p>231a.7</p>ba ni ngan spong bu/ /bai ra baM ni 'jigs par byed/ /mA d+ha ba ni skra can dang / /sgrub byed dang ni dpyid la'o/ /mA d+ha bI na/ sbrang rtsi la'ang / /ka ra chang dang rdung byed ma/ /shin tu grol ba rnams la'o/ /rA g+ha ba na nya chen gye/ /rab dbye rag+hu yi rigs la/ /rA dzI
<p>231b</p>
<p>231b.1</p>ba ni nya ri dwags/ /rgyal po nye bar 'tsho ba la/ /sU ba ba ni/ bum pa 'bangs so/ /bud med khyad par bram ze la/ /bA Da baM ni rgod ma'i tshogs/ /bud med byed pa'i khyad par dang / /sa 'og aurba bram ze la/ /be+e tra ba ni 'bros su 'jug /blo la'o de nas bi b+ha ba/ /
<p>231b.2</p>nor dang mya ngan 'das pa la/ /pi b+hA pa ni/ yongs bsags dang / /'dod pa dang ni gsal byed dang / /dgra rnams kyi dngos 'joms pa la/ /shA trA baM ni zhe sdang dang / /dgra las skyes pa nyid la'o/ /shu Sha bI ni ral gri dang / /zi ra dang ni zi ra nag /ShA Da ba ni ro
<p>231b.3</p>bcud glu/ /myur ba'i 'bu dang rab skye dang / /gru dang kha dog dag la'o/ /sartsi ba ni g.yo ba dang 'bod/ /sam+b+ha ba ni 'byung ba dang / /dran pa rgyu dang / slong ba dang / /'dus dang shin+tu tha dad dang / /rten dang brten pa dag la'o/ /su grI ba ni bdud kyi bdag /
<p>231b.4</p>mgrin pa mdzes pa rjod par byed/ /sain+d+hA ba ni nor bu bsrub/ /rta dang / sin+d+hA'i yul byung la'o/ /a nu b+hA ba mthu dang ni/ /rten dang dngos po mtshon pa la/ /a bat+na ba/ ngan smras dang / /smod dang skur pa 'debs pa la/ /a b+he Sha ba gnas dang ni/ /tshang
<p>231b.5</p>dang / mchod sbyin yang dag 'jog /A dI na pa nyes dmigs skyon/ /yongs su nyon mongs mtha' ngan no/ /u ba bla pa skyed pa dang / /rnam 'phyo chom rkun seng ge la/ /ku shI tse ba grog mkhar skyes/ /gar dang slong ba rnams la'o/ /ku shI la ba gcig 'thob dang / /
<p>231b.6</p>bzod ldan dga' byed bu la'o/ /dza lwa bi lwa 'dod pa dang / /rus sbal/ sbal pa chu'i bzhi mdo/ /dzi baM dza ba tsa ko ra/ /bya'i dbye shing gi khyad par la/ /do lA dzre pa bun skyed dang / /log shes dang ni rab dga' la'o/ /d+ha mArga pa zhes pa ni/ /a pA marga'i shing dang
<p>231b.7</p>ni/ /de ba dA lI la yang brjod/ /pa ri sla ba g.yo ba dang / /'khrug pa dang ni brjod bya'i rtags/ /ba rA b+ha ba mi snang dang / /rnam par nyams dang gzhan du gyur/ /ba ra ba sa gzhan skyob dang / /dmangs rigs bu dang gnyis skyes la/ /pu Ta grI ba mtshon cha laM/ /garga
<p>232a</p>
<p>232a.1</p>rI dang / /zangs bum la/ /ba la de bA/ char can dang / /stobs lha stobs dang / rlung dang ni/ /rta dmar dang ni 'phrog byed rta/ /mthil skyes dang ni rig byed la'o/ /shI ta shi ba brag spos lam/ /rgyam tsha dang ni mi sI la/ /sa te de ba
<p>232a.2</p>stobs dang ni/ /ut+pal yu ba/ sA ri ba/ /bum sman dang ni lhar bcas la/ /sbrul mig dang ni skya bo la/ /sred ldan a si ti b+ha ba/ /chu klung A si taM b+ha bi/ /wa mtha'i sde'o// //sha ni mtshon cha brgya dang 'tshe/ /shaM ni chos dang shA ston pa/ /shI ni gnyid log pa
<p>232a.3</p>dang ni/ /rtag tu gnyid log pa la'o/ /A sha 'dod dang sred pa la/ /A shu 'bru dang myur ba la/ /i sha /ku sha /ga la'i dbyug /dbang phyug dang ni gtso bo la/ /aM shu 'od dang nyi ma tsha/ /kA sha klo sgra rtsa la'o/ /kA shI wA rA Na sI dang / /glang phrug spre'u gcer bu
<p>232a.4</p>la/ /ku sha dga' byed bu dang gling / /sbyor ba'i dbye ba dag la'o/ /ku sha myos dang sdig can dang / /glang po la'o ku shA ni/ /yi ge'o ku shI dus rab bsgrags/ /ke sha skra dang ngo tsha can/ /lha min dbye ba chu lha la/ /kle sha sdug bsngal chags sogs dang / /bya ba sA ya
<p>232a.5</p>la yang blta/ /daR+sha mthong ba nyi zla 'grogs/ /phyogs mtha' kha khyer zla ba la/ /da shA dbang byed/ cha shas dang / /las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / /stobs med pa yi gnas skabs la/ /dr-i sha blo dang mthong ba mig /shes dang mthong ba spo dag la/ /daM sha go cha
<p>232a.6</p>sbrul gyi rma/ /rtsed mo dum bu skyon la'o/ /nA sha /bros dang byer ba dang / /thim dang / mi dmigs pa la'o/ /ni shA mtshan mo yung ba dang / /shing dang ser po dag la'o/ /ba shu rab 'joms ri dwags sogs/ /rab dang / snod dang bsreg bya'i don/ /sAM shu rdul
<p>232a.7</p>dang lo thog dang / /nor dang ring bsag pa byung la'o/ /pA shA phyogs la sogs pa dang / /'chi ba g.yo ba'i don dang skra/ /dbang sogs mtha' dang smod don dang / /rna ba'i mtha' dang mdzes don can/ /be+e shI sha dang gong bu dang / /sha ldan ral gri'i shubs dang ni/ /khye
<p>232b</p>
<p>232b.1</p>'tshong bag phye thug pa'i dbye/ /rA shi phung po lug dang skyon/ /mtshon cha dang ni dbang bral la'o/ /pa shA/ sgyu ma/ dat+ta dang / /'dod pa dang ni gtso bo la/ /ba shA/ yo Sha'i bu mo gsham/ /ba dang glang mo rnams la'o/ /be+e sha rje rigs yid skyes dang / /rab tu 'jug la yang dag
<p>232b.2</p>'dod/ /be sha tshong khang 'jug pa dang / /'jug bya'i khyem dang khang pa la/ /baM shing 'od ma rigs dang sre/ /rgyab kyi cha shas rus pa la/ /ba shu phyugs dang dri yi bcud/ /skyes bu'i khyad par lo d+h+ra la/ /paR+ga rig byed sbyin pa dang / /nad dang / reg pa po la
<p>232b.3</p>yang / /g.yul dang smon lam la yang 'dod/ /A daR+sha ni me long dang / /rgyas bshad so so'i glegs baM la/ /ud+hI sha ni ri'i bu mo/ /mdzes dang gzhung gi khyad par la/ /u pAM shu ni skyes bye brag /rdul dang skye bos dben pa la/ /ka pi shI ni ma d+h+wa
<p>232b.4</p>lbi/ /sngo sangs dang ni se h+la/ /karka sha ni/ ka m+wi la/ /kA shA 'joms dang / bur shing rta/ /brtse med skyes bu 'khrug pa dang / /brtan dang / bab chol can la'o/ /kA nA sha ni zhi byed dang / /'khrug dang / rtsub po/ rdul 'joms la/ /ku li sha nya'i dbye ba
<p>232b.5</p>dang / /A li dang ni rdo rjer 'dod/ /go ri sha ni dbang phyug dang / /tshig bdag dang ni ri yi bdag /tAd+gI sha ni seng ge zla/ /duHduR+sha ni nad kyi gnas/ /tsher ma dang ni reg rtsub po/ /ni re sha ni mtha' nye dang / /ston pa dang ni 'chad pa la/ /nirbe sha ni 'jug pa
<p>232b.6</p>dang / /longs spyod dang ni rmongs pa la/ /ni pe sha ni zhi ba dang / /de bzhin byed dang rnam sel la/ /ni ste sha ni brtse med dang / /ral gri gsal ba des dang mnyam/ /ba lA sha ni ki shu ka /sha TI dang ni ljang ser dang / /ni ka sha las skyes pa'o/ /pa lA shaM
<p>232b.7</p>ni gos la yang / /bak+Shi shA ni mkha' lding dang / /nag po/ dmar ser/ legs skyer/ ser/ /nya dang / lcug ma'i bdag po la/ /ping+gA shI ni rams dang / sman/ /pra kA sha ni rab grags pa/ /rab tu bzhad dang dka' thub gsal/ /pra de sha ni/ yul
<p>233a</p>
<p>233a.1</p>'dzin byed/ /mdzub mo mthe bong / yang dag 'dod/ /b+hU ke shI ni bal ba dza/ /ban+dU sha ni tshu bal gar/ /'o ma sha ni lug bal la/ /shri gA lI ni spre'u dang / /spang spos/ gra ma/ shilda la'o/ /lo ma shA ni bya rog byin/ /kA shI sha dang
<p>233a.2</p>kA shI'i dbye/ /tshil chen dang ni shin tu stobs/ /rnam par rgyas dang nges skye la/ /bi ke shI ni gsal ba dang / /rnam par dbye dang rnam rgyas skra/ /bi bA shA ni gos ldan dang / /chu rlung zhag grol ba la'o/ /be+e ba sha ni mang 'dzin bdag /bI kA sha ni rnam gsal dang / /
<p>233a.3</p>gsal dang rnam par brjod pa la/ /saM kA sha ni/ kun tu 'dzin/ /mtshungs dang 'dra dang 'gro dang mnyam/ /pa de sha ni yang dag 'dzin/ /yul la'o su/ khA sha zhes pa/ /mdzes pa dang ni 'jig pa la/ /sa ba sha ni mal stan dang / /chu lha rgyal po ti mi sa/ /ha tA sha ni
<p>233a.4</p>'khrug pa dang / /brtse med 'jig dang 'dod pa la/ /a ba de sha /tshig mtshon cha/ /zol dang mtshan ma dag la'o/ /a ba b+h+raM sha skad kyi dbye/ /zur chag sgra dang go dka' ba/ /A shra yA sha snang ba che/ /lus dang 'jig par byed pa la/ /u pa raM sha me da dang / /
<p>233a.5</p>gnod pa dang ni za byed la/ /u pa sbaR+sha nye reg dang / /kun tu reg /khrus/ kha bshal ba'o/ /paN+Da par+shu/ pI nA ki/ /ma rungs mig dang ngan dang 'khyog /sgra gcan dum bu ma la ka /byug byed dga' byed/ sgra sta can/ /dzI be+i ta sha dpe/ mtha' gcig /'tsho ba'i
<p>233a.6</p>mtha' dang mtsho dbang phyug /nA ba/ bA sha dran pa dang / /bud med rnams kyi byed pa dang / /chu lha'i zhags pa dbang phyug gi dgra sta'i ming / rnams la'o/ /pany+tsa da shi zla nya dang / /gnam stong dag la 'dod pa yin/ /pa ri bi sha zlum dkyil 'khor/ /pA da yA shi/ ba DU ka /
<p>233a.7</p>lcags sgrog dang ni gdu bu'o/ /pu ro Da sha nam mkha'i dbye/ /zla ba khri shing bcud dang ni/ /phye ma dang ni ma sI dang / /khrus kyi rnam pa la yang 'dod/ /lo rgyus mchod pa grong son dang / /grogs dang rab tu gnas pa dang / /rje rigs sa reg rjes skyes la'ang / /sha
<p>233b</p>
<p>233b.1</p>mtha'i sde'o// //Sha ni/ gtso bo la 'dod de/ /Shi ni mngal nas grol ba la'o/ /u ShI mda' dang bu dag dang / /mtshan mo dang ni tho rangs la'o/ /u Sha 'dod ldan gu gul la'o/ /r-i Shi 'od 'bar rig byed dang / /drang srong gnas 'jog la sogs la'o/ /kar+Sha ko
<p>233b.2</p>dang ba rgyal la/ /karlU lci ba me dag dang / /khyim dag mngon par rjod byed la'o/ /ko Sha lha rdzas/ nor/ don mthun/ /sgra sgrogs yang dag 'dzin pa dang / /sbubs skye ba dang kha ma bye/ /snod dang ral gri kha chod la/ /g+ho Sha me tog brgya pa dang / /dbyangs ldan dang
<p>233b.3</p>ni 'brug sgra la/ /g+ho Sha/ sgra ldan 'jigs pa dang / /su nA b+hI ra/ lcug ma la/ /dz+ha ShA klu yi stobs ma la/ /dz+ha ShA rnam par 'phyo bar brjod/ /tar+Sha 'dod pa skom pa la/ /tu Sha/ so ba/ pags pa mig /tI Sha 'dod dang skom pa la/ /tI Sha/ 'od mdzes
<p>233b.4</p>dbyangs can dang / /mtha' dang / dzi gI Sha la'o/ /do Sha sun 'byin sdig pa skyon/ /mtshan mo dang ni lag pa la/ /po Sha zla ba'i bye brag dang / /rgyal dang grub pa zla bral la/ /pau ShI rgyal dang rgyas pa la/ /pre Sha mdag pa byed pa dang / /'joms par byed dang nyon
<p>233b.5</p>mongs la/ /b+ha ShA skad dang tshig dag la/ /mA Sha 'bru yi khyad par dang / nga rgyal/ rmongs/ lpags/ sun 'byin dbye/ /ma Shi 'gran par byed dang zol/ /me Sha 'dzin par byed pa la/ /ba r+Sha khyim dang sman bye brag /dbyar gyi dus so bar+ShaM ni/ /char 'be+ebs chu
<p>233b.6</p>skyes 'dzam gling sprin/ /bi ShaM bong nga dkar po la/ /bi Sha ga ra la dang chu/ /bi Sha khyab byed bshad pa la/ /br-i Sha chos dang / byi ba la/ /b+h+ri Sha 'dzin gnas gtso bo khyim/ /lcags sgrog dang ni khu ba 'dzin/ /dr-i ShA spre'u khyi rngo la/ /br-i ShI brtul zhugs ming dang
<p>233b.7</p>gdan/ /shu Shi skems dang khung bu la/ /she Sha spyi blugs lhag ma la/ /she Sha mtha' yas khyad par dang / /dri med dbyer med la yang ngo / /a b+he Shu ni snang ba la/ /u b+hi ShU ni rang so bzung / /A kar+Sha na rang dbang bshad/ /rgyan po 'gyed par byed pa la'ang / /
<p>234a</p>
<p>234a.1</p>zhags pa dang ni mda' gzhu la/ /goms pa'i dngos po la yang ngo / /A mi Sha ni skra brdzes dang / /sha dang longs spyod 'dod pa dang / /A mi Shi ni mdzes pa yi/ /rnam pa'i gzugs sogs yul la yang / /uSh+TI Sha ni mgo dkris dang / /
<p>234a.2</p>cod pan mtshan nyid khyad par la/ /kal+maSha ni srin po dang / /nag po skya bo dag la yang / /kalpa ShaM ni rnyog sdig pa/ /kilpi She ni spong byed nad/ /sgrub tu med pa'o kusmA ShaM/ /kAny+dzi ka dang nas can no/ /gan+DU Sha ni Sha skong dang / /rab 'byams dang ni dkar min
<p>234a.3</p>dang / /glang po dang ni lag sor la/ /dzi gI Sha ni rgyal 'dod dang / /cung zad rgod pa dag dang ni/ /phul du byung dang mtha' la'o/ /ta rI Sha ni dbyibs mdzes dang / b+he la chu gter mtha' la'o /tI bi Sha ni gser dang sprin/ /na g+tu Sha ni rgyal dbye
<p>234a.4</p>dang / /sbrul gyi bye brag dag la'ang / /ni Sha ka /kar+Sha pA Na/ /ni ka ShA ni rgya skyegs ma/ /ni me Sha ni mig 'dzums dang / /dus dbye dang ni mig 'dres la/ /ba ru Shi ni bkra ba rtsub/ /bab chol rjod par byed pa'o/ /pu ru Sha ni klu shing dang / /sbrang rtsi skyes dang
<p>234a.5</p>mchog dag la/ /sau ru ShaM ni gzi brjid dang / /bsam pa dang ni las la yang / /steng dang / rgya chen dpung pa dang / /lag pa mi dang btung ba la/ /pra t+yu Sha ni nyin mo'i sgo/ /tho rangs dang ni nor lha'o/ /pra do Sha naM skyon ldan ma/ /srod dang mtshan mo'i sgo
<p>234a.6</p>la'o/ /ma hi ShI ni sa skyong gi/ /btsun mor dbang bskur byin la'o/ /mA ri ShA ni dri zhim dang / /sman dbye gsal ba'i ma ma'o/ /mA ri Sha ni sdo'i dbye ba/ /gar ma dang ni 'gyur byed ma'o/ /ro hi ShaM ni gtsang byed nya/ /ro hi Sha ni ri dwags dbye/ /bi She Sha ni dbye ba
<p>234a.7</p>tsam/ /bi She Sha ni thig le la/ /beshA+eSha ni ma 'byer dang / /kha bral ba dang ring du gyur/ /byA kar+Sha ni snying po can/ /sa la ka dang rgyan 'gyed 'gugs/ /shu shru Sha ni nyan 'dod dang / /bsnyen bkur dang ni gtam dag la/ /shai lu Sha ni bil ba'i shing / /ku shI
<p>234b</p>
<p>234b.1</p>gcod pa la yang ngo / /saM har+Sha ni 'gran pa dang / /a nu kaR+Sha shing rta yi/ /'og shing dang ni rjes su 'gugs/ /lha yi btung ba sred pa dang / /mngon par 'dod pa dag la'o/ /a rdzi mi Sha lha dang nya/ /alba ri Sha ri'i bye brag /nyi ma dgra sta dum bu can/ /pI ta na
<p>234b.2</p>dang / ki sho ra/ /am+bu rI ShaM sgra yul 'khor/ /a lam+bu Sha/ sgyug byed la//a lam+bu ShA gaN+Di rI/ /mtho ris dang ni rje rigs dang / /kim+bu ru Sha lta gdong can/ /'jig rten dbye ba la yang ngo / /nan+di g+hoSha pha rol gnas/ /bstod pa 'don pa dbyangs byed pa/ /
<p>234b.3</p>pa ri g+ho Sha brjod bya dang / /nges par sgogs dang 'brug sgra la/ /pa laM bzang ba za ma dang / /rgya skyegs gu gul kiM shu ka /ba laM ka Sha mgo zlum dang / /sman dang srin po nyid la'o/ /ma hA g+ho ShA rwa yi dbye / /tshong dus kyis ni glag gcor la/ /bA ta ra rU Sha/ rlung tshub dang / /
<p>234b.4</p>skra 'greng pa dang brgya byin gzhu/ /Sha mtha'i sde'o// //sA na don dang dpal la'o/ /sI ni kha lo sgyur ba la/ /se ni dpal mo'i bu dang dga'/ /so ni skems byed ma ma la/ /aM sa cha dang 'ching ba la/ /kA su nus pa dang mtshon cha/ /ma tshang gos dang 'khar ba dang / /lha mi
<p>234b.5</p>'khar ba dag la'o/ /'khar ba'i snod dang / tshad dang yang / /gud+ba ta pa kA hA ra/ /sdong bu/ gran+b+ri par+Na la/ /go sa tho rangs po la dag /tsA sa/ gser dang gtsug phud dang / rab dbye khru dang tshig rnams la'o/ /dA sa nor bu skyon 'jigs pa/ /dA sa gla mi nya pa
<p>234b.6</p>dang / /dad dang sbyin pa tsam dang ni/ /bran dang bud pa rnams la'o/ /nA sa/ sna dang / sna yi sgo/ /steng gi shing dag la yang ngo / /pra sU ma ma gzhal ba dang / /rta dang 'gal ba rnams la'o/ /ba sU dpal sbyin bu ga me/ /rigs dang 'od dang lha'i khyad par/ /shing
<p>234b.7</p>dang sman dang rin chen dang / /steng dang tshong dus nor dang ni/ /snyan ngag khur dang mthu dang mdzes/ /b+ha se sa yi bya rgod dang / /goSh+To dang ni bya gag la/ /maM saM sha dang spang spos dang / /kak+ko li dang ral pa la/ /mA sa/ zla ba mjal byed dang / /mA sI/ sbrang rtsi 'o mi se
<p>235a</p>
<p>235a.1</p>ni/ /me tog brgya pa dzA mA ni/ /mri dwA gnas can sa mchog dang / /ra sa/ ro bcud/ tik+tA sogs/ /sgog pa sogs dang khu ba dug /dngul chu khams dang chang / /bo la mar dang lus la'o/ /ra sA/ lce dang / rta pho dang / /'don dang shal+la
<p>235a.2</p>kI kaM gu/ /rA sa gla rtsi rtse ba dang / /skad dang lcags sgrog la yang ngo / /phat+sa/ bu sogs tal+la ka /tshar ba dang ni za ba la/ /bA sA/ khyim dang gnas skabs dang / /a Ti/ rUl ka zhes la'o/ /bya sa thub pa rgya che la/ /shaM sa brjod dang 'dod pa la/ /hiM sa chom
<p>235a.3</p>rkun sogs dang gnod/ /haM sa nyi ma/ ma dA la/ /nag po lus kyi rlung dang ni/ /chags med mi bdag mchog gi bdag /rnal 'byor sngags sogs dbye ba dang / /ser sna rta yi khyad par la/ /a b+h+yA+e sa ni/ deng 'di gzhan/ /yang dag bzhag dang yon tan dang / /
<p>235a.4</p>phongs dang 'od dang ma lus la/ /a li sa ni bya ba dal/ /rkang nang shing gi khyad par la/ /a la sA ni dad pa'i bdag /rtag 'gro sdig pa gzhan la gnod//A shis sbrul byi mche ba dang / /gnod pa byed dang mtshungs pa la/ /A sh+bA sa ni kun bshad dang / /yongs
<p>235a.5</p>su gcod dang nges 'jug /nyi/ /ts+ma shwA sa ni 'ching ba tsam/ /g.yo ba dang ni gzhu la'o/ /uts+tsha sa ni dbugs rngub dang / /dbugs 'byin rkyang ba 'ching ba dang / /yon tan gyi ni khyad par la/ /ut+taM sa ni/ rna rgyan dang / /rna ba gang dang thod dkris la/ /u ras bong
<p>235a.6</p>dang sgrib pa la/ /ru shas/ dgongs mthun/ tho rangs dag /e nas gzhan dbang sdig pa dang / /lus dang khang pa dag la'o/ /o rdzas gzi brjid khams rnams ni/ /kun nas brdas dang / rab gsal la/ /nye bar 'dzin dang gcod pa'ang / /kI ka saM ni
<p>235a.7</p>rus pa la/ /kIka sa ni 'bu phran la/ /ts+tshan+das tshigs bcad thos pa 'dod/ /rang dbang dang ni kun spyod la/ /tsa ma sa ni kun 'gro/ gser/ /rgyags dang phyi ma'i dbye ba la/ /dz+yA yas/ thu bo/ phul byung la/ /dz+yo tis/ sgra dang me rab gsal/ /mthong ba dang ni
<p>235b</p>
<p>235b.1</p>mig gi 'bras/ /dka' thub 'jig rten khyad par dang / /brtul zhugs/ tsan+d+rA yA na sogs/ /dka' thub dregs dang bgrang ba la/ /ta mas mtho ris snang dang khro / /yon tan khyad par don byed la/ /ta ras stobs dang shugs dag la/ /ta ma sa ni mun can
<p>235b.2</p>dang / /gtum mo ngan dang yang 'gro la/ /te dzas pha rol gnon pa dang / /gsal dang mthu dang stobs khu ba/ /d+ha nus mda' sten khyem dang gzhu/ /gzhu can dang ni pi yA laM/ /gzhu mchog /gzhu rgyud sa skyes la/ /na b+h+yes nam mkha'/ na b+hAs sprin/ /pad rtsa'i
<p>235b.3</p>'bras bu 'gro ba 'dzin/ /pa na sa ni/ char/ rdo ba/ /sna dang spre'u nad kyi dbye/ /char ldan/ tsher ldan 'bras bu la/ /ba yas 'o ma chu dag la/ /pA ya sa ni dpal gnas la/ /pA ya saM ni zas kyi mchog /puSh+ka sI ni nag mo sngo/ /khyi 'tshed/ tha shal/ 
<p>235b.4</p>puSh+ka sa/ /b+hU yas slar don mang po la/ /ma nas/ sems dang nye ba la/ /ma nis/ dga' ston gzi brjid dag /mA na sa ni rang nad 'tsho/ /ra dzas mtsho dang / yon tan dang / /ri dang mchog dang skyes pa la/ /ra b+ha ra ni de nyid dang / /dga' ba dang ni
<p>235b.5</p>shugs la yang / /ra ha sa/ gsang dang dga' ba la/ /srin po mche ldan rAk+Sha sa/ /re ta sa khu ba ro bcud dang / /'khrug dang ser sna tha ma'o/ /ro nga sa dang / ro di pI/ /mkha' dang sa gzhi dag la'o/ /lA la sa ni lhan cig brjod/ /spro ba dang ni slong
<p>235b.6</p>ba dang / /sred pa dang ni lhag pa la/ /ba spu lus dang smin byas la/ /ba yas lang tsho dang byis pa/ /sogs dang mkha' la 'gro ba la/ /bi rdis me dang rma bya dang / /ku sha'o brtsas bshang 'dor dang / /'bar ba/ bshad pa gzugs la 'o/ /bA yas ni
<p>235b.7</p>shrI bA sa/ /gtor mas rgyas dang bya rog dang / /u dusba ri kA dang ni/ /kA ka mA tsI na tshod gnas/ /ma ha sa ni gnyid can sbrul/ /chu las nges 'byung rim la legs/ /bi dwad+ma ni brtan bdag nyid/ /shes rab can dang rnam rol dang / /bsam pa rol
<p>236a</p>
<p>236a.1</p>pa rnams la'o/ /bA tas bya dang ri dwags rnams/ /'ching bar byed pa'i thabs la'o/ /bi shA sa ni gos 'bral la/ /bi b+hAt+sA ni/ srid sgrub dang / /mi sdug /btsog dang 'tshe ba la/ /be+e d+has khyab 'jug /gza' lha du
<p>236a.2</p>rtogs/ /ri ras mgo bo sde'i mchog cha/ /mchog dang gtso bo dag la'o/ /shro tas/ chu shugs/ rna ba la/ /shre yan+sa ni shis dang zhi/ /shre ya sbi ni/ blang mo dang / /pi spa lI dang khrus la yang / /she yas chos dang / bkra shis dang / /dpal dang gnas
<p>236a.3</p>khyab 'jug pad+ma dag /sa ma sa ni mdor bsdus dang / /snying dang bdug spos nus pa la/ /sa ras chu dang / lhan cig dgun dang / /lam dag la/ /sa ha sa rnam pa/ rnam g.yo la/ /sA ha sa ni dul bar 'dod/ /stobs las bya ba byed pa la'o/ /sA ri pa ni zla ba
<p>236a.4</p>bya/ /sA+e' saM ni 'di ma skyes la/ /ha bis mar dang bsreg bya la/ /a gau klas dang na gau kAs/ /sa ra b+ha dang seng ge bya/ /a d+hi ba sa gnas 'du byed/ /bdug spos la sogs rnams la'o/ /a ba d+h+wad+ma smod pa dang / /yongs gtong / kun tu phye ba la/ /u da rtsis
<p>236a.5</p>ni mi dang ni/ /steng du me lce gyen 'od can/ /ki ni yad+ma/ rjes skyes dang / /shin tu chung dang nu bo la/ /ka la haM sa/ tshogs can dang / /ngang pa'i rgyal po mi dag mchog /kum+b+hI na sa/ dug 'bar dang / /rigs lta ba dang lag 'gro la/ /kum+b+hI na sI lan tshwa'i ma/ /
<p>236a.6</p>g+ha ni ra sa chu dang ni/ /dngul chu g.yas su 'khyel ba la/ /saM tra niR+YA/ sa/ ga pur/ /su mo ra Ta sbo lu'i 'dab/ /tsan+d+ra hA sa mgrin bcu pa'i/ /ral gri ral gri gzhan la yang / /b+hA sa ra sa zangs dang ni/ /gser dang chu skyes la yang ngo / /tri shro ta sa naM/ lha'i chu klung / /
<p>236a.7</p>dza h+nu'i bu mo mtho ris 'dab/ /dIr+g+ha yus ni mda' can dang / /ka shAsma yi 'tsho byed la/ /niHgre ya saM dge ba dang / /grol ba nges legs 'phrog byed la/ /nI lany+dza sa lha mo'i dbye/ /chu klung / bye brag glog la yang / /pu narba su skar ma dang / /nag po/ kA t+yA ya na
<p>236b</p>
<p>236b.1</p>la'o/ /baur+Na mA sI/ nya gang dang / /zla ba nya dang mchod sbyin la/ /pra che tas ni/ thub pa dang / /chu lha dang ni/ nag po la/ /yo ba rI yan+sa/ gtso bo dang / /mchog gnas dang ni ches gzhon la/ /ma d+hu ra sA/ mUrbI dang / /rgun 'brum 'o ma can dag la/ /ma lI
<p>236b.2</p>ma sa/ slu ma dang / /lcags dang me tog tshur dag la/ /ma hA ra sa 'bra go dang / /mdzod byed dang ni/ go ma la/ /ra se ra sa bcud skyes dang / /bcud grub pa dang stobs la'o/ /pi b+hA ba su/ 'od chen dang / /nyi ma 'phrog byed khyad par la/ /bi sho pa su
<p>236b.3</p>dri za yi/ /bye brag dang mi mtshan mo la/ /bi hA yas ni mkha' 'gro dang / /mkha' dang lha yi lam la'o/ /shwa shre ya saM dge ba dang / /gzhan dga' ba dang skyid pa la/ /sas+t+tA rtsis ni sreg byed dang / /gdung ba'i 'od dang sar mig la/ /sa many+dza sa ri mo goms/ /
<p>236b.4</p>brdza ra sa pi wang gi /rab dbye dang ni d+hU na ka /sa d+hI yan+sa shin tu legs/ /shin tu b+haD+Ta la yang ngo / /sed+d+ha rA sa ro bcud dang / /sbrul gdug sogs so sum nA sa/ /me tog phreng dang brtan dang dbyangs/ /su me d+hAs ni gsal ldan dang / /blo gros bzang po dbang la'o/ /
<p>236b.5</p>di bya tsak+Shus don dang ni/ /dri bzang dang ni mig mdzes la/ /na b+ha/ shra mos ri mo dang / /sU pa zla ba dra ba la/ /haM gu ni rlA saM'i sgra 'di/ /nilba dang ni shing kun ro/ /hi ra N+T+ya ra has zhes pa/ /me lce bdun dang de nas yang / /res gza' spen pa nas bzlog ste phri ba'i/ /bdun gyi bdun pa dag la'o/ /sa
<p>236b.6</p>mtha'i sde'o// //ha ni khro mdangs bcas pa yi/ /glang po dang ni rdo rje la/ /hi ni dbang po bu la'o/ /a hi lha min/ br-i ha/ sprul/ /yI hA grib ma u d+Ya ma/ /u hu zla ba cha nyams dang / /mthong ba dang ni/ tshogs pa la/ /gu ha/ tshang
<p>236b.7</p>tshing / seng ge'i/ mjug /phug dang phung po rnams la'o/ /gr-i ha khyem dang / bal+lI dang / /'dzin khri 'dzin pa do shal la/ /gra ha nyi ma la sogs dang / /'ching ba nye bar chags pa dang / /skra dang at+Ya ma dang ni/ /'dzin byed dga' byed la sogs dang / /seng
<p>237a</p>
<p>237a.1</p>ge ma'i bu mun pa 'dzin/ /na hA 'ching ba brtsegs pa dang / /yangs pa glang po rkang pa tshigs/ /spro ha to/ ge byang ba dang / /sde tshan dang ni yangs pa la/ /gsum sogs grangs la de bzhin no/ /pA ta khyu mchog nga rgyal dang / /
<p>237a.2</p>rta la'o/ /bA ha bzhon pa la'o/ /ma ha dga' ston gzi brjid la/ /ma tI sa dang chu klung dang / /rmongs dang dga' ba dag la'o/ /a haM blo gros rmongs pa la/ /lo he mtshon cha dzong+ga ka /me las skyes pa thams cad la/ /bar+haM rma bya'i mjug 'ad+ba ba gshog /
<p>237a.3</p>ya hA dri bzhon phung po yul/ /khyu mchog rnams so b+Yu ha ni/ /dpung gi bkod pa tshogs dang ni/ /sprul pa dang ni rtogs pa la/ /sa ha stobs dang bzod pa sa/ /mung+ga par+Ni na Sha sman/ /sa ha lha mo gzhon nu ma/ /bzod pa dang ni ldan pa'o/ /siMha
<p>237a.4</p>mgrin pa'i sgra can dang / /khyem gyi dbye ba gtso bo gnas/ /mo tI chen po lo rgyus dang / /kau rang+ga dang ma ma be lu/ /sna ha mar dang til la sogs/ /khu ba'i rdzas dang mdza' bshes la/ /a t+yU hA ni rma bya dang / /ha d+yU ho dang rams dang sman/ /A gra ha ni rjes
<p>237a.5</p>'dzin nus/ /'dzin byed dang ni rim pa la/ /A ro ha ni ri ngos dang / /ring po nyid dang kun nas bsgreng / /mchu zheng dang ni glang po 'dul/ /nga rgyal dbye ba la yang 'gyur/ /u ha ni spro ba dang / /srad bu dang ni rgyud la yang / /ka Da hA ma ra ti la sogs/ /
<p>237a.6</p>snod dang ga pur rnams dang ni/ /mchod rten dang ni rus sbal rgyab/ /ma he'i phrug gu rnams la'o/ /ka la ha ni/ 'tshong 'bu/ 'thag /ral gri'i shubs dang ze 'bru la/ /dA t+yA ha ni/ sbrul nag dang / /phyag 'tshal dang ni mkha' 'gro la/ /na pA ha ni dang
<p>237a.7</p>po dang / /nyin mo laM dang cha sa la'o/ /na gra ha ni brgyad bkag dang / /bcing ba dang ni khrims lugs la/ /niR+Yu ha ni/ sgo khyud dang / /thod dang glang po'i mche ba la/ /nir+Shu ha ni 'doms kyi dbye/ /rtog dang nges pa dag la yang / /pa Ta ha ni yang dag
<p>237b</p>
<p>237b.1</p>rtsom/ /dmag gi rnga chen dag la'o/ /pra gra ta ni srang thag dang / /dz+yA bAn+d+ha dang / nges dang lag /rash+mi rta sogs srab dang ni/ /mo gsham gser ldan ni ba la/ /pra ga ha ni srad bu dang / /char la sogs pa'i tshad la yang / /bra bA ha ni tha snyad
<p>237b.2</p>dang / /'o ma dang ni chu rgyun la/ /pa rA ha ni/ phag mustA/ /dri bi slu sprin/ rnga chen la/ /pA ra hi ni ma mo dang / /sangs rgyas lha mor blta bar bshad/ /sman la yang ngo / /bi gra ha/ /lus dang g.yal dang rgya che la/ /rab tu rnam par char dbye dang / /
<p>237b.3</p>bsdus dang lus 'phags mi thi la'o/ /bi de ha ni mi thI lA/ /lus kyi sa stong pa la yang / /brjod pa'i de hI ni gsal ba dang / /dkar mo tshangs pa'i bud med dang / /pispa lI'o saM gra ha/ /rgya che mtshon dang khu tshur bsdus/ /mdor bsdus rnams so su ba ha/ /
<p>237b.4</p>ya dag 'bab pa la 'dod do/ /su ba hA ni/ e le'i 'dab/ /shal+lU kI dang sman dag la/ /lcug ma dang ni dang rkang dang / /se pha li kA rnams la'o/ /a b+he gra ha mngon par 'dzin/ /mngon par sbyor dang zhe sa la/ /a ba gra ha char 'gog dang / /so sor 'ching
<p>237b.5</p>dang glang po'i gral/ /a ba ro ba rang dbang min/ /rtsa ba/ lU ta steng 'gro dang / /yal ga dang ni shi pa lA/ /sum rtsen de bzhin 'bab pa'o/ /a shwa ro hA dri la ste/ /a shwa ro ha rta res pa/ /u pa ga ha mo gsham dang / /nye bar sbyor dang rjes mthun la/ /u pA nA
<p>237b.6</p>ha pi waM dang / /'ching byed rma dang byug pa la/ /gan+d+ha ba hA sna can ma/ /gan+d+ha ba ha rlung la'o/ /ta nU ru haM mkha' lding dang / /spu can ta mo pha ha na/ /rgyal gnyi ma/ mi dang ni/ /ri dwags mtshan ma rnams la'o/ /de ba sa ha sru ta dang / /ut+pal sdong bu sman la'o/ /pa ri gra ha yongs skye dang / /
<p>237b.7</p>sa laM rang byed mna' la'o/ /pa ri bA he rin dang ni/ /rgyal po/ rung ba/ yongs bgebs la/ /ba rI bA ha/ chu dbugs 'byung / /sa skyong dngos po thug pa la'o/ /pi tA ma ha pha jo bo/ /tshangs pa dang ni mes po la/ /pa ti gra ha rang gir byed/ /dmag dang rgyab dang
<p>238a</p>
<p>238a.1</p>gza'i bye brag /chen po rnams dang bi pa dang / /rlung dang de 'dzin gnas 'dzin la/ /ma hA ro hA sked pa dang / /bud med dbye ba nyin dang mtshan/ /kun 'bab ma hA sa hA ni/ /na ba sran ma'i lo ma la'o/ /pra bit+Sha ma haM zhes pa/ /mes po/ tshangs
<p>238a.2</p>pa/ pha yi pha /ha mtha'i sde'o// //k+Sha ni/ srin po/ zhing tsam la/ /ak+Sha 'khor lo zhags pa can/ /shing rta ba ru ra dang ni/ /kun spyod tha snyad bsam pa dang / /dAd+mAng+gaR+sha dag la'o/ /ak+Sh-i ra dbang po spangs ma dang / /sau brtse la la yang ngo / /ri k+ShaM b+ha l+lu dom
<p>238a.3</p>dang dmar po dang / /byas pa dang ni nor la'o/ /r-i k+shaM drang srong bye brag dang / /skar ma dang ni 'gro ba'i dbye/ /kak+Sha se ra b+ha dang ni/ /lag pa'i rtsa ba glo dang ni/ /nags tshal skam dang rtswa dang ni/ /gel pa la'o ka k+Shu ni//khyem dang gser ldan bang mdzod dang / /yongs
<p>238a.4</p>'gebs lcug ma g.yo ba dang / /'dren dang 'dzin dang snod dang ni/ /shing rta'i yan lag glang po rdul/ /tsauk+Sh-i/ bsil/ zlum po dang / /snod dang / gtsang dang yid 'ong la/ /dak+Shau thub pa 'phrog byed dang / /shing dang bya gag /me 'dzin byed/ /dak+Sho spobs
<p>238a.5</p>pa can dang me/ /dak+Sha sa gzhi'o/ d+d+haM k+Sha ni/ /bya rog dang ni kaM ka dang / /slong ba po dang rtog ge khyim/ /d+hUk+ShAk+ka i ka dang / /n+ya k+Sha mtha' dag nag po dang / /dgra sta rA ma la yang ngo / /bak+Sha phyogs dang ngos gcig dang / /khyim dang / rtsig pa zla bla mi/ /grogs po
<p>238a.6</p>rgyal po/ glang po stobs/ /bsgrub bya/ mkha' lding lus yan lag /sgyed pu/ bu ga 'gal ba dang / /skra sogs mchog dang tshogs la'o/ /prek+Sha/ blo gros gar skad cig /pak+Sha bispa la ral pa/ /khyem gyi logs la yang / /mar me'i bye brag da rda'i snod/ /b+haMk+ShA
<p>238a.7</p>'dzin dang mun pa 'jig /nyal dang / slong ba'i dngos po la/ /mo kA byad grol/ grol ba thar/ /muSh+ka ka yi rkang 'thung la'o/ /yak+Sha/ lus ngan/ gsang ba pa/ /srung ba srung byed mtshon pa la/ /rU k+Sha shing gi khyad par dang / /rtsub pa dga' ba stong pa'o/ /
<p>238b</p>
<p>238b.1</p>lak+She/ grangs dang / /khang pa mda'/ /ngo mtshar byed dang ngo mtshar la/ /a d+h+yak+Sha ni dbang byed pa/ /pa d+yuk+Sha ni mngon sum dang ni/ /mi 'gyur ba dang skad cig pa/ /mgo bo gnad dang so rnams la/ /usbrek+Sha ni snyan dngags rgyan/ /a na d+hA dag la'o/ /ga
<p>238b.2</p>bAk+Shu ni dbang po dang / /chu lha/ dA bA/ kIkI sha /go rak+Sha ni zha nye'i mtshan/ /ba lang rnams ni yongs bsrung la/ /mr-i gA k+Shi ni ri dwags mig /dbang po/ chu lha 'dod ldan la/ /rak+tA kla ni/ sai ri tha/ /'khrug dang phug ron tsa go ra/ /sa mIk+Sha ni de nyid dang / /
<p>238b.3</p>blo dang gzhung gi dbye ba dang / /ni b+ha la na rnams la'o/ /de bi br-ik+Sha lo ma bdun/ /gu gul man+dA ra sogs la/ /bI ra br-ik+Sha b+ha l+lA ta'i/ /rkang 'thung ka ku b+ha yi shing / /byu ta br-ik+Sha/ shA/ bo Ta'i/ /shing dang rkang 'thung dmar po'o/ /dza rA br-ik+Sha rma med dang / /
<p>238b.4</p>gser can dang ni saM tha la/ /bi shA lak+Sha 'phrog byed mig /yangs pa'i mig mchog ces bya'o/ /sha ka TAk+Sha shing d+ha ba/ /zur mig dang bcas zhes bya'o/ /a Na sogs dang ta bya yon tan sogs sbyor las/ /'khyog po'i tshig gi 'bras bur gyur rnams
<p>238b.5</p>blta bya ste/ /ma brjod rtags kyi tshogs rnams kyang ni drang ste/ /gal te 'ga' zhig yangs pas 'jigs la 'dir byas min/ /sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las k+Sha yig mtha' yi sde rnams rdzogs so// //da ni a
<p>238b.6</p>yig la sogs pa'ang / /de lta'i yang dag rim pa la /sna tshogs don gyi skabs 'dir ni/ /bdag gis mi zad rnams kyang brjod/ /a ni dpal mgrin/ Am saM po/ /dran pa dag dang mngon khyab dang / /nye ba khams dang lhag ma'i don/ /kun tu
<p>238b.7</p>gdung dang khro ba la/ /de dag mtshams sbyor mi bya'o/ /i ni 'dod pa skyo ba dang / /dpal dang sdug bsngal/ dngos khro ba/ /zhi ba rdzogs sangs rgyas dang / skad/ /A ni srung ba srung byed dang / /gtsang ba bya ba/ rtsom grangs med/ /r-i ni lha yi tshig smad
<p>239a</p>
<p>239a.1</p>pa/ /r-i ni lha min ma tshig smad/ /'-i yang lha yi ma la'o/ /e ni lag pa bzhi po dang / /dran pa bod pa glu dag la/ /i ni zhi ba la bshad de/ /dran pa/ bod pa 'gran pa la'ang / /aM ni tshangs pa 'od dang 'gran/ /au ni nam
<p>239a.2</p>mkha' bod pa 'gran/ /chos mchog rjes su 'dod pa la/ /aHni phyag dar la bshad do/ /ku ni smod dang / cung zad don/ /kiM ni/ bye brag sgrib pa dang / /spyo dang smod pa la yang ngo / /ki ni ma 'ongs pa dang ngal/ /ang+ga kun tu bod pa dang / /dga' dang / slar don
<p>239a.3</p>la yang blta/ /kiny+dza rtsom dang / mtha' dag la/ /tsa ni rgyud dang / rnam nges dang / /rkang pa kha skong mchan par dang / /kun las btus dang zhar byung bsdu/ /phan tshun don dang dmigs 'dzin dang / /thad ka dang ni mi snang don/ /'khyog dang mkha' 'gro la sogs
<p>239a.4</p>la/ /na nu tsa ni dri ba dang / /lha dang rtog dang yang dag brtan/ /rab tu bsngags pa dag la'o/ /prany+tsa mchog dang / 'das pa sngon/ /tho rangs dang ni bar skabs la'o/ /phyogs dang / yul dus he ru ka /dbus dang / bi nar+tha dag la'o/ /na nya med dang dgag
<p>239a.5</p>pa dang / /de dang 'gal dang de las gzhan/ /'dra ba dang ni cung zad don/ /rang bzhin don dang rim pa la'o/ /<p>]puSh+bU[</p> rab tu bsngags pa dang / /shin tu don dang legs pa dang / /bzang dang kha na ma tho med/ /a ti bar dang med pa dang / /dbus kyi don dang bstos pa
<p>239a.6</p>dang / /'dra ba nyid dang da ltar 'dor/ /phul du byung dang gong ba la'o/ /a tas dmigs kyis ston pa dang / /nges bstan lnga pa'i don dang byed/ /an+ta tas ni bstan pa dang / /lnga pa'i don dang sgom yan lag /rjes shes phra ma gnod pa la'ang / /a ho/ ngo mtshar
<p>239a.7</p>'dod pa dang / /skyo dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /rjes su brtse ba dag la'o/ /A rang ring dang nye ba la/ /i tas nges pa cha dag dang / /lnga pa'i don la yang bshad do/ /a ti rgyu dang rdzogs pa dang / /gleng gzhi rab dbye gsal byed sogs/ /rjes su 'gugs pa
<p>239b</p>
<p>239b.1</p>rnams dang ni/ /rnam pa 'on te'i don rnam rtog /u ni/ 'dri dang rnam rtog don/ /ki ni dri dang 'dod pa dag /ki mu ta ni/ phul byung dang / /dri dang rnam rtog don la'ang grags/ /ku tas rtogs dang 'dri ba dang / /lnga pa'i don la yang dran no/ /he ni khyod don sbyin
<p>239b.2</p>byin don/ /me ni bdag don bdag gi ba/ /tu ni rkang pa kha skong dang / /dbye ba dmigs 'dzin kun sdud pa/ /ta tas dang po yongs su 'dri/ /lnga pa'i don dang gtam bzhin no/ /ta pas bas me chad dang chad/ /mig 'dzin pa dang cung zad yod/ /yongs
<p>239b.3</p>'bebs la'o/ /pab+tsa ta ni/ /nub dang phyi ma la yang ngo / /pu ra stang ni shar dang / sngar/ /snga ma'i don dang dang po la/ /pra ti slar sbyin dang po dang / /so sor nges par 'dzin pa dang / /gtso bo 'byung dang thob 'dod dang / /mtshan nyid sogs dang rab sbyor dang / /
<p>239b.4</p>tsam gyi don dang mngon phyogs dang / /rab tu gsal dang brjod pa la'ang / /ba ta skyo dang rtse dang / smod/ /mgu dang 'bod dang rmad byung la/ /ya tas sgra ni nges pa dang / /lnga ma'i don dang rnam 'byed la/ /yad+ba ta tri dang rnam rtog la/ /ya ta bdag dang nges bzung
<p>239b.5</p>la/ /sI man/ le'u ka ta ste/ /shwa twata yang dang rtag tu'i don/ /shi ti ni/ dri dang rnam rtog la/ /sa kr-ita lhan cig lan cig la/ /sA k+Shata mngon sum mtshungs pa dag /swaste smon dge bsod nams dang / /bde legs bde ba la sogs la/ /han+ta dga'
<p>239b.6</p>dang rjes su brtse / /dag dang rtsom pa dug la sogs/ /dug sogs bzang ba'i don la yang / /han+ta'i sgra ni rab tu sbyor/ /a tha/ a tho dge ba dang / /dri dang rtsom dang the tshom dang / /bar ma chad la'o a n+ya thA/ /de bzhin min dang rnam gzhan don/ /ta thA/ de 'dra
<p>239b.7</p>nges bstan dang / /nges dang kun sdud pa dang ni/ /rgyud dang / skyed par byed pa dang / /mdor bstan dang ni so so'i dag /ya thA rjes dpag de 'dra dang / /nges bstan mdor bstan dag dang ni/ /rgyu dang skyed byed dag la yang / /dr-i thA nad dang bor ba dang / /rgyu med
<p>240a</p>
<p>240a.1</p>mo gsham thams cad du/ /rgyu des dag la blta bar bya/ /ud gtso bo rab gsal dang / /thar pa 'ching ba steng gi las/ /byu ru thob pa dngos po dang / /bral ba rang rus nus med la/ /a nu rim pa dman pa dang / /rjes kyi don dang
<p>240a.2</p>lhan cig don/ /zheng che ba dang nye ba'i don/ /'dra ba mtshan nyid la sogs la/ /ki nu dri dang rnam rtog la/ /na nu dri dang dmigs 'dzin dang / /'bod pa rjes khrid rjes gnang dang / /nA nA/ du ma bor don dang / /gnyi ga'i don rnams la yang ngo / /ni na/ rtag dang
<p>240a.3</p>nges pa dang / /ngo mtshar rnam bkod mdor phung po/ /nang gi dngos dang dngos po dang / /mthong ba dang ni sbyin pa po/ /'ching dang mchog tu zhi ba dang / /thar dang dge ba/ the tshom dang / /gnas la'o nu ni/ rjes khrid don/ /gnas dang rigs dang 'dra ba dang / /
<p>240a.4</p>rgyu yi don la blta bar bya/ /a pa nag po bral don dang / /bor ba'i don dang klog pa dang / /bral dang mi snyug chom rkun dga'/ /nges par bstan pa dag la'o/ /a be+e srid pa/ dgos pa dang / /dri dang / smod dang kun sdud dang / /rigs pa tshig don
<p>240a.5</p>'dod spyod dang / /bya ba rnams la'o u pa ni/ /dman dang ngan dang khyab pa dang / /rtsom dang / mchod pa dag dang ni/ /spyod med byed pa sbyin pa dang / /sbyin gnas dang ni 'das pa dang / /ud ni brtson pa skyon dang gtam/ /'chi med don dang brtson pa'i don/ /
<p>240a.6</p>bsdu ba dang ni byug 'dod dang / /mu ba'i don sgra ni rab tu grags/ /ba yi sgra ni dpe la 'gyur/ /chu lha la yang 'di nyid do/ /bA ni rnam rtog dpe dang ni/ /kho na'i don dang kun sdu pa'o/ /bai ni rkang pa kha skong dang / /'brel pa rjes 'khrid nges pa la'o/ /a b+hi
<p>240a.7</p>'di ltar gyur dang gtam/ /mngon par 'dod dang mngon du phyogs/ /a b+hIk+Sh+naM yang yang / myur/ /phul byung dang ni rgyud la'o/ /A b+hi k+Sh+D+yaM yang de bzhin te/ /yang yang dang ni rgyud la 'dod/ /a mA lhan cig don dang / nye/ /gnam stong dang ni lhan cig go/ /
<p>240b</p>
<p>240b.1</p>a pa bye ni 'bad dang / rtag /a laM rgyan dang / chog tshig dang / /'bras med nus ldan thob dmigs 'dzin/ /i dA dI ni/ tshig rgyan la/ /saM ni sngar don la yang 'dod/ /i ni sdug bsngal sgom pa dang / /khro dang mngon sum kun tu 'dzin/ /uM ni dri dang khab len khro/ /uM ni
<p>240b.2</p>dri dang khab len khro dang s+zo/ /e waM rnam pa dpe dang ni/ /khas len dang ni nges gzung dang / /oM ni rjes su 'dod pa dang / /brjod dang rab bsngags rim pa la/ /ka ni mgo dang bde dang chu/ /ka thi dri ba rnam pa la/ /paM ni g.yo dang 'byung ba la/ /ma mi rjes
<p>240b.3</p>su 'dod pa la/ /pra na 'dod dang rjes bgrod nyi/ /kaM ni dri dang smad pa la/ /dzo Sha tshi smra bde ba dang / /rab tu bstod dang g.yo ba la/ /ud+di naM ni nyin chud dang / /nyi ma so sor gnas pa la/ /tuSh+NI kA ni ma sma tsam/ /tU Sh+NI kaM ni thub pa can/ /nA ma rab gsal
<p>240b.4</p>'byung ba dang / /ngan dang khas len khro ba la/ /nu nam rnam par rtog pa dang / /don nges pa la rnam par bshad/ /prA d+ha gug pa rjes su mthun/ /phul byung nges dang shin tu'i don/ /shaM ni dge dang bde ba la/ /saM ni chags don mnyam pa'i don/ /mdzes
<p>240b.5</p>pa'i don dang phul byung don/ /sma ni 'das dang rkang pa skong / /sa mA smod dang gnyis ldan la/ /saM pra taM ni da ltar ba/ /haM ni khro tshig rjes khrid lus/ /pra gu nga ni rnam rtog la/ /hUM ni rnam gnon rjes su 'dod/ /sdig pa la yang 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /a yi kA
<p>240b.6</p>ni cha/ shas ngan/ /smra ba rtogs dang dga' tshig dang / /g.yul ngor son dang rjes khrid dang / /'gro dang kun 'khor khro ba la/ /A ya dran dang dug sogs dang / /dus mtha' dang ni dbus dag la/ /an+ta rA ni bral don dang / /dbus kyi don dang nye ba'i don/ /
<p>240b.7</p>an+tar rab mtha'i don dbus don/ /rang gi byed don rnams la blta/ /u ra rI dang U ra rI/ /U rI/ rgya che rang gir byas/ /dur ni dgag pa/ dka' tshegs dang / /'gro sogs don dang bul byung min/ /nir ni ma lus dgag pa dang / /b+h+r-i sha sogs don nges
<p>241a</p>
<p>241a.1</p>pa la/ /pa rA rtogs pa gnod pa dang / /so sor smra dang gtso bo mchog /mngon phyogs rnam par thar pa dang / /nges pa'i don dang rnam gnon la/ /pa ri kun nas dngos po dang / /thob 'dod mtshan nyid la sogs dang / /'khyud
<p>241a.2</p>dang gos dang khyab pa dang / /nad dang mya ngan mchod pa mchog /sa skyong skyon bshad bor ba la/ /phu nar dbye ba dang po dang / /snga mar gyur pa sngon rabs dang / /rab bcings nyid dang 'das pa dang / /sa bla mtho ris 'jig rten gzhan/ /ke la mdzes dang
<p>241a.3</p>lo rgyus dang / /srid pa dang ni rjes khrid don/ /kha lu tshig rgyan thob 'dod dgag /nges dang rgyun dang mi smra dang / /shes 'dod la sogs rnams la dran/ /a ba khyab dang yongs bsgom dang / /bral ba dmigs pa dgag pa dang / /chung zad don dang rnam
<p>241a.4</p>shes dang / /dpe dang nges par gzung ba la/ /bas ni khyed rnams shes don dang / /dbye ba dang ni rnam pa dang / /'das dang tha dad don gtso dang / /dngos po dang ni mkha' 'gro la'o/ /u ShA grangs dang / grangs bcas dang / /mtshan mo'i mtha' dang nges
<p>241a.5</p>nyal 'dod/ /do ShA/ mtshan mo'i sgo dang ni/ /mtshan mo dang ni sprin la yang / /ni Sha ShA ni mtha' dang dbus/ /bsrung ba dang ni gzhan la yang / /a gra has ni dang po dang / /rtse mo mchog dang de nyid dang / /mi smra rnams so/ /a b+hi ta/ /mtha' dang
<p>241a.6</p>mtha' dag mngon phyogs dang / /gnyi ga dang ni myur ba la/ /ti ras bdud 'gro mi snang dang / /ngal ba dang ni dgag pa dang / /mtha' dag pa dang ni 'das pa dag /nI tsi rang dbang chung bar 'dod/ /pu ras mchog dang dang po la/ /gu rang sa na dang po
<p>241a.7</p>mchog /pra tas snga nyin snga dro la/ /pu rbeR+Yus ni chos kyi gnas/ /snga ma'i don dang kha nyin dang / /phyi phyir dang ni yang dang yang / /mang ba'i don la mi tha ste/ /phan tshun dang ni 'phrog pa'o/ /prA dus rab gsal spyod pa dang / /srid pa tsam la'ang blta ba'o/ /
<p>241b</p>
<p>241b.1</p>sa nais/ dal bus rgyu bar bshad/ /rang dbang dang ni legs mchod dang / /nges pa'i don dang rjes su bgrod/ /dka' tshegs dang ni yang dag 'byor/ /de dus tsam dang bab chol dang / /glo bur byung ba la yang ngo / /ma hA mya ngan las skyes dang / /ngan
<p>241b.2</p>dang dug dang snying rje'i don/ /a ho/ 'dri dang rnam dpyod dang / /rmad byung skyong ba rnams la 'dod/ /a hA hA ni ngo mtshar skye/ /a ha ha ni phra rgyas dang / /yongs su nyon mongs rab dga' la/ /A ha/ skyod dang nges sbyor don/ /u tA ho ni 'di dag
<p>241b.3</p>rtog /sa ha'i sgra ni mtha' dag dang / /cig car dang ni yang dag spyor/ /'dra dang yod dang 'brel pa la/ /ha ni rkang pa kha skong dang / /'brel pa dang ni dman pa'o/ /hA ni dug la sogs pa la/ /hA hA skyo ba la rab grags/ /dri za la yang / hA hA'o/ /he ni
<p>241b.4</p>bye brag nges gzung dang / /rkang pa kha skong dag la'o/ /hI ni ngo mtshar dug sogs dang / /dga' dang sdug bsngal rgyu rnams la'o/ /hI tI ngo mtshar dgod pa la/ /hU tU dga' dang dri za la/ /he hai yong min dran pa dang / /bod pa dang ni rgyu rnams la/ /ho dang
<p>241b.5</p>ho ni mtha' dag dang / /bod pa dang ni 'gran par 'dod/ /mik+Sha/ myur dang nges pa'i don/ /de nyid la yang 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /mi zad pa don du ma can rnams so/ /bal po'i lo sum brgya brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa las/ dbo'i zla ba'i nag pa'i tshes brgyad gza'
<p>241b.6</p>phur bu'i nyin/ dpal rol pa'i grong / gau ta ma lhag par gnas pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por/ paN+Di ta gnas brtan dpal rigs mchog dpal ye shes kyis 'drir bcug pa'i sde tshan rdzogs so// //'di ni lha dang mi yi yon
<p>241b.7</p>gnas dam pa mtshungs med sprul sku rin po che zhwa dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa/ dpal phag mo gru pa'i gdan sa rin po che thel gyi spyan snga rin po che'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' bzhin/ zha lu lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma pA la b+ha dra zhes bgyi bas/ snga 'gyur gyi 'chi
<p>242a</p>
<p>242a.1</p>med mdzod la sogs pa la brten nas bod skad la mi mkho ba'i rtags ngos 'dzin pa'i tshig la sogs pa bor/ bshad gzhir rgya skad sor 'jog dgos pa dang / skad dod ma rnyed pa rnams sor bzhag ste bsgyur cing zhus te dag par
<p>242a.2</p>bgyis pa'o// //[]@/ /dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi man ngag bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ kA la tsakra ga Ni ta mu kha de sha /bod skad du/ dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi man ngag /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sha ka'i lo 1071kla klo'i
<p>242a.3</p>lo 590dag pa'i lo 450dam dag pa'i zla ba'i tshogs 126 ga pa'i zla ba'i tshogs 450me mkha' rgya mtsho 407 la lag pa gdengs can zla bas phri ba'i lhag ma'i lo 721yang drug cus phri ba'i lhag ma'i lo41dang por lo drug cu'i nang nas lo bcu dgu
<p>242a.4</p>ma 'das par byas so zhes pa ni phyogs gcig gi rnam par rtog pa ste dang po'i lo'i d+hU ba ka 61 de bzhin gshegs pa'i dus nas lo drug brgya na 'jam dpal gyi dus so/ /de nas lo brgyad brgya na kla klo'i dus so/ /kla klo'i dus de las mkha' mkha' chu gter
<p>242a.5</p>zla ba'i lo las brgya brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis dman pa las zla ba dang d+hU ba ka la sogs pa bya'o zhes pa man ngag go/ /lo bcu dgu yang de la zhugs pa'i phyir tha dad du ma byas zhes so / /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus 'khor zhes bya gnyis
<p>242a.6</p>med pa/ /dus kyi bdag nyid phyag byas nas/ /gti mug mun pa gzhig pa'i phyir/ /de yi sgron me rab gsal bya/ /'dir d+hU ba ka'i rang bzhin lo lnga brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gsum rnams ni rtag par mi 'gyur te/ rab byung la sogs pa'i lo drug cu rdzogs
<p>242a.7</p>pan d+hU ba ka gzhan gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa gsum du 'gyur ro/ /de ltar lo drug cu rdzogs pa na drug cu drug cu 'jug pa'i phyir nges pa 'di ni mi rtag go zhes shes par bya'o/ /de la yang lnga brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gsum gyi bdag
<p>242b</p>
<p>242b.1</p>nyid la da ltar gyi lo'i d+hU ba ka'i don du rab byung la sogs pa'i lo gzhug par bya'o/ /rab byung la sogs pa'i lo drug cu rnams 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ste/ de skad du/ sha ka dbang po'i 'das lo rnams/ /drag pos bsgyur zhing yang bzhis
<p>242b.2</p>bsgyur/ /dgu brgyad bzhi dang ldan byas nas/ /stong pa mda' ri 'dod pas bgo/ /rnyed pa sha ka'i lo bcas pa/ /drug cus dag byas rab byung sogs/ /zhes pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin te/ 'di yin nam brtag /sha ka zhes bya ba'i rgyal
<p>242b.3</p>po 'das pa'i lo rnams bcu gcig gis bsgyur nas slar yang bzhis bsgyur bar bya'o/ /dgu brgyad bzhi dang ldan byas nas/ /zhes pa bzhi brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa dgu ldan par bya'o/ /stong pa mda' ri 'bod pas bgo/ /zhes
<p>242b.4</p>pa khri sum stong bdun brgya lnga bcus bgos pa'i lhag ma phyis te rnyed pa dang lhan cig pa'i sha ka'i lo drug bcus bgos pa'i lhag ma ni/ rab byung la sogs pa'i lor 'gyur ro/ /rnyed pa ni rab byung la sogs pa'i lo drug cu
<p>242b.5</p>rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas mi gzung ngo / /rab byung la sogs pa dang kla klo la sogs pa'i rim pas drug cu'i mthar thug pa'i rang rang gi ming ni rab tu grags pa dang gzhung mangs pa'i 'jigs pas ma bris so/ /des na
<p>242b.6</p>rab byung la sogs pa dang lhan cig lnga brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gsum ni kla klo'i lo ru rab tu grags so/ /de la brgya brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis dman pa'i lhag ma ni zla ba'i don du bcu gnyis kyis bsgyur bar bya'o/ /da ltar gyi zla ba'i don du nag
<p>242b.7</p>pa la sogs pa'i zla ba ldan par bya ste de'i rim pa ni 'di yin no/ /sa ga'i zla ba nas brtsams te gcig la sogs pa bcu gcig gi mthar thug pa gzhug par bya'o/ /nag pa'i zla ba la ni lo ril po longs pas lo gcig bcug nas brtsi
<p>243a</p>
<p>243a.1</p>bar bya'o/ /zla ba'i tshogs 'di rnams kyang zla ba'i shol gzung ba'i phyir steng dang 'og gi ngo bos gnas gnyis su bya'o/ /'dir nyi ma rgyu ba'i dbang gis zla ba phyed bcas sum cu rtsa gnyis rdzogs pa na shol gyi zla ba gcig
<p>243a.2</p>'byung bas na zla ba phyed bcas sum cu rtsa gnyis po bzhis bsgyur bas brgya sum cur gyur la/ yang na gnyis bsgyur bas drug cu rtsa lngar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba'i shol bde blag tu gzung ba'i phyir bzhi'am gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis
<p>243a.3</p>rgyu mtshan can bgo bya zla ba'i tshogs kyang bzhi'am gnyis kyis bsgyur bas dag par rtogs par bya'o/ /rgyud dang 'grel pa ni mthun par bzhis bsgyur ba kho na'o zhes shes par bya'o/ /de'i phyir zla ba'i tshogs la brgya sum cu kho nas sngar bshad pa'i rim
<p>243a.4</p>pas sam yang na drug cu rtsa lngas bgos pas thob pa ni shol gyi zla ba'i bdag nyid de steng du zla ba'i tshogs la bcug ste/ steng du zla ba'i tshogs zla ba dag pa'i bdag nyid bya'o/ /lhag ma ni ma rdzogs pa'i phyir mi gzung ngo / /gang gi tshe lhag ma cung zad
<p>243a.5</p>kyang ma lus pa de'i tshe zla ba gnyis pa 'phel te zla ba re re'i 'phel ba/ zla ba ril po dang ldan pa zla ba gnyis 'phel ba la slar yang shol gyi zla ba gcig 'byung ngo zhes nges par bya'o/ /de'i tshe zla ba gzhan zhig bcug ste/ zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa zhes pa la
<p>243a.6</p>sogs pa'i d+hU ba ka gsum la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /yang na 'das pa'i zla ba dang yang dag par 'brel pa'i d+hU ba ka gsum la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin gza' la gza' gcig dang / gza'i chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ril po la ril po gnyis dang / ril
<p>243a.7</p>po'i cha shas la gcig dang / skar ma la skar ma gnyis dang / chu tshod la chu tshod bcu gcig bcug ste/ shol gyi zla ba dang yang dag par 'brel pa'i d+hU ba ka gsum rtogs par bya'o/ /zla ba gnyis 'phel ba'i zla ba ril po ni ma 'ongs pa'i zla ba dang yang dag par
<p>243b</p>
<p>243b.1</p>'brel par rtogs par bya'o/ /dag pa'i zla ba'i tshogs so/ /da ni gza'i d+hU ba ka brjod par bya ste/ dag pa'i zla ba steng dang 'og gi ngo bos gnas gsum du bya ste/ steng ma gza'i bdag nyid dag gnas 'og ma chu tshod kyi bdag nyid dang / gnas par
<p>243b.2</p>ma zla ba so so'i gza'i chu tshod kyi don te/ de rnams sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bsgyur nas 'og ma'i phung po lo drug gis bgos pas thob pa bu lon gyi bdag nyid yin pas chu tshod kyi dngos po las dbyi bar bya'o/ /bgos pa'i lhag ma drug cus bsgyur nas drug gis
<p>243b.3</p>thob pa chu srang gi bdag nyid yin pas sngar gye thob pa'i 'og tu bri bar bya'o/ /lhag ma drug gis bsgyur nas drug gis bgos pas thob pa dbugs kyi bdag nyid yin pas de'i 'og tu gzhag par bya'o/ /chu srang gcig ni dbugs drug gi bdag nyid kyi phyir
<p>243b.4</p>sgyang bar bya'o/ /de nas steng dang 'og gi ngo bos gnas bzhir byas nas gza'i gnas kyi gza' ni chu tshod drug cu'i bdag nyid do/ /chu tshod kyi gnas ni chu srang drug cu'i bdag nyid dang / chu srang gi gnas ni dbugs drug gi bdag nyid du gnas so/ /des na dbugs drug
<p>243b.5</p>tshang ba ni chu srang gcig gi bdag nyid du 'gyur ro/ /chu srang drug cu tshang ba ni chu tshod gcig gi bdag nyid du 'gyur ro/ /chu tshod drug cu tshang ba ni gza' gcig gi bdag nyid du 'gyur te/ de ltar thams cad du rtog par bya'o/ /nges pa 'di ni nub par byed pa
<p>243b.6</p>la 'ongs pa ste/ nyi ma la sogs pa 'char bar byed pa'i don du steng gi phung por gza' gnyis nor dang / 'og gi phung por chu tshod sum cu nor du 'gyur ro/ /chu tshod kyi phung po drug cu'i cha thob pa steng gi phung por bsres nas steng gi phung po'i bdun gyis
<p>243b.7</p>bgos pa'i lhag ma ni gza' ru 'gyur ro/ /lhag ma gcig la sogs pa ni nyi ma la sogs pa rab tu grags pa rnams so/ /rnyed pa ni gza' 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas mi gzung ngo / /da ni gza'i bdag nyid kyi ril po'i d+hU ba ka brjod par bya ste/ dag pa'i
<p>244a</p>
<p>244a.1</p>zla ba la brgya dang bcu gnyis bsres nas steng dang 'og gi ngo bos gnas gnyis su byas te/ gnas 'og ma brgya dang nyi shu rtsa drug gis bgos pa'i rnyed pa la lnga bsres te/ steng gi phung po gnyis kyis bskyur ba la nor du sbyin par
<p>244a.2</p>bya'o/ /gang gi phyir 'dir zla ba rgyu ba'i dbang gis zla ba brgya nyi shu rtsa drug na ril po gcig tu 'gyur bas ril po'i gnas su gcig lhag par 'gyur ro/ /gnas steng ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bgos pa'i lhag ma ni ril por 'gyur ro/ /rnyed pa ni gza' 'khor
<p>244a.3</p>ba'i ngo bo yin pas mi gzung ngo / /brgya nyi shu rtsa drug gis bgos pa'i lhag ma ni ril po'i cha shas yin pas ril po'i 'og tu gzhag par bya'o/ /da ni nyi ma'i d+hU ba ka brjod par bya ste/ dag pa'i zla ba steng dang 'og gi ngo bos gnas pa rnams/ /steng
