<p>244a.4</p>ma rgyu skar gyi bdag nyid dang 'og ma chu tshod kyi rang bzhin no/ /gnas par ma bcu gcig gis bsgyur te/ gnas 'og ma la sum cu rtsa dgus bgos pas thob par gnyis bsres te gzhag pa ni chu tshod kyi rang bzhin no/ /lhag ma drug cus bsgyur nas
<p>244a.5</p>des bgos pas thob pa ni chu srang gi bdag nyid de de'i 'og tu bri bar bya'o/ /lhag ma drug gis bsgyur te des bgos pas thob pa ni dbugs kyi bdag nyid de de'i 'og tu gzhag par bya'o/ /chu srang dang dbugs kyi bdag nyid kyi rnyed pa dag la yang gnyis
<p>244a.6</p>bsre ba snga ma bzhin bya'o/ /sngar gyi chu tshod dbus ma'i chu tshod kyi gnas la sbyangs te/ chu srang dang dbugs ril po ni 'og tu phab la sbyar bar bya'o zhes pa ni thams cad du spyi'i rigs pa'o/ /de nas dbus ma'i phung po chu tshod kyi bdag nyid la drug
<p>244a.7</p>cu'i chas thob pa ni steng gi phung po gnyis kyis bsgyur ba la nor du 'gyur/ de las nyi shu rtsa bdun du bgos pa'i lhag ma ni rgyu skar du 'gyur ro/ /rnyed pa ni rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo yongs su 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas mi gzung ngo / /gnas 'og ma ni
<p>244b</p>
<p>244b.1</p>snga ma bzhin du chu tshod kyi bdag nyid du 'gyur te/ dag pa'i zla ba'i d+hU ba ka'o/ /gang gi tshe rtsis la le lor gyur pa de'i tshe gza' la gza' gcig dang / gza'i chu tshod la chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / ril po la ril po gnyis dang / ril po'i
<p>244b.2</p>cha shas la ril po'i cha shas gcig dang / skar ma la skar ma gnyis dang / skar ma'i chu tshod bcu gcig rnams zla ba re re la sbyin par bya ste/ ma dag pa'i gza' la sogs pa'i d+hU ba ka'o/ /de lta bus gza' la sogs pa dag par bya ste/ dkar po'i
<p>244b.3</p>tshes gcig nas brtsams nas ji srid gnam stong gi mthar thug pa nyi ma sum cu zla ba'i rkang pa la sogs pa'i rim pas gza' re 'phel bas gza' la gza' ril po sbyin zhing / gza'i chu tshod la chu tshod kyi rang bzhin rnams dbri'o/ /gal te dbri zhing
<p>244b.4</p>sbyangs pa'i rang bzhin la gza'i chu tshod ma longs pa de'i tshe/ gza' gcig chu tshod drug cur byas te 'og tu phab nas sbyang bar bya'o zhes pa thams cad du rig par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe yang phab pa'i gza' zla ba'i rkang pa dang nyi ma'i rkang pa la sogs pas nor
<p>244b.5</p>dang bu lon du byas pa la phab par gyur pa chu tshod drug cur ma longs pa de'i tshe tshes da ltar ba de chad do zhes rig par bya'o/ /de'i tshe tshes de dor nas ma 'ongs pa'i tshes byin nas bya ba thams cad bya'o/ /gang gi tshe yang rtsis kyi dbang gis chu tshod drug tu lhag par gyur
<p>244b.6</p>pa de'i tshe de lhag go zhes rig par bya'o/ /de'i tshe yang chu tshod drug cu ni da ltar ba'i gza' phri bar bya'o/ /chu tshod lhag pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i gza' la phri bar bya'o/ /ji srid chu tshod lhag pa nas chad pa'i bar du'o/ /chu tshod lhag pa dang chad pa rnams ni thun
<p>244b.7</p>mong gi rigs pas mnyam pa kho nar 'gyur ro/ /tshogs kyi cha la bcu bzhis bgos pa'i rnyed pa mnyam na nor dang mi mnyam na bu lon du rtogs par bya'o/ /de la gcig dang gsum gyi cha ni mi mnyam pa ste bu lon no/ /gnyis dang bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa
<p>245a</p>
<p>245a.1</p>ste nor du rtogs par bya'o/ /rnyed pa med na'ang mnyam pa ste gza' dang chu tshod rnams su nor dang bu lon gyi 'phel 'grib rtogs par bya'o/ /'dir yang lnga la sogs pa'i rnyed pa ni med de/ gang gi phyir ril po la nyi shu
<p>245a.2</p>rtsa brgyad kyis bgos pa na/ nyi shu rtsa bdun las lhag pa'i lhag ma med la/ de la tshes sum cu sbyin yang lnga bcu rtsa bdun las lhag pa yod pa ma yin zhing / de la bcu bzhis bcad pa'i rnyed pa bzhi kho nar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gnyis bgos pa'i rnyed pa ni
<p>245a.3</p>rkang pa so so la nor dang bu lon du 'gyur bas mi gzung ngo / /bgos pa'i lhag ma ni zla ba'i rkang pa so so rtogs par byed de/ gcig la sogs pa bcu gsum gyi mthar thug par rtogs par bya'o/ /zla ba'i rkang pa rtogs par byed pa lhag ma gcig la
<p>245a.4</p>sogs pa bcu gsum gyi mthar thug pa phyis nas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba'i rkang pa'i gnas nas rnams rtogs par bya'o/ /de la bcu bzhis bgos pa'i lhag ma gcig gam bcu gsum la zla ba'i rkang pa lngar shes par bya'o/ /de bzhin du gnyis sam bcu
<p>245a.5</p>gnyis la bcu'o/ /gsum dang bcu gcig la bco lnga'o/ /bzhi dang bcu la bcu dgu'o/ /lnga dang dgu la nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/ /drug dang brgyad la nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /bdun la nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /de la yang nyi ma'i rkang pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'i dor ba ni nyi
<p>245a.6</p>ma bzhin te/ gal te nyi ma la sbyin na ni 'di la yang sbyin no/ /gal te nyi ma la dor na ni 'di la yang 'dor ro/ /da ni sngar bshad pa'i zla ba'i rkang pa 'char ba rnams kyis bsgyur ba'i bya ba bde blag tu yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir so sor brjod par bya ste/ de la
<p>245a.7</p>ril po la bcu bzhis bgos pa'i lhag ma stong pa la ni sbyin pa'am dor ba ci yang med do/ /'on kyang ril po'i cha shas gza'i rkang pa dang po'i mtshan ma lngas bsgyur nas brgya nyi shu rtsa drug gis bgos pa'i rnyed pa zla ba'i gza'i rkang pa dang lhan cig bsre
<p>245b</p>
<p>245b.1</p>bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ni drug cus bsgyur te bgos pa'i rnyed pa chu srang gi bdag nyid yin pas gza'i rkang pa'i 'og tu bri bar bya'o/ /lhag ma drug gis bsgyur te des bgos pas thob pa ni dbugs kyi tshogs te/ de'i yang 'og tu gzhag par bya'o/ /'chad
<p>245b.2</p>par 'gyur ba rnams la yang bkod pa de ltar shes par bya'o/ /lhag ma gcig lus pa na rkang pa'i mtshon byed phyis nas de'i gnas 'og ma rgyu ba'i rkang pas rgyu bar bya ste sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas so/ /lhag ma gnyis lus pa na gnyis po phyis nas
<p>245b.3</p>gza'i rkang pa snga ma dang lhan cig shes par bya'o/ /ril po'i cha shas ni sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas de'i gnas 'og ma lngas bsgyur bar bya'o/ /bcu bzhis bgos pa'i lhag ma gsum la ni gza'i rkang pa snga ma bcu dang lhan cig bco lnga'o/ /ril
<p>245b.4</p>po'i cha shas ni snga ma bzhin de'i gnas 'og ma bzhis bsgyur bar bya'o/ /lhag ma bzhi la ni snga ma gsum dang lhan cig bcu dgu ste/ ril po'i cha shas ni snga ma bzhin de'i gnas 'og ma gsum gyis bsgyur bar bya'o/ /lhag ma lnga la ni snga ma bzhi dang
<p>245b.5</p>lhan cig nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/ ril po'i cha shas ni snga ma bzhin gnyis kyis bsgyur bar bya'o/ /lhag ma drug la ni snga ma lnga dang lhan cig nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ ril po'i cha shas ni snga ma bzhin gcig gis bsgyur bar bya'o/ /lhag ma bdun la ni snga ma drug dang
<p>245b.6</p>lhan cig nyi shu rtsa lnga ste/ ril po'i cha shas ni de'i gnas 'og ma gcig gis bsgyur nas brgya nyi shu rtsa drug gis thob pa chu srang la sogs par byas nas gza'i rkang pa nyi shu rtsa lnga las bu lon dbrog par bya'o/ /lhag ma brgyad la ni thams cad du rkang pa'i
<p>245b.7</p>mtshon byed kyi mtshan ma phyis nas spyad zin pa'i rkang pa rnams dor te/ ma spang pa'i rkang pa'i gnas drug la gnas pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams gza'i rkang pa la phri bar bya'o/ /thams cad du bar gyi ri mo brgal nas rim min la ni 'das shing spyad zin
<p>246a</p>
<p>246a.1</p>pa'i gza'i rkang pa rnams dor te/ ma spyad pa rnams bsdoms nas dgod par bya zhing / rim pa la ni dbus kyi ri mo'i bar spyad zin pa'i rkang pa'i gnas rnams gza'i rkang pa la bsres nas dgod par bya'o/ /khyad par ni ril
<p>246a.2</p>po'i cha shas rim pas bgrod pa la spyad zin pa'i gza'i rkang pa'i gnas las 'og gi gza'i rkang pas bsgyur bar 'dod la/ de la brgya nyi shu rtsa drug gis thob pa gza'i rkang pa dang ji ltar rigs par bsre bar bya'o/ /rim min du bgrod pa la ril po'i
<p>246a.3</p>cha shas ni spyad zin pa'i de ma thag pa'i steng na gnas pas bsgyur te/ de brgya nyi shu rtsa drug gis bgos pas thob pa gza'i rkang pa ji ltar rigs par bu lon dbrog par bya'o/ /lhag ma bcu gcig la ni ma spyad pa'i gnas gsum la gnas pa bco lnga'o/ /
<p>246a.4</p>lhag ma bcu gnyis la ni ma spyad pa'i gnas gnyis la gnas pa bcu'o/ /lhag ma bcu gsum la ni ma spyad pa'i gnas gcig la gnas pa lnga'o/ /bcu bzhis bgos pas gza'i rkang pa stongs pa la gnas na sngar bshad pa nyid rigs so/ /nyi ma'i rkang
<p>246a.5</p>pa las byung ba ni phyogs 'di la yang thun mong du sbyin pa dang dor ba nyid de/ de dag gza'i rkang pa dang 'dra bar sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i bgrod pa la gza' dang chu tshod rnams su sbyin pa dang dor ba rtogs par bya'o/ /gza'i rkang pa
<p>246a.6</p>'di rnams byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyis mthong bar bya ba'i phyir bris te/ gza' dang tshes dang skar ma dag pa'o/ /da ni nyi ma so so'i nyi ma dag pa brjod par bya ste/ skar ma'i d+hU ba ka la dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te nyi ma sum cu rnams su re re 'phel
<p>246a.7</p>bas tshes de/ bzhis bsgyur zhing de la gsum tshes de'i/ gyi cha chu srang nyi shu/ dag gis bsres te/ tshes dang po la chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang nyi shu 'byung 'dir chu srang gcig chad pas cung mdag pa de d+h+rU ba ka'i skabs su gnas dbus ma bcu gcig gis bsgyur bas bgos te dag
<p>246b</p>
<p>246b.1</p>bar 'gyur bas chad pa'i skyon med do/ /da dung dbugs lnga dang 'dod cha brgyad kyis mdag pa'i cha yod do/ /ba de yang skar ma'i d+h+rU ba ka la bcug ste/ nyi ma re re la 'phel ba de bzhin bya'o/ /yang na chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang nyi shu rtsa gnyis bcug ste 'di nyid dag go zhes bstan to/ /
<p>246b.2</p>yang na grub pa'i mtha'i rigs pas chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang nyi shu rtsa drug dang dbugs gnyis te de yang ma dag pa'i nyi ma'i longs spyod kyi bdag nyid kyi d+h+rU ba ka'o/ /snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngo bos gnas gsum du bzhag nas gcig la khyim gsum gyi bdag nyid
<p>246b.3</p>'di gza' lnga la mkho ba'i nyin zhag gi nyi dag bsgrub tshul lo/ /rgyu skar drug dang chu tshod bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dbyi bar bya'o/ /de ltar na lug la sogs pa'i khyim gsum sbyangs pa'i phyir nyi ma skyes pa'i khyim karka Tar 'gyur ro/ /bya ba lhag ma ni gza' bkra shis kyi ji lta ba bzhin du
<p>246b.4</p>nyi ma la yang shes par bya'o/ /'on kyang bkra shis dang gza'i rkang pa rnams tha dad de nyi ma'i gza'i rkang pa rnams ni drug dang bzhi dang gcig ste dang po karka Ta la drug go/ /gnyis pa seng ge la bzhi'o/ /gsum pa bu mo la gcig go/ /de nas lugs
<p>246b.5</p>las bzlog pas bzhi pa srang la gcig go/ /lnga pa sdig pa la bzhi'o/ /drug pa gzhu la drug go/ /chu srin la sogs pa la yang de lta bu nyid du rtogs par bya'o/ /de la rkang pa'i gnas su shar ba gang yin pa de'i rkang pa'i gnas kyi de ma
<p>246b.6</p>thag pas lhag ma rnams bsgyur te/ chu tshod kyi gnas la sogs par nor dang bu lon du bya ste/ brgya sum cu rtsa lngas bgos pa'i rnyed pa gcig la sogs pa ni nyi ma'i longs spyod kyi bya ba bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang las rkang pa'i gnas drug la sogs
<p>246b.7</p>pa la nor ram bu lon du 'gyur te/ de yang chu srin la sogs pa la nor dang karka Ta la sogs pa la bu lon no zhes pa mdor bsdus pa ste/ rgyas par ni u sang+ga lar 'chad do zhes pa 'di ni nyi ma so so'i nyi ma dag pa'o/ /byed pa la brjod pa'i
<p>247a</p>
<p>247a.1</p>cho gas ni dag pa med do/ /byed pa la brjod pa'i cho ga yang 'di yin te/ karka Ta'i phyogs dang po la chu tshod gsum bu lon no/ /karka Ta'i phyogs gnyis pa la drug go/ /de bzhin du seng ge la brgyad dang bcu'o/ /bu
<p>247a.2</p>ma la bcu dang bcu gcig go/ /srang la bcu gcig dang bcu'o/ /sdig pa la brgyad dang drug go/ /gzhu la gsum dang stong pa ste bgrod pa'i mthar ro/ /de bzhin du chu sr-in la sogs pa la nor te byed pa la grub pa'i phyogs dang po la/ phyi ma la/ 
<p>247a.3</p>dang po la/ phyi ma la/ mtha'i dgong pa'o/ /gi dang po/ /de lta bu ni phyi ma la/ dang po la/ phyi ma/ zla ba drug gi phyogs la nyin dang po/ phyi ma/ mor byed pa rgyu ba'i zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba rnams so/ /da ni zla ba dag pa brjod par bya ste/ rgyu skar gyi d+h+rU ba
<p>247a.4</p>ka la tshes gcig la sogs pa nas gnam stong gi mthar thug pa tshes sum cu po rnams rgyu skar gyi gnas su nyi ma so sor rgyu skar re re 'phel bas rgyu skar 'phel ba'i don du sbyin par bya'o/ /tshes de rnams gnas gzhan du byas te chu tshod kyi bya ba la drug gis
<p>247a.5</p>bsgyur te sngar gyi chu tshod kyi rang bzhin de rnams gza'i chu tshod dag pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /slar yang de ltar gyur pa rnams kyis rgyu skar gyi d+h+rU ba ka'i chu tshod la sogs pa tshes de/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dman par bya'o/ /de ltar na zla ba'i longs spyod kyi chu tshod la
<p>247a.6</p>sogs pa de rnams dag par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar gyi d+h+rU ba ka'i steng du gnas pa nyi ma so sor re re 'phel ba bcug ste/ nyin mor byed pa'i rgyu skar ril po dang zla bas longs spyad pa'i rgyu skar ril por 'gyur ro/ /rkang pa ni rgyu skar gyi d+h+rU ba ka'i chu tshod la sogs pa rnams
<p>247a.7</p>kyis dman par bya ba'i phyir de rnams dman par bya'o/ /chu tshod la sogs pa ma longs pa na bu lon gyi chu tshod la sogs pa de ltar lhag par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshes rtsis kyi dbang gis chu tshod sbyang bar bya ba na de la chu tshod drug cu byin nas sngar bshad pa'i bu lon sbyang
<p>247b</p>
<p>247b.1</p>bar bya'o/ /rgyu skar gyi d+h+rU ba ka la yang rgyu skar gcig byin te/ rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu skar tshad du zhes rig par bya'o/ /de nas yang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bgrod de/ 'das pa'i rgyu skar dor nas ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu skar bri bar bya'o/ /
<p>247b.2</p>de nas gzhan gyi bu lon sbyangs te lhag ma'i chu tshod la sogs pa bri bar bya'o/ /gang gi tshe yang rtsis kyi dbang gis sbyangs pa'i lhag ma'i chu tshod drug cu lhag par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyu skar gyi chu tshod 'phel lo zhes rtogs par bya'o/ /de'i tshe yang 'das pa'i rgyu
<p>247b.3</p>skar las gzhan pa'i chu tshod drug cu bri bar bya'o/ /lhag pa'i chu tshod ni ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu skar las gzhan du bri bar bya'o/ /ji srid rtsis kyi dbang gis lhag pa dang chad pa'i bar du'o/ /chad na ni de'i rim pa ji lta ba kho na'o/ /gang gi tshe lhag pa dang bcas
<p>247b.4</p>pas chu tshod drug cu'i mthar thug par 'phel ba de'i tshe rgyu skar gcig 'phel lo zhes rig par bya ste/ de'i tshe yang ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu skar la chu tshod drug cu bri bar bya'o/ /ji srid rim pa yongs su dman pas chad pa de dang de la go rims ji lta ba nyid do/ /da ni sol ba
<p>247b.5</p>la sogs pa sbyor ba nyi shu rtsa bdun gsal bar bya ste/ rgyu skar gyi d+h+rU ba ka la gnas pa'i rgyu skar rnams kyi mtshan ma dang zla bas spyad pa'i rgyu skar rnams bsres par gyur ba la nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis sbyangs pa'i lhag ma ni sel ba la sogs pa rnams so/ /da ni gdab pa la
<p>247b.6</p>sogs pa'i byed pa bdun brjod par bya ste/ dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa nas gnam stong gi mthar thug pa tshes sum cu po re re bzhin 'phel ba gnyis kyis bsgyur te/ gcig dang bral ba la bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma ni gdab pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/ /
<p>247b.7</p>bdun gyis bgor ma btub pa la mtshan ma gcig dang bral ba yang gdab pa la sogs pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na gza' dang tshes dang skar ma dang sbyor ba dang byed pa yan lag lnga po rnams te/ gza' ni nyi ma la sogs pa rab tu grags pa bdun no/ /tshes ni
<p>248a</p>
<p>248a.1</p>dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs bco lnga bco lngar rab tu grags pa rnams so/ /rgyu skar ni tha skar la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bdun rab tu grags pa rnams so/ /sbyor ba yang sel ba la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bdun nyid do/ /byed pa ni gdab pa la sogs
<p>248a.2</p>pa bdun te/ dkar po'i tshes gcig gi phyed phyi ma la gdab pa'o/ /gnyis kyi phyed snga ma la byis pa can no/ /phyed phyi ma la rigs can no/ /gsum gyi phyed snga ma la til brdung ngo / /phyed phyi ma la khyim skyes so/ /bzhi'i phyed snga ma la tshong ba'o/ /
<p>248a.3</p>phyed phyi ma la biSh+Ti'o/ /de bzhin du nag po'i bcu bzhi'i phyed snga ma la biSh+Ti'o/ /phyed phyi ma la bkra shis so/ /gnam stong gi phyed snga ma la rkang bzhi'o/ /phyed phyi ma la klu'o/ /dkar po'i tshes gcig gi phyed snga ma la mi sdug pa'o/ /phyed phyi ma la slar yang gdab
<p>248a.4</p>pa'o/ /de ltar na byed pa bcu gcig ste yan lag lnga'i rim pa'o/ /skar ma tha skar la sogs pa'i rkang pa dgu dgu ni lug la sogs pa'i khyim rab tu grags pa bcu gnyis po rnams so/ /'di rnams la rim pa bzhin du mig dmar dang lug /pa sangs dang glang / 
<p>248a.5</p>gza' 'khrig pa/ lhag dang / zla ba dang / karka Ta/ nyi ma dang / seng ge / gza' bu mo/ lhag dang / pa ba sangs dang / srang / mig dmar dang / sdig pa/ phur bu dang / gzhu/ spen pa dang / chu srin/ spen pa dang / bum pa/ lug dang sdig ba'i mig dmar zhing / /glang dang srang ni pa sangs zhing / /
<p>248a.6</p>'khrig pa bu mo gza' lhag zhing / /zla ba'i zhing ni karka Ta/ /nyi ma'i zhing ni seng ge'i khyim/ /phur bu'i zhing ni gzhu dang nya/ /chu srin bum pa'i zhing bdag ldan/ /de ltar gza' bdun khyim la dbang / /phur bu rnams ni zhing can no/ /da ni lo 'pho ba'i d+hU ba ka brjod par bya ste/ dag pa'i lo la brgyad bsres te bzhi brgyas bsgyur nas
<p>248a.7</p>brgyad bsres pa'i byed pa'i los dman par byas pa sum brgya bcu bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma ni gzar 'gyur ro/ /bgos pa'i lhag ma chu tshod kyi don du drug cus bsgyur te sngar bshad sum brgya bcu bdun/ nyid kyis bgos pas thob pa ni chu tshod du 'gyur
<p>248b</p>
<p>248b.1</p>ro/ /de la bkra shis la sogs pa'i nges pa nyi ma la sogs pas byed pa'i don du gza'i gnas su gnyis dang chu tshod kyi gnas su sum cu sbyin par bya'o/ /drug cus bgos pas thob pa ni gzar 'gyur ro/ /bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma ni gza'i gnas
<p>248b.2</p>su gza' ste lo 'pho ba'i zla ba la 'gyur ro zhes pa rig par bya'o/ /da ni lug la sogs pa'i 'pho bar snon pa la snon byed bcu gnyis kyis lo'i d+h+rU ba ka brjod par bya ste/ lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa dang karka Ta dang seng ge dang bu mo rnams la gza'i
<p>248b.3</p>gnas su gcig dang chu tshod kyi gnas su lnga bcu rtsa bdun no/ /de la gza'i gnas su lo'i d+h+rU ba ka dang lhan cig bsnan pas gzar 'gyur ro/ /gza' des lug gi 'pho ba'o/ /srang dang sdig pa dang gzhu dang chu srin dang bum pa dang rim pas 'gyur ba las thog ma lug la 
<p>248b.4</p>nya rnams la gza'i gnas su nam mkha' dang chu tshod kyi gnas su chu tshod de rnams kyis chu tshod do zhes pa thams cad du rig par bya'o/ /gza' la bzhi dang chu tshod du lnga bcu rtsa gsum ni glang la'o/ /'khrig pa la gza' gcig dang chu tshod bcu bdun no/ /karka Ta la
<p>248b.5</p>gza'  rim pas 'gyur ba la sa mthar nya la/ bzhi dang chu tshod bcu rtsa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis/ gsum mo/ /seng ge la gza' gcig dang chu tshod nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/ /bu mo la gza' bzhi dang chu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /srang la gza' drug dang chu tshod lnga bcu rtsa gcig go/ /
<p>248b.6</p>sdig pa la gza' gcig dang chu tshod bzhi bcu rtsa bdun no/ /gzhu la gza' gsum dang chu tshod bcu drug go/ /chu srin la gza' bzhi dang chu tshod sum cu rtsa bdun no/ /bum pa la gza' drug dang chu tshod bzhi bcu'o/ /nya la gza' stong pa dang chu tshod lnga bcu rtsa gnyis te 'pho
<p>248b.7</p>ba'i tshul gyis byed pa shes par bya'o/ /grub pa'i mtha' la yang 'di 'pho ba'i longs spyod du mi 'gyur te/ /'on kyang sngar bshad pa'i cho gas chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang nyi shu rtsa gnyis nyi ma so sor gcig la sogs pa 'phel ba skar ma'i d+h+rU ba ka la sbyin nas nyi ma'i gnas su
<p>249a</p>
<p>249a.1</p>'pho ba dag pa yod do zhes nges par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rig pa'o/ /lo'i d+h+rU ba ka gcig pu 'di nag pa la sogs pa nas brtsams te lo gzhan la yang lo gzhan gcig bcug ste d+h+rU ba ka gzhan gang yin pa de yis 'pho ba nges pa'o/ /
<p>249a.2</p>yang na byang du bgrod pa'i zla ba dang po la nyi ma bcu'i bar du brtag par bya ste/ phur bu'i grib ma gang las phur bu'i grib ma 'jug pa nas brtsams te nyi ma byang du 'pho ba'i nyin mo'i nyi ma de'i gza' dang / de'i tshes dang de'i sbyor ba dang de'i byed pas so/ /de la
<p>249a.3</p>nyin mo'i nyi ma'i longs spyod la rgyu skar gyi gnas su nyi shu dang chu tshod kyi gnas su bco lnga'i zhes rtsa ba'i d+h+rU ba ka'o/ /d+h+rU ba ka de la nyin re bzhin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyin zhag gis thob pa bcug ste/ de nas sngar bshad pa'i cho gas nyi ma'i rkang pa rnams sbyang bar bya'o/ /da ni
<p>249a.4</p>nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor bgrod pa'i tshad brjod par bya ste/ sum brgya dang drug cu gnas gnyis su byas nas gnas 'og ma gnyis kyis bsgyur nas drug cu rtsa lngas thob pa steng du gzhug par bya'o/ /lhag ma drug cus bsgyur nas de yis bgos pas thob pa chu
<p>249a.5</p>tshod de steng gi phung po'i 'og tu bri bar bya'o/ /yang lhag ma drug cus bsgyur nas de yis bgos pas thob pa chu srang ste de'i yang 'og tu'o/ /lhag ma drug gis bsgyur nas de yis bgos pas thob pa dbugs te de'i yang 'og tu'o/ /de ltar bsgrubs pa'i nyin zhag
<p>249a.6</p>la sogs pa rnams gnas gsum du bzhag ste/ bdun brgya dang bdun gyis bgos pa'i rnyed pa rnams dbus ma'i phung po la nong du 'gyur ro/ /dbus ma'i phung po la drug cu rtsa bzhis bgos pas thob pa ni stong gi phung po la bu lon du bya'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du nyin zhag la sogs
<p>249a.7</p>par shes par bya ste/ dbugs kyi phung por byas pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag dag pa'o/ /da ni nyi ma'i nyin zhag gi rnam par dbye ba brjod par bya ste/ rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo drug cus bsgyur ba las dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag gis thob pa chu tshod la sogs par 'gyur ro/ /de
<p>249b</p>
<p>249b.1</p>bzhin du gzhan rnams la yang rang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag gis gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bgos pas thob pa ni nyin zhag la spyod par rig par bya'o/ /zla ba'i nyin zhag la spyod pa'i 'khor lo'i chu tshod gzhan no/ /nyi ma'i zla ba brgya dang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
<p>249b.2</p>bdag nyid kyi spyad pa bsres pa rnams la nyin zhag sum cus bgos pas thob pa'i bdag nyid ni chu tshod dang chu srang dang dbugs nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor ji srid pa de nyin zhag la spyod pa rnams kyis bsgyur bas rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo longs pa de rnams dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag
<p>249b.3</p>tu rig par bya'o/ /nyin zhag dang chu tshod dang chu srang rnams so/ /bkra shis kyi nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor ni drug brgya brgyad cu rtsa bdun dang chu tshod gcig chu srang bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi'o/ /gza' lhag gi dbyu gu dang chu srang gi nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor ni brgyad stong bdun brgya dgu
<p>249b.4</p>bcu rtsa bdun no/ /bla ma'i nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor ni bzhi stong sum brgya sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /pa sangs kyi nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor ni nyis stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa bdun no/ /spen pa'i nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor ni/ khri bdun brgya drug cu rtsa drug go/ /
<p>249b.5</p>sgra gcan gyi nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor ni drug stong dgu brgya'o/ /mjug rings ni nyi ma dang lhan cig rgyu ba'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag rnams kho na'o/ /nyin zhag la spyad pa rnams ni rang rang gi nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor rnams kyis rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo
<p>249b.6</p>las sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas thob pa rnams so/ /bkra shis kyi dbyu gu dang / chu srang dbugs dang / gza' lhag gi chu srang dang / bla ma'i chu srang dang / dbugs dang pa sangs kyi chu srang dang / dbugs dang spen pa'i chu srang dang / sgra gcan gyi dbyu gu dang dbugs
<p>249b.7</p>phyed dang mjug rings kyi nyi mas spyad pa nyid do/ /da ni nyin mo dang mtshan 'dir nyin mtshan 'phel 'grib kyi tshad brjod par dam bcas nas sgra gcan gyi rtsis bshad snang brgya dpe'i yi ge chad par snang / mo dag gis lho dang byang du bgrod pa'i 'phel 'grib brjod par bya ste/ byed pa'i zla ba la brgya dang
<p>250a</p>
<p>250a.1</p>nyi shu rtsa gnyis bsres te phyogs kyi phung po'i don du gnyis kyis bsgyur nas nya'i longs spyod kyi don du phyogs kyi rang bzhin gcig bsre zhing gnam stong gi longs spyod kyi don du phyogs kyi rang bzhin gnyis bses pa la/ sgra gcan gyi phyogs kyi
<p>250a.2</p>rang bzhin bzhi brgya dang drug cus bgos pa'i rnyed pa rnams dor nas lhag ma rnams rgyu skar gyi don du nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis bsgyur nas bzhi brgya drug cus bgos pas thob pa ni skar mar 'gyur ro/ /snga ma bzhin du drug cu la sogs pa rnams kyis bsgyur nas 'di nyid kyis bgos pa
<p>250a.3</p>ni chu tshod la sogs par 'gyur ro/ /nyin zhag gi rgyu skar 'dis 'khor lo la lhag mar byas pa ni sgra gcan gyi gdong du 'gyur te/ tha skar la sogs pa'i rgyu skar la longs spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo phyed bsres pa ni sgra gcan gyi mjug mar 'gyur ro/ /da ni bkra shis
<p>250a.4</p>la sogs pa rnams rgyu skar la longs spyod pa'i don du nyin zhag gi rtsis brjod par bya ste/ byed pa'i zla ba rnams nyin zhag gi rtsis kyi phyir du sum cus bsgyur nas nyin zhag tu 'gyur ro/ /de rnams da ltar ba'i don du sngon ma'i nyi ma gcig la sogs pa dang bcas pa gnas gsum
<p>250a.5</p>du byas te/ 'og gi phung po la bdun brgya dang bdun gyis thob pa dbus ma'i phung po la nor du sbyin no/ /dbus ma'i phung po la yang drug cu rtsa bzhis bgos pas thob pa gang yin pa de yis steng gi phung po la dman par byas pa ni mi gsal ba'i nyin zhag gi tshogs su 'gyur ro/ /
<p>250a.6</p>phung po gnyis ka'i bgos pa'i lhag ma ni mi bzung ngo / /mi gsal ba'i nyin zhag nyid la res 'ga' gza' lhag pa dang chad par 'gyur bas gsal ba'i don du gcig dman pa'am lhag par byas pas gsal ba'i nyi mar 'gyur ro/ /da ni bkra shis brjod par bya ste/ gsal
<p>250a.7</p>ba'i nyin zhag gi tshogs la brgya dang drug cu rtsa bdun bsres te/ bkra shis kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag drug brgya dang nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis bgos pas thob pa ni rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas mi gzung ngo / /lhag ma rgyu skar gyi 'khor los bsgyur te dkyil
<p>250b</p>
<p>250b.1</p>'khor gyi nyin zhag gis bgos pas thob pa ni skar mar 'gyur ro/ /chu tshod la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /da ni bkra shis dag pa brjod par bya ste/ 'dir bkra shis kyi 'gyur la sogs pa'i longs spyod snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngo bos so sor bya ste/ longs spyod gcig la
<p>250b.2</p>skye ba'i khyim gzung ba'i don du rgyu skar phyed dang bcas pa'i dgu sbyang bar bya ste/ 'di'i skye ba'i khyim ni seng ger 'gyur te/ tha skar la sogs pa'i rgyu skar gyi longs spyod la gal te bu lon lhag par 'gyur na sbyang bar bya'o/ /phung po dman par gyur pa de'i tshe 'khor
<p>250b.3</p>lo bcu gcig nas bya'o/ /gal te sbyangs pa'i lhag ma la 'khor lo byed lhag pa'am 'khor lo phyed yongs su rdzogs pa de'i tshe 'khor lo phyed dor nas bkra shis kyi longs spyod kyi phung po gnyis pa'i chu tshod la sogs pa la nor du rtogs par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe rgyu skar dgu la sogs
<p>250b.4</p>pa sbyangs pas 'khor lo phyed ma longs pa de'i tshe bu lon te/ de ltar thams cad la yang rtogs par bya'o/ /gal te sbyangs pa'i lhag ma rgyu skar gcig kyang mi gnas pa de'i tshe rgyu ba'i rkang pa dang pos chu tshod la sogs pa bsgyur nas khyim gcig gi chu tshod kyi bdag
<p>250b.5</p>nyid brgya dang sum cu rtsa lngas thob pa chu tshod la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa'i rigs pas nor dang bu lon te longs spyod kyi phung po gzhan la yang shes par bya'o/ /sbyangs pa'i lhag ma'i rgyu skar gnas pa de'i tshe skar ma de drug cus bsgyur nas 'og tu gnas pa'i chu tshod kyi tshogs
<p>250b.6</p>dang lhan cig tu byas te/ chu tshod kyi tshogs la brgya sum cu rtsa lngas bgos pas thob pa gcig la sogs pa rkang pa'i gnas kyi mtshon byed kyi mtshan ma ste/ de'i phyis nas rkang pa'i gnas rnams su gcig la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rim pas bri bar bya'o/ /de la
<p>250b.7</p>snga ma phyed ma zos pa bsdoms nas gcig tu byas te/ de'i gnas kyi lhag ma chu tshod la sogs pas bsgyur te lnga la sogs pas bgos pa'i rnyed pa steng du bcug nas longs spyod kyi phung po gzhan la nor sbyin pa dang bu lon dbrog par shes par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe phyed
<p>251a</p>
<p>251a.1</p>phyi ma la gnas pas rkang pa'i gnas dang pos bsgyur te der bshad pa'i rkang pa'i gnas dang gcig tu byas nas phyed phyi ma'i rkang pa dang pos bsgyur te/ lhag ma chu tshod la sogs pa'i gnas la lnga la sogs pa thob pa dang gcig tu byas nas spyad
<p>251a.2</p>pa'i rkang pa'i gnas dang po la dman par bya ste/ spyad pa'i rkang pa'i gnas bsdoms pa de yis nor dang bu lon rtogs par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe rtsa ba'i ri mo brgal nas rkang pa'i gnas mtshon byed kyi mtshan ma rtags su gyur pa de'i tshe phyed phyi ma la spyad pa'i rkang pa
<p>251a.3</p>rnams ngos nas ma sbyang pa'i rkang pa'i gnas rnams bsdoms te/ ma spyad pa'i rkang pa'i gnas dang po lnga la sogs pas thob pa lhag ma chu tshod la sogs pa rnams bsgyur te/ bsgyur ba de la slar yang lnga la sogs pas thob pa ma spyad pa'i rkang pa'i tshogs la gnas
<p>251a.4</p>pa ji lta ba bzhin du dman par byas te/ dman par byas pa'i lhag ma nyid nor dang bu lon du shes par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe phyed phyi ma la rkang pa'i gnas kyi mtshan ma bgrod zin pa de'i tshe de yongs su dor nas lnga la sogs pa thob pa'i lhag ma phyed snga ma'i rkang pa'i
<p>251a.5</p>gnas dang pos bsgyur nas de la lnga la sogs pa thob pa sbyin pa'am dor bar bya ste/ de bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ba thams cad la yang tshul 'di thun mong du rtogs par bya'o/ /rkang pa'i gnas dang po la nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /gnyis pa la bco brgyad do/ /gsum pa la
<p>251a.6</p>bdun te phyed snga ma la'o/ /de nas bar du ri mo byas te phyed phyi ma'i phung po gsum lugs ldog tu rtogs par bya'o/ /de ltar thams cad du ste/ de'i phyir bzhi pa la bdun no/ /lnga pa la bco brgyad do/ /drug pa la nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /zhes pa bkra shis kyi dal ba'i las dag
<p>251a.7</p>pa'o/ /da ni myur ba'i las kyi cho ga brjod par bya ste/ bkra shis kyi dal ba'i las dag pa dang phur bu'i dang spen pa rnams kyis nyi rkang las byung ba dang bral ba'i nyi ma la sbyang bar bya'o/ /pa sangs kyi longs spyod dang gza' lhag gi longs spyod kyi don du pa sangs kyi longs
<p>251b</p>
<p>251b.1</p>spyod dang gza' lhag gi longs spyod dag la ni nyi mas sbyangs te 'dis myur ba la dal bas spyad par bya'o zhes pa gza' lhag dang pa sangs kyi nyi ma las myur ba la lhag ma dal ba zhes bya'o/ /gza' lhag dang pa sangs dag la nyi mas sbyangs pa'i lhag ma ni sla chos
<p>251b.2</p>su'o/ /'dir myur ba'i las la rim pas/ /'di'i nyi ma ni nyin zhag gi nyi dag yin par bu ston chos rje bzhed de mkhas ba dga' byed na gsal lo/ /nor dang rim min gyis bu lon ni thams cad du shes par bya'o/ /thams cad du 'khor lo dor na bu lon dang ma dor na nor ro/ /de la 'khor
<p>251b.3</p>lo phyed ma dor ba'am gcig la sogs pa bcu gsum gyi mthar thug pa lhag mar gyur pa de'i tshe gcig la sogs pa rkang pa'i gnas kyi mtshan ma'i rtags lhag mar gyur pa phyis nas gnas bcu gsum gyi mthar thug pa bri bar bya'o/ /phyed snga ma la spyad pa las 'og tu
<p>251b.4</p>gnas pa'i rkang pa'i gnas dang phyed phyi ma lam spyad pa'i dang po la sngon du gnas pa'i chu tshod la sogs pas bsgyur nas drug cus bgos pas phyed snga ma la des bgos pas thob pa dang lhan cig pas bkra shis kyi longs spyod gzhan la nor dang bu lon du bya'o/ /phyed phyi ma la
<p>251b.5</p>thob pas dman par byas te ma spyad pa'i gnas bsdoms nas 'dir yang nor dang bu lon shes par byas te lhag ma snga ma bzhin no/ /gza'i rkang pa rnams ni dang po nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /de nas nyi shu rtsa gsum mo/ /de nas nyer gcig pa rnams gnyis so/ /de nas
<p>251b.6</p>bco brgyad dang bco lnga dang bcu gcig dang gsum mo/ /de nas rtsa ba'i ri mo'o/ /de nas bcu gcig dang sum cu rtsa brgyad dang brgyad cu dang lnga bcu rtsa gsum mo/ /da ni gza' lhag dag pa brjod par bya ste/ nyin zhag gi tshogs de nyid brgyas bsgyur nas bdun stong brgya
<p>251b.7</p>nyi shu rtsa gsum gyis dman par byas te/ de nas nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor brgyad stong bdun brgya dgu bcu rtsa bdun gyis bsgyur te lhag ma snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas nyi ma'i d+hU ba ka snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngo bos gnas gnyis su bzhag ste/ gcig la rgyu skar phyed
<p>252a</p>
<p>252a.1</p>dang bcas pa'i bcu drug sbyang ngo / /de nas sdig pa la skyes par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan ni mig dmar bzhin te 'on kyang gza'i rkang pa ni tha dad do/ /dang po la sogs pa la bcu dang bdun dang gsum mo/ /de nas rtsa ba'i ri mo'o/ /de nas
<p>252a.2</p>gsum dang bdun dang bcu'o/ /myur ba'i gza'i rkang pa rnams ni bcu drug rnam gnyis dang bco lnga dang bcu bzhi dang bcu gsum dang bcu gcig dang bdun dang lnga dang stong pa dang rtsa ba'i ri mo'o/ /de nas bzhi dang bcu gcig dang nyi shu dang / nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang sum cu rtsa
<p>252a.3</p>bzhi'o/ /da ni phur bu dag pa brjod par bya ste/ nyin zhag gi tshogs la nyis stong drug brgyas dman par byas te nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor bzhi stong sum brgya sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bgos pa'i lhag ma bkra shis bzhin no/ /phur bu'i longs spyod snga ma bzhin byas
<p>252a.4</p>pa gcig la rgyu skar bcu gnyis sbyangs pa'i lhag ma'i bya ba mig dmar bzhin no/ brgya phrag nyi shu rtsa drug ces pa sgra bsgyur yin/ 'phrog byed dang dgu dang gsum dang / rtsa bar gsum dang / bcu gcig dang / gza'i myur ba'i rkang pa rnams so/ /da ni pa sangs dag pa brjod par
<p>252a.5</p>bya ste/ nyin zhag gi tshogs bcu yis bsgyur nas brgyad cu rtsa bzhis dman par byas te dkyil 'khor gyi nyin zhag gi rang bzhin nyis stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma'i bya ba bkra shis bzhin no/ /gza' lhag bzhin du nyi ma'i d+h+rU ba ka tha dad du byas pa gcig la
<p>252a.6</p>rgyu skar drug sbyang bar bya'o/ /dal ba'i las rkang pa rnams ni lnga dang bzhi dang / gcig dang / rtsa bar gcig dang / bzhi dang bzhi bcu rtsa bdun lhag pa'i brgya phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis zhes sgra bsgyur na 'ong / lnga rnams dang / myur ba'i gza'i rkang pa rnams so/ /da ni spen pa dag pa brjod par bya
<p>252a.7</p>ste/ nyin zhag gi tshogs la bzhi stong brgyad brgya nyi shus dman par byas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi drug cu rtsa drug lhag pa'i brgya phrag bdun dang stong phrag bcu zhes pa sgra bsgyur du'o/ /nyin zhag khri bdun brgya drug cu rtsa drug gis bgos pa'i lhag ma'i bya ba bkra shis bzhin no/ /spen pa'i longs
<p>252b</p>
<p>252b.1</p>spyod snga ma bzhin tha dad du byas nas gcig la rgyu skar bco brgyad sbyang bar bya'o/ /de ltar na gzhu'i khyim du skyes par 'gyur ro/ /dal ba'i gza'i rkang pa rnams ni nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang bco lnga dang drug dang / rtsa ba drug dang bco lnga dang nyi shu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur te/ thams cad du lugs
<p>252b.2</p>las bzlog pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o/ /myur ba'i gza'i rkang pa rnams ni drug dang lnga dang lnga dang bzhi dang / bzhi dang gnyis dang / gnyis dang stong pa dang rtsa ba'i ri mo las pha rol tu gnyis dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug dang brgyad dang gsum rnams so/ /de ltar na bkra shis la sogs pa gza'
<p>252b.3</p>lnga po rnams kyi dag pa bshad zin to/ /bkra shis la sogs pa'i gza' lnga po rnams kyis dal ba dang myur ba'i las kho nas don thams cad dag pas na gnyis ka ji ltar dag pa bshad zin to/ /da ni rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste/ 'dir gza' lnga po rnams dang gza' gnyis po'i
<p>252b.4</p>dal ba dang myur ba la yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las 'char ba lnga po rnams rim pas bgrod pa myur bar rgyu ba zhes brjod par bya'o/ /rkang pa'i gnas kyi longs spyod ni rtsa ba'i ri mo mthar thug pa'o/ /dal bar rgyu ba ni 'khyog por bgrod pa la/ kha nub tu phyogs te bgrod
<p>252b.5</p>par byed de/ gza'i rkang pa ni rtsa ba'i ri mo brgal nas bgrod de/ /de nyid kyi phyir rim pa la nor dang 'khor lo phyed dor ba rim min la bu lon no/ /des na rim pas bgrod pa la myur ba'i gza' zhes brjod par bya'o/ /rim min la ni dal ba'i gza' ste/ 'khyog po'i gza'
<p>252b.6</p>zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe nyi ma'i g.yas su bgrod pa de'i tshe g.yas kyi gza' dang g.yon du ni g.yon gyi gza' zhes brjod par bya ste/ nyi ma'i 'od dang nye bar gyur pas mi snang ba de'i tshe nub pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ gza' lhag dang phur bu ni myur ba'i gza'
<p>252b.7</p>la stobs dang ldan mig dmar phur bu g.yas kyi gza'/ /lhag pa mjug rings g.yon gyi gza'/ par 'gyur ro/ /sa skyes dang mjug rings ni 'khyog po la stobs dang ldan no/ /dal ba la pa sangs ni 'khyog po'i gza' nyid do/ /myur ba la gza' thams cad gdong
<p>253a</p>
<p>253a.1</p>shar du blta'o/ /'khyog po la nub tu blta'o/ /da ni mjug rings dag pa brjod par bya ste/ mjug rings kyi rgyu ba zla ba sum cu rtsa drug dang chu tshod bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ste/ nyin zhag so sor chu srang gnyis dang dbugs gsum mo/ /'on kyang
<p>253a.2</p>zla ba phyed nyi ma'i mdun du rgyu ba na rim par rgyu ba dang zla ba phyed nyi ma'i rgyab tu ni 'khyog po'i gza'o/ /zla ba gcig du ba med la/ de nas mthar zla ba phyed du ba dang bcas pa'o/ /zla ba phyed dang gnyis su 'char ba de'i tshe zla ba sum cu rtsa bdun gnyis kyis bsgyur bas/ shar dang
<p>253a.3</p>nub la sogs pa'i dbye bas 'char te zla ba sum cu rtsa bdun ni shar du 'char ro/ /sum cu rtsa bdun ni nub tu 'char ro/ /de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs te gnas so/ /de'i tshe yang nyi ma dang mnyam par 'jug pas de'i rkang pa rnams tha dad par ma bshad de/ nyi ma'i rkang pa'i
<p>253a.4</p>gnas rnams kho na de'i yin no/ /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi gzhung 'grel nyung ngu 'di dpal stag lung thang gi gtsug lag khang du/ chos kyi rje rin po che thams cad mkhyen pa dpal ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi phyag dpe las chos rje rin po che
<p>253a.5</p>bi dza ya kIrti shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas bsgyur cig ces bka' stsal pa bzhin legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos dag gi cha shas tsam rig pa zha lu lo tsA ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos rang lo zhe lnga pa zil gnon gyi lo dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes nyer
<p>253a.6</p>gcig la rdzogs par bsgyur ba'o// //mgon dam pa 'di nyid kyi zhabs rdul spyi bor len pa shAkya'i ban+de A nan+da lak+Sh+mis rtsis kyi gtsug lag phyogs tsam rig pa la brten rang gi lag bris su bgyis pa'i dge bas kun mkhyen thob par shog/ //gzhung 'di bsgyur las thob pa'i legs
<p>253a.7</p>byas kyis/ dbyig 'dzin gzhi la lhar bcas skye dgu yi/ /gtsug rgyan dam pa shAkya'i bstan pa rnams/ /dar zhing rgyas la yun ring gnas gyur cig/ //[]@/ /gtor ma'i phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ 
<p>253b</p>
<p>253b.1</p>rgya gar skad du/ ba li mA li kA/ na mA mi badzra satwa s+ya tsa ra Na m+b+h+yo tu ha dwa yaM// sA d+ha kA nI/ tsa sid+d+h+ya r+thaM li khya te ba li mA li kA/ /yai nai pa ba li dwa de na srI Ni tAH /sarba dzan+ta baH rak+Sha tsakra di kaM sarbaM sho d+ha naM/ 
<p>253b.2</p>bod skad du/ gtor ma'i phreng ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhabs gnyis kyi/ chu skyes la ni phyag 'tshal te/ /sgrub po rnams kyi dngos grub phyir/ /gtor ma'i phreng ba bri bar bya/ /gang gis gtor ma byin pa yis/ /skye bo thams cad tshim gyur pa/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo sogs kun dang / 
<p>253b.3</p>bo d+ha naM ta taH/ /ba li ta twaM ma kr-i te dz+nyA ta byaM sA d+hu sasma taiH/ shAn+ti kaM pauSh+Tiko tsai ba pa sh+yA b+hi tsA tu kaM ta thA/ /pa l+yA pa hA Da mA tre Na sA d+h+ya tA+e nA tra saM sha yaH/ ma yA su ma ti si he na gri n+tha n+t+ra tA pa li mA li kA/ /
<p>253b.4</p>de nas sbyangs dang rtogs pa yis/ /gtor ma'i de nyid bdag gis bya/ /legs 'dod rnams kyis shes par bya/ /zhi dang rgyas pa nyid dang yang / /de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod kyang / /gtor ma'i mchod pa tsam gyis ni/ //'di ni the tshom med par 'grub/ /blo bzang seng ge bdag gis ni/ /gtor ma'i phreng ba 'di ni rgyud/ /
<p>253b.5</p>tsan+tA ma Ni ri bA b+hA ti kaN+Tha s+tha man+t+ri NAM sa dA/ /a tra su bA hu tran+tok+ta gA thA b+hirba li kaM sr-i dze tAH/ /pi Ta kaiH sha ka Tair+b+hA rai ran+ta sho\u0f85 ny+dza li b+hi sta thA/ /da twai ka tra ba liny+tsa r+g+haM gan+d+ha to yA di ka ba de ta/ 
<p>253b.6</p>rtag tu sngags pa'i mgrin gnas na/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur gsal/ /'dir ni dpung bzang rgyud gsungs pa'i/ tshigs bcad rnams kyis gtor ma btang / /zangs gzhong shing rta khur rnams dngos/ /de bzhin tha la thal mas kyang / /gcig tu gtor mar mchod yon dang / /dri yi chu sogs byin zhes gsol/ 
<p>253b.7</p>de bA su raH// sarba b+hu dze ga sid+d+hA stAr+g+thaHlha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /su par+N+NaHka Ta bU ta nash+tsa/ nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzang lus srul po/ gan+d+hArba sid+d+hA gra ha dzA ta yash+tsa ye ke pi b+hU mau ni ba san+ti d+b+yIHdri za srin po gdon gyi tshogs rnams dang / gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ 
<p>254a</p>
<p>254a.1</p>n+ya stai ka dzA nuH/ /br-i thi bI ta le haM kr-i tany+dza lirba dz+nya pa yA mi tAM stA na/ /ya pu tra dA raiH sa ha b+h+r-i t+yA saM g+haiH/ /shru twa i hA yan+t+wa nu gra hA r+thAM/ /ye me tu pr-i Sh+Thi ni pa san+ti b+hU trA yo nan+da ne ye tsa su rA la ye Shu/ /ye tso dA
<p>254a.2</p>bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa la/ bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyis/ /gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir gshegs shig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang / /shar nub ri dang
<p>254a.3</p>yAsta gaM ri man+da re Shu na ge Shu sa tse Shu tsa ya ba san+ti/ /sa riR+su sarbA su tsasaM ga me Shu rat+nA la ye tsA pi kr-i tA d+hi bA sAH /bA pi ta DA ge Shu tsa sa lwa le Shu kU pe Shu badzre Shu tsa ni r+dz+hi re Shu/ /ye gra ma g+ha She su ra kA na na tsa shru n+yA la ye de ba
<p>254a.4</p>nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang / /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang / /rin chen gling na lhag par gang gnas dang / /chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang / /mtsho dang rdzing bu ldeng ka chu ngogs dang / /g.ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang / /grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang / khang stong dag dang lha yi
<p>254a.5</p>gr-i he Shu ye tsa/ /bi hA ra tsai t+ya ba sa thA shra me Sh+tsa ma the Shu shA lA su tsa kun+dza rA NAM/ /ye b+hU b+h+ri tAM tsi tra mr-i he ba san+ti ra th+yA su bI thI Shu tsa tsa twa re Shu/ /ya tsai ka br-ik+She Shu ma hA ba the Shu ma hA sh+ma shA ne Shu ma hA ba ne Shu/ /
<p>254a.6</p>khang pa dang / /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas rnams dang / /dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres gnas dang / /rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang / /lam srang sum mdo dang ni bzhi mdo dang / /gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung / /drur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang / /
<p>254a.7</p>si he b+ha rik+ShA d+d+h+yu Shi tA su ye tsa ba san+ti g+ho rA su ma hA Ta pI Shu/ seng gi dred dang gcan gzan gnas rnams dang / /'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang / /dwa pe Shu di bye Shu kr-i tA la ya sh+tsa me rau sh+ma shA ne ni ba san+ti yo tsa/ gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang / /lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams/ /
<p>254b</p>
<p>254b.1</p>hr-iSh+TA pa san+naH/ /pra dza gan+d+d+ha mA l+yaM d+hU paM ba liM dI pa bi r+d+ha ny+tsi b+ha k+t+yA/ /gr-ih+Na n+tu b+huny+dzan+tu pi ban+tu tse da mi dany+tsa karma sa pha laM dzu Shan+tu/ /ma hA ba liH(1) oM badzra yo gi nI hrIH /tu nya/ khaH
<p>254b.2</p>rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur nas su/ phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang / /bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus 'bul na/ /'di dag gsol zhing legs par bzhes nas kyang / /bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /gtor ma chen po'o/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma
<p>254b.3</p>pheM nya aM/ ma ma ma naH/ sid+d+ha pra yats+tsha ba liM gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ shu klA ga ga na k+Sha pA ba liH(2) oM pi shA tsi par+Na sha ba ri sarbo pa dra ba nA shi ni sarba ro ga pra sha ma ni sarba b+ha ya bi nA shi ni i daM ba li gr-ih+na gr-ih+Na/ 
<p>254b.4</p>bdag gi yid bzhin dngos grub stsol/ gtor ma zung gtor ma zung / nam mkha' dkar mo la 'thor ba'i gtor ma'o/ /sha za ma ri khrod lo ma can nyer 'tshe thams cad sel ma/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed ma/ /'jigs pa thams cad sel ma/ /gtor ma 'di zung zung / 
<p>254b.5</p>kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ sarwa duSh+Ta mA rA na mA rA ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA ra ya mA ra yA/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ bar+Na sha ba ri ba liH(3) oM ma hA kA lA shA sa no pa kA ri Ne/ 3 pash+tsi ma kA lo ya mi daM rat+na
<p>254b.6</p>zo zo/ zo shig zo shig /gdug pa'i sems can thams cad sod sod/ chings chings/ snun snun/ sregs sregs/ tshos tshos/ gsad par gyis gsad par gyis/ ri khrod lo ma can gyi gtor ma'o/ /nag po chen po/ /bstan pa la/ phan 'dogs par/ /phyi ma ma yin pa'i dus 'di dang 'dir/ 
<p>254b.7</p>tra yA pa kA r-i NAM/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa/ ya di pra ti dz+nyAM sma ra si ta dA/ gal te byung na de'i tshe dam bca' dran par gyis/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+na gr-ih+Na kha kha khA hi khA hi/ gtor ma 'di zung zung zo zo/ /zo shig zo shig /sarba duSh+Ta sa twa na mA ra mA ra/ gdug pa'i sems can thams cad sod sod/ 
<p>255a</p>
<p>255a.1</p>gr-ih+Na gr-ih+na/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ dI na me ke na mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ ma hA kA la ba liH/ /(4) oM AHhUM hoHuSh+NI Sha sum+b+ha rA dza/ ya mAn+ta ka pra dz+yAn+ta ka pat+mAn+ta ka bi g+h+nAn+ta ka a tsa la Tak+ki rA dza nI la daN+Da ma hA ba la b+h+yaH/ 
<p>255a.2</p>sa pa ri wa re b+h+yaHzung zung / chings chings/ snun snun/ sregs sregs/ tshos tshos/ nyi ma gcig gis gsad par gyis gsad par gyis/ i daM ba liM gan+d+haM puSh+paM nag po chen po'i gtor ma'o/ /gtsug tor gnod mdzes rgyal po/ /gshin rje mthar byed/ shes rab mthar byed/ pad+ma mthar byed/ bgegs mthar byed/ mi g.yo ba/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po/ /dbyug sngon/ stobs po che rnams/ 
<p>255a.3</p>'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ d+hU paM dI pany+tsa k+Sha taM da dA ma he/ te tsA gat+ya sa pa ri wa raHshI g+h+ra mi daM ba liM gr-ih+Nan+ta khA dan+tu/ gtor ma 'di dang dri dang me tog dang / pi bin+tu dzaHhUM baM hoH san+ti s+t+wa ma ma sarba satwA nany+tsa shAn+tiM puSh+TiM rak+ShA sa ra Na gu p+tiM kurban+tu hUM hUM phaT phaT badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ 
<p>255a.4</p>da sha kro d+ha ba liH/ bdug pa dang mar me ma nyams pa sbyin gyis/ de rnams byon nas 'khor bcas myur bar gtor ma 'di zung gsol/ (5) oM AHhUM hoHi hA pa s+thi te b+h+yaH 'thung zhig// yang dag par tshim ste bdag dang sems can thams cad la zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar mdzod/ rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bzhin du/ 
<p>255a.5</p>khro bo bcu'i gtor ma'o/ /k+She tra pA le b+h+yo n+ya b+h+ya sh+tsa i daM gan+d+haM puSh+paM d+hU paM/ dI pa mak+Sha taM da dA ma he/ te tsa ga t+ya sa pa ri wA rAH 'dir gnas pa'i shI g+h+ra mi daM ba liM gr-ih+Nan+tu khA dan+tu pi dan+tu dzaH hUM baM hoH san+ti s+t+wa ma ma sarba satwA nany+tsaH shAn+tiM puSh+TiM rak+Sha sa ra Na gup+tiM kurban+tu hUM hUM/ 
<p>255a.6</p>phaT phaT/ zhing skyong rnams dang / gzhan rnams la/ 'di dri dang me tog bdug pa mar me ma nyams pa sbyin gyi de rnams kyang byon nas/ 'khor dang bcas pa rnams myur du gtor ma 'di zung gsol 'thung / yang dag par tshim ste/ bdag dang sems can thams cad zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba
<p>255a.7</p>par mdzod/ badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bzhin gyes/ k+She tra pA li ba liH/ zhing skyong gi gtor ma'o/ (6) /oM na maHsu rU pA ya ta thA ga tA yA r+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ 'di lta ste/ 
<p>255b</p>
<p>255b.1</p>oM su ru su ru/ pra su ru pra su ru/ ta ra ta ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra/ sma ra sma ra dran pa dran pa/ san+tar+pa ya san+tar+pa ya/ sarba pre tA nI swA hA/ a pa sa ran+t+wa pa ta ra prak+Shi No da dA mya haM sab+wa lo ka d+hA tu ni bA si nAM pre tA nA mA hA ra mi ti/ pre ta ba liH/ (7)
<p>255b.2</p>gzugs mdzes gzugs mdzes/ rab tu gzugs mdzes rab tu gzugs mdzes/ sgrol ba sgrol ba/ 'dzin pa 'dzin pa/ yang dag par 'dzin pa yang dag par 'dzin pa/ kun tu tshim par gyis kun tu tshim par gyis/ yi dgas rnams thams cad song zhig /glags lta ba rnams sbyin gyi/ ngas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gnas pa'i yi dgas rnams kyi bza' ba/ yi dwags kyi gtor ma'o/ /
<p>255b.3</p>oM da sha dig+b+ya ba s+thi te b+h+yaHi hA ba s+thi te b+h+yaH/ su ra ga ru Da kin+na ra ma ho ra ga b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tson+mA dA pa smA ra ostA ra kA di b+h+yo ba li dA pa yA ma i daM puSh+paM d+hU paM dI paM gan+d+haM nai lbi d+yA+ai di saM yuk+taM gr-i hi twa su kha sau ma na s+ya
<p>255b.4</p>phyogs bcur rnam par gnas pa rnams dang / 'dir gnas pa rnams dang lha dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang sha za dang smyo byed dang brjed byed dang gnon po la sogs pa rnams la gtor ma sbyin gyi me tog bdug pa mar me dri zhal zas la sogs pa dang ldan pa 'di bzung nas/ bde ba dang yid bde ba
<p>255b.5</p>lA b+hi no b+ha ban+tu/ s+thA nAny+tsa ni ru pa dra paM kurban+tu/ sarba bud+d+hA d+hiSh+Tha na ne te/ oM AH hUM/ i da ma mr-i ta piN+Da b+huk+t+wA ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa shAn+tiM kurban+tu swa sti swA hA/ sa mA dzi kA nAM sarba b+hau ti bi liH/ (8) ai n+d+yan+tu badzrI sa ha b+hU ta paM g+hai ri many+tsa gr-ih+Nan+tu ba liM bi shiSh+TaM/ 
<p>255b.6</p>thob par gyur cig /gnas su nye bar 'tshe ba med par mdzod/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi/ bdud rtsi'i gong bu 'di zos nas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la zhi ba dang bde legs su mdzod cig /'dus pa rnams kyi 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'o/ /shar phyogs rdo rje can gyi lha tshogs 'khor dang
<p>255b.7</p>bcas/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /ag+niR+Ya mo nai r-i ti b+hU pa tiSh+tsa/ me dang gshin rje bden bral 'byung po'i bdag /a pAM ba tirba yu d+ha nA ti paSh+tsa/ chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang / /i shA na b+hU tA d+hi pa ti sh+tsa/ dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang / /
<p>256a</p>
<p>256a.1</p>de bA Ur+d+haM ny+tsa tsan+d+ra rka pi ta ma ha sh+tsa/ /de bAHsa ma stA b+hU mi ye tsa nA nA gA d+ha ra gu h+ya ha NaiH sa me tAH pra ti pat+ti dwai ka ni be+e dany+tsa swa ka swa ka sbe ba de shA pu b+hU tAH gr-ih+Nan+tuSh+TaH /sa ba mA sa pe n+yA pa bu tra mi tra swa dza naiHsa me tAH/ /
<p>256a.2</p>steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang / /lha rnams kun dang gang dag sa steng klu/ /ri yi lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs bcas la/ /so so so sor phul ba 'di dag kun/ /rab tu dges shing mgu bar gyur pa yis/ /rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas kyang / /rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun bcas/ /
<p>256a.3</p>puSh+paM ba liM d+hU pa ni be da nany+tsa b+huny+dzan+tu dzi g+h+ran+tu pi ban+tu tse da mi daM tsa kar+m+ma sa pha laM yu Shan+tu/ dik+pA la ba liM/ (9) oM pheM hrIM hUM dzaH ba liM rak+ta puSh+pa kA ma rA dza sarba sid+d+ha pra yats+tsha ma ma pi tud+d+ha tsin+ta kAn b+hasmi ku ru/ 
<p>256a.4</p>gtor ma me tog bdug pa 'bul lags na/ /'di dag gsol zhing bzhes te bsnams nas kyang / /bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /phyogs skyong gi gtor ma'o/ /gtor ma dmar po/ me tog 'dod pa'i rgyal po dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /bdag la 'gal bar sems pa rnams thal bar mdzod/ /
<p>256a.5</p>sap+ta pA tA la ga ta sha trUM na pA da ta laM ku ru/ sarba dza no pa shAn+tiM ku ru phaT swA hA/ kA ma rA dza ba liMH/ (10) oM hriH e h+ya hi e ka dza TI ma mo pa n+yu tA na shan+tiM ku ru puSh+TiM ku ru ma hA yak+ShA d+hi pa ta ye i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na
<p>256a.6</p>sa 'og rim pa bdun du dgra rnams rkang pa'i mthil du gyis/ /skye bo thams cad la nye bar zhi bar mdzod/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po'i gtor ma'o/ tshur byon tshur byon ral gcig ma/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la zhi bar mdzod/ rgyas par mdzod/ lhag par gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen po la gtor ma 'di/ zung zung / 
<p>256a.7</p>gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya/ zung shig zung shig /pa ra bi d+yAM A kaR+Sha ya A kar+Sha ya/ pha rol gyi rig pa khug khug /tru Ta tru Ta/ chod chod/ mu Ta mu Ta/ chom chom/ hUM hUM phaT hUM swA hA/ u gra tA rA ba liH sgrol ma drag mo'i gtor ma'o/ /(11) oM AHhrI hriM ku ru kul+le rigs su byed ma/ sarba satwa
<p>256b</p>
<p>256b.1</p>ba shaM ka ri sarba b+ha ya b+ha yaM ka ri i daM ba li gan+d+haM puSh+paM d+hU paM dI pany+tsA lA taM dA ma he sarba de ba nA ga yak+Sha gan+d+ha rbA su ra ga ru Da kin+na ra ma ho ra gA da yo ya thaiSh+TaM b+hUny+dza tha khA da tha si ba tha dzi g+h+ra tha ma ma ma naH 
<p>256b.2</p>sems can thams cad dbang du byed ma/ /'jigs pa thams cad 'jigs par byid/ /'di gtor ma/ dri dang me tog dang bdug pa dang mar me ma nyams pa dbul gyi/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin pa dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi lam ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad cad ci 'dod zo zhig /'chos shig /'thung zhig dri snoms/ 
<p>256b.3</p>naH sid+d+hiM pra yats+tsha tha oM AH hrIM hUM phaT swA hA/ ku ru kul+lA+e ba liH (12) oM na mo b+ha ga ba te shrI tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha NA ya de bA su ra na tra sa nA ya sa ka la mA ra ba ra ba ma bi nA sa nA ya a ta sI ku sua wa pu She/ a k+Sho b+h+ya
<p>256b.4</p>bdag gi yid la dngos grub rab tu stsol cig// rigs su byed pa'i gtor ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal gtum po 'jigs rung chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams skrag par mdzad pa/ bdud dpung mtha' dag rnam par zhi ba/ zar ma'i me tog lta bu'i sku can/ 
<p>256b.5</p>mi bskyod pa'i cod pan mdzad pa la/ /kr-i ta she kha rA ya i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ma ma sarba big+h+nAn tsa turmA rA na bA ga ya bA ga ya/ tra sa ya tra sa ya/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ tshind tshind/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ nA shA/ nA shA/ tA pa tA pa/ sho Sha sha Sha/ ts+tshe da ts+tshe da/ /b+he da b+he da/ duSh+Ta satwA na ma ma bi rud+d+hA tsit+ta kAn
<p>256b.6</p>b+hasmi ku ru hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ gtor ma 'di zung zung / bdag la gegs rnams thams cad dang / bdud bzhi po rnams zlog par gyis zlog par gyis/ skrag par gyis skrag par gyis/ g.yo ba g.yo ba/ chod chod/ phug phug// shig shig// sregs sregs/ skoms skoms/ chod chod/ gdug pa'i sems can bdag la 'gal bar sems pa
<p>256b.7</p>rnams thal bar mdzod/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ba liH/ gtum po 'jigs rung chen po'i gtor ma'o/ /(13) oM dzam+b+ha la dza lan+d+ra ya rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po la/ ma hA d+ha nA ya ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la/ 
<p>257a</p>
<p>257a.1</p>i daM ba liM pany+tsa mr-i tAM tAM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ /dzaHdzaHhUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ dzam+b+ha la ba liH(14) oM rak+ta mu ku TA ya rak+ta mu khA ya rak+ta sha rI rA ya rak+ta b+hu dzA ya rak+ta hA ra ba li mA
<p>257a.2</p>bdud rtsi lnga'i gtor ma 'di zung zung / zo zo/ zo shig zo shig// dam tshig rjes su dran par gyis/ rmugs 'dzin gyi gtor ma'o/ cod pan dmar po la/ ral pa dmar po la/ gdong dmar po la/ lus dmar po la/ phyag dmar po la/ 
<p>257a.3</p>lA ya rak+ta ra tha sa ma rU D+DA ya rak+tA na nA ya/ rak+tA b+ha ra Na b+hU Shi tA ya i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ma ma sarba big+h+nA ha ra ha ra/ tsa tu rmA rA na ni bA ra ya bA ra ya/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ tshin+da tshin+da/ bin+da bin+da/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ 
<p>257a.4</p>do shal phreng ba dmang po ldan pa/ shing rta dmar po la yang dag par bzhugs pa/ rgyan cha dmar pos brgyan pa la/ bdag gi bgegs thams cad phrogs phrogs/ bdud bzhi po rnams zlog par gyis/ tsin+da tsin+da/ b+he da b+he da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ pash+tsata
<p>257a.5</p>prad+yaM she na tsA ra ye ta/ de nas cha shes so sor brjod par bya ste/ in+d+ra ya na laH hrIH ya mA ya na maH Sh+T+rIH ba ru NA ya na maH bi ku be rA ya na maH kr-i ag+na ye na maH ta/ I shwa rA ya na maH A nai ra ta ya na maH na bA ya be na maHna
<p>257a.6</p>tsan+dA ya na maH hUM/ arkA ya na ma hUM dbang po la 'dud/ gshin rje la 'dud/ chu'i lha la 'dud/ lus ngan la 'dud/ me lha la 'dud/ dbang phyug la 'dud/ bden bral la 'dud/ rlung lha la 'dud/ 
<p>257a.7</p>zla ba la 'dud/ nyi ma la 'dud/ bra h+ma ma Ne na maH phaT/ tshangs pa la 'dud/ ba su d+hA ra ai na maHphaT/ nor rgyun ma la 'dud/ be ma tsi tri Ne na maHswA hA/ thags bzangs ris la 'dud/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yo na maHswA hA/ 'byung po rnams thams cad la 'dud/ 
<p>257b</p>
<p>257b.1</p>ha hA hi hI hu hU hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rak+ta ya mA ri ba liH (15) oM tA ri Ni sarba duH kha b+ha ya ha ri Ni tsa turmA ra Ni pA ri Ni sarba da bA su ra na ra gan+d+harba kiM na ra ma ho ra gA d+yu ba dra ba pra mard ni b+hU ta pre ta yak+Sha sa DA ki n+ya di ba ya bi d+h+wan+sa ni ra kri ra yan+t+ra
<p>257b.2</p>man+t+ra tan+t+ra tra yo ga bi nA shin ba ga ba ti durgat+tA+e/ gshin rje gshed dmar po'i gtor ma'o/ /sgrol ma/ sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa thams cad 'phrog ma/ bdud bzhi bzlog par mdzad ma lha dang lha ma yin pa dang mi dang dri za dang mi 'am ci dang lho 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i nyer 'tshe rab tu 'joms ma/ 'byung po yi dgas gnod sbyin srin po dang mkha'
<p>257b.3</p>'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par 'joms ma/ gzhan gyis byas pa'i 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba rnam par zhi ba/ ri Ni A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ma ma sarba sha trUn ha na ha na/ khA hi khA hi/ sarba b+han+d+ha na byA d+hi gra hAn da ha da ha/ b+he da ya b+he da ya/ phoT ya phoT ya/ 
<p>257b.4</p>s+pho Ta ya s+phoT ya/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha shIn+taM puSh+T-iM rak+ShAM me ku ru sarba ka li ka la ha bi gra ha bi/ bcom ldan 'das ma ngan 'gro las sgrol ma tshur byon/ wa da big+hono rbA da byak+ti ka rAM sh+ts+tshin+da sh+ts+tshin+da/ b+han+da b+han+da/ 'ching ba dang nad dang gdon thams cad/ b+hany+dza ya b+hany+dza ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ hrIM hrIM hrIM/ 'chos 'chos/ 
<p>257b.5</p>khos khos/ hUM hUM hUM/ AHhUM phaT swA hA/ durgo t+tA rA ba liH/ (16) 'thab pa dang 'thab mo 'gyed pa dang / oM badzra ra l+li hoH badzra DA ki n+yaH rtsod pa dang / bgegs bskyed cing gsal bar byed pa rnams/ sa ma ya s+t+waM dr-i sh+ya hoH badzrA ny+dza l+ye Ur+d+ha bi ka tsa yA ba liM da byA ta ni shAd+b+ha ke/ oM kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ 
<p>257b.6</p>ngan 'gro las sgrol ba'i gtor ma'o/ /sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa b+hU ta pre ta A ra dgra dang li 'joms pa la'ang 'jug ces rje btsun lo chen gsung ngo / /rdo rje rtsibs 'phur rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams dam tshig nyid la ltos/ bi shA tso n+mA dA pasmA ra DA ka DA ki nA da ya/ rdo rje thal mo kha gyen du phye bas mchod sbyin gyi gtor
<p>257b.7</p>ma sbyin par bya'o/ /i daM ba liM gr-ihan+tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu ma ma sarba sid+d+hiM pra yats+tshan+tu ya thai baM/ ya theSh+Ti/ b+huny+dza tha khA da tha/ bi ba tha/ dzi g+h+ra tha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sarbA kA ra ta ya bdag la rnam pa thams cad du/ mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams/ 
<p>258a</p>
<p>258a.1</p>sat+su kha/ bi d+h+r-i d+ha ye sa hA ya kA b+ha ban+tu hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ tsakra sam+ba rA ba liMH (17) oM na mo g+ha ba t+yai rak+ta ne tra yai ma hA tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye ma sa sarba sha trU NAM sarba gA trA Ni saM ko tsa ya saM ko tsa ya/ b+hany+dza ya b+hany+dza ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ b+ha ga ba
<p>258a.2</p>ti badzra shrI kha le bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/ dam pa'i bde ba/ rnam par 'phel ba'i ched du stong grogs mdzod cig /'khor lo sdom po'i gtor ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma spyan dmar mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag na rdo rje gtum po chen po la/ bdag gi dgra thams cad kyi lus yang dag par bskum bskum
<p>258a.3</p>badzra pA Ni nA ga tsUR+Ya A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ tsak+Shu rba n+d+ha shi ro ban+d+ha sarba gA tra Ni tA ra ya mA ra ya puSh+paM d+hA paM gan+d+haM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ swA hA/ badzra shriM kha lA ba li/ (18) oM badzra bA rA hi i daM ba liM kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsA basmA ra DA ka DA ki n+yA da ya
<p>258a.4</p>phyag na rdo rje lha yul ba phye ma gyis la khug khug /mig chings/ mgo chings/ lus rnams thams cad sgrol cig /gcod cing / i daM ba liM gr-ih+Nan+tu/ rdo rdo lcags sgrog ma'i gtor ma'o/ /rdo rje phag mo/ sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu ya thai baM ya theSh+TaM b+huny+dza tha khA da tha bi ba tha dzi g+h+ra tha mA ri kra ma tha ma ma sarbA kA ra ra yA sat+su
<p>258a.5</p>kha baM br-id+d+ha ye sa hA ya kA b+ha ban+tu hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ badzra bA rA hI ba liH (19) na mo b+ha ga ba ti badzra tA ra sarba sid+d+hi ka re sarba b+ha ha re i daM ba liM pany+tsA mr-i taM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta na ma ma kr-i te stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ mo hA ya mo hA ya/ 
<p>258a.6</p>ban+da ya ban+da ya/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta stam+b+ha ni badzra tA re swA hA/ rdo rje phag mo'i gtor ma'o/ /phyag 'tshal lo bcom ldan ma rdo rje sgrol ma dngos grub kun mdzad ma/ 'jigs pa rkun 'phrog ma/ bdud rtsi lnga'i gtor ma 'di zung zung / bdag la gdug pa dang rab tu sdug par byed pa rnams thams cad du/ badzra tA tA ra ba
<p>258a.7</p>liMH rdo rje sgrol ma'i gtor ma'o/ /(20) gdug pa can thams cad rengs par byed ma/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ kun nas sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /namaH sa man+ta d+harmA NAM/ na maH sa man+ta saM g+hA nAM/ oM si tA ta pa tra gdugs dkar po/ /oM bi ma la dri ma med pa/ oM
<p>258b</p>
<p>258b.1</p>shaM ka ra/ oM pra t+yaM gi ra badzra uSh+Ni Sha tsa kra brti sarba yan+t+ra mU la karma ban+d+ha naM 'a Da nAM kI la naM bA/ bdag la byed pa po gang ci yang rung bas byed pa po 'di dang de thams cad/ ma ma kr-i te ye na ke na tsi tr-i taM tat+sarbAn ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ tsi ri tsi ri/ gi ri gi ri/ ma ra ma ra/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM
<p>258b.2</p>hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ bde byed/ uSh+Ni Sha/ phyir bzlog /rdo rje gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba/ 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang rtsa ba'i las thams cad dang bcings pa bsnun pa phur bus btab pa'am/ tsakra brti ba liH/ (21) oM AHsarba t+r+ya d+h+wa dza ga d+ha sha di klo ka d+hA tu na n+ta ga ga na sa mu dra me g+ha byu ha pra sa ra
<p>258b.3</p>pa ra mA Nu ra dzo maN+Dal pa ram+pa rAn+targa ta tha mA bat+t+ya ba s+thi tA d+d+ha rma d+d+ha tu sa ma ba sa ra NA A kA sha d+hA tu pa ma wa sA nAH sarba t+ya d+h+wa dza gad+da gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i gtor ma'o/ /dus gsum pa'i 'gro ba phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas/ nam mkha' rgya mtsho sprin gyi bkod pa/ 
<p>258b.4</p>rab 'byams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi dkyil 'khor gcig nas gcig tu brgyud po'i nang du gnas shing / snyoms par 'jug pa gnas pa chos kyi dbyings dang / sha di klo ka d+hA twa nan+ta b+hU ha sra sa ra ga ga na sa mAH sarba lo ka pA lAH sarba satwA ny+tsa/ tad+ya thA/ 'di lta ste/ badzrA yu d+ta/ rdo rje mtshon cha dang / badzra kA la
<p>258b.5</p>nA ga badzra badzra b+hai ra ba badzra ma la badzra su Sha la badzra ni la snyoms par 'jug pa nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam par gnas pa thams cad dang sa gsum pa'i 'gro ba phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i bkod pa/ rab 'byams nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang sems can thams cad la/ rdo rje dus dang / 
<p>258b.6</p>rdo rje klu dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / rdo rje me dang / rdo rje gtun shing dang / rdo rje rlung dang / badzra kro d+ha badzra mA+au na badzra mA yA badzra shauN+Da badzra sra b+ha kro d+ha be ma tsi tri thi wi de bi tAH sa pa ri wA rA i daM ba liM puSh+paM d+hU paM/ dI paM/ gan+d+haM/ nai wi d+yA di paM/ yug+taM/ pa l+Yu/ pra hA raM/ pra tI ts+tsho ba
<p>258b.7</p>b+hU dz+yaM ldan pa'i gtor ma'i mchod pa 'di bzhes shing longs spyad de/ rdo rje khro bo dang / thugs rdo rje dang / rdo rje sgyu ma dang / rdo rje glang sna dang / rdo rje 'od dang / rdo rje khro bo dang / thags bzangs ris dang / sa'i lha mo rnams 'khor dang bcas pas/ gtor ma/ me tog bdug spos mar me dri zhal zas la sogs pa dang / ma ma sarba bi
<p>259a</p>
<p>259a.1</p>g+h+na bi nA ya kA na sarba duSh+TA na ma nu Sh+ya na ma nu Sh+ya na dzam+b+ha ya ta stam+b+ha ya ta/ rings par gyis/ b+han+d+ha ya ta/ chings/ bi d+h+wa n+sa ya ta/ ma ma hi ra N+ya su war+Na d+ha na d+hA n+yA yu yau ba mA rau gya sat+su khA ni ma hA su kha bi br-id+d+ha ye yA ba dA bo d+hi maN+Da saR+Ya n+taM D+b+hau ka ya ta ma ma sa hA ya d+yaM/ 
<p>259a.2</p>bdag gi bgegs dang log 'dren dang gdug pa dang rab tu gdug pa'i mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams thams cad rmugs par gyis/ rnam par choms/ bdag gi dbyig dang gser dang nor dang 'bru dang tshe dang lang tsho dang nad med pa dang bde ba dam pa rnams dang bde ba chen po/ /rnam par 'phel ba'i ched dang ji srid byang chub snying po'i mthar thug par/ 
<p>259a.3</p>shAn+tiM puSh+TiM rak+ShAny+tsa kunA oM AH many+dzu badzra maM hUM swA hA/ many+dzu badzra bA gI shwa ra ba li (22) oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba ti badzra yo gi ni sarbA shA pa ri bU ri ke b+hA ga ba ti ba ra de na ma ste na ma ste pu na ba ri na ra bi na ma ste ma ma de bi mA ta ra nu gra ha ku ru i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na
<p>259a.4</p>gr-ih+Na/ bdag gi stong grogs mdzod cig na/ byams pa'i rdo rje ngag gi dbang phyug gi gtor ma'o/ /tshur byon tshur byon bcom ldan ma/ rdo rje rnal 'byor bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad ma/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchog sbyin ma khyod la 'dud slar yang khyod la 'dud yum lha mo/ /'di dag rjes su 
<p>259a.5</p>gzung du gsol/ oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye swA hA/ a tsa la kalpo k+tA+o sar+d+ha kha Da k+Sha ra badzra yo gi na'i ba liH/ (23)oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM hUM pheM pheM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rak+tA ga ga na k+She pa ba liH (25)oM badzra DA ki ni i daM ba liM hrI hrI/ ha hA+aiM haM hiH
<p>259a.6</p>rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad ma/ mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa las gsungs pa byed bcas yi ge drug gi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gtor ma'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rjes su dran par gyis/ nam mkha' dmar po la thor ba'i gtor ma'o/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ phaT ma ma sarba satwa nA ny+tsa shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ 
<p>259a.7</p>aSh+Ta mrI tsa tu r+d+da 'di brgyad dang bcu bzhi/ sh+yA mi ya me ya me ba dA ta byA kho na la sbyin par bya'o/ /sha ba ra pA dI ya kra ma badzra li gi nI ba liH/ sha ba ri'i zhal snga nas kyi rim pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gtor ma'o/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig /(25) 
<p>259b</p>
<p>259b.1</p>oM badzra DA ka ni i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ha ha ha haH kha kha kha kha/ ya ya ya ya/ a a a aH ma ma sid+d+hiM pra yats+tsha hUM phaT swA hA/ shrI ma da dwa ya pA dA ya badzra yo gi nA ba liH (26) oM a ra pa tsa nA ya ku ma ti da ha na dak+ShA ya tsan+t+ra kAn+ta ma Ni pra b+hA ya khaD+ga pusta ka bya grA ha stA ya
<p>259b.2</p>many+dzu bA NI bar/ 'jam par gsung ba/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ pra dA ya many+dzu bu d+hi sid+d+hi da dA ya i daM ba liM gan+d+haM puSh+paM d+hU paM dI paM ma d+hu/ dpal gnyis med zhabs kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gtor ma'o/ /sharka rA di sa hi taM 'khor ba sreg par byed pa/ blo gros ngan pa sreg par mkhas pa/ nor bu chu shel gyi 'od can/ ral gri dang 
<p>259b.3</p>glegs bam phyag na bsnams pa/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas dngos grub mchog stsol ba/ ma ma shAn+tiM puSh+TiM rak+ShA rak+ShA ba ra Na gup+tiM ku ru ku ru/ oM AHd+hIHhUM swA hA/ sbrang rtsi dang ka ra la sogs dang bcas pa/ a ra pa tsa na ba liH/ (19) oM ma hA shri ye trI hUM hrI oM i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ trai lo kya
<p>259b.4</p>saM sA rA ya dA ri byA ga dzaM bi dA ra ya sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA na b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ a gats+tsha agats+tsha/ b+ha ga ba ti ma ma ni d+hiM de hi swA hA/ mahA shri tA rA ba liH(28) oM ba ga ba ti ASh+Ta ma hA/ a ra pa tsa na'i gtor ma'o/ /b+ha ya tA ri Ni/ dpal chen mo/ shan+tiM puSh+TiM ba sh+yAM kA ri Na pa ra yan+t+ra
<p>259b.5</p>'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor ba'i dbul ba'i glang po rnam par 'joms ma/ gdug pa dang gdug pa rnams thams cad nyes/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdag la gter stsol cig/ dpal chen sgrol ma'i gtor ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol la/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang du mdzad ma/ 
<p>259b.6</p>man+t+ra bi ShA tsUr+Na bi nA shi ni ma hA yo ge shwa ri rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo/ /ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa rak+ShAM ku ru aSh+Ta ma hA dA ru Na b+ha ye b+h+ya stA ra ya tA ra ya/ di bya rU pi Ni sau me mu khi i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ swA hA/ aSh+Ta ma hA b+ha ya tA ra ba liH/ 
<p>259b.7</p>gzhan gyi 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang rdug phye ma rnam par sel ma/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la srung bar mdzod cig /'jigs pa mi bzad pa chen po brgyad las sgrol cig sgrol cig /lha'i gzugs can zhi ba'i zhal ma/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba'i gtor ma'o/ (29) /oM b+ha ga ba ti
<p>260a</p>
<p>260a.1</p>ts+tshin+na ma ste pra shaste/ oM sarba bud+d+ha TA ki nI ye ba dzra bai ro tsa nI ye rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad ma/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ma ma bi rud+d+ha rtsi t+ta kA na b+ha smi ku ru sa p+ta pA tA la ga ta sha trun pA da ta laM ku ru sarba tra ma ma shin+tiM pu Sh+Ti rak+ShA ba ra na gu b+ti ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT 
<p>260a.2</p>bcom ldan 'das ma dbu bcad ma/ rab bsngags ma/ sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma/ s+w+'a hA/ tri kA ya badzra yo gi ni bdag la 'gal bar sems pa rnams thal bar mdzod cig/ ba liH/ sa 'og rim bdun du gnas pa'i dgra rnams rkang 'og tu gyis/ thams cad du bdag la zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang
<p>260a.3</p>spa bar mdzod/ (30) oM sarba d+ha rma ba dzrA d+hi kA ra badzra ma hA kA la shA sa na ta la ga ma no pa ka ra ha hUM hriM k+ShiM i maM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ sarba du Sh+Ta sa tA da ma/ sku gsum rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gtor ma'o/ /ha hA hi hI hu hU he hai ho hau haMhaHphaT swA hA/ oM badzra ma hA kA la ba liH/ (31) oM ma hA pra t+yaM gi re sarba shu
<p>260a.4</p>b+ha shAn+ti ka re a shI chos thams cad rdo rje lhag par byed pa rdo rje nag po chen po bstan pa'i gzhi la 'gro ba'i yid nye bar byed pa/ ti yo ga sha ta sa ha sra kA ra ri daM ba liM gan+d+haM/ pu Sh+paM/ d+hU paM/ dI paM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ye na ke na rtsi n+ma ma/ rdo rje nag po chen po'i gtor ma'o/ /phyir bzlog ma chen mo dge ba dang zhi ba kun
<p>260a.5</p>byid ma sbyor ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu byed ma/ yan+t+ra man+t+ra tan+t+ra bi Sha tsU rna pra yo ga di kaM kr-i ku rban+tu taM ta t+sa rbaM ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ gardza gardza/ tardza tardza/ ta s+yai ba ma sta ke ni pa ta tu swA hA/ ma hA pra t+yaM gi ra ba liH/ (32) oM ma hA pra ti sA ri ma hA sA hA sra pra marda ni ma hA mA
<p>260a.6</p>yu ri ma hA/ gang la la dag bdag 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang rgyud dang drug gi phye ma'i sbyor ba la sogs pa byas pa dang byed du bcug pa de thams cad/ de nyid kyi mgo lhung bar gyis shig/ phyir bzlog ma chen mo'i gtor ma'o/ /so so 'brang chen mo/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa/ 
<p>260a.7</p>rma bya chen mo/ /shI ta pa ni bsil ba'i tshal chen mo/ /ma hA man+t+ra nu sA ri ni gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma bud+d+hi sh+tsai ba ma hA t+mA no bi d+yA de byo ma hA ba lIH sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po dang / /rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen ma/ mA ma kI b+h+r-i ku TI tsai/ mA ma kI dang khro gnyer can/ /btA rA bI tA thAM ku
<p>260b</p>
<p>260b.1</p>shI badzra shr-iM kha lA shwe tA ta the tsa de bzhin dkar mo dkar chen ma/ ma hA kA lI tsa pU t+ya stsa badzra dU t+ya sta thA ba raH/ /su pA shI badzra pA shI tsa badzra pA Ni rma hA ba lA/ /badzra ma lA ma hA bi d+yA ta thai bA mr-i ta kuN+Da liH/ /a pa rA dzi tA ma hA de bI kA la ka r+NI ma hA ba la/ 
<p>260b.2</p>lha mo sgrol ma lcags kyu ma/ de bzhin rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/ nag mo che dang pho nya mo/ /de bzhin rdo rje pho nya gzhan/ /gzhag bzang rdo rje zhags pa ma/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs chen ma/ /rdo rje phreng ba rig ma che/ /de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che/ /sme ba nag po stobs chen ma/ /
<p>260b.3</p>ta thA d+ha n+ya ma hA b+hA gA pad+ma kuN+Da li re ba tsa/ /pu Sh+pa daN+DI ma ni tsU TA sba n+ya ke shI tsa piM ga lA/ /ma hA te dzA ta thA de bI d+ha n+yA tsa biR+Yu n+mA li nI/ /rA k+Sha s+yai ka dza TI rtse ba bud+d+hA k+Shi ti ka nA yi kAH/ /kA pA li nI ma hA b+hA gA d+ha n+yA lang+ke shwa rI ta thA/ 
<p>260b.4</p>de bzhin dpal yon skal chen ma/ /pad+ma 'khyil pa nyid dang yang / /me tog so ma bcud ster ma/ /gser gyi skra ma dmar ser ma/ /de bzhin lha mo gzi brjid can/ /dpal mo klog gi phreng ldan ma/ /srin mo ral pa gcig ma dang / /sangs rgyas sa yi 'dren pa mo/ /thod pa can ma skal chen ma/ /de bzhin dpal mo lang+ka'i dbang / /
<p>260b.5</p>a n+yA sh+tsa ba ha bo bi d+yAHsa twA nu gra ka ri kAH/ tad+ya thA/ kA li ka rA li kum+b+ha n+D-i shaM khi ni/ ka ma lA k+Shi/ hA rI ti/ ha ri ke shi/ shrI ma ti/ ha ri sing+ga le/ lam+be/ pra lam+be/ kA la pA she/ ka la sho da ri/ ya ma du ti/ ya ma rA k+Sha/ 
<p>260b.6</p>gzhan yang rig pa mang po ni/ /sems can yongs su 'dzin pa ma/ /'di lta ste/ nag mo mche gtsigs ma grul bum ma dung can ma/ pad+ma'i mig ma/ 'phrog ma/ skra ljang gu ma/ dpal ldan ma/ 'phrog ma dmar ser ma/ 'phyang ma/ rab tu 'phyang ma/ zhags pa nag po/ /bum pa'i lto ma/ gshin rje'i pho nya ma/ gshin rje'i srin mo/ /
<p>260b.7</p>si b+hU ta gra sa ni/ 'byung po za byed ma/ pra tI ts+tshe mi gan+daM puSh+paM d+hU paM dI paM ba liM tsa dA s+yA maM ra k+ShI ku ru/ gtor ma dri dang me tog bdug spos mar me dang ldan pa 'di 'bul gyis bzhes shig srung bar mdzod/ ma ma sarba satwa nA ny+tsa sarba b+ha yo pa dra be b+h+yo dzA ba tu/ bdag dang sems can/ 
<p>261a</p>
<p>261a.1</p>thams cad 'jigs pa dang nye bar 'tshe ba 'di las lo brgya 'tsho bar shog cig /paR+Sha sha taM pa sh+ya tu sa ra dI sha taM/ sid+d+h+ya n+tu ma n+t+ra pa dAHswA hA/ pany+tsa rak+Sha pa liH/ (33) oM na mo b+ha ga bti pra dz+nyA pA ra mi te \u0f85 /mi te ma hA pI te/ ma hA shwe te/ ma hA nI la rat+na pang+ga dza pusta ka ha ste/ 
<p>261a.2</p>i maM ba liM pany+tsA mr-i taM b+huny+dza dzig+h+ra/ oM pi tsu pitsu/ 'jam pa 'jam pa/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /gsang sngags kyi tshigs rnams grub par gyur cig /bsrung ba lnga'i gtor ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma/ dpag med ma/ ser chen ma/ dkar chen ma/ rin po che'i 'dam skyes sngon po chen pos glegs bam bsnams ma/ 
<p>261a.3</p>pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ me d+hA bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bu d+hi bar+b+ha ni swA hA/ oM shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye/ d+hIHd+hAr NI yi swAhA/ blo 'dzin ma/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ba liH/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtor ma'o/ (34)/ oM ba su d+hA ri Ni dA ri d+h+ya duHkha b+ha ya ha ri Ni/ 
<p>261a.4</p>shes rab 'phel ma/ 'bar ma 'bar ma/ yid gzhungs 'phel ma/ blo 'phel ma/ oM d+hIHshru ti smr-i ti ma hA bi dza ye swA hA zer/ thos pa dran pa rnam rgyal ma/ sarba yak+Shi Ni sa me tA shI g+h+raM A gats+tshan+tu/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ nor rgyun ma dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa 'phrog ma/ 
<p>261a.5</p>oM d+har Ni d+ha ra Ni swA hA/ ba su d+hA ra ba liH/ (35) oM pra san+na tA re a mr-i ta mu khi a mr-i ta lo tsa ne/ ma masarbAr+tha sA d+ha ni/ gnod sbyin ma thams cad dang ldan pa myur du tshur byon/ sarba satwAM shaM ka ri/ i maM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ hUM phaT hrIM hrIM swA hA/ 
<p>261a.6</p>pra san+na tA ra ba liH/ nor rgyun ma'i gtor ma'o/ /rab tu dang ba'i sgrol ma bdud rtsi'i zhal ma bdud rtsi'i spyan ma/ bdag gi don thams cad sgrub pa/ (36) / oM na maH sha ba ri ku mA rI bi Sha dUSha NI ye/ sems can thams cad bde byed ma/ bi Sha b+hak+Sha NI ye tsA la ya/ saM g+haT+Ta ya/ 
<p>261a.7</p>rab tu dang ba'i sgrol ma'i gtor ma'o/ /man+ta mA taM ga// glang po myos pa/ a bi d+he he/ dug 'joms ma/ i daM ba li b+huny+dza dzi g+h+ra oM dzAHdzaHswAhA/ ri khrid ma gzhon nu ma dug sun 'byin ma/ AR+YaM gu lI ba liH/ 'phags ma sor mo can gyi gtor ma'o/ /dug za byed ma skyod cig/ zung du brdungs shig/
<p>261b</p>
<p>261b.1</p>(37) oM na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai/ badzra g+dA n+d+ha R+Ya/ a ne ka sha ta sa ha sra dz+wa li ta dIp+ta te dzA yai u dra kI ra NA/ b+ha yA na kA yai/ a h+ye hi/ tra yANAM rat+nA nAM sa t+ya na de bA dI kaM/ ye tsA n+ye sa ma ye na tiSh+Shi te tA na ba b+hu Shi swA mi shI g+h+ra/ mi daM ba li gr-i h+Na gr-ih+Na/ 
<p>261b.2</p>bcom ldan 'das ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rjes 'dzin ma/ 'od dang gzi brjid brgya stong phrag du ma 'bar ma rab tu 'bar ma 'od zer drag mo/ /'jigs rung ma la/ tshur byon tshur byon/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang lha la sogs pa dang / gang gzhan dam tshig la gnas pa de rnams snang bar byed pa'i rje mo myur du/ 
<p>261b.3</p>oM ma la ma la/ tu lu tu lu/ mu lu mu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ rang+ga rang+ga/ rang+ga ya rang+ga pa ya/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ A shAM me b+ha ga ba ti ma hA badzra gAn+d+hA ri/ sid+d+hi tsaN+Da badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ badzra gAn+d+hA ri ba liH/ (38) oM d+h+wa dzA gra ke yU re/ 
<p>261b.4</p>dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ dza yA ba hi ni/ tshos tshos/ tshos shig tshos shig/ gang bar gyis gang bar gyis/ bdag bsam pa bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rjes 'dzin chen mo/ grub pa gtum po phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin gyis/ rdo rjes 'dzin pa'i gtor ma'o/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan/ 
<p>261b.5</p>rgyal ba rgyal ba/ rnam par rgyal ba rnam par rgyal ba/ rgyal ba thob ma/ ma ma sarba shatrUM dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ ma tha ma tha/ gra sa gra sa/ hUM rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM b+ha ga wAM/ i maM ba liM gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ pa ra sai n+yaM bi d+h+wan+sA ya bid+h+wan+sA ya/ sha trUn sha trUn tsa la tsa la tsi li tsi li/ dgra rnams skyod skyod/ 
<p>261b.6</p>tu lu tu lu/ ga la ga la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ bdag gi dgra thams cad rmugs par gyis rmugs par gyis/ sarba ta thA ga tA ba lo ki te swA hA/ guN rA dza prA b+hA se swA hA/ tsan+d+rA rka bi ma le swA hA/ sarba nak+Sha tra tsa mi ka ri Ne swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ gzhan gyi dmag rnams rnam par choms choms/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH swA hA/ d+h+wa dzA gra ke yU rA ba liH/ 
<p>261b.7</p>(39) oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti uSh+Ni Sha bi dza ye/ bcom ldan 'das ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu gzigs ma/ yon tan rgyal po rab snang ma/ zla ba nyi ma dri med ma/ rgyu skar thams cad gsal bar byed ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnams la/ rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi gtor ma'o/ /
<p>262a</p>
<p>262a.1</p>ma ma mr-i t+yu nA sha ya nA sha ya/ bi nA shA ya bi nA shA ya/ bi d+h+wan+sA ya pi d+h+wan+sAn+sA ya/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ dI r+g+hA yuSh+ka mi ku ru swA sti swA hA/ uSh+Ni Sha bi dza yA ba liH/ (40)/ oM sid+d+hai ka bI rA ya pI re shA ya ka ru NA pe sha la hr-i da yA ya ni lo twa la hastA ya i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na
<p>262a.2</p>bdag gi 'chi bdag nyams par gyis nyams par gyis/ rnam par nyams par gyis rnam par nyams par gyis/ rnam par choms choms/ bdag gi tshe bsrings shig bde legs gzhi tshugs/ gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma'i gtor ma'o/ /dpa' bo gcig tu sgrub pa la/ dpa' bo'i dbang po la/ snying rje dang nges pa'i thugs can la/ ut+pal sngon po phyag na bsnams pa la/ 
<p>262a.3</p>tI tA ba b+hu dze shAn+tiM ku ru sarba sid+d+haM ku ru hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ sid+d+hai ka bI ra ba liH/ (41) /oM ya mAn+ta kA ya ya ma b+hI Sha NA ya hrIHSh+T+rIHbi kr-i tA na nA ya nA gA b+ha ra NA ya trai lo kya bi marda na daN+Da hastA ya sarba mA ra ba la bi nA sha nA ya i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ 
<p>262a.4</p>bzung ste longs spyad de/ ma ma big+h+nan ha ra ha ra tsa dpa' bo gcig tu sgrub pa'i gtor ma'o/ /gshin rje mthar byed/ gshin rje 'jigs par byed pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal can klu'i rgyun can/ 'jig rten gsum rnam par 'joms pa'i dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa/ bdud dpung rnam par 'joms pa/ 
<p>262a.5</p>turmA rA na ni bA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ ya mAn+ta ka ba liH/ (42) /oM big+h+nAn+ta ka la hA kro d+ha ma hA ba la pa rA kra ma i maM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ma ma sarba big+h+nAn ts+tshe da ts+tshe da/ b+he da b+he da/ dru taM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ AH
<p>262a.6</p>big+h+nAn kaM ta hUM swA hA/ big+h+nAn+ta ga ba liH/ gshin rje mthar byed kyi gtor ma'o/ /bgegs mthar byed khro bo chen po stobs po che pha rol gnon pa/ (43) /oM b+ha ga ba ti gra ha mA tri ke sarba gra ha na k+Sha tra b+ha ya nA shi ni sarba de ba nA ga yak+Sha di b+ha ya byu yu pa sha ma ni rA dza tsau ra 'i di b+ha ya
<p>262a.7</p>bid+h+wan+sa bgegs mthar byed kyi gtor ma'o/ ni b+ha ga rgyal po dang chom rkun la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par 'joms ma/ bcom ldan 'das ma gza' rnams kyi yum/ gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad sel ma/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad kyi 'jigs pa nye bar zhi byed ma/ 
<p>262b</p>
<p>262b.1</p>ba ti gra hA mA tr-i ke sarba gra ha nak+Sha trA di b+hiH shI g+h+raM A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ma ma sarba big+h+nAn ha ra ha ra/ shAn+tiM puSh+TiM rak+ShAny+tsa me ku ru hUM phaT swA hA/ bra ha mA tr-i kA ba liH/(44) oM na mo lo ka nA thA ya de bA su ra na
<p>262b.2</p>bcom ldan 'das ma gza' rnams kyi yum/ gza' dang rgyu skar la sogs pa thams cad lhan cig tu myur du byon/ ra yak+Sha rAk+Sha de b+hirban+di ta pA da pad+ma ya a she Sha nA ra ka sa twod+d+ha ra gza' yum gyi gtor ma'o/ /'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /Na tsan+tI
<p>262b.3</p>tat+pa pA ya ma hA kA ku Ni kA ya thugs rje chen po can la/ i daM ba liM du g+d+hA di sa hi haM lha dang lha ma yin dang mi dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi pad+mo la phyag bya ba/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ mAMsarba satwA sh+tsa na ra kA di duHkhA dut+ta ra ya khA dut+ta ra ya/ ud+d+ha ra/ 
<p>262b.4</p>ud+d+ha ra/ dmyal ba'i sems can ma lus 'don par dgongs pa lhur mdzad pa/ samud+d+ha ra sa mud+d+ha ra/ bud+d+ha sa t+yai na d+harma sa t+yai na saM g+ha sa t+yai na sa t+ya bA de sa t+ya na oM IHhrIHhUM phaT 'o ma sogs dang bcas pa'i gtor ma 'di zung zung / bdag dang sems can thams cad dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las sgrol sgrol/ 
<p>262b.5</p>phyung phyung / swA hA/ sarba lo ke shwa ra ba lIH/ (45) oM na maH kun nas phyung phyung / sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pas/ shrIkha sar+b+ba NA ya trai lo kya da r+b+ba NA ya/ e kA gra ci t+ta ya/ sa ka la ro ga dA ri d+h+ya duH/ duHkha du ri to pa zer te 'og ma don bzang / 
<p>262b.6</p>'jig rten dbang phyug thams cad kyi gtor ma'o/ /kha dru ta mu pa sha ma nA ya i daM ba liM dug+d+ha di sa hi daM gr-i hI two pa b+hu dz+ya phyag 'tshal dpal mkha' la gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi me long / shAn+taM puSh+TiM nad dang dbul ba dang / saMha duH rak+ShAny+tsa me ku ru oM AH hrIH
<p>262b.7</p>hUM phaT swA hA/ bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' dag myur du zhi bar mdzad pa/ bzung ste long spyad nas/ kha sar+p+pa NA ba liH/ mkha' la gshegs pa'i gtor ma'o// (46) oM na mo bud+d+ha ya/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ ma hA ka ru NA b+hA ra b+ha
<p>263a</p>
