<p>263a.1</p>ri ta hr-i da yA ya/ pa rArma ba tA ga ta tsit+tA ya gzhan gyi don mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa'i thugs can/ trai d+ha tu kai ka mUr+t+ta ye sa twAr+tha ma hA duHka ra kA ri Ne i daM ba liM di bya gan+d+ha bar+Na ra swa pe taM mu pa b+hu dz+yaM zer te don gcig /bu byu dz+ya mAM sarba satwAM sh+tsA nut+tA rA yAM samyag+saM
<p>263a.2</p>snying rje chen po'i khur gyis gang ba'i thugs can/ bo d+hau pra tiSh+ThA ba ya oM AH su ga ta badzra tu Sh+ya khams gsum pa'i sku gcig pu rang gi don don chen po mdzad pa mdzad pa/ lha'i dri dang kha dog dang / hoHhUM swA hA/ shri bud+d+ha b+hat+ta ra ka ba liH/ rgya dpe gcig na 'di gnyis par bya snang pa/ 
<p>263a.3</p>ro dang ldan pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes te bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu khod cig /(47) oM mr-i t+yu pany+tsa ni tA re kA lA kA la mr-i t+yu ha re dA re d+ya duHkha/ bde gshegs rdo rje dgyes pa/ dpal sangs rgyas rje btsun gyi gtor ma'o/ b+ha yaM ka re aSh+Ta ma hA b+ha ya ha re
<p>263a.4</p>khaD+gAny+dza na pA du ka b+ha dra g+ha TA di sid+d+hi de/ b+ha ga ba ti tA re i daM ba liM pany+tsA mr-i taM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ma ma 'chi ba bslu ba'i sgrol ma/ dus dang dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba 'phrog ma dbul ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa 'jig par byed ma/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad 'phrog ma/ 
<p>263a.5</p>ral gri dang mig sman dang lham dang bum pa bzang po la sogs pa'i dngos grub stsol ma/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma/ mr-i t+yuM nA sha ya nA sha ya/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ mr-i t+yu pany+tsa nI tA rA ba liH/ (48) oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya na mo ma Ni b+ha dra ya ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM
<p>263a.6</p>uts+tshuSh+ma dzam+b+ha la dza len+t+ra ya i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ba su ma me de hi da dA ya swA hA/ sdug bsngal myur du sgrol ba'i sgrol ma/ 'chi ba bslu ba'i sgrol ma'i gtor ma'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal nor bu bzang po la/ /gnon sbyin sde dpon chen po la/ /
<p>263a.7</p>'chol pa rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po la/ /bdag la nor chen po sbyin du chug cig /uts+tsu Sh+ma dzam+b+ha la ba liH/ 'chol pa rmugs 'dzin gyi gtor ma'o/ /(47) oM AH hrIM hUM shuklai ka dza TI/ ral gcig ma dkar mo/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ g+hA Ta ya sarba
<p>263b</p>
<p>263b.1</p>duSh+TAn hUM phaT swA hA/ sarba mA ra ba la bi nA sha nA shAnA shAr+thaM da d+yA ta/ shuklai ka dza Ti ba liH/ (50) /oM na maHka ya wAk+tsit+ta b+h+yaH/ karko Ta shaM kha pA la a nan+ta pA su ki tak+Sha ka/ ku li ka pad+ma ma hA pad+me b+h+yo nA ga rA dze b+h+ya i daM pa liM nA no pa ka ra Na duH/ khA/ 
<p>263b.2</p>phyis shig gdug pa can thams cad/ rnam par gshegs pa'i phyir du sbyin par bya ste/ ral gcig ma dkar mo'i gtor ma'o/ /phyag 'tshal sku gsung thugs rnams la/ stobs rgyu/ dung skyong mtha' yas dang / nor rgyas bu dang / 'jog po dang / rigs ldan pad+ma pad+ma chen po ste klu'i rgyal po rnams nyer spyod dang bcas pa'i gtor ma 'di/ 
<p>263b.3</p>sa hi taM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ma ma na sid+d+hiM pra yats+tsha oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ nA ga ba liH/ (51) oM na maHshrI mai tre ya nA thA ya/ b+hA bi bi d+yA tsa ra Na sam+pan+na samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ sarba sa twA r+the Na bA bud+d+h+ri t+yA nu t+ta rA yAMsamyak+saM/ dra bi ta tsit+tA ya/ 
<p>263b.4</p>i daM ba liM di bya gan+d+ha bar+Na ra so pe daM u pa b+hu dz+ya mAM/ sarba satwaMsh+tsa saM sA duHkhAr+Na bA t+saM klu'i gtor ma'o/ /bo d+hau pra tiSh+ThA pa yi Sh+ya si byams pa mgon po la/ sgom pa'i rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ dud+h+r-i t+yA nut+ta rA lAM samya k+saM zer/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyis brlan
<p>263b.5</p>pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha rdzas kyi dri dang kha dog dang ro dang ldan pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes te/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'khod par mdzod cig /oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ mai tri ya ba liH/ 
<p>263b.6</p>(52) oM in+d+ra dza ma dza la dza dzakla b+hU ta bah+ni bA u rak+kha tsan+d+ra sudz+dza mA da bap+pa tA li aT+Tha sAp+pa swA hA/ i daM ba liM b+huny+dza dzi g+ha phu l+ma d+hU pa mAM sa piM g+ha am+ma sap+pa sA d+ha khAn+ti khu Ni phe Da gA da hUM swA hA/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ byams pa'i gtor ma'o/ /
<p>263b.7</p>dbang po/ gshin rje/ chu lha/ gnod sbyin/ 'byung po/ me lha/ rlung lha/ srin po/ zla ba/ nyi ma/ myos ma/ mthil/ 'og na/ sbrul brgyad/ 'di snoms/ me tog / bdug pa sha// nya sha bdag gi thams cad bsgrubs bzod par gsol gnod pa sol/ da 'di dpe shas cher mi 'dug/ 
<p>264a</p>
<p>264a.1</p>A d+ya nut+pan+na twA ta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ shrI he ru ka ba liH/ (53) /oM sa ha dza sam+ba ra AHhUM A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ shI g+h+raM i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ b+huk+t+wA tr-ip+tiM kr-i twA sarba satwA nAM shAn+tiM kr-i twA/ swa s+thA naM gats+tsa gats+tsha swA hA/ shrI sa ha dza sam+ba ra ba liH/ (54) /oM tA re sarba b+ha
<p>264a.2</p>ya ha re ma ma kr-i te duSh+Ta/ sarba duSh+Ta sa twA na dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ dpal he ru ka'i gtor ma'o/ /lhan skyes sdom pa/ sta m+b+ha ya sta b+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ ma ma shIn+taM ku ru gsol zhing 'thung ste tshims nas sems can thams cad la zhi bar mdzod/ rang gi nang du gshegs/ dpal ldan skyes sdom pa'i gtor ma'o/ /sgrol ma 'jigs pa kun
<p>264a.3</p>'phrog ma/ bdag la byed ma gdug pa can dang rnam par gdug pa'i sems can thams cad/ sarba bi g+ha na shAn+tiM ka re pra kr-i ti pra b+ha swa re/ i daM ba liM pany+tsa mr-i ta sa hi raM gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ puSh+TiM ku ru rak+Sha ba ra Na gup+ti ku ru sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta stam+b+ha ni tA re swA hA/ Ad+ya tA ri ba liH/ 
<p>264a.4</p>(55) oM badzra g+haN+Ti AHoM badzra g+haN+Te ra Na ra Na/ pra ra Na pra ra Na/ saM pra ra Na saM pra ra Na/ bgegs kun zhi bar byed ma/ rang bzhin rang 'od/ sarba bud+d+ha k+She tra pra tsA ri Ni/ prany+dzA pA ra mi te nA da swa b+ha be/ badzra sa twa hr-i da ya san+to Sha na ka ri hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rengs byed sgrol ma/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gtor ma'o/ /
<p>264a.5</p>sad+d+harma pA ThAr+thaM g+han+daM bA da rdo rje dril bu/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur/ yan+na ne na man+t+re na da d+yA ta/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rab tu rgyu bar byed ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra'i rang bzhin/ rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kun tu mnyes par byed ma/ dI pa d+hU paM gan+d+he nai bi d+ya puSh+pa tAm+bu
<p>264a.6</p>laM tsa ya thA bi d+hi mA dA taM bya/ ta taHkr-i to baH sarba satwAr+tha i t+yA di nA/ oM badzra muHswa he t+ya dam pa'i chos klog pa'i don gyis dril bu gsil zhing sngags 'dis dbul bar bya zhing / ne na bi sardza ye ta/ sad+d+har+m+ma ba liH/ (56) / oM bra h+mA d+yA de ba tAH sarbe in+da d+ya/ mar me dang bdug pa dang dri dang zhal zas dang me tog dang so rtsi
<p>264a.7</p>yang cho gas ji lta ba bzhin du dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas khyed kyi sems can don kun mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa dang / oM badzra muHswA hA zhes bya ba 'dis gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ dam pa'i chos kyi gtor ma'o/ tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang dbang po la sogs pa bdag bsrung ba'i klu dang / 
<p>264b</p>
<p>264b.1</p>ma ma rak+Sha kAHnA ga /gan+d+ha yak+Sha sh+tsa saM tristA ba li nA sa dA/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM a d+ya nut+pan+na twA ta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ sarba kArmI ka ba liH/ (57) /oM AHrA hu kA mA g+ni tsan+d+ra sUmaM ga la bu d+ha br-i haspa ti shu kra ke tu she ni sh+tsa re b+h+yo nya \u0f85b+h+yaH/ 
<p>264b.2</p>dri za dang gnod sbyin rnams rtag tu gtor mas tshim par mdzod/ tsa de ba nA ga yak+Sha gan+d+harbA su ra ga ru Da kin+na ra ma ho ra gA di b+h+ya i daM ba liM las thams cad pa'i gtor ma'o/ /sgra gcan/ dus me/ zla ba/ nyi ma/ bkra shis gza' lhag /phur bu/ pa sangs/ mjug rings/ spen pa/ 
<p>264b.3</p>gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ hUM phaT swA hA/ sarba gra ha ba liMH/ gzhan yang / lha klu/ gnod sbyin/ dri za/ lha ma yin nam mkha' lding / mi 'am ci/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa rnams/ (58) /oM ma hA sA ha sra pra marda ni bi d+yA radz+nyi sarba sha trUM bi dA ra Ni ma ma sarba sa twA nany+tsa shAn+tiM ku ru puSh+Ti ku ru
<p>264b.4</p>pa sh+yaM ku ru sarba da nA ga gan+b+harbA/ gza' thams cad kyi gtor ma'o/ /su ra ga ru Da kin+na ra ma ho ra ga b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsA dI na da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa ma tha ma tha stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo/ dgra thams cad rnam par 'joms ma/ bi d+h+wA n+sa ya ma hA
<p>264b.5</p>sA ha sra pra mard nI i daM ba liM gr-i h+Na gr-i h+na maM sarba satwAM sh+tsa rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ ma hA sA ha sra pra mardi ni ba liH/ (59) /oM ma hA mA yu ri bi d+yA rA dz+nyi sarba bi Sha pra sha ma ni ma ma shAn+tiM ku ru puSh+Ti ku ru ba sh+yaM ku ru sarba de ba nA ga yak+Sha gan+d+harbA su ra
<p>264b.6</p>ga ru Da/ kin+na ra ma ho ra gA d+Yu pa dra bA na ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ gardza ya gardza ya/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i gtor ma'o/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo/ dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed ma/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ mAM sarba
<p>264b.7</p>satwAM sh+tsa rak+Sha rak+Sha/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i he bar 'tshe ba rnams/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ ma hA mA yu ri bA liH/ rma bya chen mo'i gtor ma'o/ /(60) / oM ma hA shI ta ba ni bi d+yA rA dz+nyi sarba duSh+Ta pra marda ni rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba tshal chen po gdug pa thams cad rab tu 'joms ma/ ma ma sarba
<p>265a</p>
<p>265a.1</p>satwA nAny+ta shAn+tiM ku ru puSh+Ti ku ru ba sh+yaM ku ru b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsA di na mA ra ya mA ra ya kA ra ya kA ra ya kA ra ya tardza ya tardza ya i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na rak+Sha rak+Sha hUm hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ mahA shAti ba ni ba liH/ (61) oM ma hA pra ti sa re sarba bi d+ya d+hi pa te i daM liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa shAn+tiM ku
<p>265a.2</p>ru puSh+TiM ku ru ba sh+yaM ku ru b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsa dI na mA ra ya mA ra ya marda ya marda ya mAM sarba satwAM sh+tsa/ rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ ma hA pra ti sa rA ba liH/ bsil ba tshal chen mo'i gtor ma'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo so so 'brang chen mo/ (62) /oM ma hA man+t+ra nu pA ri Ni i d+yu pa dra bA nA shi ni i daM
<p>265a.3</p>ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ma ma sarba twA nA ny+tsa shAn+tiM ku ru puSh+TiM ku ru pa sh+yaM ku ru ma ma sarba sha truM mA ra ya mA ra ya hrIM haHhUM phaT swA hA/ ma ha man+t+ra nu pA ri NI ba liH/ so so 'brang chen mo'i gtor ma'o/ (63) /kr-i ti ri ya mA tsaR+Ya su ma ti siM ha pA dA nAM ba li mA li kA sa mAp+ta/ gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma/ yams dang nye bar
<p>265a.4</p>'tshe ba sel ma/ gtor ma 'di zung zung / bdag dang sems can thams cad la zhi bar mdzod/ rgyas par mdzod/ dbang du mdzod/ gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i gtor ma'o/ /slob dpon blo bzang seng ge'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i gtor ma'i phreng ba 'di rdzogs so// //bde bar gshegs pa'i ring lugs dam
<p>265a.5</p>pa mchog tu gces spras mdzad pa'i rje btsun mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gi zhal snga nas dang / sa skyong chos kyi spyan ldan gyi bka' bzhin rgya gar shar phyogs kyi dge slong d+harmA dI paM ka ra dang / lo tsA ba d+harmA pa la b+ha dras dpal e waM chos 'khor du bsgyur ba'o// //![]bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa skye ba
<p>265a.6</p>dran ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo b+ha ga wa te sid+d+hi sid+d+he mo tsa ni mo k+Sha Ni muk+t+re a ma le bi ma le nirma le aN+Da re paN+Da re mang+ga laM/ hi ra N+ye gar+b+he sarba trA pra ti ha te swA hA/ gang zhig gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang ston pa dang yi ger 'dri ba dang yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ gzungs 'di'i mthus de bskal ba brgyad
<p>265a.7</p>khri bzhi stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa dgu khrir gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang rnam par grol ba'i gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa skye ba dran pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya dpe gser gyis bris pa las d+harmA b+ha dras bsgyur ba'o// //[]#/ /tsan+d+ra pa'i yi ge'i mdo'i 'grel ba gsar
<p>265b</p>
<p>265b.1</p>'gyur ba zhugs/ /@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsan+d+ra byA ka ra Na baN+Di sU tra Ni br-itrIH/ bod skad du/ lung ston pa tsan+d+ra pa'i yi ge'i mdo'i 'grel pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu rgyal dka' bdud kyi stobs bcom ste/ /rnyed dka'i go 'phang nyams pa med brnyes pa/ /gzhan don legs
<p>265b.2</p>mdzad rgud pa mi mnga' ba'i/ /mi mchog kun mkhyen de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sgra yi bstan bcos mngon par mi shes shing / /rang gi don ni tshol bar 'dod pa la/ /yi ge'i mdo yi rnam par 'grel pa ni/ /bdag gis mdor bsdus pa yis brjod par bya/ /bdud kyis nyer sgyur skye bo ngan/ /yid ni phrag
<p>265b.3</p>dog gis bcom phyir/ /yon tan skyon dag mi shes pas/ /skyon med pa yang rtag tu skyon/ /skye bo dam pa ring nas bcom na yang / /da ltar gzhan kyi skyon dag rgyas mi byed/ /skye dgu rnams la nam yang mi brnyas pa'i/ /yon tan phyogs su lhung ba der phyag 'tshal/ /de la re
<p>265b.4</p>zhig dang por sgra'i mtshan nyid nye bar brjod par bya ba ni/ /nam mkha' rlung las byung dang lus las dang / /brjod dang kha dang nye ba nA da ste/ gnas gzhan rnams su dbye bar byed pa yis/ /yi ge nyid du 'byung gang sgra yin no/ /nam mkha' dang rlung dang zhes pa ni nam mkha' dang
<p>265b.5</p>rlung dag las de dag 'byung ba'i rgyu gang yin pa de nam mkha' 'gyur rnyed zhig na/ nam mkha' rlung las rab tu byung zhing lus las ni/ /yang dga'i ma pas gyen bskyod kha nang sgra ring 'di/ /gnas rnams de ma thag par rab tu rnam rtsol ldan/ /yi ge nyid du kun du 'gro ba gang de'i sgra/ /zhes pa snang ste 'gyur mi bde/ dang rlung las
<p>265b.6</p>byung ba'o/ /yang na nam mkha' dang rlung las 'byung ba ni skye ba ste skye'o zhes pa'i don to/ /lus las zhes pa ni lus kyi phyogs gcig lte ba'i phyogs las so/ /brjod pa zhes pa ni yang dag par steng nas phyir 'byung ba'i bar du 'gro'o zhes pa'o/ /kha dang nye ba ni 'ong ba ste thob
<p>265b.7</p>po zhes pa'i don no/ /ci yis de ni nA da'i sgrar 'gyur zhe na mi gsol ba'i sgra zhes pa'o/ /gnas gzhan rnams ni brgyad de/ khog pa/ mgrin pa/ spyi bo/ lce rtsa/ so/ sna/ mchu/ rkan rnams te/ de skad du'ang / yi ge'i gnas ni brgyad yin te/ /khog pa mgrin pa spyi bo
<p>266a</p>
<p>266a.1</p>dang / /de bzhin lce rtse so dang sna/ /mchu dag dang ni rkan rnams so/ /de rnams kyang gang la ma ltos pa'i gnas gzhan du brjod pa'o/ /khog pa'i gnas ni mgrin pa la ma ltos pa'i gnas te gnas gzhan mgrin pa'i gnas las mi brjod pas khog
<p>266a.2</p>par blta'o/ /gnas gzhan rnams kyang gzhan kho nar blta bar bya'o/ /des na de nyid gnas gzhan rnams su dbye bar byed pas so sor bya ba yin no/ /gang yi ge a yig la sogs pa rnams kyi gzugs su 'byung ba de ni sgra zhes gsal bar rtogs par bya'o/ /sgra gang gi mtshan nyid nye
<p>266a.3</p>bar brjod pa de ni spyi'i bdag nyid do/ /ci ste yi ge de rnams ci las skye bar 'gyur zhe na smras pa/ gnas dang byed pa dang rtsol ba rnams las yi ge rnams skye'o zhes pa ste/ gnas ni sngar bshad pa'i khog pa dang mgrin pa la sogs pa'o/ /byed pa ni lce'i rtsa ba la sogs
<p>266a.4</p>pa'o/ /rtsol ba ni 'phrad pa la sogs pa'o/ /gnas dang byed pa dang rtsol ba ni/ gnas dang byed pa dang rtsol ba rnams so/ /de rnams las yi ge a yig la sogs pa rnams skye ba ste mngon par 'byung ba'o/ /de rnams kyi nang nas yi ge rnams
<p>266a.5</p>ci/ gnas ni ci/ rtsol ba ni ci/ rnam par gzhag pa ci zhe na/ smras pa/ de la zhes pa ni nges gzung la bdun pa ste/ re zhig gnas rnam par bshad pa'ang 'di'o zhes bsams pa'o/ /a ku ha rnam par bcad pa rnams kyi mgrin pa'o/ /mgrin pa las byung ba ni mgrin pa'i
<p>266a.6</p>gnas te mgrin pa'i gnas nas brjod pa'o/ /de dag ci zhe na/ a ku ha rnam par bcad pa rnams so/ /a ni a yig go/ /ku ni ka sde'o/ /ha ni ha yig go/ /rnam par bcad pa'i yang a sbyar ba ni brjod pa'i rten no/ /de rnams mgrin pa'i gnas las 'byung bar shes par
<p>266a.7</p>bya'o/ /ita eta ai ta rnams kyi mgrin pa dang rkan no/ /rkan las gyur pa ni rkan can no/ /mgrin pa dang rkan dang zhes pa ni mgrin rkan gyi gnas so/ /ci rnams kyi zhe na ita ni i yin no/ /eta ni e yin no/ /ita ni i yin no/ /ita eta aita de rnams so/ /ta pha rol
<p>266b</p>
<p>266b.1</p>tu byed pa ni brjod bde ba'i don du'o/ /uta ota auta rnams kyi mgrin mchu'o/ /mgrin pa dang mchu ni mgrin mchu'i gnas so/ /uta ni ci zhe na u yig go/ /ota ni i yig go/ /auta ni au yig go/ /uta auta ste de rnams so/ /ta pha rol tu byed pa tsam kyang snga
<p>266b.2</p>ma bzhin no/ /ri Tu ra Sha rnams kyi spyi bo'o/ /r-i ni r-i yin no/ /Tu ni Ta sde'o/ /ra ni re pa'o/ /Sha ni Sha yig gi don no/ /r-i Tu ra Sha rnams kyi gnas ni spyi bo'o/ /'dir sngon med pa bsam par bya ba ni 'di yin te zhes re pha 'di ra yig gi dang po'am 'on te dbus sam
<p>266b.3</p>mthar gnas/ de la gal te re zhig dang por dam 'cha' na/ ag+gir/ r-i ta dr-i Sh+ye zhes pa 'di la r-i yig de/ gang ni dang por zhes pa 'di'i phyir/ asniH ste r-i ta ces pa 'di la/ ra'i ra la zhes pa 'dis dbye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar yang yang na ra
<p>266b.4</p>dbyi bas ring bor thal lo/ /de'i phyir dang bor mi spyor te/ 'on te/ mthar nges par gzung ba de ltar yod na/ ho tri ra than+ta ri zhes pa 'dir/ ra'i ra la dbyi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de yang ma yin no/ /de nas nges par bya ba ni de bzhin du/ nr-i NAM zhes pa 'dir mtshon
<p>266b.5</p>bya ra Sha las na'i Na'o zhes pa 'dir mtshon bya ra Sha las na'i Na'o zhes pa'i sbyor ba 'dis Na nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes so / /bar du mi thob pa kho na yod pa 'di ni ma nges pa'i gnas kyi bya ba'i dbang las kyang rnam par shes so/ /des na ji ltar bya ba rnams bsgrub pa'i skyon
<p>266b.6</p>rnams kyang spang bar bya'o/ /dper na bya rog lta ba bzhin du 'di khas blang bar bya ste/ bya rog lta bar byed pa de ni nang dgang gi logs lta bar byed pa de dang de nyid du 'di'i dbang po 'gro'o/ /de skad du'ang / dang por am+biHr-i ti mthong / /de nas ho tri ra than bzhag /
<p>266b.7</p>bar du rw-i NAM gzhag par bya/ /de phyir bya rog lta bzhin brjod/ /ces so/ /so no l-i tu la sa rnams kyi'o/ /l-i ni l-i yin no/ tu ni ta sde'o/ /la ni la yig go/ /sa ni sa yig go/ /l-i tu la sa rnams so/ /'di rnams kyi gnas ni so yin par rtogs par
<p>267a</p>
<p>267a.1</p>bya'o/ /sna ni rjes su nga ro'i 'o/ /i zhes pa rjes su nga ro ste zla ba phyed pa can no/ /de'i gnas ni sna'o/ /nga nya Na na ma rnams ni rang gi gnas dang rjes su sna ldan no/ /rang gi zhes pa ni mgrin pa rkan/ spyi so/ mchu dag go/ /
<p>267a.2</p>gnas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang dag sna dang rjes su 'brel ba'i mtha' can nam/ rang gi gnas dang rjes su sna ldan pa'o/ /nga yig gi rang gi gnas ni mgrin pa ste/ ka sde yin pa'i phyir ro/ /nya yig gi rang gnas ni rkan te/ tsa sde yin pa'i phyir ro/ /Na
<p>267a.3</p>yig gi rang gi gnas ni spyi bo ste Ta sde yin pa'i phyir ro/ /na yig gi rang gi gnas ni so ste/ ta sde yin pa'i phyir ro/ /ma yig gi rang gi gnas ni mchu dag ste/ pa sde yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad du bshad par 'gyur ba ni/ da yig la sogs pa re re
<p>267a.4</p>'ang / mgrin pa la sogs pa re re'i gnas nye bar mtshon pas na/ gnas zhes pa'o/ /i tsu ya sha rnams kyi rkan no/ /i ta ni i yig go/ /tsu ni tsa sde'o/ /ya ni ya yig go/ /sha ni sha yig go/ /de rnams i tsu ya sha rnams so/ /de rnams kyi gnas ni rkan
<p>267a.5</p>no/ /mchu dag ni u dang pu dang mchu dang nye ba can rnams kyi'o/ /u ni u yig go/ /pu ni pa sde'o/ /mchu dang nye bar can ni pa yig dang pha yig gi steng du bzhag pa'i yi ge glang po che'i bum pa'i rnam pa can no/ /'di ni mchu dang nye ba can te mchu las 'byung bar blta bar bya'o/ /
<p>267a.6</p>so dang mchu ni wa yig gi'o/ /so dang mchu ste wa yig gi gnas su rtogs par bya'o/ /de ltar yi ge'i rim pa ji lta bas gnas kyi spros pa mngon par brjod de/ byed pa nas brtsams nas smras pa/ byed pa ni lce'i rtsa ba can gyi lce'i rtsa ba'o zhes pa la sogs
<p>267a.7</p>pa'o/ /ka yig dang kha yig dag gi steng du bzhag pa'i rdo rje'i rnam pa'i yi ge'o/ /lce'i rtsa ba can de'i byed pa ni lce'i rtsa bas byed do/ /'dis ni 'di'i byed pa dang gnas kyang 'di nyid du rtogs par bya'o/ /lce dbus rnams kyi ni rkan gyi gnas las
<p>267b</p>
<p>267b.1</p>byung ba sngar bshad pa rnams kyi lce'i dbus byed par gzung ngo / /lce'i rtse mo dang nye ba ni/ /spyi bo las byung ba rnams kyi'o/ /spyi bo'i gnas nas byung ba rnams kyi ni/ lce'i rtse mo dang nye ba goms pa ste/ rtse mo dang nye ba ni byed par rtogs par bya'o/ /so las byung ba
<p>267b.2</p>rnams kyi ni lce'i rtse mo'o/ /lce rtse'i mtha' thug pa ni so'i gnas las byung ba rnams kyi byed par blta bar bya'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni rang gi gnas kyi byed pa can no/ /gang lhag ma rnams kyi byed pa ni rang gi gnas kho na byed pa ste rang gi gnas byed pa yin pa 'dis ni byed pa bzhi
<p>267b.3</p>mngon par sgrub pa gzhan ma bshad pa'i gnas las byung ba rnams rang gi gnas kho na las rtogs par bya'o/ /de ltar byed pa mngon par brjod nas rtsol ba nye bar bstan pa'i phyir smras pa/ rtsol ba rnam pa gnyis te zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ ches rab tu 'bad pas na rtsol ba
<p>267b.4</p>ste byed pa rnams kyi nang du gtogs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par las nges par byung ba'i rang bzhin te/ nam du'ang 'di'i rang bzhin mtha' dag par nges par mi nus so/ /des na 'dir yang de bzhin kho nar rnam par bshad pa brtsam par bya zhes pa'o/ /de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ ji ltar zhe na/ nang
<p>267b.5</p>dang phyi rol gyi rab tu byed pa gnyis so/ /nang ni nang du 'jug pa'i byed pa'i nang du son par ro/ /de las bzlog pa ni phyi rol lo/ /de la'i sgra ni 'dir nges gzung la 'jug go/ /nang ni ji srid ma nor ba brjod do zhes pa de srid du'o/ /nang gi rtsol ba 'di la'ang btsums pa dang phye ba dang phrad
<p>267b.6</p>pa dang cung zad phrad pa'i dbye bas phye ba rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/ /btsums pa ni a yig gi'o/ /mgrin pa phye ba ma yin pas brjod pa ni btsums pa ste/ a yig gi yin par bzhag go/ /de las phye ba ni dbyangs rnams dang dro ba rnams kyi'o/ /phye ba zhes pa ni mgrin pa ma bsdams
<p>267b.7</p>pas brjod pa'i yi ge A yig dang e yig dang o yig ste/ dbyangs yig rnams dang sde pa'i gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dang sha Sha sa ha rnams te dro ba rnams so/ /de rnams las phye ba nyid ni eta aita dag gi'o/ /de rnams las kyang lhag par phye ba ni/ e yig dang ai yig dag
<p>268a</p>
<p>268a.1</p>gi'o/ /de dag las ota auta dag gi'o/ /e yig dang i yig de rnams las kyang ches cher phye ba ni/ o yig dang au yig dag go/ /de dag las kyang A yig gi'o/ /o yig dang au yig de dag las kyang lhag par phye ba yin pa
<p>268a.2</p>A yig gi'o/ /phrad pa ni reg pa rnams kyi'o/ /phrad pa ni gnas gang du yi ge de rnams mthon por brjod pa rtsol ba chen pos btsir nas 'phrad pa de rnams te/ ka sde dang / tsa sde dang / Ta sde dang / ta sde dang / pa sde rnams su bshad pa ni phrad pa mngon par brjod
<p>268a.3</p>do/ /cung zad phrad pa ni mthar gnas kyi'o/ /bshad ma thag pa las bzlog pa/ mthar gnas te/ ya ra la wa rnams nang du cung zad phrad pa mngon par brjod do/ /phyi rol ni sde pa rnams kyi dang po dang gnyis pa rnams dang sha dang Sha dang sa dang rnam par bcad pa dang lce rtsa can
<p>268a.4</p>dang mchu dang nye ba'ang phyi rol du byung ba ni phyi'i rtsol ba'o/ /ci rnams kyi zhe na/ sde pa lnga po rnams kyi dang po dang gnyis pa rnams te/ ka kha tsa tsha Ta Tha ta tha pa pha zhes bya ba de rnams dang / gang yang sha yig dang / Sha yig dang sa yig dang rnam par bcad pa dang lce rtsa
<p>268a.5</p>can dang mchu dang nye ba can rnams kyang ste/ khyad par ci zhe na/ mgrin pa phye bas sgra rjes su rtogs pa ni sgra med pa rnams yin la/ phye ba ni mgrin pa'i bu ga ma bsdams pas brjod pa gang dag mgrin pa phye bas sgra rjes su ste/ phyi nas grag pa gang yin pa de rnams ni
<p>268a.6</p>sgra rjes su rtogs pa'o/ /sgra zhes bya ba'i yon tan gang la med pa de rnams sgra med rnams so/ /dang po dang gsum pa rnams dang / lnga pa rnams dang mthar gnas rnams srog chung ba'o/ /gang sde pa rnams kyi dang po dang gsum pa dang lnga pa rnams te/ ka ga nga tsa dza
<p>268a.7</p>Ta Da Na ta da na pa ba ma zhes bya ba rnams so/ /gang yang mthar gnas ya ra la wa 'di rnams thams cad srog chung ba rnams nyid do/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ srog ces bya ba'i rlung 'di rnams la chung zhing phra bas so/ /cig shos rnams srog che ba'o/ /cig shos ni sngar ma
<p>268b</p>
<p>268b.1</p>brjod pa'i sde pa lnga'i gnyis pa rnams dang bzhi pa rnams te/ kha g+ha tsha p+ta Tha d+ha pha b+ha zhes bya ba rnams so/ /sha Sha sa ha 'di rnams kyang brjod ma thag pa las bzlog pa sa nges par gzung ngo / /gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa rjes su nga ro dang bcas pa rnams dang
<p>268b.2</p>mthar gnas dang ha yig rnams so/ /sde pa lnga'i gsum pa rnams dang bzhi pa rnams dang lnga pa rnams te/ ga g+ha nga dza dz+ha nya Da D+ha Na da d+ha na ba b+ha ma zhes bya ba rnams rjes su nga ror bcas pas rjes su nga ro dang bcas pa'i ya yig dang re pha dang la yig dang wa yig dang ha yig
<p>268b.3</p>rnams kyang ste/ mgrin pa btsums pas sgra rjes su rtogs pa 'di dag ni sgra dang ldan pa'o/ /btsums pa ni phye ba ma yin pa la sogs pa sngar bzhin yin la/ sgra'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir sgra ldan no/ /gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dang sha Sha sa rnams dro ba'o/ /gang dag
<p>268b.4</p>sde pa lnga'i gnyis pa dang bzhi pa ste/ gnyis pa dang bzhi pa rnams ni kha g+ha tsha dz+ha Tha zwa tha d+ha pha b+ha rnams su mngon par brjod pa rnams dang sha Sha sa ha rnams kyang ste/ 'di dag thams cad dro ba nyid kyi yon tan dang ldan pas dro ba rnams kyi ming can du 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di ni phyi'i
<p>268b.5</p>rtsol ba'o/ /de ltar bar ma chad du brjod pa de rnams ni phyi'i rtsol bar rig par bya'o/ /'dir yang a yig ni thung ngu dang ring po dang shin tu ring po zhes pa rnam pa gsum du dbye'o/ /'dir zhes pa yi ge'i rab tu byed pa 'di la ste/ a yig ni a'i yi ge'o/ /de yang
<p>268b.6</p>thung ngu dang ring po dang shin tu ring po'i rab tu byed pas gsum mo/ /dbye ba ni/ eta dang ita tu 'gyur ro/ /bar+Na smos pas gnas skabs thams cad du ldan pa nyid de/ a'i rigs 'dzin zhing / de ltar gzhan du'ang ngo / /te te la u dAt+ta dang / a nu dAt+ta dang swa ri tas
<p>268b.7</p>phye ba dang rjes su sna ldan dang bcas pas rjes su sna ldan med pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bco brgyad du 'gyur ro/ /te te ba ste/ thung ngu la sogs pa re re la u dAt+ta dang a nu dAt+ta dang swa ri tas phye bas rnam pa gsum du dbye bar 'gyur ro/ /thung ngu la sogs pa re re po de nyid slar yang rjes su
<p>269a</p>
<p>269a.1</p>sna ldan dang bcas pa dang rjes su sna ldan med pa nyid kyis nyams su phye bas de ltar gsum po rnams so sor rnam pa drug tu 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa drug po ni bco brgyad du 'gyur ro/ /de ltar i'i yi ge dang u'i yi ge dang r-i'i yi ge'ang ngo / /ji ltar
<p>269a.2</p>a yig la thung ngu la sogs pa'i rab tu byed pa phye bas rnam pa bco brgyad du 'gyur ba de ltar e yig la sogs pa'i yi ge'ang dbye bar 'gyur ro/ /lo'i yi ge la ring po yod pa ma yin te/ de nas rnam pa bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /l-i yig thung ngu dang shin tu ring
<p>269a.3</p>por phye bas bcu gnyis kho na yin te/ ring por dbye ba'i rab tu byed pa drug pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge rnams la thung ngu yod pa ma yin te/ de na de rnams kyang rnam pa bcu gnyis rnams su 'gyur ro/ /e yig la sogs pa yi ge bzhi rnams ni mtshams
<p>269a.4</p>sbyor yi ge rnams te/ de la'ang thung ngu drug rnams med pas ring po dang shin tu ring po rgyas par bya bas re re la bcu gnyis kho na'o/ /yi ge gnyis rnams kyang ngo / /kyang gi sgra ni mtshams sbyor yi ge rnams su mngon par 'brel lo/ /de rnams kyang yi ge re re ba nyid du 'gyur
<p>269a.5</p>ro/ /ci a yig dag dang r-i yig dang lo yig rnams kyi ches gzhan pa tshogs pa la e yig tu 'gyur ba de bzhin du e yig dag kyang i yig ste 'di dag kyang u yig dang U yig rnams kyi ches gzhan pa tshogs pa la o yig tu 'gyur ba yod pa de bzhin du o yig kun tu brjod pa
<p>269a.6</p>la'ang au yig go/ /'di dag i yig dang A+e yig dang / U yig dang / u yig rnams kyi cig shos phrad pa la'ang e yig dang o yig dag 'byung ba yod pa ma yin nam zhe na/ yod pa bden te/ de rnams e yig dang o yig smos pas gzung ba'i phyir 'di dag so sor
<p>269a.7</p>brjod do/ /phyi mo gcig pa thung ngu'o/ /thung ngu'i yi ge ni phyi mo gcig can du bstan to/ /phyi mo gnyis pa ring po'o/ /ring po ni phyi mo gnyis pa can du brjod do/ /phyi mo gsum pa d+lu ta'o/ /phyi mo gnyis pa'i rigs pas p+lu ta mngon par brjod par 'gyur ro/ /mthon po rnams kyis u dAt+ta'o/ /gang dag
<p>269b</p>
<p>269b.1</p>nga ro mthon pos mngon par brjod pa'i yi ge de ni u dAt+ta'o/ /dma' ba rnams kyis a nu dAt+ta'o/ /yi ge gang gi nga ro dma' bas brjod par bya ba de ni a nu dAt+ta'o/ /de dag par ma swa ri ta'o/ /u dAt+ta dang / a nu dAt+ta de dag las/ bar ma'am bsdus pa dang
<p>269b.2</p>ro mnyam pa ni swa ri tar 'gyur ba nyid de/ de'i tshe 'dis mngon par brjod pa las mtho ba dang dma' ba'i nga ro ma gtogs pa'i nga ros yi ge gang mngon par brjod par byed pa de ni swa ri tar brjod do/ /rang gi gnas dang rjes su sna ldan dang rjes su sna ldan ma yin pa'o/ /
<p>269b.3</p>rang gi ni bdag nyid kyi gnas dang / sna dang ldan pa'i gnas ni yi ge gang / /rang gi gnas kyi rjes su sna dang ldan pa dang / rjes su sna ldan ma yin pa ni sna'i gnas dang bral ba'o/ /mthar gnas ni rab tu dbye ba gnyis pa'o/ /rab tu dbye ba gnyis kyis
<p>269b.4</p>rtogs pa/ ya ra la wa rnams so/ /ci ltar zhe na/ rjes su sna ldan dang bcas pa dang / rjes su sna ldan ma yin pa rnams kyang ste sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /phrag dog ser snas rig pa yi/ /rjes su legs par 'brang ba dag /yang dag lta ba'i dngos po yi/ /mtshan nyid
<p>269b.5</p>mi ldan dor bar bya/ /gang phyir gzhan gyi don tshol ba'i/ /bla ma'i mkhyen pa las thob pa/ /mkhas pa bdag nyid kyis byas pa'i/ /dge ba blang bya nyid yin no/ /gang 'dir yi ge'i mdo ni 'grel byas pa'i/ /dge ba cung zad bsags pa de dag gis/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen
<p>269b.6</p>por 'phyan gyur pa'i/ /skye bo'i sdug bsngal sbyor ba zhi gyur cig /lung ston pa tsan+d+ra pa'i yi ge'i mdo'i 'grel pa rdzogs so// //'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag snyan grags kyi gdugs dkar po dri ma med pa gcig gis khebs pa dngos grub mchog brnyes pa'i slob dpon
<p>269b.7</p>chen bo tsan+d+ra go mi'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa ste/ sngon bod du ma 'gyur snang bas/ gangs can gyi skye bo kun gyi mig gcig pu thams cad mkhyen pa zha lu lo tsA ba chen po d+har+m+ma pA la b+ha dra'i bka' drin las rnam dpyod kyi skal ba'i cha shas thob pa skyogs ston lo tsA'i ming tsam 'chad pa ngag
<p>270a</p>
<p>270a.1</p>dbang rin chen bkra shis dpal bzang pos 'dzin byed ces bya ba me pho phyi ba'i rgyal can gyi nya la dpal gra thang gi gzims khang du bla ma dam pa nyid kyis bsgyur cig ces bka' stsal pa bzhin dpang lo chen po'i phyag dpe rgya dpe las bsgyur cing ma rtogs
<p>270a.2</p>pa dang log par rtogs pa thams cad rje lo tsA ba chen po'i gsung la gtugs nas dag par byas pa'o/ /slar yang kha ra zhes bya ba lcags mo yos kyi dbo'i zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi rgyal ba gnyis pa la nyang po'i yul gyi ljongs phrag zur du gdong gi dpal kar+m+ma pa'i chos kyi sde
<p>270a.3</p>chen po 'jam dbyangs dgyes pa'i gtsug lag khang gi 'dabs su rgya dpe la gtugs te bsgyur ba po nyid kyis cung zad zhus shing gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa ni sgra rig smra ba A nan+da badzra zhes bya ba'o/ /'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dang lus can dpag tu med pa la phan par gyur
<p>270a.4</p>cig /[]@/ /sdeb spyor rin chen 'byung gnas stag tshang lo tsha bas bsgyur ba bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ts+tshan+da rat+na a ka ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>270a.5</p>nang gi mtshan mo bshes bral gyi/ /nang gi thub pa nyi ma ni/ /snang ba mchog gi bdag nyid can/ /rgyal ba nyi ma la phyag 'tshal/ /mdor bsdus tshigs bcad gsal ba dang / mdo yis dper brjod bgyis pa dang / /ma 'dres rim ldan 'don slad dang / /tshogs mthar
<p>270a.6</p>sdod rnams yon tan yin/ /tshigs bcad rkang bzhi de la yang / /br-it+ta dzA ti zhes rnam gnyis/ /yi ge bgrang ba br-it+ta ste/ /phyi mo bgrang ba dzA ti yin/ /gsal byed rnams ni sum cu bdun/ /'dir ni dbyangs yig nyi shu gnyis/ /'di rnams yi ge lnga bcu dgu/ /dbyangs
<p>270a.7</p>kyi yi ge bgrang bar bya/ /yang ba la yin drang po dbyangs/ /thung ngu'o legs byas nus bshad la/ /lci ba ga yin 'khyog po ni/ /rkang pa'i mtha' rnams phal cher te/ /dbyangs dang bral ba'i gsal byed las/ /snga ma'ang shi na nus nas ci/ /ring po dang ni p+lu ta 'ang / /
<p>270b</p>
<p>270b.1</p>gar bsgyur bud med lha yi lus/ /dbang po me nus rtse mo thob/ /gsum gyi thog ma lci ba b+ha/ /dbus lci dza yin mtha' lci sa/ /thams cad lci ba ma zhes bya/ /thog ma yang ba ya yin te/ /dbus yang ra dang mtha' snga ta/ /thams cad yang ba na te brgyad/ /
<p>270b.2</p>thog ma bar mtha' kun lci ba/ /b+ha dang dza dang sa dang ma/ /thog ma bar mtha' kun yang ba/ /ya dang ra dang ta dang ni/ /bsdu ba'i tshigs bcad do/ /drug pa nas brtsams re re 'phel/ /rkang pas sdeb sbyor rnams rtogs byed/ /dbyangs sgrog rab dga' rjes
<p>270b.3</p>bsngags dang / /br-i ha tI dang 'phreng ldan dang / /de bzhin gsum bsngags zhes bya'o/ /skye 'gro nus ldan legs spyod dang / /bstan 'dzin rnams la so sor ni/ /re re'ang phyi mar shin tu'o/ /byed ldan dag pa'o rab dang kun/ /rnam dang legs dang shin tu dang / /lhag
<p>270b.4</p>pa rnams las phyi mo yang / /de ltar drug brgyad rta rnams so/ /mnyam dang phyed mnyam mi mnyam zhes bya ba/ br-it+ta rnam pa gsum du rab bshad bya/ /de ni dbus phra sogs dang nye bkra sogs/ /kha sgo la sogs rnams dang go rims bzhin/ /'dod pa rnams kyi
<p>270b.5</p>gnas pa sdod/ /'gram pa'i rdul sel mig mdzes ma/ /rna ba'i ut+pal nyams byed dang / /yon tan zung byas gtsug na bzlas/ /zhabs sen zer la rab tu 'dud/ /tshogs chen stug por gyur pa la/ /gang gi rgyal mtshan tog dag gi/ /grags pa 'phro ba 'di nyid
<p>270b.6</p>ni/ /sa skyong nyid du rnam par bshad/ /rkang pa rnams kyi mtha' la'o/ /b+ha sogs uta la de ldan no/ /rkang pa so so rnams la ni/ /lci ba ba yin yang ba ka /gal te ta ya dbus phra ba'o/ /gzhon nu rol pa dza sa ga /1 /lci yang bzhi pa de 'dra mtshungs/ 2 /la ga bzhi
<p>270b.7</p>pa de gzhal dpag /3 /gal te/ b+ha ga gnyis rkang bkra/ 4/gal te ma gzung klog 'phreng / 5 /b+ha las ta dang la dang ni/ /ga rnams yod pa bram ze'i bu/ 1 /gal te ra las na dang ni/ /sa dag yod pa gshol gdong ngo / 2 /na gnyis dang ni ma yod pa/ /
<p>271a</p>
<p>271a.1</p>lag 'gro khye'u'i bu yin no/ 1 /ma dang sa dang dza dang ga /dag pa'i snang bar shes par bya/ 2 /ma dang na dang ya rnams las/ /lci ba nges par 'khar rdar bshad/ 2 /ra dang dza dang ra rnams ni/ /ga rnams rma bya'i 'gros yin no/ /4 /
<p>271a.2</p>gang la b+ha dang ma dang sa/ /gang yod de ni gser ldan no/ 5 /ma dang b+ha dang sa dang gas/ /bskyed ma myos mar shes par bya/ 1 /ta las dza gnyis ga dang ga /zhes pa 'di ni nye ra 'khod 'gyur/ 2 /gal te ta gnyis dza dang ni/ /lci gnyis dbang po'i rdo rje'o/ 2 /dza dang ta
<p>271a.3</p>dang dza dang ni/ /lci gnyis nye dbang rdo rje'o/ /de ma thag tu brjod zin mtshan nyid dag /sna tshogs rtog pas rkang pa rnams su 'gyur/ /de gnyis mnyan 'os ngal bso'i spros ldan gang / /de rnams dran pa'i dbang pos nyer bskyed bshad/ 5 /b+ha gsum las ni
<p>271a.4</p>ga gnyis pa/ /de ni 'dod pa 'jo ba'o/ 6 /ma dang ba dang ra gnyis pa/ /rig byed 'jig rten shA li nI/ 7 /gal te ma dang ba dang sa/ /ra dang ba ni chu rlabs 'phreng / 8 /ma dang ba dang na dag dang / /ba ni bung ba rol pa'o/ 9 /ra las pha rol na dang ni/ /ra la ga
<p>271a.5</p>rnams shing rta dregs/ 10 /ra dang na dang b+ha dang ga /rnams dang lci bar legs 'ongs so/ 11/na dang na dang sa dang ga /ga zhes bya ba zlum por 'gyur/ 12 /na dang na dang ra dang la/ /ga zhes bya ba bzang ldan nyid/ 13 /ra dang dza dang ra dang ni/ /la dang lci ba dkar mor
<p>271a.6</p>brjod/ 14 /dza dang sa dang ta dang ni/ /ga ga rnams ni nyer gnas 'gyur/ 1 /ra dang na dang b+ha dang sas/ /rgyu zhing 'khor ba zlo ba'i lam/ 2 /dza dang ta dang dza dang ra/ /'di ni rigs gnas nyid du 'dod/ 12 /gang la ta gnyis dza dang ra/ /nges par dbang po'i
<p>271a.7</p>rgyud tu 'gyur/ 4 /na gnyis ga dang ba ra ba/ /nor dang rig byed 'dir sbyor ba'o/ 5 /dza su dza su dus zung ba/ /chu 'thor 'gro ba nyid yin no/ 6 /sa yig chu gter byas pa ni/ /de nas 'gro bar byed pa'o/ 7 /na dang b+ha dang b+ha dang ni/ /ra rnams dal myur yin par
<p>271b</p>
<p>271b.1</p>smra/ 8 /ya yig bzhi pa rnams kyis ni/ /lag 'gro ltung ba nyid yin no/ 9 /ra yig bzhi pa de nyid ni/ /me tog phreng can ces grags so/ 10 /sa dang dza dang sa dang sa/ /rnams kyis yi ge nyung ngur grags/ 11 /ma dang ga ba ra dag pa/ /mda' rtas sna tshogs
<p>271b.2</p>lha mo'o/ 12 /ma ba na ya ga ba ste/ /yan lag mtsho yi chu 'dzin phreng / 112 /na na ra ra 'dus pa ni/ /dal gyis 'bab pa nyid yin no/ 14 /na dang dza dang dza dang ra/ /ya mu na ru thub pa smra/ 15 /gal te 'dir ni na dang dza/ /b+ha ya 'phreng ba gsar ba'o/ 1 /mu dang na dang
<p>271b.3</p>dza ra ba/ /gsum dang phyogs kyi rab dga' can/ 2 /dza ba na dza ra zhes bya/ /bzhi dang gza' yis dga' mdzes yin/ 3 /ma ba b+ha ta ya rnams te/ /de nyid ngal bso rma bya myos/ 4 /sa dang dza dang sa dang sa/ /ga ni snyan pa'i dang par bshad/ 5 /gal te sa dang dza
<p>271b.4</p>dang sa/ /dza dang ga rnams 'jam pa'i ngag /2 /ma ga ba dang na gnyis ma/ /lnga dang dgu yis gnod med yin/ 2 /na na ba dang dza dza ba/ /dbyangs rnams gzhan gyis mi thub po/ 12 /na na ba dang na na ba/ /de rnams mtshon cha kha 'bus yin/ 9 /ta b+ha dza dza ga ga dag /
<p>271b.5</p>dpyid kyi thig ler shes par bya/ 5 /sa la wa na gzhan ra dag /lnga dang gza' yis nor 'dzin yin/ 1 /yang ba ma nu'i mthar lci ba/ /'dir ni ri bong can gyi cha/ 2 /'di nyid ro dang dgus ngal bsor/ /gyur pa gzhan ni 'phreng ba'o/ 3 /de bzhin nor dang thub pa yis/ /
<p>271b.6</p>ngal bso yon tan nor bu'i tshogs/ 4 /na na ga pa ra ra bas/ /brgyad dang 'jig rten gyis 'phreng ldan/ 5 /na dza b+ha dza ra rnams ni/ /rnam par spel 'di rgya mtsho can/ 1 /b+ha ra ka na na sa las/ /thub bug khyu mchog glang chen rtsen/ 2 /gal te na dza b+ha dza ra/ /
<p>271b.7</p>lci de de tsho le brgan rtsi/ 1 /ya mu na sa b+hA la ba/ /ro drag ngal gso gtsug phud can/ 2 /dza sa la ba na ra ra/ /nor dang bzang snod yang ldan no/ 3/b+ha ra na ba na na ga /phyogs thub 'od ma'i 'dab lhung ba/ 4 /na su ma ba dza dza ba/ /ro chu dbyangs la ri dwags mo/ /
<p>272a</p>
<p>272a.1</p>ma ba na su ra ra ba/ /tshong dus 'dzin de dal gyis gnon/ 6 /gal te na dza b+ha dza dza/ /yang lci de tshe bum pa can/ 2 /na dza ba na b+hu b+ha ba/ /thub ro chu gter khu byug go/ 1 /ma lci ba na su ra gnyis/ /ba rnams dbang dus 'jig rten gyis/ 
<p>272a.2</p>me tog g.yo ba'i khri shing yin/ 2 /'dir ni na dang na dang ra/ /bzhi sgrigs lcags kyi mda' ru bshad/ 1/ya mu na dang su ra dag /ba rnams drug dus mgyogs 'gro yis/ /sprin rnams sgrog ces bya bar 'gyur/ 2 /gal te ma dang sa dza su/ /ta ta ba rnams nyi ma
<p>272a.3</p>dang / /rta rnams kyis ni stag rnam rtsen/ 1 /gal te ma ra ba na dang / /na ba ta su rnams la ni/ /bdun ta ros phyi zha mdzes yin/ 2 /ra dza ra dza ra dza dang / /lci dang yang ba 'di lta bu/ /zlum po zhes ni bya bar 'dod/ 1 /ma ra ba dang na na ba/ /ra ra ba rnams bdun
<p>272a.4</p>gsum gyi/ /sdod pa phreng 'dzin zhes byar 'gyur/ 1 /gang la b+ha ra na ba dza/ /sa dza sa phyogs nyi mar ni/ /ngal gso 'di ni zab mo'i dbyangs/ 1 /na dza b+ha la ba dza dang / /sa dang dza su'ang 'phrog byed dang / /nyi mar tha dad rta rol pa/ 2 /'gal te ma ma ga ba na/ /
<p>272a.5</p>la ka na na na ba rnams/ /nor dbang phyogs kyis myos ma rtsen/ /b+ha lci ba ba na na ba/ /b+ha zung na yu rnams la mda'/ /dbyangs gnyis ngal gso lus phrar 'gyur/ 1 /b+ha ga ba dang b+ha ga ba/ /na zung la ka na na ba/ /mda' mda' nor dang thub par ni/ /sdong pa
<p>272a.6</p>khrung khrung rkang yin no/ 1 /ma zung gang na zung dang / /la ka su dang dza zung dang / /ba rnams nor lha myos sred dang / /thub pas lag 'gro rnam bsgyings so/ /ma na nu dang na nu gnyis/ /sa ga ba zhes bya rnams la/ /dgu dang ro ro byed par ni/ /ngal bso
<p>272a.7</p>bzlog phyogs 'bab par 'gyur/ 1 /'di ru rgyun chags dang po ni/ /na gnyis de nas ra bdun gyi/ /gtum pa'i char 'bebs su 'gyur ro/ /rkang pa so sor ra 'phel rnams/ /'dir ni chu rgyun rgya maM tsh+laM sprul+laM/ /char sprin rol pa'i 'byung gnas dang / /shin tu
<p>272b</p>
<p>272b.1</p>klu bus dang dung sogs so/ /'dir ni ra yis ji lta bar/ /ya yis rgyun chags rab bsags te/ /na zung dag las ya rnams kyis/ /gtum pa'i char 'bebs sogs ji bzhin/ /mnyam pa'i brit+ta rnams so/ 1 /zung min sa gsum la ga dang / /gal te zung la b+ha gsum
<p>272b.2</p>las/ /ga zung can ni nye bkrar smra/ 2 /b+ha gsum can las ga dag ste/ /slar ni na dza dza ya rnams/ /gal te ldan gyur myur ba'i dbus/ 3 /sa gsum can la lci ba dang / /b+ha gsum can la ga dag ni/ /gal te ldan na shugs ldan ma/ 4 /zung min ta dza ra lci ba/ /zung las ma sa dza lci
<p>272b.3</p>ba/ /gang la ldan de bzang po'i snod/ 5 /mi mnyam pa dza sa lci ba/ /mnyam la b+ha ra na lci ba/ /gal te Da na tog ldan ma/ 6 /zung min te zung dza lci ba/ /zung la dza ta dza ga lci/ /gal te ldan na kun bsgrags so/ 7 /'dir yang dza ta dza ga ga /ta zung dza ga lci de ni/ /bzlog pa'i kun
<p>272b.4</p>bsgrags snga ma can/ 8 /sa gsum can las la dang ga /na b+ha b+ha ra rnams kyang ni/ /gal te de tshe ri dgas 'phyong / 7 /gal te na na ra la ga /gal te na dza dza ra ni/ /de yi tshe na gzhan sgor 'dod/ 10 /zung min na zung ra ya dang / /zung la na dza dza ra ga /me tog rgyas pa'i rtse mo brjod/ 19 /ra
<p>272b.5</p>dza ra dza de bzhin du/ /dza ra dza ra ga rnams las/ /ya ba'i sgra las ma tUs yin/ /bud med mtshungs brjod nas ldan ma/ 12 /mi mnyam bcu dang bcu nor yang / /cig shos bcu dang bcu bcu yang / /tha ma gnyis ka lcir byas pa/ /rol rkang rnam spro gtsug phud can/ 13 /mnyam dang mi mnyam
<p>272b.6</p>rkang pa yis/ /yongs brjod nges gnas nges bral byas/ /'dab mar bkod pa'i nges 'di ni/ /rkang 'khyog 'gros ldan 'theng po dang / /mtshungs 'drar gyur pa 'theng por brjod/ /phyed mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams so/ 1 /rkang pa yig brgyad dang po las/ /sa dang na min mtsho las ni/ /ya ru gyur
<p>272b.7</p>pa kha sgo'o/ 2 /rkang pa zung dag dza yig gis/ /kha sgo phan pa zhes par grags/ 3 /dza yis zung min brjod 'di ni/ /zlog pa dang po can gyi de'o/ 4 /na yig sbyor las kha sgo de/ /gya gyu can du shes par bya/ /zung la bdun pa yang gyur ba/ /de ni thub pas yangs mar 'dod/ 6 /thams cad
<p>273a</p>
<p>273a.1</p>nas de de nyid de'i/ /mtsho las b+ha yis de'i yangs ma/ 2 /ra yis de bzhin de las gzhan/ 2 /na yig gis kyang de bzhin yab/ 7 /ta yig gis kyang de lta nyid/ 10 /ma yig gis kyang de ltar lta/ 11 /de las gzhan pa'i bla bre yin/ /rkang pa kun la thog ma las/ /
<p>273a.2</p>sa dang na min rkang zung gi/ /mtsho las dza dang zung min la/ /phal cher ji ltar mdzes sbyor lta/ /kha sgo'i bye brag rnams so/ 1 /rkang pa dang po yig brgyad yin/ /'di las phyi mar rim bzhin du/ /bzhi dang mngon 'phel de dang de/ /sna tshogs rnam bkod
<p>273a.3</p>yang dag mdzes/ /rkang pa rkang par rol sgeg ldan/ /rkang bzhi 'phel du mkhas rnams smra/ 2 /'dir ni rkang bzhi 'phel de la/ /kun yang rkang mthar ga dang ga /rol sgeg bcas phan ngal gso'i 'gros/ /'jig rten dga' bskyed AM ldan pa'i/ /pI Tar gyur
<p>273a.4</p>de kun nas bcer/ 3 /'dir ni yang dag lhung ba yi/ /rkang pa rnams lam dang po ni/ /nye las pha rol gnas byas kyang / /de nas dbus su gnas gyur la/ /cig shos gsum rnams g.yo med par/ /des gnas me tog kha ma bye/ 4 /yang dag shin tu 'dir
<p>273a.5</p>lhung ba'i/ /rkang pa dang por grags pa de/ /nye ba'i rkang pa zung 'das la/ /cig shos rkang pa gsum rnams ni/ /g.yo med nges gnas yud tsam rol/ 5 /'dir ni rkang pa dang po yis/ /cig shos g.yo med gsum 'das par/ /lhung 'gyur rnam mang rol sgeg sdod/ /mngon
<p>273a.6</p>dga' bskyed 'di bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /rkang bzhi 'phel gyi bye brag rnams so/ 1 /snga ma sa dza sa dang la/ /na sa dza lci de ma thag /de nas b+ha na dza la ga /de nas sa dza sa dang dza/ /lci 'gyur 'di ni steng 'gro nyid/ 2 /gsum ni steng 'gro de 'drar 'gyur/ /gsum pa gzhan du shes bya ste/ /
<p>273a.7</p>ra na b+ha dang lci bsgrigs pa/ /de 'dra dri zhim lan du brjod/ 12 /gsum par na zung sa dag 'gyur/ /rkang pa zhes bya gzhan gsum la/ /rab spros tshig bkod rol sgeg ldan/ /rol par snyan ngag mkhan rnams bzhed/ /steng 'gro'i bye phrag rnams so/ 1 /dang po ma sa dza b+ha lci/ /de nas
<p>273b</p>
<p>273b.1</p>sa na dza ra ga /pha rol na gnyis dang ni sa/ /de nas na gsum dza ya 'di/ /nye bar gnas pa'i ngal 'gror brjod/ 2 /rkang pa gsum par na zung dang / /sa dang na zung sa yin la/ /gzhan kun dal 'gro dang 'dra bar/ /rkang par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi/ /bsgrub pa so sor
<p>273b.2</p>nges de ni/ /snyan dngags mkhan gyis 'phel ldan brjod/ /gang tshe gsum par ta dza ra/ /'di yi dang po ngal gso te/ /gzhan gsum dal 'gro dag dang tshogs/ /mtshungs gyur dag pa snang ldan gyis/ /khyad par rab mchog ldan du brjod/ /mi mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams so/ /
<p>273b.3</p>br-it+ta'i rnam par brtag pa bshad zin te/ /phyi nas dzA ti mngon brjod bya/ /yang ba phyi mo gcig yin te/ /lci gnyis gsal byed dag gis min/ /b+ha dza sa dang lci ba zung / /yang ba bzhi tshogs de lnga po/ /phyi mo bzhi pa'o tsa yin la/ /yang ba bzhi po kha yang yin/ /phyi mo gcig
<p>273b.4</p>gnyis ka dang nga / /'dab ma 'dab mar tshogs brgyad sa/ /mi mnyam rnams la dza spangs shing / /phyi mo phyed la drug pa ka /gnyis ka'i brgyad pa nga yin la/ /lhag ma tsa rnams 'phags mar 'gyur/ 31 /phyed spang drug pa dza'am kha/ /kha la sngon du yang ba'i sdod/ /pha rol kha la drug pa'i
<p>273b.5</p>mthar/ /'dab ma phyi mar bzhi pa 'ang / /zung min rkang pa tsa gsum gyis/ /rdzogs pa de tshe 'phrod par 'gyur/ 2 /zung min gcig kyang rdzogs min pa/ /de rnams kyi tshe yangs ma yin/ 3 /gal te gnyis pa bzhi pa'i tshogs/ /lci gnyis dbus bzhugs dza dag bshad/ /
<p>273b.6</p>phyed pa gnyis la gyur de tshe/ /kun nas g.yo bar gyur pa yin/ 1 /gal te snga phyed 'ba' zhig nyid/ /g.yo ba yis ni mtshan nyid gyur/ /slar yang phyi phyed la gyur min/ /de tshe de sgo g.yo bar 'gyur/ 5 /gang la bstan pa'i g.yo mtshan nyid/ /snga ma phyed la spangs nas kyang / /
<p>273b.7</p>phyi mar gcig pur bstan nas bzhugs/ /de ni lus bstan g.yo ba'o/ 1 /gang du 'dab ma gnyis ka yang / /drug tshogs dza 'am kha yig gyur/ /phyed snga bzhin dang lhag ma yang / /so sor nges gyur de dbyangs 'gyur/ 1 /gang gi 'dab ma gnyis ka'i yang / /drug pa'i
<p>274a</p>
<p>274a.1</p>tshogs ni ka nyid gyur/ /phyed phyi bzhin dang lhag nges pa/ /de ni nye ba'i dbyangs su smra/ 2 /gang du snga phyed drug gyur ka /phyi phyed la ni dza 'am kha/ /lhag nges 'dab ma log pa las/ /gyur pa de ni mchog dbyangs yin/ 3 /'dab ma 'dab mar
<p>274a.2</p>brgyad rnams tsa/ /drug pa'i tshogs ni dza 'am kha/ /phyed snga bzhin dang lhag so sor/ /des de 'phags pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur/ /'phags ma'i dzA ti rnams so/ /zung min dang po da gsum pa/ /zung la da bzhi phyi ma la/ /ra la ga ste yang ba drug /bar ma chad du ma
<p>274a.3</p>yin pa/ /de ni ro langs can du brjod/ 12 /dang po ro langs can lta bu/ /phyi ma ra ya nye sdeb sbyor/ /dang po ro langs can mtshungs 'dir/ /b+ha ga ga mtha' kun nas srab/ /zung thog da las phyis dza dang / /lhag ma sngon 'dra rab 'phel yin/ /zung min dang
<p>274a.4</p>po dza da dag /lhag ma sngon 'dra phyi 'phel yin/ /zung min cha ni phyi 'phel gyi/ /zung cha rab 'phel kun 'phel lo/ /kun 'phel zung ni gzhan mtha' can/ /zung min rkang pas mdzes rgod ma/ /ro langs can gyi dzA ti rnams so/ /rkang pa rkang par chu gter tsa/ /lci med
<p>274a.5</p>mi g.yo brtan pa'o/ /'dab las yang zhing mtha' lcig /phyi mo mnyam pa nyid yin no/ /tsa gnyis las b+ha nyer bkra yin/ /tsa las kha'am dza nyid ni/ /khyad par tshigs bcad nyid yin no/ /phyed las kha 'am dza nyid ni/ /nags khrod gnas pa nyid yin no/ /gal
<p>274a.6</p>te tsa zhes bya ba las/ /sa gnyis pa de bkra ba'o/ /bshad ma thag pa'i mtshan nyid rten/ /phyi mo mnyam sogs rkang pa dkrugs/ /br-it+ta'i tshad rnams rtogs med pa/ /rkang dkrugs su ni thub pas brjod/ /gang gi phyed la brgyad brgyad pa/ /phyi ma gzhan kun yang ba
<p>274a.7</p>ni/ /chu gter nor bsgyur rkang pa spro/ /de ni lus med rtsen du brjod/ /'dab rer bcu bcu bcu yang ba/ /bkod mthar lci byas gsal mdzes ma/ /dza med rang gi thog min par/ /b+ha bral tsa da ka da ka /tsa gsum dza ga zhes dum bu/ /phyi mo mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams so/ /
<p>274b</p>
<p>274b.1</p>dzA ti rnams bshad zin to// //br-it+ta'i dang por thams cad lci/ /lci gtso'i 'og yang phyi rnams 'dra/ /snga mar lci 'di prastA ra/ /ji srid thams cad yang de srid/ /sdeb sbyor so sor nyis 'gyur gyi/ /phreng ring steng lci 'og yang ba/ /nyis 'gyur lci yang tshogs
<p>274b.2</p>rnams kyis/ /re rer rim spel prastA ra/ /'di 'dra 'di lta ci zhes pas/ /de bkod 'bras las 'da' ma bya/ /gcig bcas mi mnyam 'dab ma lci/ /'dir mnyam yang 'bras naSh+Ta'o/ /steng du gcig sogs rim pas ni/ /nyis 'gyur bris te yang ba'i steng / /
<p>274b.3</p>bsdoms pas gcig dang bcas 'di lta/ /nyid yin ces pa ud diSh+Ta/ /gzugs bkod yi ge'i grangs kyis bslangs/ /mnyam pa steng du bcug pa yis/ /langs pa rim pas thung du ste/ /br-it+ta yang med gcig yang sogs/ /dang por gzugs ni ma byas
<p>274b.4</p>kyang / /steng bzhugs gang bri de nas 'og /gnas pa'i rang rang 'og mnyam bsre/ /br-it+ta yang med gcig yang sogs/ /br-it+ta rnams kyi grangs kyi gzugs/ /zung gi yi ge'i grangs su bsgyur/ /ud diSh+Ta'i am ka'i mtha'/ /gnyis 'gyur yang
<p>274b.5</p>ba'i bya ba bsdu/ /grangs nyid yi ges bsgyur de nas/ /de phyed de nas gnyi ga'ang sdom/ /dang por yi ge dbus lci yang / /de nas phyi ma rnams yin no/ /yi ge br-it+ta gnyis kyis bsgyur/ /gcig dman a d+h+wa 'phreng dang 'og /lci yang rnams kyi sa dang ni/ /
<p>274b.6</p>de la bar yang mtshungs pa'o/ /mnyam pa'i br-it+ta rnams kyi brastA ra/ /mtha' dag la rtogs byed drug po rnams bshad zin to// //br-i t+ta'am dzA ti re re la/ /lci yang yi ge phyi mo rnams/ /grangs ni shes pa brjod bya ste/ /dper brjod tshigs bcad 'di gnyis so/ /
<p>274b.7</p>gang zhig mchog dang gang zhig dam pa'i don/ /ma lus don dam las 'bras rtogs gyur cing / /skye bo gang yang der ni bskyed mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas chos tshogs de rnams rgyal gyur cig /rgyal chos nang las rgyal ba rgyal gyur cig /de yi lhan cig spyod ma shes rab
<p>275a</p>
<p>275a.1</p>kyang / /gnyis las lhag mos sa bon las byung ba/ /lus can 'phags pa'i tshogs kyang rgyal gyur cig /yang ba rnams kyi yi ge dor/ /phyi mo'i yang ba dor mnga' ma/ /yi ge dor ba'i phyi mo yang / /de rnams ji sted 'dir lci ba/ /
<p>275a.2</p>lci ba'i grangs so/ /lci ba gnyis 'gyur gyi phyi mo/ /yi ge gnyis 'gyur phyi mos spangs/ /lci ba bral ba'i yi ge rnams/ /ji snyed de rnams 'dir yang ba/ /yang ba'i grangs so/ /ci yang bsdoms pa ji snyed de/ /phyi mo lci bral ji snyed do/ /ji snyed phyi mo yang
<p>275a.3</p>bsdoms 'dab/ /de snyed 'dir ni yi ge rnams/ /yi ge'i grangs so/ /lci ba nyis 'gyur yang ba bsre/ /yi ge nyis 'gyur yang rnams dor/ /lci ba bsres pa'i yi ge rnams/ /ji snyed de rnams 'dir phyi mo/ /phyi mo'i grangs so/ /rgyal ba'i rig pa 'di la bdag dad
<p>275a.4</p>pa'i/ /bsod nams gang zhig bdag la rab skyes pa/ /de yis 'gro rnams dam pa'i lam dang ni/ /rig pa mchog la rab tu dad gyur cig /rtsod pa'i dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i sdeb sbyor rin chen
<p>275a.5</p>'byung gnas zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //'di rang 'grel dang bcas pa la chos ldan ras pa dang / yar lung pa grags pa rgyal mtshan dang / lo chen byad rtse ba rnams kyis sum rim du bsgyur ba'i mthar/ /lo tsA ba nam mkha' bzang
<p>275a.6</p>pos dag par bsgyur ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi dper brjod ston pa rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa/ sdeb sbyor so so'i rkang pa'i yig grangs su byas 'dug pas/ bod skad la shin tu mi bde ba cig byung zhing / bod skad la la sdeb sbyor zhig pas
<p>275a.7</p>lci yang sogs kyi rim pa mi dgos pa bzhin du/ yig grangs kyang mi dgos/ mdo'i dper brjod ston pa rgya skad kyi dbang du byas pa yin pas/ bod la go bde zhing gzung sla bar/ stag tshang pa shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
<p>275b</p>
<p>275b.1</p>skyes rabs kyi TI ka bzhugs so/ /@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ dza ta ka ma la s+ya pany+tsi ka/ bod skad du/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje'i stobs kyis thabs kyi
<p>275b.2</p>spyod pa rgya che dang / /shes rab kyis ni de nyid don gzigs chags bral ba/ /mtha' gnyis mi gnas yon tan rgya mtsho dang ldan pa'i/ /'gro ba kun skyob rgyal dang de sras rnams la 'dud/ /gang zhig 'gro ba mtha' dag yongs su skyob pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan zhing / shes
<p>275b.3</p>rab kyis 'gro ba'i bya ba la rab tu ma rmongs pa/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs mtshungs pa med pas sems can gyi don spyod pa la rab tu mi ngal ba/ bdag gi bde ba la mi chags shing bag yod pa spyir la rab tu gnas pa/ yon tan rin po che'i gter sdud par byed pa'i byang chub sems
<p>275b.4</p>dpa' de tshogs gnyis kyi bdag nyid/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de nyid bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhir gyur pas gzhan sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ni rgyal ba'i sras kyi spyod pa yin
<p>275b.5</p>la/ khyad par du de bzhin gshegs pa/ slob dpon 'di'i bzhed pas sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa gsum ni bsod nams kyi tshogs la/ bsam gtan dang shes rab gnyis ni ye shes kyi tshogs yin la brtson 'grus gnyi gar gtogs pa'o/ /shAkya thub pas kyang sngon de lta bu'i spyod pa rnam pa du ma mdzad do/ /de'i phyogs shig
<p>275b.6</p>tsam slob dpon dpa' bos sbyar ba yin la/ /de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po gang dag gi bdag nyid yin pa dang / slob dpon 'phags pa thogs med kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sar gsungs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i khyad par gang dang gang yin pa
<p>275b.7</p>dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i khyad par la sogs par gyur pa'i don phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya'o/ /de la g.yung drung shes rab grags/ kha cig na re gzhung 'di ni slob dpon gyis yongs su ma rdzogs par mngon te/ lhag lus par/ de ltar bstan mchod brjod dang dgos 'brel la sogs pa/ 
<p>276a</p>
<p>276a.1</p>bcos rtsom pa dang 'brel ba'i yan lag yod kyang mjug tu dge ba byang chub tu bsngo ba la sogs pa/ bstan bcos yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba ma byas pa'i phyir dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang po gsum la bcu bcu yod kyang / brtson 'grus kyi bcu tshan yang ma tshad la bsam
<p>276a.2</p>gtan dang shes rab kyi dbang du byas pa'i gzhung ma snang ba'i phyir dang / dang po gsum la/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pas mjug bsdus pa la mtha'i bzhi tshan la sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te dpyad dgos so/ /de la bcu tshan dang pos ni sbyin pa bstan to/ /la bzhi tsam las/ bcu tshan gnyis
<p>276a.3</p>pas tshul khrims bstan to/ /bcu tshan gsum pas ni bzod pa bstan to/ /de la bcu tshan dang po las dang pos ni lus ril gyis sbyin pa bstan te/ /brtson 'grus/ gnyis pas ni yan lag gi mchog sbyin zhing mthong ba'i chos nyid la 'bras bu rgya 'grel las rgyal bu zla ba'i skyes rabs brtson 'grus so lcags kyi khyim dang ma he gnyis bsam
<p>276a.4</p>gtan no bya shing rta mo shes rab tu gsung ba 'thad par snang ngo / /chen po thob pa bstan to/ /gsum pas ni longs spyod dman pa sbyin pa yang rnam par sbyin pa dang rgyu mthun pa rgya cher bstan to/ /mig/ /slar yang spyan thob pa'i/ bzhi pas sbyin pa la bdud kyis mi phrogs par bstan to/ /lnga pas ni
<p>276a.5</p>yo byad nyung bas sbyin pa las mi ldog par bstan to/ /drug pas ni rten dman yang sbyin pa las mi zan changs/ ldog pa 'byor ba chen po/ /bstan to/ /bdun pa las longs spyod yongs su mi 'dzin yang gtong ba mi zad par bstan to/ /brgyad pas ni sbyin pa la brten
<p>276a.6</p>nas gtan du thar pa thob par bstan to/ /dgu pas ni longs ri bong dud 'gro'i/ /spyod mchog la ma chags par bstan to/ /bcu pas ni 'tsho ba spong zhing gzhan mang po dag gi sdig pa spong ba thabs la mkhas pa'i khyad par bstan to/ /de dag ni phyogs re re'i dbang du byas pa ste/ 
<p>276a.7</p>rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du'ang dpyad du yod do/ /gzhan yang zang zing gi sbyin pa ni gnyis te/ lus sbyin pa dang longs spyod sbyin pa'o/ /dang po ni le'u bzhis bstan te/ dang po dang gnyis pa dang / drug pa dang / brgyad pa'o/ /lhag ma drug ni longs spyod sbyin pa'o/ /zhing gi khyad
<p>276b</p>
<p>276b.1</p>par gang la sbyin pa'i dbang du byas na/ bzhi pa dang bcu pas ni yon tan gyi zhing la sbyin pa'o/ /lhag ma ni sdug bsngal ba'i zhing la sbyin pa'o/ /bcu po thams cad la yang legs par bshad pa'i khyad par ni chos kyi sbyin pa yin la/ dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / drug pa dang / 
<p>276b.2</p>brgyad pa dang / lhag ma drug ni longs spyod sbyin pa'o/ /zhing gi khyad par gang la sbyin pa'i dbang du byas na/ bzhi pa dang / bcu pas ni yon tan gyi zhing la sbyin pa'o/ /dgu pa dang / bcu pas ni gzhan sdug bsngal ba las skyob pa mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa yang yin no/ /gtsor sbyin pa yin
<p>276b.3</p>gyi/ ni lus sbyin pa dge ba/ /gzhan lnga dang yang ldan te/ 'di ltar thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims yin la/ ci rigs par gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa la sogs pa sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyang yod do/ /sdom pa'i tshul khrims ni don gyi
<p>276b.4</p>rten nyid du rnam par pha rol tu phyin pa/ gnas pa ste/ rab tu byung ba'i rten la ni rab tu byung ba'i dge ba/ sdom pa yod la/ gzhan thams cad la dge bsnyen sdom pas bsdus pa'o/ /thams cad la sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa yod la/ dang po dang gsum pa dang / bcu pa sa snga ma gnyis gyi/ 
<p>276b.5</p>ma gtogs pa lhag ma bdun la ni gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa yod do/ /thams cad la yang sems can gyi don byed pa'i brtson 'grus yod la/ de'i rgyur dgos pas dge ba bsgrub pa dang go cha'i brtson 'grus dag kyang yod do/ /theg pa dman par mi g.yeng bas bsam gtan
<p>276b.6</p>gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin la/ de ni byang chub chen por smon pas na phal cher gzhung na snang ngo / /shes rab las kyang kun rdzob la dmigs pa dang / sems can gyi don bya ba la dmigs pa ni shes rab ste rgyu'i sgo nas don dam pa la dmigs pa'i shes rab ste rgyu'i sgo nas don dam pa la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyang yod do/ /'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin
<p>276b.7</p>pa'i phan tshun rnam par nges pa'o/ /gzhan yang bdun pa ni chos smon lam/ kyi sbyin pa gtso che ba yin te/ brgya byin legs par bshad pas tshim par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /bcu pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa gtso che ba yin te/ dud 'gro rnams gsod pa las bskyabs shing mi rnams rgyu bzlog pas/ sdig pa/ 
<p>277a</p>
<p>277a.1</p>ngan 'gro las bskyab pa'i phyir ro/ /lhag ma ni zang zing gi sbyin pa gtso che zhes bya bar yang rung ngo / /bcu tshan 'di la grangs nges pa dang go rims nges par mi bsam mo/ /tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas pa'i bcu tshan ni/ /don gnyis kyi dbang du byas te/ lus ngag gi
<p>277a.2</p>las yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa'o/ /dang po ni bdun no/ /gnyis pa ni lhag ma gsum mo/ /dang po la yang gnyis te/ /rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba spang ba dang / bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba spang bas te/ dang po drug dang / gnyis pa bdun pa'o/ /dang po la gnyis te/ 
<p>277a.3</p>lus kyi las yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa bden pa'i tshig brjod pa ste/ gsum dang go rims bzhin no/ /lus kyi las yongs su dag pa la gsum ste/ srog gcod pa spong bas rab tu phye ba dang po dang / ma byin par len pa spong bas rab tu phye ba gnyis pa dang / 
<p>277a.4</p>log pa'i g.yem pa spong bas rab tu phye ba gsum pa'o/ /tha ma gsum yid kyi las yongs su dag pas/ /gsum/ rab tu phye ba ji ltar gzhag ce na/ go rims bzhin sdig pa'i grogs pos bzlog kyang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa la sogs pas yang mi 'phrogs pa dang / smon nas
<p>277a.5</p>tshangs par spyod pa spangs pa dang / rab tu byung ba'i bar chad kyis mi brdzi bas ma chags pa la sogs pa shas che ba'i phyir ro/ /dang po bdun pos ni phongs pa'i dus na yang brtan par ston te/ phongs kyang rang nyid sdig pa la mi 'jug pa ni dang po gsum gyis ston la/ rang gzhan gnyi
<p>277a.6</p>ga phongs pa las skyob pa ni bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang drug pas ston to/ /gzhan tshul khrims la dgod pa bdun pas ston to/ /dang po drug gis ni lus kyi rkyen gyis mi 'phrogs pa ston la/ tha ma gsum gyis ni sdig pa'i grogs pos mi 'phrogs par ston to/ /de lta bu'i rnam par gzhag
<p>277a.7</p>pa ni mang du dpyad du yod do/ /gzhan yang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes pa spong ba thams cad kyang sdom pa'i tshul khrims so/ /dge ba bsgrub pa'i bya ba yin pas thams cad kyang dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims so/ /bdun pa ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pas gtsor sems can gyi don bya ba'i
<p>277b</p>
<p>277b.1</p>tshul khrims so/ /dang po gsum yang gzhan la gnod pa spong bas sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims yin no/ /gzhan gsum ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pas rtogs par sla'o/ /tha ma gsum dag kyang rgyur gyur pas sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims zhes byar rung ngo / /phan
<p>277b.2</p>tshun rnam par nges pa'i dbang du byas na tshul khrims thams cad kyang chos kyi sbyin pa'i grogs su 'gro'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang / bye brag tu legs pas bshad pa thams cad ni chos kyi sbyin pa'o/ /dang po drug ni sdug bsngal gyis mi 'khrugs pas sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa'o/ /
<p>277b.3</p>tha ma bzhi ni gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa ste/ sems can gyi don legs par bsgrub pa la mi khro ba'i sgo nas so/ /thams cad kyang dge ba bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus te/ bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang drug pa dang bdun pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyang yod do/ /
<p>277b.4</p>go cha'i brtson 'grus ni de dag gi sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /bsam gtan dang shes rab ni snga ma bzhin no/ /bzod pa'i dbang du byas pa'i bcu tshan ni gtsor bzod pa gnyis kyi dbang du byas pa ste/ sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang / gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod
<p>277b.5</p>pa'o/ /chos la nges par rtogs pa'i bzod/ theg pa dman par sems mi g.yeng ba/ kun rdzob dang sems can gyi don shes pa'i shes rab/ pa yang de dag gi rgyu nyid du don gyis gnas so/ /de la gsum pa dang dgu pa ni sems can gyi log par bsgrub pa 'ba' zhig bzod pas gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam
<p>277b.6</p>pa'i bzod pa'o/ /bcu pa ni sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa ste/ gzhan gyi gnod pa byas pa ni med kyi gzhan la phan/ /gnyis po/ /'dogs pa'i sdug bsngal nyid bzod pa'i phyir ro/ /lhag ma bdun ni bzod pa gnyis kas bsdus te/ sems can gyi log par bsgrub pa dang des
<p>277b.7</p>byas pa'i sdug bsngal gnyis ka bzod pa'i phyir ro/ /dang po ni nang gi khro ba nye bar zhi bas phyi rol gyi gnod pa bzlog pa'i phan yon dang ldan pa ston to/ /gnyis pa ni rten dman pa la yang yon tan dang bzod pa yod par ston to/ /gsum pa dang bdun pa ni byas pa gzo bas gzhan yal bar mi
<p>278a</p>
<p>278a.1</p>'dor ba ston to/ /gzhan gyis brnyas kyang yal bar mi 'dor ba dang / phongs kyang yal bar mi 'dor ba'o/ /yang na tshe gzhan gyi don dang tshe 'di'i don yal bar mi 'dor ba ston pa'o/ /bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang drug pa ni gnod byed nyam nyes par gyur pa yal bar
<p>278a.2</p>mi 'dor ba ston to/ /brgyad pas ni log par bsgrub pa la tshe 'di'i don bya bar ma nus kyang / bdag gi bzod pa'i 'bras bu de la thob par smon pa ston to/ /dgu pas ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyu la gnas pa shin tu brtse ba'i gnas yin pa dang / gtso bo dge ba la bkod pas gzhan du ma'i don du
<p>278a.3</p>gyur pas thabs la mkhas pa'i khyad par ston to/ /bcu pas ni ngan 'gro'i rten la gzhan du ma'i sdug bsngal skyob pas rten dman pas bzod pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mi 'dor ba ston to/ /de lta bu'i dgos pa rnam pa du ma dpyad du yod do/ /bzod pa de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan lnga dang ldan te/ 
<p>278a.4</p>legs par bshad pa thams cad chos kyi sbyin pa yin la bye brag tu dgu pa la sogs pa chos kyi sbyin pa shin tu yang gtso che'o/ /bcu pa ni zang zing gi sbyin pa'o/ /bcu po thams cad ni dge ba chos sdud la ci rigs par sems can gyi don byed pa dang sdom pa'i tshul khrims ni snga ma gnyis kyi rten du don gyis byed pas/ tshul khrims su
<p>278a.5</p>gyur pa'i don ni snga ma bzhin no/ /bcu po thams cad ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i brtson 'grus yin la/ de'i rgyur dge ba sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang go cha'i brtson 'grus kyang yod pa'o/ /kun rdzob dang sems can gyi don byed pa shes pa'i shes rab/ /brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi don yang snga ma bzhin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi dbang du
<p>278a.6</p>byas pa'i bzhi tshan ni/ /sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus dang / rang nyid kyis dge ba bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus te/ dang po dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa ni dang po yin la/ gnyis pa theg dman par sems ma g.yeng ba'i/ ni gnyis pa yin no/ /dang po yang gnyis te/ tshe 'di
<p>278a.7</p>dang gzhan la phan pa bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang / tshe 'di'i don bsgrub pa ste/ dang po ni dang po yin no/ /tshe 'di'i don bsgrub pa la gnyis te/ mi gnod pa bsgrub ba dang phan pa bsgrub pa ste/ gsum pa dang bzhi pa ni rim pa bzhin no/ /gzhan yang dang po de nyid dang gzhan du ma la
<p>278b</p>
<p>278b.1</p>phan 'dogs pa yin la/ gsum pa dang bzhi pa de nyid la phan pa tsam bsgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin du sdug bsngal bzlog pa dang de'i rgyu bzlog pa la sogs pa rnam pa mang du dpyad du yod do/ /brtson 'grus de yang gzhan la legs par bshad pas sbyin pa yin la/ thams cad kyang sems can
<p>278b.2</p>don byed kyi tshul khrims yin la/ bden par smra ba dang khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba dang 'tsho ba spong ba dag ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyang yin no/ /dang po gnod pa la ji mi snyam pa yin la/ gnyis pa ni sdug bsngal dang du len pa ste/ mngon par 'byung bas 'dod pa'i bde ba gtong
<p>278b.3</p>zhing dka' thub kyi gnod pa bzod pa'i phyir ro/ /gsum pa dang bzhi pa ni gtsor gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'o/ /bsam gtan dang shes rab ni snga ma bzhin no/ /gzhan yang sbyin pa la sogs pa de nyid gzhan du rjes su 'dzin pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i grangs su 'gro ste/ sbyin pa ni
<p>278b.4</p>zang zing gi sbyin pa nyid gzung gi chos kyi sbyin pa ni snyan par smra ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su kun rdzob dang don dam sems can gyi don byed pa shes pa'i shes rab/ theg pa dman par sems mi g.yeng ba'i/ 'gro'o/ /mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa'ang don spyod pa'am don mthun pa zhes bya bar brjod do/ /gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug
<p>278b.5</p>la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snyan par smra ba'o/ /brtson 'grus ni don spyod pa'o/ /bsam gtan dang shes rab ni don mthun pa'o/ /gzhan la chos ston pa'i khyad par snyan par smra ba de dag gis chos kyi don ni bsdus na 'di
<p>278b.6</p>dag yin te/ dang por ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa dang bdag la chags pa spang ba'o/ /gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pas ni sbyin pa'i bsngags pa dang ser sna'i nyes pa'o/ /drug pas ni bsod nams la 'bad pa'o/ /bdun par ni theg pa chen po'i lam la gnas pa
<p>278b.7</p>dang chog shes pa dang grogs po ngan pa spangs pa dang / dam pa dang mi mthun pa'i rkyen dang 'bral bar brtag pa'o/ /brgyad par ni theg pa chen por sems bskyed pa dang / sdig pa lnga spang ba dang / sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'o/ /dgu par sbyin pa la 'bad par bya ba'o/ /
<p>279a</p>
<p>279a.1</p>bcu par sdig pa spang pa'o/ /bcu gcig par 'tshe ba bzlog pa'o/ /bcu gnyis par ngo tsha shes pa la gnas par bya ba'o/ /bcu gsum pa yang de bzhin no/ /bcu bzhi pa dang bco lnga pa dang bcu drug par bden pa'i byin rlabs brjod pa'o/ /
<p>279a.2</p>bcu bdun par chang gi nyes pa'o/ /bco brgyad par ni khyim gyi gnod pa dang 'dod pa'i nyes pa'o/ /bcu dgu par 'dod pa'i nyes pa'o/ /nyi shu par ni gzhan gyis yon tan dang ldan par re ba bsgrub pa'o/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig par ni khro ba'i nyes pa'o/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis par ni yon tan la
<p>279a.3</p>'bad pa'o/ /nyi shu rtsa gsum par lta ba ngan pa tshar bcad pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po spong ba dang / bsod nams la 'bad pa dang / chos kyis rgyal srid bskyang ba'o/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi par sdig pa spang ba'o/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga par ri dgas la gnod pa spang ba dang / gzhan la gnod pa
<p>279a.4</p>spang ba dang / bsod nams la 'bad par bya'o/ /nyi shu rtsa drug par sdig pa spang ba dang / snying rje bskyed pa dang chos kyis srid bskyang ba'o/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun par byas pa drin du gzo ba dang chos kyis rgyal srid bskyang ba'o/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad par bsod nams la 'bad pa dang bag yod par bsgrub pa
<p>279a.5</p>dang bzod pa la gnas par bya ba'o/ /nyi shu rtsa dgu par ni yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed pa'i thabs dang log par lta ba'i nyes dmigs dmyal ba'i gnod pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i lam mo/ /sum cu par snying rjes gzhan dbugs dbyung ba dang smon lam chen po gdab pa'o/ /sum cu rtsa gcig
<p>279a.6</p>par thos pa'i bsngags pa dang legs par bshad pa'i khyad par bzhi dang gzhan lam bzang po la sbyar ba'o/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis par 'khor ba'i nyes pa dang 'chi ba bsgom pa'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang rtsa bzhi par bzod pa'i phan yon no/ /de ltar sbyin pas 'dun par byas nas snyan par smra bas gdams
<p>279a.7</p>par byas shing don spyod pas gdams ngag gi don bsgrub pa la btsud la/ don mthun pas pha rol po'i don bsgrub pa la brtan par 'gyur bas gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa'i thabs rnams ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi kho na'o/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po de nyid ci rigs par ngang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs
<p>279b</p>
<p>279b.1</p>par byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i khyad par yin te/ tha na gzhan gyis rjes su yi rang ba tsam gyis kyang de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / de'i phyir spyod pa rmad du byung bas theg pa dman pa las log pa dang zhugs pa brtan
<p>279b.2</p>pa dang gzhan gyi don la ched cher 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dgos pa du ma gzigs te/ de ston pa'i gzhung nye bar bkod pas 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pas rin po che chen po lta bu yin no/ /des na tshig 'di'i don dran par byas la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang 'di lta bu'i spyod pa rlabs po
<p>279b.3</p>che la gnas nas ji ltar tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur snyam du yid la bya'o/ /gzhan dag la spyod pa rlabs po che bsgrags shing mos pa bskyed du gzhug go/ /rnam par rtog pa shas che ba la ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'i gtam rgyas par bshad pa dga' ba la yang tha mal ba'i gtam spangs te gtam 'di lta bur
<p>279b.4</p>brjod par bya ste/ de dag kyang dad pa ma thob par thos pas kyang thar pa'i sa bon 'jog par byed do/ /mya ngan gyis gdungs pa dang yi chad cing zhum pa dag la mya ngan bsal zhing spro ba bskyed pas bya ste/ 'khor ba'i nyes pa la sogs pa dang 'phangs pa'i dus na yang bya ba de dag dang de lta bu byed na
<p>279b.5</p>bdag ci'i phyir zhum par byed snyam ste spro ba 'thob pa'o// //da ni yi ge'i dka' ba'i gnad cung zad bshad par brtsam par bya'o/ /rtsom pa dang 'bral ba'i yan lag tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po 'di ni don gsum du gnas te/ brjod bya dang rjod byed kyi khyad par gyis bshad par dam bca'
<p>279b.6</p>ba dang / dgos pa brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas bshad par dam bca' ba rgyas par bshad pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la mchod par brjod pa'o/ /de la brjod bya'i khyad par tshig gsum gyis bstan la/ de rjod byed ji lta bus brjod pa yang rkang pa tha mas bstan te 'di'i don ni byang chub sems
<p>279b.7</p>dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par don rmad du byung ba de snyan dngags kyi tshig ngo mtshar du gyur pa me tog gi phreng ba lta bus gsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba'o/ /de la thub pa'i sku tshe snga ma'i spyod pa zhes gsungs pa'i thub pa de ji lta bu zhe na/ dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rkang pa dang po gnyis te thub pa nyid kyi
<p>280a</p>
<p>280a.1</p>yon tan no/ /de dpal ldan ni khyad par gyi gzhi ste tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'byor pa dam pa gnyis dang ldan par ston to/ /yon tan dam pas yongs bzung bkra shis pa ni rang don phun sum tshogs pa ste yon tan dam pas ni stobs la sogs pa'o/ /des bzung ba ni
<p>280a.2</p>de dang ldan pa ste ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /bkra shis pa ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste sgrib pa thams cad spangs pas rgud pa thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /grags pa'i gzhir gyur ma smad shin tu yid du 'ong ba ni gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa ste de ni gzhan la phan 'dogs
<p>280a.3</p>pas rab tu phye ba'i gzugs kyi sku gnyis po'o/ /grags pa'i gzhir gyur pa ni gnyis ka yang gzhan la grags shing gzhan gyis mthong bas phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro/ /ma smad pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste gdul bya mchog gi yul du gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /shin tu yid 'ong ba
<p>280a.4</p>ni sprul pa'i sku ste gdul bya'i bsam pa dang mthun par 'jug pa'i phyir ro/ /thub pa ni spyi ming bye brag la 'jug pa ste thub pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid yang dag par bsdams pa yin la de thun mong ma yin pa dang ldan pa thub pa'i mchog la de skad ces bya'o/ /de'i sku tshe snga ma'i spyod pa
<p>280a.5</p>stag mo la lus byin pa la sogs pa ni rmad du byung ba ste bya dka' zhing phan 'dogs pa che ba'i phyir ro/ /yang na dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thub pa'i sku tshe snga ma nyid kyi gnas skabs kyi spyod pa mdzad pa'i dus kyi yon tan te rang don phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /yon tan dam pas
<p>280a.6</p>yongs su bzung ba ni shes rab dang snying rje la sogs pas bzung ba ste de dang ldan pa'o/ /bkra shis pa ni ser sna la sogs pa'i dri ma bsal bas rgud pa nye bar zhi ba'o/ /ma smad pa ni bsam pa'i khyad par snying rje chen po'o/ /shin tu yid du 'ong ba ni gzhan la phan 'dogs dga' ba'i phyir
<p>280a.7</p>nyan thos dang rang rgyal dang sangs rgyas gsum ka la 'jug pa la las 'dir skabs kyi stobs kyis/ sbyor ba'o/ /de nyid kyis ni grags pa'i gzhir gyur pa'o/ /de bdag gis snyan dngags kyis mchod de rjod byed des brjod bya la dga' ba bskyed do zhes bya ba'o/ /me tog snyim pa na gnas pa phul bas dga' ba skye ba'i
<p>280b</p>
<p>280b.1</p>rgyur gyur pa yin pas de dang chos mthun pas me tog snyim pas gus par mchod ces smos so/ /dgos pa brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas dam bca' ba rgyas par bshad pa ni tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te/ dgos pa brjod pa dang dgos pa de dang ldan pa brtsam par zhal gyis bzhes pa
<p>280b.2</p>ste tshigs su bcad pa re re dang rim pa bzhin no/ /grags pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa 'di rnams kyis te rtogs pas zhes bya ba la tshigs lhag ma'o/ /grags pa ni snyan dngags so/ /de'i rgyu mtshan ni mtshan mar gyur pa'o/ /bzod po ni spyod pa bzang po rmad du byung ba 'og nas 'byang
<p>280b.3</p>ba 'di rnams kyis te de dag rtogs shing shes bas so/ /'dir dgos pa gsum ste/ theg pa chen po'i/ /brtsam zhes sbyar ro/ /lam gsal bar byas pa dang / bstan pa lam zhugs pa dad par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa thun mong ba dang bstan pa la zhugs pa rnams chos dang mthun
<p>280b.4</p>pa'i gtam gyis dga' ba ste/ tshig gsum dang go rims bzhin no/ /de ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam du zad do/ /dgos pa de dang ldan pas rtsom pa ni snyan dngags 'di brtsams so zhes sbyar ro/ /snyan dngags de yang spros pas 'jigs pa la brjod bya bsdus pas khyad par du byas pa ste
<p>280b.5</p>'jig rten mchog gi spong ba dam pa'i phyogs tsam gyis shes par bya ba ste/ rdzogs po ni mtha' yas pas brjod mar mi nus so snyam du bsams pa'o/ /'jig rten na mchog tu gyur pa'i gang zag ni byang chub sems dpa' yin la/ de'i spyod shin tu nyung ngu / /pa ni spyod pa gzhan las
<p>280b.6</p>dam pa'i spyod pa ste de ni mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /des ni brjod bya bsdus pas khyad par du byas pa'o/ /rjod byed rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir/ mnyan du rung bar bya ba'i phyir lung dang gtsug lag rig par mi 'gal lam ngag gis 'di brtsams so zhes bya ba'o/ /nyan thos la sogs pa'i/ 
<p>280b.7</p>mkhas pa'i skye bas don bzang zhing tshig spel legs pas/ mnyan du rung bar bya ba'i phyir ram ched du lung bla ma brgyud pa dang mi 'gal ba dang / gtsug lag ni bka' dang mi 'gal ba dang / rig pa ni tshad ma dang rang gi tshig dang mi 'gal ba'o/ /de lta bu'i lam ni tshul te thabs su gyur pa'i tshig go/ /de
<p>281a</p>
<p>281a.1</p>ltar 'jig rten pa'i don 'gyur snyam nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma dgos pa gsum dang sbyar ro/ /'di brtsams zhes bya ba ni brjod bya'i khyad par te rjod par byed pa'i ngag dri ma med pa 'og nas 'byung ba 'di ces bya ba'o/ /de ltar dgos pa brjod nas yul khyad par can la phyag 'tshal
<p>281a.2</p>bas bsod nams 'phel ba ni rtsom pa mthar phyin pa'i yan lag yin pas dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal bar byed de/ de la sangs rgyas ni rgyu thun mong ma yin pa dang rang gi ngo bo thun mong ba ma yin pa'i yon tan gyis gzhan las khyad par du 'phags par ston te/ de la thun mong ma yin pa'i rang don brtson
<p>281a.3</p>pas gzhan don brtson pa/ phyi nang gi bar chad zhi bas/ gang yin pa'o/ /yon tan bsgrub pa bzang po'i rjes su mthun ma gyur/ /ces bya ba ste rang don brtson pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yin la/ gzhan don phyi rol ba dang nyan thos la sogs pa/ brtson pa gang yin pa'i yon tan bsgrub pa bzang po ni byang chub
<p>281a.4</p>sems dpa' ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don du zhugs pa nyid yon tan bsgrub pa yin la de nyid legs shing phan pas bzang po ste yon tan de mchog yin pas nyan thos kyi rjes su mthun par ma gyur te shin tu dman pas so/ /yang na rang don brtson pas gzhan don brtson pa gang yin pa'i
<p>281a.5</p>byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan bsgrub pa de mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bzang po'i rjes su mthun par gyur ces pa'i don to/ /des na khyad par du gyur pa'i yon tan de ni rgyus bsdus pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyi yon tan ni/ thams cad mkhyen ces
<p>281a.6</p>brjod pa ma nor gsal bar grags zhes smos te nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin te shes bya'i sgrib pa yang ma spangs pa'i phyir ro/ /des na sangs rgyas la thams cad mkhyen ces brjod pa ste/ don dang ldan pa'i brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
<p>281a.7</p>yang na 'di dag ni phyi rol pa'i ston pa thams cad mkhyen par 'du shes pa drang srong chen po gzegs zan dang ser skya la sogs pa'am khyab 'jug dang tshangs pa la sogs pa las khyad par du ston te/ de dag ni rang gi don la brtson te 'tshe ba la sogs pas bdag nyid kyi don bsgrub ste
<p>281b</p>
<p>281b.1</p>lha las phul du byung ba'i bstod par bshad pa lta bu'o/ /gzhan gyi don la brtson pa gang yin pa'i yon tan bsgrub pa bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhan la phan pa bsgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de'i rjes su mu stegs byed kyi ston pa mthun pa ma yin la 'di ni thams
<p>281b.2</p>cad mkhyen ces brjod pa ma nor gsal bar grags te brjod pa don dang mthun pa'o/ /yang na tshig rkang pa dang po gnyis kyis ni gzhan la phan pa bsgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan te/ phyi rol pa dang thar pa thob pa'i skye bo las khyad par du 'phags pa gzhan don bsgrub
<p>281b.3</p>pa'i thabs la gnas par ston la/ rkang pa gsum pas ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan te/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni sgrib pa thams cad zad pa'i mkhyen pa yin pas spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum nyan thos la sogs pa/ tshogs pa bstan to/ /de nyid kyis ni mnyam
<p>281b.4</p>med phyi rol pa'am slob pa thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar sangs rgyas la bstod nas/ chos dang dge 'dun zhes smos te/ ston pa de'i bstan pa dang slob pa'i tshogs dag yin te/ dkon mchog gsum la spyi bos btud pa ni phyag 'tshal ba ste/ phyag
<p>281b.5</p>'tshal ba ni bya ba'i khyad par yin te/ mgo sa la gtugs pa ni gtso bo yin pas de smos te/ yon tan brjod pas ngag sngon du 'gro bas yid ma smos kyang grub ste/ dngos su/ chos/ dge 'dun/ don gyis las gsum gyi rang bzhin no/ /yang na rtsom pa dang 'brel pa'i don gsum du gnas te/ rgyu'i
<p>281b.6</p>che ba la mchod pa brjod pa dang / dgos pa brjod pa'i sgo nas rgyu'i che ba de bshad par dam bca' ba dang / dam bcas pas mthar phyin pa'i yan lag 'bras bu dkon mchog gsum la mchod par brjod pa de/ tshigs su bcad pa gcig dang gnyis dang gcig gis rim pa bzhin no/ /de la don dang
<p>281b.7</p>po yang yul bsdus don 'di legs/ gang la gang zag gis/ mchod pa'i dngos po gang gis mchod pa ston te/ yul ni rkang pa dang po gsum mo/ /gang zag ni bdag gis zhes bya ba'o/ /mchod pa'i dngos po ni snyan dngags me tog snyim pa yis so/ /yul ni thub pa'i sku tshe snga ma'i spyod pa
<p>282a</p>
<p>282a.1</p>rmad du byung ba rnams so/ /khyad par du byed pa'i thub pa nyid bshad pa ni/ dpal ldan yon tan dam pa yongs bzung bkra shis pa/ /grags pa'i gzhir gyur ma smad shin tu yid du 'ong / /zhes pa'o/ /de'i yi ge'i don snga ma bzhin no/ /yang na sku tshe snga ma'i spyod pa
<p>282a.2</p>rmad du byung ba nyid ji lta bu zhe na/ dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste yi ge'i don ni snga ma bzhin no/ /rgyu'i che ba de bshad par dam bca' ba ni/ 'jig rten mchog gi spyod pa dam pa'i phyogs tsam gyis/ bdag gis snyan dngags 'di brtsams so zhes bya ba ste/ yi ge'i don ni snga ma
<p>282a.3</p>bzhin no/ /de yang dgos pa gang gis rtsom zhe na/ grags pa'i mtshan ma gyur pa zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste yi ge'i don ni snga ma bzhin no/ /dam bcas pa de mthar phyin pa'i yan lag rgyu'i che ba de'i 'bras bu thun mong ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang de'i
<p>282a.4</p>chos dang de sgrub pa'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang don bsgrub ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni gcig ste yi ge'i don ni snga ma bzhin no/ /rgyu med par byams pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i byams pa'i rgyur grags pa'i mdza' bshes dang phan btags pa la sogs pa med
<p>282a.5</p>pas rgyu med/ yin gyi byang chub kyi sems rab tu goms pa'i rgyu mchog tu gyur pa ni med pa ma yin no/ /bla ma'i don ni gsum gyis te/ bla mar byed pa dang / bla ma mgu ba byas pa dang / bla mar gyur pa ste tshig gsum dang sbyar ro/ /skyes pa'i las byas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
